LocalizedStrings.enGB: The highest rank of the standard nobility are the Archdukes, which are fixed at six members, each of whom rule one of the Archduchies of Cheliax. Archduke is a hereditary title that is held by a single family that has not changed much since the turmoil of the civil war.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 标准贵族的最高等级是大公，固定为六名成员，每名大公统治一个 切利亚斯 大公国。大公是一个世袭的头衔：，由一个家族拥有，自内战动荡以来没有太大变化。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 3rd level, and every three levels thereafter, a dreadknight can select one cruelty. Each cruelty adds an effect to the dreadknight's touch of profane corruption ability. Whenever the dreadknight uses profane corruption to deal damage to one target, the target also receives the additional effect from one of the cruelties possessed by the dreadknight.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第3级以及之后的每3级，恐惧骑士可以选择一种残虐。每一次残虐都会为恐惧骑士的亵渎之炎能力增加一个效果。每当恐惧骑士使用亵渎之炎对一个目标造成伤害时，该目标也会受到该恐惧骑士所拥有的残虐之一的额外效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Channeling negative energy causes a burst that damages every creature in a 30-foot radius centered on the Dread Knight. The amount of damage inflicted is equal to 1d6 points of damage plus 1d6 points of damage for every two Dread Knight levels beyond 1st (2d6 at 3rd, 3d6 at 5th, and so on). Creatures that take damage from channeled energy receive a Will save to halve the damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 引导负能量致其爆发，对以恐惧骑士为中心的30英尺半径内的所有生物造成伤害。造成的伤害量等于1d6点伤害加上1级之后每两个恐惧骑士等级1d6点伤害（3级2d6，5级3d6，依此类推）。受到引导能量伤害的生物可以通过一次成功的意志豁免将伤害减半。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Channeling negative energy causes a burst that heals every undead creature in a 30-foot radius centered on the Dread Knight. The amount of damage healed is equal to 1d6 points of damage plus 1d6 points of damage for every two Dread Knight levels beyond 1st (2d6 at 3rd, 3d6 at 5th, and so on).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 引导负能量致其爆发，对以恐惧骑士为中心的30英尺半径内的所有生物造成伤害。造成的伤害量等于1d6点伤害加上1级之后每两个恐惧骑士等级1d6点伤害（3级2d6，5级3d6，依此类推）。受到引导能量伤害的生物可以通过一次成功的意志豁免将伤害减半。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dread Knight
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恐惧骑士

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day as a swift action, she can channel her anger at one target within sight who is engaged in melee combat with her or an ally. She adds her Charisma modifier to her attack rolls and adds her Oathbreaker level to damage rolls against the target of her bane. In addition, while Oathbreaker's Bane is in effect, the Oathbreaker gains a deflection bonus equal to her Charisma bonus (if any) to her AC against attacks by the target of the smite.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，以一个迅捷动作，她可以将她的怒火引导到视线内的一个与她或一名盟友进行近战的目标身上。她将她的魅力调整值添加到她的攻击检定中，并将她的复仇暴徒等级添加到对她的祸害目标的伤害检定中。此外，当复仇制裁生效时，复仇暴徒在对抗祸害目标的攻击时获得等同于她的魅力加值（如果有的话）的偏斜加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, the Oathbreaker can, as a move action, indicate an enemy in combat and rally her allies to focus on that target. The Oathbreaker and her allies gain a +1 bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls against the target.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1级时，复仇暴徒可以以一个移动动作指定战斗中的敌人并召集她的盟友以集中攻击该目标。复仇暴徒和她的盟友在对目标的武器攻击和伤害检定上获得+1加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 2nd level, all of the Oathbreaker's allies are treated as if they possessed the same teamwork feats as the Oathbreaker for the purpose of determining whether the Oathbreaker receives a bonus from her teamwork feats. Her allies do not receive any bonuses from these feats unless they actually possess the feats themselves. The allies' positioning and actions must still meet the prerequisites listed in the teamwork feat for the Oathbreaker to receive the listed bonus.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 2级时，所有复仇暴徒的盟友都被视为拥有与复仇暴徒相同的团队专长，以确定复仇暴徒是否从她的团队专长中获得加成。但她的盟友不会从这些专长中受益，除非他们自己确实拥有这些专长。盟友的站位和行动仍然必须满足团队专长中列出的先决条件，复仇暴徒才能获得所列的加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Upon reaching 5th level, a dreadknight receives a boon from their dark patrons. This boon can take one of two forms. Once the form is chosen, it cannot be changed. The first type of bond allows the dread knight to enhance their weapon as a standard action by calling upon the aid of a fiendish spirit for 1 minute per dreadknight level. When called, the spirit causes the weapon to shed unholy light as a torch. At 5th level, this spirit grants the weapon a + 1 enhancement bonus.For every three levels beyond 5th, the weapon gains another + 1 enhancement bonus, to a maximum of + 6 at 20th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
5级时，恐惧骑士会从他们的亵渎领主那里获得恩惠。这种恩惠可以采取两种形式。一经选定，便不可更改。第一种恩惠允许恐惧骑士以一个标准动作来增强他们的武器，在每恐惧骑士等级/1分钟内呼唤恶魔之魂。当被召唤时，灵魂会使武器像火炬一样散发出邪恶的光芒。
在 5级时，灵魂给予武器+1增强加值。5级之后每3级，武器再获得+1增强加值，在20级时达到最高+6。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day, a dreadknight can reach out to the profane lords to grant sinful absolution to the forces arrayed against them. As a swift action, the dreadknight chooses one target within sight to crush. The dreadknight adds their Charisma bonus (if any) on their attack rolls and adds their dreadknight level on all damage rolls made against the target of their unholy smite. Regardless of the target, sinful absolution attacks automatically bypass any DR the creature might possess. In addition, while Sinful Absolution is in effect, the dreadknight gains a deflection bonus equal to their Charisma modifier(if any) to their AC against attacks made by the target of sinful absolution.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，恐惧骑士可以链接亵渎领主，以对抗对他们不利的势力。以一个迅捷动作，恐惧骑士选择一个视野内的目标进行粉碎。恐惧骑士在他们的攻击检定上加上他们的魅力调整值（如果有的话），并把他们的恐惧骑士等级加到对他们邪恶惩戒目标的所有伤害检定上。无论目标是什么，原罪斩攻击都会自动绕过该生物可能拥有的任何DR。此外，当原罪斩生效时，恐惧骑士在对抗原罪斩目标的攻击时获得等于其魅力调整值（如果有的话）的偏斜加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Beginning at 7th level as a swift action, a dreadknight can spend two uses of their touch of profane corruption to surround their weapon with a profane flame, causing terrible wounds to open on those they attacks. This ability works with any weapon.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 7级开始，以一个迅捷动作，恐惧骑士可以消耗两次亵渎之炎使用亵渎之炎围绕他们的武器，对他们攻击的人造成可怕的伤口。此能力适用于任何武器。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Beginning at 2nd level, a dreadknight can surround her hand with a profane flame, causing terrible wounds to open on those she touches. Alternatively, a dreadknight can use this power to heal undead creatures.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 2级开始，恐惧骑士可以用亵渎之炎围绕她的双手，对遭受他们攻击的人造成可怕的伤口。此能力适用于任何武器。或者，恐惧骑士可以使用这个力量来治疗不死生物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Upon reaching 5th level, a paladin/dreadknight forms a divine/profane bond with her weapon. As a standard action, she can call upon the aid of a celestial/fiendish spirit for 1 minute per paladin/dreadknight level.
At 5th level, this spirit grants the weapon a +1 enhancement bonus. For every three levels beyond 5th, the weapon gains another +1 enhancement bonus, to a maximum of +6 at 20th level. These bonuses can be added to the weapon, stacking with existing weapon bonuses to a maximum of +5.
Alternatively, they can be used to add any of the following weapon properties: axiomatic/anarchic, brilliant energy/vorpal, defending, disruption/vicious, flaming, flaming burst, holy/unholy, keen, and speed depending on class. Adding these properties consumes an amount of bonus equal to the property's cost. These bonuses are added to any properties the weapon already has, but duplicate abilities do not stack.
A paladin/dreadknight can use this ability once per day at 5th level, and one additional time per day for every four levels beyond 5th, to a total of four times per day at 17th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
达到 5 级后，圣武士/恐惧骑士与她的武器形成神圣/亵渎的联系。以一个标准动作，她可以在每圣武士/恐惧骑士等级 1 分钟内召唤一个天界/恶魔之魂的帮助。
在5级时，这种精魂使武器获得+1增强加值。5级以及之后的每3个等级，该武器将获得另一个+1增强加值，在 20 级时达到最大+6。这些加值可以添加到武器上，与现有的武器增强加值叠加，最大+5。或者，它们可用于添加以下任何武器属性：公正/无序、光能/斩首、护体、瓦解/恶毒、炽焰、焰爆、神圣/邪恶、锐锋和追击，具体取决于职业。添加这些属性会占用增强加值。这些加成会添加到武器已有的任何属性中，但重复的能力不会叠加。圣武士/恐惧骑士可以
在5级时每天使用一次此能力，超过 5级时每4级每天可以额外使用次数一次，在17级时每天可以使用4次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Divine/Profane Weapon Bond
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣/亵渎武器盟誓

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This amulet allows the wearer to cast Reduce Person as a 6th level wizard once pey day.

When eaten goodberries heal 2d4 point of damage, however if they are eaten more than once every 24 hours they can make the creature that ate them sick for a short time.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 食用神莓会治疗 2d4 点伤害，但是如果每 24 小时食用超过一次，它们会使食用它们的生物在短时间内生病。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: All attacks deal 25 bleed damage that triggers each round but does not stack with itself.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 所有攻击造成25点流血伤害/轮，但无法叠加。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: All attacks deal 1 bleed damage that triggers each round and stacks with itself.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 所有攻击造成1点流血伤害/轮，但无法叠加

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A small bunch of magic berries made from plant matter with druidic magic.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 一小束由植物物质制成的魔法浆果，带有德鲁伊魔法。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A amulet common to those who raise animals for riding, allowing them to start training early.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 饲养动物的人常用的护身符，可以让他们尽早开始训练。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Source of Uncleanness, The Primal Clay of Life's First Lurch   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Disease, Fecundity, Oozes  
Rank: Outer God  
Domains: Chaos, Darkness, Earth, Madness, Strength   
Subdomains: Caves, Ferocity, Insanity, Night, Nightmare, Resolve   
Favoured Weapon: Whip (Dagger)   
Holy Symbol: Tentacle coiled around a disembodied eye  
In the deepest reaches of every world lie vast caverns that, in most cases, have been long forgotten or simply never discovered by that world’s inhabitants in the first place. On Golarion, these deep pathways and hidden realms are known as the Darklands, but similar extensive networks exist on countless other worlds. It is in these forgotten midnight grottoes that Abhoth, the Source of Uncleanness, the Primal Clay of Life’s First Lurch, seeps and clots and spews forth its aberrant spawn. Abhoth has an otherworldly wisdom and a staggering intellect, yet it does not devote its mind to matters that mortals could comprehend. It’s not so much trapped as it is cradled in a cavern lair connected to many worlds. The creatures it constantly spawns that manage to escape its ravenous gluttony and eternal hunger stagger upward through the nighted ways, growing stronger and larger the longer they survive. The greatest find paths through ancient portals in those caves to other worlds, where they may spawn entire societies and races of their own. Abhoth’s cultists maintain that all life in the universe was spawned by the Unclean God, and that in our flesh and bones lie traces of its divine excretions. Abhoth appears as a vast lake of seething, surging, protoplasmic ooze in which eyes and mouths and limbs and organs constantly form and are consumed. Those creations that drip from its bulk gain sentience of their own, and through them Abhoth can see and explore and infect any world they touch.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：不净之源
阵营：混乱中立 
神职：疾病，多产与泥形生物
等级：外神
领域：混乱，黑暗，大地，疯狂，力量
子领域：洞窟、凶猛、疯狂、暗夜、梦魇、决意
偏好武器：鞭子（匕首）
圣徽：触手缠绕的独立眼球
在每个世界的最深之所在都有着巨型的洞穴，大多情况下，这些洞穴早已被遗忘又或根本未曾被这个世界的居民发现过。在格拉里昂，这些深邃的通道和隐藏的国度被称作幽暗地域，但类似的广阔网系也存在于无数其他世界。正是在这些遭到遗忘的午夜洞窟之中，不净之源，初创生命之原初胚土，阿布霍斯，渗出、凝结并喷出其变异后代。
阿布霍斯拥有超凡的睿智与惊人的智能，但祂并不专注于任何凡人能够理解的事务。与其说是祂被困在一个与众多世界相连的洞巢之中，不如说祂懒在其中。由祂不断繁育创造的生物设法逃离祂无尽的贪婪和永恒的饥渴，蹒跚地攀上漆黑如夜的通路，成长得越是强壮越是硕大便能存活越久。这其中最为伟大者在洞穴之中找到了通往其他世界的古老门户，或能在彼方孕育出自己的社群和种族。
阿布霍斯的信徒们认为宇宙中的所有生命皆由不净之神孕育，在我们的血肉与骨骼之中都留存有祂的圣性分泌物。阿布霍斯形如沸腾且汹涌的原生质泥形生物，眼睛、嘴巴、四肢和其他器官在其中不断形成又被重新吞没。从主体中滴落的造物能够获得自己的感知能力，而阿布霍斯能够通过它们看到、探索和感染任何其所接触的世界。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Abhoth
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 阿布霍斯

You take a –2 penalty on saving throws against mind-affecting effects and add hypnotism to your list of 1st-level oracle spells known.

Titles: Master of the Final Incantation, Demon Lord of Forbidden Lore and Magic  
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Forbidden lore, Magic, Snakes  
Domains: Chaos, Evil, Knowledge, Magic  
Subdomains: Arcane, Demon, Education, Memory, Thought   
Favoured Weapon: Flail   
Holy Symbol: Demonic face encircled by a serpent with two snake tails descending from the mouth   
Sacred Animal: Snake   
Abraxas is the demon lord of forbidden lore and magic, and called the Master of the Final Incantation. He is said to know countless magical formulae, spells, and secrets, including the Final Incantation, a single word so powerful its speaking causes the annihilation of magic.Although Abraxas’s following is strongest among the drow of Golarion, one can expect to find small cults of Abraxas in most large cities on the surface. His cult is particularly strong in Nex’s capital city of Quantium, where it maintains a notorious library called Scrivenbough, a fortified stone structure with countless rare books in its holdings, and cultists who tattoo their greatest secrets on hidden parts of their bodies.
Abraxas

You have found a way to force dark powers to grant you additional uses of the Sinful Absolution ability. 
Benefit: You can use Sinful Absolution a number of additional times per day equal to half your mythic rank.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你已经找到了一种方法来强迫黑暗力量授予你原罪斩能力的额外使用次数。好处：你每天可以额外使用原罪斩，次数等于你神话等级的一半。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Abundant Sin
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 罪孽深重

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You are cursed with misfortune and sorrow, and you cannot gain benefit from morale bonuses. However, you gain a +4 bonus to all saving throws against curse effects.
You are cursed with misfortune and sorrow, and you cannot gain benefit from morale bonuses. However, you gain a +4 bonus to all saving throws against curse effects.
Accursed

Titles: The Mantis God, He Who Walks in Blood   
Alignment: Lawful Evil   
Areas of Concern: Blood, Death. Assassination   
Domains: Death, Evil, Law, Trickery, War   
Subdomains: Blood, Deception, Devil, Murder, Tactics, Thievery   
Favoured Weapon: Sawtooth saber (Falcata)   
Holy Symbol: Crossed mantis claws   
Sacred Animal: Crimson Mantis   
Achaekek's status as a deity is sometimes debated, but many theologians agree that he was the first entity created by the gods to carry out their will. There is general disagreement as to who exactly is responsible for Achaekek's creation, although it was most likely an alliance of several deities—or perhaps, as his own church suggests, Achaekek's creator might have been a deity long ago murdered by Achaekek himself. According to the Windsong Testaments, Achaekek was one of the first eight deities of this incarnation of creation, and originated as a lawful neutral judge over good and evil. When the first deities turned their attention toward the Material Plane, Achaekek stood sentinel at the edge of Pharasma's Spire to oversee the creation of life. Near the end of the Age of Creation, when Rovagug was rampaging across creation, Achaekek consumed his own impartiality and descended into savagery, becoming a mindless beast. Whatever his true origins may be, Achaekek was created as an agent for the gods, an enforcer of divine justice, specifically targeting all mortals who hoped to usurp the power of a god and achieve divinity. Not wishing to be become targets of He Who Walks in Blood themselves, however, they made him incapable of killing those who truly were gods, restricting his powers to slay those of demigod status or below.

领域：死亡、邪恶、守序、诡计、战争

偏好武器：锯齿剑（反曲剑） 
圣徽：交叉的螳螂爪 
圣兽：深红螳螂 
虽然阿卡艾克克的神力起源在学者间多有争论，但普遍观点认为阿卡艾克克是一个造物——某个神祗或者某些神祗创造了它，用以摧毁那些盗窃神祗地位的存在，从此以后，阿卡艾克克就成了神罚的代言人。
被冠以浴血行者之名，阿卡艾克克沐浴着信徒与异教徒的鲜血，沉眠在骨园（Boneyard）尖塔的底部，一个名为鲜血之谷（Blood Vale）的位面里。他与任何神祗都没有正式的关联，就连他的妹妹——屡屡劝说阿卡艾克克反抗诸神、放弃他的使命的祖母蜘蛛（Grandmother Spider）也不例外。反过来，即使有些神祗并不同意阿卡艾克克的做法，也很少有人公开反对他。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Achaekek
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 阿卡艾克克

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You channel the pure and uncorrupted energy of Nirvana.
Touch of Good: You can touch a creature as a standard action, granting a sacred bonus on attack rolls, skill checks, ability checks, and saving throws equal to half your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1) for 1 round. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Protective Aura: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot protective aura as a standard action. Allies in this aura receive a +2 deflection bonus to AC and a +2 resistance bonus on all saving throws. Additionally, the aura protects from attempts to dominate or charm the subject made by evil creatures. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你已将生命与灵魂奉献给善良与纯洁。
善良之触：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你可使所{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触{/g}的生物在{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击检定{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能检定{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}属性检定{/g}以及{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}时获得崇圣{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，加值数等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级（最小为1），持续1轮。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
防护灵光：到了8级，你能用标准动作发动30尺的防护灵光，盟友得到AC+2偏斜加值和豁免+2抗力加值，并且获得防护邪恶效果（AC豁免不叠加）。你每天能使用的轮数等于牧师等级，不必连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: In melee combat, you can help your allies attack or defend by distracting or interfering with an opponent. If you’re in position to make a melee attack on an opponent you can attempt to aid your allies against that enemy as a standard action. The distracted enemy is inflicted with a -2 penalty to either their AC against the next attack by your allies, or a -2 penalty on their next attack roll against your allies. This penalty only applies to the first attack roll and is removed after 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在近战中，您可以通过分散或干扰对手来帮助您的盟友进攻或防御。如果你处于对对手进行近战攻击的位置，你可以尝试以一个标准动作帮助你的盟友对抗该敌人。分心的敌人在对抗你盟友的下一次攻击时，他们的 AC 将受到 -2 惩罚，或者在他们对你盟友的下一次攻击检定中受到 -2 惩罚。此惩罚仅适用于第一次攻击检定，并在 1 轮后移除。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Aid Another
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 援助他人

By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Air: Increase your current speed by 30 feet and gain a +1 dodge bonus to your AC.

Titles: She of the Six Venoms, Lord of Scorpions 
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Sand, Scorpions, Thirst   
Domains: Animal, Chaos, Evil, Sun   
Subdomains: Demon, Feather, Fur, Insect, Light, Thirst 
Favoured Weapon: Kukri   
Holy Symbol: Sandy gold scorpion   
Sacred Animal: Scorpion   
Aldinach’s cults are strongest in deserts, particularly in Osirion’s wastelands and the remote reaches of Rahadoum, where her cultists work to seduce and corrupt that realm’s godless citizens. Aldinach is one of Lamashtu’s daughters, although since Lamashtu’s ascension to divinity, the two have not associated overmuch. The same cannot be said of her relationship with her sister Areshkagal, with whom Aldinach is locked in an eternal war. Ever since Aldinach stole the Abyssal realm known as the Sea of Whispering Sands from her sister, forcing Areshkagal into exile in the desolate Blood Clefts, Aldinach has been forced to defend her desert realm constantly from her sister’s increasingly desperate attempts to reclaim her lost territory. Although she has ruled the Whispering Sands for only a few dozen centuries, already she has inspired her minions to create hundreds of eerie desert cities in her honor, hidden amid the trackless sands.
Aldinach

Titles: The Welcomer   
Alignment: Lawful Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Doors, Transitions, Years   
Domains: Community, Law, Magic, Protection   
Subdomains: Arcane, Defense, Home, Inevitable   
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Two faces in profile   
Sacred Animal: Tortoise   
Alseta acts as a guardian of boundaries. She strengthens city gates, shields guards from invaders’ arrows, and turns away unwelcome visitors. Alseta is also a guardian of metaphorical boundaries, particularly those related to time and life. Those who earn Alseta’s favor find that physical blockades often open easily to them, or that metaphorical obstacles melt away more easily than expected. They uncover new opportunities in unexpected places, and receive flashes of insight that illuminate options that otherwise wouldn’t have occurred to them. Alseta appears as a kindly human woman dressed in simple gray clothing, and she wears a smiling mask on the back of her head.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：迎宾之主
阵营：守序中立 
神职：门扉，传送，入口，传统
领域：联盟、守序、魔法、保护 
子领域：秘示域、防御、家园、制裁
偏好武器：匕首 
圣徽：侧面的两张脸 
圣兽：乌龟
奥尔塞塔是掌管转变之神。无论是物理上的位移，跨越门扉，还是象征意义的转变，甚至于时间的流动不息——这一切都处于奥尔塞塔的影响之下。她守望着城市的大门，帮助他们将入侵者隔绝在外，给防御者带来安全。她也守望着那些进入新的人生阶段的人，无论是诞生，迈入婚姻殿堂，还是更健康的身体。对每个人而言，在生活面临转折时向奥尔塞塔寻求指引都是常见之事，比如搬到一座新的城镇，或者换新的工作。同样，出生和死亡都是转折，所以怀孕的母亲和死者的亲属也都会献上祈祷，让奥尔塞塔的教会和法莱斯玛的教会也产生关联。有些人认为奥尔塞塔也是传送之神，虽然她从未公开承认过这一名号。她同时也是一位在精灵的国家和文化中有着诸多追随者的神祗，他们将奥尔塞塔与精灵遍布格拉里昂的艾厄达拉传送门联系在一起。
作为迎宾之主，奥尔塞塔也认同以礼相待的价值观。她尊重礼遇一切生灵，从最渺小的动物，到最强大的神明；同时，她也期望被相应地回以礼遇。她要求她的追随者在与人相交时以她为榜样。奥尔塞塔的追随者中常见外交家，谈判家，以及其他本地行政部门的成员。奥尔塞塔的牧师以公正和平等对待他人而著称，他们中的很多人会被传召去帮助本地的居民，甚至有些教会会帮助解决争端，或者去监督重要的典礼。
奥尔塞塔通常化身为一个慈祥的年长女性，在后脑带着一个微笑着的面具。她衣着简朴，通常一身灰色。当她开口时，她挑选措辞总是屡经斟酌，反复衡量。她的话语中带着强烈的权威和无边的睿智，令人难以轻忽她词句的重量。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Alseta
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥尔塞塔

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Early Rider
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 新生骑手

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Grandmother Crow   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Consolation, Respect, Security   
Domains: Good, Knowledge, Law, Protection   
Subdomains: Archon, Defense, Education, Memory, Purity   
Favoured Weapon: Quarterstaff   
Holy Symbol: Hand with willow staff   
Sacred Animal: Crow   
Andoletta was an archon before ascending to the status of empyreal lord, and retains much of that celestial order’s low tolerance for nonsense. She most often wears the shape of a stern but kindly grandmother with her hair in a smooth bun, piercing hazel eyes, a firm set to her mouth, and a low voice, but she can also take the form of a crow. She is implacable in her opposition to evil, but is the first to remind her celestial kin that if victories come without care for the vulnerable, the battle is won at the cost of the war. Adults often find it difficult to look her in the eye, yet many an orphaned child has been awakened from a nightmare by a hand stroking his hair, then lulled back to peaceful sleep by the creaking of a rocking chair and an unshakable sense that he is cherished and protected. Few have seen Grandmother Crow’s feather cape open into her great black wings, but the thunderclap that accompanies such a moment leaves even demon lords shaken, while those who shelter behind her find any fear dispelled. Though she prefers to avoid battles, seeing Heaven as defined most by what it does while it is at peace rather than at war, Andoletta is a cunning, inimitable opponent when roused. She roams Golarion’s most dire places, seeking cracks in evildoers’ resolve through which the light of redemption can enter their souls, fanning the sparks of hope in any weary hearts of the virtuous, reminding the grieving that sorrow need not consume their capacity for joy, and teaching hard lessons to those who would prey on the less fortunate.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：祖母鸦
阵营：守序善良 
神职：慰藉，尊重与安宁
领域：善良、知识、守序、保护
子领域：亚空、防御、教育、记忆、纯净
偏好武器：木棍
圣徽：手握柳树杖
圣兽：乌鸦
被称为祖母鸦的安多莱塔象征慰藉，尊重与安宁。她明确地区分有罪者与无辜者，不容许任何模糊的中间地带。对于那些被诬陷者，或是展现出寻求救赎迹象之人，她愿意向他们提供一条重归光明的道路。路长且艰，但总是值得践行，而安多莱塔将始终陪伴在那些踏上漫长救赎之旅的行路之人身侧。对于那些真正的邪恶之人和毫无忏悔之意者，安多莱塔绝不容情。为此，安多莱塔的化身经常出现在法庭上。在这里，她可以监督并确保被指控犯罪之人得到公正的裁决。安多莱塔也十分重视对于死者的尊敬，以及对于孩童的呵护。在她看来，慰藉痛失所爱之人是一种真正的仁慈与同情之心，而孩子们则拥有无量的善之潜能——只要他们能够得到充足的保护，使他们远离邪恶的侵蚀。
当她出现在凡人面前时，祖母鸦展示出苍老妇人的形象：白发苍苍，满面皱纹，双眼中放射出敏锐感知的光辉。她手持拐杖，肩膀上披着一件由黑色乌鸦羽毛制成的斗篷，看起来就像一双折叠着的大翅膀。
安多莱塔的信徒通常包括年长者，困惑者，失去至亲之人，被诬告者，调查员和法官。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Andoletta
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 安多莱塔

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Animal: You gain low-light vision, scent, a +6 natural armor bonus, and a bite attack that deals damage as normal for a creature of your size.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
动物：你获得昏暗视觉、嗅觉、+6 天生防御加值，以及对应你体型伤害骰的啮咬攻击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Guardian of the Tomb   
Alignment: Lawful Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Burial, The Dead, Funeral Rites, Mummification, Tombs   
Domains: Death, Earth, Law, Protection , Repose   
Subdomains: Ancestors, Defense, Inevitable, Metal, Purity, Souls   
Favoured Weapon: Flail   
Holy Symbol: Black Jackal Head   
Sacred Animal: Jackal   
Virtually every Osirian tomb contains images of the jackal-headed god Anubis, the god of mummification and protector of tombs. He presides over funerals and embalming, and guides souls to Pharasma to await their judgment in the afterlife, punishing tomb robbers and defending the dead on their journeys to the Boneyard. Anubis is the son of Osiris and Nephthys, and assisted Isis with Osiris's mummification. Like his father, Anubis frequently comes into conflict with Set, particularly regarding that god's association with undeath. As a guardian of the dead and their tombs, Anubis frequently works with Isis, Neith, Nephthys, and Selket, who protect the canopic jars containing the organs of the deceased. Anubis usually appears as a man with jet-black skin and the head of a jackal, though he sometimes takes the entire form of a jackal. Clerics and paladins of Anubis are dedicated to destroying undead creatures wherever they find them.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：坟墓守护者 
阵营：守序中立 
关注领域：埋葬、亡者、葬礼仪式、木乃伊化、坟墓 
领域：死亡、大地、守序、保护、安息 
次领域：死亡、大地、守序、保护、安息 、
死亡、大地、守序、保护、安息 
子域：祖先、防御、不可避免、金属、纯洁、灵魂 
最喜爱的武器：连枷 
神圣的象征：黑豺头 
神圣动物：豺狼 
几乎所有奥西里斯人的坟墓中都有豺头神阿努比斯的形象，他是木乃伊之神和坟墓的保护神。他主持葬礼和防腐工作，引导灵魂前往法拉斯玛（Pharasma）等待来世的审判，惩罚盗墓者，保护死者前往骨葬地。阿努比斯是奥西里斯和奈芙提斯之子，曾协助伊希斯将奥西里斯制成木乃伊。和他的父亲一样，阿努比斯经常与赛特发生冲突，尤其是在赛特与亡灵的关系上。作为死者及其坟墓的守护者，阿努比斯经常与伊希斯、尼特、奈菲斯和塞尔凯特一起保护装有死者器官的罐子。阿努比斯通常以拥有黑色皮肤和豺狼头的男子形象出现，但有时也会变成豺狼的整体形态。阿努比斯的牧师和圣骑士致力于消灭任何地方的亡灵生物。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：陵寝卫士
阵营：守序中立
神职：埋葬、死者、葬礼、木乃伊化、陵墓
领域：死亡、大地、守序、保护、宁静
子领域：先祖、防御、裁决、金属、纯净、灵魂
偏好武器：连枷
圣徽：黑豺狼头
圣兽：豺狼
奥西里昂举国上下的每个陵墓之中几乎都有木乃伊化之神，陵寝守护者─狼首之神阿努比斯的画像或雕刻。祂监督著丧葬与防腐仪式，引导亡灵至法莱斯玛处静待冥府审判，制裁盗墓贼并在死者前往骨园的路上保护他们。
阿努比斯是欧西里斯与奈芙蒂斯之子，并协助伊西斯将欧西里斯制作成木乃伊。一如其父，阿努比斯常与赛特冲突，特别是因为后者与不死的牵连。身为死者与陵墓守护者的阿努比斯常与保护装载亡者脏器的卡诺波坛的伊西斯、奈斯、奈芙蒂斯及赛尔凯特共事。阿努比斯通常以皮肤乌黑颈上狼首的人类形象示人，但有时也会以完整的豺狼造型显现。
侍奉阿努比斯的牧师与圣骑士致力消灭所见的一切不死生物。阿努比斯是防腐官的守护神，祭司与防腐官常穿戴复盖整颗头的豺狼面具来纪念祂。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Anubis
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 阿努比斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Devourer of the Dawn   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Chaos, Darkness, Destruction, Snakes   
Domains: Chaos, Darkness, Destruction, Evil, Scalykind   
Subdomains: Catastrophe, Demon, Dragon, Entropy, Fear, Night   
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Coiled Serpent   
Sacred Animal: Snake   
Born in the waters of primeval chaos before creation, the malevolent serpent Apep stands in sharp contrast to the more benevolent serpent goddess Wadjet. Apep is the personification of chaos and darkness, the hidden dangers that lurk just beneath the surface, the deadly whorls and eddies that drown and swallow, and the hungry river snakes that prey on those who venture too near the water's edge. Apep is the raging rapids, the boundless flood that inundates and sweeps away all that mortals seek to build. He is the darkness in the water's depths that swallows light and life, devouring the sun and plunging the world into eternal night. Said to dwell in the Tenth Region of Night, Apep is the great enemy of the sun god Ra, and ancient Osirians believed each sunrise was but a temporary victory, for the Devourer of the Dawn always waits to seize and consume the sun again and again, until one day the sun shall rise no more and all shall be ended. Apep is a great golden serpent miles long, and his crushing coils encircle the world. He also appears as a fearsome dragon with night-black scales, and evil dragons of Osirion venerate him in this form. Apep's human cults are secretive, usually meeting at night or under the cloak of darkness. These evil sects keep themselves hidden from the public eye lest they attract the wrath of those who follow the more benevolent and helpful gods.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：黎明的吞噬者 
阵营：混乱邪恶 
关注领域：混沌，黑暗，毁灭，蛇类 
领域：混沌，黑暗，毁灭，邪恶，鳞类混沌、黑暗、毁灭、邪恶、鳞类 
次领域：灾难、恶魔、龙、熵、恐惧、黑夜 
最喜爱的武器：匕首 
神圣的象征：盘蛇 
圣兽：蛇 
在创世之前，恶蛇阿佩普诞生于原始混沌之水，与仁慈的蛇女神瓦杰特形成鲜明对比。阿佩普是混乱和黑暗的化身，是潜伏在水面下的隐秘危险，是淹没和吞噬人的致命漩涡，是捕食过于靠近水边冒险者的饥饿河蛇。阿佩普是汹涌的急流，是无边无际的洪水，淹没并卷走凡人试图建造的一切。他是水底的黑暗，吞噬光明和生命，吞噬太阳，让世界陷入永恒的黑夜。据说阿佩普居住在第十黑夜区域，是太阳神拉的大敌，古代奥西里斯人相信每次日出都只是暂时的胜利，因为黎明的吞噬者总是在等待着一次又一次地夺取和吞噬太阳，直到有一天太阳不再升起，一切都将结束。阿佩普是一条巨型的金色巨蛇，长达数英里，它那令人窒息的盘绕环绕着整个世界。他还会化身为长着夜黑色鳞片的可怕巨龙，奥西瑞恩的恶龙们会以这种形态崇拜他。阿佩普的人类崇拜非常隐秘，通常在夜间或黑暗的笼罩下聚会。这些邪恶的教派一直隐藏在公众视线之外，以免招致那些更仁慈、更乐于助人的神灵的愤怒。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：吞日大蛇
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：浑沌、黑暗、破灭、蛇
领域：混乱、黑暗、破坏、邪恶、鳞类
子领域：天灾、恶魔、龙、熵、恐惧、暗夜
偏好武器：匕首
圣徽：盘旋巨蛇
圣兽：蛇
在天地创生前从原初浑沌的水中降生的恶蛇阿佩普与善良蛇神瓦吉特成了鲜明的对比。阿佩普是混乱、黑暗、安稳表面下的厄难、吞人致命的漩涡与乱流、以及在水边猎食大意者的河蛇之化身。阿佩普即是汹涌激流，是要将凡人成就洗灭殆尽的洪水。祂是在水下深处吞噬光明与生命，活吞太阳后让世间陷入无尽长夜的深邃黑暗。
传说中栖息在第十夜国的阿佩普是太阳神拉的死敌，古奥西里昂人认为每天的日出仅仅是暂时击退阿佩普，而吞日大蛇总是一次又一次地等待吞下太阳的机会，终有一天拉会败北，天地必将灭绝。阿佩普是条千里长的金色巨蛇，其身躯缠绕着世界。祂也会以暗鳞巨龙的姿态显现，而奥西里昂的邪恶龙族崇拜此形象。阿佩普的人类信徒组织了秘密邪教，通常在夜深时或黑暗中集会。这些邪教徒由于不想被其他更仁慈或善良的神的信众所骚扰，将自己的信仰掩藏了起来。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Apep
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 阿佩普

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Horseman of Pestilence, Prince of Locusts, Prince of Plagues
Alignment: Neutral Evil 
Areas of Concern: Pestilence 
Domains: Air, Darkness, Destruction, Evil 
Subdomains: Catastrophe, Daemon, Loss, Night, Plague 
Favoured Weapon: Scythe 
Holy Symbol: Diseased yellow scythe 
Sacred Animal: Horse, rat   
Apollyon, the Horseman of Pestilence, takes the form of a pockmarked giant with the head of a diseased ram. His pustule-covered body is wrapped in a cloak made from the stitched-together skins of angels, and his bow spreads disease wherever its arrows fall. Whether from his throne of bone and flesh or atop his bleeding, ulcerated mount, the Horseman of Pestilence and his skull-headed deacons spread disease like wildfire across the worlds of the Material Plane.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:

神圣象征：生病的黄色镰刀 
神圣动物：马、老鼠 
瘟疫骑士阿波利昂（Apollyon）是一个满脸麻子的巨人，长着生病公羊的头。他满是脓疱的身体裹在用天使的皮缝制的斗篷里，他的弓箭所到之处都会传播疾病。瘟疫骑士和他的骷髅头执事们，无论是从他的骨肉宝座上，还是在他那流血溃烂的坐骑上，都像野火一样在物质界的各个世界传播疾病。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Apollyon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亚玻伦

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Waybringer, The Exiled Wyrm, Maker of All   
Realm: Immortal Ambulatory, a traveling demi-plane   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Good Dragons, Glory, Leadership, Peace   
Domains: Artifice, Good, Law, Travel, Scalykind   
Subdomains: Archon, Construct, Dragon, Exploration, Judgment, Toll, Trade   
Favoured Weapon: Bite, Quarterstaff (Arcana)  
Holy Symbol: Silver Dragon above Pool   
Sacred Colours: Metallic Colors  
Apsu is the patron deity of all good and metallic dragons, and one of the oldest gods of the Great Beyond. Along with Tiamat, he is believed to be one of the two original creator beings of the multiverse. According to draconic lore, in the dawn of time there flowed two waters, fresh and salt, which became Apsu and Tiamat, parents of the first gods. However, their eldest son Dahak came to Hell to rampage, then killed his siblings, whose shattered remains fell into the Material Plane and became the first metallic dragons. Enraged, the fresh water descended upon the Material Plane to confront his son, saying the eternal words: "I shall then be Apsu, for I am the first". 
Appearance: Apsu appears as a regal silver dragon dwarfing the largest great wyrms. His scales sparkle with a pearlescent glow.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：引路者
阵营：守序善良
神职：善龙、领导与和平
领域：工匠，善良，守序，旅行，鳞类 
子领域：亚空、构装体、龙、探索、审判、劳累、交易
偏好武器：啮咬或木杖（木棍） 
圣徽：水池上方的银龙
阿普苏乃最古老且最雄伟的存在。
根据龙族传说，时间之初存在两种水，淡水和咸水，其后化阿普苏及祂的伙伴——提亚玛特。此夫妇诞下了创造所有凡人世界的龙神们，但其长子，毁灭者达哈克，往地狱狂欢喧闹并且横冲直撞，使它成为幽暗与业火之地。
祂是绝大部分龙的父亲形象，祂爱戴祂的孩子，以及那些祖上为龙的生物，不论是字面上或比喻上的意思。唯一例外的是效忠于祂那残忍兼破坏性的孩子——达哈克的信徒，阿普苏预期他们会受到最终且可怕的清算。为此，善良阵营的龙与那些为其忠诚的龙类血脉祖先而战的生物，将滔滔不断地向伟大的阿普苏祈祷，相信祂必定能伸张正义。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Apsu
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 阿普苏

LocalizedStrings.enGB: All spells provided by Apsu's domains and subdomains are added to the Silver Champions spellbook.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 阿普苏的领域和子域提供的所有法术都添加到银冠勇士法术书中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Apsu's Gift
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 阿普苏的赠礼

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A shimmering, blue and gold radiance surrounds you, enhancing arcane spells cast within its area. Any arcane spell cast by a creature within 10 feet of the caster gains a +1 enhancement bonus to the DC of any saving throws against the spell, and is cast as if one of either the Extend Spell or Reach spell metamagic feats have been applied to it (without increasing the spell level or Casting Time; you choose the metamagic feat when you cast arcane concordance).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 闪烁的蓝金光芒环绕着你，可以增强在其范围内施放的奥术。施法者 10 英尺范围内的生物所施放的任何奥术法术都会在针对该法术的任何豁免检定的 DC 值上获得+1 的强化加成，并且施法时就像应用了法术延时或及远法术的法术超魔一样（不会增加法术等级或施法时间；您可以在施放奥术协调时选择法术超魔）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Arcane Concordance
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥术协约

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action you can become a beacon of arcane energy for 2 rounds. The aura emanates 15 feet from you. All arcane spells cast within the aura gain a +1 bonus to their caster level. You can use arcane beacon a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

You are affected by a arcane aura. All arcane spells you cast increase their caster level by 1.

You are a true scholar of the mystic arts, harnessing the fusion of arcane and divine. 
Arcane Beacon: As a standard action you can become a beacon of arcane energy for 2 rounds. The aura emanates 15 feet from you. All arcane spells cast within the aura either gain a +1 bonus to their caster level or increase their saving throw DC by +1. The caster chooses the benefit when she casts the spell. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. 
Dispelling Touch: At 8th level, you can use a targeted dispel magic effect as a melee touch attack. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time per day for every four levels in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th.

The arcanists studies into the abilities of drakes have given them knowledge on how to exploit the rules of magic and nature regarding them. All draconic exploits can only target ally drakes and once a drake is targeted by a exploit it cannot benefit from another for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥术师对龙兽能力的研究让他们知道如何利用魔法和自然守序强化龙兽。所有的龙类专研只对盟友的龙兽生效，并且一旦一只龙兽被强化，它在 1 分钟内无法接受另一种强化。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Exploits
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙类专研

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A draconic scholar gains a drake companion, the drake commpanion levels along with the draconic scholar as if they where a draconic druid of the same level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙语学者会获得一个龙语同伴，龙语同伴的等级与龙语学者相同，就好像他们是同等级的龙语德鲁伊。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A draconic scholar gains a drake companion, the drake commpanion levels along with the draconic scholar as if they where a draconic druid of the same level.
This ability replaces spirit, spirit animal, and the hexes gained at 4th and 10th levels and alters spirit magic.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙之学者获得一个龙兽伙伴，龙兽伙伴与龙之学者的等级相同，就好像他们与同级的龙之德鲁伊一样。此能力取代精魂、魂兽和在 4 级和 10 级获得的巫术，并改变精魂魔法。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The arcanist may select between a arcanist or draconic exploit.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥能师可以在奥能师或龙类专研之间进行选择。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Exploit Type Selection
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 利用类型选择

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Archdevils are the nine major devils who rule the nine layers of Hell. They are demigods who posses god-like powers (such as the ability to grant spells to their worshipers), but are less powerful than the master of Hell, Asmodeus. The others pay strict obeisance to him, even while they tirelessly scheme against him and each other. Each archdevil represents a different form of punishment for sinful mortals.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 大魔鬼是九层地狱的九大魔鬼。他们是半神，拥有神一样的力量（例如向他们的信徒授予法术的能力），但不如地狱之主阿斯摩蒂斯强大。其他人对他表示严格的服从，即使他们不知疲倦地计划反对他和彼此。每个大恶魔都代表了对有罪的凡人的不同形式的惩罚。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Archdevils
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 大魔鬼

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The archer is dedicated to the careful mastery of the bow, perfecting his skills with years of practice honed day after day on ranges and hunting for game, or else on the battlefield, raining destruction down on the enemy lines.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 弓箭手致力于精心掌握弓箭，通过日复一日的练习，在射击场上和狩猎猎物时，或者在战场上，向敌军阵线倾泻毁灭之火，使自己的技能日臻完善。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Archer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 弓箭手

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You follow the archons path of righteousness.
Touch of Good: You can touch a creature as a standard action, granting a sacred bonus on attack rolls, skill checks, ability checks, and saving throws equal to half your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1) for 1 round. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Aura of Menace: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of menace as a standard action. Enemies in this aura take a –2 penalty to AC and on attacks and saves as long as they remain inside the aura. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你遵循正义的亚空之路。
善良之触：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你可使所{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触{/g}的生物在{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击检定{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能检定{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}属性检定{/g}以及{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}时获得崇圣{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，加值数等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级（最小为1），持续1轮。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
威胁灵光：到了8级，你能用标准动作发动30尺的防护灵光，敌人的命中、AC、豁免受到-2惩罚。你每天能使用的轮数等于牧师等级，不必连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Archon Subdomain - Good
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亚空子域——善良

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You follow the archons path of righteousness.
Touch of Law: You can touch a willing creature as a standard action, infusing it with the power of divine order and allowing it to treat all attack rolls, skill checks, ability checks, and saving throws for 1 round as if the natural d20 roll resulted in an 11.[LONGSTART] You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.[LONGEND]
Aura of Menace: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of menace as a standard action. Enemies in this aura take a –2 penalty to AC and on attacks and saves as long as they remain inside the aura. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.

你遵循正义的亚空之路。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Golden Bulwark, Lord of the Wall   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Bodyguards, Protection, Watchfulness   
Domains: Good, Law, Protection, War   
Subdomains: Archon, Cooperation, Defense, Fortifications, Tactics   
Favoured Weapon: Longspear   
Holy Symbol: Gauntlet and briars   
Sacred Animal: Gloden eagle   
Arqueros protects his charges against corruption and evil, providing a testament to what the stalwart can accomplish. Many seek the protection of the Golden Bulwark, but only a chosen few earn his measured attention. It's not always clear why the Golden Bulwark takes on a particular charge, but when he does, he protects this chosen individual with all the power at his disposal, sending legions of his celestial minions to the aid of those who cannot stand for themselves. Only rarely does Arqueros himself appear to protect these chosen devotees; his sacred duty prevents him from leaving the Prime Vallation among the lowest slopes of Heaven except under the direst of circumstances. Bodyguards, guards, and children's guardians-as well as soldiers and civic leaders during a time of war-frequently pay homage to Arqueros.
Appearance: He stands 12 feet tall, and even while completely stationary (as he often is while at rest) he is a spectacle to behold; clad in gleaming golden armor, one gauntleted hand always gripping a diamond-bladed longspear.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：黄金壁垒、城墙之主
阵营：守序善良
神职：护卫，守护，警觉
领域：善良、守序、保护、战争
子领域：亚空、协作、防御、防御工事、战术
偏好武器：长矛
圣徽：被黑色荆棘环绕的金色手套
圣兽: 金雕
阿奎洛斯保证他的指控不受腐败和邪恶的影响，这证明了这位坚定的人能做到什么。
许多人寻求黄金壁垒的保护，但只有少数被选中的人得到了他慎重的关注。我们并不总是清楚为什么金堡垒会承担一个特定的任务，但当他这样做的时候，他会用他所拥有的所有力量保护这个被选中的人，派遣他的天堂仆从军团去帮助那些无法自立的人。
阿奎洛斯本人很少会出面保护这些被选中的信徒。他的神圣职责阻止他离开擎天堡，除非在最恶劣的情况下。护卫、警卫和儿童监护人——以及战争时期的士兵和公民领袖——经常向阿奎洛斯祈祷。
外貌：他身高 12 英尺，即使在完全静止时（就像他经常在休息时那样），他也是一个值得一看的奇观；穿着闪闪发光的金色盔甲，一只戴着手套的手总是握着一把镶有钻石的长矛。

Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Bodyguards, Protection, Watchfulness   
Domains: Good, Law, Protection, War   
Subdomains: Archon, Cooperation, Defense, Fortifications, Tactics   
Favoured Weapon: Longspear   
Holy Symbol: Gauntlet and briars   
Sacred Animal: Golden eagle   
Arqueros protects his charges against corruption and evil, providing a testament to what the stalwart can accomplish. Many seek the protection of the Golden Bulwark, but only a chosen few earn his measured attention. It's not always clear why the Golden Bulwark takes on a particular charge, but when he does, he protects this chosen individual with all the power at his disposal, sending legions of his celestial minions to the aid of those who cannot stand for themselves. Only rarely does Arqueros himself appear to protect these chosen devotees; his sacred duty prevents him from leaving the Prime Vallation among the lowest slopes of Heaven except under the direst of circumstances. Bodyguards, guards, and children's guardians-as well as soldiers and civic leaders during a time of war-frequently pay homage to Arqueros.
Appearance: He stands 12 feet tall, and even while completely stationary (as he often is while at rest) he is a spectacle to behold; clad in gleaming golden armor, one gauntleted hand always gripping a diamond-bladed longspear.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：金色堡垒，长城领主 
阵营：守序善良 
关注领域：护卫、保护、警戒 
领域：善良、守序、保护、战争 
次领域：大君、合作、防御、防御工事、战术 
最喜爱的武器：长矛 
神圣象征：臂铠和石楠 
圣兽：金雕金雕 
阿奎罗斯保护他的部下免受腐败和邪恶的侵扰，为坚毅者的成就提供了证明。许多人都在寻求金色堡垒的保护，但只有少数被选中的人才能得到他的关注。我们并不总是清楚金色牛头犬为什么要承担某个特定的责任，但当他这样做的时候，他就会用他所掌握的所有力量来保护这个被选中的人，派遣他的天界爪牙军团去帮助那些无法自立的人。只有在极少数情况下，阿奎罗斯才会亲自出面保护这些被选中的信徒；除非在最危急的情况下，否则他的神圣职责会阻止他离开天堂最底层的主谷。护卫、护卫和孩子们的监护人--以及战争时期的士兵和公民领袖--经常向阿奎罗斯致敬：他身高12英尺，即使在完全静止的状态下（他经常在休息时静止），他也是一个值得一看的奇观；他身披金光闪闪的盔甲，一只满是铠甲的手总是紧握着一柄钻石刃的长枪。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Arqueros
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 阿奎洛斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Spirit of Abandon, Host of Delectation   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Edict: Inspire passion, comfort and free the repressed, seek your true self and desires   
Domains: Charm, Good, Liberation, Strength   
Subdomains: Agathion, Freedom, Love, Lust   
Favoured Weapon: Flail   
Holy Symbol: Figure with colourful sashes   
Sacred Animal: Swan   
Sacred Colours: Purple, White
The angel empyreal Lord Arshea is a champion of the repressed and weary, providing mortals deliverance from their bonds. This liberation applies to many of Arshea's worshipers, who often choose to ignore conventional gender identities, eventually choosing one that fits them best. Arshea is worshipped by artisans, courtesans, some fey, and those seeking to escape repression. They eschew gender roles and often dress and behave as members of the opposite sex (or another gender role in societies with multiple gender roles) for a period of time ranging from months to decades, which they consider the best way to overcome repression and understand freedom, choosing the most fitting gender after this period of pilgrimage. Arshea teaches them to abandon constraining beliefs and practice free love and sexuality. Arshea has no permanent home, and constantly travels through the Material Plane, Nirvana, Elysium and Heaven.   
Appearance: Arshea is androgynous and has been depicted as both male and female, but in either case, always dressed in many-colored veils of gossamer. Indeed, Arshea is of both genders and neither, unhindered by such differences. Arshea has a perfect face, a lithe body, and wings of gray and blue. Their form is seen as ideal by any species that look upon them, and some claim that those who directly behold Arshea can never be satisfied with mortal beauty again.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：放纵之魂
阵营：中立善良
神职：自由、肉体美与性爱
领域：魅惑，善良，自由，力量
子领域：盖丁，解放，爱慕，情欲
偏好武器：链枷
圣徽：躺卧着的女性身段，身上蒙着多色的布料
圣兽：天鹅
阿榭依点燃激情、抚慰压抑自我之人的内心。而放纵之魂在艺术作品中出现的频率，也没有哪名至高天领主能出其右。阿榭依的肉体使人联想到男性跟女性性征最美的部分。这位至高天领主的身体柔韧又灵巧，精悍的肌肉与柔美的曲线完美地结合，乃是无上的肉体。放纵之魂的容貌是至美的典范，据传若有人直视他的面容，那么凡俗的美将再也无法满足此人。阿榭依的身旁总是飘荡着游丝般的纱衣，让这位至高天神使双性同体的身躯若隐若现。他那灰中带蓝的双翼优雅地轻扬，彷佛跳着永恒的舞蹈。
对放纵之魂来说，自由胜过一切——但并不只是身体的自由。阿榭依支持灵魂的终极自由，并鼓励凡人抛弃那些带来束缚的无谓信念。阿榭依的教派引导凡人，让他们在无害或双方合意的情况下，从己所欲地去体验爱欲。那些因为压抑或渴慕而深陷悲惨的人们，有时会在床头找到欢欣之源留下的希望象征——柔软的灰色羽毛、装饰着珠宝的手镯或一小块如游丝般的布料。 阿榭依的信徒认为人在社会中的地位与职责与其肉体型态无关。阿榭依的虔信者时常会以另一性别的穿着或举止（若在有多种性别角色的社会中，则可能是其他该社会定义的性别角色），过上数月、数年甚是数十年的生活。他们相信这样才能打破自我压抑的囚牢，了解真正的自由。在他们这种独具风格、追寻真我的求道之旅结束后，这些信徒才会选择他们认为最适合自己的性别认同。
阿榭依居无定所。放纵之魂无拘无束的天性，让他在漫长无尽又不可预测的周期里，不断地在诸多天界位面与尘世中漫游。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Arshea
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 阿榭依

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch an ally and grant them greater power to harm and destroy crafted objects. For 1 minute, whenever this ally deals damage to constructs or objects with melee weapons, they bypasses hardness and damage reduction. 
At 10th level, you can temporarily copy a weapon enchantment from one weapon to another. You may copy any simple permanent enchant from a weapon you have currently equipped. If you are using this ability on a double weapon, only one end of the double weapon is affected. The copy lasts for 1 minute. You can use this ability multiple times on the same weapon. 
Some examples of simple enchants are, Icy Burst, Holy, Keen, Speed.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，你可以接触一名盟友，并赋予他们伤害和摧毁人造物品的强大力量。在1分钟内，每当该盟友使用近战武器对构装体或物品造成伤害时，它们都会绕过硬度和伤害减免。
10级时，你可以暂时将一件武器上的魔法复制到另一件武器上。你可以从当前装备的武器上复制任何简单的永久附魔。如果您在双武器上使用此能力，只有双武器的一端会受到影响。复制持续 1 分钟。您可以在同一把武器上多次使用此能力。
一些简单附魔的例子有：冰爆、神圣、锐锋、追击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Artifice
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 手艺

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 10th level, you can temporarily copy a weapon enchantment from one weapon to another. You may copy any simple permanent enchant from a weapon you have currently equipped. If you are using this ability on a double weapon, only one end of the double weapon is affected. The copy lasts for 1 minute. You can use this ability multiple times on the same weapon. 
Some examples of simple enchants are, Icy Burst, Holy, Keen, Speed.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
10 级时，您可以暂时将一件武器上的魔法复制到另一件武器上。您可以复制当前装备的武器上的任何简单永久附魔。如果您对双武器使用此能力，则双武器中只有一端会受到影响。复制持续 1 分钟。您可以在同一把武器上多次使用此能力。
一些简单附魔的例子有：冰爆、神圣、锐锋、追击。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 转移魔术

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can temporarily copy the Shock weapon enchantment to another weapon. If you are using this ability on a double weapon, only one end of the double weapon is affected. The copy lasts for 1 minute. You can use this ability multiple times on the same weapon.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 您可以暂时将电击武器的魔法复制到另一把武器上。如果您对双武器使用此能力，则双武器中只有一端会受到影响。复制持续 1 分钟。您可以在同一把武器上多次使用此能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your main hand weapon has a temporarily copy of the Shock weapon enchantment. If you are using this ability on a double weapon, only one end of the double weapon is affected. The copy lasts for 1 minute. You can stack multiple versions of this ability on the same weapon.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 您的主手武器会暂时复制电击武器魔法。如果您在双武器上使用此能力，只有双武器的一端会受到影响。副本持续 1 分钟。您可以在同一把武器上叠加多个此能力的版本。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You may touch an ally and grant them greater power to harm and destroy crafted objects. For 1 minute, whenever this ally deals damage to constructs or objects with melee weapons, they bypasses hardness and damage reduction.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 您可以接触一名盟友，并赋予他们伤害和摧毁人造物品的强大力量。在 1 分钟内，只要该盟友使用近战武器对构装体或物品造成伤害，就会绕过硬度和伤害减免。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: For 1 minute, whenever you deal damage to constructs or objects with melee weapons, you bypasses hardness and damage reduction.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在 1 分钟内，每当你使用近战武器对构装体或物体造成伤害时，你都会绕过硬度和伤害减免。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Artifice: You are immune to bleed, disease, and poison effects, and you gain a +4 bonus on saving throws against death effects, mind-affecting effects, and necromancy effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
手艺：你免疫流血、疾病和中毒效果，并且在对抗死亡效果、影响心灵的效果和死灵法术效果的豁免检定上获得+4加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Artifice Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 手艺领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An asavir is skilled at forging those who battle by her side into a loyal and well-coordinated team and exhorting them to fight bravely. The bonus she grants to any allies when she takes the aid another action in combat increases by 1. At 5th level, the bonus instead increases by 2, and at 9th level, it instead increases by 3. These bonuses do not stack with other abilities that enhance the aid another action.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 阿萨维尔擅长将身边的战友打造成一支忠诚、配合默契的队伍，并鼓励他们勇敢战斗。当她在战斗中采取 "援助他人 "行动时，她给予任何盟友的加成都会增加 1。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Camaraderie
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 友情

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The True Spark   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Dancers, Lonely spirits, Moonlight   
Edict: Dance even when there is no music, cast light in places of darkness, lead the lost   
Domains: Chaos, Darkness, Good, Repose   
Subdomains: Ancestors, Azata, Moon, Revelry   
Favoured Weapon: Punching daggers   
Holy Symbol: Dancing woman and moon   
Sacred Animal: Wolf   
Legend tells that benevolent marsh lights, used for guiding lost travelers to safety, danced in Elysium for countless millennia before one night coalescing into the graceful form of Ashava. Now the empyreal lord known as the True Spark dances in dangerous wilderness and lonely graveyards alike, leading lost spirits home. When individuals die violently or unexpectedly, their spirits can become lost. Lonely ghosts and confused spectres become hypnotized by Ashava's dance and follow her as she leads them to their peaceful graves. Those who watch over dangerous areas where travelers can lose their way pray to Ashava for the safety oftheir guests. Ashava despises will-o'-wisps and goes out of her way to destroy the foul creatures. When not guiding spirits, Ashava lives in the moonlight of the Sparkling Fens on Elysium, at the base of the Mountain of Lingering Soulsong.
Appearance: Ashava's every motion is light and unfettered; she moves like the wild wind across the plains. She stands 7 feet tall, and her olive skin holds a perpetual flush, as if she has been dancing outdoors for some time. Ashava's form is always obscured by shadows in the light; her features only shine clearly beneath the luminous moon. She wears a gown woven of starlight, and a wreath of colorful moss encircles her dark brow.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：真实火花
阵营：混乱善良
神职：舞者，孤独精神和月光
领域：混乱，黑暗，善良，宁静
子领域：先祖、爱塔、月、狂欢
偏好武器：拳匕
圣徽：跳舞的女人和月亮
圣兽：狼
在很久以前，在极乐园野的荒野中，一群有力量的沼泽游光汇聚到一起，形成了真实火花阿莎瓦。阿莎瓦不停的舞动，不断旋转和跳动，以抚慰所有观看她舞蹈的人。尽管她经常与观看她的人保持一定的距离，但她仍会将他们带离荒野，回到安全的文明社会中。她认为，无论是生命还是死亡，任何人都不应该受迷失之苦。
阿莎瓦一部分存在与所有舞者的心中，当这些人因激动的节奏或悦耳的和弦而从座位上站起时，就会感觉到她的影响。她认为舞蹈是灵魂最真实的表达方式，并且鄙视那些扼杀自己或他人在这领域的创造力的人。阿莎瓦坚持认为舞蹈没有错误的方式，而且舞蹈不仅体现文化而且超越文化。她指导热诚新人舞者笨拙的舞步，就像是在指导专业芭蕾舞演员练习动作一样。
阿莎瓦的大部分时间都花在在许多世界里漆黑的沼泽中起舞，帮助迷途的旅人和与会让他们迷失方向的邪恶力量作战。在极乐园野上，阿莎瓦的领域是闪耀沼泽，一个永远沐浴在月光下的沼泽。它坐落在绕梁魂歌山脉的山脚上，山上回旋的旋律飘落到沼泽中，为阿莎瓦和追随她的阿莎瓦舞者伴奏她们永无止境的舞蹈。在闪耀沼泽中，没有人会长时间迷失，因为漂浮的光球（外观上类似于鬼火，但是性格友好）始终可以引导游客的安全。这些灯火即使阿莎瓦的仆人，也是阿莎瓦的一部分，无论她在宇宙的哪个位置，她都可以感受到并控制它们，就好像它们是自己四肢的延伸一样。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ashava
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 阿莎瓦

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You can focus flame to a fine point, and use the embers left to blind your foes. 
Fire Bolt: As a standard action, you can unleash a scorching bolt of divine fire from your outstretched hand. You can target any single foe within 30 feet as a ranged touch attack with this bolt of fire. If you hit the foe, the fire bolt deals 1d6 points of fire damage + 1 point for every two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. 
Wall of Ashes: At 8th level, you can create a wall of swirling ashes lasting for one minute. Any creature passing through it must make a Fortitude save or be blinded for 1d4 rounds. The wall of ash reveals invisible creatures that are inside it, although they become invisible again if they move out of the wall. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your cleric level.
Ash Subdomain

At 20th level, the Mantis Zealot can become an aspect of Achaekek. Once per day as a swift action, they can add 5 to their base attack bonus, gain DR 10/—, and can cause all attacks to deal 25 bleed damage that triggers each round but does not stack. This ability lasts for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在 20 级，螳螂狂徒可以模仿 阿卡艾克克 的一个面相。每天一次，以一个迅捷动作，他们可以在基本攻击加值上获得+5加值，获得DR10/—，并且可以使所有攻击造成每轮触发但不叠加的25点流血伤害。该能力持续1分钟。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Void Weaver, The Spider God   
Alignment: Neutral Evil  
Areas of Concern: Construction, Futility, Spiders   
Rank: Great Old One   
Domains: Artifice, Evil, Madness, Void (Travel)   
Subdomains: Construct, Isolation, Nightmare, Toil   
Favoured Weapon: Net (Dagger)   
Holy Symbol: Spider perched at the centre of a web   
The Spider God Atlach-Nacha is of an indeterminate gender—in some tales, he is portrayed as male, but in others she is female. In truth, constructs as prosaic as gender are but afterthoughts to Atlach-Nacha. Dwelling in a vast underground cavern large enough to swallow entire nations, Atlach-Nacha weaves an impossibly complex web to span the gulf. Texts claim that on the day its vast bridge finally connects all sides of this complex canyon, a new age of madness will be unleashed, while others purport that Atlach-Nacha’s web-bridges are to be used by the Outer God Abhoth to surge out of its deep cavern rather than sending forth only its spawn. Those who venerate Atlach-Nacha see the divine in the spider’s form. Many of its worshipers are arachnid creatures, such as driders, ettercaps, and jorogumos. These latter beings have been known to take the name of Atlach-Nacha themselves when they invade human societies, although their goal in appropriating the god’s name is unclear. Atlach-Nacha appears as a huge black-andred spider with a body the size of an elephant and long, spindly legs. Its face is vaguely humanoid, with hairrimmed eyes, but in certain obscure sources it has also been depicted as having multiple arms and a woman’s head and torso. Many of the spiders of Leng venerate it as their mother, and doubtless the tunnels below Leng eventually connect to Atlach-Nacha’s web-strewn canyon lair.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：虚无纺者
阵营：中立邪恶 
神职：构建，徒劳与蜘蛛
等级：旧日支配者 
领域：工匠、邪恶、疯狂、虚空（旅行）
子领域：构装，孤寂，梦魇，疲累
偏爱的武器：网（匕首）
圣徽：栖于网中心的蜘蛛
蜘蛛神阿特拉克·纳克亚性别不定——在一些故事中被描绘为男性，但另外一些则将祂当做女神。不过，以性别这种单调的概念构想阿特拉克·纳克亚实属浅薄。居住在足以容纳一个国度的巨型地下洞穴中，阿特拉克·纳克亚编织了一个复杂以至无法想象的网络用以跨越裂隙。记载称，当祂构筑的巨桥最终联通复杂峡谷的每一面之时，一个崭新的疯狂时代便会到来；而另一些人则声称阿特拉克·纳克亚的网桥将由外神阿布霍斯用于涌出祂的洞巢，而非仅仅送出它的后代。
崇拜阿特拉克·纳克亚往往是由于窥见了蜘蛛形态的圣性。祂的许多崇拜者都是蛛形生物，例如蛛化精灵（Drider）、伊特怪（Ettercap）和女郎蜘蛛（Jorogumo）。当它们侵入人类社会时往往会为自己取名为阿特拉克·纳克亚，尽管它们盗用神名的目的还无人知晓。
阿特拉克·纳克亚形如巨型的黑红色蜘蛛，体躯巨型如象，腿则是又长又细。祂的面容与人相似而眼周生有毛发，但在某些模糊的资料中祂则被描绘为具有多只手臂的女性头部和身躯。许多冷原蜘蛛将祂尊为母亲，而毫无疑问，冷原下的隧道最终联通着阿特拉克·纳克亚那布满蛛网的峡谷巢穴。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Atlach-Nacha
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 阿特拉克·纳克亚

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Last Sister, Judge of Judges   
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Fate, Sleep, Youth   
Domains: Darkness, Death, Luck, Repose   
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Six overlapping lines arranged in a hexagon   
Also called the Judge of Judges, Atropos rules over the courts of the Boneyard as the penultimate arbitrator of mortal fates. She determines who will die and when, superseded only by Pharasma herself. The youngest daughter of Pharasma, she is also called the Last Sister, though few know the fates or can even confirm the existence of any preceding sisters. Psychopomps whisper that Pharasma is training this child to one day succeed her when the universe dies and is reborn, but for now Atropos holds the domain of sleep rather than true death. She receives the most challenging of all petitioners: the souls of fallen children. Atropos manifests as a large and glorious nosoi the size of a wolf and adorned in a silver mask, with an infinitely long peacock tail decorated with one living eye for every soul she will ever judge, though she sometimes takes on the guise of a young human girl when appearing in her mother’s court. She shares the realm of Pharasma’s Palace, though her deific control also extends over the Boneyard’s courts and planar gates.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：末代姐妹、审判者 
阵营：绝对中立 
形态：招魂使 
领域：命运、睡眠、青春 
领域：黑暗、死亡、幸运、安息 
偏好武器：匕首 
圣徽：六边形排列的六条重叠线 也称为作为法官的法官，阿特罗波斯作为凡人命运的倒数第二位仲裁者统治着墓地的法庭。她决定谁将死去以及何时死去，仅由法拉斯玛本人取代。 Pharasma 的最小女儿，她也被称为 Last Sister，尽管很少有人知道命运，甚至无法确认任何先前姐妹的存在。 Psychopomps 窃窃私语说，Pharasma 正在训练这个孩子有一天会在宇宙死亡并重生时接替她，但现在 Atropos 拥有睡眠领域，而不是真正的死亡。她收到了所有请愿者中最具挑战性的：堕落儿童的灵魂。阿特洛波斯化身为一只巨型而光荣的 nosoi，体型如狼，戴着银色面具，无限长的孔雀尾巴上装饰着一只活生生的眼睛，代表她将判断的每个灵魂，尽管她有时会伪装成一个幼年人类女孩出现在她母亲的法庭上。她共享法拉斯玛宫的领域，尽管她的神圣控制权也延伸到了墓地的庭院和位面之门。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Atropos
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 阿特罗波斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 11th level, a dreadknight can expend two uses of his sinful absolution ability to grant the ability to all allies within 10 feet, using his bonuses. Allies must use this ability by the start of the dreadknight’s next turn and the bonuses last for 1 minute. Using this ability is a free action.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 11级时，恐惧骑士可以花费两次他的原罪斩能力，将加值将能力授予10英尺内的所有盟友。盟友必须在恐惧骑士的下一回合开始前使用此能力，并且加成持续1分钟。使用此能力是一个自由动作。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 11th level, a dreadknight can expend two uses of his sinful absolution ability to grant the effect to all allies for 1 minute, using his bonuses. As a swift action, the dreadknight chooses one target within sight to smite. The dreadknight's allies add his Charisma bonus (if any) to their attack rolls and add his dreadknight level to all damage rolls made against the target of his smite. Attacks automatically bypass any DR the creature might possess. In addition, while aura of absolution is in effect, the dreadknight's allies gain a deflection bonus equal to his Charisma bonus (if any) to their AC against attacks made by the target of this ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 11 级时，恐惧骑士可以消耗两次 "罪恶赦免 "能力的使用次数，在 1 分钟内利用自己的额外能力给予所有盟友该效果。作为一个快速动作，恐惧骑士在视线范围内选择一个目标进行灼烧。恐惧骑士的盟友在他们的攻击投掷上加上他的魅力加成（如果有的话），并在对他的灼烧目标进行的所有伤害投掷上加上他的恐惧骑士等级。攻击会自动绕过该生物可能拥有的任何灾难恢复能力。此外，当赦免光环生效时，恐惧骑士的盟友在受到此能力目标的攻击时，会在其 AC 上获得与他的魅力加成（如果有的话）相等的防御加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 11th level, a dreadknight can expend two uses of his sinful absolution ability to grant the effect to all allies for 1 minute, using his bonuses. As a swift action, the dreadknight chooses one target within sight to smite. The dreadknight's allies add his Charisma bonus (if any) to their attack rolls and add his dreadknight level to all damage rolls made against the target of his smite. Attacks automatically bypass any DR the creature might possess. In addition, while aura of absolution is in effect, the dreadknight's allies gain a deflection bonus equal to his Charisma bonus (if any) to their AC against attacks made by the target of this ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 11 级时，恐惧骑士可以消耗两次 "罪恶赦免 "能力的使用次数，在 1 分钟内利用自己的额外能力给予所有盟友该效果。作为一个快速动作，恐惧骑士在视线范围内选择一个目标进行灼烧。恐惧骑士的盟友在他们的攻击投掷上加上他的魅力加成（如果有的话），并在对他的灼烧目标进行的所有伤害投掷上加上他的恐惧骑士等级。攻击会自动绕过该生物可能拥有的任何灾难恢复能力。此外，当赦免光环生效时，恐惧骑士的盟友在受到此能力目标的攻击时，会在其 AC 上获得与他的魅力加成（如果有的话）相等的防御加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day, a dreadknight can reach out to the profane lords to grant sinful absolution to the forces arrayed against them. As a swift action, the dreadknight chooses one target within sight to crush. The dreadknight adds their Charisma bonus (if any) on their attack rolls and adds their Dread Knight level on all damage rolls made against the target of their unholy smite. Regardless of the target, sinful absolution attacks automatically bypass any DR the creature might possess. In addition, while Sinful Absolution is in effect, the dreadknight gains a deflection bonus equal to their Charisma modifier(if any) to their AC against attacks made by the target of sinful absolution. The sinful absolution effect remains until the target of sinful absolution is dead or the next time the dreadknight rests and regains their uses of this ability. At 4th level, and at every three levels thereafter, the dreadknight may grant sinful absoltion one additional time per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，恐惧骑士向亵渎领主索取原罪之力并以此摧毁胆敢反抗她们的势力。
以一个迅捷动作，恐惧骑士选择以原罪之力侵蚀一个视野内的目标。
恐惧骑士在他们的攻击检定上加上他们的魅力加值（如果有的话），并在对他们侵蚀目标的所有伤害检定上加上他们的恐惧骑士等级。
无论是何种目标，原罪斩都会自动穿透该生物可能拥有的任何 DR。
此外，当原罪斩生效时，恐惧骑士在对抗侵蚀目标的攻击时获得等于其魅力调整值（如果有的话）的偏斜加值。
原罪斩效果一直持续到侵蚀目标死亡或恐惧骑士下一次休息并恢复该能力使用次数时。在第 4 级以及之后的每 3 级，恐惧骑士每天可以额外使用一次原罪斩。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Aura of Absolution
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 原罪灵光

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 11th level, a dreadknight can expend two uses of his sinful absolution ability to grant the ability to all allies within 10 feet, using his bonuses. Allies must use this ability by the start of the dreadknight’s next turn and the bonuses last for 1 minute. Using this ability is a free action.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 11 级时，恐惧骑士可以花费两次原罪斩次数，将该能力授予 10 英尺内的所有盟友。盟友必须在恐惧骑士的下一回合开始前使用此能力，持续 1 分钟。使用此能力是一个自由动作。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 3rd level, a dreadknight radiates a palpably daunting aura that causes all enemies within 10 feet to take a –4 penalty on saving throws against fear effects. Creatures that are normally immune to fear lose that immunity while within 10 feet of a dreadknight with this ability. This ability functions only while the Dread Knight remains conscious, not if he is unconscious or dead.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3 级时，恐惧骑士散发出令人生畏的灵光，使 10 英尺内的所有敌人在对抗恐惧效果的豁免检定上受到 –4 减值。通常对恐惧免疫的生物在拥有此能力的恐惧骑士附近 10 英尺内时会失去该免疫。此能力仅在恐惧骑士保持清醒时起作用，在他失去知觉或死亡时无效。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 3rd level, a dreadknight radiates a palpably daunting aura that causes all enemies within 10 feet to take a –4 penalty on saving throws against fear effects. Creatures that are normally immune to fear lose that immunity while within 10 feet of a dreadknight with this ability. This ability functions only while the dreadknight remains conscious, not if he is unconscious or dead.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3 级时，恐惧骑士散发出令人生畏的灵光，使 10 英尺内的所有敌人在对抗恐惧效果的豁免检定上受到 –4 减值。通常对恐惧免疫的生物在拥有此能力的恐惧骑士 10 英尺范围内会失去免疫。该能力仅在恐惧骑士保持清醒时起作用，在他失去知觉或死亡时无效。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Aura of Cowardice
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 怯懦灵光

Creatures that are normally immune to fear lose that immunity while within 10 feet of a dreadknight with this ability. This ability functions only while the Dread Knight remains conscious, not if he is unconscious or dead.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3 级时，恐惧骑士散发出令人生畏的灵光，使 10 英尺内的所有敌人在对抗恐惧效果的豁免检定上受到 –4 减值。通常对恐惧免疫的生物在拥有此能力的恐惧骑士附近 10 英尺内时会失去该免疫。此能力仅在恐惧骑士保持清醒时起作用，在他失去知觉或死亡时无效。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 17th level, a dreadknight gains DR 5/good and immunity to compulsion spells and spell-like abilities. Each enemy within 10 feet takes a –4 penalty on saving throws against compulsion effects. This ability functions only while the dreadknight is conscious, not if he is unconscious or dead.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 17 级时，恐惧骑士获得 DR 5/善良，并免疫胁迫法术和类法术能力。 10 英尺内的每个敌人在对抗胁迫效果的豁免检定上都会受到 –4 的惩罚。该能力仅在恐惧骑士有意识时起作用，在他失去知觉或死亡时无效。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 14th level, an dreadknight’s weapons are treated as evil-aligned for the purposes of overcoming damage reduction. LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Daemon Sultan, The Primal Chaos, The Blind Formless Chaos That Lies Behind the Stars, Blind Idiot God   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Entropy, Madness, Mindless destruction   
Rank: Outer God   
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Madness, Sun, Void (Travel)   
Subdomains: Catastrophe, Dark Tapestry, Entropy, Insanity, Nightmare, Stars   
Favoured Weapon: Warhammer   
Holy Symbol: Eight pointed star   
The so-called “blind idiot god” is a primal mass of mindless devastation and destruction the size of a star. Azathoth is unaware of its worshipers, and indeed has little interest in anything. Some scholars theorize that Azathoth isn’t even self-aware, likening the outer god to a cosmic firestorm on the grandest scale, an entity incapable of directing action or reacting to stimuli. Azathoth is attended by an unknown number of other gods that orbit it as a solar system’s planets might orbit an angry star. Referred to in eldritch tomes as Azathoth’s Court, these lesser gods are themselves powerful beings whose insane songs and eerie piping provide a constant accompaniment to Azathoth’s chaotic babblings and thunderous explosions. Many worshipers of Azathoth liken the entities of Azathoth’s court to the true manifestation of their god’s conscious will. Although lesser than Azathoth, these gods are themselves quite powerful, and the greatest of them is none other than Nyarlathotep, the Crawling Chaos. Said to lie at the center of the universe, Azathoth is believed by some to be the source of all existence, the primal truth that created the Material Plane. Cultists of the Primal Chaos often seek to harness their blind god’s power for their own destructive ends, yet such attempts are fraught with peril, for the tiniest ripple caused by Azathoth’s thrashings can lay waste to entire planets. The Shory are said to have developed ways to harness this power, but it seems just as likely that tampering with such forces may have played a key role in that empire’s mysterious fall so long ago. Azathoth is referenced as the “Daemon Sultan” in some ancient texts, but this appellation does not imply any connection to the fiends known as daemons, for Azathoth has as little interest in matters of the Great Beyond as it does anything else.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：邪魔大君
阵营：混乱中立
神职：熵、疯狂、目盲破坏
等级：外神
领域：混乱、破坏、疯狂、太阳, 虚空(旅行)
子领域：天灾，异幕，熵，疯狂，梦魇，星辰
偏好武器：木棍
圣徽：八芒星
这位“盲目愚痴之神”是盲目破坏所构成，犹如恒星般巨型的原生团质。阿撒托斯对于信徒毫无知觉，且实际上对万事万物皆无兴趣。某些学者甚至认为阿撒托斯根本不具备自我意识，而将这位外神喻为一场规模极度宏大的宇宙焰爆，一个既无法行动也无法对刺激做出回应的实体。
数量未知的外神环绕着阿撒托斯运行，就如同太阳系行星一般环绕这颗愤怒之星。这在一些骇人著作之中被称作阿撒托斯之廷，而这些次级外神本身亦是无比强大的存在，祂们以疯狂歌声与诡异奏乐不断应和着阿撒托斯的混乱呓语和雷鸣般的爆裂声。许多阿撒托斯的崇拜者将阿撒托斯之廷视为他们的神祇具备意识意志的表征。虽然不及阿撒托斯，但这些神祇本身同样极度强悍，其中最为伟大的当数伏行之混沌奈亚拉托提普。
据说阿撒托斯位于宇宙的中心，某些理论认为祂是世间万物的根源，是创诞物质界的原初真实。原初混沌教团一直尝试利用盲目痴愚之神的力量来完成他们自己的毁灭性目的，但这种尝试极度危险，纵使阿撒托斯扭动身躯引发的最为微小的涟漪也足以毁灭整个星球。据称硕理帝国（Shory）曾研究出驾驭此伟力的方法，但对此伟力的干预似乎也成为帝国在远古时期神秘衰落至关重要的一步。在一些古代文献之中，阿撒托斯被称为“邪魔大君”，但这个头衔：并不意味着祂与被称为“邪魔”的炼狱生物具备任何联系，毕竟阿撒托斯对于伟大彼岸的兴趣并不比祂对其他事物的兴趣更多。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Azathoth
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 阿撒托斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lord of the Flies, Hell's Angel, The White Son, Lord of the Seventh   
Realm: Cocytus 
Alignment: Lawful Evil   
Areas of Concern: Arrogance, Flies, Lies   
Domains: Air, Death, Evil, Law  
Subdomains: Devil, Murder, Undead, Wind 
Favoured Weapon: Spear  
Profane Symbol: Iron crown and diamond  
Profane Animal: Fly  
Few in Hell’s armies loathe the Heavens more than Baalzebul. A being of tarnished glory and wounded pride, the Lord of the Seventh was once a creature of luminous form and Asmodeus’s undisputed favorite. Though he is still among the most powerful figures in Hell, millennia of violence and disappointment have warped him into a creature of vicious jealousy and absolute arrogance. Known as the Lord of the Flies, Hell’s Angel, and the White Son, Baalzebul revels in hollow victories, enviously eyeing the gifts of others as he seeks a birthright that was never his. As Asmodeus’s champion, he won his lord countless victories and, when the time came for Exodus, he led those who followed in the Prince of Darkness’s path. In Hell, he expected to rule at his creator’s side, but such was not to be. The creation of Mephistopheles and distribution of Hell’s rule among all the archfiends infuriated Baalzebul, who had long awaited a far greater reward for his service. Forgetting himself, the Lord of That Which Flies railed against his maker, demanding a realm far greater than those who were created after him. Offended, Asmodeus stripped Baalzebul of his magnificent form, fusing him instead with millions of biting flies. Horrified but cowed, Baalzebul fled back to his newly granted realm of Cocytus, taking his throne as Lord of the Flies. Baalzebul rules Cocytus not as the realm it is but as the realm he believes it should be, his every gesture and edict surrounded by mock ceremony and magniloquence. As Baalzebul possesses great knowledge of the ways of magic, many who seek to improve their fortunes through arcane means beseech him for aid, as do lords seeking greater power and any who seek revenge.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
Titles：蝇王，地狱天使，白之子，第七领主 
王国：Cocytus 
阵营：守序邪恶 
关注领域：傲慢, 苍蝇, 谎言 
领域：气、死亡、邪恶、守序 
子域：恶魔、谋杀、亡灵恶魔、谋杀、亡灵、风 
最喜爱的武器：长矛 
神的象征：铁冠和钻石 
普罗凡的动物：飞苍蝇 
在地狱的军队中，很少有人比巴尔泽布更厌恶天堂。作为一个荣耀受损、自尊心受创的生物，第七领主曾经是一个光彩夺目的生物，也是阿斯莫德的最爱。虽然他仍是地狱中最强大的人物之一，但千年的暴力和失望已将他扭曲成一个充满恶意的嫉妒和绝对傲慢的生物。巴尔泽布被称为 "苍蝇之王"、"地狱天使 "和 "白之子"，他沉浸在空洞的胜利中，妒忌地盯着别人的天赋，寻找本不属于他的天赋。作为阿斯莫德的战士，他为他的主人赢得了无数的胜利，当出埃及记到来的时候，他带领着那些追随黑暗王子的人走上了他的道路。在地狱中，他期望能在造物主身边统治一切，但事与愿违。梅菲斯特的诞生和地狱统治权在所有大恶魔中的分配激怒了巴尔泽布，他一直在等待着对他的服务给予更大的回报。飞天之主忘记了自己，他对自己的创造者大肆谩骂，要求得到比他之后创造的人更伟大的境界。阿斯莫德恼羞成怒，剥夺了巴尔泽布尔的伟岸身躯，取而代之的是将他与数以百万计的咬人苍蝇融合在一起。巴尔泽布勒惊恐万分，但也胆怯了，他逃回了新获得的科西图斯王国，坐上了苍蝇之王的宝座。巴尔泽布统治的不是科希图斯王国，而是他认为应该统治的王国，他的一举一动和法令都充满了嘲弄的仪式和华丽的辞藻。由于 Baalzebul 精通魔法之道，许多想要通过神秘手段改善命运的人都向他求助，那些想要获得更大权力的领主和想要复仇的人也是如此。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
An Archduke of Cheliax adds Lore (Nature), Lore (Religion), Knowledge (World) and Knowledge (Arcana) to the list of her class skills. She can also use her Intelligence instead of Wisdom while attempting Lore (Nature) or Lore (Religion) checks. 
She also gains a +2 bonus to initiative and can use her Intelligence modifier to determine initiative. 
The highest rank of the standard nobility are the Archdukes, which are fixed at six members, each of whom rule one of the Archduchies of Cheliax. Archduke is a hereditary title that is held by a single family that has not changed much since the turmoil of the civil war.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 切利亚斯大公将学识（自然）、学识（宗教）、知识（世界）和知识（神秘）添加到她的职业技能列表中。在尝试学识（自然）或学识（宗教）检定时，她还可以使用智力代替感知。她也获得 +2 先攻加值，并且可以使用她的智力调整值来确定先攻。标准贵族的最高等级是大公，固定为六名成员，每名大公统治一个 切利亚斯大公国。大公是一个世袭的头衔：，由一个家族拥有，自内战动荡以来没有太大变化。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Bearded Lord, The Iron Hierophant, The Keeper of Lost Children, The Lord of the First   
Realm: Avernus 
Alignment: Lawful Evil   
Areas of Concern: Animals, Corruption, Gateways   
Domains: Evil, Law, Magic, Travel  
Subdomains: Arcane, Devil, Divine, Trade 
Favoured Weapon: Quarterstaff  
Profane Symbol: Three-eyed beard  
Profane Animal: Raven  
Few dare speak Barbatos’s name, as legend says he is the most likely of Hell’s archfiends to hear. Of Asmodeus’s lieutenants, the mysterious lord of Avernus has held his station for the shortest time, a term measured in millennia, but still a tenure too short for Hell’s elite to embrace the newcomer. As the Lord of the First, Barbatos holds the least enviable duties of any of the archfiends, charged with the dual Sisyphean tasks of disseminating the endless tides of accursed souls to their appropriate damnations and guarding Hell’s shores against incursion. He rules with a light hand, but brooks no disobedience, swiftly revealing any plot to oppose him. Those who repeatedly prove themselves untrustworthy are sapped of their vitality and hung upon the Penitent Cross, a massive, bleeding willow tree at the heart of his floating paradise of worms, the Promised Land. As Barbatos possesses uncanny knowledge of seemingly all that happens within his realm, legends tell of mortals who venture to Avernus to treat with him for the release of loved ones’ souls. Often the Lord of the First consents, but never without seeking a damning price, and rarely is what the archfiend releases not returned to him multiple fold. It is said that Barbatos can see into the Material Plane through any representation of his sigil, can hear 21 words spoken after his name, and knows the languages of all beasts. When called upon by desperate souls, he delights in sending servants to offer just enough lore or out-ofcontext information for a mortal to make her situation all the more hopeless. When he appears on the mortal realm he typically takes the shape of a heavily cloaked hermit or a woodland creature with a long, strange beard. In any guise he always retains some vestige of his natural form, by which the wary might recognize him.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
Titles：大胡子领主，铁袍人，迷失之子的守护者，第一领主 
王国：阿弗纳斯 
阵营：守序邪恶 
关注领域：动物，腐败，通道 
领域：邪恶，守序，魔法，旅行邪恶、守序、魔法、旅行 
次领域：奥术、恶魔、神术、贸易 
最喜欢的武器：四分杖 
普罗法恩符号：三眼胡须 
神兽：乌鸦 
很少有人敢说巴巴托斯的名字，因为传说他是地狱大恶魔中最有可能听到的人。在阿斯莫德的副手中，这位神秘的阿弗纳斯领主在位时间最短，以千年为单位，但对于地狱的精英们来说，他的任期仍然太短，以至于无法接纳新来者。作为初代领主，巴巴托斯的职责是所有大恶魔中最不令人羡慕的，他肩负着将无穷无尽的受破敌灵魂传播到相应的地狱，以及守卫地狱海岸防止入侵的双重重任。他轻描淡写地进行统治，但不容违抗，并迅速揭露任何反对他的阴谋。那些屡次证明自己不值得信任的人将被抽走生命力，吊死在忏悔十字架上。忏悔十字架是一棵巨型的柳树，鲜血淋漓，位于他的虫子乐园 "应许之地 "的中心。由于巴巴托斯对其领域内发生的一切似乎都了如指掌，因此传说中凡人都会冒险前往阿弗纳斯，向他请求释放所爱之人的灵魂。初代领主通常都会同意，但绝不会不付出惨痛的代价，大恶魔释放的灵魂很少有不数倍奉还的。据说巴巴托斯可以通过任何他的徽章看到物质界，可以听到以他的名字命名的 21 个单词，并且通晓所有野兽的语言。当绝望的灵魂向他求助时，他喜欢派仆人为凡人提供足够的传说或断章取义的信息，使他们的处境更加绝望。当他出现在凡间时，通常会化身为披着厚厚斗篷的隐士或留着长长怪胡子的林地生物。不管是什么样子，他总是保留着一些自然形态的痕迹，警惕的人可能会通过这些痕迹认出他来。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Barbatos
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 巴巴托斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Passage   
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Compasses, Travellers, Vigils   
Domains: Knowledge, Protection, Repose, Travel   
Favoured Weapon: Club   
Holy Symbol: Two straight lines that converge vertically through a circle   
While most psychopomps are born from the needs and fears of mortals, Barzahk was born from the needs and fears of psychopomps, emerging fully formed at the same moment the Dead Roads—secret back channels between the planes and the mortal world—appeared. Barzahk manifests as an enormous migratory bird, often a corvid, but sometimes as a robin or other songbird. Swathed in robes and carrying a staff and a keyhole, the Passage struggles to understand the finite world beyond the Dead Roads, and they rarely leave this unusual transitive realm. They see to the comings and goings of psychopomps and, by extension, care for the souls of travelers and those who die far from home, an experience that challenges many petitioners and can cause a soul to linger far too long. Afflicted with wanderlust, Barzahk roams aimlessly and rarely attends to any of their appointed duties. Those psychopomps who labor under Barzahk’s purview enjoy an exceptional amount of autonomy, even by the standards of the Boneyard, and many of their most powerful servants begin to feel akin to ushers themselves—notions true ushers are eager to disabuse them of.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：通道 
阵营：绝对中立 
形态：招魂使 
领域：指南针、旅行者、守夜 
领域：知识、保护、休息、旅行 偏好武器：俱乐部
圣徽：两条直线通过一个圆圈垂直汇聚而大多数 Psychopomps 都是天生的出于凡人的需要和恐惧，巴尔扎克诞生于对精神分裂症的需要和恐惧，在死亡之路——位面和凡人世界之间的秘密通道——出现的同时完全形成。巴尔扎克表现为一只巨型的候鸟，通常是鸦科动物，但有时也表现为知更鸟或其他鸣禽。披着长袍，拿着一根棍子和一个钥匙孔，通道努力理解死亡之路之外的有限世界，他们很少离开这个不寻常的过渡领域。他们精神错乱的来来去去，进而关心旅行者和离家很远的死者的灵魂，这种经历对许多请愿者提出了挑战，并可能导致灵魂逗留太久。饱受旅行癖折磨的巴尔扎克漫无目的地游荡，很少履行他们指定的职责。那些在巴尔扎克职权范围内工作的精神病患者享有极大的自主权，即使按照 Boneyard 的标准，他们的许多最强大的仆人也开始觉得自己与引座员相似——真正的引座员急于消除他们的想法。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Barzahk
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 巴尔扎克

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Sly Enchantress   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Cats, Pleasure, Secrets   
Domains: Animal, Chaos, Charm, Protection, Trickery   
Subdomains: Deception, Defense, Fur, Lust, Protean, Thievery   
Favoured Weapon: Cat's Claws (Sai)   
Holy Symbol: Golden Cat   
Sacred Animal: Cat   
Bastet was a popular deity in Ancient Osirion,worshiped as a goddess of cats and a deity of celebration, pleasure, and secrets. While her sister Hathor is a goddess of love, Bastet is one of desire and sensuality. She also guards against contagious diseases, evil spirits, and snakes, and is associated with protective ointments and perfumes. A beautiful woman with the head of a cat, Bastet is often depicted holding a rattle-like sistrum, a musical instrument associated with her worship-and a small shield called an aegis, usually decorated with the head of a lion, as a symbol of her protective role. Bastet is the daughter of Ra, and the sister of Hathor, Maat, and Sekhmet. Normally indolent and relaxed, Bastet can be fierce when roused to anger, and she has often faced off against the great serpent Apep on behalf of Ra. A promiscuous goddess, Bastet has no mate, but numerous stories detail her liaisons with other deities. Bastet is a popular goddess among bards and women of all classes, and she is the patron of spies, rogues, and thieves.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：狡诈魔术师
阵营：混乱中立
神职：猫、逸乐、秘密
领域：动物、混乱、魅惑、保护、诡计
子领域：欺骗、防御、毛兽、情欲、星灵、盗窃
偏好武器：猫爪 (十手)
圣徽：金猫
圣兽：猫
芭丝特在古奥西里昂是个信徒众多的神祇，以猫之女神以及欢庆、逸乐及祕密之神的身分受人膜拜。相对于其姊妹的爱之女神哈索尔，芭丝特是渴望与享乐之神。祂也保护生灵不受传染病、邪灵与蛇的侵扰，也被人与防护膏药及香水联想在一起。猫首美人芭丝特的绘画或雕刻通常描绘祂持握响铃─这也是祂的宗教乐器─以及一张小盾，盾上常饰有狮首，象征祂作为守护之神的地位。
芭丝特是拉的女儿，哈索尔、玛亚特与塞赫美特的姊妹。虽然平常慵懒闲散，芭丝特若被激怒也是相当凶狠，也常代父出战与大蛇阿佩普对打。放荡女神芭丝特至今没有配偶，但有许多祂与其他神私通的故事流传于世。
芭丝特深受吟游诗人与各方女人爱戴，祂也是间谍、匪徒与窃贼的守护神。芭丝特的牧师多为女性，但也不排斥男性祭司，两性都有人担任芭丝特神殿内的圣娼，而祂的神殿也常举办充满了饮酒舞蹈与各式狂欢的豪华庆典。芭丝特的信徒常养圣兽猫当宠物，生前受敬拜，死后还会将尸体制作成木乃伊与主人一起安葬。

巴斯蒂特是古代奥西瑞恩的一个受欢迎的神灵，被奉为猫的女神，是庆祝、快乐和秘密的神灵。她的姐姐哈托尔是爱的女神，而巴斯提则是欲望和性感的女神。她还能抵御传染病、邪灵和蛇，并与保护性药膏和香水有关。巴斯提是一位长着猫头的美丽女性，她的形象通常是手持拨浪鼓（一种与其崇拜有关的乐器）和一个小盾牌（通常饰有狮子头），小盾牌被称为 Aegis，象征着她的保护作用。巴斯提是拉神的女儿，也是哈托尔、玛阿特和塞克梅特的姐姐。芭斯蒂特平时寡言少语，但一旦被激怒就会变得凶猛，她经常代表拉神与大蛇阿佩普对抗。巴斯提是一个滥交的女神，她没有伙伴，但有许多故事详细描述了她与其他神灵的关系。巴斯提是吟游诗人和各阶层妇女喜爱的女神，也是间谍、流氓和小偷的守护神。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Bastet
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 芭丝特

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A druid whose focus calls upon the mighty bear, titan of the woodlands and mountains, a paragon of strength and ferocity, and yet also a quiet protector rich in wisdom.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 追寻此道的德鲁伊们有着如同熊一般强大的力量，在林地和山区中他们是如同巨神般不可忽视的存在，是蛮力与英勇最完美的集合体，同时还保有着令人难以企及的感知。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Bear Totem Druid
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 巨熊德鲁伊

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A bear totem druid who chooses an animal companion must select a bear. If choosing a domain, the bear totem druid must choose from the Animal, Earth, Protection, and Strength domains.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 巨熊德鲁伊动物伙伴必须是熊，如果他选择了领域能力的话，他必须以从下几个领域中挑选：动物、大地、保护和力量。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A bear shaman who chooses an animal companion must select a bear. If choosing a domain, the bear shaman must choose from the Animal, Earth, Protection, and Strength domains.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 巨熊德鲁伊动物伙伴必须是熊，如果他选择了领域能力的话，他必须以从下几个领域中挑选：动物、大地、保护和力量。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A bear totem druid who chooses an animal companion must select a bear or wolverine. If choosing a domain, the bear totem druid must choose from the Animal, Earth, Protection, and Strength domains.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 巨熊德鲁伊动物伙伴必须是熊，如果他选择了领域能力的话，他必须以从下几个领域中挑选：动物、大地、保护和力量。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 9th level and every 4 levels thereafter, a bear totem druid gains one of the following bonus feats: Diehard, Endurance, Great Fortitude, Improved Great Fortitude, Toughness. She must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 9级和之后的每4级，巨熊德鲁伊可以获得一个奖励专长，他的奖励专长必须从以下几个专长中选取：顽强、坚忍、强韧加强、精通强韧加强、健壮。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Bear Totem Druid Bonus Feat
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 巨熊德鲁伊奖励专长

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Unlike normal animals of its kind, an animal companion's Hit Dice, abilities, skills, and feats advance as the druid advances in level. If a character receives an animal companion from more than one source, her effective druid levels stack for the purposes of determining the statistics and abilities of the companion. Most animal companions increase in size when their druid reaches 4th or 7th level, depending on the companion.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 与同类的普通动物不同的是，动物伙伴的生命骰，属性，技能和专长都会随着德鲁伊等级的提升而增长。如果人物从多个来源获得了动物伙伴，将她的有效德鲁伊等级相互叠加以决定伙伴的数据和能力。根据伙伴种类的不同，大多数伙伴的体型会在德鲁伊达到4级或7级时增长。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Bear Totem Animal Companion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 熊图腾动物伙伴
