LocalizedStrings.enGB: Bear Totem Druids Bond
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 巨熊德鲁伊纽带

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 5th level, a bear totem druid may cast summon nature’s ally as a standard action when summoning bears, and summoned bears gain temporary hit points equal to their druid level. They can apply the young template to any bear to reduce the level of the summoning spell required by one. They can also increase the level of summoning required by one in order to apply either the advanced or the giant template, or increase it by two to apply both the advanced and giant templates.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 5级时，在召唤熊时巨熊德鲁伊可以用标准动作施展“召唤自然盟友”，被召唤出来的熊得到相当于巨熊德鲁伊等级的额外生命加值。巨熊德鲁伊可以召唤较年轻的版本以降低召唤法术的等级一级，他也可以增加召唤法术等级一级以召唤拥有进化或巨型模板（advanced and giant templates）的熊，也可以增加两级，以召唤同时具有两个模版的版本。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Totemic Summons
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 图腾召唤

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A bear totem druid may cast summon nature’s ally as a standard action when summoning bears, and summoned bears gain temporary hit points equal to their druid level.

As a move action a bear totem druid may adopt an aspect of the bear while retaining her normal form. They gain one of the following bonuses: 
Movement (+10 enhancement bonus to speed, +4 racial bonus on Mobility checks)
Senses (Blind Fight feat, +4 on perception checks)
Toughness (+2 natural armor bonus to AC, Endurance feat)
Natural Weapons (bite attack dealing 1d6 damage and two claws dealing 1d4 damage for a Medium druid, +2 to CMB)

LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
以一个移动动作，巨熊德鲁伊可以用他正常的形体模拟出熊的一个面像，他可以选择以下的加值之一：
速度：得到10尺移动速度的增强加值，并且在灵巧上得到+4的种族加值。
感官：得到盲斗专长并且在感知检定上得到+4的种族加值。
强韧：AC+2天生防御加值，同时得到耐久专长。
爪牙：中体型的巨熊德鲁伊得到啮咬（1d6）和两次爪抓（1d4），同时擒抱的CMB得到+2加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: 1 minute
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1分钟

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Bear Totem Transformation
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 熊图腾变身

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
As a swift action a bear totem druid may adopt an aspect of the bear while retaining her normal form. They gain one of the following bonuses: 
Movement (+10 enhancement bonus to speed, +4 racial bonus on Mobility checks)
Senses (Blind Fight feat, +4 on perception checks)
Toughness (+2 natural armor bonus to AC, Endurance feat)
Natural Weapons (bite attack dealing 1d6 damage and two claws dealing 1d4 damage for a Medium druid, +2 to CMB)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
以一个迅捷动作，巨熊德鲁伊可以用他正常的形体模拟出熊的一个面像，他可以选择以下的加值之一：
速度：得到10尺移动速度的增强加值，并且在灵巧上得到+4的种族加值。
感官：得到盲斗专长并且在感知检定上得到+4的种族加值。
强韧：AC+2天生防御加值，同时得到耐久专长。
爪牙：中体型的巨熊德鲁伊得到啮咬（1d6）和两次爪抓（1d4），同时擒抱的CMB得到+2加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Bear Totem Transformation - Swift Action
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 熊图腾变身-迅捷动作

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 2nd level, a bear totem druid may adopt an aspect of the bear while retaining their normal form. They gain one of the following bonuses: 
Movement (+10 enhancement bonus to speed, +4 racial bonus on Mobility checks)
Senses (Blind Fight feat, +4 on perception checks)
Toughness (+2 natural armor bonus to AC, Endurance feat)
Natural Weapons (bite attack dealing 1d6 damage and two claws dealing 1d4 damage for a Medium druid, +2 to CMB)
Using this ability is a standard action at 2nd level, a move action at 7th level, and a swift action at 12th level. This ability lasts one minute and can be used a number of times equal to their druid level. This is a polymorph effect and cannot be used while the druid is using another polymorph effect, such as wild shape.

感官：得到盲斗专长并且在感知检定上得到+4的种族加值。
强韧：AC+2天生防御加值，同时得到耐久专长。
爪牙：中体型的巨熊德鲁伊得到啮咬（1d6）和两次爪抓（1d4），同时擒抱的CMB得到+2加值。这个能力持续一分钟，可使用次数等于他们的德鲁伊等级。这是一种变形效果，不能在德鲁伊使用另一种变形效果时使用，例如野性变身。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A bear totem druid wild shape is effected by their dedication to the bear sprits. All wild shape forms gained from level 6 onwards are gained 2 levels later than a standard druid, however bear form is gained 2 levels earlier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 巨熊德鲁伊的野性形态受到他们对巨熊精魂奉献的影响。巨熊德鲁伊在6级时习得自然变身，其自然变身有效等级为“巨熊德鲁伊等级-2”。但是在变成熊的时候，有效德鲁伊等级为他的“巨熊德鲁伊等级+2”。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A bear totem druid wild shape is effected by their dedication to the bear spirits. All wild shape forms gained from level 6 onwards are gained 2 levels later than a standard druid, however bear form is gained 2 levels earlier.
Wild Shape - Bear Totem Druid

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Beastmorphs study the anatomy of monsters, learning how they achieve their strange powers. They use their knowledge to duplicate these abilities, but at the cost of taking on inhuman shapes when they use mutagens.
Beastmorph

At 14th level, a beastmorph’s mutagen grants him more exotic abilities and options. He may select four different abilities at once before using his mutagen, and the following effects are added to the list of beastform options. 
Blindsense - Detect unseen foes within 30 feet, this range does not stack with the range from the scent mutagen. 
Ferocity - When your hit point total is below 0 but you are not killed, you can fight on for 1 more round. At the end of your next turn, unless brought to above 0 hit points, you immediately fall unconscious. 
Web - You gain the ability to fire webs as if a spider, you must wait one minute between uses and the DC of the web is 10 + half your beastmorph level + constitution modifier.
Grand Beastform Mutagen

At 10th level, a beastmorph’s mutagen grants him more additional abilities and options. He may select three different abilities at once before using his mutagen, and the following effects are added to the list of beastform options. 
Pounce - You can perform a full attack at the end of your charge. 
Trip - Make a free trip attempt on your first melee attack that hits each round.
Greater Beastform Mutagen

At 6th level, a beastmorph’s mutagen grants him additional abilities and options. He may select two different abilities at once before using his mutagen, and the following effects are added to the list of beastform options. 
Speed - Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet, increasing to 20 feet at 10th level, and 30 feet at 14th level. 
Buoyancy - You are immune to ground effects and being tripped.
Improved Beastform Mutagen

A beastmorph’s mutagen causes him to take on animalistic features. Before using his mutagen the beastmorph may select one of the following additional effects to gain for the duration of his mutagens effect.
Beastform Mutagen - Blindsense Toggle

A beastmorph’s mutagen causes him to take on animalistic features. 
Detect unseen foes within 30 feet, this range does not stack with the range from the scent mutagen.
Beastform Mutagen - Blindsense
Beastform Mutagen - Buoyancy Toggle

A beastmorph’s mutagen causes him to take on animalistic features. 
You are immune to ground effects and being tripped.
Beastform Mutagen - Buoyancy

A beastmorph’s mutagen causes him to take on animalistic features. 
Gain a +4 bonus to perception.
Beastform Mutagen - Eyes Toggle

A beastmorph’s mutagen causes him to take on animalistic features. 
Gain a +4 bonus to perception.
Beastform Mutagen - Compound Eyes

At 3rd level, a beastmorph’s mutagen causes him to take on animalistic features, such as a furry muzzle and pointed ears like a werewolf, scaly skin like a lizardfolk or sahuagin, or compound eyes and mandibles like a giant insect. Before using his mutagen the beastmorph may select one of the following additional effects for the duration. 
Scent - Detect unseen foes within 15 feet by sense of smell, as if you had blindsense. 
Scaly Skin - Gain a +2 natural armor bonus to AC. 
Compound Eyes - Gain a +4 bonus to perception.
Beastform Mutagen

Titles: The Pale Kiss, Thorned Caress, Father of Whores, Duke of Many Forms, Lord of the Fourth   
Realm: Idolisque 
Alignment: Lawful Evil   
Areas of Concern: Adultery, Deception, Desire   
Domains: Charm, Destruction, Evil, Law  
Subdomains: Catastrophe, Devil, Lust, Rage 
Favoured Weapon: Ranseur (Trident)  
Profane Symbol: Two-toned devil mask  
Profane Animal: Goat  
Do what you will: such is all that impassioned Belial demands of his followers. Along with the titles given him by mortals—the Pale Kiss, the Thorned Caress, the Father of Whores—the Lord of the Fourth goes by a number of aliases, most commonly Belhor, Jouvart, and Mechembuchus. His variety of names merely suggests the diversity of his form, as few beings in the multiverse can match Belial as a shapeshifter, seducer, creator, and deceiver. All of these skills he uses to spread Hell’s infernal seed and indulge his unquenchable lust. Over the ages Belial has taken the shape of every race in the multiverse and more, his form being subject only to his infernal imagination. When dealing with other creatures, he takes on aspects he suspects them to find most alluring, delighting in f lustering even the most disciplined. In council with his peers, though, he adopts a split form, his right half darkly fiendish, the left mockingly angelic. Possessing one of the most incredible imaginations in Hell, Belial commands the respect and envy of the infernal elite. Aside from assuring continued excitement through millennia of hedonism, his creativity has spawned numerous deadly infernal weapons, perverse magic, and entire new races of devils. Although he possesses an unrestrained flair for the dramatic, he cares little for what he creates, his attention and interests as quick to change as his fluid form. While he serves as forgemaster of Phlegethon, he holds little interest in such coarse work. Jilted lovers, the forlorn, and both the ugly and the beautiful beseech Belial. The scarred beg for comforts of the flesh, while aging beauties offer the youth of others to retain their own. On any visit to the Material Plane, Belial leaves a part of him behind, likely being the sire of more half-fiends than any other devil in the multiverse.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
Titles：苍白之吻，荆棘之抚，妓女之父，多形态公爵，第四领主 
王国：伊多里斯克 
阵营：守序邪恶 
关注领域：通奸、欺骗、欲望 
领域：魅惑、毁灭、邪恶, 守序 
次领域：灾难、恶魔、欲望、愤怒 
最喜爱的武器：三叉戟（Ranseur） 
神职象征：双色恶魔面具 
神的动物：山羊山羊 
随心所欲：这就是慷慨激昂的贝利亚对追随者的要求。除了凡人给他的头衔：--苍白之吻、带刺的爱抚、妓女之父--第四魔王还有很多别名，最常见的是贝尔霍尔（Belhor）、朱瓦特（Jouvart）和梅切姆布库斯（Mechembuchus）。他的名字多种多样，这只是表明他的形态多种多样，因为在多元宇宙中，很少有生物能与贝利亚相提并论，贝利亚是变形者、诱惑者、创造者和欺骗者。他利用所有这些技能传播地狱的地狱种子，放纵自己无尽的欲望。在过去的岁月里，贝利亚曾变幻出多元宇宙中每一个种族的形状，甚至更多，他的形状只取决于他对地狱的想象。在与其他生物打交道时，他会幻化成他认为最诱人的样子，即使是最守规矩的生物也会被他迷得神魂颠倒。不过，在与同类交谈时，他则采用分裂形态，右半边是黑暗的恶魔，左边则是嘲弄的天使。贝利亚是地狱中想象力最丰富的人之一，他赢得了地狱精英们的尊重和羡慕。除了通过千年的享乐主义确保持续的刺激之外，他的创造力还催生了无数致命的地狱武器、反常的魔法和全新的恶魔种族。虽然他拥有无拘无束的戏剧天赋，但他对自己创造的东西并不在意，他的注意力和兴趣就像他多变的外形一样瞬息万变。虽然他是 Phlegethon 的锻造师，但他对这种粗糙的工作兴趣不大。被抛弃的恋人、被遗弃的人，以及丑陋和美丽的人都向贝利亚乞求。伤痕累累的人乞求肉体的慰藉，而衰老的美人则用别人的青春来留住自己的青春。在任何一次物质界之旅中，贝利亚都会留下自己的一部分，他可能比多元宇宙中的任何其他恶魔都拥有更多的半身恶魔。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Belial
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 贝利尔

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your mind is marked by aboleth tampering, either as a result of a close encounter with one of these creatures while you were a child, or even through an ancestor, close family member, or one of your sisters or brothers in faith—this associate’s interaction with the aboleths may be all that it takes to infect you. 
You take a –2 penalty on saving throws against mind-affecting effects and add hypnotism to your list of 1st-level oracle spells known. 
At 5th level, add mirror image to your list of 2nd-level oracle spells known. 
At 10th level, add hold monster to your list of 4th-level oracle spells known. 
At 15th level, add cloak of dreams to your list of 6th-level oracle spells known.

You are cursed with misfortune and sorrow, and you cannot gain benefit from morale bonuses. However, you gain a +4 bonus to all saving throws against curse effects.
At 5th level, add ill omen to your list of 2nd-level oracle spells known. 
At 10th level, add bestow curse to your list of 4th-level oracle spells known. 
At 15th level, you are immune to curse effects except for your own oracle curse.

The lure of the ocean tugs at your soul. 
You reduce your base land speed by 5 feet. 
At 5th level, your natural armor bonus increases by 1 as your skin thickens. 
At 10th level, you gain a +1 bonus to your caster level when casting spells with the cold descriptor. 
At 15th level, add elemental body - water (I,II,III,IV) to your list of oracle spells known. 
While under the effects of these spells or the seamantle spell, gain the benefits of the freedom of movement spell.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
大海的诱惑牵引着你的灵魂。
你的基本陆地速度减少5英尺。
在5级时，你的自然护甲加值增加1，因为你的皮肤变得更厚。
在10级时，当你施放具有寒冷描述符的法术时，你的施法者等级获得+1加值。
在15级时，将元素之躯——水（I, II, III, IV）加入到你已知的先知法术列表中。
在受到这些法术或水幕天华的效果时，获得自由行动法术的益处。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The gods’ interference in your life has left you with strange, unpredictable powers dependent on divine whim. Bizarre side effects occur whenever you are affected by a spell from a divine caster—for better or for worse. Once per round during combat, when a creature casts a divine spell including you as a target, roll 1d20 and consult the table below.
At 5th level, you gain a +2 competence bonus on saving throws to resist divine spells. 
At 10th level, you become immune to the confused condition. 
At 15th level, you gain a +4 competence bonus on saving throws to resist mind-affecting effects.

God Meddled Effects
1-7: No effect.
8-10: You shrink by one size category for 1 round, as reduce person.
11-13: You grow by one size category for 1 round, as enlarge person.
14-15: Your caster level is treated as 1 higher for 1 round.
16-17: Creatures adjacent to you are pushed 10 feet away from the space you occupy.
18-19: You are affected by the benefits of haste for 1 round.
20: The next spell cast may be cast as a swift action as if modified by the Quicken Spell feat.

Every living spellcaster hides a secret in their flesh—a unique, personalized set of conditions that, when all are fulfilled in the correct order, can trigger the transformation into a lich. Normally, one must expend years and tens of thousands of gold pieces to research this deeply personalized method of attaining immortality. Yet, in a rare few cases, chance and ill fortune can conspire against an unsuspecting spellcaster. 
You have yet to turn into an undead creature, but you are close. You take damage from positive energy and heal from negative energy as if you were undead.
At 5th level, add command undead to your list of 2nd-level oracle spells known. 
At 10th level, add create undead to your list of 5th-level oracle spells known. 
At 15th level, you are immune to death effects.

(The Negative Energy Affinity granted at level 1 is not considered a penalty and therefore is not removed.)

You crave the taste of fresh, warm blood. 
You take damage from positive energy and heal from negative energy as if you were undead. 
At 5th level, you gain channel resistance +4. 
At 10th level, you add vampiric touch to your list of 3rd-level oracle spells known and create undead to your list of 5th-level oracle spells known. 
At 15th level, you gain damage reduction 5/magic.
(The Negative Energy Affinity granted at level 1 is not considered a penalty and therefore is not removed.)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你渴望新鲜、温暖的血液的味道。
你受到正能量的伤害并从负能量中恢复，就好像你是不死生物一样。第 5 级时，你获得 +4 引导抗性。在第 10 级时，你将吸血鬼之触添加到你的 3 级先知法术列表中，并将创造不死生物加入到你的 5 级先知法术列表中。 15 级时，你获得 5/魔法的伤害减免。 （在 1 级授予的负能量亲和不被视为惩罚，因此不会被移除。）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Beneficial Vampirism
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 良性吸血鬼化

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Guardian Fool   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Households, Luck, Marriage, Protection   
Edict: Aid childbirths, spread joy and celebration, protect sleeping creatures   
Domains: Community, Earth, Good, Luck, Protection   
Subdomains: Agathion, Caves, Defense, Family, Home, Imagination   
Favoured Weapon: Hunga Munga (Throwing Axe)   
Holy Symbol: Bearded Dwarf Face   
Sacred Animal: Lion   
As the guardian of marriage and a protector of households, Bes had a wide appeal through all levels of Osirian society, and most houses, rich or poor, had a statue or carving of Bes to watch over the family and household. An amiable and inclusive deity, Bes encompasses all types of families under his protection, and is both a god of childbirth and a defender of children. He is the guardian of sleep, protecting against evil spirits and all manner of dangerous beasts, from scorpions and snakes to lions and crocodiles. Bes appears as an ugly, bandy-legged dwarf, with a large head, big eyes, a full beard, and an open mouth with a comically protruding tongue. He wears a headdress of ostrich feathers and a lion skin cloak. In contrast to the other gods of Ancient Osirion, who were usually shown in profile, Bes was always depicted facing forward. Bes is friendly with most of the other Ancient Osirian gods, but always keeps a watchful eye out for Apep and Set and their servants. Bes has few temples and ordained priests, but his joviality makes him popular among bards, professional performers, and serving boys and girls, who also view him as a patron of music, dance, and sexual pleasure, and such worshipers frequently wear small tattoos of Bes for protection and luck. Pregnant women and new mothers also pray to him to watch over their children. Though Bes has few proper temples, simple shrines to the Guardian Fool can be found in many Osirian cities, particularly in entertainment districts.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：癡愚守护者
阵营：中立善良
神职：家户、幸运、婚姻、守护
领域：联盟、大地、善良、幸运、保护
子领域：盖森、洞窟、防御、家庭、想像
偏好武器：三刃镰（飞斧）
圣徽：蓄胡矮人脸
圣兽：狮子
身为婚姻与家户守护神的贝斯广受奥西里昂各阶层的大众喜爱，不论贫富每家每户都会放一尊贝斯的塑像或雕刻以求保庇亲族。和蔼又博爱的贝斯将各式各样的家庭都纳入祂的保护网中，祂同时也是生育与幼童的守护神。此外贝斯也是睡眠的守护者，庇护众人不受邪灵及蛇蠍狮鳄之类的危险野兽所侵害。
贝斯以丑陋又有罗圈腿的矮人形象示人，生著好大一颗头，长着大大的眼睛，一脸大胡子，嘴巴大张还搞笑地吐舌，头上戴着鸵鸟羽饰，身上披着狮皮斗篷。贝斯的划相或雕刻总是正面著观众，与其他一般是侧身的古奥西里昂诸神不同。贝斯与其他诸神大多关系友好，但总是警戒著阿佩普和赛特以及祂们的信众。
贝斯没有多少正式的教堂或祭司，但随和的祂受吟游诗人、专业艺人、幼童侍从所崇拜，这些人将贝斯视为音乐、舞蹈与性爱的守护神，也常在身上刺上贝斯的刺青以求保佑。孕妇及刚产子的母亲也常向祂祈祷以求孩子受到庇佑。虽然贝斯的神殿很少，但癡愚守护者的祭坛在奥西里昂许多的城里都能找到，特别是繁华街之类的声色场所。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Bes
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 贝斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Pirate Queen   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Piracy, Sea monsters, Strife   
Domains: Chaos, Trickery, War, Water, Weather   
Subdomains: Deception, Duels, Innuendo, Oceans, Protean, Storms, Tactics, Thievery   
Favoured Weapon: Rapier   
Holy Symbol: Skull and crossbones   
Sacred Animal: Parrot   
Besmara also known as the Pirate Queen, is a goddess most commonly worshiped by the sailor-folk of the Shackles or Ilizmagorti. She is said to captain her legendary ship Seawraith throughout the seas and waterways of the Great Beyond (especially the Maelstrom), making raids on places such as Hell, Elysium, Axis, and Heaven. Pirates don't tend to be a very religious lot, and generally only call on her on their death bed or if in extreme danger. Those few priests who do devote themselves to her generally also are captains of their own raiding ships and have a fierce reputation. Her symbol is the jolly roger, a universal emblem of piracy, normally a white skull and crossbones on a black field.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：海盗女王 
阵营：混乱中立 
神职：海盗、海怪、冲突 
领域：混乱、诡计、战争、流水、天气 
子领域：欺骗、决斗、影射、海、星灵、风暴、战术、盗窃
偏好武器：细剑
圣徽：骷髅头和交叉骨头图案的旗帜 
圣兽：鹦鹉
贝斯玛拉曾经不过是一个拥有操纵海怪能力的强大水之精魂，几个世纪以来，凭借海员的献祭，她的力量才慢慢壮大。最终通过战胜并吞噬了战斗之灵、黄金之灵和木材之灵后，她成为了海盗、冲突和海怪的弱等神。贝斯玛拉，海盗女王，有着傲慢且大胆的形象，她经常被描绘成穿着海盗服装，包括宽松的，引人注目的衣服和黑色的靴子，她的头发即使是在最风平浪静的日子里也呈现出被风吹乱的样子。她和她的追随者遵循着一个简单的贪婪准则：拿走想要的东西，别问它属于谁。尽管如此，贝斯马拉和她的崇拜者们通常对彼此都很忠诚，他们知道，当海盗们在海浪中抢劫船只、寻找宝藏时，只有船员之间相互信任，才能生存下去。
贝斯玛拉并不愚蠢。她知道审时度势，如果某种宝藏过于难以取得，她也会退而求其次；事实上，她在等待时机，等待获得更多神力的机会，甚至在她劫掠其他弱等神力时也是如此。如果他认为下三滥的招数能让她在战斗中占得优势，她也会不择手段，同时还鼓励她的追随者煽动其他团体之间的冲突，以便能坐收渔翁之利。贝斯玛拉的信仰在那些海盗泛滥甚至被推崇的地方非常流行，例如伊兹玛格罗提或镣铐群岛，她的追随者都希望拜托任何限制他们个人自由的守序的束缚。
贝斯玛拉的大多数追随者都生活在格拉里昂的各大海洋，通常是海盗或其他以海上劫掠为营生的人。这其中既包括最卑鄙的公海杀手，也包括搜寻他们的私掠船。但是，就算是非信徒，也会在起航或风暴来临时向海盗女王祈祷。贝斯玛拉很少介意信仰其它神的人在海上，只要她得到应有的尊重和应得的那份宝藏。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Besmara
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 贝丝玛拉

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Tempered Inventor   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Creativity, Invention, Persistence   
Domains: Artifice, Community, Good, Knowledge   
Subdomains: Agathion, Construct, Cooperation, Education, Thought   
Favoured Weapon: Sickle   
Holy Symbol: Two mixing potions   
Sacred Animal: Elephant   
The Tempered Inventor prefers spending time in his workshop, but occasionally he visits a gifted crafter in person, usually if the crafter is at risk of releasing a dangerous invention into the world. Bharnarol prefers guiding artists through discourse, but may resort to force if necessary. No matter how foul the object or how evil its creator's intent, though, Bharnarol cannot bring himself to destroy any invention. Instead, he steals such inventions away and locks them up in the Unflawed Vault below his workshop. The Tempered Inventor's workshop itself stands among the foothills of the Dragonmane Mountains in Nirvana. A grand tunnel leads from the workshop to the Caverns of Molten Sunlight beneath the mountains, where Bharnarol can work his metallurgic wonders in the living golden heat of his blessed forge.   
Appearance: Bharnarol is a powerful figure with muscular arms for stoking forges and hammering metal. His head is that of an elephant, with silver skin, wise eyes, and ivory tusks. He wears a neat leather apron embossed with images of industry and invention: anvils, books, flasks, forges, honeycombs, kilns, pulleys, and water wheels.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：温和的发明者
阵营：中立善良 
神职：创造力、发明、持久性 
领域：工匠、联盟、善良、知识
子领域：盖森、构装体、协作、教育、思想 
偏好武器：镰刀 
圣徽：两种混合药水
圣兽: 大象
温和的发明者更喜欢花时间在他的工作室里，但偶尔他会亲自拜访一位有天赋的工匠，通常是在工匠面临向世界发布危险发明的风险时。
巴纳洛更喜欢通过话语引导艺术家，但必要时可能会诉诸武力。然而，无论这个物体多么肮脏，或者它的创造者的意图多么邪恶，巴纳洛都不允许让自己摧毁任何发明。取而代之的是，他偷走了这些发明，并将它们锁在他工作室下面的无瑕保险库中。
温和的发明者的工作室本身就位于涅槃龙鬃山脉的山脚下。一条宏伟的隧道从车间通向山下的熔火之光洞穴，在那里，巴纳洛可以在他祝福的熔炉的金色热气中创造他的冶金奇迹。
外貌：巴纳洛是一个强壮的人，手臂肌肉发达，可以用来锻造和锤击金属。他的头是一头大象的头，有着银色的皮肤、睿智的眼睛和象牙。他穿着整洁的皮围裙，上面刻有工业和发明的图像：铁砧、书籍、烧瓶、锻造、蜂窝煤、窑、滑轮和水车。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Bharnarol
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 巴纳洛

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Silence Between, Desna's Shadow   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Distance, Silence, Space   
Domains: Chaos, Good, Liberation, Void   
Subdomains: Azata, Freedom, Revolution, Stars   
Favoured Weapon: Starknife   
Holy Symbol: Black butterfly with star   
Sacred Animal: Butterfly   
Legend tells that at the dawn of creation, Desna placed the stars in the sky. As the goddess worked, she realized she had created a pattern of spaces between the stars. When Desna placed the final star, a shadowy butterfly formed in the spaces between and sprang into existence. This is the Black Butterfly, Desna's Shadow. The Black Butterfly appears as the living silhouette of a graceful woman with white hair and eyes. Her expansive black butterfly wings hold reflections of all the stars, planets, and galaxies in creation. One of the stars on the Black Butterfly's wings is actually her magical starknife, Voidsedge, which can disappear from her wing and appear in her hand with a thought. The Silence Between knows the value of stillness. She has seen the great expanse of space, and its vast and awful silence is reflected in her ancient eyes. Those who live lives of silence, happily or unhappily, turn to the Black Butterfly as one who understands their solemn existence. Explorers venturing into strange territories offer prayers to the Black Butterfly as well. Desna's Shadow teaches that in the silences between breaths and thoughts, one can see one's true nature. While she despises all the forces of evil, she holds particular enmity for the entities of the Dark Tapestry, and it is said she possesses great knowledge about the Dark Tapestry to which she refuses to give voice.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：静默之间
阵营：混乱善良 
神职：路程，宁静与空间
领域：混乱，善良，自由，旅行
子领域：爱塔，解放，革命，星辰
偏好武器：星刃
圣徽：带星星的黑蝴蝶
神兽：蝴蝶
静默之间在星辰之间优雅地飞舞，将路程，宁静与空间纳入管辖。常被称为黛丝娜之影，有些人认为黑蝴蝶是黛丝娜的面相之一，从女神的存在中脱离，获得了自己的生命；至少她对于空间与行路的兴趣显然反映出黛丝娜对旅行的热爱。黑蝴蝶发现星海的寂静对于静思与自省大有裨益。她的追随者会抓紧机会在宁静的黑暗中静坐冥想。长途旅行为自省和沉思提供了充分的机会，而黑蝴蝶也鼓励信者踏上这样的旅途。她憎恨一切邪恶，但她真正憎恨的是那些毒害着黑暗帷幕的强大邪恶生物们。她期待她的追随者毫不容情地去与这些生物，和他们的追随者决一死战。
静默之间的化身是一个蝶翼女子的轮廓，有着洁白的头发与眼瞳。她的翅膀中容纳着整个黑暗帷幕与其中一切存在的反射或剪影。分离的相爱之人，被孤立者，内向者和立誓保持沉默或是并不通过言语进行交流之人，凝视群星之人，旅行者和多愁善感之人都是黑蝴蝶的常见信徒。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Black Butterfly
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 黑蝴蝶

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are a crusader for your god, always ready and willing to fight to defend your faith.
Battle Rage: You can touch a creature as a standard action to give it a bonus on melee damage rolls equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain for 1 round (minimum +1). You can do so a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Wounding Blade (Su): At 8th level, you can give a weapon that you touch the wounding special weapon quality for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your cleric level. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and an additional time per day for every four levels beyond 8th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你是神明的圣战士，时刻准备着为保卫自己的信仰而战。
战斗怒火：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你可{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触{/g}生物，赋予其近战{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害检定{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，加值等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级（最小为1），持续1{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
伤刃：到了8级，你能通过触碰令武器变成血光武器，持续轮数为牧师等级一半。你8级能每天使用1次，以后每比8级高4级多1次。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 鲜血子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This spell summons forth a misty cloud of rust-red toxic algae. Any creature within the mist is coated by it, turning the creature the same reddish color. All targets within the mist gain concealment. Any creature within the mist must save or take 1d4 points of Wisdom damage and become enraged, attacking any creatures it detects nearby (as the “attack nearest creature” result of the confused condition). An enraged creature remains so for one minute per caster level. A creature only needs to save once each time it is within the mist (though leaving and returning requires another save).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这个法术会召唤出一团锈红色的有毒藻类。雾气中的任何生物都会被其包裹，变成同样的红色。迷雾中的所有目标都会获得隐蔽效果。迷雾中的任何生物都必须进行豁免，否则会受到 1d4 点感知值伤害并被激怒，攻击它发现的附近的任何生物（作为迷惑状态的 "攻击最近的生物 "结果）。被激怒的生物每施法者等级会持续一分钟。生物每次在迷雾中都只需要豁免一次（不过离开和返回都需要再次豁免）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Any creature within the mist that fails it's save take 1d4 points of Wisdom damage and become enraged, attacking any creatures it detects nearby (as the “attack nearest creature” result of the confused condition). An enraged creature remains so for one minute per caster level. A creature only needs to save once each time it is within the mist (though leaving and returning requires another save).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 迷雾中的任何生物如果豁免失败，都会受到 1d4 点感知值的伤害，并会被激怒，攻击它发现的附近的任何生物（作为迷惑状态的 "攻击最近的生物 "结果）。被激怒的生物每施法者等级会持续一分钟。生物每次在迷雾中都只需要豁免一次（不过离开和返回都需要再次豁免）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Blood Mist
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 血雾

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Any creature within the blood mist is coated by it, turning the creature a reddish color. All targets within the mist gain concealment.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 血雾中的任何生物都会被血雾包裹，变成红色。血雾中的所有目标都会获得隐蔽效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Blood Mist Concealment
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 血雾隐匿

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Water Lizard   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Revenge, Storms, Water  
Rank: Great Old One   
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Water, Weather   
Subdomains: Catastrophe, Oceans, Rage, Storms   
Favoured Weapon: Ranseur (Longspear)   
Holy Symbol: Green lizard with a long, coiled tail  
The original worshipers of Bokrug were a hideous aquatic race who dwelled upon the shores of an ancient lake in a remote corner of the Dreamlands. As humans rose to prominence on the Material Plane, they inevitably came into violent conflict with these creatures. Humans prevailed, but a thousand years later, the spirits of the slain worshipers of Bokrug rose to exact a terrible revenge. Today, in remote regions of the Dimension of Dreams, Bokrug is worshiped out of fear as much as devotion. When those who encounter Bokrug’s cult while traveling this dimension waken, they often carry in their minds the seeds of faith. In this manner, Bokrug’s cult has spread to the waking world. Compared to other deities of the Elder Mythos, Bokrug seems relatively content to bask in the adoration of his worshipers and the powerful storms that often visit the distant dreaming lands he dwells within. The Great Old One does not often seek to destroy others, by design or by accident. Only when his anger and thirst for vengeance are aroused does Bokrug go on the hunt. Bokrug appears as an immense aquatic lizard with spines and sickly green scales. His exceptionally long tail ends in three terrible spines, and his breath is said to be a poisonous green mist. His cult is typically found in rural regions, where worship of the Water Lizard seems to do wonders in the bringing of fine weather and prosperity—as long as blood sacrifices to Bokrug continue. Although he does not demand the sacrifice of sentient creatures, many of his cults have nonetheless taken to sacrificing prisoners or criminals.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：水蜥
阵营：混乱中立 
神职：复仇、风暴、水 等级：旧日支配者 
领域：混乱、毁灭、水、天气 
子领域：灾难、海洋、狂暴、风暴 
偏好武器：Ranseur (Longspear) 
圣徽: 长着卷曲长尾巴的绿蜥蜴 Bokrug 的原始崇拜者是一个可怕的水生种族，他们居住在梦境偏远角落的一个古老湖泊的岸边。随着人类在物质位面的崛起，他们不可避免地与这些生物发生了激烈的冲突。人类占了上风，但一千年后，被杀害的博克鲁格崇拜者的灵魂升起，进行了可怕的报复。今天，在梦想维度的偏远地区，Bokrug 出于恐惧和虔诚而受到崇拜。当那些在这个维度旅行时遇到博克鲁格的邪教的人醒来时，他们的脑海中往往会带着信仰的种子。通过这种方式，Bokrug 的邪教已经传播到了清醒的世界。与上古神话中的其他神祇相比，博克鲁格似乎比较满足于沉浸在他的崇拜者的崇拜和经常造访他所居住的遥远梦想之地的强大风暴中。旧日支配者并不经常有意或无意地试图摧毁他人。只有当他的愤怒和复仇的渴望被激起时，Bokrug 才会继续狩猎。 Bokrug 看起来像一只巨型的水生蜥蜴，有刺和病态的绿色鳞片。他那异常长的尾巴末端是三根可怕的刺，他的吐息据说是一团有毒的绿色雾气。他的信仰通常出现在农村地区，只要继续向博克鲁格献血，对水蜥蜴的崇拜似乎在带来好天气和繁荣方面创造了奇迹。尽管他不要求牺牲有情的生物，但他的许多邪教仍然采取牺牲囚犯或罪犯的方式。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Bokrug
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 博克鲁格

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 20th level, an Oathbreaker becomes a champion of her own ambition. Her DR increases to 15/lawful or good and whenever she makes a saving throw, she adds her charisma modifier as a bonus.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 20 级时，复仇暴徒致力于实现自己的野心。她的 DR 增加到 15/守序或善良，每当她进行豁免检定时，她都会将她的魅力调整值添加到豁免检定中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Breaker of Oaths
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 破誓

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You slow your breath, calm yourself, and hit the bullseye, just as you were trained to do. 
You can spend a move action to steady your shot. When you do, you gain a +4 bonus on your next ranged attack roll before the start of your next turn.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你放慢呼吸，冷静下来，按照训练的方法击中靶心。
你可以花费一个移动动作来稳定你的射击。当你这样做时，在下一个回合开始前，你的下一次远程攻击投掷会获得+4的加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Bullseye Shot
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 靶心射击

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You release a burst of barbed, acid-filled nettles. Creatures caught in the burst take 3d6 points of damage plus 1d6 points of acid damage on the next round. Those that save take half damage from the initial burst and no damage on the next round.
Reflex half
Next round this creature takes 1d6 points of acid damage.
Burst of Nettles
For some, "an eye for an eye" becomes more than a saying, it becomes a creed by which they live. The castigator is such an individual, always ready to strike when struck.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 对一些人来说，“以眼还眼”不仅仅是一句谚语，更是他们赖以生存的信条。惩戒者就是这样一个人，随时准备对她的敌人展开反击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Castigator
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 惩戒者

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, a mantis zealot can make a sneak attack. This ability functions as the rogue class feature of the same name. At 4th level, his sneak attack damage is +1d6. This damage increases by 1d6 at 8th level and every 4 warpriest levels thereafter. If the zealot gets a sneak attack bonus from another source, the bonuses stack.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 4 级，螳螂狂徒可以进行偷袭。该能力作为同名的盗贼职业特性发挥作用。在第 4 级，他的偷袭伤害为 +1d6。这种伤害在第 8 级和之后每 4 个战争祭司等级增加 1d6。如果狂热者从其他来源获得偷袭加值，则加值叠加。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 12th level, a castigator gains the Opportunist rogue talent.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 12 级时，惩戒者获得机会主义者盗贼天赋。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Even the Score
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 扳回一城

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 8th level, a castigator can make an attack of opportunity as an immediate action against an opponent who hits the castigator with a melee attack, so long as the attacking creature is within the castigator's reach.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 8 级，只要敌人在惩戒者的触及范围内，惩戒者就可以立即对一个用近战攻击她的对手进行借机攻击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 8th level, a castigator can make an attack of opportunity as an immediate action against an opponent who hits the castigator with a melee attack, so long as the attacking creature is within the castigator's reach.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 8 级，只要敌人在惩戒者的触及范围内，惩戒者就可以立即对一个用近战攻击她的对手进行借机攻击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Payback
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 同态复仇

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, a castigator can make an additional number of attacks of opportunity in a round equal to their Charisma modifier (minimum 1). This effect stacks with the Combat Reflexes feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 4 级，惩戒者可以在一轮内进行额外次数的借机攻击，数量等于他们的魅力调整值（最少 1 次）。该效果与战斗反射专长叠加。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, a castigator can make an additional number of attacks of opportunity in a round equal to their Charisma modifier (minimum 1). This effect stacks with the Combat Reflexes feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 4 级，惩戒者可以在一轮内进行额外次数的借机攻击，数量等于他们的魅力调整值（最少 1 次）。该效果与战斗反射专长叠加。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Vengeance
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 复仇

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You have mastery over rock and stone, can manifest vast pits, and command earth creatures.
Acid Dart: As a standard action, you can unleash an acid dart targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged touch attack. This acid dart deals 1d6 points of acid damage+ 1 point for every two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Tunnel Runner: At 8th level, while underground you may gain an insight bonus equal to your cleric level on Stealth and Perception skill checks and an insight bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier on initiative checks. You can use this ability for 1 minute per day per cleric level you possess. These minutes do not need to be consecutive, but they must be spent in 1-minute increments.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你可以控制岩石和石头，可以显现巨型的坑洞，并指挥大地生物：作为一个标准动作，你可以对30英尺范围内的任何敌人释放酸性飞镖作为范围触碰攻击。这枚酸性飞镖会造成 1d6 点酸性伤害+1 点伤害，每提升两级你就会获得该领域的等级。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知修正值。
隧道奔跑者：8级时，当你在地下时，你可以在隐身和感知技能检定上获得相当于你的牧师等级的洞察加值，在主动检定上获得相当于你的感知修正值的洞察加值。你拥有的神职等级越高，每天可使用此能力 1 分钟。这些分钟不需要连续使用，但必须以 1 分钟为单位。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You have mastery over rock and stone, can manifest vast pits, and command earth creatures.
Acid Dart: As a standard action, you can unleash an acid dart targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged touch attack. This acid dart deals 1d6 points of acid damage+ 1 point for every two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Tunnel Runner (Su): At 6th level, as a standard action, you can create a 30-foot aura of gale-like winds that slows the progress of enemies. Creatures in the aura cannot take a 5-foot step and treat it as as difficult terrain. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. The rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你拥有对大地、金属与石头的掌控，可发射酸蚀飞镖并指挥土系生物。
强酸镖：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你能够以远程{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触攻击{/g}的方式，对30英尺内的任意敌人发射一枚强酸镖。此强酸镖将造成{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}酸蚀伤害{/g}，赋予你此领域的职业等级每提升2级，可额外造成1点伤害。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
隧道竞走：在第 6 级，在地下时，你在隐匿和察觉技能检定上获得等同于你牧师等级的洞察加值，在先攻检定上获得等同于你的感知调整值的洞察加值。每天时间为每牧师等级1分钟，不需连续但必须以分钟计。

Domain Spells: stone fist, createpit, spiked pit, spike stones, acidic spray, hungry pit, elemental body IV (earth), iron body, elemental swarm (earth).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你能控制岩石和石头，能显现巨型的坑洞，并指挥大地生物。
酸性飞镖：作为一个标准动作，你可以对30英尺范围内的任何敌人释放酸性飞镖作为范围触碰攻击。这枚酸性飞镖会造成 1d6 点酸性伤害+1 点伤害，每升两级你就会拥有获得该领域的等级。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知修正值：8级时，当你在地下时，你可以在隐身和感知技能检定上获得相当于你的牧师等级的洞察加值，在主动检定上获得相当于你的感知修正值的洞察加值。你拥有的神职等级越高，每天可使用此能力 1 分钟。这些分钟不需要连续使用，但必须以1分钟为单位。
领域法术：石拳、创造坑、尖刺坑、尖刺石、酸性喷雾、饥饿坑、元素体IV（土）、铁体、元素群（土）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You have mastery over rock and stone, can manifest vast pits, and command earth creatures.
Acid Dart: As a standard action, you can unleash an acid dart targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged touch attack. This acid dart deals 1d6 points of acid damage+ 1 point for every two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Tunnel Runner (Su): At 6th level, as a standard action, you can create a 30-foot aura of gale-like winds that slows the progress of enemies. Creatures in the aura cannot take a 5-foot step and treat it as as difficult terrain. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. The rounds do not need to be consecutive.
Domain Spells: stone fist, createpit, spiked pit, spike stones, acidic spray, hungry pit, elemental body IV (earth), iron body, elemental swarm (earth).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你拥有对大地、金属与石头的掌控，可发射酸蚀飞镖并指挥土系生物。
强酸镖：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你能够以远程{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触攻击{/g}的方式，对30英尺内的任意敌人发射一枚强酸镖。此强酸镖将造成{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}酸蚀伤害{/g}，赋予你此领域的职业等级每提升2级，可额外造成1点伤害。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
隧道竞走：在第 6 级，在地下时，你在隐匿和察觉技能检定上获得等同于你牧师等级的洞察加值，在先攻检定上获得等同于你的感知调整值的洞察加值。每天时间为每牧师等级1分钟，不需连续但必须以分钟计
领域法术: 石拳，次元陷坑，次元刺坑，岩刺，酸液喷射，次元饥坑，元素之躯IV（土），钢铁之躯，召集元素（土）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Shepherd   
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Final words, Lost souls, Searches   
Domains: Community, Protection, Repose, Strength   
Favoured Weapon: Quarterstaff   
Holy Symbol: Two concentric circles bisected by a horizontal line   
Ceyannan first arose from the eddies and foam within the River of Souls created by mortals’ resistance to death, and a piece of the Shepherd resides in every mortal heart, allowing this monitor demigod to sense those who flee death’s embrace. Always seeking to recover these lost fragments, Ceyannan gathers wayward souls—the lost, the stolen, and the stubborn—and returns them to the Boneyard. Rumor holds that when the last mortal dies and the Shepherd is whole, Ceyannan will finally embrace death themself. Until that peace comes, Ceyannan relentlessly hunts missing souls, reserving a special hatred for those who would destroy souls or pervert them into undeath. As the patron of lost souls, they are also responsible for containing those souls that pose an existential threat to the cosmos. Ceyannan’s flesh is maggot-white and impossibly beautiful, and their otherwise humanoid frame sports a pair of wings covered in the oily, black feathers of a carrion bird. They often appear clutching the Apostasy, a simple shepherd’s crook capable of dragging out the faith any mortal soul holds for a god. They claim no realm, instead wandering the Material Plane and the River of Souls in search of their lost portions.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：牧羊人 
阵营：绝对中立 

形态：招魂使 
领域：最后的话，迷失的灵魂，搜索
领域：联盟，保护，休息，力量 
偏好武器：四杖
圣徽：两个同心圆被一条水平线一分为二 Ceyannan 最初来自凡人对死亡的抵抗所产生的灵魂之河中的漩涡和泡沫，牧羊人的一部分存在于每个凡人的心中，让这个监控半神能够感知那些逃离死亡拥抱的人。 Ceyannan 一直在寻求找回这些丢失的碎片，他收集任性的灵魂——迷失的、被盗的和固执的灵魂——并将它们送回 Boneyard。有传言说，当最后一个凡人死去，牧羊人完整时，杰亚南最终将自己拥抱死亡。在和平到来之前，Ceyannan 无情地追捕失踪的灵魂，对那些会摧毁灵魂或将他们变成不死之人的人怀有特殊的仇恨。作为迷失灵魂的守护神，他们也有责任收容那些对宇宙构成生存威胁的灵魂。 Ceyannan 的肉是蛆虫般的白色，美丽得令人难以置信，而它们原本是人形的骨架上长出了一对覆盖着腐肉鸟油性黑色羽毛的翅膀。他们经常出现抓着叛教者，一个简单的牧羊人的骗子，能够拖出任何凡人灵魂对神的信仰。他们没有领地，而是在物质位面和灵魂之河中游荡，寻找他们丢失的部分。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ceyannan
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 夨焉捺

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Serendipitous Path   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Fate, Safety, Serendipity   
Domains: Chaos, Good, Luck, Protection   
Subdomains: Azata, Defense, Fate, Purity   
Favoured Weapon: Net (Starknife)   
Holy Symbol: Symmetrical water lily   
Sacred Animal: Gecko   
Chadali gently nudges events and individuals to create fortunate detours, harmonious meetings, and unexpected revelations. Her followers claim that a confluence of singular events-a yellow aurora, a lunar eclipse, and a meteor shower-occurred simultaneously on Elysium, and that from that confluence Chadali was born. Chadali appears as a beautiful, middle-aged Vudrani woman who stands firmly on the ground but whose dark eyes often lift to the sky. Fresh water lilies peep out from the coiled masses of her shining black hair, and she wears silken robes of pale yellow that fall to her bare feet. In her hands she holds a net woven of red threads; tiny rubies glimmer within the folds of the net. The Serendipitous Path teaches that fate is beautiful in its unpredictability. Seemingly insignificant events can determine the course of an entire life. Her agents visit those who are afraid to take chances and encourage them to step out into the world and trust fate. The greatest evil, in Chadali's eyes , is rigidly structuring one's life to prevent unexpected events from happening. Chadali lives in the Pavilion of Serendipity, a structure of glimmering light on the coast of the Boundless Azure Ocean in Elysium.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：偶现之径
阵营：混乱善良
神职：命运、安全、偶然
领域：混乱、善良、幸运、保护
子领域：爱塔、防御、天命、纯净
偏好武器：网（星刃）
圣徽：对称睡莲
圣兽：壁虎
察答理轻轻推动事件和个人的进展，创造幸运的弯路、和谐的会议和意想不到的启示。她的追随者声称，在极乐世界同时发生了一系列奇异事件——黄色极光、月食和流星雨，而察答理正是从这种融合中诞生的。
察答理看起来是一个美丽的中年乌荼罗女人，她坚定地站在地上，但黑色双眸经常仰望天空。
新生的睡莲从她闪亮的黑发中探出头来，她穿着浅黄色的丝质长袍，光着脚。她手里拿着一张用红线织成的网；细小的红宝石在网的褶皱中闪烁。
偶现之径教导说，命运的不可预测性是美丽的。看似微不足道的事件可以决定整个人生的进程。她的代理人拜访了那些恐惧冒险的人，并鼓励他们走向世界并相信命运。在察答理眼中，最大的罪恶，就是刻板地安排自己的生活，以防意外事件的发生。察答理住在极乐境无边碧海沿岸的奇缘阁中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Chadali
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 察答理

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Beginning at 7th level as a swift action, a dreadknight can spend three uses of their profane corruption to surround their weapon with a profane flame and deliver an attack with their weapon, causing 1d6 points of damage plus an additional 1d6 points of damage for every two dreadknight levels they possesses, as well as applying the cruelty selected.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 从第7级开始，以一个迅捷动作，恐惧骑士可以消耗 3 次亵渎之炎使用次数强化他们的武器，使用该武器进行攻击时，额外造成1d6+1d6点/每2个恐惧骑士等级伤害并附加所选残虐的效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Channel Profane Corruption
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎破敌

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Beginning at 7th level as a swift action, a dreadknight can spend three uses of their touch of profane corruption to surround their weapon with a profane flame, causing terrible wounds to open on those they attacks. This ability works with any weapon.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 从第7级开始，以一个迅捷动作，恐惧骑士可以消耗 3 次亵渎之炎使用次数强化他们的武器，使用该武器进行攻击时，额外造成1d6+1d6点/每2个恐惧骑士等级伤害并附加所选残虐的效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Chaos: You are immune to additional damage from critical hits and precision damage (such as sneak attack damage), and weapons you wield count as chaotic for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的技能使用该法术的DC。
混乱：你免疫重击和精准伤害（例如偷袭伤害）造成的额外伤害，并且你使用的武器被视为混乱，以穿透伤害减免。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 混沌领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You can baffle and befuddle foes with a touch or a smile, and your beauty and grace are divine. 
Dazing Touch: You can cause a living creature to become dazed for 1 round as a melee touch attack. Creatures with more Hit Dice than your level in the class that gave you access to this domain are unaffected. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. 
Charming Smile: At 8th level, you can cast charm person as a swift action, with a DC of 10 + 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain + your Wisdom modifier. The effect of charm person lasts for 1 round. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your caster level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的一触一笑都能迷惑敌人，你的美丽和优雅是神圣的。
晕眩之触：作为近战触碰攻击，你可以使生物眩晕1回合。命中骰子比你获得此领域的等级高的生物不受影响。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知修正值。
迷人微笑：8级时，你可以施放 "魅惑他人 "作为快速行动，DC为10+你获得此领域的等级的1/2+你的感知值。魅惑他人的效果持续 1 个回合。您每天可以使用此能力的次数等于您的施法者等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Horseman of Death, The Boatman, The Boatman of the Styx, Lord of Death
Alignment: Neutral Evil 
Areas of Concern: Death 
Domains: Death, Evil, Knowledge, Water 
Subdomains: Daemon, Ice, Memory, Undead 
Favoured Weapon: Quarterstaff 
Holy Symbol: Skull with coins on eyes 
Sacred Animal: Horse, raven   
The Horseman of Death plies the River Styx in his skiff, offering souls passage—for a price. Representing death by old ageand natural causes, Charon can afford to be the most patient and cunning of the Four, as he knows that, in the end, all those evil souls untouched by other gods and creeds will end up on the banks of his river, waiting for him to consume them. The origins of Charon, the oldest of the Horsemen, are shrouded in mystery, and he’s happy to keep them that way.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：死亡骑士、船夫、冥河船夫、死亡领主
阵营：中立邪恶 
关注领域：死亡 
领域：死亡、邪恶、知识、水死亡、邪恶、知识、水 
次领域：大恶魔、冰、记忆、亡灵 
最喜爱的武器：四分杖 
神圣标志：眼睛上有硬币的骷髅头 
神圣动物：马、乌鸦 
死亡骑士驾着他的快艇在冥河上航行，为灵魂提供通行的机会，但要付出代价。卡戎代表着老死和自然死亡，他是四大死神中最有耐心、最狡猾的一个，因为他知道，所有那些没有被其他神灵和信条触碰过的邪恶灵魂最终都会在他的河岸上被他吞噬。卡戎是骑士中最古老的一位，他的身世被蒙上了一层神秘的面纱，而他也乐于保持这种神秘感。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Charon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 卡戎

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Horror from the Hills   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Blood, Patience, Remote hill country   
Rank: Great Old One  
Domains: Chaos, Death, Evil, War   
Subdomains: Blood, Entropy, Murder, Tactics   
Favoured Weapon: Light pick   
Holy Symbol: Elephantine visage with a bloody trunk  
The entity known as Chaugnar Faugn is ancient beyond imagining, a creature capable of existing in more dimensions than most could even guess at and surviving over epochs of time that birth and destroy worlds. For thousands of millennia, Chaugnar Faugn has dwelled, dormant and immobile, in a shallow cave lost within the depths of a desolate stretch of rugged hill country. This is how the Great Old One gained his appellation as the Horror from the Hills, and most of his more ardent worshipers are those who dwell in such backcountry. Yet he has no particular affinity to the slopes and vales that hide him; they are merely where he has waited for the past unknown eons. Chaugnar Faugn’s faithful adopt the Great Old One’s patience. They are violent and eager for blood, yet they wait generations before acting on plans for vengeance or raids. Many times, the cultists’ enemies have believed them to have been exterminated after a brutal conflict, but each and every time, this was a misconception. The worshipers of the Horror from the Hills were merely content to wait for a proper chance at revenge. In those rare occasions when Chaugnar Faugn does wake, though, worship does nothing to deter his hunger; he feeds on zealots and unbelievers with equal disdain. Chaugnar Faugn is vaguely humanoid in form, yet his head is that of a distorted, nightmarish elephant with vast veined ears, enormous curved tusks, and a trunk that ends in a large disk through which he drains the blood of those who draw too near.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：来自群山的恐怖
阵营：混乱邪恶 
神职：鲜血、耐心、偏远山区
等级：旧日支配者
领域：混乱、死亡、邪恶、战争
子领域：鲜血、熵、杀戮、战术 
偏好武器：轻十字镐
圣徽：长有淋血长鼻的象面
被称作夏乌戈纳尔·法格恩的实体古老的超乎想象，祂存在于不可设想的维度之中，且能在纪元交替的世界诞生与毁灭中生存下来。数千万年来，夏乌戈纳尔·法格恩一动不动地蛰伏在一片荒凉崎岖山地深处的浅洞之中，这就是这位旧日支配者“来自群山的恐怖”头衔：的来由，而祂的大多数虔诚信者也都来自于类似的偏远山区。然而，祂对栖身的山地并无特别的兴趣，这里仅仅只是祂等待无尽时光流逝的地方而已。
夏乌戈纳尔·法格恩的虔信者采取了这位旧日支配者的耐心。他们天性暴力，渴求鲜血，但往往会等待数代人才会采取报复或袭击的计划。教团的敌人经常轻信自己已在一场残酷的冲突之后将其剿灭，然而教团总能证明这纯属痴心妄想。来自群山的恐怖的崇拜者们只是乐于等待一个适宜的复仇机会。不过，当夏乌戈纳尔·法格恩偶尔苏醒之时，对祂的敬拜并不能阻止祂的饥渴：祂对虔信者与不信者投以相同的鄙夷轻蔑。
夏乌戈纳尔·法格恩近似人形，但头部类似扭曲而噩梦般的巨象，生有脉络巨耳和弯曲獠牙，长臂末端的大盘被祂用于吸取接近者的鲜血。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Chaugnar Faugn
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 夏乌戈纳尔·法格恩

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The child of Acavna and Amaznen has trained in the nearly forgotten arts of Azlant passed down by Aroden, which combine martial prowess with elementary wizardry. Inspired by the deities Aroden once worshiped long ago, children of Acavna and Amaznen strive to understand the dangers of the world and overcome them with knowledge and strength of arms.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 旧神圣子学习了阿罗登传下来的几乎被遗忘的阿兹兰专长艺，这些技艺结合了武艺和初级魔法。旧神圣子们受到很久以前阿罗登崇拜的神灵的启发，努力了解世界上的危险，并用知识和力量战胜它们。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The child of Acavna and Amaznen completes their initial studies, unlocking the ability to cast all cantrips and all learnt 1st level spells. The caster level for these spells is equal to their fighter level. 
The spell-like cantrips gained from Lore of Acavna and Amaznen are removed in favour of the unlocked cantrips.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
旧神圣子完成初始学习后，就能施放所有法术和所有学到的一级法术。这些法术的施法者等级等于他们的战士等级。
从阿卡夫娜和阿玛兹宁的传说中获得的法术类法术将被移除，取而代之的是已解锁的法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Martial Wizardry
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 武学奇才

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The child of Acavna and Amaznen gains a spellbook starting with spells from the bloodrager spelllist equal to 3 + their Intelligence modifier. 
While they are unable to cast these spells before 5th level, they may add one additional per level and copy spells from scrolls into the spellbook until then.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
旧神圣子会获得一本法术书，从血族法术列表中选取相当于3+智力修正值的法术。
虽然他们在五级之前无法施放这些法术，但在此之前，他们可以每级增加一个，并将投掷上的法术复制到法术书中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Student of Spellcasting
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 法术学生

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A child of Acavna and Amaznen is proficient with all simple weapons, one-handed martial weapons, all armor (heavy, light, and medium) and shields (excluding tower shields).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 旧神圣子精通所有简单武器、单手武术武器、所有盔甲（重型、轻型和中型）和盾牌（塔盾除外）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Child of Acavna and Amaznen Proficiencies
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 旧神圣力

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Child of Acavna and Amaznen
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 旧神圣子

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spell lock before lvl 5
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 5 级前的法术锁定

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Maiden of Haze and Whimsy   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Dreams, Hallucinations, Mists   
Domains: Chaos, Good, Madness, Magic   
Subdomains: Azata, Insanity, Revelry, Whimsy   
Favoured Weapon: Morningstar (Heavy mace)   
Holy Symbol: Eye with rainbow iris   
Sacred Animal: Bird of paradise   
Where mists rise after a gentle shower and wide- eyed prophets see visions of things to come, the hand of Chucaro can be seen. Legend tells that thousands of years ago, an angel fell asleep in a misty dale in Elysium. The angel dreamed of a beautiful woman with a basket full of ethereal visions. When she awoke, she saw her dream made real as Chucaro stepped out of the mist. Chucaro's pale skin gleams iride scently and her eyes shift from color to color in a neverending spectrum. Her frame is draped in robes of living mist. Her waist-length mass of rippled hair shimmers, colorless, like a cascade of rain that rushes continually from her brow. She has a sweet, serious face, and always seems to be listening to something just on the edge of hearing. To combat those fiends who would pervert the visions she grants, Chucaro summons a sap formed of churning mists-anyone struck by the blackjack is overwhelmed by disorienting hallucinations. The Maiden of Haze and Whimsy brings comfort to those afflicted with mad delusions. She soothes their fevers and helps them make sense of the strange images that plague their minds. To her dedicated followers she brings bright, lucid dreams every night. She frowns on those who use harsh drugs to induce visions at the cost of their physical health; Chucaro's agents strive to bring such broken individuals back to health and teach them to draw phantasmagoria from within rather than through the use of external implements. Chucaro can often be found in a delicate house of iridescent pearl in the silver-gray lowlands of Elysium.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：迷蒙狂想少女
阵营：混乱善良
神职：梦，幻景，迷雾
领域：混乱、善良、疯狂、魔法
子领域：爱塔、狂乱、狂欢、滑稽
偏好武器：晨星（重型硬头锤）
圣徽：彩虹瞳膜的眼睛
圣兽：天堂鸟
温和的阵雨后薄雾升起，睁大眼睛的先知看到未来的景象，其中映出了丘卡洛之手。传说数千年前，一位天使在极乐境的迷雾山谷中睡着了。天使梦见一个美丽的女人提着篮子，里面装满了空灵的幻象。当她醒来时，她看到丘卡洛从迷雾中走出来，她的梦想变成了现实。
丘卡洛苍白的皮肤闪烁着迷人的香气，她的眼睛从一种颜色变换到另一种颜色，永无止境。她的身躯披着活雾的长袍。她齐腰长的波涛状头发闪闪发光，无色，像雨点一样不断地从她的额头涌出。她有一张甜美、严肃的脸，似乎总是在倾听耳语。
为了对抗那些会歪曲她给予的幻象的恶魔，丘卡洛召唤了一种由搅动的迷雾形成的汁液——任何被二十一点击中的人都会被迷失方向的幻觉所淹没。迷蒙狂想少女为那些被疯狂妄想折磨的人带来了安抚。她可以缓解他们的发烧，并帮助他们理解困扰他们脑海中的奇怪图像。对于她的忠实追随者，她每晚都会带来明亮、清醒的梦想。她不赞成那些使用刺激性药物以牺牲身体健康为代价来诱发幻觉的人； 丘卡洛的信徒努力让这些沉溺其中的人恢复健康，并教他们从内部而不是通过使用外部工具来绘制幻影。
丘卡洛经常可以在极乐境奔放之野银灰色低地的一间精巧的虹彩珍珠之屋中找到。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Chucaro
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 丘卡洛

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Claws of the False Wyrm are a cult made up of warpriests of Dahak who have been chosen to act as a destuctive foil to Apsu's Silver Champions. Tasked with hunting down the followers of Apsu the most powerful and destuctive of the Claws are granted young drakes to join them on their hunt. These Claws must constantly display their command over their charges as any signs of weakness could be seen as the chance for a drake to succeed its master.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 虚龙之爪是一个由达哈克的战争祭司组成的邪教，他们被选为阿普苏银冠勇士对立的破坏性存在。任务是追捕阿普苏的追随者，最强大和最具破坏性的利爪被授予幼年龙加入他们的狩猎。这些利爪必须不断地展示他们对狩猎的指挥能力，因为任何孱弱的行为都可能被视为对龙神的亵渎。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The target’s skin becomes as thick and tough as clay, granting the target DR 5/adamantine. Once the spell has prevented a total of 5 points of damage per caster level (maximum 50 points), it is discharged and the spell ends.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 目标的皮肤变得像粘土一样又厚又硬，使目标获得 DR 5/精金。一旦法术合计阻止了每施法者等级 5 点伤害（最多 50 点），它就会被解除并结束。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: 10 minutes/level or until discharged
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 10 分钟/级别 或 直到解除

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The target’s skin becomes as thick and tough as clay, granting the target DR 5/adamantine. Once the spell has prevented a total of 5 points of damage per caster level (maximum 50 points), it is discharged and the spell ends.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 目标的皮肤变得像粘土一样又厚又硬，使目标获得 DR 5/精金。一旦法术总共阻止了每施法者等级 5 点伤害（最多 50 点），它就会被解除并且法术结束。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Clay Skin
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 粘土皮肤

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Whether to stop it falling into the wrong hands, or to hold the power for themselves, it is common for an aspiring thief to see a drake egg as a valuable score. Less common is for the egg to hatch while in the thieves care. With a bit of knowledge borrowed from the drake wardens on raising young drakes, the clutch thief gains a new and interesting partner in crime.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 无论是阻止它落入坏人之手，还是为自己掌握权力，一个有抱负的小偷都将龙蛋视为有价值的猎物。出乎意料的是龙蛋在小偷的照料下孵化了。借助从龙兽看守那里借来的一些关于饲养龙兽的知识，龙蛋小偷获得了一个新的、有趣的犯罪伙伴。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Clutch Thief
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙蛋小偷

LocalizedStrings.enGB: By level 17 the clutch thief and the drake instinctively guard each others openings in combat, both gain the Back To Back teamwork feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 到 17 级时，龙蛋小偷和龙兽本能地在战斗中互相守卫，都获得了背靠背团队专长。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shared Back to Back Feat
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 共享背靠背专长

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, the clutch thieves drake companion is finally strong enough to help as a animal companion, but his drake’s level is equal to his rogue level – 3.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 4 级时，龙蛋小偷龙兽伙伴终于强大到足以作为动物伙伴提供帮助，但他的龙的有效等级等于他的盗贼等级-3。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Clutch Thieves Bond
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙蛋小偷盟誓

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At level 11 both the clutch thief and the drake have mastered fighting in tandem, both gain the Outflank teamwork feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在 11 级时，龙蛋小偷和龙兽掌握了联合战斗，都获得了包抄团队专长。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shared Outflank Feat
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 共享包抄专长

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch an ally and grant it the blessing of community. For the next minute, whenever that ally uses the aid another action, the bonus granted increases to +4. You can instead use this ability on yourself as a swift action. 
At 10th level, you can rally your allies to fight together. For 1 minute, whenever you make a successful melee or ranged attack against a foe, allies within 10 feet of you gain a +2 insight bonus on attacks of the same type you made against that foe—melee attacks if you made a melee attack, or ranged attacks if you made a ranged attack. If you score a critical hit, this bonus increases to +4 until the start of your next turn.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，您可以接触一名盟友，并给予其群体祝福。在接下来的一分钟内，每当该盟友使用 "援助他人 "行动时，所获得的祝福值会增加到 +4。你可以将此能力作为一个快速动作对自己使用。
10级时，你可以召集你的盟友一起战斗。在1分钟内，每当你对敌人发动一次成功的近战或远程攻击时，10英尺范围内的盟友都会在你对敌人发动的同类型攻击中获得+2洞察加值--如果你发动的是近战攻击，则为近战攻击；如果你发动的是远程攻击，则为远程攻击。如果你命中要害，该奖励会增加到 +4，直到你的下一回合开始。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Community
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 团队

LocalizedStrings.enGB: For 1 minute, whenever you make a successful melee or ranged attack against a foe, allies within 10 feet of you gain a +2 insight bonus on attacks of the same type you made against that foe—melee attacks if you made a melee attack, or ranged attacks if you made a ranged attack. If you score a critical hit, this bonus increases to +4 until the start of your next turn.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在 1 分钟内，每当你对敌人发动一次成功的近战或远程攻击时，10 英尺范围内的盟友都会在你对该敌人发动的同类型攻击中获得 +2 洞察加值--如果你发动的是近战攻击，则为近战攻击；如果你发动的是远程攻击，则为远程攻击。如果你命中要害，该奖励会增加到 +4，直到你的下一回合开始。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Whenever you make a successful melee or ranged attack against a foe, allies gain a +2 insight bonus on attacks of the same type you made against that foe—melee attacks if you made a melee attack, or ranged attacks if you made a ranged attack. If you score a critical hit, this bonus increases to +4 until the start of your next turn.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每当你对敌人发动一次成功的近战或远程攻击时，盟友都会在你对该敌人发动的同类型攻击中获得 +2 的洞察加值--如果你发动的是近战攻击，则获得近战攻击加成；如果你发动的是远程攻击，则获得远程攻击加成。如果你命中要害，该加成会增加到 +4，直到下一回合开始。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Fight as One
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 一体作战

For 1 minute, whenever you make a successful melee or ranged attack against a foe, allies within 10 feet of you gain a +2 insight bonus on attacks of the same type you made against that foe—melee attacks if you made a melee attack, or ranged attacks if you made a ranged attack. If you score a critical hit, this bonus increases to +4 until the start of your next turn.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The insight bonus to hit against this foe is increased to +4 for one round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在一回合内，对该敌人的命中洞察加值提高到 +4。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Fight as One - Melee Crit
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 一体作战 - 近战暴击

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Melee attacks against this foe have a +2 insight bonus to hit.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 对该敌人的近战攻击有 +2 的洞察加值命中加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Fight as One - Melee
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 一体作战 - 近战

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The insight bonus to hit against this foe is increased to +4 for one round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在一回合内，对该敌人的命中洞察加值提高到 +4。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Fight as One - Ranged Crit
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 一体作战 - 远程攻击

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ranged attacks against this foe have a +2 insight bonus to hit.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 对该敌人的远程攻击有 +2 的洞察加值命中加成。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 一体作战 - 范围

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 给予盟友群体祝福。在接下来的一分钟内，每当盟友使用 "援助他人 "行动时，所获得的奖励会增加 2。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 团队援助 - 盟友

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 作为一个快速行动，给予自己团队的祝福。在接下来的一分钟内，每当你使用 "援助他人 "行动时，所获得的奖励就会增加 2。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 团队援助 - 自我

LocalizedStrings.enGB: For the next minute, whenever you use the aid another action, the bonus granted increases by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在接下来的一分钟内，每当您使用 "援助他人 "行动时，所获得的奖励都会增加 2。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Communal Aid
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 团队援助

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your touch can heal wounds, and your presence instills unity and strengthens emotional bonds. Calming Touch: You can touch a creature as a standard action to heal it of 1d6 points of damage + 1 point per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. This touch also removes the fatigued, shaken, and sickened conditions (but has no effect on more severe conditions). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. Guarded Hearth: At 8th level, you can create a ward that protects a specified area. Creating this ward is a full-round action. All friendly creatures in the area receive a resistance bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier on all saving throws and an equal competence bonus on attack rolls while inside the warded area. The ward lasts for 1 hour per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的触摸可以治愈伤口，你的存在会灌输团结并加强情感纽带。平静之触：你可以用一个标准动作触摸一个生物来治疗它 1d6 点伤害 + 每级 1 点，使你可以进入这个领域。这种接触也消除了疲劳、战栗和恶心的情况（但对更严重的情况没有影响）。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知调整值。守卫壁炉：在第 8 级，您可以创建一个守卫来保护指定区域。创建这个守卫是一个整轮动作。该区域内的所有友方生物在所有豁免检定上获得等同于你的感知调整值的抗力加值，并且在受保护区域内时在攻击检定上获得相同的能力加值。在允许您访问此域的课程中，病房每级持续 1 小时。您每天可以使用此能力一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your touch can heal wounds, and your presence instills unity and strengthens emotional bonds. 
Calming Touch: You can touch a creature as a standard action to heal it of 1d6 points of damage + 1 point per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. This touch also removes the fatigued, shaken, and sickened conditions (but has no effect on more severe conditions). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. 
Guarded Hearth: At 8th level, you can create a ward that protects a specified area. Creating this ward is a full-round action. All friendly creatures in the area receive a resistance bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier on all saving throws and an equal competence bonus on attack rolls while inside the warded area. The ward lasts for 1 hour per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的抚摸可以治愈创伤，你的存在可以促进团结，加强情感纽带。
平静之触：作为标准动作，你可以抚摸一个生物，治愈其1d6点伤害+你获得此领域的等级中每级1点伤害。这个抚摸还能消除疲劳、摇晃和生病的状态（但对更严重的状态没有效果）。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知修正值。
守护壁炉：8级时，你可以创建一个保护指定区域的防护罩。创建守护是一个全回合行动。在该区域内的所有友好生物都会在所有豁免检定中获得等同于你的感知修正值的抗性加成，并在攻击投掷上获得等同的能力加成。守护持续时间为您获得此领域的等级每级 1 小时。每天可以使用一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your touch can heal wounds, and your presence instills unity and strengthens emotional bonds. Calming Touch: You can touch a creature as a standard action to heal it of 1d6 points of damage + 1 point per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. This touch also removes the fatigued, shaken, and sickened conditions (but has no effect on more severe conditions). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. Guarded Hearth: At 8th level, you can create a ward that protects a specified area. Creating this ward is a full-round action. All friendly creatures in the area receive a resistance bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier on all saving throws and an equal competence bonus on attack rolls while inside the warded area. The ward lasts for 1 hour per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day. Domain Spells: bless, communal protection from alignment, prayer, communal protection from energy, burst of glory, communal stoneskin, greater restoration, legendary proportions, mass heal.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的触摸可以治愈伤口，你的存在会灌输团结并加强情感纽带。平静之触：你可以用一个标准动作触摸一个生物来治疗它1d6点伤害+每级1点，使你可以进入这个领域。这种接触也消除了疲劳、战栗和恶心的情况（但对更严重的情况没有影响）。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知调整值。守卫壁炉：在第 8 级，您可以创建一个守卫来保护指定区域。创建这个守卫是一个整轮动作。区域内的所有友方生物在所有豁免检定上获得等同于你的感知调整值的抗力加值，并且在受保护区域内时在攻击检定上获得相同的能力加值。在允许您访问此域的课程中，病房每级持续 1 小时。您每天可以使用此能力一次。领域法术：祝福，公共保护免受阵营，祈祷，公共保护免受能量，荣耀爆发，公共石皮，更大的恢复，传奇的比例，集体治疗。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your touch can heal wounds, and your presence instills unity and strengthens emotional bonds. 
Calming Touch: You can touch a creature as a standard action to heal it of 1d6 points of damage + 1 point per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. This touch also removes the fatigued, shaken, and sickened conditions (but has no effect on more severe conditions). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. 
Guarded Hearth: At 8th level, you can create a ward that protects a specified area. Creating this ward is a full-round action. All friendly creatures in the area receive a resistance bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier on all saving throws and an equal competence bonus on attack rolls while inside the warded area. The ward lasts for 1 hour per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day. 
Domain Spells: bless, communal protection from alignment, prayer, communal protection from energy, burst of glory, communal stoneskin, greater restoration, legendary proportions, mass heal.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的抚摸可以治愈创伤，你的存在可以促进团结，加强情感纽带。
平静之触：作为标准动作，你可以抚摸一个生物，治愈其1d6点伤害+你获得此领域的等级中每级1点伤害。这个抚摸还能消除疲劳、摇晃和生病的状态（但对更严重的状态没有效果）。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知修正值。
守护壁炉：8级时，你可以创建一个保护指定区域的防护罩。创建守护是一个全回合行动。在该区域内的所有友好生物在所有豁免检定中都会获得等同于你的感知修正值的抗性加成，在被守护区域内的攻击投掷上也会获得等同的能力加成。守护持续时间为您获得此领域的等级每级 1 小时。每天可以使用一次。
领域法术：祝福、群体阵营防护、祈祷、群体能量防护、荣耀爆发、群体石肤、大恢复术、力拔山兮、群体治愈。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Community Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 联盟领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Community: You give a sacred +2 will save bonus to all allies within 30 feet.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
联盟：你为 30 英尺内的所有盟友豁免提供 +2 崇圣加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: After the drake grows to a large size it gains the ability to shrink back down to their medium size. When this is active the drakes stats are modified; -4 Strength, +2 Dexterity, and the range on attacks is reduced to the medium size range.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在龙兽长大后，它获得了缩小到中等体型的能力。当此功能处于激活状态时，龙兽能力获得以下变化； -4 力量，+2 敏捷，攻击范围缩小到中等范围。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: After the drake grows to a huge size it gains the ability to shrink back down to their large size. When this is active the drakes stats are modified; -4 Strength, +2 Dexterity, and the range on attacks is reduced to the large size range.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在龙兽成长到巨型后，它获得了缩小到大型体型的能力。当此功能处于激活状态时，龙兽能力获得以下变化； -4 力量，+2 敏捷，攻击范围缩小到大型范围。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Whenever the crawling mound's vines coil successfully grapples a creature, they take 1d6 damage. Everyround the grappled creature fails to escape the grapple they take 1d6 damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每当爬行怪的藤蔓线圈成功抓住一个生物时，它们就会受到 1d6 的伤害。每当被抓住的生物无法逃脱擒抱时，它们都会受到 1d6 的伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Constrict
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 限制

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Size: Medium
Speed: 20 ft.
AC: +6 natural armor
Attack: slam (1d4) + grab
Ability scores: Str 13, Dex 17, Con 13, Int 1, Wis 12, Cha 2
At 4th level size becomes Large, Str +8, Dex -2, Con +4, +1 natural armor, iterative attacks, and grab now deals 1d6 damage on successful grapple and each round.
This animal companion can't be used as a mount.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
体型：中型
速度：20 英尺
AC：+6 天生护甲
攻击：猛击（1d4 + 擒抱
能力值：+6中型
速度：20 英尺
AC：+6 天生护甲
攻击：猛击（1d4）+擒抱
能力值：Str13，敏捷 17，Con13，Int1，感知 12，Cha2
4级时体型变为大型，Str+8，敏捷 -2，体质 +4，+1天生护甲，迭代攻击，擒抱成功时和每回合造成1d6伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Animal Companion — Crawling Mound
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 动物伙伴 - 爬行怪

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A crawling mound's vines coil around any creature it hits with a slam attack. The crawling mound attempts a grapple maneuver check against its target, on a successful check the foe is grappled. 
Grappled characters cannot move, and take a -2 penalty on all attack rolls and a -4 penalty to Dexterity. Grappled characters attempt to escape every round by making a successful combat maneuver, Strength, Athletics, or Mobility check. The DC of this check is the crawling mound's CMD.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
爬行怪的藤蔓会缠绕任何被它猛击的生物。爬行怪会尝试对目标进行擒抱动作检定，如果检定成功，敌人就会被抓住。
被抓住的角色无法移动，所有攻击投掷都会受到-2的惩罚，敏捷也会受到-4的惩罚。被擒住的角色每回合都会尝试逃脱，方法是进行一次成功的战斗演习、力量、运动或移动检定。该检定的 DC 值为爬行怪的 CMD。

Animal Companion — Sapling Treant
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 动物伙伴 - 树苗幼苗

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Size: Small
Speed: 30 ft.
AC: +5 natural armor
Attack: bite (1d4)
Ability scores: Str 10, Dex 17, Con 10, Int -, Wis 10, Cha 2
Special Attacks: Web
At 4th level size becomes Medium, Str +4, Dex -2, Con +2, +1 natural armor and gains iterative attacks.
Spiders Web: Web creates a many-layered mass of strong, sticky strands. These strands trap those caught in them. Creatures caught within a web become grappled by the sticky fibers.
Anyone in the effect's area when spider's web is cast must make a Reflex save. If this save succeeds, the creature is inside the web but is otherwise unaffected. If the save fails, the creature gains the grappled condition, but can break free by making a combat maneuver check, Athletics check, or Mobility check as a standard action against the DC of this ability. The entire area of the web is considered difficult terrain. Anyone moving through the webs must make a Reflex save each round. Creatures that fail lose their movement and become grappled in the first square of webbing that they enter. Spiders are immune to this ability.
This animal companion can't be used as a mount.

蛛网：制造出一团由强韧而有黏性的丝构成的多层网状结构。  这些丝将牢牢缠住里面的人。  被蛛网捆住的生物将被黏性纤维擒抱。  
在{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}施法{/g}时，效果区域内的所有生物都必须进行反射{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}。 如果豁免成功，生物位于网中，但不受任何影响。 如果豁免失败，生物陷入擒抱状态，但可以花费{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}进行{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}战技{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Check}检定{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}运动检定{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}灵巧检定{/g}以脱身，检定难度等于此法术的{g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g}。 受蛛网影响的整个区域视作困难地形。 任何在网中移动的生物每{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}都必须进行反射豁免检定，若失败则失去移动，并在进入的第一个方格被擒抱。蜘蛛免疫该能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While in rage, a barbarian gains a +2 bonus on melee attack rolls, melee damage rolls, thrown weapon damage rolls, and Will saving throws. In addition, she takes a –2 penalty to Armor Class. She also gains 2 temporary hit points per Hit Die.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 处于狂暴状态时，野蛮人在近战攻击检定、近战伤害检定、投掷武器伤害检定和意志豁免检定上获得+2加值。此外，她还要承受 –2 的防御等级减值。她还可以通过每个生命骰获得 2 个临时生命值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Rage
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暴怒

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While in rage, a barbarian gains a +2 bonus on melee attack rolls, melee damage rolls, thrown weapon damage rolls, and Will saving throws. In addition, she takes a –2 penalty to Armor Class. She also gains 2 temporary hit points per Hit Die.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 处于狂暴状态时，野蛮人在近战攻击检定、近战伤害检定、投掷武器伤害检定和意志豁免检定上获得+2加值。此外，她还要承受 –2 的防御等级减值。她还可以通过每个生命骰获得 2 个临时生命值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Conqueror is bent on earthly conquest. They care nothing for the intricacies of divine spellcasting, but malevolent energy still surrounds them. Whether alone or at the head of a marauding host, these cruel warriors bring suffering and death.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 征服者一心要征服尘世。他们对复杂的神术施法毫不在意，但恶毒的能量仍然围绕着他们。无论是独自一人还是在主导掠夺时，这些残暴的战士都会带来痛苦和死亡。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Conqueror
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 征服者

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 7th level, the conqueror's commandments warp the minds of those who accept them even further.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 7 级，征服者的敕命会进一步扭曲那些接受它们的人的思想。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, a conqueror receives the ability to incite rage in those he rules over, as the skald inspired rage class feature.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 7 级，征服者的敕命会进一步扭曲那些接受它们的人的思想。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, a conqueror receives the ability to incite rage in those he rules over, as per the skald inspired rage class feature. Affected allies gain a +1 bonus to melee attack and damage rolls and a +1 bonus on Will saving throws, but also take a -1 penalty to AC. While under the effects of inspired rage, allies other than the conqueror cannot use any ability that requires patience or concentration. At 4th level and every 4 levels thereafter, the song's bonuses on Will saves increase by 1; the penalty to AC doesn't change. At 8th and 16th levels, the song's bonuses to attack and damage increase by 1. (Unlike the barbarian's rage ability, those affected are not fatigued after the song ends.)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
在 1 级，征服者获得挑起他的奴隶愤怒的能力，这个效果等同于野蛮人狂暴职业特性。
受影响的盟友在近战攻击和伤害检定上获得 +1 加值，在意志豁免上获得 +1 加值，但在 AC 上也会受到 -1 减值。
在受到狂暴的影响下，征服者以外的盟友不能使用任何需要耐心或专注的能力。在第 4 级和之后的每 4 级，意志豁免加值增加 1；对 AC 的处罚不变。在第 8 级和第 16 级，攻击和伤害加成增加 1。（与野蛮人的狂暴能力不同，受影响的人在影响结束后不会陷入疲劳。）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Commandment
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎敕命

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 7th level, the conqueror's commandments warp the minds of those who accept them even further, the Strength bonuses of the conquerors incite rage increase by 2, however if affected creature stops attacking or changes the target she suffers (1d6 + his level) points of damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 7 级，征服者的敕命会进一步扭曲那些接受它们的人的思想，征服者亵渎敕命带来的力量加值增加 2，但是如果受影响的生物停止攻击或改变目标，她将受到 (1d6 + 他的等级) 点伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Conquest
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎征服

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
With a touch, this spell causes a small, rapidly growing patch of corrosive acid to appear on the target. On application, the acid deals 1 point of acid damage per caster level (maximum 15). 
Next round on the casters turn, the acid patch grows and deals 1d4 points of acid damage per caster level (maximum 15d4). 
During the second round on the casters turn, the acid patch covers the entire creature and deals 1d6 points of acid damage per caster level (maximum 15d6), the acid then evaporates. 
A creature can only be affected by one instance of corrosive consumption at a time.

A creature can only be affected by one instance of corrosive consumption at a time.

Titles: The Traitor   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Betrayal, Exiles, Shadows   
Domains: Chaos, Darkness, Nobility, Travel   
Subdomains: Exploration, Loss, Martyr, Night   
Favoured Weapon: Rapier   
Holy Symbol: Eye with crescent moon pupil   
Sacred Animal: Bat   
Over eons beyond mortal ken, many Eldest have been forced out of power or vanished into obscurity. Yet only one has managed to do both these things and still exert influence over both the First World and the planes beyond. The creature known as Count Ranalc, for reasons long lost to history—first rose to power in the early days of the multiverse as a physical embodiment of primal darkness and the chaos of creation. Tall and gaunt, constantly wrapped in inky shadow, he was always difficult for the other fey lords to work with, his arrogance born from both power and the knowledge that, in the end, his domain of darkness would consume all things. Still, the other Eldest respected his strength and the necessity of chaos in fueling the fires of existence, which makes it all the more surprising that they eventually banded together to exile him from the plane entirely. What Ranalc did to rouse the ire—or self-preservation—of the other Eldest remains one of the First World’s greatest mysteries, but it was at that point, millennia ago, that he was first given the appellation “the Traitor.” Cast out onto the Shadow Plane, Ranalc shocked the others by refusing to be beaten, instead creating a stronghold within the darkness and embracing his new role as lord of exiles and betrayal. From his darkened realm, he continued to grant power to his followers and influence both the First World and Material Plane. Yet even then the mystery of the dark lord was not yet complete. Though historical records dating all the way back to the Age of Anguish show evidence of Ranalc’s machinations on Golarion, he abruptly disappeared from both his shadowed court and the pages of history in the third century of the Age of Anguish. Whatever the truth, the fact that he continues to grant magic to his followers indicates that, wherever the missing demigod has gone, he has not yet met the same fate as Aroden.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：背叛者
阵营：混乱中立
神职：背叛、放逐、阴影 
领域：混乱、黑暗、崇高、旅行
子领域：探索、失却、殉难、暗夜
偏好武器：木棍
圣徽：带有新月瞳孔的眼睛
圣兽：蝙蝠
超越凡人所知的亿万年，许多始祖被迫失去权力或消失在默默无闻中。然而，只有一个人成功地做到了这两件事，并且仍然对第一世界和其他位面施加影响。
被称为莱诺克伯爵的生物，由于早已被历史遗忘的原因，在在多元宇宙的早期崛起，作为原始黑暗和混沌创造的物理化身。他又高又瘦，总是笼罩在漆黑的阴影中，其他妖精领主总是难以与他共事，他的傲慢来自权力和他的知识，最终，他的黑暗领域将吞噬一切。
尽管如此，另一位始祖仍然尊重他的力量，也尊重他为生存之火助燃引导混乱的必要性，更令人惊讶的是，他们最终联合起来将莱诺克伯爵完全驱逐出位面。莱诺克伯爵为激起另一位始祖的愤怒——或自我保护——所做的事情仍然是第一世界最大的谜团之一，但正是在几千年前，他第一次获得了“背叛者”的头衔：。
莱诺克伯爵被扔到了阴影位面，他不承认失败，反而在黑暗中建立了一个据点，并接受了他作为流亡和背叛之主的新角色，这让其他人感到震惊。在他黑暗的领域，他继续赋予他的追随者力量，并影响第一世界和主物质位面。然而即便如此，黑暗领主的神秘还没有完全揭开。尽管可以追溯到痛苦时代的历史记录显示了拉纳尔克对葛拉利昂的阴谋的证据，但在痛苦时代的第三世纪，他突然从他阴暗的宫廷和历史的篇章中消失了。不管真相如何，他继续为他的追随者提供魔法这一事实表明，无论这个失踪的半神去了哪里，他还没有遇到与阿罗登一样的命运。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Count Ranalc
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 莱诺克伯爵

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The next use of profane corruption will be enhanced with the fatigued cruelty.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 下一次对亵渎之炎的使用将随着残虐——疲劳而增强。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Cruelty - Fatigued
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 残虐——疲劳

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 3rd level, and every three levels thereafter, a dreadknight can select one cruelty. Each cruelty adds an effect to the dreadknight's profane corruption ability. Whenever the dreadknight uses any from of profane corruption to deal damage to one target, the target also receives the additional effect from one of the cruelties possessed by the dreadknight. The Dread Knight selects this cruelty before the attack. The target receives a Fortitude save to avoid this cruelty. If the save is successful, the target takes the damage as normal, but not the effects of the cruelty. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 the dreadknight’s level + the dreadknight’s Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
在第 3 级以及之后的每 3 级，恐惧骑士可以选择一种残虐。
每种残虐都能为恐惧骑士的亵渎之炎能力增加一种效果。当恐惧骑士通过亵渎之炎对一个目标造成伤害时，会受到残虐带来的额外异常状态。恐惧骑士必须在攻击前声明使用残虐。目标骰一次强韧豁免以避免这种效果。如果豁免成功，目标将照常受到伤害，但不会受到残虐的影响。该豁免的 DC 等于 10 + 1/2 恐惧骑士的等级 + 恐惧骑士的魅力调整值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Cruelty Selection
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 残虐选择

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 3rd level, and every three levels thereafter, a dreadknight can select one cruelty. Each cruelty adds an effect to the dreadknight's touch of profane corruption ability. Whenever the dreadknight uses touch of profane corruption to deal damage to one target, the target also receives the additional effect from one of the cruelties possessed by the dreadknight. This choice is made when the touch is used. The target receives a Fortitude save to avoid this cruelty. If the save is successful, the target takes the damage as normal, but not the effects of the cruelty. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 the dreadknight’s level + the dreadknight’s Charisma modifier.

目标骰一次强韧豁免以避免这种效果。如果豁免成功，目标将照常受到伤害，但不会受到残虐的影响。该豁免的 DC 等于 10 + 1/2 恐惧骑士的等级 + 恐惧骑士的魅力调整值。
