LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Dreamer in the Deep   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Cataclysms, Dreams, The Stars   
Rank: Great Old One   
Domains: Chaos, Evil, Madness, Void (Destruction)   
Subdomains: Dark Tapestry, Insanity, Nightmare, Stars   
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Complex rune around eye   
Although Cthulhu is imprisoned in the sunken corpse city of R’lyeh under a vast ocean on a distant world far from Golarion, his mind is vast and terrible, capable of reaching out to touch dreaming minds across the universe. His cult is spread in this manner, as those sensitive to his dreams of madness (typically half-insane artists, poets, and visionaries) waken with memories not wholly their own. Upon waking, these afflicted artists and dreamers may not even consciously recall their dreams or realize that their actions have been influenced. Cthulhu’s spawn—tremendous entities similar in shape and purpose to their great master—also spread his terrible worship, but deadly as they are, they possess but a shadow of Cthulhu’s power. Cthulhu’s cults are secretive, based in remote swamplands, dense forests, and sprawling sewers under the world’s greatest cities. They know that one day the stars shall align and their master’s city will rise again above the waves on that distant, doomed planet, at which point it is merely a matter of time before they are rewarded with the arrival of their terrible deity upon Golarion as he wipes entire worlds clean in preparation for the return of all of the Outer Gods. Cthulhu is a massive creature, roughly humanoid in shape but hideously inhuman in many regards, with an octopoid face, immense wings, and foul protoplasmic flesh that writhes in ways no flesh should. While imprisoned, his mad thoughts can touch only a dreaming few, but once awake, his alien mind will spread like a virus of insanity through all thinking souls.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：深渊梦者
阵营：混乱邪恶 
神职：天灾，梦境与群星
等级：旧日支配者 
领域：混乱、邪恶、疯狂、虚空（破坏）
子领域：异幕，狂乱，梦魇，星辰
偏好武器：匕首
圣徽：环绕一只醒眼的复杂符文
虽然克鲁苏被囚禁在某个远离格拉里昂的遥远世界那浩瀚海洋下的沉没死城之中，但祂的心灵强健而可怖以至祂仍能触及宇宙各处的梦中心灵。祂的教团正以这种方式传播——那些对疯狂梦境敏感的人（大多是半癫狂的艺术家、诗人和空想家）醒来时的记忆并不完全属于他们自己。这些备受折磨的艺术家和梦者甚至可能在醒来后依然没有意识到自己的梦境和行为受到了影响。克鲁苏的眷族——一种与它们的伟大主人相似的庞然大物——同样传播着祂的恐怖崇拜，虽然它们强悍而致命，但它们的力量不过是克苏鲁伟力的阴影而已。
克苏鲁教团行踪诡秘，通常藏身于偏僻的沼地、茂密的丛林和遍布世界各大城市的下水道中。他们知道终有一日群星将列于正确的位置，而属于他们主人的城市将从遥远彼方那颗注定毁灭的星球上再度浮起；而祂降临至格拉里昂授予信徒奖赏也仅仅只是时间问题，因为祂注定要净空所有世界以迎接外神归返。
克苏鲁形如体躯庞大略似人形，但每一处都恐怖至极，祂有着类似章鱼的面容，宽阔的翅翼和不断诡异扭动的丑恶原生血肉。在被囚禁之时，祂的疯狂心智只能触及少数梦者，但一旦醒来，祂的异星思想便会如同疯狂病毒一般散播至所有拥有思想的灵魂之中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Cthulhu
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 克苏鲁

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 2nd level, a sworn of the Eldest adds her Charisma modifier on initiative checks, in addition to her Dexterity modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 2 级时，原初誓约者的先攻检定除了敏捷修正值外，还增加了魅力修正值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Cunning Initiative
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 狡猾的倡议

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action, you can afflict one target within 30 feet with your malign eye, causing it to take a –2 penalty on all saving throws against your spells. The effect lasts for 1 minute. You can use this ability for a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以标准动作，你怨恨地瞪了30尺内单个目标一眼，令其对你的所有法术的豁免检定受到-2惩罚。效果持续1分钟或者到目标攻击命中你，每天能使用的次数为“3+感知修正”。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action, you can afflict one target within 30 feet with your malign eye, causing it to take a –2 penalty on all saving throws against your spells. The effect lasts for 1 minute. You can use this ability for a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以标准动作，你怨恨地瞪了30尺内单个目标一眼，令其对你的所有法术的豁免检定受到-2惩罚。效果持续1分钟或者到目标攻击命中你，每天能使用的次数为“3+感知修正”。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Malign Eye
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 冷眼

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are infused with fate, spreading ill omens to foes while granting fortune to yourself.
Malign Eye: As a standard action, you can afflict one target within 30 feet with your malign eye, causing it to take a –2 penalty on all saving throws against your spells. The effect lasts for 1 minute. You can use this ability for a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Might of the Gods: At 8th level, you add 1/2 of your level in the class that gave you access to this domain as an enhancement bonus to your Athletics checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你与命运融为一体，向敌人传播恶兆，同时给自己带来好运。
冷眼:以标准动作，你怨恨地瞪了30尺内单个目标一眼，令其对你的所有法术的豁免检定受到-2惩罚。效果持续1分钟或者到目标攻击命中你，每天能使用的次数为“3+感知修正”。
神圣幸运：6级起，你可以用标准{g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}动作{/g}，以神圣的幸运自我祝福。接下来的等于赋予你此领域的职业等级一半的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}内，你可以为所有d20检定投骰两次，并取最有利的结果。6级时你每天可施展一次此能力，之后你每在赋予你此领域的职业上提升6级，就可再获得一次每日施展次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are infused with fate, spreading ill omens to foes while granting fortune to yourself.
Malign Eye: As a standard action, you can afflict one target within 30 feet with your malign eye, causing it to take a –2 penalty on all saving throws against your spells. The effect lasts for 1 minute. You can use this ability for a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Divine Fortune: At 6th level, as a standard action, you can bless yourself with divine luck. For the next half your level in the class that gave you access to this domain rounds you roll two times on every d20 roll and take the best result. You can use this ability once per day at 6th level, and one additional time per day for every 6 levels in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 6th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你被命运灌注，向敌人散播不祥之兆，同时为自己带来幸运。
邪恶之眼：作为一个标准动作，你可以用你的邪恶之眼折磨30英尺内的一个目标，使其在所有针对你的法术的豁免检定中受到-2的惩罚。效果持续 1 分钟。您每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 您的感知修正值：6级时，作为标准动作，你可以用神圣的幸运祝福自己。持续你在此领域职业等级的一般轮次，你可以在每次D20掷骰子时掷两次，取最好的结果。在 6 级时，您每天可以使用一次此能力，在 6 级之后，每升 6 级，每天可以额外使用一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Curse Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 破敌子域

LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你被命运灌注，向敌人散播不祥之兆，同时为自己带来幸运。
邪恶之眼：作为一个标准动作，你可以用你的邪恶之眼折磨30英尺内的一个目标，使其在所有针对你的法术的豁免检定中受到-2的惩罚。效果持续 1 分钟。您每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 您的感知修正值：6级时，作为标准动作，你可以用神圣的幸运祝福自己。持续你在此领域职业等级的一般轮次，你可以在每次D20掷骰子时掷两次，取最好的结果。六级时每天可以使用一次，六级后每升六级，每天可以额外使用一次。
领域法术：破敌、援助、赐予破敌、公有能量保护、破除魔法、眼球术、大恢复术、预知时刻、群体治疗。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are infused with fate, spreading ill omens to foes while granting fortune to yourself.
Malign Eye: As a standard action, you can afflict one target within 30 feet with your malign eye, causing it to take a –2 penalty on all saving throws against your spells. The effect lasts for 1 minute. You can use this ability for a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Divine Fortune: At 6th level, as a standard action, you can bless yourself with divine luck. For the next half your level in the class that gave you access to this domain rounds you roll two times on every d20 roll and take the best result. You can use this ability once per day at 6th level, and one additional time per day for every 6 levels in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 6th.
Domain Spells: bane, aid, bestow curse, communal protection from energy, break enchantment, eyebite, restoration greater, euphoric tranquility, mass heal.

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are infused with fate, spreading ill omens to foes while granting fortune to yourself.
Malign Eye: As a standard action, you can afflict one target within 30 feet with your malign eye, causing it to take a –2 penalty on all saving throws against your spells. The effect lasts for 1 minute. You can use this ability for a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Might of the Gods: At 8th level, you add 1/2 of your level in the class that gave you access to this domain as an enhancement bonus to your Athletics checks.
Domain Spells: bane, aid, bestow curse, communal protection from energy, break enchantment, eyebite, restoration greater, euphoric tranquility, mass heal.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你与命运融为一体，向敌人传播恶兆，同时给自己带来好运。
冷眼:以标准动作，你怨恨地瞪了30尺内单个目标一眼，令其对你的所有法术的豁免检定受到-2惩罚。效果持续1分钟或者到目标攻击命中你，每天能使用的次数为“3+感知修正”。
神圣幸运：6级起，你可以用标准{g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}动作{/g}，以神圣的幸运自我祝福。接下来的等于赋予你此领域的职业等级一半的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}内，你可以为所有d20检定投骰两次，并取最有利的结果。6级时你每天可施展一次此能力，之后你每在赋予你此领域的职业上提升6级，就可再获得一次每日施展次数。
领域法术：绝望术、援助术、降咒、共用防护能量、破除法术、凶险注视、高等复原术、狂喜宁静、群体医疗术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Prince of the Blasted Heath, Demon Lord of Fungus and Parasites, Lord of Filth and Pollution
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Disease, Fungus, Parasites   
Domains: Chaos, Earth, Evil, Plant   
Subdomains: Caves, Decay, Demon, Growth, Plague   
Favoured Weapon: Scimitar   
Holy Symbol: Moldy spiraling tentacle
Sacred Animal: Centipede   
Cyth-V’sug’s realm is both a place and a being—an immense parasitic fungus called the Jeharlu capable of extending tendrils into other planes, corrupting them, and then drawing them into the Abyss to expand itself. A quivering, spherical clot of fungal matter much larger than the largest of planets, the Jeharlu lies at the center of an immense cavern, suspended by thick white filaments that attach it to the surrounding rift. Pallid giant worms, moldering shamblers, deformed fungoid dragons, and all manner of demons are but a few of the Jeharlu’s dangers. Cyth-V’sug dwells at the heart of this fungal sphere, an immense monstrosity that appears as a tangled mass of fungal tubers, tentacles, and grasping claws topped by a heaving draconic body with puff ball eyes and jagged teeth. Cyth-V’sug can be thought of as a planetary parasite that infests worlds and consumes them, adding the waste that he leaves behind to his ever-expanding Abyssal realm. One of Cyth-V’sug’s greatest minions, the nascent demon lord Treerazer, recently established a domain on the Material Plane after a failed coup against Cyth-V’sug, yet curiously, the Prince of the Blasted Heath has done little to strike against his wayward minion since.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：枯萎荒地王子、真菌和寄生虫恶魔领主、污秽和污染领主 
阵营：混乱邪恶 
关注领域：疾病、真菌、寄生虫
领域：混乱、大地、邪恶、植物 
子领域：洞穴、腐烂、恶魔、生长，瘟疫 
偏好武器：弯刀 
圣徽：发霉的螺旋触手 
圣兽：蜈蚣  
赛斯-痿'撒格 的领域既是一个地方也是一个存在——一种叫做 Jeharlu 的巨型寄生真菌，能够将卷须延伸到其他位面，腐化它们，并且然后将他们拉入深渊以扩张自己。 Jeharlu 是一个颤抖的球形真菌物质块，比最大的行星还要大得多，它位于一个巨型洞穴的中心，由厚厚的白色细丝悬挂，将其连接到周围的裂隙。苍白的巨型蠕虫、腐烂的蹒跚者、畸形的菌类龙和各式各样的恶魔只是杰哈鲁的一小部分危险。 赛斯-痿'撒格 居住在这个真菌球体的中心，这是一个巨型的怪物，看起来像是一团缠结在一起的真菌块茎、触手和抓握的爪子，顶部是一个起伏的龙形身体，长着肿胀的球眼和锯齿状的牙齿。 赛斯-痿'撒格 可以被认为是一种行星寄生虫，它会感染世界并吞噬它们，将他留下的废物添加到他不断扩大的深渊领域。 赛斯-痿'撒格 最伟大的仆从之一，初生的恶魔领主 Treerazer，在对 赛斯-痿'撒格 的政变失败后最近在物质界建立了一个领域，但奇怪的是，Blasted Heath 的王子几乎没有采取任何行动来对抗他任性的爪牙，因为。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Cyth-V'sug
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 赛斯-痿'撒格

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Shadow in the Sea, Demon Lord of the Sea and Sea Monsters   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Deformity, Sea monsters, The Sea   
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Evil, Water   
Subdomains: Catastrophe, Demon, Oceans, Rage   
Favoured Weapon: Trident   
Holy Symbol: Gold disk inscribed with sinister runes around an open octopus eye   
Sacred Animal: Fish   
Dagon dwells in the Abyssal Sea of Ishiar in a sunken city called Ugothanok. The surface of this Abyssal Sea is dotted with countless islands, many of which are settled by fiendish and half-fiend humans known as Ishians who wage constant nautical warfare upon each other in a never-ending battle to claim new islands and impress Dagon with their cruelties. Not quite fish or octopus or eel, Dagon is fond of sending his spawn into the oceans of the Material Plane to spread his inf luence, often physically by breeding with creatures of the deeps or among isolated coastal-dwelling societies. Marsh giants are traditionally among his most fervent worshipers on land, yet in certain remote locations (particularly along the western coastlines of Avistan and Garund), his cult is growing among humans. A village that turns to the worship of Dagon often does so secretly, maintaining a facade of worshiping another deity when in fact the town’s devotions are for the Shadow in the Sea. In the most remote locations, these cults mix with sahuagin, boggards, and other hideous aquatic creatures. The deformed hybrid children of such blasphemous unions are sure signs of Dagon worship. In these regions, such deformities are regarded as badges of honor.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：海之阴影、海魔领主和海怪 
阵营：混乱邪恶 
神职：畸形、海怪、海洋
领域：混乱、毁灭、邪恶、水 
子领域：灾难、恶魔、海洋、狂暴武器：三叉戟 
圣徽：在张开的章鱼眼睛周围刻有邪恶符文的金圆盘 
圣兽：鱼大衮居住在伊什亚尔深海的一座名为乌戈萨诺克的沉没城市中。这片深渊海的表面散布着无数岛屿，其中许多是被称为 Ishians 的恶魔和半恶魔人类定居的地方，他们在无休止的战斗中相互进行海战，以夺取新岛屿并用他们的岛屿给大衮留下深刻印象。残虐。达贡并不完全是鱼、章鱼或鳗鱼，他喜欢将他的后代送入主物质位面的海洋以传播他的影响力，通常是通过与深海生物或与孤立的沿海居民社会进行繁殖来进行物理繁殖。沼泽巨人传统上是他在陆地上最狂热的崇拜者之一，但在某些偏远地区（尤其是阿维斯坦和加伦德的西部海岸线），他的崇拜在人类中日益增长。一个转向崇拜大衮的村庄经常秘密地这样做，保持崇拜另一个神灵的表面，而实际上该镇的信仰是对海影。在最偏远的地方，这些邪教与沙华鱼、沼泽和其他可怕的水生生物混在一起。这种亵渎神明的结合的畸形混血儿无疑是大衮崇拜的迹象。在这些地区，这种畸形被视为荣誉徽章。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dagon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 大衮

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The False Wyrm, Sorrowmaker, The Endless Destruction, The Great Darkness   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Destruction, Dragons, Evil, Trachery   
Edict: Kill metallic dragons, destroy things at your whim   
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Evil, Scalykind, Trickery   
Subdomains: Catastrophe, Deception, Demon, Dragon, Rage, Thievery   
Favoured Weapon: Bite or Whip   
Holy Symbol: Falling burning scale    
Sacred Animal: None   
Dragons believe Dahak was one of the original gods created by Apsu and Tiamat at the beginning of creation.While the other deities began to create, Dahak chose to destroy. He is credited with transforming Hell into a place of agony and flame. He is also believed to be the creator of the metallic dragons, which he formed solely to hunt as sport. Seeing the destruction and chaos wrought, Apsu entered the Material Plane in order to end Dahak's reign of terror. However, Tiamat saw Dahak as a son and wanted him spared. In a deal to save Dahak, Tiamat healed some of the wounded metallic dragons. These dragons became the original chromatic dragons.
Appearance: The only descriptions of Dahak tell of him as ugly, scarred, and covered in spikes, with a burning hatred in his eyes for his father, Apsu.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：无尽毁灭
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：毁灭、龙、邪恶
领域：混乱、破坏、邪恶、鳞类、诡计
子领域：灾难、欺骗、恶魔、龙、狂暴、盗窃 
偏好武器：啮咬、长鞭（徒手击打） 
圣徽：坠落的燃烧鳞片 
圣兽：无 
龙族相信达哈克是阿普苏和提亚马特在创世之初创造的原始神之一。当其他神灵开始创造时，达哈克选择了毁灭。很多人认为是他将地狱变成了一个充满痛苦和火焰的地方。他也被认为是金属龙的创造者，他创造这些金属龙的目的只是为了狩猎。在看到这些破坏和混乱之后，阿普苏进入物质位面打算结束达哈克的恐怖统治。然而，提亚马特视达哈克为儿子，希望他能幸免于难。为了拯救达哈克，提亚马特治愈了一些受伤的金属巨龙。这些龙成为最初的色彩龙。
外貌：对达哈克的唯一描述是丑陋、伤痕累累、长满尖刺，眼中对他的父亲阿普苏怀有炽热的仇恨。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dahak
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 达哈克

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Claw gains a spellbook with the bloodrager spelllist and gains spellslots at the same rate as a paladin. All spells provided by Dahak's domains and subdomains are added to the Claw of the False Wyrm spellbook.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 虚龙之爪获得一本带有血怒者法术列表的法术书，并以与圣武士相同的进度获得法术位。达哈克的领域和子领域提供的所有法术都被添加到虚龙之爪法术书中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dahaks's Gift
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 达哈克的赠礼

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lady of Foxes   
Alignment: Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Agriculture, Craftsmanship, Kitsune, Rice
Edict: Ensure the health of crops and vegetation, perfect a craft or trade, leave offerings for foxes, celebrate the turning of the seasons   
Domains: Animal, Artifice, Community, Plant, Weather   
Subdomains: Construct, Family, Fur, Growth, Home, Industry, Seasons   
Favoured Weapon: Flail   
Holy Symbol: Nine-tailed fox   
Sacred Animal: Fox   Daikitsu is widely worshiped in Tian Xia, as she is the goddess of rice, a staple food in those lands, as well as of agriculture and craftsmanship. Farmers pray to Daikitsu for good harvests, smiths and craftsmen seek her blessing for their creations, and families ask for her protection for their homes and families. Known as the Lady of Foxes, Daikitsu usually appears as beautiful kitsune woman with snow-white fur and nine tails. She is also the patron of kitsune, who venerate her as the mother of their race.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：狐狸女士 
阵营：绝对中立 
神职：农业、手艺、狐妖、稻米
信条：确保作物和植被的健康，完美的手工艺或贸易，为狐狸送上祭品，庆祝季节的转变 
领域：动物、工匠、联盟、植物、天气 
子领域：构装、家族、毛兽、滋长、家园、工业、季节
偏好武器：连枷
圣徽：九尾狐
圣兽：狐狸
大狐女在天洲信者众多，因为她是稻米之神，掌管田地的丰饶，也关照工匠们的手艺。农民向大狐女祈祷自己的庄稼丰收，匠人向大狐女祈祷自己的作品完美，而每家每户都会向大狐女祈祷保佑家宅平安。就像她的尊号所称的那样，大狐女喜欢化身为一个皮毛光洁雪白，长有九条大尾的狐妖美女出现，因为她也正是狐妖一族的保护者，被狐妖们奉为主母。

领域：动物、工匠、联盟、植物、天气 
子领域：构装、家族、毛兽、滋长、家园、工业、季节
偏好武器：连枷
圣徽：九尾狐
圣兽：狐狸
大狐女在天洲信者众多，因为她是稻米之神，掌管田地的丰饶，也关照工匠们的手艺。农民向大狐女祈祷自己的庄稼丰收，匠人向大狐女祈祷自己的作品完美，而每家每户都会向大狐女祈祷保佑家宅平安。就像她的尊号所称的那样，大狐女喜欢化身为一个皮毛光洁雪白，长有九条大尾的狐妖美女出现，因为她也正是狐妖一族的保护者，被狐妖们奉为主母。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Daikitsu
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 大狐女

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Denied   
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Liquor, Luck, Medicine   
Domains: Healing, Luck, Protection, Repose  
Favoured Weapon: Short sword   
Holy Symbol: Horizontal line crossed by two vertical lines, surrounded by four dots   
While most ushers concern themselves with death, Dammar fixates on life. A physical manifestation of the first resurrection magic, the Denied acts as monitor for all who would journey back to the mortal realm from the Boneyard and ensures that such passages are neither too frequent nor too easy. Concerned as they are with walking back from death, Dammar is also the usher of doctors, medicine, and, due to its long history of use in medical preparations, alcohol and those who produce it. Legends say Dammar created the hangover to grant mortals a peek beyond the veil. Dammar manifests as a portly, androgynous figure swathed in several layers of silk robes, who hides their face behind a veil. Six insectile legs emerge from beneath their robes, and while no arms normally emerge from the swirl of fabric encompassing them, Dammar can manifest dozens at a time to manage various tasks. This uncanny ability—along with their supposed fondness for cockroaches—earns the Denied their unofficial reputation as the usher of insects and creeping things.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：被拒绝的
阵营：绝对中立 

形态：招魂使 
领域：酒、运气、医学
领域：治疗、运气、保护、休息 
偏好武器：短剑 
圣徽：水平线与两条垂直线相交，周围有四个圆点大多数引座员都关心死亡，而达玛则生命。作为第一个复活魔法的物理表现，被拒绝者充当着所有将从墓地返回凡间的人的御衡者，并确保这样的通道既不太频繁也不太容易。尽管他们担心死而复生，但达马尔也是医生、药物的引领者，并且由于其在医疗制剂中的长期使用历史，酒精和生产它的人。传说达马尔创造了宿醉，让凡人能够窥视面纱。 Dammar 显现为一个身材魁梧、雌雄同体的人物，身上裹着几层丝质长袍，面纱掩面。六只昆虫腿从他们的长袍下伸出来，虽然通常不会从环绕它们的织物漩涡中伸出手臂，但达玛一次可以显现数十条来处理各种任务。这种不可思议的能力——连同他们所谓的对蟑螂的喜爱——为否认者赢得了他们作为昆虫和爬行动物的引导者的非官方声誉。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dammar
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 达玛尔

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Weighted Swing  
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Executions, Judiciousness, Responsibility   
Domains: Death, Glory, Good, Law   
Subdomains: Archon, Heroism, Honor, Judgment   
Favoured Weapon: Greataxe   
Holy Symbol: White dove perched on axe   
Sacred Animal: Dove   
Damerrich and his followers believe death to be the defining moment of a mortal's life. How an individual meets her end and why weigh heavily on the spirit in the afterlife. Damerrich understands that evil must sometimes be slain, but never lightly, never easily. Damerrich takes on the weight of all the necessary executions and just deaths in the world. Executioners look to this empyreal lord whenever they have qualms with their line of work, and Damerrich teaches them that while their duty is a s ober and joy-free one, it is necessary to ensure peace and goodness. Damerrich is a silent, monolithic figure clad in black stone armor. His handsome, hairless face is mostly hidden behind his helm; only his weary eyes are clearly visible. Judges, whether appointed officials in city courthouses or village leaders acting as part of a tribunal, pray to Damerrich for guidance in their judgments. Good people may understand the need for executions but shrink from the act; Damerrich and his agents help reas sure them when executions are appropriate or take the burden of mortal guilt upon themselves. Those wrongly sentenced to death pray for intercession from Damerrich, and can hope to receive help in the form of one of his divine agents. Corrupt judges and careless executioners rouse the Weighted Swing's ire like nothing else. Similarly, if an accused deserving of death is set free, Damerrich's agents might appear both to perform the just execution and to chastise those who set the criminal free. The Weighted Swing does not take pleasure in his grim but necessary task, and those who take the matter of execution too lightly or who sadistically revel in the act may expect retribution from Damerrich's chosen elimination squad of shield archons, known as Those of the Heaving Hand.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：权衡之挥
阵营：守序善良 
神职：处刑，明智，责任
领域：死亡、荣耀、善良、守序 
子领域：亚空、英勇、诚实、审判 
偏好武器：巨斧
圣徽：栖息在斧头顶部的白鸽
圣兽: 鸽子
戴莫瑞启和他的追随者相信死亡是凡人生命的决定性时刻。一个人是如何结束她的生命的，为什么在死后会对灵魂产生沉重的影响。达莫里希明白，邪恶有时必须被消灭，但绝不能轻易，也绝不能轻易。
戴莫瑞启承担了世界上所有必要处决和公正死亡的重担。刽子手们在对自己的工作有疑虑时会求助于这位至高天领主，而戴莫瑞启教导他们，虽然他们的职责是冷酷又庄严的，但有必要确保和平与善良。 
戴莫瑞启是一个身着黑色石制盔甲的沉默寡言的人物。他英俊的无毛的脸几乎都隐藏在他的头盔后面；只有他疲劳的眼睛清晰可见。法官，无论是市法院任命的官员，还是作为法庭一部分的村镇领袖，都向戴莫瑞启祈祷，以寻求他们的判决指导。好人可能会理解处决的必要性，但会畏缩不前；戴莫瑞启和他的代理人在适当的处决时帮助他们安抚他们，或者自己承担致命的罪责。那些被错误判处死刑的人祈求戴莫瑞启的帮助，并希望得到他的一位神圣代理人的帮助。
腐败的法官和粗心的刽子手激起权衡之挥的怒火，没有什么比这更重要的了。同样，如果一个该死的被告被释放，戴莫瑞启的代理人可能既要执行公正的处决，又要惩罚那些释放罪犯的人。
权衡之挥不喜欢他严酷但必要的任务，那些对处决问题过于轻率或对这一行为充满残虐的人可能会受到戴莫瑞启挑选的亚空小队的惩罚.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dammerich
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 戴莫瑞启

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a lethal combat dancer, swirling and spinning with grace and precision. You gain a morale bonus on melee attack rolls, melee damage rolls, and Mobility checks, and to Armor Class. This bonus is equal to +1 per 3 caster levels (maximum +5 at 15th level). You must remain moving for the spell to stay in effect. If in any round you do not either move at least 10 feet or make a melee attack, the spell’s duration ends.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你成为一个致命的战斗舞者，优雅而精确地旋转和舞动。你在近战攻击检定、近战伤害检定和移动检定以及防御等级上获得士气加值。该加值等于每 3 个施法者等级 +1（在 15 级达到最大 +5）。你必须保持移动才能使法术生效。如果在任何一轮中你没有移动至少 10 英尺或进行近战攻击，则法术的持续时间结束。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Darkness: You gain the effects of the improved blind fight feat and are immune to blindness effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
黑暗：你获得高等盲斗专长的效果并且免疫目盲。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You must have a bardic performance in effect to cast this spell. With a flourish, you immediately end your performance, dealing 2d8 points of sonic damage to each target. In addition, each target takes 3d6 points of bleed damage for 1d6 rounds. A save negates the bleed damage but not the sonic damage. 
You cannot activate another bardic performance this round. If you have the lingering performance feat the effect lingers as normal.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你必须处于一个生效中的吟游演绎中才能施展这个法术。使用时，你立即结束表演，对每个目标造成 2d8 点音波伤害。此外，每个目标都会受到 3d6 点流血伤害，持续 1d6 轮。豁免可以抵消流血伤害，但不能抵消声波伤害。本轮你不能启动另一个吟游表演。如果你有余音绕梁的表演专长，效果会像往常一样余音绕梁。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your faith is your greatest source of protection, and you can use that faith to defend others. In addition, you receive a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的信仰是你坚定防护的源泉，而且你也可以利用信仰之力保护他人。此外，你的{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}将获得+1抗力{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。你每升5级可额外获得1点抗力加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Defense Domain Resistance Bonus
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 防御子域抗性加值

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your faith is your fortitude, inspiring all with the strength to defend aginst any blow. In addition, you receive a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain.
Deflection Aura: Once each day, you can emit a 30-foot aura for a number of rounds equal to your cleric level. Allies within the aura gain a +2 deflection bonus to AC and combat maneuver defense.
Aura of Protection: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of protection for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You and your allies within this aura gain a +1 deflection bonus to AC and resistance 5 against all elements (acid, cold, electricity, fire, and sonic). The deflection bonus increases by +1 for every four levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th. At 14th level, the resistance against all elements increases to 10. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的信仰是你坚定防护的源泉，而且你也可以利用信仰之力保护他人。此外，你的{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}将获得+1抗力{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。你每升5级可额外获得1点抗力加值。
偏转灵光：每天你能放出持续轮数为牧师等级的30尺灵光，盟友获得AC+2偏斜加值和+2战技防御。
守护灵光：达到8级后，你可发出30英尺范围的守护灵光，每天可持续的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。在此灵光范围内的盟友，包括你自身的{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}防御等级{/g}获得+1偏斜加值，以及对抗所有能量的5点抗性（酸蚀、寒冷、电击、火焰和音波）。在8级后，赋予你此领域的职业每升4级，可额外提高1点偏斜加值。14级时，对抗所有能量的抗性将提高到10点。生效轮次无需连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Defense Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 防御子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your faith is your fortitude, inspiring all with the strength to defend aginst any blow. In addition, you receive a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain.
Deflection Aura: Once each day, you can emit a 30-foot aura for a number of rounds equal to your cleric level. Allies within the aura gain a +2 deflection bonus to AC and combat maneuver defense.
Aura of Protection: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of protection for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You and your allies within this aura gain a +1 deflection bonus to AC and resistance 5 against all elements (acid, cold, electricity, fire, and sonic). The deflection bonus increases by +1 for every four levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th. At 14th level, the resistance against all elements increases to 10. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
Domain Spells: shield, barkskin, protection from energy, communal protection from energy, spell resistance, communal stoneskin, particulate form, protection from spells, seamantle.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的信仰是你坚定防护的源泉，而且你也可以利用信仰之力保护他人。此外，你的{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}将获得+1抗力{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。你每升5级可额外获得1点抗力加值。
偏转灵光：每天你能放出持续轮数为牧师等级的30尺灵光，盟友获得AC+2偏斜加值和+2战技防御。
守护灵光：达到8级后，你可发出30英尺范围的守护灵光，每天可持续的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。在此灵光范围内的盟友，包括你自身的{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}防御等级{/g}获得+1偏斜加值，以及对抗所有能量的5点抗性（酸蚀、寒冷、电击、火焰和音波）。在8级后，赋予你此领域的职业每升4级，可额外提高1点偏斜加值。14级时，对抗所有能量的抗性将提高到10点。生效轮次无需连续。
领域法术：护盾术、树肤、防护能量、共用防护能量、法术抵抗、共用石肤、粒子形态、防护魔法、水幕拒敌

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Since the Age of Destiny, the people of Osirion have worshiped their own local gods, in addition to those deities venerated throughout the Inner Sea region. They were most popular during the early days of Osirion, but their faith waned as the Osirian people gradually turned to the worship of foreign deities. When Osirion was under Keleshite rule, the foreign overlords sought to eradicate the faith in the indigenous gods, but they remain a part of the history of Osirion's land and people, and with the restoration of native Osirian rule, interest in these ancient divinities has been rekindled.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
当文明之芽在刚在痛苦之年从史芬斯河的富饶三角洲破土而出时，移居至此的迦伦德人从大陆南边的家乡带来了在漠南已是古老的诸神信仰。这其中有许多神明长着野兽的头颅─似乎可追溯到更久远以前迦伦德人还在膜拜部族图腾兽的时期─但这只是神明在与凡人互动时选择显现的形象。以太阳神拉，以及继承祂权柄的欧西里斯与荷鲁斯为首，诸神积极介入凡间事务，在史前时代以神君之姿统治众生。作为一个努力奋斗以超脱蛮夷的民族之核心信仰的具现化身，诸神在这片新天地依旧眷顾祂们的天选之民。
阿兹格哈德一世在神君内希斯的引导下在命运之年创建了古奥西里昂。虽然奥西里昂的人民接纳了内海区域所崇拜的众神，他们依然保有对古神的信仰，内希斯、法莱斯玛和莎伦莱的教堂与阿努比斯、伊西斯和拉的圣殿比邻而立。随着古奥西里昂发展到第一和第二时代的顶峰，古老诸神在奥西里昂人心中的分量也越来越小。人类法老君临奥西里昂，而人民也逐渐改为信奉外来的内海众神。终于到了人类黄金时代的登基之年时，古老诸神退隐到了在伟大彼岸的领域，虽然依旧远远地保护与引导奥西里昂，祂们的注意力转移到了埃及古王国─一个遥远世界上的国度。
但在珂治时期，奥西里昂的外族统治者发起了灭绝古神信仰以及其他法老政权痕迹的运动。雕刻被捣毁，塑像被击碎，神殿被夷平。古奥西里昂的宗教就此衰败，但未被根绝，而随着本地法老政权在上个世纪复辟，人民对古奥西里昂历史再次充满兴趣，古神信仰也随之重生。古奥西里昂神系中包含了数十个神祇与半神，在此列举的20个神明是在现代奥西里昂最为活跃，信众也最多的古神信仰。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Deities of Ancient Osirion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 古奥西里昂诸神

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Just as in the lands of the Inner Sea, religion and faith play a vital role in the daily lives of the people of the Dragon Empires. And while there are deities and powerful extraplanar beings beyond count in search of followers, the faiths of 14 gods are particularly strong in Tian Xia
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 就像在内海的土地上一样，宗教和信仰在龙帝国人民的日常生活中也起着至关重要的作用。在天洲占据主要地位的是十四神，但依然有数不清其他的神祇和强大的异界生物在寻找追随者，

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Deities of Tian Xia
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天洲神祇

LocalizedStrings.enGB: There are hundreds of gods and demigods that are worshiped in the Inner Sea Regions. Ranging from unknown minor deities without a pantheon, to just as powerful as more commonly worshipped gods.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 内海域供奉着数以百计的神灵和半神。从没有万神殿的不知名的小神，到与更多人崇拜的神一样强大的神。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A deity, also known as a god or goddess, is a being or force of incredible power capable of granting its power to mortal beings through divine magic. These are the only beings that can claim full Divinity. A deity is strongly associated with a specific alignment, several domains, and a plane (typically an Outer Sphere plane).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神祇，也称为神或女神，是一种具有不可思议力量的存在或力量，能够通过神圣的魔法将其力量赋予凡人。这些是唯一可以声称完全神性的存在。神祇与特定阵营、多个领域和一个位面（通常是外球体位面）密切相关。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Deities of the Inner Sea region
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 内海地区的神灵

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Gods and Goddesses
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神与女神

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you can give yourself an enhancement bonus equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum +1) on melee attacks, melee damage rolls, and combat maneuver checks. This bonus lasts for 1 round. During this round, you take a –2 penalty to AC. You can use this ability for a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以迅捷动作，你让自己获得等于牧师等级一半的增强加值到近战命中伤害和战技检定上1轮，同时AC受到-2惩罚。每天能用“3+感知修正”次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you can give yourself an enhancement bonus equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum +1) on melee attacks, melee damage rolls, and combat maneuver checks. This bonus lasts for 1 round. During this round, you take a –2 penalty to AC. You can use this ability for a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以迅捷动作，你让自己获得等于牧师等级一半的增强加值到近战命中伤害和战技检定上1轮，同时AC受到-2惩罚。每天能用“3+感知修正”次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Fury of the Abyss
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 深渊狂怒

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your soul embodies the anarchic and evil nature of demonkind, your master grants you the power of the Abyss.
Fury of the Abyss: As a swift action, you can give yourself an enhancement bonus equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum +1) on melee attacks, melee damage rolls, and combat maneuver checks. This bonus lasts for 1 round. During this round, you take a –2 penalty to AC. You can use this ability for a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Chaos Blade: At 8th level, you can give a weapon you touch the anarchic special weapon quality for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and an additional time per day for every four levels beyond 8th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的灵魂体现了恶魔的无序和邪恶本性，你的主人赋予你深渊的力量。
深渊狂怒：以迅捷动作，你让自己获得等于牧师等级一半的增强加值到近战命中伤害和战技检定上1轮，同时AC受到-2惩罚。每天能用“3+感知修正”次。
混沌破敌：在第 8 级时，你可以赋予你接触到的武器无序附魔，持续轮数等于你获取该领域的职业等级的 1/2。你可以在 8 级时每天使用一次此能力，8 级之后每 4 级每天可以额外使用一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Demon Subdomain - Chaos
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恶魔子域——混沌

Your soul embodies the anarchic and evil nature of demonkind, your master grants you the power of the Abyss.

You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and an additional time per day for every four levels beyond 8th.
Domain Spells: doom, communal protection from law, rage, freedom of movement, acidic spray, summon monster VI, word of chaos, cloak of chaos, summon monster IX.

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are well-versed in demonic lore.
You gain a +2 morale bonus on all attack rolls and a +2 morale bonus on caster level checks to penetrate spell resistance made against creatures with the demon subtype you recognize as demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你精通恶魔传说。
你在所有攻击投掷上获得+2士气加成，在施法者等级检定中获得+2士气加成，以穿透你认为是恶魔的恶魔亚型生物的法术抗性。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Demon Hunter
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恶魔猎手

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A demon lord is a very powerful and unique demon. They are, by definition, rulers of at least one layer of the Abyss, and have hordes of nascent demon lords and lesser demons in their service. Being creatures of chaos, however, not all demons are servants to a demon lord. As the Abyss is nigh infinite, so too are the number of demon lords.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恶魔领主是一个非常强大和独特的恶魔。根据定义，他们是深渊至少一层的统治者，并拥有成群结队的新生恶魔领主和小恶魔为他们服务。然而，作为混沌生物，并非所有恶魔都是恶魔领主的仆人。由于深渊几乎是无限的，所以恶魔领主的数量也是如此。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Demon Lords
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恶魔领主

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Destruction: You gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls with melee weapons, spells you cast from the evocation spell school have their save DCs (if any) increased by 1, and your attacks against enemies with the construct type deal an additional 1d6 points of force damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
毁灭：你在使用近战武器的伤害掷骰上获得 +2 加值，你施展的塑能系法术的豁免 DC（如果有的话）增加 1，你对构装体类型的敌人的攻击额外造成 1d6 点力场伤害。

You flood yourself with a potent surge of elemental energy. One round after completing the casting of the spell, the energy explodes from your body. 
Choose one of the following four energy types: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. The explosion inflicts 1d8 points of damage of that energy type per caster level (maximum 10d8) to all creatures within 15 feet, and half that amount to targets past 15 feet but within 30 feet. You automatically take half damage from the explosion, without a saving throw, but any other energy resistance or energy immunity effects you may have in place can prevent or lessen this overflow damage caused by the explosion.

Titles: Iron Lord, Father of Dis, First King, King of Iron, Asmodeus' Eye, Master of the Tower, Lord of the Second   
Realm: Dis, Hell   
Alignment: Lawful Evil   
Areas of Concern: Cities, Prisons, Rulership   
Domains: Evil, Law, Nobility, Trickery   
Subdomains: Deception, Devil, Leadership, Legislation, Thievery   
Profane Symbol: Iron Nail, Crown and Ring   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy Mace   
Profane Animal: Hound   
Profane Colours: Iron gray, Red
The archdevil Dispater is Hell's greatest jailer and politician and rules its second layer, Dis. Also known as the Iron Lord, Father of Dis and First King, Dispater is one of the more active rulers of Hell and one of Asmodeus's closest and longest-standing allies. His unholy symbol is an iron spike driven into a golden ring with a red and purple crown. His symbol of office is an artefact known as The Eclipsing Eye. Alone among the lords of Hell, Dispater believes in the virtues of courtly love, and has taken three wives over the course of his eons-long existence. The first is forgotten, even by the Iron Lord himself, the only token of her existence a shattered statue in Dispater's throne room. The second was Feronia, an elemental demigoddess with whom Dispater shared a brief, tempestuous relationship that led to the birth of his son, the empyreal lord Ragathiel. Dispater's third and current wife is Erecura, a once-mortal demigoddess who was condemned to Hell for stealing the secret of eternal life from Pharasma. Dispater has allied with the archdevil Mephistopheles as they both enjoy the art of ruling, and is married to Erecura.   
Appearance: Dispater appears as a majestic, seven-foot-tall figure with rust-red skin, four horns, and a burning crown that hovers above his head. His skin bears dozens of scars and piercings, each of them a past wound turned into a mark of pride. He retains his angelic wings, though they are now black, and he keeps them retracted within his body at almost all times. The First King's staff of office is The Eclipsing Eye, a bladed staff with a great ruby through which Asmodeus constantly watches him.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：钢铁公爵
阵营：守序邪恶
神职：城市、监狱、统治
领域：邪恶、守序、崇高、诡计
子领域：欺骗、邪魔、领导、立法、盗窃
亵渎符号：铁钉、王冠和戒指
偏好武器：重型硬头锤
亵渎动物：猎犬
大魔鬼迪斯帕特是地狱最伟大的狱卒和政治家，他统治着地狱的第二层，迪斯帕特也被称为钢铁之王、迪斯之父和第一任国王，是地狱中最活跃的统治者之一，也是阿斯莫迪斯最亲密和最长久的盟友之一。他的邪恶象征是一根铁钉，钉在一个带有红色和紫色皇冠的金色戒指中。他的办公室象征是一件被称为“食之眼”的人工制品。
在地狱领主中，迪斯帕特独自一人相信宫廷爱情的美好，并在他漫长的存在过程中娶了三位妻子。
第一个被遗忘了，甚至被钢铁领主本人遗忘，她存在的唯一标志是迪斯帕特王座室中破碎的雕像。
第二位是弗洛尼亚，一位元素半神，迪斯帕特与她有着短暂而激烈的关系，这导致了他的儿子——至高无上的领主拉贾瑟尔的诞生。
迪斯帕特的第三任妻子是埃雷库拉，她是一位曾经是凡人的半神，因从法拉斯玛那里窃取了永生的秘密而被判入狱。
迪斯帕特与大魔鬼墨菲斯托结盟，因为他们都喜欢统治的艺术，并与艾蕾卡拉结婚。
外貌：迪斯帕特看上去充满威严，身高七英尺，皮肤呈锈红色，有四个角，头顶上有一顶燃烧的王冠。他的皮肤上有几十道伤痕和穿孔，每一个都是过去的伤口，变成了骄傲的印记。他保留了他的天使之翼，尽管它们现在是黑色的，而且他几乎一直都将它们缩回体内。第一任国王的权杖是“食眼”，这是一把带有大红宝石的刀杖，阿斯莫迪斯通过它不断地注视着他。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Iron Lord, Father of Dis, First King, King of Iron, Asmodeus' Eye, Master of the Tower, Lord of the Second   
Realm: Dis 
Alignment: Lawful Evil   
Areas of Concern: Cities, Prisons, Rulership   
Domains: Evil, Law, Nobility, Trickery   
Subdomains: Deception, Devil, Leadership, Legislation, Thievery   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy mace   
Profane Symbol: Iron Nail, Crown and Ring   
Profane Animal: Hound   
The outcast, the forlorn, the forsaken—all need but to call upon Dispater to have the path home revealed. Known as the Iron Lord, the Father of Dis, and the First King, Dispater welcomes all to his perfect city. Among the most active and cunning of Hell’s rulers, he directly oversees the administration and constant expansion of his vast metropolis, entertains dispossessed souls and the envoys of powerful lords from throughout the planes, and judges those who would f lout infernal law. One of Asmodeus’s oldest and most loyal allies, Dispater holds a favored place in the hierarchy of Hell and serves his lord by creating a city of such dark perfection as to surpass all godly imagining. Calm, creative, and wise, Dispater is also unforgiving, manipulative, and arrogant, blending the traits of the perfect ruler with those of the archfiend he is. He places great value on the concepts of rank and station, as well as the intricacies of courtly manners and lordly right. Despite his interest in conduct and enjoyment of deriding the uncouth, the Lord of the Second quickly dismisses such decorum to further his schemes, often confessing his boredom with Hell’s formalities to those he seeks to influence. Dispater stands out among the archfiends by holding respect for the concept of courtly love. Thrice during his rule has the Iron Lord taken a queen. His first bride was a fallen angel, though none, not even Dispater, can recall her face, name, or fate—a condition that greatly vexes the archfiend. His second, Feronia, was a demigoddess from the Plane of Fire, and after a tryst lasting but a few centuries, she left the First King—somewhat congenially—taking with her the babe who would become the empyreal lord Ragathiel. His current wife, the beauteous Erecura, was once mortal, but her gift of fateful visions allowed her to slip the bonds of death. The pair share a cordial romance, and she is one of Dispater’s closest advisors, revealing her visions to him in exchange for mysterious gifts.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：铁之王，迪斯之父，第一王，铁之王，阿斯莫德之眼，塔主，第二王 
王国：迪斯 
阵营：守序邪恶 
关注领域：城市、监狱、统治者 
领域：邪恶、守序、高贵、诡计 
次领域：欺骗、魔鬼、领导、立法、偷窃 
最喜爱的武器：重锤 
神职者的象征：铁钉、王冠和戒指 
神兽：猎犬 
被遗弃者、被抛弃者、被遗弃者--只要召唤迪斯帕特，就能找到回家的路。迪斯帕特被称为钢铁之王、迪斯之父和第一国王，他欢迎所有人来到他完美的城市。他是地狱中最活跃、最狡猾的统治者之一，直接监管着他那庞大都市的管理和不断扩张，招待来自各个位面的一无所有的灵魂和强大领主的使节，并对那些违反地狱守序的人进行审判。作为阿斯莫德最古老、最忠实的盟友之一，迪斯帕特在地狱的等级制度中占有一席之地，他为他的领主服务，创造了一座超越所有神灵想象的黑暗完美之城。迪斯帕特冷静、富有创造力、睿智，但同时也是一个无情、操纵、傲慢的人，他将完美统治者的特质与大恶魔的特质融为一体。他非常重视等级和地位的概念，以及宫廷礼仪和领主权利的复杂性。尽管二世主对行为举止很感兴趣，也喜欢嘲笑那些粗鲁的人，但为了推进自己的计划，他很快就摒弃了这些礼仪，经常向那些他试图影响的人坦白自己对地狱礼仪的厌倦。Dispater 因尊重宫廷爱情而在大恶魔中脱颖而出。在他统治期间，铁魔王曾三度迎娶王后。他的第一位新娘是一位堕落天使，尽管没有人，甚至迪斯派特，能回忆起她的容貌、名字或命运--这让大恶魔非常苦恼。他的第二任妻子费罗妮娅是来自火界的半神女神，在持续了几个世纪的试婚之后，她离开了初代国王--有点先天不足--并带走了后来成为帝界领主拉加提尔的孩子。他现在的妻子，美丽的埃雷库拉曾经也是凡人，但她的天赋让她摆脱了死亡的束缚。她是 Dispater 最亲密的顾问之一，向 Dispater 透露自己的幻象以换取神秘的礼物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dispater
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 迪斯帕特

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action you become a divine vessel for one round. If you are targeted by a divine spell during this round, grant each ally within 15 feet of you a divine boon. This boon grants a +2 bonus on the next attack roll, skill check, or ability check made before the end of their next turn. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

Divine Vessel - Boon

Many worshippers harness the magic of the divine, you wield the magic of divinity itself. 
Divine Vessel: As a swift action you become a divine vessel for one round. If you are targeted by a divine spell during this round, grant each ally within 15 feet of you a divine boon. This boon grants a +2 bonus on the next attack roll, skill check, or ability check made before the end of their next turn. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. 
Dispelling Touch: At 8th level, you can use a targeted dispel magic effect as a melee touch attack. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time per day for every four levels in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th.

Gain access to the spells and revelations of the Metal mystery. 
Due to the divine herbalist archetype the class skills gained from this archetypeare replaced by the master herbalist feature and the brew potions feat.

Gain access to the spells and revelations of the metal mystery. 
Due to the divine herbalist archetype the class skills gained from this archetypeare replaced by the master herbalist feature and the brew potions feat.

Gain access to the spells and revelations of the shadow mystery. 
Due to the divine herbalist archetype the class skills gained from this archetypeare replaced by the master herbalist feature and the brew potions feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
获得暗影秘示域的法术和启示。
由于神圣草药师原型的出现，从该原型中获得的类技能被草药大师特性和酿造药剂专长所取代。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Gain access to the spells and revelations of the succor mystery. 
Due to the divine herbalist archetype the class skills gained from this archetypeare replaced by the master herbalist feature and the brew potions feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
获得救助秘示域的法术和启示。
由于神圣草药师原型，从该原型获得的职业技能被草药大师特征和酿造药水专长所取代。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Gain access to the spells and revelations of the winter mystery. 
Due to the divine herbalist archetype the class skills gained from this archetypeare replaced by the master herbalist feature and the brew potions feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
获得冬季秘示域的法术和启示。
由于神圣草药师原型的出现，从该原型中获得的类技能被草药大师特性和酿造药剂专长所取代。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Gain access to the spells and revelations of the wood mystery. 
Due to the divine herbalist archetype the class skills gained from this archetypeare replaced by the master herbalist feature and the brew potions feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
获得木秘示域的法术和启示。
由于神圣草药师原型的出现，从该原型中获得的类技能被草药大师特性和酿造药剂专长所取代。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Some divine servants take on the role of dealing out unique punishments on behalf of their deities, taking pleasure in carrying out their sacrosanct duties. Divine scourges make a point of inflicting long-lasting maladies and curses on those deserving of such fates under the tenets of the scourges’ religions.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 一些神仆代表他们的神灵执行独特的惩罚，以履行神圣的职责为乐。神祸则会根据神祸的宗教信仰，对罪有应得者施以长期的折磨和破敌。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Divine Scourge
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神祸

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A divine scourge must take the curse subdomain as a domain, regardless of the actual domains offered by her deity. The divine scourge does not receive a second domain.
If the divine scourge already the curse subdomain from another class, they may select another domain or subdomain granted by their deity.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
神祸必须将破敌子域作为一个领域，无论她的神祗提供了哪些实际领域。
如果神祸已经从其他等级获得了破敌子域，他们可以选择其他神祗赋予的领域或子领域。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Curser
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 诅咒者

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level and every 4 cleric levels thereafter, a divine scourge can select the following hexes from the witch class hex list, up to a maximum of five hexes at 19th level: cackle, evil eye, misfortune, slumber, and vulnerability. 
At 11th level, a divine scourge can instead select from the following list of major hexes: agony, delicious fright, hoarfrost, and restless slumber. 
The divine scourge uses her Wisdom modifier instead of her Intelligence modifier to determine the save DCs of her hexes.Any hex that refers to using her Intelligence modifier to determine its duration or effect instead uses her Charisma modifier for that purpose.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
在 3 级和之后的每 4 级牧师等级中，神圣祸害可以从女巫等级的法术列表中选择以下法术，在 19 级时最多可以选择五个法术：咯咯笑、邪恶之眼、不幸、沉睡和脆弱。
11级时，神祸可以从以下主要魔法列表中选择：痛苦、美味的惊吓、冰霜和不安的沉睡。
神祸使用她的感知修正值而不是智力修正值来决定她的法术的豁免DC，任何提到使用智力修正值来决定持续时间或效果的法术都使用她的魅力修正值来决定。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level and every 4 cleric levels thereafter, a divine scourge can select the following hexes from the witch class hex list, up to a maximum of five hexes at 19th level: cackle, evil eye, misfortune, slumber, and vulnerability. 
At 11th level, a divine scourge can instead select from the following list of major hexes: agony, delicious fright, hoarfrost, and restless slumber. 
The divine scourge uses her Wisdom modifier instead of her Intelligence modifier to determine the save DCs of her hexes. Any hex that refers to using her Intelligence modifier to determine its duration or effect instead uses her Charisma modifier for that purpose.
Divine Hexes
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣的六芒星

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level and every 4 cleric levels thereafter, a divine scourge can select the following hexes from the witch class hex list, up to a maximum of five hexes at 19th level: cackle, evil eye, misfortune, slumber, and vulnerability. 
At 11th level, a divine scourge can instead select from the following list of major hexes: agony, delicious fright, hoarfrost, and restless slumber. 
The divine scourge uses her Wisdom modifier instead of her Intelligence modifier to determine the save DCs of her hexes. Any hex that refers to using her Intelligence modifier to determine its duration or effect instead uses her Charisma modifier for that purpose.

At 11th level, a divine scourge can instead select from the following list of major hexes: agony, delicious fright, hoarfrost, and restless slumber. 
The divine scourge uses her Wisdom modifier instead of her Intelligence modifier to determine the save DCs of her hexes.Any hex that refers to using her Intelligence modifier to determine its duration or effect instead uses her Charisma modifier for that purpose.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
在 3 级和之后的每 4 级牧师等级中，神圣祸害可以从女巫等级的法术列表中选择以下法术，在 19 级时最多可以选择五个法术：咯咯笑、邪恶之眼、不幸、沉睡和脆弱。
11级时，神祸可以从以下主要魔法列表中选择：痛苦、美味的惊吓、冰霜和不安的沉睡。
神祸使用她的感知修正值而不是智力修正值来决定她的法术的豁免DC，任何提到使用智力修正值来决定持续时间或效果的法术都使用她的魅力修正值来决定。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: DivineScourgeHexFlag
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: DivineScourgeHexFlag

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Starting at level 1, a living scripture gains spell focus as a bonus feat and at level 2 he can select one spell that he knows to inscribe upon his body, gaining benefits as per the spell specialization feature. The living scripture may replace this spell with any spell known upon gaining the next level. At level 4, he gains spell focus greater as a bonus feat. At 6th level, the living scripture is a magical bastion of his faith, gaining an innate, stackable spell resistance of 13. At levels 10, 15 and 20, the living scripture discovers new ways to increase the power of his spellcasting, choosing a bonus feat from the Wizard class bonus feat selection.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 从 1 级开始，活圣经获得法术专攻作为奖励专长，在 2 级时，他可以选择一个他已知的法术铭刻在他的身上，获得法术专精特性的好处。活圣经可以在升级的时候用任何已知的法术来取代这个法术。在 4 级时，作为加成专长，他获得高等法术专注。在第 6 级，活圣经是他信仰的魔法堡垒，获得 13 点与生俱来的、可叠加的法术抗力。在第 10、15 和 20 级，活圣经发现了增加他的施法力量的新方法，选择了获取来自法师职业额外专长可选择的专长。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Living Scripture
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 活圣经

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch any one ally. For 1 minute, his ranged attacks doesn't provoke an attack of opportunity.
At 13th level, you can touch an ally and give her the gift of flight for 1 minute (as Wings). Whenever the ally succeeds at a charge attack, that attack deals an amount of additional electricity damage equal to your level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1级时，你可以触摸任意一名盟友。1分钟内，他的远程攻击不会引发借机攻击。
13级时，你可以触摸一名盟友，并赋予她飞行天赋，持续1分钟（如同翅膀）。每当盟友冲锋攻击成功时，该攻击会造成相当于你等级的额外电击伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch one ally and grant it feral features. The ally gains 2 claw attacks that each deal 1d6 points of damage if the ally is Medium or 1d4 if it's Small. These are primary natural attacks that replace any similar primary natural attacks the ally might have. This effect lasts for 1 minute.
At 13th level, you can summon a battle companion. This ability functions as summon nature's ally V with a duration of 1 minute. This ability can summon only one animal, regardless of the list used. For every 2 levels beyond 10th, the level of the summon nature's ally spell increases by 1 (to a maximum of summon nature's ally IX at 18th level).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，您可以触摸一名盟友并赋予其野性特征。盟友会获得 2 次爪击，如果盟友是中型，每次爪击会造成 1d6 点伤害，如果是小型，每次爪击会造成 1d4 点伤害。这些都是主要的自然攻击，可以取代盟友可能拥有的任何类似的主要自然攻击。该效果持续 1 分钟。
13 级时，你可以召唤一名战斗同伴。该能力的作用与召唤自然盟友 V 相同，持续时间为 1 分钟。该能力只能召唤一种动物，无论使用的是哪种动物。10级后每升2级，召唤自然盟友法术的等级增加1级（18级时召唤自然盟友IX的最高等级）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Blessed by his deity, a divine tracker hunts down those he deems deserving of his retribution. His weapon is likely to find purchase in his favored enemy.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 受到神灵的庇佑，神圣追猎者会追捕那些他认为应该受到惩罚的人。他的武器很可能会被他偏爱的敌人所接受。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Divine Tracker
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣追踪

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch an ally and grant them greater power to harm and destroy crafted objects. For 1 minute, whenever this ally deals damage to constructs or objects with melee weapons, they bypasses hardness and damage reduction. 
At 13th level, you can temporarily copy a weapon enchantment from one weapon to another. You may copy any simple permanent enchant from a weapon you have currently equipped. If you are using this ability on a double weapon, only one end of the double weapon is affected. The copy lasts for 1 minute. You can use this ability multiple times on the same weapon. 
Some examples of simple enchants are, Icy Burst, Holy, Keen, Speed.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，你可以接触一名盟友，并赋予他们伤害和摧毁人造物品的强大力量。在1分钟内，每当该盟友使用近战武器对构装体或物品造成伤害时，它们都会绕过硬度和伤害减免。
13级时，你可以暂时将一件武器上的魔法复制到另一件武器上。你可以从当前装备的武器上复制任何简单的永久附魔。如果你在双武器上使用此能力，只有双武器的一端会受到影响。复制持续 1 分钟。您可以在同一把武器上多次使用此能力。
一些简单附魔的例子有：冰爆、神圣、锐锋、速度。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, a divine tracker forms a close bond with his deity’s ethos. He selects two warpriest domains from among the domains granted by his deity, and gains the minor blessings of those domains. A divine tracker can select an alignment domain (Chaos, Evil, Good, or Law) only if his alignment matches that domain. A divine tracker uses his ranger level as his warpriest level to determine the effect of the blessing. At 13th level, a divine tracker gains the major blessing from both of his domains.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 四级时，神圣追猎者与神灵的精神形成紧密联系。他从神灵赋予的领域中选择两个经文领域，并获得这些领域的小祝福。神圣追猎者只能选择一个排列领域（混沌、邪恶、善良，守序），前提是他的排列与该领域相匹配。神圣追猎者使用游侠等级作为经文师等级来决定祝福的效果。13 级时，神圣追猎者可以获得两个领域的主要祝福。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Trackers Blessings
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 追踪者的祝福

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, a divine tracker forms a close bond with his deity’s ethos. He selects two warpriest domains from among the domains granted by his deity, and gains the minor blessings of those domains. A divine tracker can select an alignment domain (Chaos, Evil, Good, or Law) only if his alignment matches that domain. A divine tracker uses his ranger level as his warpriest level to determine the effect of the blessing. At 13th level, a divine tracker gains the major blessing from both of his domains.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 四级时，神圣追猎者与神灵的精神形成紧密联系。他从神灵赋予的领域中选择两个经文领域，并获得这些领域的小祝福。神圣追猎者只能选择一个排列领域（混沌、邪恶、善良，守序），前提是他的排列与该领域相匹配。神圣追猎者使用游侠等级作为经文师等级来决定祝福的效果。13 级时，神圣追猎者可以获得两个领域的主要祝福。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch one ally and grant him a chaotic blessing. For 1 minute, this ally deals an additional 1d6 points of damage against lawful creatures. During this time, his attacks are treated as chaotic for the purposes of overcoming damage reduction.
At 13th level, you can summon a battle companion. This ability functions as summon monster IV with a duration of 1 minute, but can only summon demons. This ability can summon only one creature, regardless of the list used. For every 2 levels beyond 10th, the level of the summon monster spell increases by 1 (to a maximum of summon monster IX at 20th level).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，你可以接触一名盟友并给予他混乱祝福。在1分钟内，该盟友对守序生物造成额外1d6点伤害。
13级时，你可以召唤一名战斗伙伴。该能力与召唤怪物 IV 相同，持续时间为 1 分钟，但只能召唤恶魔。该能力只能召唤一种生物，无论使用的是哪种列表。十级后每升两级，召唤怪物法术的等级增加一级（20 级时最高为召唤怪物九级）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch an ally and grant an entrancing blessing. For 1 minute, the ally becomes mesmerizing to their opponents, filling them with either abject admiration or paralyzing fear. This effect functions as archon's aura, except if an affected opponent successfully attacks the ally, the effect ends. This is a mind-affecting effect.
At 13th level, you can surround yourself with a tangible aura of majesty for 1 minute. While this aura is active, all enemies within 30 feet must succeed at a Will saving throw or fall at your feet in admiration for 1 round. A successful saving throw grants immunity to this effect.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，您可以触摸一名盟友并给予迷惑祝福。在 1 分钟内，盟友会迷惑他们的对手，让他们充满钦佩或恐惧。该效果的作用与亚空灵气相同，但如果受影响的对手成功攻击了盟友，效果就会结束。
13级时，你可以用有形的威严光环环绕自己，持续1分钟。当这个光环激活时，30 英尺范围内的所有敌人都必须成功进行意志施法，否则就会在一回合内倒在你的脚下以示敬佩。豁免成功则可免疫此效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch an ally and grant it the blessing of community. For the next minute, whenever that ally uses the aid another action, the bonus granted increases by 2. You can instead use this ability on yourself as a swift action. 
At 13th level, you can rally your allies to fight together. For 1 minute, whenever you make a successful melee or ranged attack against a foe, allies within 10 feet of you gain a +2 insight bonus on attacks of the same type you made against that foe—melee attacks if you made a melee attack, or ranged attacks if you made a ranged attack. If you score a critical hit, this bonus increases to +4 until the start of your next turn.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，您可以接触一名盟友，并给予其群体祝福。在接下来的一分钟内，每当该盟友使用 "援助他人 "行动时，获得的加成就会增加 2。
13级时，你可以召集你的盟友一起战斗。在1分钟内，每当你对敌人发动一次成功的近战或远程攻击时，10英尺范围内的盟友都会在你对敌人发动的同类型攻击中获得+2洞察加值--如果你发动的是近战攻击，则为近战攻击；如果你发动的是远程攻击，则为远程攻击。如果你命中要害，该奖励会增加到 +4，直到你的下一回合开始。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch an ally and bestow a darkness blessing. For 1 minute, the ally becomes enshrouded in shadows while in combat, granting it concealment (20% miss chance).
At 13th level, you can place a shroud of darkness around the eyes of one foe within 30 feet. The target must succeed at a Will saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1级时，你可以接触一名盟友并赐予黑暗祝福。在 1 分钟内，盟友在战斗中会被阴影笼罩，并获得隐匿效果（20% 的失误几率）。
13 级时，你可以在 30 英尺内的一名敌人的眼睛周围放置黑暗笼罩。目标必须在意志豁免时成功，否则会失明1分钟。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can take on a corpse-like visage for 1 minute, making you more intimidating and giving you undead-like protection from harm. You gain a +4 bonus on Persuasion skill checks made to intimidate, as well as a +2 profane bonus on saving throws against disease, mind-affecting effects, paralysis, poison, and stun.
At 13th level, you can make a melee touch attack against an opponent to deliver grim suffering. If you succeed, you inflict 1 temporary negative level on the target for 1 minute. Alternatively, you can activate this ability as a swift action to make your next melee attack during the next minute apply the effect. These temporary negative levels stack. You gain no benefit from imposing these negative levels (such as the temporary hit points undead gain from enervation).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，你可以化身为尸体，持续 1 分钟，使你更具威慑力，并给予你亡灵般的保护，使你免受伤害。你在进行劝说技能检定时获得+4的恫吓加成，在对疾病、影响心智的效果、麻痹、中毒和眩晕的豁免检定时获得+2的亵渎加成。
13级时，你可以对对手发动近战触碰攻击，使其痛苦不堪。如果你成功了，你会对目标造成1分钟的临时负值。或者，你也可以在下一分钟内的下一次近战攻击中以迅捷行动激活该能力，并施加该效果。这些临时负面等级会叠加。您不会从施加这些负值中获得任何益处（例如亡灵会从麻醉中获得临时生命）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch an ally and bless them with the power of destruction. For 1 minute, the ally gains a morale bonus on weapon damage rolls equal to half your level (minimum 1).
At 13th level, you can touch an ally and bless them with even greater destructive power. For 1 minute, the ally gains a +4 insight bonus on attack rolls made to confirm critical hits and has a 50% chance to treat any critical hit or sneak attack against it as a normal hit.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，您可以接触一名盟友，并用毁灭之力祝福他们。在 1 分钟内，盟友在武器伤害投掷上获得相当于你等级一半（最少 1 级）的士气加成。
13 级时，你可以接触一名盟友，用更强大的破坏力祝福他们。在1分钟内，盟友在确认重击的攻击卷上获得+4洞察加值，并有50%的几率将任何重击或偷袭视为普通攻击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch one weapon and enhance it with acidic potency. For 1 minute, this weapon emits acrid fumes that deal an additional 1d4 points of acid damage with each strike.
At 13th level, you can touch an ally and harden its armor or clothing. For 1 minute, the ally gains DR 1/—. For every 2 levels beyond 10th, this DR increases by 1 (to a maximum of DR 5/— at 18th level). This doesn't stack with any other damage resistance or reduction.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1级时，你可以接触一件武器并增强其酸性效力。在 1 分钟内，该武器会散发出刺鼻的烟雾，每次攻击都会造成额外 1d4 点酸性伤害。
13 级时，你可以接触一名盟友并硬化其盔甲或衣服。在1分钟内，盟友获得DR 1/-。10级后每升2级，DR增加1（18级时DR最大值为5/-）。这不会与任何其他伤害抗性或减免叠加。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch one ally and grant him an evil blessing. For 1 minute, this ally deals an additional 1d6 points of damage against good creatures. During this time, his attacks are treated as evil for the purposes of overcoming damage reduction.
At 13th level, you can summon a battle companion. This ability functions as summon monster IV with a duration of 1 minute, but only allows to summon demons. This ability can summon only one creature, regardless of the list used. For every 2 levels beyond 10th, the level of the summon monster spell increases by 1 (to a maximum of summon monster IX at 20th level).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，您可以接触一名盟友并给予他邪恶祝福。在1分钟内，该盟友对善良生物造成额外1d6点伤害。
13级时，你可以召唤一名战斗伙伴。该能力与召唤怪物 IV 相同，持续时间为 1 分钟，但只能召唤恶魔。该能力只能召唤一种生物，无论使用的是哪种列表。第 10 级之后，每提升 2 级，召唤怪物法术的等级就会提升 1 级（20 级时最高提升至召唤怪物九级）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, a divine tracker becomes proficient with the favored weapon of his deity if not already proficient. If his deity’s favored weapon is unarmed strike, he instead gains Improved Unarmed Strike as a bonus feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神力追踪者 1 级时，如果尚未精通其神灵的偏爱武器，则会精通该武器。如果他的神灵偏爱的武器是徒手攻击，他将获得 "精通徒手攻击 "作为额外专长。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Favored Weapon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 最喜爱的武器

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch one weapon and enhance it with the grandeur of fire. For 1 minute, this weapon glows red-hot and deals an additional 1d4 points of fire damage with each hit.
At 13th level, you can touch an ally to wreath them in flames. This gives the ally cold resistance equal to your warpriest level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1级时，你可以触摸一件武器，并用火焰的威严强化它。在 1 分钟内，这件武器会发出灼热的红光，每次命中都会造成额外 1d4 点火焰伤害。
13 级时，你可以触摸一名盟友，让他们沐浴在火焰之中。这将使盟友获得等同于你的战斗祭司等级的寒冷抗性。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch an ally and grant them a glorious blessing. For 1 minute, the ally becomes mesmerizing to their foes. This functions as archon's aura, except if an affected opponent successfully attacks the ally, the effect ends. This is a mind-affecting effect.
At 13th level, you can touch an ally and make their killing blows sow terror among enemy ranks. For 1 minute, whenever the ally reduces a target to 0 hit points, they immediately make a Persuasion (intimidate) check to demoralize all foes within 30 feet who can see the kill.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，您可以触摸一名盟友，并给予他们荣耀的祝福。在 1 分钟内，盟友会对他们的敌人产生迷惑效果。这个效果与大魔导师的光环相同，但如果受影响的对手成功攻击了盟友，效果就会结束。这是一个影响心智的效果。
13 级时，你可以接触一名盟友，让他们的致命一击在敌方队伍中播下恐怖的种子。在1分钟内，每当盟友将目标的命中率降至0时，他们就会立即进行一次劝说（恐吓）检定，以打击30英尺范围内所有能看到杀戮的敌人的士气。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch one ally and grant him a holy blessing. For 1 minute, this ally deals an additional 1d6 points of damage against evil creatures. During this time, his attacks are treated as good for the purposes of overcoming damage reduction.
At 10th level, as a swift action you can bolster your allies' defenses against evil. For one round, all allies within 30 feet gain a +4 sacred bonus on AC and saving throws against evil opponents.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，你可以触摸一名盟友并给予他神圣祝福。在1分钟内，该盟友对邪恶生物造成额外1d6点伤害。
10级时，作为快速行动，你可以增强盟友对邪恶的防御力。在一回合内，30英尺范围内的所有盟友在对抗邪恶对手时获得+4神圣加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can add power to a cure spell as you cast it. As a swift action, you can make your next cure spell empowered (as though using the Empower Spell feat), causing it to heal 50% more damage (or deal 50% more damage if used against undead). This ability doesn't stack with itself or the Empower Spell feat.
At 13th level, you can touch an ally and grant them fast healing 3 for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，你可以在施放治愈法术时为其添加力量。作为一个快速动作，你可以使你的下一个治愈法术获得力量（就像使用赋能法术专长一样），使它治疗的伤害提高50%（如果是对亡灵使用，则造成的伤害提高50%）。此能力不会与自身或 "强效法术 "专长叠加。
13级时，你可以触摸一名盟友并给予他们快速治疗3，持续1分钟。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can temporarily become a master of lore. For 1 minute, you gain the bard's lore master ability.
At 13th level, as a swift action, you can make a touch attack against a creature. If the attack is successful, you learn all of the target's weaknesses, gaining a +2 insight bonus on attack and damage rolls, saving throws, and AC against that creature (the bonus on attack rolls is doubled on rolls made to confirm critical hits). This effect lasts for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1级时，你可以暂时成为传说大师。
13级时，作为快速动作，你可以对一个生物发动触碰攻击。如果攻击成功，你将了解目标的所有弱点，并在对该生物的攻击和伤害投掷、豁免检定和AC上获得+2洞察加值（攻击投掷上的加成在确认要害命中的投掷上加倍）。该效果持续 1 分钟。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch one ally and grant him an axiomatic blessing. For 1 minute, this ally deals an additional 1d6 points of damage against chaotic creatures. During this time, his attacks are treated as lawful for the purposes of overcoming damage reduction.
At 13th level, as a swift action you can bolster your allies' defenses against chaos. For one round, all allies within 30 feet gain a +4 sacred bonus on AC and saving throws against chaotic opponents.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，你可以接触一名盟友并给予他公理祝福。在1分钟内，该盟友对混乱生物造成额外1d6点伤害。
13级时，作为快速行动，你可以增强盟友对混乱的防御力。在一回合内，30英尺范围内的所有盟友在对抗混乱对手时获得+4神圣加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, for 1 round as a swift action, you can ignore impediments to your mobility and effects that cause paralysis (as freedom of movement). You can activate this blessing even if you're otherwise unable to take actions, but not if you're unconscious.
At 13th level, as a swift action you can emit a 30-foot aura that affects all allies with the liberation blessing described above. This effect lasts for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1级时，作为一个敏捷动作，你可以在1回合内无视阻碍你行动的障碍和导致瘫痪的效果（如同行动自由）。
13级时，作为快速行动，你可以发出一个30英尺的光环，影响所有拥有上述解放祝福的盟友。该效果持续一回合。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch an ally and grant them a lucky presence. The target of this luck can roll all ability checks, attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks twice and take the better result. The effect lasts for 1 round.
At 13th level, you can curse an enemy with unlucky presence. The target of this bad luck must roll all ability checks, attack rolls, saving throws, and skill check twice and take the worse result. The effect lasts for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，您可以触摸一个盟友并给予他们幸运的存在。幸运的目标可以掷两次所有属性检定、攻击检定、豁免投掷和技能检定，并取较好的结果。效果持续一回合。
13 级时，您可以用厄运降临破敌一个敌人。厄运的目标必须掷两次所有属性检定、攻击检定、豁免投掷和技能检定，并取较差的结果。效果持续一回合。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, as a swift action you can target a creature within 30 feet that has the cowering, frightened, panicked, or paralyzed condition. That condition is suspended for 1 round, and the chosen creature gains the confused condition instead. The confused creature rerolls any result other than "attack self" or "attack nearest creature." The round spent confused counts toward the duration of the suspended effect. At the end of the confused round, the suspended condition resumes.
At 13th level, as a swift action you can choose one behavior for all confused creatures within 30 feet to exhibit (as if all creatures rolled the same result). This effect lasts for 1 round. You can use this ability even while you are confused.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，作为一个敏捷动作，你可以瞄准 30 英尺范围内出现畏缩、惊恐、慌乱或麻痹状态的生物。该状态会暂停 1 回合，被选中的生物会获得迷惑状态。除了 "攻击自身 "或 "攻击最近的生物 "之外，迷惑状态下的生物可以重新投掷任何结果。迷惑的回合计入暂停效果的持续时间。
13级时，作为快速行动，你可以为30英尺范围内的所有迷惑生物选择一种行为（就像所有生物掷出相同的结果一样）。此效果持续一回合。即使在您处于迷惑状态时，您也可以使用此能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can cause your melee weapon to fly from your grasp and strike an opponent, then instantly return to you. You can make a single attack using a melee weapon at a range of 30 feet. This attack is treated as a ranged attack with a thrown weapon, except that you add your Wisdom modifier to the attack roll instead of your Dexterity modifier (you still add your Strength modifier to the damage roll as normal). This ability cannot be used to perform a combat maneuver.
At 13th level, with a swift action he can recall any single warpriest spell that he has already prepared and cast that day. The spell is prepared again, just as if it had not been cast.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，你可以使你的近战武器从你手中飞出并击中对手，然后立即回到你手中。你可以使用近战武器在 30 英尺范围内进行一次攻击。该攻击与投掷武器的远程攻击相同，只是在攻击投掷上添加的是感知修正值，而不是敏捷修正值（在伤害投掷上添加的仍然是力量修正值）。
13级时，他可以用一个快速动作召回他当天已经准备好并施放的任何一个经文法术。该法术会再次被准备，就像没有施放过一样。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can speak a few words to a creature within 30 feet that fill them with inspiration. You can grant that creature a +2 morale bonus on attack rolls, skill checks, and saving throws. This effect lasts for 1 minute.
At 13th level, as a swift action you can inspire your allies to follow your lead. For one round, all allies within 30 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on attack rolls, skill checks, and saving throws.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，你可以对 30 英尺范围内的生物说几句话，让他们充满灵感。你可以给予该生物攻击投掷、技能检定和豁免检定+2的士气加成。该效果持续 1 分钟。
13 级时，作为快速行动，你可以激励你的盟友跟随你的领导。在一个回合内，30 英尺范围内的所有盟友在攻击投掷、技能检定和豁免投掷上获得 +4 的士气加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, as a swift action you can cause any creature you hit this round with a melee attack to sprout entangling vines that attempt to hold it in place, entangling it for 1 round (Reflex negates). 
At 13th level, you can summon a battle companion. This ability functions as summon nature's ally V with a duration of 1 minute. This ability can summon only one animal, regardless of the list used, and the creature’s type changes to plant instead of animal. For every 2 levels beyond 12th, the level of the summon nature's ally spell increases by 1 (to a maximum of summon nature's ally IX at 20th level).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1级时，作为一个快速动作，你可以使任何在本回合被你近战攻击击中的生物长出缠绕藤蔓，试图将其固定在原地，缠绕它1回合（反射免疫）。
13级时，你可以召唤一个战斗伙伴。该能力与召唤自然盟友 V 相同，持续时间为 1 分钟。该能力只能召唤一种动物，无论使用的是哪种动物，而且该动物的类型会变为植物而不是动物。超过 12 级后，每升 2 级，召唤自然盟友法术的等级就会提高 1 级（20 级时最多提高到召唤自然盟友九级）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, as a swift action, you can cause a creature to sprout entangling vines that attempt to hold it in place, entangling it for 1 round (Reflex negates).
At 13th level, you can summon a battle companion. This ability functions as summon nature's ally IV, with a duration of 1 minute. This ability can summon only one animal, regardless of the list used, and the creature's type changes to plant instead of animal. For every 2 levels beyond 10th, the level of the summon nature's ally spell increases by 1, to a maximum of summon nature's ally IX at 20th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1级时，作为一个快速动作，你可以使一个生物长出缠绕藤蔓，试图将其固定在原地，缠绕它1回合（反射免疫）。
13级时，你可以召唤一个战斗伙伴。该能力与召唤自然盟友 IV 相同，持续时间为 1 分钟。该能力只能召唤一种动物，无论使用的是哪种动物，并且该动物的类型变为植物而非动物。超过 10 级后每升 2 级，召唤自然盟友法术的等级就会提高 1 级，到 20 级时最多提高到召唤自然盟友九级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can gain a +1 sacred bonus on saving throws and a +1 sacred bonus to AC for 1 minute. The bonus increases to +2 at 10th level and +3 at 20th level.
At 13th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of protection for 1 minute. You and your allies within this aura gain resistance 10 against acid, cold, electricity, fire, and sonic. At 15th level, the energy resistance increases to 20.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1级时，你可以在1分钟内获得+1的神圣豁免加成和+1的神圣 AC 加成。该加成在 10 级时增加到 +2，在 20 级时增加到 +3。
13 级时，你可以发出一个 30 英尺的保护光环，持续 1 分钟。在这个光环内，你和你的盟友对酸、冷、电、火和声波获得10级抗性。15级时，能量抗性增加到20。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can fill a living creature with lethargy by hitting it with a melee touch attack, causing it to become staggered for 1 round. If the target is already staggered, it falls asleep for 1 round instead. An undead creature that's touched is staggered for a number of rounds equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1).
At 13th level, when using channel energy to heal living creatures, you can take a swift action on that same turn to also deal damage to undead creatures (as your channel energy ability). Undead take an amount of damage equal to half the amount healed.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，你可以用近战触碰攻击使一个生物陷入昏睡，导致其踉跄 1 回合。如果目标已经踉跄，则会沉睡 1 回合。
13级时，当使用引导能量治疗生物时，你可以在同一回合采取迅速行动，同时对不死生物造成伤害（如同你的引导能量能力）。不死生物受到的伤害相当于治愈量的一半。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can create a blast rune in a desired location. Any creature entering a 5-foot area around the rune takes an amount of damage equal to 1d6 + 1/2 your warpriest level. This rune deals either acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage, decided when you create the rune. The rune lasts a number of rounds equal to your warpriest level.
At 13th level, you can touch an ally and inscribe a secret rune on their weapon. For 1 minute, all of their weapon attacks are treated as adamantine, cold iron, and mithral for all purposes.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，您可以在指定地点创建一个爆炸符文。任何进入符文周围 5 英尺范围内的生物都会受到相当于 1d6 + 1/2 战士等级的伤害。该符文会造成酸、冷、电或火伤害，由你创建符文时决定。该符文持续的回合数等于你的术士等级。
13级时，你可以接触一名盟友，并在他们的武器上铭刻一个秘密符文。在 1 分钟内，他们所有的武器攻击都会被视为金刚石、冷铁和密铁。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, as a swift action you can focus your own strength. You gain an enhancement bonus equal to 1/2 your warpriest level (minimum +1) on melee attack rolls, combat maneuver checks that rely on Strength, Strength-based skills, and Strength checks for 1 round.
At 13th level, as a swift action you can ignore the movement penalties caused by wearing medium or heavy armor. This effect lasts for 1 minute. During this time, you can add your Strength modifier on saving throws against effects that would cause you to become entangled, staggered, or paralyzed.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，作为快速行动，你可以集中自身力量。你在近战攻击投掷、依赖力量的战斗动作检定、基于力量的技能和力量检定上获得相当于你的经文法师等级 1/2 的强化加成（最低 +1），持续 1 回合。
13 级时，作为一个敏捷动作，你可以忽略穿戴中型或重型盔甲造成的移动惩罚。该效果持续1分钟。在此期间，您可以在针对会导致您被缠住、踉跄或瘫痪的效果的豁免检定中加上您的力量修正值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can create a flash of sunlight in the eyes of one of your opponents. The target is blinded for 1 round. If it succeeds at a Reflex saving throw, it's instead dazzled for 1 round.
At 13th level, you can touch a weapon and grant it either the flaming or undead bane weapon special ability for 1 minute. If you spend two uses of your blessing when activating this ability, the weapon can have both weapon special abilities.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，你可以在一名对手的眼中制造一道阳光闪光。目标会失明 1 回合。
13级时，你可以触摸一把武器，并赋予它火焰或亡灵破敌武器的特殊能力，持续1分钟。如果你在激活此能力时使用了两次祝福，该武器可以同时拥有两种武器特殊能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, as a swift action you gain increased mobility. For 1 round, you ignore all difficult terrain (including magical terrain) and take no penalties for moving through it.
At 13th level, you can teleport up to 20 feet as a move action. You must have line of sight to your destination. This teleportation doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1级时，作为一个敏捷动作，你获得了更强的灵巧。在一回合内，你可以无视所有困难的地形（包括魔法地形），在其中移动也不会受到惩罚。
13级时，你可以作为移动动作传送到最远20英尺的地方。你必须能看到目的地。这种瞬移不会引发借机攻击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, as a move action you can create an illusory double of yourself. This double functions as a single mirror image, and lasts for a number of rounds equal to your warpriest level, or until the illusory duplicate is dispelled or destroyed. You can have no more than one double at a time. The double created by this ability doesn't stack with the additional images from the mirror image spell. This ability doesn't stack with the additional damage from the mirror image spell.
At 13th level, as a swift action you can become invisible for 1 round (as greater invisibility).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，作为一个移动动作，你可以为自己创造一个虚幻的替身。这个替身就像一个镜像，持续的回合数等于你的战斗祭司等级，或者直到虚幻替身被驱散或摧毁。您一次只能拥有一个替身。此能力产生的替身不会与镜像法术产生的额外影像叠加。此能力不会与镜像法术的额外伤害叠加。
13级时，作为快速行动，你可以隐形1回合（如同大隐形术）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch an ally and grant them a tactical advantage for 1 minute. You can select one of the following bonuses to apply to your ally: +10 feet to their base speed, a +1 dodge bonus to AC, a +1 insight bonus on attack rolls, or a +1 luck bonus on saving throws. Only one bonus can be applied to a creature at a time.
At 13th level, you can touch an ally and grant them a thirst for battle. All of the ally's melee attacks are treated as if they had the vicious weapon special ability, but the additional damage dealt to the ally from that special ability is nonlethal. In addition, the ally receives a +4 insight bonus on attack rolls made to confirm critical hits. These benefits last for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，您可以接触一名盟友并给予他们战术优势，持续 1 分钟。你可以从以下奖励中选择一项应用于你的盟友：基础速度 +10 英尺、AC +1、攻击投掷上的洞察加值 +1、或豁免检定上的幸运加值 +1。一个生物一次只能获得一个奖励。
13 级时，你可以触摸一个盟友，并赋予他们对战斗的渴望。盟友的所有近战攻击都会被视作拥有邪恶武器特殊能力，但该特殊能力对盟友造成的额外伤害是非致命性的。此外，盟友在确认要害命中的攻击投掷上会获得 +4 的洞察加值。这些效果持续 1 分钟。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch an ally and grant it a tactical advantage for 1 minute. The ally gets one of the following bonuses: +10 feet to base speed, +1 dodge bonus to AC, +1 insight bonus on attack rolls, or a +1 luck bonus on saving throws. 
At 13th level, you can touch an ally and grant it a thirst for battle. All of the ally’s melee attacks are treated as if they had the vicious weapon special ability. In addition, the ally receives a +4 insight bonus on attack rolls made to confirm critical hits. These benefits last for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，您可以接触一名盟友，并在 1 分钟内给予其战术优势。盟友会获得以下奖励之一：基础速度+10英尺，敏捷+1，攻击投掷上的洞察加值+1，或幸运加值+1。
13级时，你可以触摸一个盟友并赋予它对战斗的渴望。盟友的所有近战攻击都会被视作拥有邪恶武器特殊能力。此外，盟友在确认关键一击的攻击投掷上会获得 +4 的洞察加值。这些效果持续 1 分钟。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch one weapon and enhance it with the power of water. For 1 minute, this weapon glows with a blue-white chill and deals an additional 1d4 points of cold damage with each strike.
At 13th level, you can touch any one ally and wreath it in freezing mist. He gains fire resistance equal to your warpriest level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1级时，你可以接触一件武器，并以水的力量强化它。在 1 分钟内，该武器会发出蓝白色的寒光，每次攻击会造成额外 1d4 点寒冷伤害。
13 级时，你可以触摸任意一名盟友，并将其包裹在冰雾之中。他将获得等同于你的战斗祭司等级的火焰抗性。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch one weapon and grant it a blessing of stormy weather. For 1 minute, this weapon glows with blue or yellow sparks and deals an additional 1d4 points of electricity damage with each hit.
At 13th level, you can create a barrier of fast winds around yourself for 1 minute. This gives enemy ranged attack a chance to miss equal to twice your warpriest level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1级时，你可以触摸一件武器，并赋予它暴风祝福。在 1 分钟内，该武器会闪耀蓝色或黄色火花，每次命中会造成额外 1d4 点电击伤害。
13 级时，你可以在自身周围制造一道急风屏障，持续 1 分钟。
13级时，您可以在自己周围制造一个快速风之屏障，持续1分钟，使敌人的远程攻击有相当于您的战斗祭司等级两倍的失误几率。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A Temple Champion does not have the ability to cast spells, instead being granted access to both the Clerical Domains and the Warpriest Blessings of her deitiy to defend her faith and it's faithful. At level 1 she must select both two Domains and a Blessing, gaining access to another Blessing at level 7.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 圣殿冠军没有施法的能力，而是被赋予了访问牧师领域和她的神灵的战争祭司祝福来捍卫她的信仰和它的忠诚的力量。在 1 级时，她必须同时选择两个领域和一个祝福，在 7 级时获得另一个祝福。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Domain Champion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 冠军领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The second Domain granted by Domain Champion.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 冠军领域赋予的第二领域。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Champions Second Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 冠军第二领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic companions bear a faint trace of dragon blood that grants them special abilities.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙化伙伴有着微弱的龙族血统带来的印迹，这也给它们带来了别样能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙化

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The drake gains two natural claw attacks that deal 1d2 damage from a tiny drake, but increase damage dice size each time the drake grows
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽获得两次天生爪击攻击，体型时造成 1d2 伤害，但每次龙兽成长都会提升伤害骰子

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Body
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙体

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The drake gains two natural Wing attacks that increase damage dice size each time the drake grows, it also gains the Multiattack Feat
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙获得两次翼击，每次龙成长都会提升伤害骰，它还会获得多重攻击专长

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 9th level, a draconic companion gains a breath weapon, usable once per day, that deals 1d6 points of damage per Hit Dice of the energy type matching its draconic resistance in either a 30-foot cone or a 60-foot line (chosen when the draconic companion gains this ability). At 15th level, it can use the breath weapon three times per day, but it must wait 1d4 rounds between uses. Targets of this breath weapon can attempt a Reflex save (DC = 10 + half the draconic companion’s Hit Dice + the draconic companion’s Constitution modifier) for half damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 9级起，龙化伙伴获得1天1次的喷吐武器攻击，造成每HD 1d6点的它所选的能量类型的伤害，范围为30尺扇形或60尺线型(在它获得该能力时选择)。15级时,它能使用喷吐武器攻击的次数上升至每天3次，但两次喷吐武器攻击间必须间隔1d4轮。被喷吐武器攻击的目标可以通过一个DC = （10 + 1/2HD + 体质调整值）的反射检定使得伤害减半。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Breath Weapon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 喷吐武器

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Breath Extra Use
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 喷吐额外使用次数
