LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：奇迹女王 
阵营：中立善良 
关注领域：生育、魔法、母性、重生 
领域：魅惑，团队，善良，治愈、魔法 
次领域：魔法、母性、重生魅惑，团队，善良，治愈、魔法 
子域：Agathion、奥术、神圣、家庭、爱、复活 
最喜爱的武器：四分杖 
神圣象征：伊希斯之结 
神圣的动物：风筝 
当赛特杀死他的兄弟奥西里斯时，他们的妹妹伊希斯找到了奥西里斯的尸体，并用她的魔法与死去的丈夫怀上了儿子荷鲁斯。愤怒的赛特随后肢解了奥西里斯的尸体，并将遗体撒了一地，但伊希斯收集了丈夫的所有遗体碎片，并用魔法复活了奥西里斯。在传说时代，伊希斯作为王后与奥西里斯并肩作战，她和奥西里斯一样是生育女神和自然女神，被视为理想的母亲和妻子。她是重生和复活女神，也是盛放死者肝脏的罐子的保护神。她也是魔法之神，既神秘又神圣。伊希斯是一位美丽的人类女性，双臂生翼，头戴宝座状的王冠。她是奥西里斯忠诚的妻子和伙伴，对儿子荷鲁斯保护有加。伊希斯与她的妹妹奈芙提斯（Nephthys）关系密切，但却是她哥哥赛特（Set）的死敌。伊希斯是巫师、魔法师和女巫崇拜的魔法守护神，同时也是母亲、妻子和德鲁伊崇拜的生育女神。她的绝大多数神职人员都是女性，但男性和女性都可以加入她的神秘崇拜，学习她神秘而神圣的仪式。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Isis
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 伊西斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Wind-Walker   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Cannibalism, Cold, The Wind   
Rank: Great Old One   
Domains: Air, Chaos, Evil, Weather   
Subdomains: Cloud, Ice, Storms, Wind   
Favoured Weapon: Handaxe   
Holy Symbol: Antlered wooden humanoid effigy  
The frozen lands at all the worlds’ northern poles are the domains of Ithaqua, the Wind-Walker. He is capable of striding the gulfs between planets on icy winds to visit any world that might catch his interest, yet his explorations and influence over the worlds he treads upon seem to be curiously limited in scope to those regions above each world’s arctic circle. He can, for short periods of time, venture south, but never for long, and his touch is unknown in the southern reaches of these worlds. Yet in his realm, he is greatly feared, for cannibalism and the monstrous creatures known as wendigos are rampant in the times before and after his visits. Ithaqua often takes a personal interest in certain souls, be they worshipers or unbelievers. He takes these folk into the skies and may even bring them to other worlds, yet his purpose in these abductions is unclear, for those who walk with Ithaqua always meet the same fate—a devastating fall from a great height resulting in either death in some frozen wilderness or transformation into a wendigo and the loss of all memories of a previous life. Ithaqua is known by many names in icy regions. He appears humanoid in form, yet his limbs are long and gaunt, and his feet are often concealed in gusts and blasts of blizzard winds. When he visits, despite these winds that surround him, he leaves monstrous tracks in the snow that show webbing between the toes. Those who gaze upon the Wind-Walker often don’t remember his shape at all, only the two points of light—so like strange sparkling stars in the night sky—that are in fact his eyes. 
Note that while Ithaqua does not grant the domain of Water, his followers can take the subdomain of Ice.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：风行者
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：食人，寒冷与风
等级：旧日支配者
领域：气、混乱、邪恶、天气
子领域：云、冰、风暴、风
偏好武器：手斧
圣徽：木质鹿角仿人雕像
所有世界的极北冰原皆为风行者伊塔库亚之领地。祂携带极寒之风穿梭于行星之间，造访任何可能勾起祂兴趣的世界，然而祂对踏足世界的探索和影响被奇异地限制在每个世界的北极圈地区以内。祂可冒险南下一小段时间但绝不会长久，亦不会触碰这些世界的南部地区。
然而在祂在自己的国度中极度可怕，食人癖（cannibalism）与被称为温迪戈雪魔（Windego）的怪物会在祂到访前后的时期中泛滥肆虐。伊塔库亚时常对某个灵魂产生兴趣而不在乎其是否是祂的信徒。祂会将其带往天空乃至其他世界，但祂的绑架意图为何还无人知晓，而那些与伊塔库亚同行者总会遭受相同命运——从冰封原野的高空被抛下而在毁灭性的坠落中死亡，亦或变为温迪戈雪魔而失去前世的所有记忆。
伊塔库亚在冰盖区有着许多名字。祂近似人形，但四肢修长而枯槁，脚常隐藏在狂风暴雪之中。尽管有着风暴环绕，但祂的到访总会在雪中留下趾间生蹼的恐怖足迹。凝视风行者往往会发现根本记不得祂的容貌，只能记住两个光点——宛如夜空中诡异闪烁的星辰——而那实际上正是祂的眼睛。
需要注意的是，虽然伊塔库亚不授予水领域，但祂的牧师仍可连接冰子域。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ithaqua
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 伊塔库亚

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Fearless Claw   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Cowards, The Untested, Youths   
Domains: Glory, Good, Protection, Travel   
Subdomains: Agathion, Defense, Exploration, Purity   
Favoured Weapon: Short sword   
Holy Symbol: Winding path between two trees   
Sacred Animal: Black tiger   
Jaidz believes cowards can be turned to a life of bravery with compassion and firm guidance. He steps softly so as not to frighten those who need to hear his wisdom, and helps those he visits to find the strength within themselves. Jaidz appears as a giant black tiger with ghostly white spots. While in the mortal realm, he often takes the shape of a dark-skinned man with thick black hair streaked with white. His catlike golden eyes gleam in the shadows, and curved golden claws sprout from his hands. Even in his human form he boasts a long black tail tipped with white. The cowardly, the anxious, and the untested pay homage to Jaidz. Youths are especially drawn to Fearless Claw, hoping that when adulthood comes, it will find them brave enough to face the challenges of maturity. Jaidz teaches that the cowardly are not to be scorned, but to be helped,and his agents often provide tests of courage to those who underestimate their own potential.Jaidz dwells in a pavilion of black walnut with gold lattice walls and floor-length faille curtains of emerald green, magenta, and indigo. His pavilion stands on the topmost of three stone tiers cut into one of the Dragonmane Mountains on Nirvana.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：无畏之爪
阵营：中立善良 
神职：懦夫，未经试炼者，年轻人
领域：荣耀、善良、保护、旅行
子领域：盖森、防御、探索、纯净
偏好武器：短剑
圣徽：蜿蜒至两棵树之间的小路
圣兽：黑虎
杰兹是帮助怯懦者找到勇气的至高天神使。他脚步轻柔，以免吓到需要聆听他感知的人，并帮助他拜访的人找到自己的力量。
杰兹的形象是一只巨型的黑虎，身上带有幽灵般的白斑。在凡间，他经常化身为一个黑人，有着浓密的黑白相间的头发。金色的猫眼在阴影中闪烁，弯曲的金色爪子从他的手中长出。即使处在人形，他也拥有一条长长的黑色尾巴，末端是白色的。懦弱、焦虑和未经试炼者向杰兹致敬。
幼童尤其喜欢无畏之爪，希望成年后，他们会勇敢地面对成熟的挑战。 杰兹教导说，胆小者不应该被鄙视，而是应该得到帮助，他的代理人经常为那些低估自己潜力的人提供勇气的考验。
杰兹住在极乐境龙鬃山脉三重巨石顶上一间黑胡桃木的楼阁，墙壁勾金，围绕着墨绿，紫红和靛青色绸缎的及地幕帘。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Fearless Claw   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Cowards, The Untested, Youths   
Domains: Glory, Good, Protection, Travel   
Subdomains: Agathion, Defense, Exploration, Purity   
Favoured Weapon: Short sword   
Holy Symbol: Winding path between two trees   
Sacred Animal: Black tiger   
Jaidz believes cowards can be turned to a life of bravery with compassion and firm guidance. He steps softly so as not to frighten those who need to hear his wisdom, and helps those he visits to find the strength within themselves. Jaidz appears as a giant black tiger with ghostly white spots. While in the mortal realm, he often takes the shape of a dark-skinned man with thick black hair streaked with white. His catlike golden eyes gleam in the shadows, and curved golden claws sprout from his hands. Even in his human form he boasts a long black tail tipped with white. The cowardly, the anxious, and the untested pay homage to Jaidz. Youths are especially drawn to Fearless Claw, hoping that when adulthood comes, it will find them brave enough to face the challenges of maturity. Jaidz teaches that the cowardly are not to be scorned, but to be helped, and his agents often provide tests of courage to those who underestimate their own potential. Jaidz dwells in a pavilion of black walnut with gold lattice walls and floor-length faille curtains of emerald green, magenta, and indigo. His pavilion stands on the topmost of three stone tiers cut into one of the Dragonmane Mountains on Nirvana.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：无畏之爪
阵营：中立善良 
神职：懦夫，未经试炼者，年轻人
领域：荣耀、善良、保护、旅行

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Rillsong   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Natural music, Rapids, Waterfalls   
Domains: Chaos, Good, Scalykind , Water   
Subdomains: Azata, Flotsam, Revelry, Rivers   
Favoured Weapon: Whip (Trident)   
Holy Symbol: Water from wood pipe   
Sacred Animal: Water lizard   
Jalaijatali is a free-spirited empyreal lord who sings with the voice of a rushing creek. Her presence can be felt in the rapids of a flowing river or beneath the misty cascade of a waterfall. Jalaijatali appears as a beautiful Mwangi woman with skin formed of tiny, iridescent scales. Her pointed ears peek through short black hair, and her body is garbed in a robe of living water that continually splashes and rushes over her form. At a moment's notice, the empyreal lord can pluck a stream of water from her robe to wield as a whip. Rillsong loves to teach mortals the beauty of natural music, from the patter of a summer rain to the sawing of katydids. While Jalaijatali much prefers making music to making war, she can be roused to anger by fiends and evil creatures that corrupt her waters, particularly river drakes or water oni. On Elysium, Jalaijatali lives in a pool fed by a waterfall that falls continually from the sky with no apparent source. Around the pool stands a gazebo of acacia wood and crystal, with raised wooden platforms covered in soft mats of greenery where guests can recline.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：溪流之歌
阵营：混乱善良 
神职：自然之音，湍流，瀑布
领域：混乱、善良、鳞类、流水
子领域：爱塔、漂浮、狂欢、河流
偏好武器：鞭子（三叉戟）
圣徽：从木管流下的水
圣兽：水蜥蜴
贾莱佳塔莉是一位自由奔放的至高天领主，她唱歌的声音像湍急的小溪。在流动的河流的激流中，或在薄雾缭绕的瀑布下，都能感觉到她的存在。
贾莱佳塔莉是一个美丽的芒吉女人，皮肤由微小的虹彩鳞片组成。她的尖耳朵从黑色的短发中探出头来，她的身体披着一件活水长袍，不断地在她的身体上飞溅和奔流。她可以从她的长袍中拔出一股水流，作为鞭子持有。溪流之歌喜欢向凡人传授自然音乐之美，从夏雨的淅淅沥沥到螽斯的锯切。虽然贾莱佳塔莉更喜欢创作音乐而不是发动战争，但她可能会被恶魔和邪恶生物激怒，这些生物会酸蚀她的水域，尤其是水亚龙和水恶鬼。
在极乐境，奔放之野有条从天上落下的无源瀑布，瀑布下面的水池就是贾莱佳塔莉的家。池旁有座相思树和水晶构成的露台，上面遍布芳草以供客人休憩。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Turning Sphere   
Alignment: Lawful Neutral   
Form: Primordial Inevitable   
Areas of Concern: The planes, Planetary orbits, Separation 
Domains: Earth, Knowledge, Law, Sun   
Favoured Weapon: Longspear   
Holy Symbol: Linked pair of ringed planets   
The conquest of nature and advent of cities is ultimately a late step in the rise of civilization. For millions of years before that, the planets on which they form must maintain predictable orbits and respect the laws of cosmic physics. Jerishall monitors the multiverse from their powerful observatory floating above Axis to ensure that its stars, solar systems, and even galaxies flow in an orderly fashion, not deviating beyond predictable models. Jerishall recognizes that asteroids, meteors, and other planets can crash into a species’ home world, yet they do not condone the utter destruction of such threats. Instead, Jerishall encourages the development of astronomy, astrophysics, and technology to redirect such missiles or allow large populations to escape their planet entirely. As a result, the Turning Sphere is an indirect patron of space travel, earning them the respect of spacefaring creatures such as witchwyrds and even elder things. Jerishall is especially wary of the ways in which the Outer Planes and Inner Planes interact, preferring each plane’s isolated physics to prevail rather than for an encroaching realm’s influence to alter the other’s orbits and processes. Jerishall’s faithful often frequent planar portals and breaches to ensure they do not unduly expand or impede upon other regions.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：旋转球体
阵营：守序中立
形态：原始不可避免
领域：位面，行星轨道，分离
领域：大地，知识，秩序，太阳
偏好武器：长矛
圣徽：连接的一对环形行星征服自然和城市的出现最终是文明兴起的后期。在此之前的数百万年里，它们形成的行星必须保持可预测的轨道并遵守宇宙物理定律。 Jerishall 从他们漂浮在 Axis 上方的强大天文台监控多元宇宙，以确保其恒星、太阳系甚至星系以有序的方式流动，不会偏离可预测的模型。杰里歇尔认识到小行星、流星和其他行星可能会撞击一个物种的家园，但他们并不容忍彻底摧毁这些威胁。相反，杰里歇尔鼓励天文学、天体物理学和技术的发展，以重定向此类导弹或让大量人口完全逃离他们的星球。因此，旋转球是太空旅行的间接守护神，为他们赢得了太空生物的尊重，例如巫师甚至是远古生物。 Jerishall 尤其警惕外层位面和内层位面相互作用的方式，宁愿每个位面的孤立物理占上风，而不是让一个侵占领域的影响来改变另一个位面的轨道和过程。杰里歇尔的信徒经常频繁出现位面传送门和突破口，以确保它们不会过度扩张或阻碍其他地区。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Jerishall
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 杰里歇尔

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Mistress of the Hungry Moon, Lord of Werewolves, Demon Lord of The Moon and Werewolves
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Desolation, The Moon, Werewolves
Domains: Animal, Chaos, Evil, Trickery
Subdomains: Deception, Demon, Fur, Moon
Favoured Weapon: Scimitar   
Holy Symbol: Full moon above moor   
Sacred Animal: Wolf   
In certain rural areas of the world, particularly in the region around Darkmoon Vale and the darkened woodlands of Lozeri in northern Ustalav, the barrier between human and wolf grows thin on nights of the full moon. Many religious texts point to the werewolf Jezelda as the first to spread lycanthropy among the mortals of the world, but strangely, neither she nor her faithful support that claim; instead they remain strangely silent upon her history, as if they shared a secret that the world is not yet meant to know. As the patron of werewolves, Jezelda is herself a shapechanger. She can appear as a beautiful and darkhaired Varisian woman, a feral and slavering wolf with huge fangs and yellow eyes, or her favored form—that of an emaciated amalgamation of these two embodiments, also bearing a pair of demonic horns. She despises non-werewolf lycanthropes, and charges her worshipers with seeking out such creatures as heretics worthy only for sacrifice. Goodaligned lycanthropes in particular raise Jezelda’s ire, and such a sacrifice almost always curries her favor. Jezelda’s realm on the Abyss is known as the Moonbog. This vast realm is large enough to contain a single glowing moon high above—the “stars” in the night sky are said to be the eyes of her favored wolf consorts looking down upon the realm below. Below, the Moonbog consists of vast stretches of moorland separated by winding wetlands of bogs and fens infested with all manner of monstrous denizens—the deeper and more remote of these bogs are often ruled by powerful hezrous or half-fiend froghemoths. Yet it is on the moors themselves where the true dangers of this realm can be found—for it is here that Jezelda and her favored consorts hunt under the wan light of the moon. These moors are populated by isolated communities of humanoids harvested from countless worlds. Jezelda enjoys moving from one village to the other, constantly hunting while her minions work furiously to abduct and repopulate the realm behind her so she need never be faced with an empty realm.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：饥饿月亮的女主人、狼人之王、月亮恶魔之王和狼人 
阵营：混乱邪恶 
关注领域：荒凉、月亮、狼人 
领域：动物、混乱、邪恶、诡计 
子领域：欺骗、恶魔、毛皮、月亮 
偏好武器：弯刀 
圣徽：荒野上空的满月 
圣兽：狼 
在世界的某些农村地区，特别是在暗月谷周围的地区和乌斯塔拉夫北部洛泽里的黑暗林地，人与狼之间的屏障在满月之夜。许多宗教文献都指出狼人耶泽尔达是第一个在世间凡人中传播狼人的人，但奇怪的是，她和她的忠实信徒都不支持这种说法；相反，他们对她的历史保持奇怪的沉默，就好像他们分享了一个世界还不应该知道的秘密。作为狼人的守护神，耶泽尔达本身就是一个变形者。她可以表现为一个美丽的黑发瓦里西亚女人，一个有着巨型的尖牙和黄色眼睛的野性而流口水的狼，或者她最喜欢的形式——这两个化身的消瘦结合，还长着一对恶魔角。她鄙视非狼人的兽化人，并指责她的崇拜者寻找像异教徒这样的生物，只值得献祭。善良阵营的兽化人尤其会引起耶泽尔达的愤怒，而这样的牺牲几乎总是能讨好她。 Jezelda 在深渊上的王国被称为 Moonbog。这广阔的天地足以容纳一轮皎洁的明月高高在上——夜空中的“星辰”据说是她宠爱的狼妃俯视下方天地的眼睛。下面，Moonbog 由广阔的沼泽地组成，沼泽地由沼泽和沼泽组成的蜿蜒湿地隔开，沼泽和沼泽中遍布着各种怪物——这些沼泽的更深处和更偏远的地方通常由强大的狂暴或半恶魔 froghemoths 统治。然而，正是在荒原上才能发现这个领域的真正危险所在——因为杰泽尔达和她最宠爱的配偶正是在这里在苍白的月光下狩猎。这些荒原上居住着来自无数世界的孤立的类人生物群落。 Jezelda 喜欢从一个村庄搬到另一个村庄，不断地狩猎，而她的爪牙则疯狂地绑架并重新填充她身后的领域，因此她永远不需要面对一个空旷的领域。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Jezelda
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 杰萨尔达

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Faceless Lord, Lord of Sloth, Demon Lord of Poison and Ooze   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Poison, Ooze, Sloth  
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Evil, Water   
Subdomains: Catastrophe, Demon, Flotsam, Rage   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy mace   
Holy Symbol: Melting red eye   
Sacred Animal: None   
Of the demon lords listed here, Jubilex is perhaps the one least concerned with maintaining a cult. His favored minions, the omoxes, do more to spread his cults than he does—in fact, it’s debatable whether Jubilex even realizes he has worshipers. Only among the drow is his faith particularly popular and pervasive. Certainly, those who worship him tend not to think of him as an entity to be venerated as much as a source of power. Yet despite the Faceless Lord’s lack of interest in his faithful, he certainly knows of the Material Plane and enjoys absorbing the bodies of unwilling mortals into his protoplasmic bulk. Jubilex appears as a shapeless green mass of ooze shot through with dark ribbons of tar and hundreds of glaring red eyes the size of a man’s head. His realm on the Abyss is called the Undersump, and consists of a tangled warren of sewer-like catacombs and tunnels that winds below dozens of other Abyssal realms—many creatures use the Undersump as a method of covertly moving from one such realm to the other, but they must take care to avoid Jubilex’s awareness when they do. Of course, Jubilex’s wanderings and attention to the regions of the Undersump are basically random, and certain parts of the realm are so rarely visited by the Faceless Lord that other strange and dangerous creatures have claimed them.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：无面者领主、懒惰领主、毒药和软泥怪领主 
阵营：混乱邪恶 
关注领域：毒药、软泥怪、懒惰 
领域：混乱、毁灭、邪恶、水 
子域：灾难、恶魔、漂浮、狂暴 
偏好武器：沉重的狼牙棒 
圣徽：融化的红眼 
圣兽：没有 
在这里列出的恶魔领主中，Jubilex 可能是最不关心维护邪教的人。他最喜欢的爪牙 omoxes 比他更能传播他的教派——事实上，Jubilex 是否意识到他有崇拜者是值得商榷的。只有在卓尔精灵中，他的信仰才特别受欢迎和普遍。当然，那些崇拜他的人往往不会将他视为一个值得崇敬的实体，而不是一种力量的来源。然而，尽管无面者领主对他的信徒缺乏兴趣，但他当然知道物质位面并且喜欢将不情愿的凡人的身体吸收到他的原生质体中。 Jubilex 看起来像一团无形的绿色软泥，上面有深色的焦油带和数百个人头大小的红眼睛。他在深渊上的领域被称为 Undersump，由一个由下水道般的地下墓穴和隧道组成的杂乱无章的沃伦组成，这些地下墓穴和隧道蜿蜒在数十个其他深渊领域的下方——许多生物使用 Undersump 作为从一个这样的领域秘密移动到另一个这样的领域的方法，但是当他们这样做时，他们必须小心避免 Jubilex 的意识。当然，Jubilex 的漫游和对 Undersump 地区的关注基本上是随机的，并且该领域的某些部分很少被无面之主访问，以至于其他奇怪和危险的生物已经占领了它们。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Jubilex
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 章怖涙恪斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Waiting Void   
Alignment: Lawful Neutral   
Form: Primordial Inevitable   
Areas of Concern: Emptiness, Entropy, Stillness   
Domains: Darkness, Destruction, Law, Void (Travel)   
Favoured Weapon: Warhammer   
Holy Symbol: Starry circle within an iron ring   
Although philosophers often confuse decay for the onslaught of entropy, the faithful of Kerkamoth understand that natural decay on both a visible and atomic level is key to a healthy multiverse. That which is empty has its own order and potential to form great things. Just as a toppling tree leaves space for new growth, so too does the deterioration and controlled demolition of civilization leave fallow realms just waiting to be filled by fresh innovation. For creation to continue, there must be regulated emptiness. Above all, these processes must be silently calculated, predictable, and systematic; the wanton destruction inflicted by the likes of daemons, demons, and proteans threatens the entire process.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：等待虚空
阵营：守序中立形态：原始不可避免
领域：空虚、熵、静止
领域：黑暗、毁灭、守序、虚空（旅行）
偏好武器：战锤
圣徽：铁环内的星环虽然哲学家经常将衰变与熵的冲击混淆，Kerkamoth 的忠实信徒明白，可见和原子层面的自然衰变是健康多元宇宙的关键。空性有其自身的秩序和形成伟大事物的潜力。就像一棵倒下的树为新的生长留下空间一样，文明的退化和有控制的破坏也让休耕的领域等待着新的创新来填补。创造要继续，必须有规范的空虚。最重要的是，这些过程必须经过默默计算、可预测和系统化；恶魔、恶魔和变形虫之类的肆意破坏威胁着整个过程。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Kerkamoth
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 克卡莫斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Hunter   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Hunting, Forestry, Running, The Moon   
Domains: Animal, Chaos, Good, Plant, Weather   
Subdomains: Azata, Feather, Fur, Growth, Moon, Seasons   
Favoured Weapon: Longbow   
Holy Symbol: Hawk with moon and sun   
Sacred Animal: Hawk   
This long-faced elven god rarely speaks unless coordinating the efforts of other beings in a hunt for a dangerous or especially prized creature. In holy art, he is shown barefoot, wearing form-fitting brown and forestgreen to prevent snags and excess noise. He is usually accompanied by his dog Meycho and his hawk Falling Star, though he keeps them for companionship rather than assistance, as he prefers to succeed or fail on his own skill. Ketephys is an occasional hunting partner of Erastil, but disapproves of his insistence upon marriage; in turn, Erastil attributes this to elven immaturity and capriciousness. Ketephys is an ally of Gozreh against threats to the natural world. He views Treerazer as his arch-enemy, and personally served as a commander during the conflict that pushed Treerazer to Tanglebriar, where he hides to this day. Ketephys also watches over Cyth-V'sug, Treerazer's former master, for any signs of an alliance between the two.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：猎人
阵营：混乱善良
神职：狩猎、林业、跑步、月亮
领域：动物、混沌、善良、植物、天气
子领域：爱塔、羽毛、毛皮、生长、月亮、季节
偏好武器：长弓
圣徽：鹰与月亮和太阳
圣兽：鹰
这个长脸的精灵神沉默寡言，除非是在狩猎危险或者有价值的生物并努力和别人协作时。
在绘像中，他赤着脚，穿着合身的棕色和森林绿色，避免妨碍行动和发出噪音的的衣服。他通常由他的狗梅乔和鹰坠星陪伴，尽管他只是让他们陪伴而不是帮助自己，因为他更喜欢靠自己的技艺来一决胜负。
偶尔克忒菲斯和艾若斯提的结伴狩猎，但是一直反对他赞成婚姻的态度；艾若斯提反过来将此归因于精灵的不成熟和反复无常。克忒菲斯将戈兹雷视为一同对抗自然界威胁的盟友。他将毁木者视为他的头号敌人，并在和躲藏在扭曲棘林毁木者的冲突中亲自担任指挥官。克忒菲斯还监视着毁木者的前主人西斯瓦萨格，随时观察两人是否有任何结盟的迹象。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Humble Hand   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Freedom, The Rising Sun, Work   
Domains: Artifice, Good, Liberation, Sun, Trickery   
Subdomains: Agathion, Day, Deception, Freedom, Revolution, Toil   
Favoured Weapon: Sling (Slingstaff)   
Holy Symbol: Blue Scarab   
Sacred Animal: Scarab Beetle   
Perhaps the most popular of the old gods among the common folk of Osirion is Khepri, who takes the form of a scarab or dung beetle. Khepri is the god of the rising sun in the eastern horizon, and the scarab rolling a ball of dung across the ground is seen as a symbol of Khepri pushing the sun across the sky. As the sun rises in the morning, so do the peasants who work all day with little reward, and Khepri is their divine embodiment, promising freedom from toil and reward for their labor in the afterlife. He is also a mischievous prankster, breaking up the tedium of the long days with his antics and poking fun at those who consider themselves the commoners' betters. Khepri is typically represented as a scarab beetle, or as a man with a scarab beetle for a head. As a solar deity, Khepri works closely with Ra and Horus, is friendly with Hathor, and is opposed to Apep and Set and their evil machinations. As a trickster, Khepri is close friends with Bes, and he relishes the distaste that his strange appearance, his pungent aroma, and all that he represents elicit in more refined and civilized gods such as Bastet, Maat, and Thoth. Khepri seldom has dedicated temples, but as the patron of peasants, his priests can be found anywhere the common folk labor. Temporary shrines to the scarab god often spring up next to fields or at building sites, where workers make small offerings of a bite of their food or a sip of their beer, and ask Khepri to grant them an easy and productive day of work.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：谦卑之手
阵营：中立善良 
神职：自由、朝阳、工作
领域：工匠、善良、自由、太阳、诡术
子领域：盖森、白昼、欺骗、自由、革命、疲累
偏好武器：投石杖
圣徽：青色圣甲虫
圣兽：圣甲虫
在古代诸神之中，最受奥西里昂普罗大众爱载的莫过于以圣甲虫/粪金龟形象显现的凯布里了。凯布里是日出东方之神，而圣甲虫在地上滚屎球的动作被视为凯布里在推太阳天堂象征。凯布里是日出而作工作整天却赚不了几个钱的百姓的神圣化身，应许他们在死后能从疲累中解放并收获劳动应得的报酬。祂同时也喜好整人恶搞，用笑声打破漫长工作的沉闷，并捉弄那些自以为比平民了不起的人。
凯布里一般是被以圣甲虫的形象，或是以长着一整只圣甲虫当作头的男子的姿态描绘。作为一个太阳神，凯布里与拉及荷鲁斯密切合作，与哈索尔友善相处，也对抗阿佩普及赛特的邪恶阴谋。白烂的凯布里是贝斯的亲友，尤其喜欢欣赏其他那些诸如芭丝特、玛阿特与托特等更...斯文的神见识到贝斯的奇形怪状和诡异体味以及祂所象征的一切时的反应。
凯布里的神殿很少，但由于百姓之神的身分，有人劳动的地方就有祂的祭司。在构装体工地附近偶尔会立起临时的甲虫神祭坛，工人们会向凯布里献上杯酒片饼以祈求工事平稳迅速地进行。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Khepri
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 凯布里

LocalizedStrings.enGB: When you cast this spell, choose a single ally. You teleport to your ally’s space while your ally teleports to your former space.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 施法时，选择一名盟友。你传送到你盟友的空间，而你的盟友则传送到你之前的空间。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: King's Castle
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 国王城堡

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You are a scholar and a sage of legends. In addition, you treat all Knowledge and Lore skills as class skills. Void Form: You can become semi-tangible as a standard action. While in this form, you are immune to critical hits and gain a +1 deflection bonus to AC. This bonus increases by 1 at 8th level and every 4 levels thereafter. You can use this power a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Teaching Moment: At 8th level as a swift action you can grant all allies within 30 feet special insights. Once during the next minute, each affected creature can choose to roll twice and take the better result before attempting an attack roll, ability check, skill check, or saving throw. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and one additional time per day for every 4 levels in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你是位学者，一位传说中的圣贤。此外，你可将所有知识和学识{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}视为你的本职技能。
虚空形态：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你可进入半实体状态。进入此状态后，你将免疫{g|Encyclopedia:Critical}重击{/g}，且{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}防御等级{/g}获得+1偏斜{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。在8级时，此加值会增加1点，随后每4级再增加1点。每天可使用{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。
授业时刻：8级时，作为{g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}迅捷动作{/g}，你可赋予30英尺范围内所有盟友特殊的洞察加值。在下一分钟内，每个受影响生物在进行单次{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击检定{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}属性检定{/g}、技能{g|Encyclopedia:Check}检定{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}时，可选择投骰两次，并采用更高的{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}检定{/g}结果。在8级时，每天可使用一次此能力，8级后赋予你此领域的职业每升4级，可获得1次额外的使用次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are a scholar and a sage of legends. In addition, you treat all Knowledge and Lore skills as class skills. 
Void Form: You can become semi-tangible as a standard action. While in this form, you are immune to critical hits and gain a +1 deflection bonus to AC. This bonus increases by 1 at 8th level and every 4 levels thereafter. You can use this power a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. 
Teaching Moment: At 8th level as a swift action you can grant all allies within 30 feet special insights. Once during the next minute, each affected creature can choose to roll twice and take the better result before attempting an attack roll, ability check, skill check, or saving throw. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and one additional time per day for every 4 levels in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你是一位学者和传说中的圣人。此外，你将所有知识和传说技能视为类技能。
虚无形态：作为标准动作，你可以变成半实体。在这种形态下，你对要害攻击免疫，并获得 AC+1防御加成。该加成在第 8 级时增加 1，之后每 4 级增加 1。你每天可以使用此能力的回合数等于你获得此领域的等级。
教学时刻：8级时，作为一个迅速行动，你可以给予30英尺内的所有盟友特殊洞察加值。在接下来的一分钟内，每个受影响的生物可以选择掷两次骰，并在尝试攻击掷骰、属性检定、技能检定或豁免投掷之前取较好的结果。在 8 级时，您每天可以使用一次此能力，8 级之后，每 4 级您就可以多使用一次。

By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Knowledge: You gain a +6 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:

知识：你的智力获得+6增强加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Laughing God   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Abundance, Discovery, Happiness, Prosperity   
Domains: Chaos, Charm, Good, Luck, Travel   
Subdomains: Azata, Exploration, Fate, Love, Lust,  Trade   
Favoured Weapon: Quarterstaff   
Holy Symbol: String of seven coins   
Sacred Animal: Dog   
Kofusachi, the Laughing God, is the deity of happiness, prosperity, and abundance. His blessing is invoked when a child is born, at weddings, before business deals, and at the beginning of long journeys. He is depicted as a plump, bald man, always smiling, with bare, calloused feet, a walking stick in hand, and a dog at his heels. An incurable wanderer and inveterate libertine, Kofusachi has taken numerous gods and goddesses as lovers. Though his wanderlust always keeps such relationships from becoming too serious, Kofusachi is fast friends with Daikitsu, Desna, and Shelyn.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：笑面仙
阵营：混乱善良
神职：丰富、发现、幸福、繁荣
领域：混乱、魅惑，善良、幸运、旅行
子领域：爱塔、探索、天命、爱慕、情欲、交易
偏好武器：木棍
圣徽：七文钱串
圣兽：狗
笑面仙国府幸是福气、财富与丰足之神，当有喜事将至，比如生子、嫁娶，以及买卖和远行之前人们都会祈求他的祝福。国府幸的形象通常是一个秃顶而大腹便便，笑嘻嘻的老头，光着脚丫子，一手擎着一支拐杖，身边跟着一条忠犬。  国府幸是一个不可救药和放浪不羁的游荡者，男女通吃但是又总是在最后一刻撒手以免把事情闹大，他和大狐女，黛斯娜和莎琳的关系都很好。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Kofusachi
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 国府幸

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Open Hand of Harmony   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Foresight, Forgiveness, Peace   
Domains: Good, Healing, Magic, Protection   
Subdomains: Agathion, Defense, Divine, Restoration   
Favoured Weapon: Unarmed strikes   
Holy Symbol: Lotus above two figures    
Sacred Animal: Monkey   
Korada is neither young nor old, only present and wise. Sparse light brown fur covers his body, and his three monkey tails constantly writhe behind him like the flickering flames of a fire. He carries no weapons; when spurred to anger, the Open Hand of Harmony uses only his hands and millennia of martial training to defend himself, refusing to cause lethal harm to his attacker. Korada's holy symbol has several incarnations based on the viewer's region and the local ideals of enlightenment and peace, though the most common representation is that of two kneeling figures before a lotus. Many who are weary from a lifetime of imbalance or violence turn to Korada in search of peace. Retired soldiers, their hands stained with blood, lay down their weapons forever in the name of this empyreal lord. Likewise, diplomats in strange lands, individuals facing difficult moral choices, and champions of evil who long for absolution all find comfort in the teachings of the OpenHand of Harmony. While true repentance is necessary for evil to turn to good, Korada believes that no mortals are beyond redemption. Korada is said to possess the gift of foresight, but he rarely acts on these strange visions. He believes the struggle to change is always worthwhile, even if such a journey does not always end in success. It is the process, not the result, that matters most to Korada and his followers. When he is not teaching lessons of harmony to his devotees, Korada resides in Nirvana, in the heart of the Dream Lotus-an efflorescent palace whose blossoming violet walls always drip with cool, golden nectar that is said to calm even the wildest of spirits.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：和谐之掌
阵营：中立善良
神职： 预知，宽容，和平
领域：善良、医疗、魔法、保护 
子领域：盖森、防御、神圣、复原
偏好武器：徒手攻击
圣徽：盛开莲花前对面跪坐的两人
圣兽：猴
科拉达是和平，仁慈与谅解的勇士。虽然他对他至高天神使同僚们不倦的与邪恶抗争报以热爱与敬佩，科拉达相信善良最终的胜利来源于邪恶的救赎而不是毁灭。诚实，乐观而又聪颖，和谐之掌用人性与温暖散布感知，并自由的分享他无数年研究与冥想得来的秘密。科拉达专注于哲学与自省，使他获得了阅读世界无数丝线的能力，洞察它们无尽的联系，然后以难以置信的预知力去行动。既没有青年的天真也没有老人的消沉，科拉达是智能生命与兽性本能完美的结合，随遇而安。
虽然他有很多种形态，科拉达的真身是一个矫健修长的男人穿着简单的僧袍。他有着金色的络腮胡子，三根尾巴和一身细细的金色猴毛。
在极乐境，科拉达住在梦莲，一座静谧的宫殿城市。那里淡紫的墙壁总是滴下清凉的金色花蜜，据说能安抚最狂躁的灵魂。那里是避难与疗养的地方，其中禁止暴力；难以控制自己怒气的人会被送去其中的很多凝神圣池做冥想。
科拉达据说有着预知未来的能力，但他很少依据这些奇怪的幻景去行动。他相信为变革做出的努力总有其意义，即使结果未必能够成功。过程，而非结果对科拉达来说更为重要。
尽管他全身心的奉献于和平，科拉达的战技依然值得敬佩，而且他能行云流水般地运用所有拳法。可能就是他在历史的长河里，在无数世界上通过重重伪装把动物拟形拳传授给凡人——甚至可能是他恳求创世神赋予动物战斗的技巧与本能，使得凡人得以学习与模仿动物的战斗姿态。
科拉达在和平与武技方面的名声使他成为至高天神使中的外交官。巴洛领主，邪魔战将甚至是地狱公爵当和谐之掌独自来到他们的门庭，建议他们另寻他法时都会（暂时的）放下自己征服与战斗的美梦。这样的访问总是留下一路目瞪口呆的魔族，吃惊于他是如此轻易的击败了他们，绝大多数暗暗咽下怒气，计划下次他出现时要如何复仇。
虽然科拉达通常平静又温和，他也有欢欣的一面。有时他会如反复无常的猴子般骚扰他的对手。他将自己的战技与诡术的天赋合一，将危险的敌人从无辜者身边引走，或引诱到能轻易擒获他们的地方。
科拉达厌恶暴力，喜欢非致命伤害，活捉敌人他才能与对方交流。他快速的打发无心智的对手，不想将能量耗费在与没有灵魂或做不出道德判断的生物辩论上。如果能因此能避免更多暴力，他会向对方的首领发出单挑的挑战。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Open Hand of Harmony   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Foresight, Forgiveness, Peace   
Domains: Good, Healing, Magic, Protection   
Subdomains: Agathion, Defense, Divine, Restoration   
Favoured Weapon: Unarmed strikes   
Holy Symbol: Lotus above two figures    
Sacred Animal: Monkey   
Korada is neither young nor old, only present and wise. Sparse light brown fur covers his body, and his three monkey tails constantly writhe behind him like the flickering flames of a fire. He carries no weapons; when spurred to anger, the Open Hand of Harmony uses only his hands and millennia of martial training to defend himself, refusing to cause lethal harm to his attacker. Korada's holy symbol has several incarnations based on the viewer's region and the local ideals of enlightenment and peace, though the most common representation is that of two kneeling figures before a lotus. Many who are weary from a lifetime of imbalance or violence turn to Korada in search of peace. Retired soldiers, their hands stained with blood, lay down their weapons forever in the name of this empyreal lord. Likewise, diplomats in strange lands, individuals facing difficult moral choices, and champions of evil who long for absolution all find comfort in the teachings of the Open Hand of Harmony. While true repentance is necessary for evil to turn to good, Korada believes that no mortals are beyond redemption. Korada is said to possess the gift of foresight, but he rarely acts on these strange visions. He believes the struggle to change is always worthwhile, even if such a journey does not always end in success. It is the process, not the result, that matters most to Korada and his followers. When he is not teaching lessons of harmony to his devotees, Korada resides in Nirvana, in the heart of the Dream Lotus-an efflorescent palace whose blossoming violet walls always drip with cool, golden nectar that is said to calm even the wildest of spirits.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：张开的和谐之手 
结盟：中立善良 
关注领域：先见之明、宽恕、和平 
领域：善良，治愈、魔法、保护 
次领域：魔法、保护 <br善良，治愈、魔法、保护 
次领域：Agathion、防御、神性、修复 
最喜欢的武器：徒手攻击 
神圣的象征：两个数字上方的莲花 
圣兽：猴子猴 
科拉达既不年轻也不年老，只有存在和感知。他身上覆盖着稀疏的浅棕色皮毛，三条猴尾不断地在他身后摆动，就像火堆里闪烁的火焰。他不携带武器；当被激怒时，"和谐之手 "只会用双手和千年的武术训练来保护自己，拒绝对攻击者造成致命伤害。科拉达的神圣象征有多种化身，取决于观赏者所在的地区以及当地的启蒙与和平理想，但最常见的表现形式是莲花前的两个跪姿。许多人因一生的不平衡或暴力而疲惫不堪，他们来到科拉达寻求和平。退役士兵双手沾满鲜血，他们以这位帝王之名永远放下武器。同样，身处异国他乡的外交官、面临艰难道德抉择的个人，以及渴望赦免的邪恶拥护者，都能在 "和谐之手 "的教诲中找到慰藉。虽然真正的忏悔是邪恶向善的必要条件，但科拉达相信没有凡人是无法得到救赎的。据说科拉达拥有预知的天赋，但他很少将这些奇异的幻象付诸行动。他认为，改变的斗争总是值得的，即使这样的旅程并不总是以成功告终。对 Korada 和他的追随者来说，最重要的是过程，而不是结果。不向信徒传授和谐之道时，科拉达就居住在梦莲花的中心--涅槃宫殿，这座宫殿的紫罗兰色墙壁上总是滴着清凉的金色甘露，据说这种甘露能让最狂野的灵魂平静下来。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Korada
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 科拉达

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Strong Man   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Bravery, Competition, Sport   
Domains: Community, Good, Luck, Strength, Travel   
Subdomains: Agathion, Competition, Family, Fate, Home, Resolve, Trade   
Favoured Weapon: Javelin   
Holy Symbol: Flexing arm with chain   
Sacred Animal: Horse   
Kurgess, the Strong Man, was once a mortal of peerless physical prowess. As legends of his sporting victories and his noble death spread across the Inner Sea region—and even other planes—athletes began looking to Kurgess as a role model, and competitions were often dedicated to him as the embodiment of honor and athleticism. Shortly thereafter, Cayden Cailean and Desna raised Kurgess to godhood, crowning him with deific powers. Why they did this remains up for debate, but more than a few scholars whisper that Kurgess might actually be the two deities’ half-mortal son. He stands as patron of and inspiration for all who engage in physical challenges.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：强者
阵营：中立善良
神职：勇敢、竞争、运动
领域：联盟、善良、幸运、力量、旅行
子领域：盖森、运动、家族、天命、家园、决意、交易
偏好武器：标枪
圣徽：攥着黄金锁链的强壮手臂
圣兽：马
库尔吉斯，曾经只是来自于塔尔多的一个农场男孩，从童年时期就展现出了超人的力量的库尔吉斯最终因为他在赛场上无私的牺牲而登神。被称为“强者”的库尔吉斯既是一个冠军，也是对于那些追求运动成就和全力以赴参与竞争之人的光辉榜样，无论他们最终是否胜出。
无论是库尔吉斯的牧师还是普通的信徒，信仰库尔吉斯的人都相信强健的身体和刚强的心灵是通往涅槃之门的双重支柱，而且大多数信徒都为了实现这些理念而不懈地锻炼。库尔吉斯的信徒陶醉于自身的强壮，也热衷于展示这份强壮，但与其说这是炫耀，不如说他们渴望于激励他人开发自身的潜能。固然库尔吉斯的教义更强调身体的强健，但发誓和其他施法者也偶尔能从强者的范例中得到启迪，用那些传统的信徒进行体能锻炼时同样的热情去钻研魔法。一些施法者相信，保持良好的身体状态有助于帮助大脑保持敏锐。他们主动地寻求肉体的锻炼，将其视为发展精神的敏锐力和耐力的一部分。无论他们采取什么方法进行锻炼，库尔吉斯的信徒通常都是欢快且相互鼓励的。即使在面对他们的宿敌时也是如此。而他们的伙伴也常常不禁被他们的热情所鼓舞。
虽然库尔吉斯的信徒自愿在战斗中展示他们的力量，尤其是在保护他人，或者捍卫自己的理想的情况下，但致命的战斗，乃至他们最可怕的敌人的死亡对强者的信徒而言都毫无乐趣可言。总体而言，库尔吉斯的信徒是一个轻松的群体，他们更偏爱训练，比赛和气氛友好的竞争，而不是战争与流血冲突。不过，再有需要的时候，人们也能在前线战场发现库尔吉斯信徒的身影，并且那些英雄主义的组织，例如终焉之墙骑士团，就经常在队伍中吸纳库尔吉斯的信徒作为成员。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Kurgess
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 库尔吉斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Widow of Suffering   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Earthquakes, Fire, Plague, Suffering   
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Evil, Fire, Plant   
Subdomains: Ash, Catastrophe, Decay, Demon, Rage, Smoke   
Favoured Weapon: Warhammer   
Holy Symbol: Flaming rift in the earth   
Sacred Animal: Crow   
Lady Nanbyo is the goddess of plague, fire, earthquakes, and other calamities. Even tsunamis and volcanic eruptions (usually the work of Hei Feng and Yamatsumi, respectively) are typically blamed on Lady Nanbyo, for she eagerly adds her own torments to such catastrophes and delights in the pain and suffering that follow in their wake. At the same time, however, people pray to Lady Nanbyo to spare them during such times of upheaval. Called the Widow of Suffering, Lady Nanbyo has been married many times, but all of her husbands have met terrible and tragic ends. While Lady Nanbyo can appear as a seductive woman when she wishes, her true form is said to be that of a ravenous, firebreathing dragon with a dozen legs.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：苦难寡妇 
阵营：混乱邪恶 
神职：地震、火、瘟疫、苦难
领域：混乱、毁灭、邪恶、烈火、植物 
子领域：灰烬、天灾、腐朽、邪魔、狂暴、烟幕
偏好武器：战锤
圣徽：大地上燃烧的裂谷
圣兽：乌鸦
病难母是瘟疫.火焰,地震和其他灾害的代表女神,大多数时候，那些不归病难母掌管的灾祸（比如黑风搅起的海啸和山积制造的火山爆发）也会被归罪到她的头上，虽然她只是乐意于在它们袭来以后再用自己偏爱的方式推波助澜一把，然后满意的看着那些饱经磨难的凡人对自己烧香膜拜以求免祸。病难母以苦寡妇的名号为人们所熟知，传说她曾经下嫁多次，但是每个和她成亲的男人都落得个被克死的下场。大多数时候，病难母会以美艳的少妇形象出现，不过据说她的本相则是一条暴虐无比，吞吐烈焰的多爪帝龙。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lady Nanbyo
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 病难母

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: He of Motley Repose   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Rainbows, Relaxation, Shade   
Domains: Chaos, Good, Luck, Sun   
Subdomains: Azata, Fate, Light, Whimsy   
Favoured Weapon: Sling (Slingstaff)   
Holy Symbol: Rainbow with shadow   
Sacred Animal: Lacewing   
Lalaci sees the beauty in conflict. The sun wars with the rain and creates a rainbow, and He of Motley Repose believes that everyone's inner nature should be a similar mix of action and restraint, placid adoration and righteous scorn. He offers rest and relaxation to those who meet each day with excitement and vigor and who may be tired from the chaotic beauty that is their life. To mortal eyes, Lalaci appears to be fair-skinned with white-blonde hair and yellow-white eyes. He tucks the two prismatic wings that curve from his shoulders down so that he appears to wear a beautiful multicolored cloak, though among his own kind he walks in his true naked form, with crystalline flesh that refracts light as golden rays. He of Motley Repose provides rest to the hardworking and shade to those exhausted from the sun. Glassblowers and illusionists often find creative inspiration in Lalaci's rainbows; particularly gifted glass artists and lightweavers who lead worthy lives sometimes find small prisms at their workstations-tokens of Lalaci's favor. His devotees claim that the reflections of rainbows in natural bodies of water create portals to his celestial domain: an enormous, warped gla s s palace that floats on a cloud across the surface of Elysium.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：七彩长眠者
阵营：混乱善良 
神职：彩虹、休闲、阴影 
领域：混乱、善良、幸运、太阳
子领域：爱塔、天命、光明、滑稽
偏好武器：吊索（投石杖） 
圣徽：带阴影的彩虹
圣兽：草蜻蛉
拉剌奇看到了冲突中的美。太阳与雨交相辉映，创造出彩虹，七彩长眠者认为，每个人的内在本性都应该是类似的混合行动和克制，平静的崇拜和正义的蔑视。他为那些每天都充满兴奋和活力的人提供休息和放松，他们可能会因生活中混乱的美丽而感到疲倦。
在凡人眼中，拉剌奇似乎皮肤白皙，有着白金色的头发和黄白色的眼睛。他把从肩膀上弯曲的两个棱柱形翅膀掖好，这样他看起来就穿着一件漂亮的彩色斗篷，尽管在他自己的同类中，他以真正赤裸的形式行走，水晶般的肉体折射出金色的光芒。
七彩长眠者为辛勤工作的人提供休息，为那些因太阳而疲劳的人提供阴凉。吹玻璃工和魔术师经常在拉剌奇的彩虹中找到创意灵感；特别有天赋的玻璃艺术家和过着有价值生活的织光师有时会在他们的工作站上找到小棱镜——这是拉剌奇青睐的象征。他的信徒声称，自然水体中彩虹的反射创造了通往他的天界的门户：奔放之野云端一座巨型扭曲的玻璃城堡，漂浮在极乐境表面的云层上。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Slavelord   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Slavery, Subjugation, Tyranny   
Domains: Chaos, Evil, Nobility, Strength   
Subdomains: Demon, Resolve, Slavery, Tyranny   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy flail   
Holy Symbol: Sabre-tooth tiger skull   
Sacred Animal: Sabre-toothed tiger   
Lanishra is the orc god of rulership. He assures orcs of their inherent superiority over all other humanoids, and over most other creatures as well. The Slavelord does not believe in peers, teaching that in all relationships one party is superior to the other. An orc must know his place in the pecking order, but he must never be satisfied unless he’s at the top. For a follower of Lanishra, it’s better to be feared than loved, for only those who can dominate others deserve to lead. Lanishra is depicted as an orc chieftain, richly attired (for an orc), but armed for a fight. His favored weapon is the war flail—a mockery of the farmer’s tool, unsuitable for threshing grain but ideal for flaying those who disobey him or deign to think themselves his better. Lanishra teaches that a warrior’s job is to excel at warfare and that manual labor is beneath him. The reward for a warrior’s work is the free acquisition of the goods produced by those he conquers—both from their past labors and those carried out under his whip. Lanishra’s philosophy is most at odds with those of Nulgreth and Zagresh, who would rather kill than enslave. Yet his fiercest rival is Verex, whose desire for slaves equals the Slavelord’s; despite their shared goal, the two rarely get along. Tribes dedicated to Lanishra are heavily involved in the slave trade, though even tribes devoted to other gods may have priests of the Slavelord to oversee their chattel. Many orc chieftains promote the worship of Lanishra, as his teachings legitimize their rule and supremacy.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：奴隶主
阵营：混乱中立
神职：奴隶制、征服、暴政
领域：混乱、邪恶、崇高、力量
子领域：恶魔、决意、奴隶、专制
偏好武器：重型连枷
圣徽：剑齿虎头骨
圣兽：剑齿虎
拉尼什拉是兽人的统治之神。他向兽人保证，他们比所有其他类人生物，以及大多数其他生物，都有与生俱来的优越性。奴隶领主不相信平等关系，认为在所有关系中一方都比另一方优越。一个兽人必须清楚自己在等级秩序中的位置，但除非他处于顶端，否则他永远不会满足。对于拉尼什拉的追随者来说，被人畏惧比被人爱戴更好，因为只有那些能够支配他人的人才值得作为领袖。
拉尼什拉被描绘成一个兽人酋长，衣着华丽（对于兽人来说），但全副武装时刻准备着战斗。他最偏好武器是连枷——这是对农民工具的嘲弄，不适合打谷，但非常适合从那些不服从他或自以为是比他强的人那剥皮。
拉尼什拉教导说，战士的工作是在战争中出类拔萃，体力劳动是不适合他的。战士工作的回报是免费获得他征服的人所生产的货物——包括他们过去的劳动和在他的鞭子下进行的那些。
拉尼什拉的哲学与宁可杀戮也不愿奴役的努尔格雷斯和萨格勒什的哲学最不一致。然而，他最凶猛的对手是威雷克斯，他对奴隶的渴望与奴隶主不相上下。尽管他们有共同的目标，但两人很少相处。信仰拉尼什拉的部落大量参与奴隶贸易，即使是信奉其他神灵的部落也可能有奴隶主的祭司来监督他们的动产。
许多兽人酋长提倡对拉尼什拉的崇拜，因为他的教义使他们的统治和霸权守序化。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lanishra
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 拉尼什拉

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Old Rat Woman   
Alignment: Neutral Evil   
Areas of Concern: Night, Rats, Thieves   
Edict: Work quietly toward your goals in the shadows, steal what you need, keep an ear among the ignored and downtrodden   
Domains: Animal, Darkness, Evil, Luck, Trickery   
Subdomains: Curse, Daemon, Fur, Loss, Night, Thievery   
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Emaciated Rat   
Sacred Animal: Rat   
Lao Shu Po, or Old Rat Woman, was not always a goddess. Once, long ago, she was simply a rat, skulking in the shadows. When Fumeiyoshi killed his brother Tsukiyo, Lao Shu Po crept into the moon god’s grave to feed on Tsukiyo’s corpse. She absorbed some of Tsukiyo’s divine power, such that when Tsukiyo was returned to life and Fumeiyoshi was banished from heaven, she was able to steal the portfolio of night from Fumeiyoshi, becoming the goddess of night, thieves, and rats. Lao Shu Po is the patron of thieves and of many wayangs, who pray to her to hide their activities in the dark of night. Lao Shu Po appears as an old hag or as an immense, six-legged rat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：老鼠夫人
阵营：中立邪恶 
神职：夜晚、老鼠、盗贼
信条：在阴影中安静地朝着你的目标努力，偷走你需要的东西，留意被忽视和受压迫的
领域：动物、黑暗、邪恶、幸运、诡计
子领域：破敌、邪魔、毛兽、失却、暗夜、盗窃 
偏好武器：匕首 
圣徽：瘦弱的老鼠
圣兽：老鼠
老鼠婆，或者也被称为鼠夫人，是一个相对年轻的神祗。很久以前，老鼠婆不过是一条在阴影中窜来窜去的大老鼠，当文业犯下弑兄罪行以后，它偷偷刨开了死去月神的坟墓，嚼食了一部分月夜的尸身。也正是因此，老鼠婆窃取了一部分月夜的神力，并在月夜复活，文业被贬下天界之后又偷来了文业以前的夜神之职，得以登上暗夜，鼠类和盗窃之神的位置。老鼠婆是盗贼和一部分剪影人的守护神，用黑暗的夜色遮蔽她信徒的踪迹。老鼠婆通常化身为一个老鬼婆或者一头巨型的，六只脚爪的老鼠。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lao Shu Po
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 老鼠婆

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Law: You are immune to confusion effects, gain a +4 bonus on saving throws against transmutation spells, and weapons you wield count as lawful for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
秩序：你免疫困惑，在对抗变形法术的豁免检定上获得 +4 加值，并且你使用的武器在穿透伤害减免时被视为守序武器。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 10th level, add create undead to your list of 5th-level oracle spells known.
At 15th level, you are immune to death effects.
At 5th level, add command undead to your list of 2nd-level oracle spells known.
Lich

Every living spellcaster hides a secret in their flesh—a unique, personalized set of conditions that, when all are fulfilled in the correct order, can trigger the transformation into a lich. Normally, one must expend years and tens of thousands of gold pieces to research this deeply personalized method of attaining immortality. Yet, in a rare few cases, chance and ill fortune can conspire against an unsuspecting spellcaster. 
You have yet to turn into an undead creature, but you are close. You take damage from positive energy and heal from negative energy as if you were undead.
At 5th level, add command undead to your list of 2nd-level oracle spells known. 
At 10th level, add create undead to your list of 5th-level oracle spells known. 
At 15th level, you are immune to death effects.

Leader of a small cult of undead, created by h own hands,  became famous as the indomitable commander of the Fifth Mendevian Crusade against the Worldwound. Determined to destroy the forces of the Abyss at any cost, he ventured on the path of the L of Death. For millennia, powerful necromancers have dreamed of a power that could rival the divine. They have created cults in their own names, and attracted many followers. Thanks to h legendary powers,  has managed to achieve much greater success than the others: he has acquired a talent to bestow divine spells upon h followers. From that moment, the undead created by h needed no other deities to cast spells.
Domains: Death, Evil, Strength, War. 
Favoured Weapons: Scythe, Sickle.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
{name}是蒙蒂维对抗世界之伤的第五次圣战指挥官，领导着由{mf|他|她}亲手建立的一支小型死灵教团。在下定决心要不惜一切代价消灭深渊的势力后，{mf|他|她}铤而走险，成为了一名死亡{mf|领主|女士}。千百年来，强大的死灵法师们一直梦想着拥有能与神灵相媲美的力量。他们以自己的名义建立了教派，并吸引了许多追随者。凭借{mf|他|她}的传奇力量，{name}比其他人取得了更进一步的成功：{mf|他|她}获得了一种天赋，可以赐予{mf|他|她}的追随者施展神术的能力。从此，{mf|他|她}创造的不死生物在施法时不必再依靠其他神祇。
领域：死亡，邪恶，力量，战争。
偏好武器：巨镰、镰刀。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Leader of a small cult of undead, created by their own hands, becoming famous as the indomitable commander of the Fifth Mendevian Crusade against the Worldwound. Determined to destroy the forces of the Abyss at any cost, they ventured on the path of the Lord of Death. For millennia, powerful necromancers have dreamed of a power that could rival the divine. They have created cults in their own names, and attracted many followers. Thanks to their legendary powers, they has managed to achieve much greater success than the others: acquireing a talent to bestow divine spells upon their followers. From that moment, the undead created by them needed no other deities to cast spells.
Domains: Death, Evil, Strength, War. 
Favoured Weapons: Scythe, Sickle.

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You herald the roar of thunder and crash of lightning. 
Lightning Arc: As a standard action, you can unleash an arc of electricity targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged touch attack. This arc of electricity deals 1d6 points of electricity damage + 1 point for every two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. 
Lightning Rod: As a swift action designate one creature within line of sight, the next spell you cast with the electricity descriptor that hits this creature this round has it’s damage against that creature increased by 50%. This additional damage results from divine power that is not subject to being reduced by electricity resistance, and you take an equal amount of electricity damage immediately after you cast the spell. The spell can deal this additional damage only once, even if it could affect the target multiple times. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time per day for every 4 cleric levels you have beyond 8th.
Lightning Subdomain

A druid with this totem calls upon the proud lion, imposing and majestic, the mighty leader of deadly hunters.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 雄狮德鲁伊有着狮子的荣耀、雄伟的气势，他们是强壮的领导者和致命的猎手。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lion Totem Druid
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 雄狮德鲁伊

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 9th level and every 4 levels thereafter, a lion totem druid gains one of the following bonus feats: Dodge, Lunge, Improved Iron Will, Iron Will, or Skill Focus (Acrobatics). She must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在9级和之后的每4级，雄狮德鲁伊可以选择一个奖励专长，他的奖励专长必须从以下专长中选取：闪避、突刺、钢铁意志、精通钢铁意志、技能专攻（专长）。他必须要达到条件才能选取这些奖励专长。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lion Totem Druid Bonus Feat
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 雄狮德鲁伊奖励专长

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Unlike normal animals of its kind, an animal companion's Hit Dice, abilities, skills, and feats advance as the druid advances in level. If a character receives an animal companion from more than one source, her effective druid levels stack for the purposes of determining the statistics and abilities of the companion. Most animal companions increase in size when their druid reaches 4th or 7th level, depending on the companion.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 与同类的普通动物不同的是，动物伙伴的生命骰，属性，技能和专长都会随着德鲁伊等级的提升而增长。如果人物从多个来源获得了动物伙伴，将她的有效德鲁伊等级相互叠加以决定伙伴的数据和能力。根据伙伴种类的不同，大多数伙伴的体型会在德鲁伊达到4级或7级时增长。具体取决于伙伴类型。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lion Totem Animal Companion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 狮图腾动物伙伴

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A lion totem druid who chooses an animal companion must select a feline. If choosing a domain, the lion totem druid must choose from the Animal, Glory, Nobility, and Sun domains.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 雄狮德鲁伊动物伙伴只能选择狮子，如果他选择了领域能力，他必须从以下几个领域中挑选：动物、荣耀、崇高和太阳。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lion Totem Druids Bond
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 雄狮德鲁伊纽带

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 5th level, a lion totem druid may cast summon nature’s ally as a standard action when summoning felines, and summoned felines gain temporary hit points equal to their druid level. They can apply the young template to any feline to reduce the level of the summoning spell required by one. They can also increase the level of summoning required by one in order to apply either the advanced or the giant template, or increase it by two to apply both the advanced and giant templates.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 5级时，在召唤猫科动物的时候，雄狮德鲁伊可以用一个标准动作施放召唤自然盟友，被召唤出来的猫科动物得到相当于其德鲁伊等级的额外生命值。他们可以将幼年模板应用到任何猫科动物身上，以降低一只猫科动物所需的召唤法术等级。也可以将召唤等级增加1级以应用高等或巨型模板，将召唤等级增加2级可以同时应用高等和巨型模板。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A lion totem druid may cast summon nature’s ally as a standard action when summoning felines, and summoned felines gain temporary hit points equal to their druid level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 雄狮德鲁伊可以用一个标准动作施放召唤自然盟友，被召唤出来的猫科动物得到相当于其德鲁伊等级的额外生命值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
As a move action a lion totem druid may adopt an aspect of the lion while retaining her normal form. They gain one of the following bonuses: 
Movement (+20 enhancement bonus to speed, +4 racial bonus on Mobility checks)
Senses (Blind Fight feat, +4 on perception checks)
Natural Weapons (bite attack dealing 1d4 damage and two claws dealing 1d4 damage for a Medium druid, +2 to CMB)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
以一个移动动作，雄狮德鲁伊可以模拟猫科动物一部分的力量。他们获得以下加值之一：
速度：得到20尺陆地移动速度的增强加值，灵巧检定获得+4种族加值。
感官：盲斗专长，+4 感知检定。
爪牙：中体型的雄狮德鲁伊得到啮咬（1d4），2爪抓（1d4），CMB+2加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lion Totem Transformation - Move Action
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 狮图腾转化-移动动作

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
As a standard action a lion totem druid may adopt an aspect of the lion while retaining her normal form. They gain one of the following bonuses: 
Movement (+20 enhancement bonus to speed, +4 racial bonus on Mobility checks)
Senses (Blind Fight feat, +4 on perception checks)

爪牙：中体型的雄狮德鲁伊得到啮咬（1d4），2爪抓（1d4），CMB+2加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lion Totem Transformation
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 狮图腾转化

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
As a swift action a lion totem druid may adopt an aspect of the lion while retaining her normal form. They gain one of the following bonuses: 
Movement (+20 enhancement bonus to speed, +4 racial bonus on Mobility checks)
Senses (Blind Fight feat, +4 on perception checks)
Natural Weapons (bite attack dealing 1d4 damage and two claws dealing 1d4 damage for a Medium druid, +2 to CMB)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
以一个迅捷动作，雄狮德鲁伊可以模拟猫科动物一部分的力量。他们获得以下加值之一：
速度：得到20尺陆地移动速度的增强加值，灵巧检定获得+4种族加值。
感官：盲斗专长，+4 感知检定。
爪牙：中体型的雄狮德鲁伊得到啮咬（1d4），2爪抓（1d4），CMB+2加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lion Totem Transformation - Swift Action
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 狮图腾转化-迅捷动作

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 2nd level, a lion totem druid may adopt an aspect of the lion while retaining their normal form. They gain one of the following bonuses: 
Movement (+20 enhancement bonus to speed, +4 racial bonus on Mobility checks)
Senses (Blind Fight feat, +4 on perception checks)
Natural Weapons (bite attack dealing 1d4 damage and two claws dealing 1d4 damage for a Medium druid, +2 to CMB)
Using this ability is a standard action at 2nd level, a move action at 7th level, and a swift action at 12th level. This ability lasts one minute and can be used a number of times equal to their druid level. This is a polymorph effect and cannot be used while the druid is using another polymorph effect, such as wild shape.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
2级时，雄狮德鲁伊可以模拟猫科动物一部分的力量。他们获得以下加值之一：
速度：得到20尺陆地移动速度的增强加值，灵巧检定获得+4种族加值。
感官：盲斗专长，+4 感知检定。
爪牙：中体型的雄狮德鲁伊得到啮咬（1d4），2爪抓（1d4），CMB+2加值。使用此能力在 2 级是一个标准动作，在 7 级是一个移动动作，在 12 级是一个迅捷动作。这种能力持续一分钟，可以使用的次数等于他们的德鲁伊等级。这是一种变形效果，不能在德鲁伊使用另一种变形效果时使用，例如野性形态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 2nd level, a lion totem druid may adopt an aspect of the lion while retaining their normal form. They gain one of the following bonuses: 
Movement (+20 enhancement bonus to speed, +4 racial bonus on Mobility checks)
Senses (Blind Fight feat, +4 on perception checks)
Natural Weapons (bite attack dealing 1d4 damage and two claws dealing 1d4 damage for a Medium druid, +2 to CMB)
Using this ability is a standard action at 2nd level, a move action at 7th level, and a swift action at 12th level. This ability lasts one minute and can be used a number of times equal to their druid level. This is a polymorph effect and cannot be used while the druid is using another polymorph effect, such as wild shape.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
在第 2 级，雄狮德鲁伊可以模拟猫科动物一部分的力量。他们获得以下加值之一：
移动（+20 速度增强加值，+4 移动性检定种族加值）
感官（盲斗专长，+4 感知检定）
天生武器（啮咬攻击造成 1d4 伤害，两个爪子造成 1d4伤害,如果是中型德鲁伊，+2 CMB）使用此能力在 2 级是一个标准动作，在 7 级是一个移动动作，在 12 级是一个迅捷动作。这种能力持续一分钟，可以使用的次数等于他们的德鲁伊等级。这是一种变形效果，不能在德鲁伊使用另一种变形效果时使用，例如狂野变身。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lion Totem Transformation (Swift Action)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 狮图腾转化（迅捷动作）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A lion totem druid wild shape is effected by their dedication to feline spirits. All wild shape forms gained from level 6 onwards are gained 2 levels later than a standard druid, however feline forms are gained 2 levels earlier.

A lion totem druid wild shape is effected by their dedication to feline sprits. All wild shape forms gained from level 6 onwards are gained 2 levels later than a standard druid, however feline forms are gained 2 levels earlier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 雄狮德鲁伊的野性形态受到他们对猫科动物的奉献精神影响。所有从 6 级开始获得的野性形态比标准德鲁伊推迟 2 级获得，但是猫科动物形态获得的时间提早 2 级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wild Shape - Lion Totem Druid
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 野性形态 - 雄狮德鲁伊

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The living scripture literally wields the sacred word of his deity, memorizing scripture to smite the foes of his god with divine might. Unlike most inquisitors, a living scripture focuses on careful study of divine scripture, valuing knowledge over intuition.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 活圣经确实地应用他的神明的圣言，熟记圣经并以其神圣力量毁灭神的敌人。与大多数审判官不同，活圣经侧重于仔细研究神圣的经文，重视知识胜于直觉。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You gain an intelligent longsword companion.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你获得一个智能长剑伙伴。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Intelligent Longsword
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 智能长剑

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, the mystic theurge selects a divine spellcasting class she belonged to before adding the prestige class. When a new mystic theurge level is gained, the character gains new spells per day and new spells known as if she had also gained a level in that spellcasting class.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在 1 级时，秘术师选择她在加入进阶等级之前所属的神术等级。当获得新的秘术师等级时，角色每天会获得新的法术和已知的新法术，就好像她也获得了该法术等级一样。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: When a new loremaster level is gained, the character gains new spells per day as if he had also gained a level in a spellcasting class he belonged to before adding the prestige class. He does not, however, gain other benefits a character of that class would have gained, except for additional spells per day, spells known (if he is a spontaneous spellcaster), and an increased effective level of spellcasting. If a character had more than one spellcasting class before becoming a loremaster, he must decide to which class he adds the new level for purposes of determining the number of spells per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当获得一个新的博学士等级时，角色每天会获得新的法术，就好像他在获得进阶等级之前也获得了一个法术等级一样。然而，除了每天额外的法术、已知法术（如果他是自发施法者）和增加的有效施法等级之外，他不会获得该等级的角色本应获得的其他好处。如果一个角色在成为博学士之前拥有一个以上的施法等级，他必须决定将新等级加入哪个等级，以确定每天施法的数量。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, the loremaster selects a divine spellcasting class she belonged to before adding the prestige class. When a new loremaster level is gained, the character gains new spells per day and new spells known as if she had also gained a level in that spellcasting class.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在 1 级时，博学士可以选择她在加入进阶等级之前所属的一个神术等级。当获得一个新的博学士等级时，角色每天会获得新的法术和已知的新法术，就好像她也获得了该法术等级一样。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Soldier of Golarion
The child of Acavna and Amaznen gains the ability to cast 4 cantrips as spell-like abilities, bypassing their normal inability to cast spells.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 旧神圣子会获得 4 种类似法术的施法能力，绕过了他们通常无法施法的情况。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 2nd level, a child of Acavna and Amaznen is further initiated into the arcane secrets passed down from Azlant. This gives her minor spellcasting abilities and access to lore collected to give her an edge against the enemies of humanity.
The child of Acavna and Amaznen gains a spellbook containing wizard cantrips. She can prepare and cast these spells as a wizard, using her fighter level as her caster level.
She also gains a +2 bonus on Knowledge checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
旧神圣子在二级时，将进一步了解阿兹兰特传承下来的奥术秘密。
阿卡夫娜和阿玛兹南的孩子会获得一本包含魔法师法术的魔法书。她可以像魔法师一样准备和施放这些法术，使用她的战士等级作为施法者等级。
她还会在知识检定上获得+2加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 2nd level, a child of Acavna and Amaznen is further initiated into the arcane secrets passed down from Azlant. This gives her minor spellcasting abilities and access to lore collected to give her an edge against the enemies of humanity.
The child of Acavna and Amaznen gains the ability to cast 4 cantrips as spell-like abilities, bypassing their normal inability to cast spells. 
She also gains a +2 bonus on Knowledge checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
旧神圣子在二级时，将进一步了解阿兹兰特传承下来的奥术秘密。
旧神圣子获得了施展四种类似法术的能力，绕过了他们通常无法施展法术的情况。
她还在知识检定上获得+2的加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lore of Acavna and Amaznen
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 旧神传说

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lore of Acavna and Amaznen Hidden
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 隐藏的旧神传说

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action, you can touch a willing creature, granting it a +4 sacred bonus on saving throws to resist charm, compulsion, and fear effects for 1 hour. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 作为标准动作，您可以触摸一个自愿的生物，使其在 1 小时内抵抗魅惑、蛊惑和恐惧效果的豁免检定时获得 +4 神圣加成。您每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 您的感知修正值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: 1 hour
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1 小时

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You have been granted a +4 sacred bonus on saving throws to resist charm, compulsion, and fear effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 您在抵御魅惑、蛊惑和恐惧效果时会获得+4神圣加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Touch of Loyalty
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 忠诚之触

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You value loyalty above other virtues, both between allies and towards ones holy patron. 
Touch of Loyalty: As a standard action, you can touch a willing creature, granting it a +4 sacred bonus on saving throws to resist charm, compulsion, and fear effects for 1 hour. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Staff of Order: At 8th level, you can give a weapon you touch the axiomatic special weapon quality for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and an additional time per day for every four levels beyond 8th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你把忠诚看得比其他美德更重要，无论是盟友之间的忠诚，还是对神圣守护者的忠诚。
忠诚之触：作为一个标准动作，你可以触摸一个自愿的生物，使其在1小时内抵抗魅惑、蛊惑和恐惧效果的豁免检定时获得+4神圣加成。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知修正值。
秩序之杖：8级时，你可以赋予你所接触的武器公理特质，持续回合数等于你获得此领域的等级的1/2。8级时每天可以使用一次，8级后每升4级每天可以额外使用一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Loyalty Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 忠诚度子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You value loyalty above other virtues, both between allies and towards ones holy patron. 
Touch of Loyalty: As a standard action, you can touch a willing creature, granting it a +4 sacred bonus on saving throws to resist charm, compulsion, and fear effects for 1 hour. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Staff of Order: At 8th level, you can give a weapon you touch the axiomatic special weapon quality for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and an additional time per day for every four levels beyond 8th.
Domain Spells: remove fear, communal protection from chaos, prayer, communal protection from energy, greater command, blade barrier, dictum, shield of law, dominate monster.

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are infused with luck, and your mere presence can spread good fortune.
Bit of Luck: You can touch a willing creature as a standard action, giving it a bit of luck. For the next round, any time the target rolls a d20, she may roll twice and take the more favorable result. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Divine Fortune: At 6th level, as a standard action, you can bless yourself with divine luck. For the next half your level in the class that gave you access to this domain rounds you roll two times on every d20 roll and take the best result. You can use this ability once per day at 6th level, and one additional time per day for every 6 levels in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 6th.
Domain Spells: true strike, aid, protection from energy, protection from energy, communal, break enchantment, cat's grace, mass, restoration, greater, moment of prescience, heal, mass.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你被注入了幸运，你的存在就能传播好运。 
一点幸运：你可以触摸一个自愿的生物，作为标准动作，给它一点幸运。在接下来的一轮中，目标每次掷 d20 时，都可以掷两次，并选择更有利的结果。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知修正值。 
神圣幸运：六级时，作为标准动作，你可以用神圣的幸运祝福自己。持续你在此领域职业等级的一般轮次，你可以在每次D20掷骰子时掷两次，取最好的结果。六级时每天可以使用一次，六级后每升六级，每天可以额外使用一次。 
领域法术：克敌机先、援助、能量防护、能量防护、共通、破除魔法、猫之恩典、质量、恢复、更大、预知时刻、治愈、质量。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Luck: You gain a +1 luck bonus to your AC and on attack rolls, ability checks, saving throws, and skill checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
运气：你的 AC 和攻击检定、属性检定、豁免检定和技能检定获得 +1 运气加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Luck Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 幸运领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You can entrance friend and foe alike, able to inspire people or reduce them to a stunned stupor.
Dazing Touch: You can cause a living creature to become dazed for 1 round as a melee touch attack. Creatures with more Hit Dice than your level in the class that gave you access to this domain are unaffected. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Anything to Please: At 8th level, you can compel a creature within close range to attempt to please you as a standard action. The creature receives a Will save to negate this affect. If the save fails, the creature attacks your enemies for 1 round, stands stunned by you for 1 round, or drops prone and grovels for 1d4 rounds, chosen at random. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time per day for every four levels beyond 8th. This is a mind-affecting effect.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你可以诱惑盟友和敌人，既能鼓舞人心，又能使人目瞪口呆陷入昏迷。
眩晕之触：作为近战{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触攻击{/g}，你的接触可使活物眩晕，效果持续1{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}生命骰数{/g}超过赋予你此领域的职业等级的活物，将不会受到影响。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
予取予求：8级时，你能以标准动作的心智效果强迫30尺生物服从。生物可用成功的意志豁免避免此效果，但若豁免失败，该生物将攻击你的敌人 1 轮，被你击晕 1 轮，或俯卧跪地 1d4 轮，随机选择。你能在8级每天使用此能力1次，每比8级高4级多1次。这是影响心灵的效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lust Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 情欲子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Auroral Tower   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Prostitution, Rites of passage, Virginity   
Edict: Help others achieve their desires, aid and protect sex workers, help others through difficult transitions   
Domains: Community, Good, Law, Protection   
Subdomains: Archon, Friendship, Lust, Purity   
Favoured Weapon: Longsword   
Holy Symbol: White-hooded profile   
Sacred Animal: Rabbit   
Lymnieris teaches that the passage from one state of being to another is a sacred time in every mortal's life. He is thought to have originally been a planetar, as evidenced by the empyreal lord's tall stature, emerald green skin, and four white wings. His hard, radiant body is always coated in a thin sheen of perspiration, and he carries no weapons, instead wielding in one of his delicate hands a great white shield made of celestial ivory. Lymnieris and his agents sometimes come to the aid of good-hearted virgins pressed into marriage or threatened with being deflowered against their will, as well as those devotees who wish to fulfill their sexual desires but who are restrained by culture or tradition. Any individual on the threshold of a major personal change may call on Lymnieris for aid. Prostitutes who work lawfully and willingly out of love for their profession also worship Lymnieris, and those forced into carnal service pray to him for salvation. Lymnieris lives in a palace made of blue agate in Heaven, where he often entertains the visiting Arshea.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：极光之塔 
阵营：守序善良 
关注领域：卖淫、成人仪式、贞操 
裁决：帮助他人实现他们的愿望，帮助和保护性工作者，帮助他人渡过难关 
领域：团队，善良，守序、保护 <br团队，善良，守序、保护 
子域：大主教、友谊、欲望、纯洁 
最喜爱的武器：长剑 
神圣象征：白帽的轮廓 
神圣的动物：兔子 
莱姆尼里斯教导说，从一种状态进入另一种状态是每个凡人生命中的神圣时刻。人们认为他最初是一个行星人，这一点可以从他高大的身材、翠绿色的皮肤和四只洁白的翅膀得到证明。他坚硬、光彩照人的身体上总是覆盖着一层薄薄的汗珠，他没有携带任何武器，而是用一双纤细的手拥有着由天体象牙制成的白色大盾。莱姆尼里斯和他的代理人有时会帮助那些心地善良、被逼婚或面临被强行开苞威胁的处女，以及那些希望满足自己的性欲望但受到文化或传统限制的信徒。任何面临重大个人转变的人都可以向莱姆妮里斯寻求帮助。出于对职业的热爱而自愿守序工作的妓女也崇拜莱姆尼里斯，而那些被迫从事肉体服务的人则向他祈求救赎。莱姆尼里斯住在天堂的蓝色玛瑙宫殿里，他经常在那里招待来访的阿西娅。

Lymnieris and his agents sometimes come to the aid of good-hearted virgins pressed into marriage or threatened with being deflowered against their will, as well as those devotees who wish to fulfill their sexual desires but who are restrained by culture or tradition. Any individual on the threshold of a major personal change may call on Lymnieris for aid. Prostitutes who work lawfully and willingly out of love for their profession also worship Lymnieris, and those forced into carnal service pray to him for salvation. Lymnieris lives in a palace made ofblue agate in Heaven, where he often entertains the visiting Arshea.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：极光之塔
阵营：守序善良
神职：特殊服务，成人礼，贞操
领域：联盟、善良、守序、保护
子领域：亚空，友谊，情欲，纯净
偏好武器：长剑 
圣徽：藏在白斗篷下的脸
圣兽：兔
林尼芮斯教导说，从人生的一个阶段过渡到下一个阶段是神圣的过程。
他被认为最初是一个行星，这可以从这位至高天领主的高大身材、翠绿色的皮肤和四只白色的翅膀中得到证明。他那坚硬而容光焕发的身体总是覆盖着一层薄薄的汗珠，他没有携带任何武器，而是在一只纤巧的手中拥有着一面由天象牙制成的巨型的白色盾牌。
林尼芮斯和他的代理人有时会帮助那些被迫结婚或违背意愿被剥夺尊严的善良处女，以及那些希望满足性欲但受文化或传统限制的信徒。任何即将发生重大个人变化的个人都可以向林尼芮斯寻求帮助。出于对职业的热爱而守序且自愿地工作的妓女也崇拜林尼芮斯，那些被迫从事肉体服务的妓女向他祈祷以求救赎。
林尼芮斯住在天堂的一座蓝玛瑙宫殿，总是在那里接待好友阿榭依。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lymnieris
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 林尼芮斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Feather of Truth   
Alignment: Lawful Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Justice, Law, Order, Truth   
Domains: Knowledge, Law, Protection, Void (Travel), Weather   
Subdomains: Inevitable, Judgment, Purity, Seasons, Stars, Thought   
Favoured Weapon: Starknife   
Holy Symbol: Blue Ostrich Feather   
Sacred Animal: Leopard   
When the universe was created, it was given an innate harmony, and the goddess Maat is the guardian of this cosmic order. She is a deity of balance, justice, law, and truth, and is responsible for the uniform movement of the celestial bodies through the sky and the ordered procession of seasons. Ancient Osirians believed that the legitimacy and efficacy of a pharaoh's reign were dependent on upholding the concepts embodied by Maat, and to prevent the universe from dissolving into chaos, this order must be constantly renewed and preserved by both humans and the gods. Maat is the daughter of Ra, sister of Bastet, Hathor, and Sekhmet, and the wife of Thoth. Maat presides over the councils of the gods, being impartial, honest, and fair, and she assists Pharasma in the judgment of souls as they pass on into the afterlife. As the upholder of cosmic order, Maat is opposed to both Set and Apep, who work to bring about chaos and entropy. Maat usually appears as a woman with a blue ostrich feather on her head. She is often depicted with winged arms, holding an ankh and a was scepter, symbols of life and power, respectively. Her sacred animal is the leopard, because the pattern on its coat represents the stars in the night sky. Paladins often worship Maat as the embodiment of justice, and monks and oracles revere the cosmic truth she embodies.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：真理之羽
阵营：守序中立
神职：正义、守序、秩序、真理
领域：知识、守序、保护、虚空（旅行）、天气
子领域：制裁、裁决、纯净、季节、星辰、思想
偏好武器：星刃
圣徽：苍蓝鸵鸟羽
神兽：花豹
当天地创生时，世界一片和谐，而女神玛亚特被赋予了维持宇宙秩序的职责。祂是平衡、正义、守序与真理之神，也负责调度群星整齐移动，以及安排四季顺畅变迁。古奥西里昂人相信法老的天命可以由祂是如何维护玛亚特所象征的概念来判断，而为了不让宇宙陷入无边混乱，这份秩序必须不断地由人神协力更新维持。
玛亚特是拉的女儿，芭丝特、哈索尔与塞赫美特的姊妹，以及托特的配偶。公正无私又诚实的玛亚特在诸神议事时担任主持，祂也协助法莱斯玛审判阴间幽魂。作为宇宙秩序的维护者，玛亚特与谋图带来混乱产生熵的赛特及阿佩普敌对。玛亚特以头顶苍蓝鸵鸟羽饰的女性形象示人，通常还手持象征生命的命符与体现权威的霸杖。祂的圣兽是花豹，因为其毛皮上斑纹的图样形似夜空繁星。圣武士一般把玛亚特当作正义的象征崇拜，而武僧及先知则将祂视为宇宙真理的化身来供奉。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 玛亚特

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Three   
Alignment: Lawful Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Complexity, Fate, Triplets   
Domains: Knowledge, Law, Luck, Rune   
Subdomains: Curse, Fate, Thought, Wards   
Favoured Weapon: Scythe   
Holy Symbol: Green three-pointed knot   
Sacred Animal: Multi-headed animals   
If Pharasma is the goddess of fate, then Magdh is the patron of foreknowledge—and the complications that arise from it. While other Eldest focus on gathering or controlling secrets, time, or forbidden information, Magdh watches the endless tangled lines and interplay between rippling realities, following chains of events back to their origins and into strange culminations on distant planes. She is a seer among seers, the mother of paradox, and even the other Eldest sometimes beseech her for interpretations of her maddeningly opaque visions, for it’s said that in her forest pools Magdh has glimpsed the ends of all things, including the Eldest themselves. Magdh, often known simply as the Three, takes the form of a robed humanoid woman with three faces set equidistantly around her head, the hair framing those faces by turns black, red, and blonde. These faces swivel to address the object of her attention at seemingly random intervals, sometimes mid-sentence, spinning her head in complete circles without apparent ill effect. Though not actually a collective consciousness like Shyka, Madgh’s faces appear to represent different aspects of her personality, though not always the same one—a supplicant who notices the red-haired face radiating maternal affection in one interaction might attempt to curry favor with it the next time, only to find it personifying rage or humor. When necessary, Magdh has even been known to split into three separate women in order to accomplish some task, yet the Eldest often seems reserved or less lucid for a time following such separations.

子领域：破敌、天命、思想、守护 
偏好武器：巨镰
圣徽：绿色三叉结
圣兽：多头动物
如果法拉斯玛是命运女神，那么玛芙就是预知——和应运而生的纷繁复杂——的守护神。当其他始祖都在专注于收集秘密、禁忌学识或操控时空的时候，玛芙一直观察着无尽的命运之线互相纠葛在一起，和现实激起的阵阵涟漪间的相互作用，追踪着一系列可以追溯到他们起源的事件一步步在遥远的位面进入奇特的高潮。她是先知中的先知、悖论之母，甚至其他始祖有时也会来恳求她解释她那些令人难以捉摸的愿景，也因此传说玛芙在她的林中圣池里能够一窥包括始祖在内的万物终结之时。
玛芙通常被简单的称作“三相”，外表看起来就是一个穿长袍的人类女性有三副面孔等距的环绕在头部上，围绕在这些面孔周围的头发依此是黑色、红色和金色。这些面孔会看似随机的旋转对准引起她注意的事物，她的头颅有时候能在言谈间旋转一周也毫无违和之处。玛芙的几副面孔并不是像夏依卡那样共用一个确切的集体意识，而是用来表现她自己不同的个性，并且还不是保持不变的——一个祈求者可能会在一次接触中发现红发面相表现出了母性的光辉并想要在下一次依此来取悦她，便只会发现转变成了表现狂怒或幽默的一面。在必要时，也听说过玛芙会分裂成三个独立的女人来完成一些工作，不过这位始祖在如此做之后会有一段时间变得缄默或不太清醒。
甚至连其他的始祖都不敢宣称能了解玛芙的动机。虽然时常会听到她委婉的抨击现实世界的递归本质和一些小概率事件对时间长河的影响，但玛芙她自己到底有什么进一步的目的，没有任何人能够说出确切的答案。流行的说法是她通过派遣她的仆从进行一些匪夷所思的任务来妨碍第一世界中的各种生物——包括其他始祖在内，来独自保护第一世界不会发生一些重大的灾难，并且有时也会发现三相本人会带着一些随从进行某些特别的任务。在她所有的同僚中，夏依卡与三相有着最深的联系，也是因为她们会互相交流关于时空和命运的理解，但是这份羁绊也会带有紧张气氛，她们俩经常因为一些微不足道的琐事而陷入冷战状态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Argent Prince, The Countless, Open Palm, Spirit in Gold, Lord of the Third, The Twice-Fallen   
Realm: Erebus 
Alignment: Lawful Evil   
Areas of Concern: Avarice, Watchfulness, Wealth   
Domains: Artifice, Earth, Evil, Law  
Subdomains: Construct, Devil, Metal, Toil 
Favoured Weapon: Spear  
Profane Symbol: Devil-faced coin  
Profane Animal: Rat  
In all greed rings the voice of Mammon. Known throughout the planes as the Countless, the Grasping One, and the Open Palm, none could be better suited to the duty of Hell’s treasurer and vault keeper, as Mammon’s senses extend through every copper of Erebus’s impossibly vast horde. His form having made him something of a mathematical genius, the Grasping One can give an instantly accurate accounting of the wealth he guards, items of particular significance, and the total value of Hell’s riches—an amount measured by a number mortal scholars have yet to discover. Mammon only discloses full reports of his realm’s riches to Asmodeus, but might reveal the location of a particular item to any who offer him a replacement of greater beauty or value. Both the greedy and the poor typically entreat Mammon for aid, calling out to the Open Palm for wealth, station, or other comforts. Typically the archdevil answers the most debased or pathetic requests by assuring that the mortal discovers a coin taken from Erebus. Whispering through such a “lucky copper,” Mammon encourages acts of greater and greater depravity to attain what they desire.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
Titles：阿根廷王子、无数、张开的手掌、金中之魂、三世之主、两次陨落 
境界：埃里伯斯 
阵营：守序邪恶 
关注领域：贪婪、警惕、财富 
领域：Artifice、Earth、Evil、Wealth造物，大地，邪恶，守序 
次领域：构装体、恶魔、金属、劳作 
最喜爱的武器：长矛 
普罗凡人的标志：魔面硬币 
普罗凡的动物：鼠老鼠 
在所有贪婪中都响彻着玛门的声音。在整个位面中，玛门被称为 "数不清的人"、"擒抱者 "和 "张开的手掌"，没有人比他更适合担任地狱的司库和金库看守人，因为玛门的感官遍及埃里伯斯庞大无比的部落中的每一个铜矿。他的外形让他成为了数学天才，擒抱者可以立即准确地计算出他所看守的财富、具有特殊意义的物品以及地狱财富的总价值--这是一个凡人学者尚未发现的数字。玛门只向阿斯莫德透露他王国财富的完整报告，但如果有人向他提供更精美或价值更高的替代品，他可能会透露特定物品的位置。贪婪者和穷人通常都会向玛门求助，向张开的手掌祈求财富、地位或其他舒适。通常情况下，大恶魔会通过保证凡人发现一枚从埃里伯斯挖出的硬币来回答最卑鄙或最可怜的请求。玛门通过这枚 "幸运铜币 "低声怂恿凡人做出越来越堕落的行为，以达到他们的目的。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mammon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 玛门

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Among the Red Mantis worshipers of Achaekek, some hold such strong faith in their assassin god that they gain divine power. They forge themselves into perfect killers in honor of He Who Walks in Blood.These warpriests are a relatively recent addition to the Red Mantis arsenal, but in the few short decades they have served the assassins, they have quickly built a reputation for themselves as particularly fanatical devotees of the Mantis God.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在阿查凯克的红螳螂崇拜者中，有些人对他们的刺客之神抱有强烈的信仰，以至于获得了神力。他们将自己锻造成完美的杀手，以纪念血中之神。这些祭司是最近才加入红螳螂武库的，但在为刺客服务的短短几十年里，他们很快就建立了自己的声誉，成为螳螂神特别狂热的信徒。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Among the Red Mantis worshipers of Achaekek, some hold such strong faith in their assassin god that they gain divine power.They forge themselves into perfect killers in honor of He Who Walks in Blood.These warpriests are a relatively recent addition to the Red Mantis arsenal, but in the few short decades they have served the assassins, they have quickly built a reputation for themselves as particularly fanatical devotees of the Mantis God.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在 阿卡艾克克 的红螳螂崇拜者中，有些人对他们的刺客神祇有着如此强烈的信仰，以至于他们获得了神圣的力量。他们将自己塑造成完美的杀手，以纪念浴血行者。这些战争祭司是红螳螂信仰者中新晋的成员，但在他们作为暗杀者服务的短短几十年里，他们迅速树立了自己作为螳螂神的狂热信徒的名声。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mantis Zealot
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 螳螂狂徒

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mantis zealots are proficient with simple and martial weapons, as well as with the sawtooth sabre. They are proficient with light armor but not with shields.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 螳螂狂徒精通简易和军用武器，以及锯齿军刀。他们擅长轻甲，但不擅长盾牌。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mantis Zealot Proficiencies
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 螳螂狂徒擅长

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, a mantis zealot can make a sneak attack. This ability functions as the rogue class feature of the same name. At 4th level, his sneak attack damage is +1d6. This damage increases by 1d6 at 8th level and every 4 warpriest levels thereafter. If the zealot gets a sneak attack bonus from another source, the bonuses stack.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 4 级，螳螂狂徒可以进行偷袭。该能力作为同名的游荡者职业能力发挥作用。在第 4 级，他的偷袭伤害为 +1d6。这种伤害在第 8 级和之后每 4 个战争祭司等级增加 1d6。如果狂热者从其他来源获得偷袭加值，则加值叠加。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Zealots Sneak Attack
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 螳螂偷袭

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You have found a way to force dark powers to grant you the ability to apply one additional cruelty when using profane corruption. 
Benefit: You can select one additional cruelty to use with profane corruption.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你找到了一种方法来强迫黑暗力量在使用亵渎之炎时赋予你施加额外残虐的能力。好处：你可以选择一种额外的残虐应用于亵渎之炎。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Cruel Master
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 残虐大师

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Creeping Queen, Lord of Vermin, Demon Lord of Vermin and Bindings 
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Bindings, Driders, Vermin   
Domains: Animal, Chaos, Destruction, Evil   
Subdomains: Catastrophe, Demon, Rage, Venom   
Favoured Weapon: Net (Kukri)   
Holy Symbol: Skull in spiderweb   
Sacred Animal: Spider   
Mazmezz appears as a hideous tangle of insectoid legs, far too many for any worldly insect to command. Some of these legs end in claws, others in pincers, and still others in spinnerets. At the center, a sickening clot of wriggling hair boils around a roughly spherical body, the only concession toward a “front” being an immense spider’s mouth filled with thrashing pedipalps and fangs. Mazmezz has the insidious ability to wrap herself in gauzy, vexing swaths of webbing that can magically alter her form to anything she can imagine—the form of a beautiful woman or female drider is a particular favorite when she’s dealing with those she might wish to capture and keep as trophies for her horrific harem. Yet when forced to punish foes or do battle, the Creeping Queen always reverts to her nauseating true form. Mazmezz is worshiped primarily by drow, driders, and ettercaps, but some particularly demented humanoids worship her as well—these tend to be isolated admirers rather than members of full-blown cults. Her hive-like Abyssal domain is known as Khavak-Vog, and its tangled ways are the lair of her favored children, the bebiliths. The core of her maze-like lair is guarded by several of these fiends grown to great size. Legend holds that the first bebiliths were spawned by Mazmezz; if true, this would explain the disgust and hatred with which most other demon lords hold the Creeping Queen.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：蠕行女王、虫类之王、虫类恶魔之王和绑定 
阵营：混乱邪恶 
关注领域：绑定、Driders、虫类 
领域：动物、混乱、毁灭、邪恶 
子领域：灾难、恶魔、狂暴、毒液 
偏好武器：网 (Kukri) 
圣徽：蜘蛛网中的头骨 
圣兽：蜘蛛 
 Mazmezz 看起来像一团可怕的类昆虫腿，数量之多，任何世俗的昆虫都无法指挥。这些腿有的末端是爪子，有的末端是钳子，还有一些末端是喷丝板。在中心，一团令人作呕的蠕动毛发围绕着一个大致球形的身体沸腾，唯一朝向“正面”的让步是一张巨型的蜘蛛嘴，里面长满了扑腾的须肢和尖牙。 Mazmezz 有一种阴险的能力，可以用薄纱、令人烦恼的织带包裹自己，这些织带可以神奇地将她的形态变成她能想象到的任何东西——当她与那些她可能想捕捉的人打交道时，她特别喜欢美丽的女人或女骑手的形态并作为她可怕的后宫的战利品。然而，当被迫惩罚敌人或进行战斗时，蠕行女王总是会恢复到她令人作呕的真实形态。 Mazmezz 主要受到卓尔、driders 和 ettecaps 的崇拜，但一些特别疯狂的类人生物也崇拜她——这些人往往是孤立的崇拜者，而不是成熟教派的成员。她的蜂巢状深渊领域被称为 Khavak-Vog，其错综复杂的道路是她最宠爱的孩子贝比利斯的巢穴。她迷宫般的巢穴的核心由几只体型庞大的恶魔守卫着。传说认为第一批贝比利石是由马兹梅兹产下的；如果属实，这将解释大多数其他恶魔领主对蠕行女王的厌恶和仇恨。
