LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Just Arbiter   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Deservedness, Nobility, Rulership   
Domains: Good, Law, Nobility, Protection   
Subdomains: Archon, Defense, Leadership, Martyr   
Favoured Weapon: Halberd (Glaive)   
Holy Symbol: Figure framed by branches   
Sacred Animal: Wolf   
It is said that Olheon knows the lineage of every noble soul in existence. She tracks the passage of power-and the responsibilities such power brings with it-from parent to child, ruler to heir, and dynasty to dynasty. Whether power transfers legitimately through inheritance or election or forcibly through coup or rebellion, Olheon sees the change and judges accordingly. The Just Arbiter is among the most magnificent empyreal lords to behold. Olheon stands over 16 feet tall, towering over most mortals, and her blue eyes blaze in a face of burnished gold. She wears a heavy silver breastplate and greaves, but her gauntleted hands and forearms are stained crimson, as if she had plunged her armored fists into pools of fresh blood. In one hand she carries a ruby-bladed halberd even taller than herself; in the other hand, she bears a heavy golden seal of office affirming her charge. Olheon despises tyrants and boils at the sight of legitimate rulers who, through weakness or ignorance, cause hardship and unjust living conditions for those under their dominion. She works through her subjects and divine minions to teach those who can be taught and to punish those who cannot. Officials, noble rulers, and even parents all look to Olheon for guidance, and they are in turn judged according to their actions. Olheon occupies the northern wing of the Courts of Accord, where the magicals crying mirrors hung in her vast Hall of Thrones displays cenes of accession and rulership throughout the multiverse.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：公正仲裁者
阵营：守序善良
神职：价值，高贵，统治
领域：善良、守序、崇高、保护
子领域：亚空、防御、领导、殉难
偏好武器：长戟（大砍刀）
圣徽：背后有银色网络的低首人像
圣兽：狼
说奥理翁知道每一个贵族的谱系，追踪权力的易手——以及这种权力带来的责任——从父母到孩子，从统治者到继承人，从王朝到王朝。无论是通过继承或选举守序地转移权力，还是通过政变或叛乱强制转移，奥理翁都看到了变化并做出相应的判断。
公正仲裁者是最伟大的至高天领主之一。奥理翁身高超过 16 英尺，比大多数凡人都要高，她的蓝眼睛在光滑的金色脸庞上闪耀着光芒。她戴着沉重的银色胸甲和护胫，手套则是如血般殷红，就好像她把她的装甲拳头扎进了鲜血的池子里。
她一手持比自己还高的红宝石刃战戟，另一手持黄金之印。奥理翁鄙视暴君，并对利用软弱或无知给他们统治下的人造成困难和不公正的生活条件的统治者感到愤怒腾。
她通过她的臣民和神仆来教导那些可以被教导的人和惩罚那些不能被教导的人。官员，高位统治者，甚至父母都向奥理翁寻求指导，并根据他们的行为反过来对他们进行评判。
奥理翁和谐法庭的北翼，她的御座之间里面有面镜子，反射出多元宇宙所有即位和统治的景象。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Olheon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥理翁

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become proficient with all Martial Weapons that can be used one-handed.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 您将精通所有可单手使用的武术武器。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your ranged assault leaves your foe disoriented and vulnerable to your melee attack. 
Whenever you deal damage with a ranged attack, you gain a + 4 circumstance bonus on the next melee attack roll you make against the opponent.This attack must occur before the end of your next turn.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的远程攻击会让敌人迷失方向，容易受到你的近战攻击。
每当你使用远程攻击造成伤害时，你都会在下一次对对手进行近战攻击时获得+4的环境加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Opening Volley
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 远近夹攻

While in combat you may expend a swift action; during this combat the next creature you confirm a critical hit against is cursed by your attack as the bestow curse spell, except the target doesn’t receive a Will saving throw to negate the effects and spell resistance does not apply against this ability.
Bestow Curse
You place a curse on the subject. Choose one of the following:
Curse of Feeble Body — The subject suffers a –6 penalty to Constitution score.
Curse of Weakness — The subject suffers a –6 penalty to Strength and Dexterity scores.
Curse of Idiocy — The subject suffers a –6 penalty to Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.
Curse of Deterioration — The subject suffers a –4 penalty on attack rolls, saves, ability checks, and skill checks.
Critical Curse

An oracle with the apocalypse mystery adds Lore (nature), Persuasion and Stealth to her list of class skills.
Apocalypse

Upon reaching 20th level, you become a truly alien and unnatural creature. You gain damage reduction 5/— and immunity to acid, critical hits, and sneak attacks. Once per day, you can cast shapechange as a spell-like ability without requiring a material component.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 达到 20 级后，你将成为真正的外星非自然生物。你将获得伤害减免 5/- 以及对酸液、要害攻击和偷袭的免疫力。每天一次，你可以施放 "变形术 "作为类似法术的能力，而不需要材料成分。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An oracle with the dark tapestry mystery adds Knowledge (Arcana) , Persuasion and Stealth to her list of class skills.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 拥有暗幕秘示域的先知者的类技能列表中会增加知识（奥术）、劝服和隐身。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dark Tapestry
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暗幕

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Upon reaching 20th level, your draconic destiny unfolds. You gain immunity to paralysis, sleep, and damage of your energy type. If you have the breath weapon revelation, you can use your breath weapon an unlimited number of times per day, though no more often than once every 1d4+1 rounds.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 达到 20 级后，你的龙之命运开始展现。你将获得对麻痹、睡眠和你选择的能量类型伤害的免疫力。如果你拥有喷吐武器启示，你每天可以无限次地使用喷吐武器，但每次冷却 1d4+1 轮。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Final Revelation
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 最终启示

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Upon achieving 20th level, your rapport with the heavens grants you perfect harmony with the universe. You receive a bonus on all saving throws equal to your Charisma modifier. You become immune to fear effects, and automatically confirm all critical hits. Once per day, should you die, 1 round after dying you are reborn. Your body re-forms with all your equipment, and you return to life with maximum hit points.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在达到第20级时，你与天堂的融洽关系赋予你与宇宙的完美和谐。你在所有豁免检定中获得等同于你的魅力调整值的加成。你对恐惧效果免疫，并自动确认所有重击。每天一次，如果你死亡，死后 1 轮你会重生。你的身体会随着你所有的装备而重塑，你会以最大的生命值复活。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An oracle with the heavens mystery adds Perception and Knowledge (world)  to her list of class skills.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 具有苍天秘示域的先知将感知和知识（世界）添加到她的本职技能列表中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An oracle with the heavens mystery adds Perception and Knowledge (Arcana)  to her list of class skills.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 具有苍天秘示域的先知将感知和知识（神秘）添加到她的本职技能列表中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Heavens
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 苍天

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Upon reaching 20th level, you become an avatar of the primal world. Once per day, you can transform into a lycanthrope of your choice for a number of hours equal to your Charisma modifier, gaining all the powers of a natural lycanthrope of that type. In addition, you become immune to mind-affecting effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 达到 20 级后，你会成为原始世界的化身。每天一次，你可以变身成为你所选择的狼人，持续时间等于你的魅力修正值，并获得自然狼人的所有能力。此外，你还会对影响心智的效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day, you can transform into a lycanthrope of your choice for a number of hours equal to your Charisma modifier, gaining all the powers of a natural lycanthrope of that type. (The Master Shapeshifter mythic ability allows this to be cast unlimited times per day, without time limit.)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，你可以变身成你所选择的狼人，持续时间等于你的魅力修正值，并获得自然狼人的所有能力。(变形大师 "神话能力允许每天无限次变身，没有时间限制）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lycan Shape
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 狼人形状

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, you can transform into a wererat for a number of hours equal to your Charisma modifier. 
Wererats gain: Two claw attacks (1d4) a bite attack (1d6) and free disarm attempts on bite attacks. 
Jump up, weakening wound, crippling strike and opportunist rogue talents.
3d6 sneak attack dice, stacking with other sneak attack dice. 
DR 5/silver.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，你可以变身为狼人，持续时间等于你的魅力修正值。
狼人获得两次爪击（1d4）一次咬击（1d6），咬击时可免费尝试缴械。
跳跃、削弱伤害、残废打击和机会主义流氓天赋。
3d6潜行攻击骰子，与其他潜行攻击骰子叠加。
DR5/银。

Once per day, you can transform into a werewolf for a number of hours equal to your Charisma modifier. 
Werewolves gain: Two claw attacks (1d4) a bite attack (1d6) and free trip attempts on bite attacks. 
Trip and greater trip as bonus feats.
Claw attacks cause the target to bleed for 5 damage each round, stacking up to 5 times.
DR 10/silver.

每天一次，你可以变身为狼人，持续时间等于你的魅力修正值。

绊摔和更大的绊摔作为奖励专长。
爪子攻击使目标流血，每回合造成5次伤害，最多叠加5次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Claw wounds cause the target to bleed for 5 damage each round, stacking up to 5 times. Bleeding can be stopped through the application of any spell that cures hit point damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 爪伤会使目标流血，每回合造成 5 点伤害，最多叠加 5 次。可以通过施放任何可以治愈命中点伤害的法术来止血。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Upon reaching 20th level, you become a master of iron and steel. You gain the benefits of Weapon Focus, Greater Weapon Focus, and Improved Critical with any weapon that you are proficient with. 
Your armor is like a second skin to you—while wearing metal armor you are proficient with, the armor’s maximum Dexterity bonus increases by +5 and you take no armor check penalty.

Your armor is like a second skin to you—while wearing metal armor you are proficient with, the armor’s maximum Dexterity bonus increases by +5 and you take no armor check penalty.
Final Revelation - Improved Critical
An oracle with the metal mystery adds Athletics, Persuasion and Use Magic Device to her list of class skills.
An oracle with the Metal mystery adds Athletics, Persuasion and Use Magic Device to her list of class skills.
Metal
OracleRevelationArmorMasteryEffectFeature

You become more maneuverable while wearing armor. You can move at your normal speed in medium armor that is made of metal. This does not grant proficiency in armor. 
At 5th level, whenever you are wearing metal armor, you reduce the armor check penalty by 1 (to a minimum of 0) and increase the maximum Dexterity bonus allowed by your armor by 1. 
At 10th level, and again at 15th level, these bonuses increase by 1.
Armor Mastery

Whenever you cast a summon monster spell and summon a good or evil outsider creature, you also summon it with the shadow creature template. This revelation counts as having the Spell Focus (conjuration) feat for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of the Augment Summoning feat, as well as any feat that lists Augment Summoning as a prerequisite. 
A shadow creature gains spell resistance equal to its Hit Dice +6. It also gains:
1 — 4 HD: resistance 5 to cold and electricity
5 — 10 HD: resistance 10 to cold and electricity, DR 5/magic
11+ HD: resistance 15 to cold and electricity, DR 10/magic
Shadow Blend: A shadow creature blends into the shadows, gaining concealment (20% miss chance).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每当你施放召唤怪物法术并召唤善良，恶的外围生物时，你也会以阴影生物模板召唤它。为了满足增强召唤专长的先决条件，以及任何将增强召唤列为先决条件的专长，这个启示都算作拥有法术专注（幻术）专长。 
阴影生物获得等于其命中骰子+6的法术抗性。它还会获得：
1 - 4 HD：对寒冷和电力的抗性为 5 
5 - 10 HD：对寒冷和电力的抗性为 10，DR 5/魔法 
11+ HD：对寒冷和电力的抗性为 15，DR 10/魔法 
阴影融合：阴影生物融入阴影之中，获得隐匿效果（20%失误几率）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Army of Darkness
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 黑暗军团

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your phantasmagoric displays accurately model the mysteries of the night sky, dumbfounding all who behold them. The spell DC of all Pattern spells are increased by 2, additionally you gain access to scintillating pattern as a 8th level spell. (You still need to be able to cast 8th level spells to cast scintillating pattern) 
Pattern spells: color spray, hypnotic pattern, rainbow pattern, scintillating pattern.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 您的幻象显示准确地模拟了夜空的秘示域，让所有看到它们的人都目瞪口呆。所有图纹法术的法术 DC 增加 2，另外你可以像 8 级法术一样使用闪光图纹。 （你仍然需要能够施展 8 级法术才能施展闪光图纹）图纹法术：七彩喷射、催眠图纹、虹彩图纹、闪光图纹。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Awesome Display
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 宏伟显现

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Beast Form (Wolf)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 野兽形态（狼）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Beast Form (Leopard)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 野兽形态（豹）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Beast Form (Bear)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 野兽形态（熊）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a large smilodon or a large wyvern.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你会变成一只大铁齿象或大狼獾。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Beast Form (Final)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 野兽形态（最终版）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Beast Form (Smilodon)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 野兽形态（剑齿虎）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Beast Form (Wyvern)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 野兽形态（狼獾）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can assume the form of a medium wolf, as beast shape I. At 9th level, you can assume the form of a medium leopard, as beast shape II. At 11th level, you can assume the form of a large bear, as beast shape II.At 13th level, you can assume the form of a large smilodon or a large wyvern, as beast shape IV. You can use this ability once per day, but the duration is 1 hour/level. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 9 级时，您可以变成中型狼之形，即野兽形态 I；11 级时，您可以变成大型熊的形态，即野兽形态 II。13 级时，您可以化身为大型铁齿兽或大型狼獾，野兽形态 IV。您每天可以使用一次此能力，但持续时间为 1 小时/等级。您必须至少达到 7 级才能选择此启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Form of the Beast
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 野兽之形

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You conjure a cloak of shadowy darkness that grants you a +4 armor bonus and a +2 circumstance bonus on Stealth checks. At 7th level, and every four levels thereafter, these bonuses increase by +2. You can use this cloak for 1 hour per day per oracle level. The duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-hour increments.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你能变出一件朦胧的黑暗斗篷，它能为你带来 +4 的护甲加成和 +2 的隐身检定环境加成。在七级时，以及之后的每四级，这些加成都会增加 +2。每一级先知者每天可以使用这件斗篷 1 小时。持续时间不需要连续，但必须以 1 小时为单位。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You conjure a cloak of shadowy darkness that grants you a +4 armor bonus and a +2 circumstance bonus on Stealth checks. At 7th level, and every four levels thereafter, these bonuses increase by +2. You can use this cloak for 1 hour per day per oracle level. The duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-hour increments.

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 黑暗外衣

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You conjure a coat of starry radiance that grants you a +4 armor bonus. At 7th level, and every four levels thereafter, this bonus increases by +2. At 13th level, this armor grants you DR 5/slashing. You can use this coat for 1 hour number of times per day equal to oracle level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你召唤出一件星光灿烂的外衣，使你获得 +4 盔甲加值。在第 7 级以及之后的每 4 级，该加值增加 +2。在第 13 级，这件盔甲使你获得 DR 5/挥砍。您可以使用此能力1小时，每天次数等于先知等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you can cause waves of cold to radiate from your body. This cold deals 1d6 points of cold damage per 2 oracle levels to all creatures within 10 feet. A successful Fortitude save halves the damage. In addition, a flurry of snow momentarily surrounds you, granting you 20% concealment until your next turn. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and every 5 levels thereafter.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 作为一个快速动作，你可以让寒冷的波浪从你的身体中散发出来。这种寒冷会对 10 英尺范围内的所有生物造成每 2 个先知等级 1d6 点的寒冷伤害。成功的强韧豁免会将伤害减半。此外，一阵雪花会瞬间包围你，让你获得 20% 的隐蔽效果，直到你的下一个回合。你每天可以使用一次此能力，5 级时每天增加一次，之后每 5 级增加一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A flurry of snow momentarily surrounds you, granting you 20% concealment until your next turn
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 雪花瞬间将你包围，使你获得 20% 的隐蔽效果，直至下一回合

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Cold Aura
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 寒冷光环

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you can cause waves of cold to radiate from your body. This cold deals 1d6 points of cold damage per 2 oracle levels to all creatures within 10 feet. A successful Fortitude save halves the damage. In addition, a flurry of snow momentarily surrounds you, granting you 20% concealment until your next turn. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and every 5 levels thereafter.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a move action, you can maneuver your weapon to create a shield of whirling steel around yourself until the start of your next turn; non-incorporeal melee and ranged attacks against you have a 20% miss chance while the shield is active. You must be wielding a metal weapon to use this ability.
Dance of the Blades

As a move action, you can maneuver your weapon to create a shield of whirling steel around yourself until the start of your next turn; non-incorporeal melee and ranged attacks against you have a 20% miss chance while the shield is active. You must be wielding a metal weapon to use this ability.
Dance of the Blades - Shield Buff
Dance of the Blades - Ability Holder

Your base speed increases by 10 feet. 
At 7th level, you gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls with a metal weapon in any round in which you move at least 10 feet. This bonus increases by +1 at 11th level, and every four levels thereafter. 
At 11th level, as a move action, you can maneuver your weapon to create a shield of whirling steel around yourself until the start of your next turn; non-incorporeal melee and ranged attacks against you have a 20% miss chance while the shield is active. You must be wielding a metal weapon to use this ability.
Dance of the Blades - Attack Buff

You learn the hidden secrets surrounding the casting of shadow spells. This revelation grants a 1st level shadow spell from the wizard spell list, at level 4 and every even level after, you may select another shadow spell that you are the appropriate level to cast (at level 4 you may pick up to 2nd level spells, level 6 3rd level spells, ect...). 
If this revelation is taken at a later level, spells are granted retroactively, with spells selected still being level appropriate.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
您学会了有关施放暗影法术的隐秘。这个启示可以从巫师法术列表中获得一个1级的暗影法术，在4级和之后的每一个偶数级，你都可以选择另一个相应等级的暗影法术（在4级你可以选择2级法术，6级3级法术，等等......）。
如果这个启示是在以后的等级中获得的，那么法术将被追溯授予，所选择的法术仍然与等级相适应。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 黑暗隐秘

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You gain resistance 5 to the acid energy damage, this can be chosen on future selection of the defy elements revelation to increase the effect to a maximum resistance of 20.
Defy Elements - Acid
You gain resistance 5 to the cold energy damage, this can be chosen on future selection of the defy elements revelation to increase the effect to a maximum resistance of 20.
Defy Elements - Cold
You gain resistance 5 to the electricity energy damage, this can be chosen on future selection of the defy elements revelation to increase the effect to a maximum resistance of 20.
Defy Elements - Electricity
You gain resistance 5 to the fire energy damage, this can be chosen on future selection of the defy elements revelation to increase the effect to a maximum resistance of 20.
Defy Elements - Fire
Defy Elements Res Handler

Choose one energy type (acid, cold, fire, electricity, or sonic). You gain resistance 5 to the selected energy type. At 5th level and every 5 levels thereafter, you can choose an additional energy type for which to gain resistance 5, or you can choose a previously chosen energy type and increase that resistance by 5 (to a maximum resistance of 20 for any one energy type).
Defy Elements
You gain resistance 5 to the sonic energy damage, this can be chosen on future selection of the defy elements revelation to increase the effect to a maximum resistance of 20.
Defy Elements - Sonic
As a standard action, you can utter a dire prophecy that strikes fear in enemies within 30 feet, causing them to become shaken until the end of your next round.
2 rounds
Doomsayer
Doomsayer - Once Per Round
Continue doomsaying as a move action, extending the effect an additional round on all enemies withing range.
Doomsayer - Extend

As a standard action, you can utter a dire prophecy that strikes fear in enemies within 30 feet, causing them to become shaken until the end of your next round. During a round you have not used this ability, you can continue doomsaying as a move action, extending the effect an additional round on all enemies withing range. This ability cannot cause a creature to become frightened or panicked, even if the target was already shaken from another effect; and for the purpose of immunities is a mind altering fear effect. 
At 15th level you may extend the shaken effect as a swift action instead. 
You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

This debuff has the same effect as being shaken, with the addition of being able to be extended by the doomsayers actions. 
Shaken
A shaken character takes a –2 penalty on attack rolls, saving throws, skill checks, and ability checks. Shaken is a less severe state of fear than frightened.
Doomsayers Prophecy
OracleRevelationDoomsayerSwiftExtend

Like the great dragons, you are not easily harmed by common means of attack. You gain acid resistance 5 and a +1 natural armor bonus. At 9th level, your acid resistance increases to 10 and your natural armor bonus increases to +2. At 15th level, your acid resistance increases to 20 and your natural armor bonus increases to +4.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 像巨龙一样，你不容易受到普通攻击的伤害。你获得 5 点酸蚀抗性和 +1 天生防御加值。在第 9 级，你的酸蚀抗性增加到 10，你的天生防御加值增加到 +2。在 15 级时，你的酸蚀抗性增加到 20，你的天生防御加值增加到 +4。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Resistances - Acid
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙之抗性——酸蚀

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This breath weapon deals 1d6 points of acid damage per 2 oracle levels you have (minimum 1d6)in a 30-foot cone. Those caught in the area of the breath receive a Reflex save for half damage. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 your oracle level + your Charisma modifier.After use this ability takes 1d4 rounds to recharge.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这种喷吐武器在 30 英尺锥形范围内造成 每 2 个先知等级（至少 1d6）1d6 点酸蚀伤害。那些处于吐息区域的人需要通过一个成功的反射豁免来使伤害减半。此豁免的 DC 等于 10 + 1/2 你的先知等级 + 你的魅力调整值。使用此能力后需要 1d4 轮才能恢复。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The primal power of dragonkind seethes within you. You gain a breath weapon. This breath weapon deals 1d6 points of damage of your energy type per 2 oracle levels you have (minimum 1d6; Reflex half ). The shape of the breath weapon is either a 30-foot cone or a 60- foot line, selected when choosing this revelation. You can use this ability once per day at 1st level, plus one additional time at 5th level and one additional time per day for every 5 levels beyond 5th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
龙类的原始力量在你体内沸腾。你获得喷吐武器。这件喷吐武器造成每 2 个先知等级 1d6 点与你选择的能量类型相同的伤害（至少 1d6；反射减半）。喷吐武器的形状是 30 英尺锥形或 60 英尺线形，在选择此启示时选择。你可以在 1 级每天使用一次此能力，
在 5 级时可以额外使用一次，在 5 级之后每 5 级每天可以额外使用一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dragon Breath Weapon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙息武器

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your senses take on a keen draconic edge. You gain a +2 bonus on Perception checks. At 5th level gain a blindsense of 30 feet allowing you to locate unseen foes. At 11th level gain the Blind Fight feat. At 15th level your Perception check bonus increases to +4.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的感官呈现出敏锐的龙类优势。你在察觉检定上获得 +2 加值。第 5 级时获得 30 英尺的盲感，让你能够定位看不见的敌人。 11 级时获得盲斗专长。在 15 级时，你的感知检定加值增加到 +4。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You fight with the fearsome talons of dragonkind. You can grow claws as a free action. These claws are treated as natural weapons, allowing you to make two claw attacks as a full attack using your full base attack bonus. Each of these attacks deals 1d4 points of damage plus your Strength modifier (1d3 if you are Small). At 5th level, these claws are considered magic weapons for the purpose of overcoming DR. At 7th level, the damage increases by one step to 1d6 points of damage (1d4 if you are Small). At 11th level, these claws deal an additional 1d6 points of acid damage on a successful hit. You can use your claws for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你可以使用龙类可怕的爪子战斗。你可以以自由动作长出爪子。这些爪子被视为天生武器，允许你使用你的全部基本攻击加值进行两次爪子攻击作为一次整轮攻击。这些攻击中的每一次都会造成 1d4 点加上你力量调整值的伤害（如果你是小型的，则为 1d3）。
在 5 级时，这些爪子在穿透伤害减免时被视为魔法武器。在第 7 级，伤害增加一级至 1d6 点伤害（如果你是小型的，则为 1d4）。在 11 级时，这些爪子在成功击中时会造成额外 1d6 点酸蚀伤害。你每天可以使用爪子的轮数等于 3 + 你的魅力调整值。这些轮次不需要是连续的。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You fight with the fearsome talons of dragonkind. You can grow claws as a free action. These claws are treated as natural weapons, allowing you to make two claw attacks as a full attack using your full base attack bonus. Each of these attacks deals 1d4 points of damage plus your Strength modifier (1d3 if you are Small). At 5th level, these claws are considered magic weapons for the purpose of overcoming DR. At 7th level, the damage increases by one step to 1d6 points of damage (1d4 if you are Small). At 11th level, these claws deal an additional 1d6 points of your chosen energy type on a successful hit. You can use your claws for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.

你可以使用龙类可怕的爪子战斗。你可以以自由动作长出爪子。这些爪子被视为天生武器，允许你使用你的全部基本攻击加值进行两次爪子攻击作为一次整轮攻击。这些攻击中的每一次都会造成 1d4 点加上你力量调整值的伤害（如果你是小型的，则为 1d3）。
在 5 级时，这些爪子在穿透伤害减免时被视为魔法武器。在第 7 级，伤害增加一级至 1d6 点伤害（如果你是小型的，则为 1d4）。在第 11 级，这些爪子在成功击中时额外造成 1d6 点你选择的能量类型。你每天可以使用爪子的轮数等于 3 + 你的魅力调整值。这些轮次不需要是连续的。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Talons of the Dragon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 巨龙之爪

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day as a standard action, you can cause the weapons around you to shatter in their wielders’ hands. When you use this ability, attempt a disarm combat maneuver against every creature in a 10-foot radius, using your caster level in place of your base attack bonus and your Charisma modifier in place of Strength. 
At 10th level, you can use this ability twice per day.
Dust to Dust

Once per day as a standard action, you can cause the weapons around you to shatter in their wielders’ hands. When you use this ability, attempt a disarm combat maneuver against every creature in a 10-foot radius, using your caster level in place of your base attack bonus and your Charisma modifier in place of Strength. 
At 10th level, you can use this ability twice per day.

Once per day, you cast your psyche into the void of space to attract the attention of a terrible otherworldly being. 
Phantasmal Killer: You create a phantasmal image of the most fearsome creature imaginable to the subject simply by forming the fears of the subject's subconscious mind into something that its conscious mind can visualize: this most horrible beast. Only the spell's subject can see the phantasmal killer. You see only a vague shape. The target first gets a Will save to recognize the image as unreal. If that save fails, the phantasm touches the subject, and the subject must succeed on a Fortitude save or die from fear. Even if the Fortitude save is successful, the subject takes 3d6 points of damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，你将你的心灵投入太空的虚空，以吸引一个可怕的异界生物的注意。
魅影杀手：通过将目标潜意识中的恐惧之物具象化，你将制造出该目标所能想象到的，最为骇人怪物的幻象。只有受{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}影响的生物才能看到此魅影杀手。你只能看到模糊的轮廓。目标生物首先要进行意志{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免{/g}以识破幻象。如果意志豁免失败，魅影会接触到目标，此时目标必须进行强韧豁免检定，若失败，则会死于恐惧。即使目标的强韧豁免成功，它仍要承受{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dweller in the Darkness - Phantasmal Killer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暗夜居者 - 魅影杀手

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, you cast your psyche into the void of space to attract the attention of a terrible otherworldly being. 
This spell functions like phantasmal killer, except it can affect more than one creature. Only the affected creatures see the phantasmal creatures attacking them, though you see the attackers as shadowy shapes. If a subject's Fortitude save succeeds, it still takes 3d6 points of damage and is stunned for 1 round. The subject also takes 1d4 points of Strength damage. 
Phantasmal Killer: You create a phantasmal image of the most fearsome creature imaginable to the subject simply by forming the fears of the subject's subconscious mind into something that its conscious mind can visualize: this most horrible beast. Only the spell's subject can see the phantasmal killer. You see only a vague shape. The target first gets a Will save to recognize the image as unreal. If that save fails, the phantasm touches the subject, and the subject must succeed on a Fortitude save or die from fear. Even if the Fortitude save is successful, the subject takes 3d6 points of damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，你将你的心灵投入太空的虚空，以吸引一个可怕的异界生物的注意。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}与魅影杀手类似，但能影响多个生物。即使你能看到朦胧的进攻者{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}廓，也只有受法术影响的生物才能真切看到{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}它们的魅影生物。
即使目标的强韧{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免{/g}成功，它仍要承受{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}，并震慑1轮。受术目标还会承受1d4点{g|Encyclopedia:Strength}力量{/g}伤害。
魅影杀手：通过将目标潜意识中的恐惧之物具象化，你将制造出该目标所能想象到的，最为骇人怪物的幻象。只有受法术影响的生物才能看到此魅影杀手。你只能看到模糊的轮廓。目标生物首先要进行意志豁免以识破幻象。如果意志豁免失败，魅影会接触到目标，此时目标必须进行强韧豁免检定，若失败，则会死于恐惧。即使目标的强韧豁免成功，它仍要承受3d6点伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dweller in the Darkness - Weird
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暗夜居者 - 诡影杀手

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day, you cast your psyche into the void of space to attract the attention of a terrible otherworldly being. The dweller in darkness behaves as if you had cast phantasmal killer. At 17th level, the dweller in darkness can be perceived by more than one creature, as if you had cast weird. You must be at least 11th level to choose this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，你将你的心灵投入太空的虚空，以吸引一个可怕的异界生物的注意。暗夜居者表现得就好像你施展了魅影杀手一样。在第 17 级，暗夜居者可以被不止一个生物感知，从而可以影响多个目标，就好像你施展了诡影杀手一样。你必须至少达到 11 级才能选择此启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dweller in the Darkness
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暗夜居者

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Whenever you cast a inflict spell, the maximum number damage dealt is based on your oracle level, not the limit based on the spell. For example, an 11th-level oracle of succor with this revelation may cast inflict light wounds to cause 1d8+11 hit points  of damage instead of the normal 1d8+5 maximum.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每当你施放造成伤害法术时，造成的最大伤害数量取决于你的先知等级，而不是基于法术的限制。例如，具有此启示的 11 级救助先知可以施展造成轻伤以造成 1d8+11 点生命值伤害，而不是正常的 1d8+5 最大值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Enhanced Inflictions
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 增强伤害

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a medium dragon-like creature. You gain a +4 size bonus to Strength, a +2 size bonus to Constitution, a +4 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a breath weapon, and resistance to one element. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (1d8), two claws (1d6), and two wing attacks (1d4). Your breath weapon and resistance depend on the type of your dragon prototype. You can only use the breath weapon once per casting of this spell. All breath weapons deal 6d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成了中型龙类生物。你在力量上获得 +4 体型加值，在体质上获得 +2 体型加值，在 AC 上获得 +4 形态天生防御加值，对困难地形免疫，喷吐武器和对一种元素的抵抗力。你的移动速度提高 10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬 (1d8)、两次爪抓 (1d6) 和两次翼击 (1d4)。你的喷吐武器和抗性取决于你的龙种的类型。每次施放此法术时，你只能使用一次喷吐武器。所有喷吐武器造成 6d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Oracles Form of the Dragon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 先知龙形

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a medium dragon-like creature. You gain a +4 size bonus to Strength, a +2 size bonus to Constitution, a +4 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a breath weapon, and resistance to one element. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (1d8), two claws (1d6), and two wing attacks (1d4). Your breath weapon and resistance depend on the type of your dragon prototype. You can only use the breath weapon once per casting of this spell. All breath weapons deal 6d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This spell functions as dragonkind I except that it also allows you to assume the form of a large dragon-like creature. You gain the following abilities: a +6 size bonus to Strength, a +4 size bonus to Constitution, a +6 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a breath weapon, damage reduction 5/magic, and resistance to one element. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (2d6), two claws (1d8), two wing attacks (1d6), and one tail slap attack (1d8). You can only use the breath weapon twice per casting of this spell (when you use it, the duration of your breath weapon ability is reduced by 1/2 caster level minutes), and you must wait 1d4 rounds between uses. All breath weapons deal 8d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage. Line breath weapons increase to 80-foot lines and cones increase to 40-foot cones.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这道法术的作用与龙形I 相同，只是它还允许你变成大型龙类生物的形态。你获得以下能力：力量+6体型加值，体质+4体型加值，AC+6形态天生防御加值，免疫困难地形，喷吐武器，伤害减免5/魔法，抵抗一种元素。你的移动速度提高 10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬（2d6）、两次爪抓（1d8）、两次翼击（1d6）和一次尾扫（1d8）。每次施展此法术你只能使用喷吐武器两次（当你使用它时，你的喷吐武器能力的持续时间减少 1/2 施法者等级分钟），并且你必须在两次使用之间等待 1d4 轮。所有喷吐武器造成 8d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。线型喷吐武器增加到 80 英尺，锥形增加到 40 英尺。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Oracles Form of the Dragon II
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 先知龙形 II

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This spell functions as dragonkind I except that it also allows you to assume the form of a large dragon-like creature. You gain the following abilities: a +6 size bonus to Strength, a +4 size bonus to Constitution, a +6 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a breath weapon, damage reduction 5/magic, and resistance to one element. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (2d6), two claws (1d8), two wing attacks (1d6), and one tail slap attack (1d8). You can only use the breath weapon twice per casting of this spell (when you use it, the duration of your breath weapon ability is reduced by 1/2 caster level minutes), and you must wait 1d4 rounds between uses. All breath weapons deal 8d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage. Line breath weapons increase to 80-foot lines and cones increase to 40-foot cones.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This spell functions as dragonkind II save that it also allows you to take the form of a huge dragon-like creature. You gain the following abilities: a +10 size bonus to Strength, a +8 size bonus to Constitution, a +8 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, blindsense with a range of 60 feet, a breath weapon, damage reduction 10/magic, frightful presence (DC equal to the DC for this spell), and immunity to one element. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (2d8), two claws (2d6), two wing attacks (1d8), and one tail slap attack (2d6). You can use the breath weapon as often as you like, but you must wait 1d4 rounds between uses. All breath weapons deal 12d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage. Line breath weapons increase to 100-foot lines and cones increase to 50-foot cones.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这个法术的作用与龙类 II 一样，除了它还允许你变成一个巨型的类龙生物的形式。你获得以下能力：力量+10体型加值，体质+8体型加值，AC+8体型天生防御加值，免疫困难地形，60英尺范围内的盲感，喷吐武器，伤害减少 10/魔法，可怖外表（DC 等于该法术的 DC），免疫一种元素。你的移动速度提高 10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬（2d8）、两次爪抓（2d6）、两次翼击（1d8）和一次尾扫（2d6）。你可以随心所欲地使用喷吐武器，但你必须在两次使用之间等待 1d4 轮。所有喷吐武器造成 12d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。线型喷吐武器增加到 100 英尺，锥形增加到 50 英尺。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your kinship with dragonkind allows you to take on the form of a dragon. As a standard action, you can assume the form of a Medium dragon, as per form of the dragon I. At 15th level, you can assume the form of a Large dragon, as per form of the dragon II. At 19th level, you can assume the form of a Huge dragon, as per form of the dragon III. You can use this ability once per day, but the duration is 10 minutes per oracle level. You must be at least 11th level to select this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 您与龙种的血缘关系使您化为龙形。以一个标准动作，你可以变成一条中型龙的形态，就像龙 I 的形态一样。在 15 级时，你可以变成一条大型龙的形态，就像龙 II 的形态。在第 19 级，你可以按照龙 III 的形态呈现巨龙的形态。你每天可以使用该能力一次，但持续时间为每个先知等级 10 分钟。您必须至少达到 11 级才能选择此启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you gain a natural weapon. The natural weapon lasts for a number of rounds equal to half your oracle level (minimum 1). You must choose a bite, claws, or gore attack. These attacks deal the normal damage for a creature of your size. At 5th level, your natural weapon gains a +1 enhancement bonus. This bonus increases by +1 at 10th, 15th, and 20th level. At 11th level, you gain two natural weapons at a time. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 作为一个快速动作，你会获得一件天生武器。天生武器的持续回合数等于你先知等级的一半（最少 1）。你必须选择咬、爪或撕裂攻击。这些攻击会造成与你体型相当的生物的正常伤害。5 级时，你的天生武器获得+1强化加成。该加成在 10 级、15 级和 20 级时增加 +1 。11 级时，您可以同时获得两把天生武器。您每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 您的魅力修正值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Gift of Claw and Horn
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 爪与角之力

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you gain a natural weapon. The natural weapon lasts for a number of rounds equal to half your oracle level (minimum 1). You must choose a bite, claws, or gore attack. These attacks deal the normal damage for a creature of your size. At 5th level, your natural weapon gains a +1 enhancement bonus. This bonus increases by +1 at 10th, 15th, and 20th level. At 11th level, you gain two natural weapons at a time. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Choose which weapon to receive when using the gift of claw and horn ability. This cannot be changed while gift of claw and horn is active. 
At 11th level the number of weapons able to be selected increases by 1.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
选择使用爪与角天赋能力时可获得的武器。爪与角之力处于激活状态时无法更改。
11级时，可选择的武器数量增加1。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Gift of Claw and Horn - Weapon Selection
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 爪与角之力 - 武器选择

LocalizedStrings.enGB: With this activated, the gift of claw and horn ability will grant a bite attack.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 激活后，爪角天赋能力将赋予咬合攻击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Gift of Claw and Horn - Bite
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 爪与角之力--撕咬

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Giftof CandH - Bite buff
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 爪与角之力 - 撕咬buff

LocalizedStrings.enGB: With this activated, the gift of claw and horn ability will grant claw attacks while unarmed.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 激活后，爪角天赋能力将在徒手攻击时赋予爪子攻击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Gift of Claw and Horn - Claws
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 爪与角之力 - 爪子

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Giftof CandH - Claws buff
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 爪与角之力 - 爪子buff

LocalizedStrings.enGB: With this activated, the gift of claw and horn ability will grant a gore attack.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 激活后，爪与角之力将赋予一次抵撞攻击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Gift of Claw and Horn - Gore
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 爪与角之力 - 抵撞

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Giftof CandH - Gore buff
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 爪与角之力 - 抵撞buff

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 11th level, you may select two natural weapons at a time.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 11 级时，你可以同时选择两种天生武器。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Double Natural Weapon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 双天然武器

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You tap into the unthinkable void between the stars and cause a single living creature within 30 feet to become confused for 1 round. A successful Will save negates the effect. This is a mind-affecting compulsion effect. At 7th level, the confusion lasts for a number of rounds equal to your oracle level. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 您会进入星际间难以想象的虚空，使 30 英尺范围内的单个生物陷入迷惑，持续 1 个回合。成功的意志豁免会抵消该效果。这是一种影响心智的蛊惑效果。七级时，迷惑持续的回合数等于你的先知等级。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 你的魅力修正值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Gift of Madness
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 疯狂之力

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You tap into the unthinkable void between the stars and cause a single living creature within 30 feet to become confused for 1 round. A successful Will save negates the effect. This is a mind-affecting compulsion effect. At 7th level, the confusion lasts for a number of rounds equal to your oracle level. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 您会进入星际间难以想象的虚空，使 30 英尺范围内的单个生物陷入迷惑，持续 1 个回合。成功的意志豁免会抵消该效果。这是一种影响心智的蛊惑效果。七级时，迷惑持续的回合数等于你的先知等级。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 你的魅力修正值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stars themselves hold many answers, you may add your Charisma modifier to your Wisdom modifier on all Wisdom-based checks. In addition, once per day you can cast one spell from the oracle spellbook as if it were modified by the Empower Spell or Extend Spell feat without increasing the spell’s casting time or level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星辰蕴含着许多秘示域，你可以在所有基于感知的检查中将您的魅力调整值添加到你的感知调整值。此外，每天一次，你可以从先知法术书中施展一个法术，就好像它应用了法术强效或法术延时专长，但不会增加法术的施法时间或环位。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day you can cast one spell from the oracle spellbook as if it were modified by the Empower Spell or Extend Spell feat without increasing the spell’s casting time or level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，你可以从先知法术书中施展一个法术，就好像它应用了法术强效或法术延时专长，但不会增加法术的施法时间或环位。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 群星引导

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Guiding Star - Skill Bonus
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 群星引导 - 技能加值

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You call upon the frigid depths of outer space to bring a terrible chill to your enemies. As a standard action, one target within 30 feet is cloaked in the void and takes 1d6 points of cold damage per level. A successful Fortitude save halves this damage. At 10th level, the interstellar void is so extreme that enemies who fail their saving throw are fatigued. At 15th level, creatures who fail their save are exhausted and stunned for 1 round. You can use this ability once per day plus one additional time per day at 10th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你呼唤深空的极寒给你的敌人带来可怕的寒冷。以一个标准动作，将30 英尺范围内的一个目标遮蔽在虚空中，并受到每等级 1d6 点寒冷伤害。一次成功的强韧豁免可使该伤害减半。在第 10 级，星际虚空极端寒冷，以至于豁免失败的敌人会感到疲劳。在 15 级时，豁免失败的生物将力竭并昏迷 1 轮。你每天可以使用此能力一次，在 10 级时每天可以额外使用一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Interstellar Void
Interstallar Void
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 寒宙虚空

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You call upon the frigid depths of outer space to bring a terrible chill to your enemies. As a standard action, one target within 30 feet is cloaked in the void and takes 1d6 points of cold damage per level. A successful Fortitude save halves this damage. At 10th level, the interstellar void is so extreme that enemies who fail their saving throw are fatigued. At 15th level, creatures who fail their save are exhausted and stunned for 1 round. You can use this ability once per day plus one additional time per day at 10th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你呼唤深空的极寒给你的敌人带来可怕的寒冷。以一个标准动作，将30 英尺范围内的一个目标遮蔽在虚空中，并受到每等级 1d6 点寒冷伤害。一次成功的强韧豁免可使该伤害减半。在第 10 级，星际虚空极端寒冷，以至于豁免失败的敌人会感到疲劳。在 15 级时，豁免失败的生物将力竭并昏迷 1 轮。你每天可以使用此能力一次，在 10 级时每天可以额外使用一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You call upon the frigid depths of outer space to bring a terrible chill to your enemies. As a standard action, one target within 30 feet is cloaked in the void and takes 1d6 points of cold damage per level. A successful Fortitude save halves this damage. At 10th level, the interstellar void is so extreme that enemies who fail their saving throw are fatigued. At 15th level, creatures who fail their save are exhausted and stunned for 1 round. You can use this ability once per day plus one additional time per day at 10th level.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You gain a +1 bonus on Fortitude saves. At 7th level, and again at 14th level, this bonus increases by +1.
Iron Constitution

Once per day, your skin hardens and takes on the appearance of iron, granting you DR 10/adamantine. This ability functions as stoneskin, using your oracle level as the caster level, except it only affects you. At 15th level, you can use this ability twice per day. 
Stoneskin 
The warded creature gains resistance to blows, cuts, stabs, and slashes. The subject gains DR 10/adamantine, for 10 minutes per caster level. It ignores the first 10 points of damage each time it takes damage from a weapon, though an adamantine weapon overcomes the reduction. Once the spell has prevented a total of 10 points of damage per caster level (maximum 150 points), it is discharged.

You can imbue held weapons made mostly of metal, while enchanted the weapons are considered made of cold iron. At 7th level, 15th level, and 19th level, the weapon gains a +1 enhancement bonus. At 11th level, the weapon is considered made of adamantine. This effect lasts a number of minutes equal to your oracle level. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

Once per day, you can turn a creature into wood. As a standard action, you may direct your gaze against a single creature within 30 feet. The targeted creature must make a Fortitude save or turn into a mindless, inert statue made out of wood for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your oracle level. This ability otherwise functions as a flesh to stone spell, except the target turns to wood instead of stone. This can be reversed by any effect that can reverse flesh to stone.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，你可以将一个生物变成木头。作为标准动作，你可以将目光投向 30 英尺范围内的一个生物。目标生物必须进行强韧豁免，否则就会在相当于你的先知等级 1/2 的回合内变成一尊无意识、无生命力的木头雕像。除了目标变成木头而不是石头之外，此能力的其他功能与肉身变石头的法术相同。这可以被任何可以将肉体转化为石头的效果逆转。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day, you can turn a creature into wood. As a standard action, you may direct your gaze against a single creature within 30 feet. The targeted creature must make a Fortitude save or turn into a mindless, inert statue made out of wood for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your oracle level. This ability otherwise functions as a flesh to stone spell, except the target turns to wood instead of stone. This can be reversed by any effect that can reverse flesh to stone.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，你可以将一个生物变成木头。作为标准动作，你可以将目光投向 30 英尺范围内的一个生物。目标生物必须进行强韧豁免，否则就会在相当于你的先知等级 1/2 的回合内变成一尊无意识、无生命力的木头雕像。除了目标变成木头而不是石头之外，此能力的其他功能与肉身变石头的法术相同。这可以被任何可以将肉体转化为石头的效果逆转。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lignification
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 木质化

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day, you can turn a creature into wood. As a standard action, you may direct your gaze against a single creature within 30 feet. The targeted creature must make a Fortitude save or turn into a mindless, inert statue made out of wood for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your oracle level. This ability otherwise functions as a flesh to stone spell, except the target turns to wood instead of stone. This can be reversed by any effect that can reverse flesh to stone. At 15th level, you can use this ability twice per day. You must be at least 11th level to select this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，你可以将一个生物变成木头。作为标准动作，你可以将目光投向 30 英尺范围内的一个生物。目标生物必须进行强韧豁免，否则就会在相当于你的先知等级 1/2 的回合内变成一尊无意识、无生命力的木头雕像。除了目标变成木头而不是石头之外，此能力的其他功能与肉身变石头的法术相同。这可以被任何可以将肉体转化为石头的效果逆转。15 级时，你每天可以使用此能力两次。您必须至少达到 11 级才能选择此启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your connection to the skies above is so strong that your feet barely touch the ground. At 1st level, you no longer leave tracks gaining a +1 to stealth. At 5th level, you can hover up to 6 inches above the ground, avoiding difficult terrain. At 10th level you gain the ability to fly along the ground, gaining a +3 dodge bonus to AC against melee attacks, for a number of minutes per day equal to your oracle level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你与天空的联系如此强烈，以至于你的脚几乎不需要接触地面。在第 1 级，你不再留下踪迹获得 +1 隐匿。在第 5 级，你可以悬停在离地面最多 6 英寸的地方，避开困难地形。在第 10 级，你获得沿地面飞行的能力，在对抗近战攻击时 AC 获得 +3 闪避加值，每天的持续时间等同于你的先知等级。此持续时间不需要连续，但每次使用至少1分钟。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lure of the Heavens
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 苍穹诱惑

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can fire a ray of moonlight as a ranged touch attack at any creature within 30 feet. This ray deals 1d6 points of damage + 1 for every 2 oracle levels you possess. In addition, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save or become blinded for 1 round. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以向 30 英尺范围内的任何生物发射一束月光作为范围触碰攻击。这束光线会造成 1d6 点伤害 + 你每拥有 2 个先知等级就会造成 1 点伤害。此外，目标必须在强韧豁免中成功，否则会失明 1 回合。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于你的魅力修正值（最少 1 次）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Moonbeam
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 月光

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Fortitude negates (blindness)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 强韧免疫（失明）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can fire a ray of moonlight as a ranged touch attack at any creature within 30 feet. This ray deals 1d6 points of damage + 1 for every 2 oracle levels you possess. In addition, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save or become blinded for 1 round. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以向 30 英尺范围内的任何生物发射一束月光作为范围触碰攻击。这束光线会造成 1d6 点伤害 + 你每拥有 2 个先知等级就会造成 1 点伤害。此外，目标必须在强韧豁免中成功，否则会失明 1 回合。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于你的魅力修正值（最少 1 次）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day as a swift action, you can channel the energy of the apocalypse into your body, causing you to ignite. You take 1d4 points of fire damage when you activate this ability and again at the beginning of your turn until you end the effect. Any creature that begins the next round adjacent to you takes 1d6 points of fire damage as the fire spreads, plus 1 additional point of fire damage for each previous round you have had this ability active. For example, adjacent creatures take 1d6+5 points of damage if you have had this ability active for 5 rounds. You can use this ability each time for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your oracle level, and you can end this ability as a free action. At 5th level and every 5 levels thereafter, you can use this ability one additional time per day.
1 round/2 levels, unless ended by caster

You take 1d4 points of fire damage when you activate this ability and again at the beginning of your turn until you end the effect. Any creature that begins the next round adjacent to you takes 1d6 points of fire damage as the fire spreads, plus 1 additional point of fire damage for each previous round you have had this ability active. For example, adjacent creatures take 1d6+5 points of damage if you have had this ability active for 5 rounds. You can end this ability early as a free action.
Pass the Torch

For example, adjacent creatures take 1d6+5 points of damage if you have had this ability active for 5 rounds. You can use this ability each time for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your oracle level, and you can end this ability as a free action. At 5th level and every 5 levels thereafter, you can use this ability one additional time per day.

Any creature that begins the next round adjacent to you takes 1d6 points of fire damage as the fire spreads, plus 1 additional point of fire damage for each previous round you have had this ability active. Pass the Torch - Pulse
You may end the effect of pass the torch early by removing the buff as a free action.
Pass the Torch - Early Remove
Pass the Torch - Round Token

You can effortlessly give aid to your allies, whether that means providing them with help attacking or defending them in the heat of combat. Whenever you use the aid another action to inflict a penalty on attack rolls or to AC against one of your allies, the penalty you inflict increases by 1. This bonus increases by 1 at 4th level and every 5 oracle levels thereafter (to a maximum of -5 at 19th level). It doesn’t stack with other feats or class features that improve the bonus you provide when using the aid another action. This revelation also counts as the Combat Expertise feat, but only for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of the Swift Aid feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以毫不费力地为你的盟友提供帮助，无论是帮助他们在激烈的战斗中攻击还是保护他们。每当你使用援助动作对你的一个盟友带来攻击检定或 AC 加值时，加值增加 1。此加值在第 4 级和此后每 5 个先知等级增加 1（最多-5 在 19 级）。它不与其他专长或职业特性叠加，这些专长或职业特性可以提高您在使用援助动作时提供的加值。这个启示也算作战斗专家专长，但只是为了满足快速援助专长的先决条件。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Perfect Aid
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 完美援助

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The shadows step aside from your baleful gaze, affording you sight in even the deepest darkness. Gain blindsight with a range of 15 feet.
At 11th level the range increases to 30 feet.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
阴影从你邪恶的目光中退开，让你在最深的黑暗中也能看见。获得范围为 15 英尺的百叶窗视力。
11 级时，范围增加到 30 英尺。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Pierce the Shadows
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 刺破阴影

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Those who would oppose you must overcome their fear of dragons or be struck with terror at your draconic majesty. As a swift action, you can manifest an aura of draconic might around yourself. Enemies within 30 feet who can see you when you activate this ability must attempt a Will save. Success means that the creature is immune to this ability for the following 24 hours. On a failed save, the opponent is shaken for 2d6 rounds. This is a mind-affecting fear effect. You can use this ability once per day at 1st level, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and for every 5 levels beyond 5th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 那些反对你的人必须克服他们对龙的恐惧，否则就会对你龙威感到恐惧。以一个迅捷动作，你可以在自己周围展现出一股龙威。当你激活此能力时，30 英尺内能看到你的敌人必须尝试进行意志豁免。成功意味着该生物在接下来的 24 小时内免疫此能力。如果豁免失败，会被震慑 2d6 轮。这是一种影响心灵的恐惧效果。你可以在第 1 级每天使用一次此能力，在第 5 级每天以及在第 5 级以后每 5 级额外使用一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Those who would oppose you must overcome their fear of dragons or be struck with terror at your draconic majesty. As a swift action, you can manifest an aura of draconic might around yourself. Enemies within 30 feet who can see you when you activate this ability must attempt a Will save. Success means that the creature is immune to this ability for the following 24 hours. On a failed save, the opponent is shaken for 2d6 rounds. This is a mind-affecting fear effect. You can use this ability once per day at 1st level, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and for every 5 levels beyond 5th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 那些反对你的人必须克服他们对龙的恐惧，否则就会对你龙威感到恐惧。以一个迅捷动作，你可以在自己周围展现出一股龙威。当你激活此能力时，30 英尺内能看到你的敌人必须尝试进行意志豁免。成功意味着该生物在接下来的 24 小时内免疫此能力。如果豁免失败，会被震慑 2d6 轮。这是一种影响心灵的恐惧效果。你可以在第 1 级每天使用一次此能力，在第 5 级每天以及在第 5 级以后每 5 级额外使用一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Presence of Dragons
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙威

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Succeeding the Will saving throw of Presence of Dragons had caused this creature to be immune to the ability for 24 hours.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 成功通过龙威的意志豁免使该生物在 24 小时内免疫该能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Presence of Dragons Immunity
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙威免疫

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You gain the service of a faithful animal of the night. You can select from a bear, boar, smilodon, spider, velociraptor, or wolf. This animal functions as a druid’s animal companion, using your oracle level as your effective druid level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 您可以获得一只忠实的夜行动物的服务。您可以选择熊、野猪、剑齿虎、蜘蛛、迅猛龙或狼。这种动物可以作为德鲁伊的动物伙伴，以你的先知等级作为德鲁伊的有效等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Primal Companion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 原始伙伴

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You are so in tune with your primal nature that your instincts often act to save you from danger that your civilized mind isn’t even aware of. You may use your Charisma modifier (instead of your Dexterity modifier) as part of your Armor Class and all Reflex saving throws. Your armor’s maximum Dexterity bonus applies to your Charisma, instead.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你与自己的原始天性如此契合，以至于你的本能常常能将你从危险中解救出来，而你的文明意识却还没有意识到这一点。您可以使用魅力修正值（而不是敏捷修正值）作为护甲等级和所有反射豁免的一部分。您护甲的最大敏捷加成适用于您的魅力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Prophetic Armor
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 先知盔甲

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can manifest the scaly toughness of dragonkind. Once per day as a swift action you can harden your skin, granting you DR 10/magic. During this time, you are also immune to paralysis and sleep effects. This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your oracle level. At 13th level, you can use this ability twice per day. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以表现出龙鳞般的强韧。每天一次，以一个迅捷动作，你可以硬化你的皮肤，给予你 10 点DR/魔法。在此期间，您也对麻痹和睡眠效果免疫。这个效果持续的轮数等于你的先知等级。第 13 级时，你每天可以使用此能力两次。您必须至少达到 7 级才能选择此启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can manifest the scaly toughness of dragonkind. Once per day as a swift action you can harden your skin, granting you DR 10/magic. During this time, you are also immune to paralysis and sleep effects. This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your oracle level. At 13th level, you can use this ability twice per day. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以表现出龙鳞般的强韧。每天一次，以一个迅捷动作，你可以硬化你的皮肤，给予你 10 点DR/魔法。在此期间，您也对麻痹和睡眠效果免疫。这个效果持续的轮数等于你的先知等级。第 13 级时，你每天可以使用此能力两次。您必须至少达到 7 级才能选择此启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can manifest the scaly toughness of dragonkind. Once per day as a swift action you can harden your skin, granting you DR 10/magic. During this time, you are also immune to paralysis and sleep effects. This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your oracle level. At 13th level, you can use this ability twice per day. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以表现出龙鳞般的强韧。每天一次，以一个迅捷动作，你可以硬化你的皮肤，给予你 10 点DR/魔法。在此期间，您也对麻痹和睡眠效果免疫。这个效果持续的轮数等于你的先知等级。第 13 级时，你每天可以使用此能力两次。您必须至少达到 7 级才能选择此启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Scaled Toughness
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙鳞韧性

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a full-round action, you can summon a single blizzard elemental to serve you. At 7th level, you can summon a Medium blizzard elemental. At 11th level, you can summon a Huge blizzard elemental. At 15th level, you can summon an elder blizzard elemental. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 15th level. The blizzard elemental serves you for one full day, unless dismissed or another is summoned. You must be at least 7th level before selecting this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 作为一个全回合行动，你可以召唤一个暴风雪元素为你服务。七级时，你可以召唤一个中型暴风雪元素。11 级时，你可以召唤一个巨型暴风雪元素。15 级时，您可以召唤一个长老暴风雪元素。每天可以使用一次，15 级时每天增加一次。暴风雪元素会为你服务一整天，除非被驱散或召唤出另一个。在选择此启示之前，你必须至少达到 7 级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: 1 day
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1 天

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Servant of Winter
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 冬天的仆人

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Whenever you cast an illusion spell from the shadow subschool, increase the strength of such spells by 1% per oracle level you have. You must be at least 7th level to choose this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每当你施放暗影子学派的幻象法术时，你所拥有的先知等级每提高 1%，幻象法术的强度就提高 1%。你必须至少达到七级才能选择这个启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shadow Mastery
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 影子大师

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can surround an ally with bolstering energies that supplement its health and grant it extra vigor. With a touch from you (a standard action), one creature gains a ward of restorative energy, granting it a number of temporary hit points equal to your Charisma bonus + 1d6 per 2 oracle levels you have (maximum 10d6). These temporary hit points last 1 minute per oracle level you have. You can use this revelation once per day, plus one additional time at 11th and 19th levels. You must be at least 3rd level before selecting this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以用增强的能量包围盟友，以补充它的生命值并赋予其额外的活力。通过你的一次接触（一个标准动作），一个生物获得一层恢复能量，给予它等于你的魅力加值+ 1d6的临时生命值(最多10d6)。这些临时生命值持续 1 分钟，你拥有每个先知等级。你每天可以使用此启示一次，并在第 11 级和第 19 级时额外使用一次。在选择此启示之前，你必须至少达到 3 级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can surround an ally with bolstering energies that supplement its health and grant it extra vigor. With a touch from you (a standard action), one creature gains a ward of restorative energy, granting it a number of temporary hit points equal to your Charisma bonus + 1d6 per 2 oracle levels you have (maximum 10d6). These temporary hit points last 1 minute per oracle level you have. You can use this revelation once per day, plus one additional time at 11th and 19th levels. You must be at least 3rd level before selecting this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以用增强的能量包围盟友，以补充它的生命值并赋予其额外的活力。通过你的一次接触（一个标准动作），一个生物获得一层恢复能量，给予它等于你的魅力加值+ 1d6的临时生命值(最多10d6)。这些临时生命值持续 1 分钟，你拥有每个先知等级。你每天可以使用此启示一次，并在第 11 级和第 19 级时额外使用一次。在选择此启示之前，你必须至少达到 3 级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can surround an ally with bolstering energies that supplement its health and grant it extra vigor. With a touch from you (a standard action), one creature gains a ward of restorative energy, granting it a number of temporary hit points equal to your Charisma bonus + 1d6 per 2 oracle levels you have (maximum 10d6). These temporary hit points last 1 minute per oracle level you have.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以用增强的能量包围盟友，以补充它的生命值并赋予其额外的活力。通过你的一次接触（一个标准动作），一个生物获得一层恢复能量，给予它等于你的魅力加值+ 1d6的临时生命值(最多10d6)。这些临时生命值持续 1 分钟，你拥有每个先知等级。你每天可以使用此启示一次，并在第 11 级和第 19 级时额外使用一次。在选择此启示之前，你必须至少达到 3 级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shell of Succor
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 救助之盾

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You gain proficiency in all martial weapons and heavy armor.
Skill at Arms

As a swift action empower your ray spells for 1 minute, whenever you confirm a critical hit against an opponent with a ranged touch attack spell, you immediately attempt to bull rush your opponent away from you. You don’t provoke an attack of opportunity for this bull rush attempt.

As a swift action empower your ray spells for 1 minute, whenever you confirm a critical hit against an opponent with a ranged touch attack spell, you immediately attempt to bull rush your opponent away from you. You don’t provoke an attack of opportunity for this bull rush attempt.
Spell Blast

As a swift action empower your ray spells for 1 minute, whenever you confirm a critical hit against an opponent with a ranged touch attack spell, you immediately attempt to bull rush your opponent away from you. You don’t provoke an attack of opportunity for this bull rush attempt.

As a standard action, you can unleash a ball of energy that explodes in a 5-foot radius burst dealing 1d4 points of fire damage per level. A successful Reflex save halves this damage. You can fire one explosive ball per day, plus one additional ball per day at 5th level and for every 5 levels thereafter. You can fire more than one ball at a time, but creatures caught inside more than one explosion per round only take damage once. 
Other energy balls shot by this ability are used with the "Free Action" version of this ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
以一个标准动作，你可以释放一个能量球，在 5 英尺半径范围内爆炸，造成每等级 1d4 点火焰伤害。成功的反射豁免可使此伤害减半。您每天可以发射一个能量球，在第 5 级和之后的每 5 级每天可以额外发射一次。您一次可以发射多个，但每轮陷入不止一次爆炸的生物只会受到一次伤害。
此能力射出的其他能量球与此能力的“自由动作”版本相同。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Reflex partial
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 反射 部分

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action, you can unleash a ball of energy that explodes in a 5-foot radius burst dealing 1d4 points of fire damage per level. A successful Reflex save halves this damage. This attack has a range of 60 feet. You can fire one explosive ball per day, plus one additional ball per day at 5th level and for every 5 levels thereafter. You can fire more than one ball at a time, but creatures caught inside more than one simultaneous explosions only take damage once.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个标准动作，你可以释放一个能量球，在 5 英尺半径范围内爆炸，造成每等级 1d4 点火焰伤害。成功的反射豁免可使此伤害减半。您每天可以发射一个能量球，在第 5 级和之后的每 5 级每天可以额外发射一次。您一次可以发射多个，但每轮陷入不止一次爆炸的生物只会受到一次伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
As a free action, you can unleash a ball of energy that explodes in a 5-foot radius burst dealing 1d4 points of fire damage per level. A successful Reflex save halves this damage. You can fire one explosive ball per day, plus one additional ball per day at 5th level and for every 5 levels thereafter. You can fire more than one ball at a time, but creatures caught inside more than one explosion per round only take damage once. 
Using spray of shooting stars - free action requires using the standard version at least once in the same round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
以一个自由动作，你可以释放一个能量球，在 5 英尺半径范围内爆炸，造成每等级 1d4 点火焰伤害。成功的反射豁免可使此伤害减半。你每天可以发射一个能量球，在第 5 级和之后每 5 级每天可以发射一个额外的球。您一次可以发射多个球，但每轮陷入不止一次爆炸的生物只会受到一次伤害。
使用流星飞射 - 自由动作需要在同一回合中至少使用一次标准版本。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spray of Shooting Stars - Free Action
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 流星飞射 - 自由动作

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You may use spray of shooting stars as a free action this round as many times as you wish, until you run out of daily uses. Unused uses of this ability will be available next round if not used.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以在本轮中以一个自由动作多次使用流星飞射，直到你用完每日使用次数。如果未使用，则下一轮可以使用剩下的次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spray of Shooting Stars
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 流星飞射

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You gain Skill Focus (Stealth). 
At 8th level, you gain the fast stealth talent, allowing you to move at full speed while stealthed. 
At 16th level, you gain the hide in plain sight assassin class feature. 
 An assassin can use the Stealth skill even while being observed. An assassin can hide himself from view in the open without having anything to actually hide behind.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你获得技能专注（隐身）。
8级时，你获得快速隐身天赋，允许你在隐身状态下全速前进。
16级时，你获得隐匿刺客类特性。
即使在被观察的情况下，刺客也能使用隐身技能。
刺客可以在空旷的地方隐藏自己，而不需要任何实际的藏身之处。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stealth Mastery
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 隐身术

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You are an immaculate team player and can distribute your team-based insights to your allies with a touch. You can touch an ally as a standard action to confer upon it the benefits of any one teamwork feat that you have. This effect persists for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your oracle level (minimum 1). You can confer the benefits of a teamwork feat you have a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你是一个完美的团队合作者，可以通过触摸将你基于团队的见解分享给你的盟友。你可以以一个标准动作接触一个盟友，以赋予它你拥有的任何一项团队合作专长的好处。此效果持续的轮数等于你的先知等级的 1/2（最少 1 轮）。你每天可以授予团队合作专长的次数等于 3 + 你的魅力调整值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: 1 minute/2 levels
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1分钟/2级

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Teamwork Mastery
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 团队合作精通

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You are an immaculate team player and can distribute your team-based insights to your allies with a touch. This revelation grants you a bonus teamwork feat. You must meet the teamwork feat’s prerequisites, if any. Additionally, you can touch an ally as a standard action to confer upon it the benefits of any one teamwork feat that you have. This effect persists for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your oracle level (minimum 1). You can confer the benefits of a teamwork feat you have a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你是一个完美的团队合作者，可以通过触摸将你基于团队的见解分享给你的盟友。你可以以一个标准动作接触一个盟友，以赋予它你拥有的任何一项团队合作专长的好处。此效果持续的轮数等于你的先知等级的 1/2（最少 1 轮）。你每天可以授予团队合作专长的次数等于 3 + 你的魅力调整值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you can cause sharp splinters of wood to explode outward from your body. These splinters deal 1d6 points of piercing damage per two oracle levels (minimum 1d6) to all creatures within a 10-foot burst. A Reflex save halves this damage. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and every five levels thereafter.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 作为一个快速动作，你可以使尖锐的木片从你的身体向外爆炸。这些木片会对 10 英尺范围内的所有生物造成每两个先知等级 1d6 点的穿刺伤害（最少 1d6）。反射豁免会使伤害减半。您每天可以使用一次此能力，在 5 级时每天增加一次，之后每 5 级增加一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Thorn Burst
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 荆棘爆发

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you can cause sharp splinters of wood to explode outward from your body. These splinters deal 1d6 points of piercing damage per two oracle levels (minimum 1d6) to all creatures within a 10-foot burst. A Reflex save halves this damage. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and every five levels thereafter.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 作为一个快速动作，你可以使尖锐的木片从你的身体向外爆炸。这些木片会对 10 英尺范围内的所有生物造成每两个先知等级 1d6 点的穿刺伤害（最少 1d6）。反射豁免会使伤害减半。您每天可以使用一次此能力，在 5 级时每天增加一次，之后每 5 级增加一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Cure spells are potentially more effective but entirely in the target’s mind. As a free action you may spend a spell slot, the next cure spell you cast this round of the same level will also grant temporary hit points equal to 1d4 + 1 for each d8 that would normally be healed by the spell. Hit points healed this way expire after a number of minutes equal to half your oracle level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 治愈法术可能更有效，但完全取决于目标的意念。作为一个自由行动，你可以花费一个法术槽，在本回合施放的下一个相同等级的治愈法术中，也会给予相当于 1d4 + 1 的临时生命，每个 d8 通常会被该法术治愈。以这种方式治愈的生命会在几分钟后失效，失效时间等于你先知等级的一半。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Touch of the Moon - Cure
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 触摸月亮 - 治疗

LocalizedStrings.enGB: When you cast inflict spells, these spells carry with them the taint of madness. Subjects who take damage from your inflict spells are also subject to confusion, as the spell, except the duration of this effect is a number of rounds equal to the level of the inflict spell. The save DC against this effect is 10 + 1/2 your oracle level + your Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当您施放伤害法术时，这些法术会带有疯狂的吐息。受到你的施法伤害的人也会受到混乱的影响，就像施法一样，只是这个效果的持续时间等于施法等级的回合数。对抗此效果的豁免DC是10+你的先知等级的1/2+你的魅力修正值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Touch of the Moon - Inflict
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 月亮之触 - 影响

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The exact effects of this revelation depend on whether you cast inflict or cure spells. 
If you cast inflict spells, these spells carry with them the taint of madness. Subjects who take damage from your inflict spells are also subject to confusion, as the spell, except the duration of this effect is a number of rounds equal to the level of the inflict spell. The save DC against this effect is 10 + 1/2 your oracle level + your Charisma modifier. 
Alternatively, if you cast cure spells, these spells are potentially more effective but entirely in the target’s mind. As a free action you may spend a spell slot, the next cure spell you cast this round of the same level will also grant temporary hit points equal to 1d4 + 1 for each d8 that would normally be healed by the spell. Hit points healed this way expire after a number of minutes equal to half your oracle level. 
You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
这个启示的具体效果取决于你施放的是伤害法术还是治愈法术。
如果你施放的是伤害法术，那么这些法术会带有疯狂的污点。受到您施放的 "伤害 "法术伤害的受试者也会受到混乱的影响，与 "伤害 "法术一样，但该影响的持续时间等于 "伤害 "法术的等级。对抗此效果的豁免DC是10+你的先知等级的1/2+你的魅力修正值。
另外，如果你施放治愈法术，这些法术可能会更有效，但完全是在目标的脑海中。作为一个自由行动，你可以花费一个法术槽，你在本回合施放的下一个相同等级的治愈法术也会给予相当于1d4+1的临时生命，每d8点数通常会被法术治愈。以这种方式治愈的生命会在相当于你先知等级一半的分钟后失效。
你必须至少达到7级才能选择这个启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Touch of the Moon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 触摸月亮

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action, you can perform a melee touch attack that deals 1d6 points of cold damage + 1 point for every two oracle levels you possess. At 7th level, the touched creature must also make a Fortitude saving throw or be fatigued for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your oracle level. This has no effect on a creature that is already fatigued. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 作为标准动作，你可以进行一次近战触碰攻击，造成 1d6 点寒冷伤害 + 你每拥有两个先知等级就会造成 1 点伤害。在七级时，被触碰的生物还必须进行一次强韧检定，否则会在相当于你先知等级 1/2 的回合内疲劳。这对已经疲劳的生物没有影响。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 你的魅力修正值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Touch of the Void
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 虚空之触

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action, you can perform a melee touch attack that deals 1d6 points of cold damage + 1 point for every two oracle levels you possess. At 7th level, the touched creature must also make a Fortitude saving throw or be fatigued for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your oracle level. This has no effect on a creature that is already fatigued. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 作为标准动作，你可以进行一次近战触碰攻击，造成 1d6 点寒冷伤害 + 你每拥有两个先知等级就会造成 1 点伤害。在七级时，被触碰的生物还必须进行一次强韧检定，否则会在相当于你先知等级 1/2 的回合内疲劳。这对已经疲劳的生物没有影响。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 你的魅力修正值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action, you can perform a melee touch attack that deals 1d6 points of cold damage + 1 point for every two oracle levels you possess. At 7th level, the touched creature must also make a Fortitude saving throw or be fatigued for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your oracle level. This has no effect on a creature that is already fatigued. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 作为标准动作，你可以进行一次近战触碰攻击，造成 1d6 点寒冷伤害 + 你每拥有两个先知等级就会造成 1 点伤害。在七级时，被触碰的生物还必须进行一次强韧检定，否则会在相当于你先知等级 1/2 的回合内疲劳。这对已经疲劳的生物没有影响。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 你的魅力修正值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Touch of the Void Upgrade
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 虚空之触升级版

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Tree Form
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 树形

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can assume the form of a mandragora, as plant shape I. At 10th level, you can assume the form of a large shambling mound, as plant shape II. At 12th level, you can assume the form of a Huge Treant or a Huge Giant Flytrap, as plant shape III. You can use this ability once per day, but the duration is 1 hour/level. You must be at least 8th level to select this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 10 级时，您可以幻化成一个大蔓生怪，植物形态 II。12 级时，您可以幻化成巨树或巨型捕蝇草的形态，即植物形态 III。您每天可以使用一次此能力，但持续时间为 1 小时/等级。选择此启示必须至少达到 8 级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you can manifest a set of wings that grant you a speed of 60 feet. You can use these wings for 1 minute per day for each oracle level you have. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. At 11th level you can use these wings for 10 minutes per day for each oracle level you have. At 15th level, you can use the wings indefinitely. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 作为一个快速动作，你可以显现出一组翅膀，赋予你 60 英尺的速度。你拥有的每一级先知等级每天可以使用这对翅膀 1 分钟。持续时间不需要连续，但必须以 1 分钟为单位。11 级时，每达到一个先知等级，您每天可以使用这对翅膀 10 分钟。15 级时，你可以无限次使用翅膀。你必须至少达到 7 级才能选择这个启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you can manifest a set of wings that grant you a speed bonus of 30. You can use these wings for 1 minute per day for each oracle level you have. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. At 11th level you can use these wings for 10 minutes per day for each oracle level you have. At 15th level, you can use the wings indefinitely. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 作为一个快速动作，你可以显现出一组翅膀，赋予你 30 的速度加成。你拥有的每一级先知等级每天可以使用这对翅膀 1 分钟。持续时间不需要连续，但必须以 1 分钟为单位。11 级时，每达到一个先知等级，每天可以使用这对翅膀 10 分钟。15 级时，你可以无限次使用翅膀。你必须至少达到 7 级才能选择这个启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wings of Darkness
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 黑暗之翼

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you can manifest a set of wings that grant you a speed of 60 feet. You can use these wings for 1 minute per day for each oracle level you have. LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you can gain a pair of black wings that grant a +3 dodge bonus to AC against melee attacks and an immunity to ground based effects, such as difficult terrain. You can use these wings for 1 minute per day for each oracle level you have. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. At 11th level you can use these wings for 10 minutes per day for each oracle level you have. At 15th level, you can use the wings indefinitely. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个迅捷动作，你可以获得一对黑色翅膀，在对抗近战攻击时 AC 获得 +3 闪避加值，并且免疫地面效果，例如困难地形。你每天可以使用这些翅膀 1 分钟每个先知等级。此能力无需要连续使用，但每次使用至少 1 分钟。在第 11 级时，您每天可以使用这些翅膀 10 分钟/每个先知等级。 15 级时，你可以无限期地使用翅膀。您必须至少达到 7 级才能选择此启示。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个迅捷动作，你可以获得一对红色翅膀，在对抗近战攻击时 AC 获得 +3 闪避加值，并且免疫地面效果，例如困难地形。你每天可以使用这些翅膀 1 分钟来每个先知等级。此能力无需要连续使用，但每次使用至少 1 分钟。在第 11 级时，您每天可以使用这些翅膀 10 分钟每个先知级别。在 15 级时，你可以无限期地使用翅膀。你必须至少达到 7 级才能选择此启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wings of the Dragon - Red
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙之翼——红龙

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
As a swift action, you can gain a pair of wings that grant a +3 dodge bonus to AC against melee attacks and an immunity to ground based effects, such as difficult terrain. You can use these wings for 1 minute per day for each oracle level you have. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. At 11th level you can use these wings for 10 minutes per day for each oracle level you have. At 15th level, you can use the wings indefinitely. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
Colour of the wings is selected when choosing this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个迅捷动作，你可以获得一对翅膀，在对抗近战攻击时 AC 获得 +3 闪避加值，并且免疫地面效果，例如困难地形。你每天可以使用这些翅膀 1 分钟每个先知等级。此能力无需要连续使用，但每次使用至少 1 分钟。在第 11 级时，您每天可以使用这些翅膀 10 分钟/每个先知等级。 15 级时，你可以无限期地使用翅膀。您必须至少达到 7 级才能选择此启示。选择此启示时会选择翅膀的颜色。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wings of the Dragon - White
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙之翼——白龙

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can conjure wooden armor around yourself, which grants you a +4 armor bonus. At 7th level, and every four levels thereafter, this bonus increases by +2. At 13th level, this armor grants you DR 5/slashing. You can use this armor for 1 hour per day per oracle level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-hour increments.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以在自己周围变出木制盔甲，使你获得 +4 的护甲加成。7 级时，护甲加成增加 +2，之后每升 4 级，护甲加成增加 +2。13 级时，这套盔甲会赋予你 5/砍伤防御力。每一级先知者每天可以使用这件护甲 1 小时。这个持续时间不需要连续，但必须以 1 小时为单位。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 木制盔甲

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your mystical bond with wood is such that your weapons become an extension of your body. You gain a +1 competence bonus on attack rolls when wielding a weapon made of or mostly consisting of wood (such as a bow, club, quarterstaff, or spear). This bonus increases by +1 at 5th level and every five levels thereafter.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你与木头的神秘联系使你的武器成为你身体的延伸。当你持有木制或主要由木制构成的武器（如弓、棍、四分杖或矛）时，你的攻击投掷会获得+1的能力加成。该加成在 5 级时增加 +1，之后每 5 级增加一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wood Bond
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 木材羁绊

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can imbue held weapons made mostly of wood, while enchanted the weapon is considered masterwork. At 7th level, 15th level, and 19th level, the weapon gains a +1 enhancement bonus. At 11th level, the weapon gains the keen weapon property (or the equivalent increase to its critical threat range, if it is a bludgeoning weapon). This effect lasts a number of minutes equal to your oracle level. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 您可以为主要由木头制成的武器附魔，附魔后的武器被视为精制。7 级、15 级和 19 级时，武器会获得 +1 强化加成。11 级时，武器会获得锐锋武器属性（如果是重击武器，则其要害威胁范围会相应增加）。该效果持续的分钟数等于你的先知等级。您每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 您的魅力修正值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wooden Weapon Enchant
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 木制武器附魔

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 木质武器附魔（副手）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can imbue held weapons made mostly of wood, while enchanted the weapons are considered masterwork. At 7th level, 15th level, and 19th level, the weapon gains a +1 enhancement bonus. At 11th level, the weapon gains the keen weapon property (or the equivalent increase to its critical threat range, if it is a bludgeoning weapon). This effect lasts a number of minutes equal to your oracle level. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 您可以为主要由木头制成的武器附魔，附魔后的武器被视为精制。7 级、15 级和 19 级时，武器会获得 +1 强化加成。11 级时，武器获得锐锋武器属性（如果是重击武器，则其要害威胁范围会相应增加）。该效果持续的分钟数等于你的先知等级。您每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 您的魅力修正值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: OracleRevelationWoodenWeaponEnchantFlag11
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 先知启示录木制武器强化标记11
