LocalizedStrings.enGB: Upon reaching 20th level, your body becomes permanently suffused with the essence of the Shadow Plane. You gain  immunity to cold, critical hits, and sneak attacks. You also gain regeneration 5 as long as you are not affected by any abilities that cause you to emit light. In addition, any spells you cast of the shadow subschool or with the darkness descriptor are automatically extended without affecting their spell level
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 达到 20 级后，你的身体将永久充满暗影界的精华。你将获得对寒冷、重击和偷袭的免疫力。只要你没有受到任何会使你发光的能力的影响，你还会获得 5 级再生能力。此外，您施放的任何暗影子魔法或带有黑暗描述符的法术都会自动延长，且不影响其法术等级

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An oracle with the shadow mystery adds Persuasion, Stealth and Knowledge (World)  to her list of class skills.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 拥有阴影秘示域的先知者的类技能列表中会增加劝服、隐身和知识（世界）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shadow
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 阴影

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 20th level, all spells with cure, restore hp, or temporary hp descriptors cast by the oracle are always empowered, as though using the Empower Spell feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在 20 级时，先知者施展的所有具有治疗、恢复生命值或临时生命值描述符的法术总是被强化，就像使用法术强效专长一样。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An oracle with the succor mystery adds Lore (nature) and Stealth to her list of class skills.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 具有救助秘示域的先知将学识（自然）和隐匿添加到她的本职技能列表中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Succor
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 救助

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Upon reaching 20th level, you become an avatar of winter and the North. Your body may transform into living ice, as the ice body spell at will. In addition, your mastery of winter magic is such that any of your attacks that deal cold damage bypass cold immunity or cold resistance.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 达到 20 级后，你将成为冬天和北方的化身。你的身体可以随意变成活冰，就像冰体法术一样。此外，你对冬季魔法的掌握使你的任何攻击在造成寒冷伤害时都能绕过寒冷免疫或寒冷抗性。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your body may transform into living ice, as the ice body spell at will. 
Ice Body: You gain immunity to cold, vulnerability to fire and damage reduction 5/magic. You are immune to ability score damage, blindness, critical hits, disease, drowning, electricity, poison, stunning, and all spells or attacks that affect your physiology or respiration, because you have no physiology or respiration while this spell is in effect. You cannot drink (and thus can't use potions). 
Your unarmed attack deals damage equal to a club sized for you (1d4 for Small characters or 1d6 for Medium characters) plus 1 point of cold damage, and you are considered armed when making unarmed attacks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的身体可以随意变成活冰，就像冰体法术一样。
冰体：你获得寒冷免疫，易受火焰伤害，伤害减免5/魔法。你对能力值伤害、失明、重击、疾病、溺水、电流、毒药、眩晕以及所有影响你的生理机能或呼吸的法术或攻击免疫，因为在此法术生效时你没有生理机能或呼吸。你不能喝水（因此也不能使用药水）。
你的徒手攻击造成的伤害相当于一根适合你的棍棒（小型角色为 1d4 或中型角色为 1d6）加上 1 点寒冷伤害，在进行徒手攻击时，你被视为持有武器。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Upon reaching 20th level, you become a living creature of wood. You gain a +4 natural armor bonus to your Armor Class and you gain immunity to paralysis, poison, stunning, sleep, and enemy polymorph effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 达到 20 级后，你将成为一个活生生的木头生物。你的护甲等级会获得 +4 天生护甲加成，并获得对麻痹、中毒、眩晕、睡眠和敌人多态效果的免疫力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An oracle with the wood mystery adds Mobility, Lore (nature), Stealth  and Knowledge (World)  to her list of class skills.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 拥有木秘示域的先知者的类技能列表中会增加灵巧、自然知识、隐身术和世界知识。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Orcs are not known for their discretion, yet in matters of religion, they are surprisingly tight-lipped. When a common orc refers to a god, even his own patron deity, he never uses its name, only one of its titles. The superstitious orcs believe that the names of gods hold power, and to speak a god’s name is to draw its attention. Orcs may revere violent gods, not even they wish to see the full manifestation of such deities’ destructive power. Only the shamans and witch doctors dare speak these unholy names, and then only in the midst of ecstatic rituals. This reticence on the part of orcs has led many outsiders to the erroneous conclusion that orc gods have no names. Some scholars have even gone so far as to suggest that the orc gods are not even gods at all.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
兽人并不以他们的判断力而闻名，但在宗教问题上，他们出奇地守口如瓶。当一个普通的兽人提到一个神，甚至是他自己的守护神时，他从不使用它的名字，只使用它的一个
头衔：。迷信的兽人相信神灵的名字拥有力量，说出神灵的名字就是为了引起它的注意。兽人可能崇敬狂暴的神祇，他们甚至不希望看到这些神祇的破坏力充分展现。只有巫师和巫医才敢说出这些邪恶的名字，而且只有在狂喜的仪式中。兽人的这种缄默，让很多外人误以为兽人神没有名字。一些学者甚至认为兽人神根本就不是神。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Prince of Undeath, Demon Lord of Necromancy and the Undead 
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Death, Necromancy, Wrath, Undeath   
Domains: Chaos, Death, Evil, Magic   
Subdomains: Demon, Divine, Murder, Undead   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy mace   
Holy Symbol: Four-horned goat head   
Sacred Animal: Goat   
Although Orcus doesn’t have a strong following on Golarion (his worship is mostly restricted to the nation of Geb and certain backwater regions in Nidal), he has far more dealings with other worlds than most of Golarion’s demon lords. His cultists maintain that the Prince of Undeath is merely waiting for matters in other worlds to resolve themselves before turning his gaze upon this world as his next prize—and that when he does, his faithful shall be rightly rewarded for preparing the way. Of course, fierce competition for worshipers with the cults of Zura and Kabriri and the church of Urgathoa is a more likely reason why Orcus’s cult on Golarion isn’t more widespread. Orcus appears as an immense, fat humanoid with a ram’s head, bat-like wings, cloven feet, and a long tail ending in a stinger. His legendary weapon, the Wand of Orcus, is never far from his taloned hand. His Abyssal realm of Uligor is an entire world of undead-haunted ruins, frozen seas, ragged mountains, and hideous deserts and swamps. Orcus shares this realm with a large number of evil thanatotic titans, not all of whom worship or even ally with the Prince of Undeath. Large regions of Uligor are scarred by the unending civil war between the titans. It is unknown what shadowy force directly opposes Orcus on Uligor, but his war with this mysterious demigod has lasted for millennia.

虽然奥尔库斯在歌拉瑞恩的追随者并不多（他的崇拜主要局限于盖布国和尼达尔的某些穷乡僻壤），但他与其他世界的交往要比大多数歌拉瑞恩的恶魔领主多得多。他的崇拜者们认为，亡灵王子只是在等待其他世界的问题得到解决，然后才会将目光转向这个世界，将其作为下一个目标。当然，与祖拉邪教、卡布里瑞邪教和乌加索亚教会争夺崇拜者的激烈竞争是奥库斯邪教没有在戈拉瑞恩广泛传播的更可能的原因。奥库斯是一个巨型肥胖的人形生物，长着公羊的头、蝙蝠般的翅膀、蹄形脚和一条长尾巴，尾巴的末端是一根毒刺。他的传奇武器奥尔库斯魔杖从不离手。他的深渊王国乌利抵撞（Uligor）是一个充满亡灵的废墟、冰封的海洋、崎岖的山脉、狰狞的沙漠和沼泽的世界。奥库斯与大量邪恶的泰坦巨人共享这一领域，但并非所有泰坦巨人都崇拜亡灵王子，甚至与他结盟。泰坦之间无休止的内战使乌利抵撞的大片地区伤痕累累。目前还不清楚在乌利抵撞有什么阴暗势力直接与奥库斯作对，但他与这位神秘半神的战争已经持续了千年之久。

尽管奥库斯在格拉利昂没有很强的追随者（他的崇拜主要限于盖布国和尼达尔的某些偏远地区），但他与其他人的交往要多得多世界比格拉利昂的大多数恶魔领主都要多。他的教徒坚持认为，亡灵王子只是在等待其他世界的事情自己解决，然后再将目光投向这个世界，作为他的下一个战利品——当他这样做时，他的信徒会因准备道路而得到应有的回报。当然，与 Zura 和 Kabriri 的教派以及 Urgathoa 的教会争夺崇拜者的激烈竞争更可能是 Orcus 对 Golarion 的崇拜没有更广泛传播的原因。 Orcus 看起来是一个巨型、肥胖的类人生物，长着公羊头、蝙蝠状翅膀、偶蹄和长长的尾巴，末端是一根毒刺。他的传奇武器奥库斯魔杖就在他的利爪手边。他的深渊国度 Uligor 是一个充满不死生物出没的废墟、冻寒的海洋、崎岖的山脉以及可怕的沙漠和沼泽的整个世界。奥库斯与大量邪恶的泰坦共享这个国度，但并非所有人都崇拜亡灵王子，甚至不与亡灵王子结盟。泰坦之间无休止的内战使 Uligor 的大片地区伤痕累累。不知道是什么暗影力量在乌利抵撞直接对抗奥库斯，但他与这个神秘的半神的战争已经持续了千年。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥库斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Faceless God   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Alchemy, Caverns, Hunger, Subterranean waterways   
Rank: Great Old One   
Domains: Chaos, Earth, Evil, Water   
Subdomains: Caves, Entropy, Fear, Ice, Metal, Oceans   
Favoured Weapon: Spear   
Holy Symbol: Open maw surrounding rune   
In the Land of Black Blood deep below central Avistan, strange lakes of frozen fluid bubble and roil. Similar in appearance and consistency to crude oil, this black blood is freezing cold to the touch, yet bolsters and invigorates undead flesh. It was within these un-waters that the race known as the charda were spawned, and first among their kind was the Faceless God, Orgesh. Orgesh no longer dwells in the Land of Black Blood, having abandoned its children to that realm. Although they still worship it, generations of neglect have had a positive effect on the charda—they retain their unpredictable ways, yet are no longer driven by cruelty and vengeful hunger. Those who remember but do not venerate Orgesh believe the Faceless God abandoned its children for others found far to the west in the deepest, darkest trenches of the Sightless Sea. Orgesh has no organized cult, and its followers see each other as the greatest threat. Some believe that by consuming the flesh and bones of a fellow devotee of the Faceless God, one can take in that devotee’s faith, and that when but one worshiper remains, Orgesh will return to use this final fanatic to unleash a new race upon the vaults of Orv—a race that may not stop its expansion until all has been consumed. None alive has looked upon Orgesh, yet statues of it remain strangely impervious to erosion, and thus provide evidence of its visage, or lack thereof. These statues depict Orgesh as a vaguely humanoid figure with a hugely distended belly, clawed and doglike legs, and an open mouth filled with shark’s teeth, but with no other facial features whatsoever.

偏好武器：矛
圣徽：含有符文的大开咽喉
在位于阿维斯坦中部地下深处的黑血之地中，有一个由寒冷液体形成且不断起泡投掷的湖泊。这种液体外观与稠度近似原油，触感冰冷彻骨，却能够强化活化亡灵身躯。被称为黑水怪（charda）即诞自这片非水之中，而无面之神欧格什则是其中首位。
欧格什将后代遗弃于黑血之地，已经不再居于其中。尽管黑水怪仍崇敬祂，但数代以来的漠视却产生了较为积极的影响——它们仍保持着难以理解的习俗，但已不再被冷酷残忍和渴求报复所驱使。那些虽然记得却不敬拜欧格什者认为无面之神舍弃了自己的后代，选择了位于遥远西方无光之海（Sightless Sea）至深至暗的海沟之中的种族。欧格什并无有组织的教团，祂的崇拜者将彼此视为最大的威胁。其中一些认为，献祭无面之神信徒的血肉骸骨便可汇聚其信仰，而当存活的信徒仅剩最后一个的时候，欧格什便会返回并利用这个狂热者在奥瓦（Orv）的穹顶释放一个崭新的种族——一个在吞尽一切之前绝不停止扩张的种族。
未曾有生者目击过欧格什，但祂的神像仍奇异地不受侵蚀并证明了祂的面貌，或称祂的无面。这些神像将欧格什描绘为模糊的人形实体，拥有肿胀巨腹，长爪与狗状的腿，大张的口中生满鲨鱼牙齿，但没有任何其他面部特征。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Orgesh
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 欧格什

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lord of the Living   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Afterlife, Fertility, Rebirth, Resurrection   
Domains: Good, Healing, Law, Plant, Repose   
Subdomains: Ancestors, Archon, Growth, Restoration, Resurrection, Souls   
Favoured Weapon: Flail   
Holy Symbol: Crook and flail   
Sacred Animal: Ram   
Myths say that during the Age of Legend, Osiris ruled Osirion as its king. But his brother Set was jealous of Osiris's power and coveted his throne, so Set killed Osiris, dismembered his brother's body, and scattered the pieces across the world. Isis gathered up the pieces, and using her magic, she brought her husband back to life. Now free from death, Osiris became a god of death and life after death, whose resurrection mirrors the rebirth of souls in the afterlife. Osiris is also a fertility god, a deity of nature and growth who dies each year with the harvest and is reborn again in the spring when vegetation sprouts again. Osiris always appears wrapped up like a mummy, but with green skin symbolizing his role as a god of fertility. He wears a white atef crown with two ostrich feathers and carries a crook and flail, the symbols of pharaonic rule. Osiris is the brother of Nephthys and Set. His sister Isis is also his wife, and he is the father of Horus. As a death god, Osiris is tightly aligned with the likes of Pharasma and Anubis, but his brother Set remains his sworn enemy.

神话传说，在传说时代，奥西里斯作为国王统治着奥西瑞恩。但他的兄弟赛特嫉妒奥西里斯的权力，觊觎他的王位，于是赛特杀死了奥西里斯，肢解了他兄弟的尸体，并将尸体碎片散落在世界各地。伊希斯收集了这些碎片，并用她的魔法让她的丈夫起死回生。现在，奥西里斯摆脱了死亡，成为死亡之神和死后生命之神，他的复活反映了灵魂在来世的重生。奥西里斯也是一个生育之神，是自然和生长之神，每年随着收获而死去，在春天植被重新萌芽时再次重生。奥西里斯总是像木乃伊一样被包裹起来，但他的皮肤是绿色的，象征着他是生育之神。他头戴带有两根鸵鸟毛的白色阿特夫王冠，手持象征法老统治的牛角和连枷。奥西里斯是奈芙提斯和赛特的兄弟。他的妹妹伊希斯也是他的妻子，他是荷鲁斯的父亲。作为死神，奥西里斯与法拉斯玛和阿努比斯等人关系密切，但他的兄弟赛特仍是他不共戴天的敌人。

Isis gathered up the pieces, and using her magic, she brought her husband back to life. Now free from death, Osiris became a god of death and life after death, whose resurrection mirrors the rebirth of souls in the afterlife. Osiris is also a fertility god, a deity of nature and growth who dies each year with the harvest and is reborn again in the spring when vegetation sprouts again. Osiris always appears wrapped up like a mummy, but with green skin symbolizing his role as a god of fertility. He wears a white atef crown with two ostrich feathers and carries a crook and flail, the symbols of pharaonic rule. Osiris is the brother of Nephthys and Set. His sister Isis is also his wife, and he is the father of Horus. As a death god, Osiris is tightly aligned with the likes of Pharasma and Anubis, but his brother Set remains his sworn enemy.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：生灵天尊
阵营：守序中立
神职：阴间、多产、重生、复活
领域：善良，治疗，秩序，植物，宁静
子领域：先祖、亚空、滋长、复原、回生、灵魂
偏好武器：连枷
圣徽：曲杖与连枷
圣兽：公羊
神话流传在传说之年时，欧西里斯是统御奥西里昂之王。但祂的兄弟赛特忌妒祂的权力，渴求祂的王位，因此诛杀欧西里斯，将亲兄弟碎尸万段，将尸块洒遍天地。伊西斯收集起遗体的碎片后透过魔法让丈夫复归人世。超脱生死后的欧西里斯成为了死亡与阴间之神，祂的复活被视为是死者的灵魂在阴间重生的象征。欧西里斯也是多产之神，是在每年秋收死去但随后在隔年春天植物破土时复生的自然与滋长之神。
欧西里斯的形象总是像个木乃伊一般全身包得紧紧实实，长了象征著多产神职的苍绿肤色。头戴两根鸵鸟羽饰的白冠，手持象征法老政权的曲杖连枷。欧西里斯是奈芙蒂斯和赛特的兄弟，也是伊西斯的配偶/兄弟，及荷鲁斯的父亲。身为死亡之神的欧西里斯与同类的法莱斯玛及阿努比斯关系良好，但兄弟赛特依然是祂的仇敌。
欧西里斯的神职人员主要由牧师、德鲁伊及圣武士构成。也有许多据说掌握了生死之理的秘教供奉着祂。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Osiris
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 欧西里斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Universal   
Alignment: Lawful Neutral   
Form: Primordial Inevitable   
Areas of Concern: Machinery, Mathematics, Physics   
Domains: Artifice, Fire, Knowledge, Law   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy Mace   
Holy Symbol: Planet held within a geometrical compass  
Physics is at the heart of the cosmos, spawning nebulae, destroying stars, maintaining orbits, and more. Yet supernatural forces like magic, souls, outsiders, and deities introduce variations that both warp a logical universe and even gnaw at the foundation of mathematics itself. Otolmens watches the universe from Axis with the help of thousands of axiomites who tirelessly process the vast stream of data and observations she records. Where her predictions encounter anomalies, she dispatches teams of outsiders—or, rarely, mortals—to investigate, report back, and even correct the disturbance directly. Sites where the cosmic calculus is at risk are especially high priorities, and her agents as often clash with aeons over how to amend disturbances as they cooperate. Otolmens regularly submits reports to a host of deities, summarizing her findings and the means by which she intends to correct the errors. After millions of such dispatches, these reports are largely formalities—not only because the divine host has largely grown inured to these messages, but also because there’s little a divinity might say in response that would discourage her. On a cosmic scale, her recalibrations are subtle and ultimately help sustain the multiverse, so she continues her calculations virtually uninterrupted, with the assistance of thousands of devoted axiomites and visiting mortal mathematicians.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：宇宙
阵营：守序中立
形态：原始不可避免
领域：手艺，数学、物理
领域：技巧、火、知识、守序
偏好武器：重锤
圣徽：几何罗盘内的行星物理学是核心宇宙，产生星云，摧毁恒星，维持轨道等等。然而，魔法、灵魂、外来者和神灵等超自然力量引入了变化，这些变化既扭曲了逻辑宇宙，甚至侵蚀了数学本身的基础。 Otolmens 在成千上万的公理家的帮助下从 Axis 观察宇宙，这些公理家不知疲倦地处理她记录的大量数据和观察结果。当她的预测遇到异常时，她会派出一群外人——或者，很少是凡人——去调查、报告，甚至直接纠正干扰。宇宙演算存在风险的地点尤其受到高度重视，她的特工们在合作时经常就如何修正干扰问题发生冲突。 Otolmens 定期向众多神灵提交报告，总结她的发现以及她打算纠正错误的方法。在数以百万计的此类发送之后，这些报告大多是形式——不仅因为神圣的宿主在很大程度上已经习惯了这些信息，而且还因为几乎没有神灵会在回应时说让她气馁。在宇宙尺度上，她的重新校准是微妙的，并最终有助于维持多元宇宙，因此她几乎不间断地继续她的计算，并在数千名忠诚的公理家和来访的凡人数学家的帮助下。

Physics is at the heart of the cosmos, spawning nebulae, destroying stars, maintaining orbits, and more. Yet supernatural forces like magic, souls, outsiders, and deities introduce variations that both warp a logical universe and even gnaw at the foundation of mathematics itself. Otolmens watches the universe from Axis with the help of thousands of axiomites who tirelessly process the vast stream of data and observations she records. Where her predictions encounter anomalies, she dispatches teams of outsiders—or, rarely, mortals—to investigate, report back, and even correct the disturbance directly. Sites where the cosmic calculus is at risk are especially high priorities, and her agents as often clash with aeons over how to amend disturbances as they cooperate. Otolmens regularly submits reports to a host of deities, summarizing her findings and the means by which she intends to correct the errors. After millions of such dispatches, these reports are largely formalities—not only because the divine host has largely grown inured to these messages, but also because there’s little a divinity might say in response that would discourage her. On a cosmic scale, her recalibrations are subtle and ultimately help sustain the multiverse, so she continues her calculations virtually uninterrupted, with the assistance of thousands of devoted axiomites and visiting mortal mathematicians.

头衔：宇宙

最喜爱的武器：重锤 
神圣象征：行星被置于几何罗盘之中 
物理学是宇宙的核心，它催生星云、摧毁恒星、维持轨道等等。然而，魔法、灵魂、外来者和神灵等超自然力量带来的变化，既扭曲了逻辑宇宙，甚至啃噬了数学本身的基础。奥托曼斯在数以千计的公理人的帮助下，从轴心观察着宇宙，这些公理人不知疲倦地处理着她记录下来的大量数据和观察结果。在她的预测遇到异常情况时，她会派遣外人团队--或者很少是凡人--进行调查、汇报，甚至直接纠正干扰。宇宙计算受到威胁的地方是特别优先考虑的地方，她的特工们经常在如何修正干扰的问题上与宙斯发生冲突，也经常在合作的问题上发生冲突。奥托曼斯定期向众多神灵提交报告，总结她的发现和纠正错误的方法。经过数百万次这样的发送之后，这些报告基本上都流于形式--这不仅是因为神灵们已经对这些信息习以为常，还因为神灵们几乎不会说什么让她气馁的话。在宇宙范围内，她的重新调整是微妙的，最终有助于维持多元宇宙，因此她在成千上万忠实的公理派和来访的凡人数学家的协助下，几乎不间断地继续着她的计算。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Otolmens
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥托门斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A pantheon is a group of related gods worshipped either individually or together. Most pantheons are associated with a specific ancestry or geopolitical region, but rarely, a pantheon consists of deities with overlapping areas of concern. Followers work to advance the shared interests of their pantheon, directing prayers to whichever god presides over their current activity or circumstance.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 万神殿是一组单独或共同崇拜的相关神。大多数万神殿都与特定的祖先或地缘政治地区有关，但很少有万神殿由具有重叠领域的神灵组成。追随者致力于促进他们万神殿的共同利益，将祈祷指向主持他们当前活动或情况的任何神。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Pantheons
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 万神殿

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The targets’ physical forms undergo a bizarre transformation. They look and function normally, but are composed of countless particles that separate and reconnect to remain whole. Each target gains fast healing 1 and is immune to bleed damage, critical hits, sneak attacks, and other forms of precision damage. The value of this fast healing increases by 1 at caster levels 10th, 15th, and 20th. Any target can end the spell effect on itself as a swift action; the target then regains 5d6 hit points and can attempt an additional saving throw against one disease or poison affecting it (at the original save DC), ending that disease or poison with a successful saving throw.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 目标的物理形态发生了奇异的变化。他们的外观和功能正常，但由无数粒子组成，这些粒子分离后又重新连接，保持完整。每个目标都会获得 1 级快速治愈效果，并免疫流血伤害、要害攻击、偷袭和其他形式的精确伤害。施法者等级达到第 10、15 和 20 级时，快速愈合的数值会增加 1。任何目标都可以通过迅速行动结束对自身的法术效果；然后目标会恢复 5d6 生命，并可以针对影响自身的一种疾病或毒药尝试一次额外的豁免（以原始豁免DC计算），如果豁免成功，则会结束该疾病或毒药。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The targets’ physical forms undergo a bizarre transformation. They look and function normally, but are composed of countless particles that separate and reconnect to remain whole. Each target gains fast healing 1 and is immune to bleed damage, critical hits, sneak attacks, and other forms of precision damage. The value of this fast healing increases by 1 at caster levels 10th, 15th, and 20th. Any target can end the spell effect on itself as a swift action; the target then regains 5d6 hit points and can attempt an additional saving throw against one disease or poison affecting it (at the original save DC), ending that disease or poison with a successful saving throw.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 目标的物理形态经历了怪诞的变形。虽然他们的外观与言行都正常，但是他们的身体由无数的分离的小颗粒所组成，并重聚回一个整体。每个目标获得快速医疗1，并对流血伤害，偷袭，重击和其他形式的精准伤害免疫。该快速医疗的值在施法者等级达到10，15和20级时再+1。任何目标能用一个迅捷动作终止它自己身上的该法术效果。之后它会恢复5d6点HP并可以额外尝试一次豁免骰来对抗任意一个作用在它身上的疾病或毒素效果（使用原本的豁免DC），一个成功的豁免骰可以终止这个疾病或者毒素效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You may end the effect of particulate form on yourself early as a swift action; regaining 5d6 hit points and attempting a additional saving throw against one disease or poison affecting you (at the original save DC), ending that disease or poison with a successful saving throw.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以用一个迅捷动作终止它自己身上的该法术效果。之后会恢复5d6点HP并可以额外尝试一次豁免骰来对抗任意一个作用在它身上的疾病或毒素效果（使用原本的豁免DC），一个成功的豁免骰可以终止这个疾病或者毒素效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Particulate Form
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 粒子形态

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: King of the Wind Demons, Demon Lord of the Sky and Winged Creatures   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: The Sky, Temptation, Winged creatures   
Domains: Air, Chaos, Evil, Trickery   
Subdomains: Cloud, Deception, Demon, Wind   
Favoured Weapon: Longsword   
Holy Symbol: Image of Pazuzu, right hand raised   
Sacred Animal: All flying animals   
Pazuzu appears as a wiry human with eagle’s legs and talons, a demonic avian head, two pairs of bird wings, a scorpion tail, and a writhing snake in place of his genitals. Pazuzu is an aggressive demon fond of possessing mortals and using them to work his evils upon the world—it is said that Pazuzu can hear his name when an innocent speaks it unknowingly, and that this may be all that is needed to invite possession by the demon. He is the patron of all evil things that fly, particularly vrocks and harpies. His breath is a cloud of locusts, and it is said that at the dawn of civilization his first breath of air upon the Material Plane spawned the demon that, in time, would become Deskari. Pazuzu is among the oldest of the demon lords, one of the first to rise to power in the Abyss long ago alongside the likes of Lamashtu, Abraxas, and Dagon, yet his long conf lictwith Lamashtu has prevented him from achieving greater power or perhaps even godhood himself—a fact that only serves to spur his unending conflict with the Mother of Monsters. Pazuzu’s Abyssal realm of High M’Vania exists on the side of one of the great Abyssal rifts. This vertical realm includes an immense city on a vast shelf, as well as the depths below it and the skies above. The unique location of this realm allows Pazuzu unprecedented mobility among the Outer Planes, a freedom he often abuses in his war against Lamashtu, recruiting powerful allies from Hell, Abaddon, and beyond. Pazuzu’s personal rookery is a tangle of towers called Shibaxet—a place only his most trusted minions or his favored meals ever get to see.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：风魔王、天空魔王和有翼生物
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：天空、诱惑、有翼生物
领域：气、混乱、邪恶、诡计
子领域：云、欺骗、恶魔、风偏好武器：长剑 
圣徽：帕祖祖的形象，右手举起 
圣兽：所有飞行动物 帕祖祖以鹰腿和爪子、恶魔鸟头、两对鸟翼、蝎尾和扭动的蛇的形式出现代替他的生殖器。帕祖祖是一个好斗的恶魔，喜欢附身凡人并利用他们在世界上作恶——据说帕祖祖可以在一个无辜的人在不知不觉中说出他的名字时听到他的名字，而这可能就是邀请人类附身所需要的一切恶魔。他是所有会飞的邪恶事物的守护神，尤其是弗洛克和鹰身女妖。他的吐息是一团蝗虫，据说在文明的黎明，他在主物质位面的第一口气催生了恶魔，而恶魔最终会变成Deskari。帕祖祖是最古老的恶魔领主之一，很久以前与拉玛什图、阿布拉克萨斯和大衮等人一起在深渊中获得权力的第一批人之一，但他与拉玛什图的长期冲突使他无法获得更大的权力，甚至无法获得更大的权力神性本身——这一事实只会刺激他与怪物之母的无休止的冲突。 Pazuzu 的深渊王国 High M'Vania 位于一个巨型的深渊裂隙的一侧。这个垂直领域包括一个巨型的架子上的巨型城市，以及它下面的深处和上面的天空。这个领域的独特位置使 Pazuzu 在外层位面中拥有前所未有的灵巧，这是他在与 Lamashtu 的战争中经常滥用的自由，从地狱、阿巴顿和其他地方招募强大的盟友。 Pazuzu 的私人巢穴是一团被称为 Shibaxet 的塔楼——只有他最信任的爪牙或他最喜欢的饭菜才能看到。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Pazuzu
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 帕祖祖

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can effortlessly give aid to your allies, whether that means providing them with help attacking or defending them in the heat of combat. Whenever you use the aid another action to inflict a penalty on attack rolls or to AC against one of your allies, the penalty you inflict increases by 1. This bonus increases by 1 at 4th level and every 5 oracle levels thereafter (to a maximum of -5 at 19th level). It doesn’t stack with other feats or class features that improve the bonus you provide when using the aid another action.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以毫不费力地为你的盟友提供帮助，无论是帮助他们在激烈的战斗中攻击还是保卫他们。每当你使用援助动作对你的一个盟友带来攻击检定或 AC 加值时，你造成的加值增加 1。此加值在第 4 级和此后每 5 个先知等级增加 1（最多-5 在 19 级）。它不与其他专长或职业特性叠加，这些专长或职业特性可以提高您在使用援助其他动作时提供的加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 2nd level, a mindchemist has honed his memory. When making a Knowledge check, he may add his Intelligence bonus on the check a second time. Thus, a mindchemist with 5 ranks in Knowledge (World) and a +2 Intelligence bonus has a total skill bonus of +9 (5 + 2 + 2) using this ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 2 级时，心智药师的记忆力得到了磨练。在进行知识检定时，他可以在第二次检定时加上自己的智力加成。因此，拥有 5 级知识（世界）和 +2 智力加成的心智药师在使用此能力时，技能总加成为 +9（5 + 2 + 2）。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 本轮已经使用了谢幕曲能力

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The alchemist exudes an imperceptible musk that grants him a permanent +3 competence bonus on all checks involving Persuasion.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 炼金术士身上会散发出一种难以察觉的麝香，使他在所有涉及说服力的检查中获得永久 +3 的能力加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Pheromones
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 费洛蒙

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Philosophies of Golarion differ from religions in that they are teachings and ways of thinking that are propounded by a mortal founder who, usually, does not become a deity. By assenting to a particular philosophy, one is generally not limited in choosing any particular occupation; however, some combinations of philosophy and religion present inherent conflicts. The study of various fundamental underpinnings of many philosophies is known as metaphysics.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 葛拉利昂的哲学不同于宗教，因为它们是由通常不会成为神灵的凡人创始人提出的教义和思维方式。通过同意一种特定的哲学，一个人通常不受限制于选择任何特定的职业；然而，哲学和宗教的某些组合存在内在冲突。对许多哲学的各种基本基础的研究被称为形而上学。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Philosophies
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 哲学

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Consoler of Atheists  
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Atheists, Legacies, Reincarnation  
Domains: Artifice, Earth, Knowledge, Repose  
Favoured Weapon: Longbow   
Holy Symbol: Two circles overlapping vertically  
In life, Phlegyas was an arrogant but gifted man. He was cast out from Shelyn’s church for his blasphemy and pride, but the clergy’s attempt to wipe away Phlegyas’s legacy was undone, as the mortal’s name survived among admirers and detractors alike. Pharasma saw this form of immortality as fundamental to mortal experience and raised Phlegyas up to be a patron both of art outlasting its creator and of those who spurned the gods. As a symbol of creations outliving their creators, she is also the usher of new parents, especially those who die in childbirth. Unlike Shelyn’s domain of beauty, the Consoler of Atheists embodies resonance, and the works Phlegyas inspires are as often painful or horrifying as they are beautiful. Time and perspective cooled Phlegyas’s resentment of the divine, and now she and her servants offer respite to atheists who arrive at the Boneyard. Those godless souls who show potential she reserves to train as psychopomps. Phlegyas is the most human of the ushers: a tall, broadshouldered woman wearing a simple, plaster domino mask and carrying an oar she uses to ferry those who spurn the call of their gods. Her realm is the Anonymous Loggia, a museum of works by long-forgotten creators that still remain linchpins in mortal cultures.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：无神论者的安慰者 
阵营：绝对中立 
形态：招魂使 
领域：无神论者、遗产、轮回
领域：手艺、大地、知识、安眠 偏好武器：长弓 
圣徽：两个垂直重叠的圆圈 在生活中，Phlegyas 是一个傲慢但有天赋的男人。他因亵渎神灵和骄傲而被逐出谢林的教堂，但神职人员抹去弗莱吉亚斯遗产的企图失败了，因为凡人的名字在仰慕者和批评者中都幸存下来。 Pharasma 认为这种永生形式是凡人体验的基础，并将 Phlegyas 提升为比其创造者更持久的艺术和那些唾弃众神的人的守护神。作为创造物比创造者更长寿的象征，她也是新父母的引领者，尤其是那些死于分娩的父母。与 Shelyn 的美领域不同，无神论者的安慰者体现了共鸣，而 Phlegyas 所激发的作品往往既美丽又痛苦或可怕。时间和视角冷却了 Phlegyas 对神的怨恨，现在她和她的仆人为到达 Boneyard 的无神论者提供了喘息的机会。那些表现出潜力的无神灵魂，她保留训练成精神错乱者。 Phlegyas 是最人性化的引座员：一个身材高大、肩膀宽阔的女人，戴着简单的石膏多米诺骨牌面具，手持桨，用来运送那些拒绝神的召唤的人。她的领域是匿名凉廊，这是一个由长期被遗忘的创作者的作品博物馆，这些作品仍然是凡人文化的关键。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Phlegyas
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 痰液

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Merrygleam   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Jokes, Pranks, Surprises   
Domains: Chaos, Charm, Good, Trickery   
Subdomains: Azata, Deception, Revelry, Whimsy   
Favoured Weapon: Blowgun (Dart)   
Holy Symbol: Snake on a tree branch   
Sacred Animal: Tree snake   
The eternal prankster, Picoperi finds delight in the simplest of jokes and finds existence a never-ending series of surprises. He can take any form that best suits his capers, but when he appears to mortals, he typically does so as a young boy with brown skin and wildly curling black hair. His delicate features, graceful limbs, and pointed ears suggest elven ancestry, and he is never seen without his telltale woven wool vest dyed bright green and yellow and worked with images of llamas, tree frogs, and snakes. Good folk who look at the world with wonder and delight often pay homage to Picoperi. Inventors, particularly alchemists who use ingredients derived from jungle plants, sometimes let Picoperi's love of surprises guide them to new discoveries. Picoperi takes great delight in taunting the forces of evil. In battle, he prefers ambushes and traps over forward charges, and he poisons his victims with darts that cause uncontrollable laughter and dreamy euphoria. Legend tells that thousands of years ago, Urxehl smiled at one of Picoperi's jokes, and the demon lord has sought to destroy the merry trickster ever since. Picoperi lives in the heart of a kapok tree on Elysium. Though the tree looks small from the outside, the inside holds a network of comfortable rooms carved into the tree's trunk.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：欢愉烁光
阵营：混乱善良 
神职：笑话，恶作剧，惊喜
领域：混乱、魅惑、善良、诡计
子领域：爱塔、欺骗、狂欢、滑稽
偏好武器：吹枪（飞镖） 
圣徽：缠绕在树枝上的一条挤眉弄眼的蛇
圣兽：树蛇
永远的恶作剧者，皮可皮里能从最简单的笑话中找到乐趣，并发现存在一系列永无止境的惊喜。
他可以以任何最适合他的形式出现，但当他出现在人类面前时，他通常会以一个棕色皮肤，黑色卷发的小男孩的形象出现。他精致的五官、优美的四肢和尖尖的耳朵暗示着精灵的血统，他总是穿着染上亮绿色和黄色的、带有羊驼、树蛙和蛇的图案的编织羊毛背心。
以惊奇和喜悦的眼光看待世界的好人经常向皮可皮里致敬。发明家，尤其是使用丛林植物成分的炼金术士，有时会让皮可皮里对惊喜的热爱引导他们获得新的发现。皮可皮里以嘲弄邪恶势力为乐。
在战斗中，他更喜欢伏击和陷阱而不是前锋，他用飞镖毒害他的受害者，引起无法控制的笑声和梦幻般的兴奋。传说数千年前，厄桀尔被皮可皮里的一个笑话逗笑了，从那以后，恶魔领主就一直试图摧毁这个快乐的骗子。
皮可皮里住在极乐境的奔放之野一颗木棉树里，看上去虽小，里面藏着无数舒适的房间。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Picoperi
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 皮可皮里

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You can target the weak points in your opponent’s armor. 
As a standard action, make a single ranged attack. The target does not gain any armor, natural armor, or shield bonuses to its Armor Class. You do not gain the benefit of this feat if you move this round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你可以瞄准对手盔甲的薄弱点。
作为标准动作，进行一次远程攻击。目标的护甲等级不会获得任何护甲、天生护甲或盾的加成。如果你在本回合移动，则不会获得此专长的益处。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 3rd level, the powers of darkness make the dreadknight a beacon of corruption and disease. A dreadknight does not take any damage or take any penalty from diseases.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 3 级，黑暗的力量使恐惧骑士成为腐败和疾病的灯塔。恐惧骑士免疫疾病。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Plague Bringer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 瘟疫使者

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, as a swift action you can cause any creature you hit this round with a melee attack to sprout entangling vines that attempt to hold it in place, entangling it for 1 round (Reflex negates). 
At 10th level, you can summon a battle companion. This ability functions as summon nature's ally IV with a duration of 1 minute. This ability can summon only one animal, regardless of the list used, and the creature’s type changes to plant instead of animal. For every 2 levels beyond 10th, the level of the summon nature's ally spell increases by 1 (to a maximum of summon nature's ally IX at 20th level).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1级时，作为一个快速动作，你可以使任何在本回合被你近战攻击击中的生物长出缠绕藤蔓，试图将其固定在原地，缠绕它1回合（反射免疫）。
10级时，你可以召唤一个战斗伙伴。该能力与召唤自然盟友 IV 相同，持续时间为 1 分钟。该能力只能召唤一种动物，无论使用的是哪种动物，而且该动物的类型会变为植物而不是动物。超过 10 级后每升 2 级，召唤自然盟友法术的等级就会提高 1 级（20 级时最多提高到召唤自然盟友 IX 级）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Plant
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Creatures summoned by the plant battle companion ability are granted the plant type. Plant type creatures are granted immunity to paralysis, sleep, mind affecting, poison, polymorph, and stun effects.

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You find solace in the green, can grow defensive thorns, and can communicate with plants.
Wooden Fist: As a free action, your hands can become as hard as wood, covered in tiny thorns. While you have wooden fists, your unarmed strikes do not provoke attacks of opportunity, and gain a bonus on damage rolls equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum +1). You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
Bramble Armor: At 6th level, you can cause a host of wooden thorns to burst from your skin as a free action. While bramble armor is in effect, any foe striking you with a melee weapon without reach takes 1d6 points of piercing damage + 1 point per two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你在绿色中找到慰藉，可以长出防御性的荆棘，并能与植物交流。
木拳：作为一个自由动作，你的双手可以变得像木头一样坚硬，并长满细小的荆棘。当你拥有木质拳头时，你的徒手攻击不会引发借机攻击，并且在伤害投掷上获得相当于你牧师等级1/2的加成（最低+1）。您每天可以使用此能力的回合数等于 3 + 您的感知修正值。
荆棘铠甲：六级时，你可以作为一个自由动作，使你的皮肤上迸发出大量木刺。当荆棘盔甲生效时，任何用近战武器攻击你的敌人都会受到1d6点穿刺伤害+每两级1点穿刺伤害。您每天可以使用此能力的回合数等于您获得此领域的等级。这些回合不必连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a free action, your hands can become as hard as wood, covered in tiny thorns. LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 作为一个自由动作，你的双手可以变得像木头一样坚硬，并布满细小的荆棘。当你拥有木质拳头时，你的徒手攻击不会引发借机攻击，并在伤害投掷上获得相当于你牧师等级 1/2 的加成（最低 +1 ）。您每天可以使用此能力的回合数等于 3 + 您的感知修正值。这些回合不必连续。

Wooden Fist: As a free action, your hands can become as hard as wood, covered in tiny thorns. While you have wooden fists, your unarmed strikes do not provoke attacks of opportunity, and gain a bonus on damage rolls equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum +1). LocalizedStrings.enGB: The creature gains a +2 inherent bonus to combat maneuver checks to grapple. This bonus increases to +4 at 8th level and +6 at 15th level.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, the hunter can grant an plant aspect to her plant companion. Unlike with the hunter herself, there is no duration on the plant aspect applied to her plant companion. An aspect applied in this way remains in effect until the hunter changes it. If the hunter's plant companion is dead, the hunter can apply her companion's plant focus to herself instead of her plant companion. Additionally, a hunter can take on the aspect of an plant as a swift action. She gets the same benefits as the current plant companion focus. The hunter can use this ability for a number of minutes per day equal to her level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but must be spent in 1-minute increments. For the purposes of features and abilities that interact with animal focus, plant focuses are animal focuses.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1 级时，猎人可以将植物特性赋予她的植物伙伴。与猎人本身不同的是，应用于植物伙伴的植物属性没有持续时间限制。以这种方式施加的植物属性会一直有效，直到猎人进行更改。如果猎人的植物同伴死亡，猎人可以将同伴的植物专注力应用到自己身上，而不是她的植物同伴身上。此外，猎人还可以通过快速行动获得植物的特性。她可以获得与当前植物同伴专注力相同的效果。猎人每天可以使用此能力的时间等于她的等级。该持续时间无需连续，但必须以 1 分钟为单位。就与动物焦点互动的特性和能力而言，植物焦点就是动物焦点。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Plant Focus
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物聚焦

虽然植物同伴已经对剧毒免疫，但这一固有加成可以与猎人共享。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Plant: You become immune to paralysis, poison, polymorph effects, sleep effects, and stunning.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
植物：你对麻痹、毒素、变形效果、睡眠效果和震慑效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Plant: You become immune to paralysis, poison, polymorph effects, sleep effects, and stunning.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Plant Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 植物领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Some hunters form a bond with plant life instead of an animal and take on those aspects instead. These hunters form potent bonds with plant creatures, and their leafy or fungal friends are more than capable of anything another hunter’s animal allies can accomplish.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 有些猎人会与植物生物而不是动物建立联系，并以植物生物代替猎人。这些猎人会与植物生物建立强大的联系，他们的叶子或真菌朋友可以胜过其他猎人的动物盟友。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Plant Master
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物大师

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A plant master forms a mystic bond with a plant companion. This plant is a loyal companion that accompanies the palnt master on her adventures. Except for the companion being a creature of the plant type, drawn from the list of plant companions, this ability otherwise works like the standard hunter’s animal companion ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物大师与植物伙伴建立了神秘的联系。该植物是植物大师的忠实伙伴，会陪伴植物大师一起冒险。除了同伴是从植物同伴列表中抽取的植物类型生物外，该能力与标准的猎人动物同伴能力相同。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, the hunter can grant an plant aspect to her plant companion. Unlike with the hunter herself, there is no duration on the plant aspect applied to her plant companion. An aspect applied in this way remains in effect until the hunter changes it. If the hunter's plant companion is dead, the hunter can apply her companion's plant focus to herself instead of her plant companion. Additionally, a hunter can take on the aspect of an plant as a swift action. She gets the same benefits as the current plant companion focus. The hunter can use this ability for a number of minutes per day equal to her level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but must be spent in 1-minute increments. For the purposes of features and abilities that interact with animal focus, plant focuses are animal focuses.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Exude an aura of command over hostile plant ceatures within 30 feet, causing them to not move, attack, or use abilities until they are damaged. Once a creature has been freed from this effect, they are immune for 24 hours.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 对 30 英尺范围内的敌对植物生物散发一种命令光环，使其在受到伤害之前无法移动、攻击或使用能力。一旦生物摆脱了这种效果，它们就会在 24 小时内免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Plant Shield
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物防护罩

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 17th level, a plant master and their companion are able to pacify plant creatures. Both master and companion can exude an aura of command over hostile plant ceatures within 30 feet, causing them to not move, attack, or use abilities until they are damaged. Once a creature has been freed from this effect, they are immune for 24 hours.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 17 级时，植物大师和他们的同伴能够安抚植物生物。主人和同伴都能对 30 英尺范围内的敌对植物生物散发出一种命令光环，使它们在受到伤害之前无法移动、攻击或使用能力。一旦生物摆脱了这种影响，它们就会在 24 小时内免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 17th level, a plant master and their companion are able to pacify plant creatures. Both master and companion can exude an aura of command over hostile plant ceatures within 30 feet, causing them to not move, attack, or use abilities until they are damaged. Once a creature has been freed from this effect, they are immune for 24 hours.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 17 级时，植物大师和他们的同伴能够安抚植物生物。主人和同伴都能对 30 英尺范围内的敌对植物生物散发出一种命令光环，使它们在受到伤害之前无法移动、攻击或使用能力。一旦生物摆脱了这种影响，它们就会在 24 小时内免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This creature may not move, attack, or use abilities until they are damaged. Once a creature has been freed from this effect, they are immune for 24 hours.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 该生物在受到伤害之前不能移动、攻击或使用能力。一旦生物摆脱了这一效果，就会在 24 小时内免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Plant Shield - Halted
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物盾牌 - 停止

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This creature is immune to the effects of the plant shield ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 该生物免疫植物护盾能力的效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Plant Shield - Immune
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物盾牌 - 免疫

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a small mandragora. You gain a +2 size bonus to your Dexterity and Constitution and a +2 natural armor bonus. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one 1d6 bite attack, two 1d4 slams and poison ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成了小型曼德拉戈拉。你的敏捷和体质获得 +2 体型加成，天生护甲加成 +2。你的移动速度增加 10 英尺。你还会获得一次 1d6 撕咬攻击、两次 1d4 猛击和中毒能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Plant Shape I
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物形状 I

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You are in mandragora form now. You have a +2 size bonus to Dexterity and Constitution and a +2 natural armor bonus. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also have one 1d6 bite attack, two 1d4 slams and poison ability.

You are in mandragora form now. You have a +2 size bonus to Dexterity and  Constitution and a +2 natural armor bonus. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also have one 1d6 bite attack, two 1d4 slams and poison ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你现在是曼德拉戈拉形态。您的敏捷和体质有 +2 的体型加成，天生护甲加成 +2。您的移动速度增加 10 英尺。您还拥有一次 1d6 撕咬攻击、两次 1d4 重击和中毒能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Plant Shape (Mandragora)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物形状（曼德拉草）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You become a large shambling mound. You gain a +4 size bonus to your Strength, a +2 size bonus to your Constitution, +4 natural armor bonus, resist fire 20, and resist electricity 20. Your movement speed is reduced by 10 feet. You also have two 2d6 slam attacks, the constricting vines ability, and the poison ability.
Constricting Vines: A shambling mound's vines coil around any creature it hits with a slam attack. The shambling mound attempts a grapple maneuver check against its target, and on a successful check its vines deal 2d6+5 damage and the foe is grappled.
Grappled characters cannot move, and take a -2 penalty on all attack rolls and a -4 penalty to Dexterity. Grappled characters attempt to escape every round by making a successful combat maneuver, Strength, Athletics, or Mobility check. The DC of this check is the shambling mound's CMD.
Each round, creatures grappled by a shambling mound suffer 4d6+Strength modifier × 2 damage.
A shambling mound receives a +4 bonus on grapple maneuver checks.
Poison:
Slam; Save: Fortitude
Frequency: 1/round for 2 rounds
Effect: 1d2 Strength and 1d2 Dexterity damage
Cure: 1 save
The save DC is Constitution-based.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你会变成一个蔓生怪。你的力量获得 +4 体型加成，体质获得 +2 体型加成，天生护甲获得 +4，抗火 20，抗电 20。你的移动速度降低 10 英尺。你还拥有两次 2d6 猛击、藤蔓束缚能力和中毒能力：乱冢的藤蔓会缠绕任何被它的猛击击中的生物。如果成功，它的藤蔓会造成 2d6+5 伤害，敌人会被抓住。
被抓住的角色无法移动，所有攻击投掷都会受到-2 的惩罚，敏捷也会受到-4 的惩罚。被擒住的角色每回合都会尝试逃脱，方法是进行一次成功的战斗演习、力量、运动或移动检定。
每回合，被乱冢抓住的生物都会受到4d6+力量修正×2的伤害。
乱冢在擒抱动作检定上获得+4的加成：
频率：1/回合，持续2回合
效果：1d2力量和1d2敏捷伤害
治愈：1次拯救
拯救DC基于体质。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物形状 II（香蒲丘）

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物形状 II

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成了巨型的捕蝇草。你会获得体型+8的力量加成、+4的体质加成、-2的敏捷惩罚以及+6的天生护甲加成。你还会获得四次 1d8 撕咬攻击、酸抗性 20 以及盲视和中毒能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Plant Shape III (Giant Flytrap)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物形状 III（巨型捕蝇草）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You are in giant flytrap form now. You have a +8 size bonus to your Strength, +4 to Constitution, -2 penalty to Dexterity and a +6 natural armor bonus. You also have four 1d8 bite attacks, acid Resistance 20, immunity to trip and blindsight.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你现在是巨型捕蝇草形态。您的力量有 +8 的体型加成，体质有 +4 的加成，敏捷有 -2 的惩罚，天生护甲有 +6 的加成。您还拥有四次 1d8 撕咬攻击、酸抗性 20、绊摔免疫和盲视免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Plant Shape (Giant Flytrap)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物形状（巨型捕蝇草）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a huge treant. You gain a +8 size bonus to your Strength, +4 to Constitution, -2 penalty to Dexterity and a +6 natural armor bonus. You also gain two 2d6 slam attacks, damage reduction 10/slashing, vulnerability to fire and overrun ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成了一只巨型的树人。您会获得体型+8的力量加成、+4的体质加成、-2的敏捷惩罚以及+6的天生护甲加成。您还会获得两次 2d6 猛击、伤害减免 10/砍伤、易受火焰伤害和碾压能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Plant Shape III (Treant)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物形状 III（树人）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You are in treant form now. You have a +8 size bonus to your Strength, +4 to Constitution, -2 penalty to Dexterity and a +6 natural armor bonus. You also have two 2d6 slam attacks, damage reduction 10/slashing, vulnerability to fire and overrun ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你现在是树人形态。您的力量有 +8 的体型加成，体质有 +4 的加成，敏捷有 -2 的惩罚，天生护甲有 +6 的加成。您还拥有两次 2d6 猛击、伤害减免 10/砍伤、易受火焰伤害和碾压能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Plant Shape (Treant)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物形状（树人）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a large shambling mound or a huge quickwood.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你会变成一个巨型的蔓生怪或一棵巨型的迅树。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a huge quickwood. You gain a +4 size bonus to your Strength, a +2 size bonus to your Constitution, +4 natural armor bonus, resist fire 20, resist electricity 20, and spell resistance equal to 10 + half your caster level. Your movement speed is reduced by 10 feet. You also have one 2d6 bite attack and two 1d4 root (tentacle) attacks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成了一棵巨型的迅树。你获得力量 +4 体型加成、体质 +2 体型加成、+4 天生护甲加成、抗火 20、抗电 20 以及等于 10 + 施法者等级一半的法术抗性。你的移动速度降低 10 英尺。您还拥有一次 2d6 撕咬攻击和两次 1d4 根须（触手）攻击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Plant Shape II (Quickwood)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物形状 II（迅树）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a huge quickwood. You gain a +4 size bonus to your Strength, a +2 size bonus to your Constitution, +4 natural armor bonus, resist fire 20, resist electricity 20, and spell resistance equal to 10 + half your caster level. Your movement speed is reduced by 10 feet. You also have one 2d6 bite attack and two 1d4 root (tentacle) attacks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成了一棵巨型的迅树。你获得力量 +4 体型加成、体质 +2 体型加成、+4 天生护甲加成、抗火 20、抗电 20 以及等于 10 + 施法者等级一半的法术抗性。你的移动速度降低 10 英尺。您还拥有一次 2d6 撕咬攻击和两次 1d4 根须（触手）攻击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Plant Shape (Quickwood)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物形状（迅树）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Upon reaching 5th level, a dreadknight receives a boon from their dark patrons. This boon can take one of two forms. Once the form is chosen, it cannot be changed. The first type of bond allows the dread knight to enhance their weapon as a standard action by calling upon the aid of a fiendish spirit for 1 minute per dreadknight level. When called, the spirit causes the weapon to shed unholy light as a torch. At 5th level, this spirit grants the weapon a + 1 enhancement bonus.For every three levels beyond 5th, the weapon gains another + 1 enhancement bonus, to a maximum of + 6 at 20th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
5级时，恐惧骑士会从他们的亵渎领主那里获得恩惠。这种恩惠有两种形式，二选其一。
亵渎武器盟誓：第一种恩惠允许恐惧骑士以一个标准动作来增强他们的武器，在1分钟/每恐惧骑士等级内呼唤恶魔之魂。当被召唤时，灵魂会使武器像火炬一样散发出邪恶的光芒。
在 5级时，精魂给予武器+1增强加值。5级之后每3级，武器再获得+1增强加值，在20级时达到最高+6。
恶魔仆从：第二种恩惠授予恐惧骑士一匹恶魔般的坐骑，将她带入战场。该坐骑相当于德鲁伊的动物伙伴，使用恐惧骑士的等级作为她的有效德鲁伊等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Boon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎恩惠

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 20th level, a dreadknight becomes a conduit for the might of dark powers. Her DR increases to 10/good. 
The dreadknight gains an additional 3 uses of Profane Corruption. In addition, whenever she channels negative energy or uses touch of corruption to damage a creature, she deals the maximum possible amount.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 20 级，恐惧骑士成为黑暗力量的门户。她的 DR 增加 10/善良。恐惧骑士获得额外 3 次亵渎之炎的使用次数。此外，每当她引导负能量或使用亵渎之炎对生物造成伤害时，她都会造成尽可能多的伤害，如同被极效。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Champion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎冠军

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 20th level, a conqueror becomes a beacon of unyielding force. A conquerors inspired rage no longer gives allies a penalty to AC, nor limits what skills or abilities they can use. Additionally, they act as if under a haste effect.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 20 级时，征服者成为不屈力量的灯塔。亵渎敕命不再给予盟友 AC 惩罚，也不会限制他们使用的技能或能力。此外，它们如同处于加速术效果下一样。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Lord
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎之主

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 2nd level, a dreadknight gains a bonus equal to his Charisma bonus (if any) on all saving throws.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 2 级，恐惧骑士在所有豁免检定上获得等同于他的魅力调整值（如果有的话）的加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Resilience
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎之力

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your faith is your greatest source of protection, and you can use that faith to defend others. In addition, you receive a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. Resistant Touch: As a standard action, you can touch an ally to grant them your resistance bonus for 1 minute. When you use this ability, you lose your resistance bonus granted by the Protection domain for 1 minute. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. Aura of Protection: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of protection for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You and your allies within this aura gain a +1 deflection bonus to AC and resistance 5 against all elements (acid, cold, electricity, fire, and sonic). The deflection bonus increases by +1 for every four levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th. At 14th level, the resistance against all elements increases to 10. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的信仰是你坚定防护的源泉，而且你也可以利用信仰之力保护他人。此外，你的{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}将获得+1抗力{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。你每升5级可额外获得1点抗力加值。
抵抗之触：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触{/g}一个盟友后，可使其拥有你的抗力加值，持续1分钟。在你使用此能力时，你将失去来自保护领域的抗力加值，持续1分钟。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
守护灵光：达到8级后，你可发出30英尺范围的守护灵光，每天可持续的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。在此灵光范围内的盟友，包括你自身的{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}防御等级{/g}获得+1偏斜加值，以及对抗所有能量的5点抗性（酸蚀、寒冷、电击、火焰和音波）。在8级后，赋予你此领域的职业每升4级，可额外提高1点偏斜加值。14级时，对抗所有能量的抗性将提高到10点。生效轮次无需连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your faith is your greatest source of protection, and you can use that faith to defend others. In addition, you receive a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. 
Resistant Touch: As a standard action, you can touch an ally to grant them your resistance bonus for 1 minute. When you use this ability, you lose your resistance bonus granted by the Protection domain for 1 minute. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. 
Aura of Protection: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of protection for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You and your allies within this aura gain a +1 deflection bonus to AC and resistance 5 against all elements (acid, cold, electricity, fire, and sonic). The deflection bonus increases by +1 for every four levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th. At 14th level, the resistance against all elements increases to 10. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的信仰是你最大的保护源泉，你可以用信仰来保护他人。此外，你还能在施法时获得+1抗性加成。你所拥有的等级每提升5级，该加成就会增加1级。
抵抗之触：作为一个标准动作，你可以触摸一个盟友，让他们获得你的抗性加成，持续1分钟。使用此能力时，你将失去保护领域赋予你的抗性加成，持续 1 分钟。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知修正值。
保护光环：8级时，你可以发出一个30英尺的保护光环，每天持续的回合数等于你获得该领域的等级。在此光环内，你和你的盟友会获得 AC+1防御加成，并对所有元素（酸、冷、电、火和声波）具有 5 抗性。在第 8 级之后，你所拥有的等级每提升 4 级，防御加成就会增加 +1。14 级时，对所有元素的抗性增加到 10。这些回合不需要连续进行。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your faith is your greatest source of protection, and you can use that faith to defend others. In addition, you receive a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. 
Resistant Touch: As a standard action, you can touch an ally to grant them your resistance bonus for 1 minute. When you use this ability, you lose your resistance bonus granted by the Protection domain for 1 minute. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. 
Aura of Protection: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of protection for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You and your allies within this aura gain a +1 deflection bonus to AC and resistance 5 against all elements (acid, cold, electricity, fire, and sonic). The deflection bonus increases by +1 for every four levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th. At 14th level, the resistance against all elements increases to 10. These rounds do not need to be consecutive. 
Domain Spells: protection from alignment, barkskin, protection from energy, communal protection from energy, spell resistance, communal stoneskin, greater restoration, protection from spells, seamantle.

你的信仰是你最大的保护源泉，你可以用信仰来保护他人。此外，你还能在施法时获得+1抗性加成。你所拥有的等级每提升5级，该加成就会增加1级。

领域法术：阵营防护、树肤术术、能量防护、群体能量防护、法术抗性、群体石肤、大恢复术、法术防护、海曼特尔。

This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. 领域法术：防护阵营，树肤，防护能量，共用防护能量，法术抵抗，共用石肤，高等复原术，防护魔法，水幕拒敌。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Protection Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 保护领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Protection: You gain the protection of the following spells: false life, delay poison, protection from alignment, mage armor, and shield.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
保护：你获得以下法术效果：虚假生命、延缓毒发、防护阵营、法师护甲和护盾术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Protection Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 保护领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You channel the power of the Boneyard, the place of judgement for all souls, your touch can move foes to an early rest.
Bleeding Touch: As a melee touch attack, you can cause a living creature to take 1d6 points of damage per round. This effect persists for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Spirit Touch: At 6th level, as a swift action, you can give your natural weapons or any weapons you wield the ghost touch weapon special ability. You can use this power a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds need not be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你引导所有灵魂的审判之地——骨原的力量，你的触碰可以让敌人早日安眠。
流血之触：作为近战接触攻击，你可以使活物每轮受到 1d6 点伤害。这种效果持续的轮数等于赋予你领域的职业等级的 1/2（至少 1 轮）。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知调整值。
灵触：在第 6 级，以一个迅捷动作，你可以赋予你的天生武器或任何你使用的武器的幽冥属性。你每天可以使用此能力的轮数等于你的牧师等级。生效轮次无需连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Psychopomp Subdomain - Death
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 护魂子域——死亡

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You channel the power of the Boneyard, the place of judgement for all souls, your touch can move foes to an early rest.
Bleeding Touch: As a melee touch attack, you can cause a living creature to take 1d6 points of damage per round. This effect persists for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Spirit Touch: At 6th level, as a swift action, you can give your natural weapons or any weapons you wield the ghost touch weapon special ability. You can use this power a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds need not be consecutive.
Domain Spells: cause fear, boneshaker, ray of exhaustion, enervation, slay living, summon monster VI, destruction, horrid wilting, wail of the banshee.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你引导所有灵魂的审判之地——骨原的力量，你的触碰可以让敌人早日安眠。
流血之触：作为近战接触攻击，你可以使活物每轮受到 1d6 点伤害。这种效果持续的轮数等于赋予你领域的职业等级的 1/2（至少 1 轮）。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知调整值。
灵触：在第 6 级，以一个迅捷动作，你可以赋予你的天生武器或任何你使用的武器的幽冥属性。你每天可以使用此能力的轮数等于你的牧师等级。生效轮次无需连续。
领域法术：惊恐术，颤骨，力竭射线，弱能术，杀生术，召唤怪物 VI，灰飞烟灭，凋死术，女妖之嚎。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You channel the power of the Boneyard, the place of judgement for all souls, your touch can move foes to an early rest.
Bleeding Touch: As a melee touch attack, you can cause a living creature to take 1d6 points of damage per round. This effect persists for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Spirit Touch: At 6th level, as a swift action, you can give your natural weapons or any weapons you wield the ghost touch weapon special ability. You can use this power a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds need not be consecutive.
Domain Spells: cause fear, boneshaker, ray of exhaustion, enervation, slay living, summon monster VI, destruction, horrid wilting, wail of the banshee.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你引导所有灵魂的审判之地——骨原的力量，你的触碰可以让敌人早日安眠。
流血之触：作为近战接触攻击，你可以使活物每轮受到 1d6 点伤害。这种效果持续的轮数等于赋予你领域的职业等级的 1/2（至少 1 轮）。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知调整值。
灵触：在第 6 级，以一个迅捷动作，你可以赋予你的天生武器或任何你使用的武器的幽冥属性。你每天可以使用此能力的轮数等于你的牧师等级。生效轮次无需连续。
领域法术：惊恐术，颤骨，力竭射线，弱能术，杀生术，召唤怪物 VI，灰飞烟灭，凋死术，女妖之嚎。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 6th level, as a swift action, you can give your natural weapons or any weapons you wield the ghost touch weapon special ability. You can use this power a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds need not be consecutive.
A ghost touch weapon deals damage normally against incorporeal creatures, regardless of its bonus. An incorporeal creature's 50% reduction in damage from corporeal sources does not apply to attacks made against it with ghost touch weapons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
在第 6 级，以一个迅捷动作，你可以赋予你的天生武器或任何你使用的武器的幽冥属性。你每天可以使用此能力的轮数等于你的牧师等级。生效轮次无需连续。
幽冥武器能够无视{g|Encyclopedia:Incorporeal_Touch_Attack}虚体{/g}形态的加值，对其造成正常{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}。虚体生物从实体来源受到的伤害会降低50%，而由幽冥武器做出的攻击，其伤害无法被降低。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 6th level, as a swift action, you can give your natural weapons or any weapons you wield the ghost touch weapon special ability. You can use this power a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds need not be consecutive.
A ghost touch weapon deals damage normally against incorporeal creatures, regardless of its bonus. An incorporeal creature's 50% reduction in damage from corporeal sources does not apply to attacks made against it with ghost touch weapons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
在第 6 级，以一个迅捷动作，你可以赋予你的天生武器或任何你使用的武器的幽冥属性。你每天可以使用此能力的轮数等于你的牧师等级。生效轮次无需连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You channel the power of the Boneyard, the place of judgement for all souls, your touch can move foes to an early rest.
Gentle Rest: Your touch can fill a creature with lethargy, causing a living creature to become staggered for 1 round as a melee touch attack. If you touch a staggered living creature, that creature falls asleep for 1 round instead. Undead creatures touched are staggered for a number of rounds equal to your Wisdom modifier. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Spirit Touch: At 6th level, as a swift action, you can give your natural weapons or any weapons you wield the ghost touch weapon special ability. You can use this power a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds need not be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你引导所有灵魂的审判之地——骨原的力量，你的触碰可以让敌人早日安眠。
温柔休息：你可以用一次近战接触攻击向一个生物注入昏睡之力，使该活着的生物陷入恍惚）状态，持续1轮。若你接触了一个恍惚状态的生物，则其改为陷入睡眠1轮。若被接触的为不死生物则改为恍惚等同于你感知修正的轮数。本能力每日可用次数等于“3+感知修正”。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lord of Eternity   
Alignment: Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Architecture, Craftsmanship, Creation, Metalworking   
Domains: Artifice, Earth, Fire, Knowledge, Travel   
Subdomains: Ash, Construct, Metal, Smoke, Thought, Trade   
Favoured Weapon: Quarterstaff   
Holy Symbol: Staff composed of the ankh, djed, and was   
Sacred Animal: Bull   
According to ancient Osirian mythology, Ptah is the demiurge who created the universe through his thought and creative word. He is the artisan of the gods, a deity of creation and the arts, of architecture, invention, metalworking, and sculpture. Such is Ptah's creative power that alone among the ancient Osirian gods, he created himself. He is the fire beneath the earth, and earthquakes and tremors are said to be signs of his disfavor. Ptah is the husband of Sekhmet, and an ally of Ra and Maat. Although he normally remains aloof from divine politics, he has come into conflict with Apep and Set when those gods attempt to destroy his creations. Ptah normally appears as a man wearing the wrappings of a mummy, with a simple skullcap on his head, and holding a staff in his hands composed of three combined symbols of his creative power-the ankh, representing life; the djed pillar, signifying stability; and the was scepter, symbolizing power. At other times, Ptah is depicted as a naked and deformed dwarf, and it is in this form that the Pahmet dwarves of Osirion venerate him. Ptah is the patron of alchemists, architects, artisans, artists, bards, builders, carpenters, masons, metalworkers, shipbuilders, and anyone else who is involved in creative endeavors. Additionally, Ptah is said to hear the prayers of all mortal worshipers, and he often intercedes with the other gods on behalf of humanity.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：永恒之主
阵营：绝对中立
神职：构装体、手艺、创造、金工
领域：工匠、大地、火焰、知识、旅行
子领域：灰烬、构装、金属、烟幕、思想、交易
偏好武器：木棍
圣徽由命符、稳柱与霸杖组成的权杖
圣兽：公牛
根据古奥西里昂神话，卜塔是透过思想与文字创作出宇宙的造物主。祂是诸神之中的艺匠，创作与工艺─例如构装体、发明、金工与雕刻─之神。卜塔的创造力之强，祂是唯一一个自我创造的神祇，大异于其他古奥西里昂诸神。祂是地底下的烈焰，地震与颤动被视为祂不悦的征兆。
卜塔是塞赫美特的配偶，拉和玛亚特的盟友。虽然祂平常不在乎天界政治，每当阿佩普及赛特威胁到祂的造物时也会出手对抗。卜塔一般以戴着简单圆帽，身上紧包木乃伊裹尸布的男子姿态示人，手持以三个祂所创造的符号─生命的命符、稳定的稳柱、权威的霸杖─组合而成的权杖。有时祂也会被描绘成一个裸体的畸形矮人，奥西里昂的帕梅矮人崇拜祂的此一形象。
卜塔是炼金术师、构装体师、艺匠、吟游诗人、构装体工、木匠、石匠、金工师、船匠以及其他任何进行创作活动者的守护神。此外，据说卜塔会倾听所有凡人的祈祷，不时为了人类向诸神说情。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ptah
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 卜塔

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Shimmering Maiden, The North Star, Mistress of the Stars, Light of the Aurora  
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Constellations, Homesickness, Northern Lights
Domains: Air, Chaos, Good, Weather   
Subdomains: Azata, Cloud, Seasons, Stars   
Favoured Weapon: Sling
Holy Symbol: Face in Northern Lights   
Sacred Animal: Firefly   
Sacred Colour: Midnight Blue   
Pulura, the mistress of the stars and the aurora, is an angel empyreal lord, the patron of those travellers that become homesick, lost, or injured in the snowy wastes of the far north.Pulura was worshiped as a major deity in the lost Kellid realm of Sarkoris. The Sarkorians saw her and the demon lord Kostchtchie as dualistic gods of cold. She was honoured by a mighty ring of idols in the city of Dyinglight but, in common with the rest of Sarkoris, the city fell to the demons of the Worldwound. A cascade named for her, Pulura's Fall, once flowed to the northeast of Iz; it has since been swallowed by the Worldwound, but its namesake, a temple to Pulura, remains, and has been withstanding a demonic siege for more than a century. An idol to Pulura stands on the Walk of Lost Gods in the ravaged town of Gundrun.
Appearance: Pulura appears as a lovely, alluring Tian woman with the grace of a dancer, a gravity about her expression, and black, flowing hair gleaming with the light of stars. Her robes appear to be made from green and pink light, and flicker with every one of her movements. She often appears dancing amid the aurora borealis in the skies of far northern lands, and legend has it that her extraordinary beauty will burn any mortals who dare approach her too closely. She wields a sling made from sighs that fires bullets of starlight.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：:微光少女
阵营: 混乱善良
神职:星座，思乡，北极光
领域: 气, 混乱, 善良, 天气
子领域: 爱塔, 云, 季节, 星辰
偏好武器：投石索（投石杖）
圣徽：幻化成人脸的北极光
圣兽：萤火虫
微光少女舞动于北天之上，代表着星座，思乡与北极光。璞露拉明白星座是凡人在世界中行走时的指引，群星照亮地上的道路，让那些旅行探索之人总能找到回家的方向。星座的故事不但提供给人们娱乐，讲述关于良善，光明与力量的故事，也是帮助人们学习记忆星辰的工具。它们确保星图总是能够易读难忘。微光少女呼唤她的信徒学习星图，为那些迷失者和需求向导之人提供帮助，并且比这更重要的是，信徒要自行学会在旅途中解读天穹，为自己导航。
通常，凡人很难看到微光少女，她出现在凡人面前时，就像一颗遥远而明亮的炽热星辰。当人们能够看到她时，她的外表看起来就像是一个天洲女性，漆黑的长发中闪动着星光。她身着嫩绿桃粉的长袍——袍子的材料不似任何人间的织物，而像是由纯粹的光编织而成。璞露拉的追随者包括旅行者，向导，游牧民，探险家，水手，观星者和猎人。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You must have a bardic performance in effect to cast this spell. With a flourish, you immediately end your bardic performance, removing one of the following conditions on a creature within range affected by your bardic performance: dazzled, exhausted, paralyzed, shaken, or stunned.
You cannot activate another bardic performance this round. If you have the lingering performance feat the effect lingers as normal.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你必须处于一个生效中的吟游演绎中才能施展这个法术。使用时，你立即结束表演，移除受你的吟游表演影响范围内的生物的以下状态之一：目眩、力竭、麻痹、颤栗或震慑。本轮你不能激活另一个吟游表演。如果你有余音绕梁的表演专长，效果会像往常一样持续。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 净化谢幕曲

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Master of Medicine   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Healing, Magic, Medicine   
Edict: Teach knowledge to others, relieve suffering despite personal difficulty, heal sickness and injuries   
Domains: Good, Healing, Knowledge, Magic, Protection   
Subdomains: Agathion, Divine, Memory, Purity, Restoration, Resurrection   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy mace   
Holy Symbol: Wagon wheel with spokes made of fire, earth, metal, water, and wood   
Sacred Animal: Crane   
Qi Zhong is the Master of Medicine, god of healing and magic. It was Qi Zhong, at Shizuru’s bequest, who employed his skill and magic to bring the moon god Tsukiyo back to life after he was slain by his brother Fumeiyoshi, and it was Qi Zhong who first taught mortals the importance of the five elements—fire, earth, metal, water, and wood—and their connection to magic, medicine, and martial arts, among other pursuits. Healers, sages, scholars, and practitioners of traditional Tian medicine venerate Qi Zhong, as do wizards and mystic theurges, many of whom serve in his priesthood. Qi Zhong’s faithful believe it is their duty to teach their knowledge and learning to others. He appears as a kindly older man dressed in a healer’s robe that seems to shift between the five elements.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：医药大师 
阵营：中立善良 
神职：治疗、魔法、医学
信条：向他人传授知识，不顾个人苦难悬壶济世，治愈疾病和伤害 
领域：善良、医疗、知识、魔法、保护 
子领域：盖森，神力、记忆、纯净、复原、回生
偏好武器：重型硬头锤
圣徽：以五行为轮辐的马车 
圣兽：鹤
药师祖齐仲是治疗和魔法技艺之神。他曾经应静琉的请求，以精湛的医术和超人的法力救活了被文业谋杀的月神月夜，也是齐仲最早发现了金木水火土五行的秘示域——关于魔法、医疗和武技的知识并将之传授给凡人。治疗师、贤哲、智者和操持天洲古老医术的郎中尊崇齐仲，法师和其他奥术施法者也信奉他并经常成为他的牧师，他们相信教授自己的知识，同时从别人那里学习知识是最为崇高的任务。齐仲的化身形象是一个和蔼的老人，身穿一件材质在五行元素间不断轮转的医师长袍。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Qi Zhong
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 齐仲

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: King of the Heavens   
Alignment: Lawful Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Creation, Rulership, Sun   
Domains: Fire, Glory, Law, Nobility, Sun   
Subdomains: Day, Heroism, Honor, Inevitable, Leadership, Light   
Favoured Weapon: Spear (Longspear)   
Holy Symbol: Solar disk   
Sacred Animal: Falcon   
Ra is the god of the sun, particularly the midday sun, and travels on a great solar barge through the heavens. He created most of the ancient Osirian gods and ruled as their king during the Age of Creation. The ancient Osirians believed they were created from Ra's tears, and like the sun, Ra watches over all the earth and his creations. Ra is the ruler of the heavens, a deity of kings and royalty. He represents fair and just rule in accordance with the principles ofhonor and truth. Ra is depicted as a powerful man with the head of a falcon and a blazing solar disk above his head. He is the father of Bastet, Hathor, Maat, and Sekhmet, though he created many of the other Osirian gods as well. His archenemy is Apep, and every night Ra must defend the sun against the great serpent who seeks to consume it. That the sun rises in the morning is seen as proof of Ra's victory over the Devourer of the Dawn. Kings and pharaohs worship Ra as their patron, as do paladins and warriors battling against the forces of darkness. As the god of the sun, Ra is also venerated by commoners and farmers. Ra's temples are open to the sky and decorated with obelisks representing petrified sun's rays, and services are held in daylight under Ra's watchful eye.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：天国圣王
阵营：守序中立
神职：创造、统驭、太阳
领域：火焰、荣耀、守序、崇高、太阳
子领域：白昼、英勇、诚实、制裁、领导、光明
偏好武器：矛（长矛）
圣徽：日轮
圣兽：隼
拉是太阳神，更具体的说来是午阳之神，祂搭乘着巨型的太阳船在天国移动。拉创造了古奥西里昂绝大多的诸神，并以圣王之尊于创世之年御驭祂们。古奥西里昂人相信自己是由拉的泪滴所化，而祂就样太阳一般看顾天下及祂的造物。拉是天国的统治者，是君主与王室之神。祂体现了依循荣誉与真理等原则所推行的德政。
拉被描绘成身形壮硕颈上鹰首，头顶耀眼日轮的男子。祂是芭丝特、哈索尔、玛亚特与赛赫美特的父亲，也是其他许多诸神的创造者。阿佩普是拉的死敌，每一入夜拉便必须从意图一口吞下的大蛇口中守护太阳，每次日出都被视为拉又一次成功击退了吞日大蛇。
君主与法老将拉视为守护神敬拜，一如与黑暗势力对抗的圣武士及武人。作为太阳之神，拉也受平民与农夫供奉。拉的神殿一般开有天窗，并饰有象征凝固的阳光的方尖碑，且总是在太阳底下─拉的监督中─进行仪式。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：天王 
阵营：守序中立 
关注领域：创造, 统治, 太阳 
领域：火、荣耀、守序、贵族、太阳 
次领域：日、英雄主义、荣誉、必然、领导、光 
最喜爱的武器：长矛（长枪） 
神圣象征：太阳圆盘 
圣兽：猎鹰猎鹰 
拉是太阳神，尤其是正午的太阳，他乘坐一艘巨型的太阳驳船在天上旅行。他创造了大多数古奥西里斯神，并在创世时代作为他们的国王统治着他们。古奥西里斯人相信他们是由拉的眼泪创造的，拉像太阳一样守护着大地和他的创造物。拉是天界的统治者，是国王和王权之神。他代表着符合荣誉和真理原则的公平公正的统治。拉神被描绘成一个头顶猎鹰和炽热太阳圆盘的强大男子。他是巴斯提、哈托尔、玛阿特和塞克梅特的父亲，但他也创造了许多其他奥西里斯神。他的死敌是阿佩普，每晚拉神都必须保卫太阳，抵御试图吞噬太阳的大蛇。太阳在清晨升起被视为拉神战胜黎明吞噬者的证明。国王和法老将魔王奉为守护神，圣骑士和与黑暗势力作战的战士也将魔王奉为守护神。作为太阳神，拉也受到平民和农民的崇拜。拉神的神庙向天空敞开，装饰着代表石化太阳光的方尖碑，祭祀活动在拉神的注视下于白天举行。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ra
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 拉

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Water Lord, Serpent King, The World Serpent, The Father of Dragons   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Linnorms, Oceans, Spirals   
Domains: Chaos, Evil, Scalykind , Water   
Subdomains: Ancestors, Dragon, Oceans, Venom   
Favoured Weapon: Whip (Trident)   
Holy Symbol: Blue ouroboros   
Sacred Animal: Sea snake   
Many adjectives can describe Ragadahn, but “humble” is not one of them. Fond of titles, he is also called the Serpent King, the Water Lord, and even the Father of Dragons. This last is considered heretical by most metallic and chromatic dragons, yet many linnorms pay homage to him as their progenitor, and few of the great dragons—or anyone else—would dare enter the First World’s deep seas and oceans without his permission. Ragadahn himself resembles an enormous, streamlined linnorm with flippers instead of legs, his scales a deep, shimmering blue-green. While his home is the deep trench-city of Karaphas, he claims all of the seas and lakes of the First World—and, to some extent, of the Material Plane—as his personal realm. All creatures who live in or enter deep waters are thus subject to his authority, though in truth he cares little for the dealings of ordinary fey or mortals, and few ever glimpse his majesty. That said, any land-dwellers wishing to speak with him are best advised to call his name from a sea cliff or peninsula rather than approach his home directly, lest they be accused of trespassing. Most stories of the Water Lord tend to caricature him as the epitome of draconic arrogance, yet these are quick to note his wisdom as well—for despite his tempestuous nature, Ragadahn is a consummate scholar of the unknown and unknowable. He believes that life first arose in the oceans, and that the secrets to eternity and existence remain in their depths. He’s fond of symbolism, particularly the unending ouroboros and the ever-descending spiral, and behind his fearsome facade lies a keen mind and a wealth of knowledge regarding extinct aquatic cultures from across the planes.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：水之主
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：蛇龙、海洋、漩涡 
领域：混乱、邪恶、鳞类、流水
子领域：先祖、龙、海、毒液
偏好武器：鞭子（三叉戟）
圣徽：蓝色衔尾蛇 
圣兽：海蛇
许多形容词都可以用来形容拉格达恩，但“谦卑”不是其中之一。喜欢头衔：，有巨蛇之王、世界之蛇和（一些异端学说中）真龙之父之称。最后这一点被大多数金属龙和彩色龙认为是异端邪说，但许多蛇龙都将他作为他们的祖先向他表示敬意，而且很少有巨龙——或其他任何人——敢未经他的许可进入第一世界的深海和海洋。
拉格达恩本人就像一条巨型的流线型蛇龙，有鳍状肢而不是腿，它的鳞片闪烁着深邃蓝绿色。
虽然他的家是深海城市卡拉法斯，但他声称第一世界的所有海洋和湖泊——在某种程度上，还包括主物质位面——都是他的个人领域。所有生活在或进入深海的生物都因此服从他的权威，尽管事实上他并不关心普通的妖精或凡人的行为，也很少有人能瞥见他的威严。
也就是说，任何希望与他交谈的陆地居民最好从海崖或半岛上喊他的名字，而不是直接接近他的家，以免他们被指控擅自闯入。
大多数关于水之主的故事都倾向于将他描绘成龙类傲慢的缩影，但这些故事也很快注意到了他的感知——尽管他性格暴躁，但拉格达恩是一位研究未知和不可名状的完美学者。他相信生命首先出现在海洋中，而永恒和存在的秘密就在海洋深处。他喜欢象征主义，尤其是永无止境的衔尾蛇和不断下降的螺旋，在他可怕的外表背后，隐藏着敏锐的头脑和丰富的关于来自各个位面的已灭绝水生文化的知识。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ragadahn
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 拉格达恩

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: General of Vengeance   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Domains: Destruction, Good, Law, Nobility   
Subdomains: Archon, Leadership, Martyr, Rage   
Favoured Weapon: Bastard Sword   
Holy Symbol: Sword, crossed with Wing   
Sacred Animal: Mastiff   
Sacred Colours: Crimson, Gold   
Ragathiel is an empyreal lord—a good servant of the gods who through transcendence has achieved some small measure of divine power—known as the General of Vengeance. His portfolio includes chivalry, duty, and vengeance, and his holy symbol is a bastard sword crossed with a crimson wing. He makes his home at the base of the mountain of Heaven, in his eponymous fortress, a magnificent steel structure designed to withstand a thousand-year siege if need be. Ragathiel takes an active role in the battle against Hell's fiendish legions. He shines at the head of his army, a figure of golden light cleaving through the ranks of devils that face him. Soldiers of all kinds, but particularly knights, pay homage to Ragathiel and pray for his virtue and wrathful strength in battle. Those who have taken vows, especially those of duty or vengeance, hold Ragathiel as their ideal, and his agents sometimes assist those who have been grievously wronged and now seek righteous vengeance. As strange as it may seem, Ragathiel is the son of Feronia, a demigoddess of the Plane of Fire, and Dispater, the Father of Dis. He was conceived in a brief tryst (lasting only a few centuries), after which his mother took him out of Hell. Ragathiel's tainted heritage has left him with a wrathful heart, and the angel struggles constantly to master his baser impulses in service to the light. For thousands of years he strove to prove himself to the angelic choirs of Heaven. In the Maelstrom he wrestled for 16 years with a monstrous evil serpent whose scales wept acidic blood until he was able to choke the life out of it. He led an entire army against one of the iron fortresses of Avernus and burned the castle to the ground with holy fire, single-handedly maiming Infernal Duke Deumus in the process. Finally the other empyreal lords agreed to admit Ragathiel into their ranks, and now they appear to trust the angel completely—though that trust took centuries to develop. At some point in history, Ragathiel destroyed Typhon, the original ruler of the first layer of Hell. He may have been manipulated into doing so by the schemes of Asmodeus to punish Typhon for his indiscretions. Ragathiel was once served by the Hand of the Inheritor, an angel who now acts as the goddess Iomedae's herald. Then known as the Hand of Vengeance, this angel asked to be reassigned to Iomedae after the death of Aroden. 
Appearance: Ragathiel is a tower of glorious might. He stands almost 20 feet tall, and five lofty burning wings stretch from his back. The General of Vengeance once had six wings, but one was severed, torn from his body by the archdevil Dispater—Ragathiel's father.   
Worship: Ragathiel is commonly worshiped by the avowed, knights, soldiers, the wronged, and the empyreal lord employs aasimar, paladins, blink dogs, and kirin as his most common servants. The holiest time for Ragathiel's followers is the brief moments before and after a battle. The faithful ask Ragathiel's eyes to fall upon them and for his wings to shield them. This is also a standard greeting and farewell among worshipers. Followers of Ragathiel commonly wear red and silver clothing. Many also don an ornament or sigil the color of flames, typically on the helmet. Ragathiel has a small but old cult in Magnimar, a city known for its many mystery cults revering various empyreal lords.   
Paladin Code:   
*I will avenge evil wrought upon the innocent.   
*I will not give my word lightly, but once it is given, I will uphold a promise until my last breath.   
*Those proven guilty must be punished for their crimes. I will not turn a blind eye to wrongdoing.   
*Rage is a virtue and a strength only when focused against the deserving. I will never seek disproportionate retribution.   
*Redemption finds hearts from even the cruelest origins. I will strive not to act upon prejudice against fellow mortals based on race or origin.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：复仇战将
阵营：守序善良
神职：破坏，善良，秩序，崇高
子领域：亚空，领导，殉难，狂暴
偏好武器：重剑
圣徽：交叉的剑与翼
圣兽：獒犬
复仇战将象征骑士精神，责任与复仇，他是骑士的典范。作为魔鬼大公迪斯帕特和原生的火之半神费洛尼娅的子嗣，他艰辛的克服他父母的名誉对他的影响。因此，他深切了解寻求接纳和信任，为了正义与良善，与自身的本性时刻斗争是多么艰辛难苦。他代表战斗中的力量，面对邪恶时的愤怒，对冤屈者的容赦，或是为之复仇。他代表在危难时领军的责任，守护无辜之人的美德与义务。他期望他的追随者消灭他们发现的邪恶异界生物，并努力去赢取周围之人的信赖与尊重。追随复仇战将之人将他视为光辉的榜样，身先士卒地冲锋在战斗与对抗邪恶的最前线。
复仇战将的化身是一个高大的巨型人类，身高超过20呎，身着闪耀光芒的黄金板甲，手持燃烧着熊熊圣火的剑刃。五个燃烧的火翼从他的背后伸展开来，三翼在左，二翼在右——而缺失的第六翼被他的父亲在暴怒之中撕扯了下来。拉贾瑟尔的追随者包括十字军战士，骑士，士兵，被诬陷之人，被边缘化之人和被冤屈者。

复仇战将的化身是一个高大的巨型人类，身高超过20呎，身着闪耀光芒的黄金板甲，手持燃烧着熊熊圣火的剑刃。五个燃烧的火翼从他的背后伸展开来，三翼在左，二翼在右——而缺失的第六翼被他的父亲在暴怒之中撕扯了下来。拉贾瑟尔的追随者包括十字军战士，骑士，士兵，被诬陷之人，被边缘化之人和被冤屈者。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: General of Vengeance   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Domains: Destruction, Good, Law, Nobility   
Subdomains: Archon, Leadership, Martyr, Rage   
Favoured Weapon: Bastard Sword   
Holy Symbol: Sword, crossed with Wing   
Sacred Animal: Mastiff   
Sacred Colours: Crimson, Gold   
Ragathiel is an empyreal lord—a good servant of the gods who through transcendence has achieved some small measure of divine power—known as the General of Vengeance. His portfolio includes chivalry, duty, and vengeance, and his holy symbol is a bastard sword crossed with a crimson wing. He makes his home at the base of the mountain of Heaven, in his eponymous fortress, a magnificent steel structure designed to withstand a thousand-year siege if need be. Ragathiel takes an active role in the battle against Hell's fiendish legions. He shines at the head of his army, a figure of golden light cleaving through the ranks of devils that face him. Soldiers of all kinds, but particularly knights, pay homage to Ragathiel and pray for his virtue and wrathful strength in battle. Those who have taken vows, especially those of duty or vengeance, hold Ragathiel as their ideal, and his agents sometimes assist those who have been grievously wronged and now seek righteous vengeance. As strange as it may seem, Ragathiel is the son of Feronia, a demigoddess of the Plane of Fire, and Dispater, the Father of Dis. He was conceived in a brief tryst (lasting only a few centuries), after which his mother took him out of Hell. Ragathiel's tainted heritage has left him with a wrathful heart, and the angel struggles constantly to master his baser impulses in service to the light. For thousands of years he strove to prove himself to the angelic choirs of Heaven. In the Maelstrom he wrestled for 16 years with a monstrous evil serpent whose scales wept acidic blood until he was able to choke the life out of it. He led an entire army against one of the iron fortresses of Avernus and burned the castle to the ground with holy fire, single-handedly maiming Infernal Duke Deumus in the process. Finally the other empyreal lords agreed to admit Ragathiel into their ranks, and now they appear to trust the angel completely—though that trust took centuries to develop. At some point in history, Ragathiel destroyed Typhon, the original ruler of the first layer of Hell.He may have been manipulated into doing so by the schemes of Asmodeus to punish Typhon for his indiscretions.[9] Ragathiel was once served by the Hand of the Inheritor, an angel who now acts as the goddess Iomedae's herald. Then known as the Hand of Vengeance, this angel asked to be reassigned to Iomedae after the death of Aroden. 
Appearance: Ragathiel is a tower of glorious might. He stands almost 20 feet tall, and five lofty burning wings stretch from his back. The General of Vengeance once had six wings, but one was severed, torn from his body by the archdevil Dispater—Ragathiel's father.   
Worship: Ragathiel is commonly worshiped by the avowed, knights, soldiers, the wronged, and the empyreal lord employs aasimar, paladins, blink dogs, and kirin as his most common servants.[4] The holiest time for Ragathiel's followers is the brief moments before and after a battle. The faithful ask Ragathiel's eyes to fall upon them and for his wings to shield them.This is also a standard greeting and farewell among worshipers. Followers of Ragathiel commonly wear red and silver clothing.Many also don an ornament or sigil the color of flames, typically on the helmet. Ragathiel has a small but old cult in Magnimar, a city known for its many mystery cults revering various empyreal lords.   
Paladin Code:   
*I will avenge evil wrought upon the innocent.   
*I will not give my word lightly, but once it is given, I will uphold a promise until my last breath.   
*Those proven guilty must be punished for their crimes. I will not turn a blind eye to wrongdoing.   
*Rage is a virtue and a strength only when focused against the deserving. I will never seek disproportionate retribution.   
*Redemption finds hearts from even the cruelest origins. I will strive not to act upon prejudice against fellow mortals based on race or origin.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：复仇战将
阵营：守序善良
神职：破坏，善良，秩序，崇高
子领域：亚空，领导，殉难，狂暴
偏好武器：重剑
圣徽：交叉的剑与翼
圣兽：獒犬
