LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ragathiel
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 拉贾瑟尔

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are granted a fraction of the pure divine rage of your deity.
Destructive Smite: You gain the the supernatural ability to make a melee attack with a morale bonus on damage rolls equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1).
Rage: At 8th level, you can enter a fearsome rage, like a barbarian, for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level + your constitution modifier. At 12th and 16th level, you can select one rage power. You cannot select any rage power that possesses a level requirement, but otherwise your barbarian level is equal to 1/2 your cleric level. These rounds of rage stack with any rounds of rage you might have from levels of barbarian.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你沉浸于毁灭与破坏之中，将发出特殊的毁灭{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}。
毁灭斩击：你获得进行一次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}近战攻击{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}超自然能力{/g}，本次攻击在{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害检定{/g}时获得士气{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，加值数等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级（最低为1）。
狂暴：8级时，你每天能狂暴的轮数为牧师等级，该狂暴轮数和任何你从野蛮人等级获得的狂暴轮数叠加。在12级和16级能分别选择一个狂暴之力——但不能是有等级要求的，其它时候你野蛮人等级视为牧师等级一半。狂暴的使用次数与你野蛮人狂暴次数叠加。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Rage Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 狂暴子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
An archer may catch an arrow fired at him once per round as if he had the deflect arrows feat, but only while holding a bow. 
When an arrow is successfully caught, he may fire it along with his next fired arrow as an extra attack. You may only fire one additional arrow at a time from this feature.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
弓箭手每轮可以接住向他射来的箭一次，就像他拥有箭矢偏转专长一样，但仅限于持弓时。
当成功接住一支箭时，他可以在发射下一支箭时一并发射，作为额外攻击。使用此专长一次只能发射一支额外的箭。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 19th level, an archer gains DR 5/— against ranged attacks. In addition, an archer may catch an arrow fired at him once per round as if he had the deflect arrows feat, but only while holding a bow. 
When an arrow is successfully caught, he may fire it along with his next fired arrow as an extra attack. You may only fire one additional arrow at a time from this feature.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
19 级时，弓箭手可获得 5/- 防御远程攻击的 DR。此外，弓箭手每回合可以接住一次射向他的箭，就像他拥有箭矢偏转专长一样，但仅限于持弓时。
当成功接住一支箭时，他可以将其与下一支箭一起发射，作为额外攻击。使用此专长一次只能发射一支额外的箭。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ranged Defense
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 远程防御

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, a ravener hunter gains Demon Hunter as a bonus feat, ignoring its prerequisites. In addition she gains a +2 morale bonus on attack rolls and caster level checks to overcome spell resistance of creatures that she recognizes as followers of demonic deities.
Demon Hunter: You gain a +2 morale bonus on all attack rolls and a +2 morale bonus on caster level checks to penetrate spell resistance made against creatures with the demon subtype you recognize as demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 三阶时，狩魔猎手获得恶魔猎手作为额外专长，无视其先决条件。此外，她在攻击投掷和施法者等级检定中获得+2士气加成，以克服她认定为恶魔神祗追随者的生物的法术抗性：你在所有攻击投掷上获得+2士气加成，并在施法者等级检定中获得+2士气加成，以穿透被你认定为恶魔的恶魔亚型生物的法术抗性。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, the ravener hunter chooses one revelation from her chosen mystery. She must meet the revelation’s prerequisites, using her inquisitor level as her effective oracle level to determine the revelation’s effects, and she never qualifies for the Extra Revelation feat. The ravener hunter gains a second revelation from her chosen mystery at 8th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在 1 级时，狩魔猎手可以从她选择的秘示域中选择一个启示。她必须满足启示的先决条件，使用审判者等级作为她的有效先知等级来决定启示的效果，而且她永远没有资格获得额外启示专长。猎鸦人在 8 级时会从她选择的谜题中获得第二个启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ancestors Revelation
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 祖先的启示

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Throughout the Mwangi Expanse, cults of Angazhan pollute the pristine jungle with demonic influence and wanton bloodshed. For generations, the catfolk of Murraseth have viewed such faiths with loathing and hatred, and they believe it is their sacred duty to hunt down the followers of the Ravener King and expel them from the Material Plane.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在整个姆旺基广袤的土地上，安加赞的邪教用恶魔的影响和肆意的杀戮污染着原始丛林。穆拉塞斯的猫人世世代代都对这种信仰深恶痛绝，他们认为追捕蹂躏者之王的信徒并将其驱逐出物质界是他们的神圣职责。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ravener Hunter
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 狩魔猎手

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, the ravener hunter chooses one revelation from her chosen mystery. She must meet the revelation’s prerequisites, using her inquisitor level as her effective oracle level to determine the revelation’s effects, and she never qualifies for the Extra Revelation feat. The ravener hunter gains a second revelation from her chosen mystery at 8th level.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Battle Revelation
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 战斗启示

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Rather than having a deity patron, a ravener hunter is charged by the spirits of the Mwangi to eradicate evil wherever it appears. At 1st level, a ravener hunter chooses an oracle mystery from the following list: ancestor, battle, flame, heavens, life, nature, stone, waves, wind, or wood. She gains one revelation from her chosen mystery. She must meet the revelation’s prerequisites, using her inquisitor level as her effective oracle level to determine the revelation’s effects, and she never qualifies for the Extra Revelation feat. The ravener hunter gains a second revelation from her chosen mystery at 8th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 狩魔猎手没有神灵庇护，而是受姆旺基神灵之托，铲除任何地方出现的邪恶。1 级时，狩魔猎手可以从以下列表中选择一个先知秘示域：祖先、战斗、火焰、天堂、生命、自然、石头、波浪、风或木。她会从自己选择的秘示域中获得一个启示。她必须满足启示的先决条件，以她的审判者等级作为她的有效先知等级来决定启示的效果，而且她永远没有资格获得额外启示专长。鸦人猎手在 8 级时会从她选择的秘示域中获得第二个启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Charged by Nature
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自然伟力

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Heavens Revelation
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天堂启示

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A ravener hunter adds all spells of 6th-level and lower on the cleric spell list with the good descriptor to her inquisitor spell list as inquisitor spells of the same level. If a spell appears on both the cleric and inquisitor spell lists, the ravener hunter uses the lower of the two spell levels listed for the spell. She cannot cast spells with the chaotic, evil, or lawful descriptors, even from spell trigger or spell completion items.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 鸦人猎手会将牧师法术列表中所有六级及以下带有善描述符的法术添加到她的审判者法术列表中，作为相同等级的审判者法术。如果一个法术同时出现在牧师和审判者的法术列表中，猎鸦人将使用两个法术等级中较低的一个。她无法施放带有混乱、邪恶或守序描述符的法术，即使是来自法术触发器或法术完成道具的法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Holy Magic
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣魔法

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, the ravener hunter chooses one revelation from her chosen mystery. She must meet the revelation’s prerequisites, using her inquisitor level as her effective oracle level to determine the revelation’s effects, and she never qualifies for the Extra Revelation feat. The ravener hunter gains a second revelation from her chosen mystery at 8th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在 1 级时，狩魔猎手可以从她选择的秘示域中选择一个启示。她必须满足启示的先决条件，使用审判者等级作为她的有效先知等级来决定启示的效果，而且她永远没有资格获得额外启示专长。猎鸦人在 8 级时会从她选择的谜题中获得第二个启示。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 风的启示

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wood Revelation
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 木材启示录

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A shimmering, blue and gold radiance surrounds you, enhancing arcane spells cast within its area. Any arcane spell cast by a creature within 10 feet of the caster gains a +1 enhancement bonus to the DC of any saving throws against the spell, and is cast as if the Reach Spell metamagic feat has been applied to it (without increasing the spell level).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 闪烁的蓝金光芒环绕在你周围，增强在其范围内施放的奥术。施法者 10 英尺范围内的生物所施放的任何奥术法术都会在针对该法术的任何豁免检定的 DC 值上获得 +1的强化加成，并且施法时就像应用了及远法术超魔一样（不会提高法术等级）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While inside the arcane concordance aura, any arcane spell cast my you gains a +1 enhancement bonus to the DC of any saving throws against the spell, and is cast as if the Reach Spell metamagic feat has been applied to it (without increasing the spell level or Casting Time).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在奥术协和光环内时，我所施放的任何奥术法术都会在针对该法术的任何豁免检定的DC上获得+1强化加成，并且施放时就像应用了 "及远法术超魔 "一样（不增加法术等级或施法时间）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Arcane Concordance - Reach
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥术协约 - 及远

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Arcane Concordance - Reach Aura
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥术协奏曲 - 及远光环

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 5th Level Dahak grants their claw a red drake companion. The Claw treats their dreadknight level as their effective druid level for this companion.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在 5 级时，达哈克授予他的爪牙一个红龙兽伙伴。虚龙之爪将他们的恐惧骑士等级视为该伙伴的有效德鲁伊等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Red Drake Companion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 红龙兽伙伴

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You see death not as something to be feared, but as a final rest and reward for a life well spent. The taint of undeath is a mockery of what you hold dear. Gentle Rest: Your touch can fill a creature with lethargy, causing a living creature to become staggered for 1 round as a melee touch attack. If you touch a staggered living creature, that creature falls asleep for 1 round instead. Undead creatures touched are staggered for a number of rounds equal to your Wisdom modifier. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. Ward Against Death: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura that wards against death for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Living creatures in this area are immune to all death effects, energy drain, and effects that cause negative levels. This ward does not remove negative levels that a creature has already gained, but the negative levels have no effect while the creature is inside the warded area. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.

You see death not as something to be feared, but as a final rest and reward for a life well spent. The taint of undeath is a mockery of what you hold dear. 
Gentle Rest: Your touch can fill a creature with lethargy, causing a living creature to become staggered for 1 round as a melee touch attack. If you touch a staggered living creature, that creature falls asleep for 1 round instead. Undead creatures touched are staggered for a number of rounds equal to your Wisdom modifier. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. 
Ward Against Death: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura that wards against death for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Living creatures in this area are immune to all death effects, energy drain, and effects that cause negative levels. This ward does not remove negative levels that a creature has already gained, but the negative levels have no effect while the creature is inside the warded area. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
在您看来，死亡并不可怕，而是生命的最后安息和回报。不死的污点是对你所珍视的东西的嘲弄。
温柔的安息：你的触碰可以让生物昏睡，作为近战触碰攻击，使生物蹒跚1回合。如果你触碰一个踉跄的生物，该生物会沉睡 1 回合。被触碰的亡灵生物会昏睡一回合，持续时间等于你的感知修正值。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知修正值。
抵御死亡：8级时，你可以散发出一个30英尺的光环，在每天的一定回合内抵御死亡，该回合数等于你获得该领域的等级。该区域内的生物对所有死亡效果、能量流失和导致负值的效果免疫。该守护不会消除生物已经获得的负值，但当生物在守护区域内时，负值不会产生任何影响。这些回合不需要连续进行。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You see death not as something to be feared, but as a final rest and reward for a life well spent. The taint of undeath is a mockery of what you hold dear. 
Gentle Rest: Your touch can fill a creature with lethargy, causing a living creature to become staggered for 1 round as a melee touch attack. If you touch a staggered living creature, that creature falls asleep for 1 round instead. Undead creatures touched are staggered for a number of rounds equal to your Wisdom modifier. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. 
Ward Against Death: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura that wards against death for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Living creatures in this area are immune to all death effects, energy drain, and effects that cause negative levels. This ward does not remove negative levels that a creature has already gained, but the negative levels have no effect while the creature is inside the warded area. These rounds do not need to be consecutive. 
Domain Spells: doom, scare, vampiric touch, death ward, slay living, undeath to death, destruction, waves of exhaustion, wail of the banshee.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
在您看来，死亡并不可怕，而是生命的最后安息和回报。不死的污点是对你所珍视的东西的嘲弄。

领域法术：丧志术、恐吓术，吸血鬼之触、防死结界，杀生术，亡灵归亡，灰飞湮灭，力竭波，女妖之嚎。

Repose Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 宁静领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Repose: You gain a +6 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
宁静：你的感知获得+6增强加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Repose: You gain a +6 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
宁静：你的感知获得+6增强加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Repose Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 宁静领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, a mooncaller gains a +4 bonus on saving throws to avoid confusion, daze, feeblemind, and insanity effects. She also gains a +4 bonus against the, spell-like, and supernatural abilities of creatures with the shapechanger subtype.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 4 级，唤月者在避免困惑、眩晕、弱智和疯狂的豁免上获得 +4 加值。她还获得+4加值用于对抗变形者子类型生物的类法术和超自然能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Resist Call of the Wild
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 抵抗狂野呼唤

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, a draconic druid gains a +4 bonus on saving throws gainst the, spell-like, and supernatural abilities of creatures with the dragon subtype.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 4 级，龙之德鲁伊在对抗龙类生物的类法术和超自然能力的豁免检定上获得 +4 加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Resist Dragon's Might
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 对龙抗力

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Faith grants resolve — resolve grants strength and fortitude.
Strength Surge: As a standard action, you can touch a creature to give it great strength. For 1 round, the target gains an enhancement bonus equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum +1) to melee attacks and Athletics checks. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. 
Bestow Resolve: At 8th level, you can bless creatures with the boldness of your deity. You can bestow a number of temporary hit points equal to your level + your Wisdom modifier to all allies within 20 feet. The temporary hit points remain for 1 minute. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, plus one additional time per day for every 4 levels you possess beyond 8th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
信念赋予决心——决心赋予力量和强韧。
力量激荡：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你可{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触{/g}生物赋予其强大的力量。在1{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}内，该目标的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}近战攻击{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}运动检定{/g}将获得增强{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，加值等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级（最小为+1）。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
志在必得：到了8级，可令20尺内所有盟友获得你“牧师等级+感知修正”点数临时生命，持续1分钟。每天1次，每比8级高4级多1次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Resolve Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 决意子域

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 到了8级，可令20尺内所有盟友获得你“牧师等级+感知修正”点数临时生命，持续1分钟。每天1次，每比8级高4级多1次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Faith grants resolve — resolve grants strength and fortitude.
Strength Surge: As a standard action, you can touch a creature to give it great strength. For 1 round, the target gains an enhancement bonus equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum +1) to melee attacks and Athletics checks. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. 
Bestow Resolve: At 8th level, you can bless creatures with the boldness of your deity. You can bestow a number of temporary hit points equal to your level + your Wisdom modifier to all allies within 20 feet. The temporary hit points remain for 1 minute. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, plus one additional time per day for every 4 levels you possess beyond 8th.
Domain Spells: bless, bull's strength, magical vestment, mass enlarge person, righteous might, stoneskin, legendary proportions, frightful aspect, transformation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
信念赋予决心——决心赋予力量和强韧。
力量激荡：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你可{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触{/g}生物赋予其强大的力量。在1{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}内，该目标的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}近战攻击{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}运动检定{/g}将获得增强{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，加值等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级（最小为+1）。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
志在必得：到了8级，可令20尺内所有盟友获得你“牧师等级+感知修正”点数临时生命，持续1分钟。每天1次，每比8级高4级多1次。
领域法术：祝福术、牛之蛮力、魔化盔甲、群体变巨术、正气如虹、石肤术、伟岸雄姿、可怖外表、战法转换。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can touch a creature, letting the healing power of your deity flow through you to relieve the creature of a minor condition. Your touch can remove the dazed, fatigued, shaken, sickened, or staggered condition. You choose which condition is removed. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可用一次神力接触来移除下列效果的一个：晕眩、疲乏、战栗、恶心、恍惚，每天“3+感知修正”次。你需要选择治愈的状态种类。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 修复接触

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Restorative Touch - Staggered
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 修复接触 —— 恍惚

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your touch restores vigor, protecting against ailments, and your healing magic is particularly vital and potent.
Restorative Touch: You can touch a creature, letting the healing power of your deity flow through you to relieve the creature of a minor condition. Your touch can remove the dazed, fatigued, shaken, sickened, or staggered condition. You choose which condition is removed. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Healer's Blessing: At 6th level, all of your cure spells are treated as if they were empowered, increasing the amount of damage healed by half (+50%). This does not apply to damage dealt to undead with a cure spell. This does not stack with the Empower Spell metamagic feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触{/g}可延缓痛苦与{g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}死亡{/g}，而你的{g|Encyclopedia:Healing}治疗{/g}魔法至关重要且效果显著。
修复接触：你可用一次神力接触来移除下列效果的一个：晕眩、疲乏、战栗、恶心、恍惚，每天“3+感知修正”次。你需要选择治愈的状态种类。
医者祝福：达到6级后，你所有的治疗{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}都视同被强效，治疗的伤害值将提升一半（+50%）。治疗法术对不死生物所造成的伤害不会增加。此效果不会与超魔{g|Encyclopedia:Feat}专长{/g}“法术强效”叠加。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Restoration Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 复原子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your touch restores vigor, protecting against ailments, and your healing magic is particularly vital and potent.
Restorative Touch: You can touch a creature, letting the healing power of your deity flow through you to relieve the creature of a minor condition. Your touch can remove the dazed, fatigued, shaken, sickened, or staggered condition. You choose which condition is removed. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Healer's Blessing: At 6th level, all of your cure spells are treated as if they were empowered, increasing the amount of damage healed by half (+50%). This does not apply to damage dealt to undead with a cure spell. This does not stack with the Empower Spell metamagic feat.
Domain Spells: remove sickness, remove disease, cure serious wounds, neutralize poison, break enchantment, heal, greater restoration, protection from spells, mass heal.

领域法术：移除恶心、移除疾病、治疗重伤、延缓毒发、破除法术、医疗术、高等复原术、防护魔法、群体医疗术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your deity grants you the power to see all as divine revelation, and punish those who do harm with their light.
Guided Eyes: Perception is always a class skill for you. In addition, whenever you make a skill check to see through a disguise or find something that is hidden or concealed, you gain a +4 sacred bonus on the check.
Nimbus of Light: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot nimbus of light for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Any hostile creature within this radius must succeed at a Fortitude save to resist the effects of this aura. If the creature fails, it is blinded until it leaves the area of the spell. A creature that has resisted the effect cannot be affected again by this particular aura. In addition, undead within this radius take an amount of damage equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain each round that they remain inside the nimbus. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的神明赋予你将一切视为神圣启示的力量，并用他们的光惩罚那些作恶的人。
引导之眼：察觉视为你的本职技能。此外当你用技能鉴定看透伪装或寻找掩藏和遮蔽的物体时，你在检定上获得+4崇圣加值。
光晕：在8级时，你可发出30英尺范围的光晕，每天可持续的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。任何处于此范围内的敌对生物必须进行强韧豁免检定，以抵抗此灵光的效果。如果豁免失败，则该生物将持续目盲，直至离开该{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}的范围。成功抵抗该效果的生物将不会再次被同一个灵光影响。此外，不死生物如果一直处于光晕范围内，每轮都会受到伤害，伤害量等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。生效轮次无需连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Revelation Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 启示子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Perception is always a class skill for you. In addition, whenever you make a skill check to see through a disguise or find something hat is hidden or concealed, you gain a +4 sacred bonus on the check.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 引导之眼：察觉视为你的本职技能。此外当你用技能鉴定看透伪装或寻找掩藏和遮蔽的物体时，你在检定上获得+4崇圣加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You must have a bardic performance in effect to cast this spell. With a flourish, you immediately end your bardic performance, and allies within the area of the spell regain 2d6 hit points. 
You cannot activate another bardic performance this round. If you have the lingering performance feat the effect lingers as normal.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你必须处于一个生效中的吟游演绎中才能施展这个法术。使用时，你立即结束你的表演，法术范围内的盟友恢复 2d6 点生命值。本轮你不能激活另一个吟游演绎。如果你有余音绕梁的表演专长，效果会像往常一样持续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Reviving Finale
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 重振谢幕曲

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are a beacon of revolution inspiring your allies to fight well and all foes to relent.
You have the ability to ignore impediments to your mobility. For a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain, you can move normally regardless of magical effects that impede movement, as if you were affected by freedom of movement. This effect occurs automatically as soon as it applies. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
Powerful Persuader: At 8th level, you can make grant yourself the ability to roll twice on any persuasion or intimidate  skill check, this abilities effect lasts until used then dispels itself. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, plus one additional time per day for every 2 levels beyond 8th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你是革命的灯塔，激励你的盟友奋勇战斗，令所有的敌人望而却步。
你具有无视{g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}移动{/g}限制效果的能力。在等于赋予你此领域的职业等级的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}内，你可无视限制移动的魔法效果而正常移动，如同受到行动自如的{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}效果影响。此效果会在相应情况下自动生效。生效轮次无需连续。
无双说客：到了8级你能在交涉和威吓的时候自由动作投两次取高。此能力在8级能每天用一次，每比8级高2级多一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Revolution Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 革命子域

You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, plus one additional time per day for every 2 levels beyond 8th.

For a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain, you can move normally regardless of magical effects that impede movement, as if you were affected by freedom of movement. This effect occurs automatically as soon as it applies. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
Powerful Persuader: At 8th level, you can make grant yourself the ability to roll twice on any persuasion or intimidate  skill check, this abilities effect lasts until used then dispels itself. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, plus one additional time per day for every 2 levels beyond 8th.
Domain Spells: remove fear, scare, remove curse, freedom of movement, break enchantment, greater heroism, elemental body IV, mind blank, communal mind blank.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你是革命的灯塔，激励你的盟友奋勇战斗，令所有的敌人望而却步。
你具有无视{g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}移动{/g}限制效果的能力。在等于赋予你此领域的职业等级的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}内，你可无视限制移动的魔法效果而正常移动，如同受到行动自如的{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}效果影响。此效果会在相应情况下自动生效。生效轮次无需连续。
无双说客：到了8级你能在交涉和威吓的时候自由动作投两次取高。此能力在8级能每天用一次，每比8级高2级多一次。
领域法术：移除恐惧，恐吓术，移除破敌，行动自如，破除法术，高等英雄气概，元素之躯IV，心灵屏障，共用心灵屏障。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Herald of the End Times   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Hibernation, Immortality, Ruin   
Rank: Great Old One   
Domains: Chaos, Evil, Repose, Void (Destruction)   
Subdomains: Ancestors, Dark Tapestry, Entropy, Stars   
Favoured Weapon: Sickle   
Holy Symbol: Three black stars   
Strange and silent Rhan-Tegoth bears some similarities to Chaugnar Faugn in that much of its existence seems to have been spent in waiting. Texts mention a time when Rhan-Tegoth was active and alive and ruled an empire to the north on an unknown world far beyond Golarion, yet when its worshipers abandoned it, Rhan-Tegoth transformed into an immobile statue of an unknown material. Yet immobility should not in this case be taken for inactivity, as those who spend time in proximity to this strange statue find themselves compelled to undertake increasingly violent sacrifices before the slumbering Great Old One—mere proximity is apparently enough to enable the ancient entity’s mind to reach out and influence lesser intellects than its own. While records of Rhan-Tegoth’s waking periods and its activities during those times are rare and unreliable, rumors persist of certain chants capable of temporarily stirring the god from its eternal hibernation and restoring life and mobility to its petrified form. What purpose such chants could serve, one can only guess, for the Great Old One invariably devours those with the temerity to rouse it. The ancient texts do agree that when Rhan-Tegoth does finally waken of its own accord, the End Times themselves shall be upon all worlds. Yet it is unclear whether the apocalypse wakens the Herald of the End Times, or whether the god’s wakening triggers the end of all. Legends state that if Rhan-Tegoth could be eradicated, this shared apocalypse could be forever avoided, yet a method of destroying something that fundamentally embodies immortality has baffled even the gods. Many statues of Rhan-Tegoth exist, and it can be difficult, if not impossible, to discern which of these is the actual slumbering god. These statues depict a creature with a globular torso; six long, sinuous limbs tipped in crablike pincers; and a head with three fishy eyes and a long proboscis.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：终时先兆
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：沉眠，不朽与灾祸
等级：旧日支配者
领域：混乱、邪恶、宁静、虚空（毁灭）
子领域：先祖，异幕，熵，星辰
偏好武器：镰刀
圣徽：三颗黑星
奇异而沉默的兰·提戈斯与夏乌戈纳尔·法格恩有一定相似之处，因为祂们都生活在等待之中。文献中提及，兰·提戈斯曾一度活跃并统治了远离格拉里昂的未知世界中的一个帝国，然而当祂的信徒抛弃祂时，祂便化为由材料未知的静止雕像。然而静止并不意味着无法行动，那些在这座奇异雕像附近花上一段时间的人们会发现自己必须在这位沉眠的旧日支配者面前献上越来越多的残忍血祭——显然，仅仅是靠近便足以让这位古老实体的心智接触并影响那些远比祂弱小的智能。
虽然关于兰·提戈斯的苏醒与活动的记录稀少罕见且不甚可信，但传说某些圣歌能够将这位神祇暂时从永恒的沉眠中唤醒，自石化形态恢复生命与活动能力。然而这位旧日支配者总将唤醒者吞噬，于是人们只能自行猜测这些圣歌的含义。古代文献确信当兰·提戈斯自行醒来之时，所有世界将迎来同一个末日，但无人知晓究竟是世界末日唤醒了终时先兆还是祂的苏醒引发了万物终结。传说若兰·提戈斯被彻底消灭，世界末日即可永远避免，然而纵是神明也对不朽本质之具现束手无策。
兰·提戈斯雕像众多，并且很难（但并非不可能）分辨哪一个才是真正的沉眠神祇。这些雕像所描绘的生物生有球状身躯，六个末端长有蟹类大钳的弯曲长肢，而头部生有三只鱼眼和一条长吻。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Rhan-Tegoth
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 兰·提戈斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The joints of a creature affected by this spell stiffen and swell, making movement painful and slow. The target takes 1d6 points of nonlethal damage per caster level. Additionally, the target takes a –4 penalty to Dexterity and its movement speed decreases by 10 feet; these additional effects last for 1 minute per caster level. A successful save halves the nonlethal damage and negates the penalty to Dexterity and movement.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 受此法术影响的生物的关节会变得僵硬和肿胀，使移动变得痛苦而缓慢。目标受到每施法者等级 1d6 点非致命伤害。此外，目标的敏捷受到 –4 减值并且其移动速度降低 10 英尺；这些额外效果每施法者等级持续 1 分钟。一次成功的豁免可以将非致命伤害减半，并抵消对敏捷和移动的惩罚。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 强韧 减半

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Divine Herdsman   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Herd animals, Husbandry, Shepherds   
Domains: Animal, Good, Protection, Travel   
Subdomains: Agathion, Defense, Fur, Trade   
Favoured Weapon: Quarterstaff   
Holy Symbol: Double-headed crook   
Sacred Animal: Sheep   
Kellid legend says that when caribou, deer, horses, and sheep were first created, they were solitary creatures that wandered alone and were thus easy meals for predators. Supposedly, the empyreal lord Rowdrosh pitied these animals and taught them the wisdom of traveling together. Rowdrosh can take the form of any herd animal, and often travels the material world in such a guise. In his true form, he has the body of a muscular man with tanned skin and the head of a ram. Curls of bronze hair cover his face, shoulders, and chest. Two mas sive curled ram's horns made of moonstone sweep back from his temples, and he carries their incredible weight with ease. In his left hand, he wields a straight birch staff that strikes as hard as one of iron. Those who tend to herds of animals often pay homage to Rowdrosh. His agents counsel benevolent shepherds and herders, teaching them how to prevent disease among their animals and how to properly care for pregnant animals in lands where such knowledge is still scarce. Rowdrosh has a particular hatred for schirs and worgs, and his agents go out of their way to eliminate these brutish monsters. On the plains of Nirvana, Rowdrosh raises celestial steeds to serve as mounts for divine warriors. He has no permanent home, and is content to rove the upper planes for all eternity with his divine herd.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：神圣牧者
阵营：中立善良
神职：动物，养殖，放牧
领域：动物、善良、保护、旅行
子领域：盖森、防御、毛兽、贸易
偏好武器：法杖（木棍）
圣徽象牙制的双头牧杖
圣兽: 绵羊
 传说据说创始之初所有鹿，马，羊都独往独来，因此是捕食者可以轻松获取的食物。据说，至高天领主罗卓什怜悯这些动物，并教会它们抱团生存。
洛卓许在人间行走时多数用动物的伪装，并且经常以这种伪装在物质世界中旅行。真身是个强壮的羊头人，脸，肩和胸口都是黄铜色的卷毛，一对大弯角由月石构成，左手持一根桦木杖，他轻松地承受着它们难以置信的重量。
那些照顾成群动物的人经常向洛卓许致敬。他的代理人为仁慈的牧羊人提供咨询，教他们如何预防动物疾病，以及如何在这些知识仍然稀缺的土地上妥善照顾怀孕的动物。
洛卓许对速袭魔和座狼有着特别的仇恨，他的信徒们不遗余力地消灭这些野蛮的怪物。
在极乐境的平原上，他负责为天界勇士驯养骏马。他没有永久的家，赶着牧群在上层位面无尽的游牧中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Rowdrosh
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 洛卓许

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Thunderer   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Lightning, Storms, Thunder   
Domains: Air, Chaos, Evil, Weather   
Subdomains: Cloud, Demon, Storms, Wind   
Favoured Weapon: Falchion   
Holy Symbol: Thunder cloud and lightning   
Sacred Animal: Terror bird   
Rull is not a god the orcs brought with them from the Darklands, but rather one they discovered soon after they emerged upon Golarion’s surface. Having lived all their lives in the consistent climate of caves, the orcs were awed by the turbulence of the open air. The orcs associate the sounds of thunder and rain with the din of war, and the flash of lightning with the sparking of blade on blade. Orcs are not known for their love of nature, but they find a kindred spirit in the violent and unpredictable Thunderer. Rull is depicted as an orc with skin the color of storm clouds and a voice that resounds like thunder. Lightning bolts are his weapon of choice; he throws them down from the sky to impale enemies or to revel in random destruction. The Thunderer is happiest in the midst of noise and turmoil, whether the raging of a storm or the confusion of battle. Orcs thank Rull for the clouds, which block out the painful sun. Clear skies and still air are signs of Rull’s disfavor. At these times, the orcs attempt to appease the Thunderer by beating drums and clashing weapons.Priests of Rull practice ceraunomancy—divination by thunder and lightning—to ascertain the Thunderer’s will. Many orc bards and skalds view Rull as their patron, and seek to emulate his roaring with their loud, discordant battle songs.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：雷鸣者
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：闪电、风暴、雷鸣
领域：气、混乱、邪恶、天气
子领域：云、恶魔、风暴、风
偏好武器：弯刃大刀
圣徽：雷云和闪电
圣兽：恐怖鸟
鲁尔不是兽人从黑暗地域带来的神，而是他们在葛拉利昂地表出现后不久发现的神。
兽人一生都生活在气候稳定的洞穴中，对天空的湍流感到敬畏。兽人将雷雨声与战争的喧嚣联系在一起，将闪电与刀刃上的火花联系在一起。兽人并不以热爱自然而闻名，但他们在暴力和不可预测的雷鸣者身上找到了志同道合的精神。
鲁尔被描绘成一个皮肤是暴风云的颜色，声音听起来像雷声的兽人。闪电是他的首选武器；他把它们从天上扔下来，刺穿敌人，或陶醉于随意的毁灭。雷鸣者在喧嚣和动荡中最快乐，无论是狂风暴雨还是混乱的战场。
兽人感谢鲁尔的云彩，它挡住了让他们痛苦的阳光直射。晴朗的天空和静止的大气是鲁尔所厌恶的。在这些时候，兽人试图通过敲鼓和敲击武器来安抚雷鸣者。
鲁尔的牧师练习神术——通过雷电占卜——以确定雷鸣者的意志。许多兽人吟游诗人和歌者视鲁尔为他们的守护神，并试图用他们响亮、不和谐的战歌来模仿他的咆哮。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Rull
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 鲁尔

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
In strange and eldritch runes you find potent magic. 
Blast Rune: As a standard action, you can create a blast rune in a desired location. Any creature entering a 5-foot area around the rune takes 1d6 points of damage + 1 point for every two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. This rune deals either acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage, decided when you create the rune. The rune lasts a number of rounds equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. 
Warding Rune: At 8th level, you can create a warding rune in a desired location. Any creature entering a 5-foot area around the rune must make a Will save or they will not be able to attack for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. The rune lasts a number of rounds equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time per day for every four levels in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
在奇怪而古老的符文中，你会发现强大的魔法。
爆炸符文：作为标准动作，你可以在所需位置创造一个爆炸符文。任何生物进入符文周围5英尺范围内，都会受到1d6点伤害+每两级1点。该符文会造成酸、冷、电或火伤害，由你创建符文时决定。该符文持续的回合数等于你获得该领域的等级。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知修正值。
守护符文：8级时，你可以在指定地点创建一个守护符文。任何进入符文周围 5 英尺范围的生物都必须进行意志豁免，否则他们将在相当于你获得该领域的等级的 1/2 的回合内无法攻击。符文持续的回合数等于你获得此领域的等级。在 8 级时，您每天可以使用一次此能力，8 级之后，每升 4 级，每天可以额外使用一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: In strange and eldritch runes you find potent magic. Blast Rune: As a standard action, you can create a blast rune in a desired location. Any creature entering a 5-foot area around the rune takes 1d6 points of damage + 1 point for every two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. This rune deals either acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage, decided when you create the rune. The rune lasts a number of rounds equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. Warding Rune: At 8th level, you can create a warding rune in a desired location. Any creature entering a 5-foot area around the rune must make a Will save or they will not be able to attack for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. The rune lasts a number of rounds equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time per day for every four levels in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你从奇异可畏的符文中发现了强力的{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}。
冲击符文：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你可向指定位置放置冲击符文。任何进入符文周围5英尺范围的生物都将受到{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}，赋予你此领域的职业等级每提升2级，可额外造成1点伤害。在放置符文时，需决定符文所造成的伤害类型（酸蚀、寒冷、电击或是{g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}火焰伤害{/g}）。此符文持续{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
防护符文：在8级时，你可向指定位置放置防护符文。任何进入符文周围5英尺范围的生物必须进行意志{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免{/g}，失败则会在若干轮内无法{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}，持续轮数等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级。此符文存在轮数等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。在8级时，每天可使用一次此技能，8级后赋予你此领域的职业每升4级，可获得1次额外的使用次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
In strange and eldritch runes you find potent magic. 
Blast Rune: As a standard action, you can create a blast rune in a desired location. Any creature entering a 5-foot area around the rune takes 1d6 points of damage + 1 point for every two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. This rune deals either acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage, decided when you create the rune. The rune lasts a number of rounds equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. 
Warding Rune: At 8th level, you can create a warding rune in a desired location. Any creature entering a 5-foot area around the rune must make a Will save or they will not be able to attack for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. The rune lasts a number of rounds equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time per day for every four levels in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th. 
Domain Spells: protection from alignment, protection from arrows, communal protection from arrows, communal protection from energy, spell resistance, greater dispel magic, power word blind, power word stun, power word kill.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Rune Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 符文领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Emulate the Mantis God’s grace and move with a supernatural fluidity. As a swift action gain uncanny dodge as per the rogue class feature. You can use this ability for a number of minutes per day equal to his warpriest level, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 效仿螳螂神的优雅，以超自然般的流动性移动。以一个迅捷动作，获得如同游荡者职业特性的直觉闪避能力。您每天可以使用此能力的时间等于他的1/战争祭司等级，但必须以1分钟为单位使用。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 完美神圣反射

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 7th level, a mantis zealot can emulate the Mantis God’s grace and move with a supernatural fluidity. As a swift action he can gain uncanny dodge as per the rogue class feature. He can use this ability for a number of minutes per day equal to his warpriest level, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. At 10th level, when he uses this ability, he also gains evasion as per the monk class feature. At 13th level, he gains improved uncanny dodge instead of uncanny dodge. At 19th level, he gains improved evasion instead of evasion.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 7 级，螳螂狂徒可以效仿螳螂神的优雅，以超自然般的流动性移动。以一个迅捷动作，他可以获得如同游荡者职业特性的直觉闪避能力。您每天可以使用此能力的时间等于他的1/战争祭司等级，但必须以1分钟为单位使用。在 10 级时，当他使用此能力时，他还会获得如同武僧职业特性的反射闪避能力。在 13 级时，他获得精通直觉闪避而不是直觉闪避。在 19 级时，他获得精通反射闪避能力而不是反射闪避能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 9th level, an archer does not provoke attacks of opportunity when making ranged attacks with a bow.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 9 级时，弓箭手使用弓箭进行远程攻击时不会招致借机攻击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Safe Shot
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 安全射击

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Minder of Immortals   
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Agency, Bronze, Education  
Domains: Knowledge, Liberation, Repose, Strength  
Favoured Weapon: Guisarme (Glaive)   
Holy Symbol: Equilateral triangle set inside a circle  
The ultimate accounting of mortal agency, Saloc revels in the plasticity of the soul and the living’s endless capacity. The Minder of Immortals provides legal defense for souls at trial, arguing that a soul’s intentions and recounting of its own experiences must be weighed as heavily as the consequences. A poor loser, Saloc has resurrected mortals whose souls’ judgments the usher finds wholly unfair, giving the creatures an opportunity to demonstrate their truest selves. This disregard for etiquette makes Saloc an unpopular usher among psychopomps and especially reviled by Vale, who finds the Minder of Immortals’ tactics ironically juvenile. As the solicitor of will over context, Saloc is also the ultimate authority over deities and similar beings whose existence defines morality rather than caters to it—but they rarely have call to exercise this judgment. Born from the mortal need to defend actions and decisions, Saloc predates most other ushers and even many gods. They manifest as a roughly humanoid figure, with a featureless face crowned by stag horns and orbited by two eye-lined golden rings. The Minder of Immortals rules a massive domain: the twisting planar metropolis of Spire’s Edge, where the Boneyard’s least-developed souls dwell to either find purpose or rot away into cosmic dust.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：不朽的守护者 
阵营：绝对中立
形态：招魂使 
领域：代理、青铜、教育
领域：知识、解放、休息、力量 
偏好武器：Guisarme (Glaive) 
圣徽：等边三角形设置在一个圆圈内 终极会计作为凡人代理，萨洛克陶醉于灵魂的可塑性和生命的无限能力。 The Minder of Immortals 在审判中为灵魂提供守序辩护，认为灵魂的意图和讲述自己的经历必须与后果一样重要。作为一个可怜的失败者，萨洛克复活了凡人，他们的灵魂判断被引导员认为完全不公平，让这些生物有机会展示他们最真实的自我。这种对礼节的漠视使得萨洛克在精神错乱中不受欢迎，尤其受到淡水河谷的斥责，淡水河谷认为不朽者的策略具有讽刺意味的是幼稚。作为对上下文的意志的辩护人，萨洛克也是神灵和类似生物的最终权威，这些生物的存在定义了道德而不是迎合道德——但他们很少需要行使这种判断力。萨洛克出生于捍卫行动和决定的凡人需要，早于大多数其他引导者甚至许多神。他们表现为一个大致为人形的人物，一张毫无特征的脸被鹿角冠冕，并被两个带有眼线的金色圆环环绕。不朽的守护者统治着一个巨型的
领域：Spire's Edge 扭曲的平面大都市，Boneyard 最不发达的灵魂居住在那里寻找目标或腐烂成宇宙尘埃。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Saloc
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 萨洛克

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A Mantis zealot emulates He Who Walks in Blood in their fighting style, with their twin blades acting as the mantises claws. This allows the zealot to use one-handed heavy blades as light weapons for the purpose of two-weapon fighting
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 螳螂狂徒模仿浴血行者的战斗风格，以他们的双刃充当螳螂爪。这使得狂热者可以使用单手重刃作为轻武器来进行双武器战斗

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sawtooth Sabre Style
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 锯齿流派

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This gaze attack can target a single creature within meduim range. The target must make a Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your cleric level + your Wisdom modifier). Those who fail take 1d6 points of nonlethal damage + 1 point for every two cleric levels you possess and are fascinated until the beginning of your next turn. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. This is a mind-affecting effect.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以用一个标准动作以30尺范围内的单一生物为目标发起一次的凝视攻击。目标必须通过一次意志豁免（DC=10+ 1/2牧师等级+感知调整值”，豁免失败则受到1d6点非致命伤害和“1/2牧师等级”点伤害并且被迷魂直到你下回合开始。每日你可使用本能力的次数为“3+感知调整值”。这是一个影响心灵效果。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 剧毒瞪视

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, you gain the service of an scaled animal companion. Your effective druid level for this animal companion is equal to your cleric level –2
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在4级时，你获得一个动物伙伴，以你的牧师等级-2作为你的有效德鲁伊等级。

Those who fail take 1d6 points of nonlethal damage + 1 point for every two cleric levels you possess and are fascinated until the beginning of your next turn. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. This is a mind-affecting effect.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Blast the area with a horrific combination of soul-rending energy and physical corrosion. Creatures in the area of effect gain 1d4 negative levels, and take 1d6 points of acid damage per caster level (maximum 20d6).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 用撕碎灵魂的能量和物理酸蚀的可怕组合轰炸这片区域。影响范围内的生物将获得1d4个负向等级，并且将受到1d6点/CL的酸蚀伤害(最高20d6点)。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天启诸骑的蹂躏

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Fortitude half
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 强韧 减半

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Mythic power allows you further access to the power of the spirits.
You select a second mystery from charged by nature, getting all its benefits.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以从 "自然伟力 "中选择第二个秘示域，获得它的所有好处。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mythic Charged by Nature
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神话自然伟力

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You opened your mind and soul to learn the secrets of a second mystery.
Benefit: You gain a second Oracle Mystery. 
A ocean's echo adds Persuasion, Knowledge (world) and Lore (nature) to her list of class skills. These replace the additional class skills from her mystery.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你敞开思想和灵魂，理解第二个秘示域的秘示域。
效果：你获得第二个先知秘示域。海洋回声将沟通、知识（世界）和学识（自然）添加到她的本职技能列表中。这些取代了她秘示域的额外职业技能。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Second Mystery (Ocean's Echo)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 第二秘示域（海洋回声）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lady of Slaughter   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Fire, Healing, Vengeance, War   
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Fire, Healing, War   
Subdomains: Ash, Blood, Protean, Rage, Restoration, Revelry   
Favoured Weapon: Battleaxe   
Holy Symbol: Seven arrows   
Sacred Animal: Lion   
When the sun god Ra grew old, his human subjects rebelled against him, so he sent his daughter Sekhmet to punish them. Going further than was planned, Sekhmet took on the task with such fury that Ra feared she would exterminate the human race. In order to save humanity and end the destruction, Ra filled jugs with a mixture of beer and pomegranate juice and scattered them across the battlefield. Thinking the red liquid was human blood, Sekhmet greedily consumed every drop she could find, quickly becoming so drunk that she was unable to continue the slaughter. Although primarily a goddess of war and vengeance, Sekhmet has another side as a goddess of healing who wards off plagues and pestilence. She heals warriors of their wounds and is especially revered for curing fractures. As the daughter of Ra, Sekhmet is also a goddess of fire. She is the sister of Bastet, Hathor, and Maat, and the wife of Ptah. Sekhmet appears as a woman with the head of a lioness, wearing a long dress soaked red with blood and rosettes over each breast. Occasionally she is depicted with the solar disk of her father Ra atop her head.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：屠戮仕女
阵营：混乱中立 
神职：火焰、治疗、复仇、战争
领域：混乱、破坏、火焰、医疗、战争 
子领域：灰烬、鲜血、星灵、狂暴、复原、狂欢
偏好武器：战斧
圣徽：七支箭
圣兽：狮子
传说当拉年老力衰时，祂的人类子民起兵造反，于是拉便派出女儿赛赫美特去惩戒叛徒。不料赛特美特沉醉于杀戮血狂，拉担忧这样下去人类莫不是要死绝。为了打救人类并停止这番破坏，拉将装满了啤酒与石榴汁的调酒的瓶罐四散到战场上。误以为这是罐装人血的赛赫美特见一瓶喝一瓶，很快便不胜酒力醉倒在地，于是世界得救了。
虽然主要是战争与复仇之神，塞赫美特也有着治癒之神的另一面，庇护众生不受瘟疫。祂治疗武人所受的伤，尤其因为医治骨折的大能受到敬拜。作为拉的女儿，赛赫美特也是火神。祂是芭丝特、哈索尔、玛亚特的姊妹，也是卜塔的配偶。赛赫美特一般以长着母狮头的女性形象示人，穿着浸血长裙，在胸部有着遮羞的花饰。偶尔也会在画像中把拉的日轮加在祂的头上。
野蛮人因其毁灭狂暴而祭拜赛赫美特，战士及魔战士则将祂作为武人的守护神来供奉。赛赫美特的祭司男女都有，同时是武艺高强的武人及医术精湛的医者。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sekhmet
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 赛赫美特

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Mistress of the Beautiful House   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Embalming, Healing, Scorpions   
Domains: Chaos, Good, Healing, Protection, Repose   
Subdomains: Ancestors, Azata, Defense, Purity, Restoration, Souls   
Favoured Weapon: Scorpion whip (Kama)   
Holy Symbol: Red Scorpion   
Sacred Animal: Scorpion   
The deserts of Osirion contain many species of venomous scorpions, and the scorpion goddess Selket is both a protective and punitive deity, healing venomous bites and stings and afflicting the wicked with her own deadly sting. Like many of the ancient Osirian gods, she is a funerary deity, and she is responsible for protecting the canopic jar that holds the deceased's intestines. Selket is the goddess of embalming, and her epithet, Mistress of the Beautiful House, refers to the embalming pavilion where bodies are prepared for burial. Along with Isis, Neith, and Nephthys, Selket assists Anubis in protecting the dead. She is often paired with Neith, as Isis is with Nephthys, and in the form of seven scorpions, she guarded Isis when Isis was pregnant with Horus. When a woman later refused the expectant mother shelter, it was Selket who punished the woman for turning Isis away. Selket also guards the other ancient Osirian gods against the poisonous bite of Apep, and has assisted Ra on numerous occasions in his battles against the Devourer of the Dawn. Selket normally appears as a woman wearing a scorpion with a raised tail on her head, or more rarely, as a lustrous black scorpion with the head of a woman.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：美丽之家的女主人 
结盟：混乱善良 
关注领域：防腐，治疗，蝎子 
领域：混乱、善良、治愈、保护、安息 
子域：祖先、阿扎塔、防御、纯洁、修复、灵魂 
最喜爱的武器：蝎子鞭（卡玛） 
神圣的象征：红色蝎子 
神圣动物：蝎子 
奥西瑞恩的沙漠中有许多种类的毒蝎，蝎子女神塞尔凯特既是保护神，也是惩罚神，她能治愈被毒蝎咬伤和蜇伤的人，并用自己致命的毒刺折磨恶人。与许多古代奥西里斯神一样，她也是一位殡葬神，负责保护盛放死者肠子的罐子。塞尔凯特是防腐女神，她的绰号 "美丽之家的女主人 "指的是准备埋葬尸体的防腐亭。塞尔凯特与伊希斯、尼特和奈芙提斯一起协助阿努比斯保护死者。她经常与尼伊斯配对，就像伊希斯与尼芙提斯配对一样。当伊希斯怀上荷鲁斯时，她化身为七只蝎子守护着伊希斯。后来，一位妇女拒绝为这位孕妇提供庇护，正是塞尔凯特惩罚了这位拒绝伊希斯的妇女。赛尔凯特还保护其他奥西里斯古神免受阿佩普的毒咬，并多次协助拉神与黎明吞噬者作战。赛尔凯特通常以头戴翘尾蝎子的女性形象出现，或者更罕见的是，以头戴女性形象的黑色光泽蝎子的形象出现。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：华屋女士
阵营：混乱善良
神职：防腐、治疗、蝎子
领域：混乱、善良、医疗、保护、宁静
子领域：先祖、爱塔、防御、纯净、复原、灵魂
偏好武器：蝎鞭（单镰) 
圣徽：红蝎
圣兽：蝎子
奥西里昂的沙漠中藏着多种毒蠍，蠍神赛尔凯特同时身兼保护与惩恶之神，治疗因咬或蜇而染毒的伤口，或是以自己的致命毒刺制裁恶人。一如许多古奥西里昂诸神，赛尔凯特也是丧葬神，负责看守装载肠的卡诺波坛。赛尔凯特是防腐之神，而其头衔：中的华屋指的是处理遗体的防腐馆。
赛尔凯特与伊西斯、奈斯、奈芙蒂斯一同协助阿努比斯守护死者。祂常与奈斯并列，一如伊西斯与奈芙蒂斯并列一般，并在伊西斯身怀荷鲁斯时化身七只蠍来守护之。而之后当某个女性拒绝收留怀孕的古神时，惩戒赶走伊西斯的她的也是塞尔凯特。赛尔凯特也保护其他诸神不受阿佩普的毒液所害，并多次协助拉与吞日大蛇对抗。赛尔凯特一般以带着翘尾蠍头饰的女性姿态示人，但偶尔也有将她描绘成长着人头的亮壳黑蠍的形像。
赛尔凯特的祭司一般担任村镇中的医师和防腐官。蠍神的神殿很少，但有时在阿努比斯、伊西斯、奈斯或奈芙蒂斯的庙中设有神位。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Selket
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 赛尔凯特

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lady of Inspired Notes   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Communication, Inspiration, Music   
Domains: Air, Charm, Good, Nobility   
Subdomains: Agathion, Friendship, Leadership, Wind   
Favoured Weapon: Blowgun (Dart)   
Holy Symbol: Twin chromatic harps in gold and silver   
Sacred Animal: Katydid   
Seramaydiel loves instrumental music but favors the harp above all. When astradaemons first emerged from the Abyss and began snatching wandering spirits from the River of Souls on the Astral Plane, it is said that Seramaydiel was able to call the lost souls belonging to Nirvana back to her with her majestic harping. Seramaydiel's burnished red-gold hair falls in broad curls around her face and frames the white wings that rise from her slender back. She uses her heavenly double chromatic harp to lull evildoers into a false sense of security, then slays them, if she must, using holy darts projected from a narrow bronze tube she uses as a blowgun. The Lady of Inspired Notes speaks all languages and enjoys fostering communication between disparate parties, especially when doing so may avert potential violence. A diplomat negotiating peace between countries and a tavern patron trying to head off a bar fight are both regarded by Seramaydiel as emissaries ofher cause. Seramaydiel's home is a vast marble amphitheater on Nirvana where the empyreal lords sometimes congregate for music and dancing as Seramaydiel plays a tune from her enchanted harp, much to the delight of all in attendance.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：启发音符女士
阵营：中立善良 
神职：交流、灵感、音乐
领域：气、魅惑、善良、崇高 
子领域：盖森、友谊、领导、风 
偏好武器：吹枪（飞镖）
圣徽：金色和银色的双半音竖琴
圣兽：：纺织娘
席拉美黛喜欢器乐，但最喜欢竖琴。当星界邪魔第一次从深渊中出现并开始从星界的灵魂之河中攫取流浪的灵魂时，据说席拉美黛能够用她雄伟的竖琴将属于涅槃的迷失灵魂召唤回她身边。
席拉美黛闪亮的红金色头发在她的脸庞周围垂下宽阔的卷发，勾勒出从她纤细的背部升起的白色翅膀。她用她神圣的双色竖琴让作恶者陷入虚假的安全感，然后如果必要的话，用她用作吹枪的窄青铜管投射出的神圣飞镖杀死他们。
启发音符女士通晓所有语言，并喜欢促进不同各方之间的交流，尤其是在这样做可以避免潜在的暴力时。一位在国家之间谈判和平的外交官和一位试图阻止酒吧斗殴的小酒馆顾客都被席拉美黛视为她事业的使者。 席拉美黛的家是涅槃境上一个巨型的大理石圆形剧场，当席拉美黛用她的魔法竖琴演奏曲子时，至高天领主有时会聚集在这里音乐和舞蹈，这让在场的所有人都很尽兴。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Seramaydiel
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 席拉美黛

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lord of the Dark Desert   
Alignment: Neutral Evil   
Areas of Concern: Darkness, Deserts, Murder, Storms   
Domains: Darkness, Death, Evil, Madness, Weather   
Subdomains: Daemon, Loss, Murder, Nightmare, Storms, Undead   
Favoured Weapon: Spear (Longspear)   
Holy Symbol: Sha head   
Sacred Animal: Sha   
Of all the deities of the Ancient Osirian pantheon, none is as hated and reviled as Set. He represents the foreign invader, the desert that encroaches upon the verdant banks of the River Sphinx, the storms that destroy crops and sink ships, and the dead that rise from their graves. He is evil personified, the enemy of all that is good, a god of sickness and disease, confusion and madness, rebellion and strife. He is a usurper, a murderer, and a stealer of souls. Set is the brother of Isis, Osiris, and Nephthys, who is also his consort. With Neith, Set is the father of Sobek. Set murdered Osiris, mutilated the body and scattered the pieces, and tried to steal his brother's throne, ushering in the Age of Darkness. Set is the enemy of both his brother Osiris and his nephew Horus. Set is opposed to Anubis as well, and the two war over the souls of the Osirian dead, with Anubis seeking to guide them safely to the Boneyard, and Set vying to steal their souls or turn them into undead abominations. Set appears as a lean Osirian man with the head of a sha, also known as a Set-beast. Kinslayers, murderers, and usurpers all pay homage to Set, but he is also venerated by kings and pharaohs who value the god's cunning, strength, and power. Set is a patron of assassins, rogues, and necromancers, and he is worshiped by barbarians, warriors, and evil druids as well.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：黑暗沙漠的领主 
对立面：中立邪恶 
关注领域：黑暗沙漠的领主中立邪恶 
关注领域：黑暗，沙漠，谋杀，风暴 
领域：黑暗，死亡，邪恶，疯狂，天气 
分支：黑暗，沙漠，谋杀，风暴黑暗、死亡、邪恶、疯狂、天气 
子域：恶魔、损失、谋杀、噩梦、风暴、亡灵 
最喜爱的武器：长矛（长枪） 
神圣的象征：
圣兽：沙 
在古奥西里斯万神殿的所有神灵中，没有一个像赛特那样受人憎恨和谩骂。他代表着外来入侵者、侵占斯芬克斯河青翠河岸的沙漠、摧毁庄稼和击沉船只的风暴，以及从坟墓中复活的亡灵。他是邪恶的化身，是一切美好事物的敌人，是疾病、混乱、疯狂、叛乱和纷争之神。他是篡夺者、谋杀犯和灵魂窃取者。赛特是伊希斯、奥西里斯和奈菲提斯的兄弟，奈菲提斯也是他的妃子。赛特与尼特是索贝克的父亲。赛特谋杀了奥西里斯，肢解了他的尸体并将碎片散落一地，还试图窃取他哥哥的王位，从而开创了黑暗时代。赛特是其兄奥西里斯和侄子荷鲁斯的敌人。赛特与阿努比斯也是对立的，两人为了争夺奥西里斯亡灵的灵魂而大打出手，阿努比斯试图将他们安全地引导至骨园，而赛特则争相窃取他们的灵魂或将他们变成憎恶的亡灵。赛特的形象是一个精瘦的奥西里斯人，长着 "沙 "的头颅，也被称为 "赛特兽"。弑君者、谋杀者和篡夺者都会向赛特致敬，但国王和法老们也崇敬赛特，因为他们看重赛特的狡猾、力量和权力。赛特是刺客、流氓和死灵法师的守护神，野蛮人、战士和邪恶的德鲁伊也崇拜他。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lord of the Dark Desert   
Alignment: Neutral Evil   
Areas of Concern: Darkness, Deserts, Murder, Storms   
Domains: Darkness, Death, Evil, Madness, Weather   
Subdomains: Daemon, Loss, Murder, Nightmare, Storms, Undead   
Favoured Weapon: Spear (Longspear)   
Holy Symbol: Sha head   
Sacred Animal: Sha   
Of all the deities of the Ancient Osirian pantheon, none is as hated and reviled as Set. He represents the foreign invader, the desert that encroaches upon the verdant banks of the River Sphinx, the storms that destroy crops and sink ships, and the dead that rise from their graves. He is evil personified, the enemy of all that is good, a god of sickness and disease, confusion and madness, rebellion and strife. He is a usurper, a murderer, and a stealer of souls. Set is the brother of Isis, Osiris, and Nephthys, who is also his consort. With Neith, Set is the father of Sobek. Set murdered Osiris, mutilated the body and scattered the pieces, and tried to steal his brother's throne, ushering in the Age of Darkness. Set is the enemy of both his brother Osiris and his nephew Horus. Set is opposed to Anubis as well, and the two war over the souls of the Osirian dead, with Anubis seeking to guide them safely to the Boneyard, and Set vying tosteal their souls or turn them into undead abominations. Set appears as a lean Osirian man with the head of a sha, also known as a Set-beast. Kinslayers, murderers, and usurpers all pay homage to Set, but he is also venerated by kings and pharaohs who value the god's cunning, strength, and power. Set is a patron of assassins, rogues, and necromancers, and he is worshiped by barbarians, warriors, and evil druids as well.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：黑沙魔王
阵营：中立邪恶
神职：黑暗、沙漠、凶杀、风暴
领域：黑暗、死亡、邪恶、疯狂、天气
子领域：邪魔、失却、杀戮、梦魇、风暴、亡灵
偏好武器：矛（长矛）
圣徽：圣徽：沙犬头
圣兽：沙犬
在古奥西里昂诸神中，没有比赛特更受人嫌弃的了。祂象征了异族的入侵者，逐渐侵蚀史芬斯河畔的沙漠，毁坏农作沉没船只的风暴，以及从坟中再起的亡灵。祂是恶之化身，普世之善的敌人，疫病、狂躁、叛乱之神。祂是篡乱王、杀人犯、夺魂者。
赛特是伊西斯及欧西里斯兄弟，奈芙蒂斯的兄弟/配偶。并与奈斯产下一子索贝克。赛特谋杀欧西里斯，将之碎尸万段后洒遍天地，并篡夺祂兄弟的王位，开启了黑暗之年的长夜。赛特是兄弟欧西里斯及姪子荷鲁斯的死敌。赛特也与阿努比斯对抗，两神为了争夺奥西里昂死者的灵魂而战─阿努比斯想将亡魂平安引领至骨园，而赛特则想在拐走它们以后将之转化为不死怪物。赛特以长着沙犬─别称为赛特兽的动物─头的清瘦奥西里昂男子形象示人。
弑亲者、杀人者与篡夺者敬拜赛特，但许多重视祂的机智、力量与权柄的君主和法老也供奉祂。赛特是刺客、盗贼与死灵法师的守护神，祂也受野蛮人、武人及邪恶德鲁伊崇拜。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Set
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 赛特

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Fire God   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Fire, Magic, Revenge   
Domains: Chaos, Evil, Fire, Magic   
Subdomains: Ash, Demon, Divine, Smoke   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy mace   
Holy Symbol: Burning boar skull   
Sacred Animal: Daedon   
When they created the orcs, the gods each gave the new race an admirable quality. Sezelrian gave the orcs intelligence, so they could know and worship the gods who made them. Through religion, the orcs learned to channel the power of the gods, and thus the Fire God is also the god of magic. Sezelrian teaches that not everything can be fought with physical strength alone. An orc must be clever to control fire or magic, lest she get burned. Yet Sezelrian is still an orc god, and thus has no patience for knowledge without immediate practical use. Sezelrian is depicted as an orc witch doctor wielding a mace that continually emits smoke and sparks without burning. Often his true face is hidden behind a mask of a demonic visage wreathed in fire. Sezelrian rarely leads attacks against his fellow orc gods, but often serves as an adviser to one of his brothers against another, usual in conflicts he himself instigated. Sezelrian is least likely to ally with the bestial Nulgreth; he instead favors Zagresh, who at least appreciates the destructive power of fire. Regardless of which god they hold highest, all orc spellcasters—whether arcane or divine—owe thanks to Sezelrian. They show their respect with fire, integrating bonfires, burnt offerings, candles, and torches into their rituals. Tribes dedicated to the Fire God are generally more accepting of magicusers in their midst. Burns and brands often mark the flesh of those dedicated to Sezelrian.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：火神
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：火、魔法、复仇
领域：混乱、邪恶、火焰、魔法
子领域：灰烬、恶魔、神力、烟雾
偏好武器：重型狼牙棒（重型硬头锤）
圣徽：燃烧的野猪头骨
圣兽：野猪
在创造兽人时，众神都赋予了这个新种族令人钦佩的品质。塞泽里安赐予了兽人感知，所以他们可以认识和崇拜创造他们的神祇。
通过宗教，兽人学会了引导众神的力量，因此火神也是魔法之神。塞泽里安教导说，并非所有事情都可以仅靠肉体来对抗。兽人必须聪明地控制火或魔法，以免被烧伤。然而塞泽里安仍然是兽人之神，因此对没有立即实际应用的知识缺乏耐心。
塞泽里安被描绘成一名兽人巫医，他挥舞着一根不断散发出烟雾和火花但并未燃烧的狼牙棒。通常，他的真面目隐藏在一个被火焰包围的恶魔面容的面具后面。
塞泽里安很少带头攻击他的兽人神祇同胞，但经常充当他兄弟之间冲突的顾问，这通常发生在他自己煽动的冲突中。塞泽里安最不可能与野蛮的努尔格雷斯结盟；相反，他更喜欢萨格勒什，他至少欣赏火焰的破坏力。
不管他们崇拜哪个神，所有的兽人施法者——无论是奥术还是神术——都要感谢塞泽里安。他们用火表示敬意，将篝火、燔祭、蜡烛和火把融入他们的仪式中。献身于火神的部落通常更接受他们中间的魔法师。烧伤和伤痕经常铭刻在那些献身于塞泽里安的人的肉体上。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sezelrian
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 塞泽里安

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You summon a pair of claws over your hands formed from semireal material. This grants you two primary claw attacks dealing 1d4 points of damage if you are Medium (1d3 if Small) plus 1 point of Strength damage. A successful Fortitude saving throw negates the Strength damage (DC = this spell’s DC). 
While under the effect of this spell, all claw attacks gain this spells Strength damage component.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你在双手上召唤出一对由半金属材料制成的爪子。如果你是中型生物，这将赋予你两次主要爪击，造成 1d4 点伤害（如果是小型生物，则为 1d3 点）外加 1 点力量伤害。成功的强韧豁免可以抵消力量伤害（DC = 本法术的 DC）。
在此法术的作用下，所有爪子攻击都会获得此法术的力量伤害成分。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shadow Claws
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 影爪

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You instantly travel between shadows to a point within range. You leave a shadowy decoy in your former location and are wrapped in shadow at your destination; you attempt a Stealth check as a free action to hide in your new location. In addition, for 1 round, the envelope of shadow around you grants you concealment (20% miss chance). 
The shadow decoy is fragile and will not survive more than a single attack / one round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你可以瞬间穿梭于阴影之间，到达范围内的某一点。你会在原地留下一个阴影诱饵，并在目的地被阴影包裹；你可以尝试一次隐身检查作为自由行动，以隐藏在新的地点。此外，在 1 个回合内，你周围的阴影会给你带来隐蔽效果（20% 的失误几率）。
阴影诱饵很脆弱，在一轮攻击中无法存活超过一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shadow Jaunt
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 影子之旅

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shadow Jaunt Subspell
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暗影特攻子法术

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You enter a shadow or area of darkness, which transports you along a coiling path of shadowstuff to a units shadow within range.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你进入一个阴影或黑暗区域，它会将你沿着阴影物质的盘旋路径传送到范围内的一个单位阴影中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shadow Step
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 影子舞步

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A draconic shaman gains a drake companion instead of a spirit animal, and she communes with the drake to prepare her spells just as other shamans commune with their spirit animals. She doesn’t gain a primary spirit, but she still gains wandering spirit at 4th level. She must select all her hexes (other than her wandering hexes) from the list of shaman hexes. She doesn’t gain spirit magic slots until 4th level when she gains her wandering spirit. 
This ability replaces spirit, spirit animal, and the hexes gained at 4th and 10th levels and alters spirit magic.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
龙之萨满获得龙兽伙伴而不是魂兽，她通过与龙兽交流来准备她的法术，就像其他萨满与他们的魂兽交流一样。她没有获得初始精魂，但她仍然在 4 级获得游荡精魂。她必须从萨满巫术列表中选择她可以获得的巫术（除了她的游荡精魂巫术）。直到第4级她获得游荡精魂时，她才获得精魂魔法。
此能力取代精魂、魂兽和在 4 级和 10 级获得的巫术，并改变精魂魔法。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This spell causes seven shimmering, multicolored beams of light to spray from your hand. Each beam has a different power. Creatures in the area of the spell with 8 HD or less are automatically blinded for 2d4 rounds. Every creature in the area is randomly struck by one or more beams, which have additional effects:
20 points fire damage (Reflex half)
40 points acid damage (Reflex half)
80 points electricity damage (Reflex half)
Poison (Frequency 1/rd. for 6 rds.; Init. effect death; Sec. effect 1 Con/rd.; Cure 2 consecutive Fort saves)
Baleful Polymorph (Fortitude negates)
Insane, as insanity spell (Will negates)
Sent to another plane forever (Will negates)
Creature struck by two rays receives both rays' effects at once.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
此{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}使七道闪烁的彩色光线从你的手中射出。每道光线都有不同的特异力量。处于法术范围内且生命骰数不超过8的生物自动陷入目盲{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d4{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}。范围内每个生物随机被一道或更多光线击中，每道光线都具有额外的效果：
20点{g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}火焰伤害{/g}（反射减半）
40点酸蚀{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}（反射减半）
80点电击伤害（反射减半）
毒素（频率为每轮1次，持续6轮；初始效果为即死；次要效果为每轮1点{g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}体质{/g}伤害；连续两次强韧{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免{/g}成功可治愈）
恶意变形术（强韧免除）
疯狂，效果如同神智错乱（意志免除）
永远传送至另一位面（意志免除）
被两道光线击中的生物会同时承受两道光线的效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Phantasmagoric Display - Prismatic Spray
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 虹彩使徒 - 虹光喷射

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A twisting pattern of coruscating colors weaves through the air, affecting creatures within. The spell affects a total number of HD of creatures equal to your caster level (maximum 20). Creatures with the fewest HD are affected first, and among creatures with equal HD, those who are closest to the spell's point of origin are affected first. HD that are not sufficient to affect a creature are wasted. The spell affects each subject according to its HD.
6 or less: Unconscious for 1d4 rounds, then stunned for the same amount of rounds, and then confused for the same amount of rounds. (Treat an unconscious result as stunned for nonliving creatures.)
7 to 12: Stunned for 1d4 rounds, then confused for the same amount of rounds.
13 or more: Confused for 1d4 rounds.
Sightless creatures are not affected by scintillating pattern.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
充满生动色彩的交缠图纹在空中汇集，对身在其中的生物造成影响。此{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}可影响生物的总生命骰数等于你的{g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}施法者等级{/g}（最高20级）。生命骰数最低的生物首先受到影响，相同生命骰数的生物当中则是最靠近法术源点的首先受到影响。不足以影响一个生物的生命骰数将被浪费。法术将根据受术生物的生命骰数造成不同效果。
6或更低：{g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}昏迷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}轮，然后震慑相同的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}，然后困惑相同的轮数。（对于非活物，将昏迷按震慑判定）
7到12：震慑1d4轮，然后困惑相同的轮数。
13或更高：困惑1d4轮。
无视觉的生物不受迷幻图纹影响。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Phantasmagoric Display - Scintillating Pattern
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 幻彩展示 - 闪烁图案

LocalizedStrings.enGB: 虹彩使徒 - 迷幻图纹
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 虹彩使徒 - 迷幻图纹

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action, the shaman causes stardust to materialize around one creature within 30 feet. This stardust causes the target to shed light as a candle, and it cannot benefit from concealment or any invisibility effects. The creature takes a –1 penalty on attack rolls and sight-based Perception checks. This penalty to attack rolls and Perception checks increases by 1 at 4th level and every 4 levels thereafter, to a maximum of –6 at 20th level. This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to half the shaman’s level (minimum 1). Sightless creatures cannot be affected by this ability. The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个标准动作，萨满召唤来一团星尘包裹30尺内一个生物。星尘会使目标如同蜡烛一般发光，并且不能从隐蔽和隐形效果中获得任何好处。目标的攻击和基于视力的察觉检定都会获得-1减值，该减值在4级及之后每4级都会增加1,最高20级时的-6。该能力持续轮数为萨满等级的一半（最少为1）。不依靠视力的生物不受该能力影响。该能力每日使用次数为3+萨满魅力调整值。

This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to half the shaman’s level (minimum 1). Sightless creatures cannot be affected by this ability. The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个标准动作，萨满召唤来一团星尘包裹30尺内一个生物。星尘会使目标如同蜡烛一般发光，并且不能从隐蔽和隐形效果中获得任何好处。目标的攻击和基于视力的察觉检定都会获得-1减值，该减值在4级及之后每4级都会增加1,最高20级时的-6。该能力持续轮数为萨满等级的一半（最少为1）。不依靠视力的生物不受该能力影响。该能力每日使用次数为3+萨满魅力调整值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The shaman gains cold resistance 15. In addition, every time you miss an attack roll because of concealment, you can reroll your miss chance percentile roll one time to see if you actually hit.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 萨满获得寒冷抵抗15。此外，每次因为你因为隐蔽而导致攻击失手，你可以重掷一次来决定是否命中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Void Adaptation
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 虚空适应

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Upon reaching 20th level, the shaman becomes the spirit of heaven. You receive a bonus on all saving throws equal to your Wisdom modifier. You become immune to fear effects, and automatically confirm all critical hits. Once per day, should you die, 1 round after dying you are reborn. Your body re-forms with all your equipment, and you return to life with maximum hit points.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: ２０级时，萨满成为苍天的精魂。你可以将感知调整值添加到所有豁免上。你免疫恐惧效果，所造成的重击威胁自动确认。每天一次，若你死亡，将在1轮内重生，你的身体会带着所有装备重组，回到最大生命值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Manifestation
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 显圣

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A shaman who selects the heavens spirit has eyes that sparkle like starlight, exuding an aura of otherworldliness to those she is around. When she calls upon one of this spirit’s abilities, her eyes turn pitch black and the colors around her drain for a brief moment.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 选择苍天魂域的萨满双眼透射出星光，周身散发出异世的霞光。当她激活该魂域能力时，她的双眼会忽然变得深邃而幽暗，瞬间吸收掉周遭的光芒。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The shaman can cast prismatic spray and scintillating pattern, each once per day with a caster level equal to her shaman level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 萨满每天可以使用虹光喷射和迷幻图纹各1次，施法者等级等于其萨满等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Phantasmagoric Display
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 虹彩使徒

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The shaman causes a target within 30 feet to stumble and fall. The shaman attempts a trip combat maneuver using her caster level as its base attack bonus against the target’s CMD. On a successful trip attempt, the target falls prone and takes 1d6 points of damage.
Accident

The shaman causes a target within 30 feet to stumble and fall. The shaman attempts a trip combat maneuver using her caster level as its base attack bonus against the target’s CMD. On a successful trip attempt, the target falls prone and takes 1d6 points of damage.

As a standard action, the shaman can curse a coin, and place it in the pockets of a target, attempting to plant the coin is a melee touch attack. The bearer of the cursed coin takes a –2 penalty on all saving throws and skill checks as long he has the coin on his person. Once the coin leaves his person, the curse ends and the coin becomes a mundane piece of tender again. At 8th level, the penalty becomes –4. If the shaman curses a new coin, the previous curse ends. This is a curse effect.

As a standard action, the shaman can curse a coin, and place it in the pockets of a target, attempting to plant the coin is a melee touch attack. The bearer of the cursed coin takes a –2 penalty on all saving throws and skill checks as long he has the coin on his person. Once the coin leaves his person, the curse ends and the coin becomes a mundane piece of tender again. At 8th level, the penalty becomes –4. If the shaman curses a new coin, the previous curse ends. This is a curse effect.
Bad Penny

As a standard action, the shaman can curse a coin, and place it in the pockets of a target, attempting to plant the coin is a melee touch attack. The bearer of the cursed coin takes a –2 penalty on all saving throws and skill checks as long he has the coin on his person. Once the coin leaves his person, the curse ends and the coin becomes a mundane piece of tender again. At 8th level, the penalty becomes –4. If the shaman curses a new coin, the previous curse ends. This is a curse effect.

The shaman turns the air frigid around a target within medium range for a number of rounds equal to the shaman’s Charisma modifier (minimum 1). The target must attempt a Fortitude saving throw at the beginning of each turn or be damaged by exposure to the extreme cold. On a failed save, the target takes 1d6 points of nonlethal damage. On a successful save, the effect ends immediately. Whether or not the initial save is successful, the creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

The target must attempt a Fortitude saving throw at the beginning of each turn or be damaged by exposure to the extreme cold. On a failed save, the target takes 1d6 points of nonlethal damage. On a successful save, the effect ends immediately. Whether or not the initial save is successful, the creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.
Biting Frost

As a swift action, the shaman channels the city’s spirit through herself, gaining a +4 bonus on all Dexterity– and Wisdom-based skill checks. She can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier. These rounds need not be consecutive.

As a swift action, the shaman channels the city’s spirit through herself, gaining a +4 bonus on all Dexterity– and Wisdom-based skill checks. She can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier. These rounds need not be consecutive.
City Spirit

As a swift action, the shaman channels the city’s spirit through herself, gaining a +4 bonus on all Dexterity– and Wisdom-based skill checks. She can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier. These rounds need not be consecutive.

If the shaman is a living creature, she reacts to positive and negative energy as if she were undead—positive energy harms her, while negative energy heals her. If she’s an undead creature or a creature with the negative energy affinity ability, she gains a +1 bonus to her channel resistance. At 8th level, she gains a +4 bonus on saves against death effects and effects that drain energy, her bonus to channel resistance increases to +2.
Deathly Being

When the shaman casts a cure spell, the maximum number of hit points healed is based on her shaman level, not the limit imposed by the spell. For example an 11th-level shaman with this hex can cast cure light wounds to heal 1d8+11 hit points instead of the normal 1d8+5 maximum.
Enhanced Cures

The shaman summons the powers of nature to erode a construct or object within 30 feet. This erosion deals 1d6 points of damage per 2 shaman levels, ignoring hardness and damage reduction. The Target can attempt a Reflex saving throw to halve the damage. Once an object or a construct is damaged by this erosion, it cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.
Erosion Curse
Already damaged by this hex today

The shaman summons the powers of nature to erode a construct or object within 30 feet. This erosion deals 1d6 points of damage per 2 shaman levels, ignoring hardness and damage reduction. The Target can attempt a Reflex saving throw to halve the damage. Once an object or a construct is damaged by this erosion, it cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

The shaman’s senses become magically heightened in the heat of battle. As a swift action, she can grant herself a +10 insight bonus for 1 round on Perception checks made to notice and pinpoint invisible creatures within 30 feet. She can instead use this ability as a swift action to ignore the affects of concealment on her next attack, as long as that attack is made before the end of her next turn. The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to her shaman level.
Eyes of Battle

The shaman’s senses become magically heightened in the heat of battle. As a swift action, she can grant herself a +10 insight bonus for 1 round on Perception checks made to notice and pinpoint invisible creatures within 30 feet. She can instead use this ability as a swift action to ignore the affects of concealment on her next attack, as long as that attack is made before the end of her next turn. The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to her shaman level.

Eyes of Battle - Ignore Concealment

Eyes of Battle - Perception

The stars themselves hold many answers, you may add your Wisdom modifier to your Charisma modifier on all Charisma-based skill checks. In addition, once per day you can cast one spell as if it were modified by the Empower Spell or Extend Spell feat without increasing the spell’s casting time or level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星星本身就蕴含着许多答案，在所有基于魅力的技能检定中，你都可以将你的感知修正值加上你的魅力修正值。此外，每天您可以施放一次法术，就像被 "强效法术 "或 "法术延时 "超魔修改过一样，而不会增加法术的施放时间或等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The shaman causes a creature within 30 feet to turn into a twisted, treelike shape for 2 rounds. The target gains hardness 5 but is staggered, and can negate the effect with a successful Fortitude saving throw. Whether or not the target succeeds at its save, it can’t be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

The shaman causes a creature within 30 feet to turn into a twisted, treelike shape for 2 rounds. The target gains hardness 5 but is staggered, and can negate the effect with a successful Fortitude saving throw. Whether or not the target succeeds at its save, it can’t be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.
Hex of Lignification

The shaman causes a creature within 30 feet to turn into a twisted, treelike shape for 2 rounds. The target gains hardness 5 but is staggered, and can negate the effect with a successful Fortitude saving throw. Whether or not the target succeeds at its save, it can’t be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

Your connection to the skies above is so strong that your feet barely touch the ground. At 1st level, you no longer leave tracks gaining a +1 to stealth. At 5th level, you can hover up to 6 inches above the ground, avoiding difficult terrain. At 10th level you gain the ability to fly along the ground, gaining a +3 dodge bonus to AC against melee attacks, for a number of minutes per day equal to your shaman level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你与天空的联系如此强烈，以至于你的脚几乎不需要接触地面。在第 1 级，你不再留下踪迹获得 +1 隐匿。在第 5 级，你可以悬停在离地面最多 6 英寸的地方，避开困难地形。在第 10 级，你获得沿地面飞行的能力，在对抗近战攻击时 AC 获得 +3 闪避加值，每天的持续时间等同于你的先知等级。此持续时间不需要连续，但每次使用至少1分钟。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The shaman causes the speed of a creature within 30 feet to be halved. The target can attempt a Fortitude saving throw to negate this effect. The penalty lasts for a number of rounds equal to the shaman’s character level and does not stack with other effects that reduce speed. Whether or not the save is successful, the creature can’t be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

The shaman causes the speed of a creature within 30 feet to be halved. The target can attempt a Fortitude saving throw to negate this effect. The penalty lasts for a number of rounds equal to the shaman’s character level and does not stack with other effects that reduce speed. Whether or not the save is successful, the creature can’t be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.
Sluggish

The shaman causes the speed of a creature within 30 feet to be halved. The target can attempt a Fortitude saving throw to negate this effect. The penalty lasts for a number of rounds equal to the shaman’s character level and does not stack with other effects that reduce speed. Whether or not the save is successful, the creature can’t be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

The shaman causes a creature within 30 feet to spark and shimmer with electrical energy. Though this does not harm the creature, it does cause the creature to emit light like a torch, preventing it from gaining any benefit from concealment or invisibility. Furthermore, while the aura lasts, whenever the target is hit with a metal melee weapon, it also takes an amount of electricity damage equal to the shaman’s Charisma modifier. The sparking aura lasts a 1 round for every 2 shaman levels the shaman possesses. A creature affected by this hex cannot be affected by it again for 24 hours.

Furthermore, while the aura lasts, whenever the target is hit with a metal melee weapon, it also takes an amount of electricity damage equal to the shaman’s Charisma modifier. The sparking aura lasts a 1 round for every 2 shaman levels the shaman possesses. A creature affected by this hex cannot be affected by it again for 24 hours.
Sparking Aura

The sparking aura lasts a 1 round for every 2 shaman levels the shaman possesses. A creature affected by this hex cannot be affected by it again for 24 hours.

As a standard action, the shaman causes one creature within 30 feet to burn like a star. The creature takes 1d6 points of fire damage for every 2 levels the shaman possesses and emits bright light for 1 round. A successful Fortitude saving throw halves the damage and negates the emission of bright light. The shaman can use this hex a number of times per day equal to her Charisma modifier (minimum 1), but must wait 1d4 rounds between uses.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个标准动作，萨满可以使30尺内一个单位燃起星光。目标受到每2萨满等级1d6点火焰伤害，并散发出强光１轮。成功的强韧豁免可以减半伤害并不会发光。该巫术每日使用次数为萨满的魅力调整值，连续使用之间至少间距1d4轮。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Even the most tangled briars make way for the shaman, and suitable roots and branches appear to support her feet. The shaman gains woodland stride, as per the druid ability of the same name. 
You can move through any sort difficult terrain at your normal speed and without taking damage or suffering any other impairment.
Verdant Path

The shaman touches a willing creature (including herself) and grants a ward of stoene. The next time the warded creature is struck with a melee attack, it is treated as if it has DR 5/adamantine. This ward lasts for 1 minute, after which it fades away if not already expended. At 8th and 16th levels, the ward lasts for one additional attack. A creature affected by this hex cannot be affected by it again for 24 hours.

As a standard action, the shaman can attack an enemy with an unarmed strike as if she had the Improved Unarmed Strike feat. If the shaman hits a creature in this way, that creature must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + half the shaman’s class level + her Charisma modifier) or be dazed for 1 round. The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier. 
You must be unarmed in your main hand to use this ability.
Powerful Smash

As a standard action, the shaman can attack an enemy with an unarmed strike as if she had the Improved Unarmed Strike feat. If the shaman hits a creature in this way, that creature must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + half the shaman’s class level + her Charisma modifier) or be dazed for 1 round. The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier.

The shaman gains a +2 enhancement bonus to her Strength score. This bonus increases by 2 every 6 shaman levels thereafter (at 14th and 20th levels for her spirit, and at 18th level for her wandering spirit).

The shaman gains a +2 enhancement bonus to her Strength score. This bonus increases by 2 every 6 shaman levels thereafter (at 14th and 20th levels for her spirit, and at 18th level for her wandering spirit).
At 20th level, the shaman can transform into any animal form granted by the beast shape spells, able to activate and dismiss the ability as often as she likes.
