A shaman who selects the mammoth spirit is abnormally tall and stocky, with thick shaggy hair. When she uses a special ability of this spirit, her muscles ripple and flex, and her stature seems even greater than before.
Mammoth

You instantly transfer yourself from your current location to any other spot within range, as if using the dimention door spell. However only you are transported and not your allies. You can use this ability three times per day, plus one additional time per day at 12th level and at 20th level.
Doors to Everywhere

You instantly transfer yourself from your current location to any other spot within range, as if using the dimention door spell. However only you are transported and not your allies. You can use this ability three times per day, plus one additional time per day at 12th level and at 20th level.

When in an urban environment, the shaman blends into the streets around her, making her difficult to pin down. She gains the effects of the evasion and improved uncanny dodge class features.
Evasion
A character can avoid even magical and unusual attacks with great agility. If a character makes a successful Reflex saving throw against an attack that normally deals half damage on a successful save, he instead takes no damage. A helpless character does not gain the benefit of evasion.
Improved Uncanny Dodge
The character can no longer be flanked.
This defense denies another rogue the ability to sneak attack the character by flanking her, unless the attacker has at least four more rogue levels than the target does.

Upon reaching 20th level, the shaman becomes a spirit of the slums. She is immune to all diseases and poisons. When in an urban environment, she gains a +4 insight bonus to her AC and on Reflex saves.

A shaman who selects the slums spirit gains the city’s alleys and avenues as steadfast allies. The rats in the gutter, the torches along the walls, the coins that flow through the market are all a part of her and serve her whim.
Slums

She can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier.

As a standard action, the shaman can cause a field of thick roots to burrow up from the ground, for a number of rounds per day equal to her Charisma modifier. All creatures other than the shaman treat the area as difficult terrain. 
Every enemy within the area of the spell is the target of a combat maneuver check made to grapple each round at the beginning of your turn, as well as when entering the area. The CMB of this grapple attempt is equal to your shaman level plus 5, increasing to plus 10 when trying to escape the grapple. If a creature is grappled by this ability, or fails to escape the grapple, it takes 1d6+4 points of damage.
The shaman can use this ability once per day, increasing to twice per day at 16th level.

Upon reaching 20th level, the shaman becomes a living creature of wood. She gains a +4 natural armor bonus to her Armor Class and damage reduction 10/— against wooden weapons. She gains immunity to paralysis, poison, sleep, and stun, along with enemy polymorph spells.
A shaman who selects the wood spirit has a skin tone similar to the coloration of trees in her home region. Her vibrant hair is fragrant and resembles leaves and blossoms.

You become a Huge Treant or a Huge Giant Flytrap. 
Treant: You become a huge treant. You gain a +8 size bonus to your Strength, +4 to Constitution, -2 penalty to Dexterity and a +6 natural armor bonus. You gain a +8 size bonus to your Strength, +4 to Constitution, -2 penalty to Dexterity and a +6 natural armor bonus. You also gain four 1d8 bite attacks, acid Resistance 20 and blindsight and poison ability.

The shambler spell creates 1d4+2 shambling mounds with the advanced template. The creatures willingly aid you in combat or battle, perform a specific mission, or serve as bodyguards. The creatures remain with you for 7 days. You can only have one shambler spell in effect at one time. If you cast this spell while another casting is still in effect, the previous casting is dispelled.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 变形怪法术会用高等模板创造出 1d4+2 个变形怪堆。这些生物愿意在战斗或战役中帮助你，执行特定任务或充当护卫。这些生物会在你身边停留 7 天。同一时间只能有一个变形怪法术生效。如果您在施放此法术时，另一个法术仍在生效，则前一个法术会被驱散。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Blood Marquis, Demon Lord of Lies and Murder
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Envy, Lies, Murder
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Evil, Nobility
Subdomains: Demon, Leadership, Martyr, Rage
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: White bloody feather
Sacred Animal: Stork   
Cruel and sadistic, Shax revels in the act of torture and murder, especially if the victim retains hope for survival up to the very instant of death. He is particularly fond of eating the eyes of his living victims, but not until he is sure they have seen the filthy tools and bloodstained devices he intends to use upon their bodies. Shax appears as a human man with a dove’s head, bird’s legs, and an immense collection of knives and other bloodstained weaponry. His cultists are typically lone murderers or sadists, often killers who lead double lives as upstanding citizens of society and kill in secret. Shax is the creator of the babau race, and those he creates by skinning living victims and then infusing them with Abyssal energies are the most powerful of their kind. Shax’s realm is the appropriately named Charnelhome, an immense house the size of a city perched atop a slightly slanted bluff surrounded by a vast bog of thorny, blooddrinking plants. Each of Charnelhome’s rooms contains a different insidious deathtrap or horrific guardian—Shax is fond of releasing victims into a wing of the vast manor so he can watch them try to escape, often posing as a fellow prisoner so that the demon lord can experience the victim’s despair and fear on as intimate a level as possible.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：血侯爵、谎言和谋杀恶魔领主 
阵营：混乱邪恶 
关注领域：嫉妒、谎言、谋杀 
领域：混乱、毁灭、邪恶、崇高 
子域：恶魔、领导力、殉道者、狂暴 
偏好武器：匕首 
圣徽：白色血淋淋的羽毛 
圣兽：鹳  
Shax 残忍且残虐狂，沉迷于酷刑和谋杀行为，尤其是当受害者在死亡的那一刻仍保留着生存的希望时。他特别喜欢吃他活着的受害者的眼睛，但除非他确定他们已经看到他打算在他们身上使用的肮脏工具和沾满血迹的装置。沙克斯以人类的形象出现，长着鸽子的头、鸟的腿，以及大量的刀具和其他沾满鲜血的武器。他的教徒通常是孤独的杀人犯或残虐狂，通常是作为正直的社会公民过着双重生活并秘密杀人的杀手。 Shax 是 babau 种族的创造者，他通过剥下活着的受害者的皮然后将深渊能量注入他们而创造的那些是同类中最强大的。 Shax 的领地恰如其分地命名为 Charnelhome，这是一座巨型的房子，有一座城市那么大，坐落在一个略微倾斜的悬崖上，周围环绕着一大片带刺、吸血的植物沼泽。 Charnelhome 的每个房间都包含一个不同的阴险死亡陷阱或可怕的监护人——Shax 喜欢将受害者释放到广阔庄园的侧翼，这样他就可以看到他们试图逃跑，他经常假扮成狱友，这样恶魔领主就可以体验受害者的痛苦尽可能亲密地表达绝望和恐惧。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shax
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 沙克斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Ibis Matron   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Age, Life, Self-actualization   
Domains: Community, Good, Healing, Liberation   
Subdomains: Agathion, Education, Family, Freedom, Resurrection   
Favoured Weapon: Sickle   
Holy Symbol: Vine-wrapped sickle   
Sacred Animal: Dragonfly   
Shei demonstrates patience and acumen cultivated over thousands of years and strives to lead others to the same wisdom of the self. Through quiet reflection, service to the community, and the grand experience of life, Shei's followers learn to recognize their true natures and feel the freedom that comes with perfect self-acceptance. Shei stands 8 feet tall and exudes quiet confidence and grace despite her eerie form. The empyreal lord's slender body appears to be that of a middle-aged woman, but her form is concealed beneath glossy black feathers and tightly wrapped bandages. The head of an ibis pours from her elongated neck, and in her hand she carries her silver sickle, Imminent Harvest, with her at all times lest evil catch her unawares. Though Shei possesses the wisdom of age, she also possesses the fiery passion of youth, making her an unpredictable force to be reckoned with even at the best of times. The Ibis Matron understands every stage of life, from infancy to old age, and sees the purpose of life as the attainment of self-actualization. Her servants find joy in helping mortals express their true selves through creativity, hard work, and service to their communities. Individuals in search of enlightenment, parents of small children, mothers about to bring life into the world, and teachers helping their students blossom all pay homage to Shei. The elderly feel particularly drawn to Shei, knowing that the Ibis Matron understands the weight of their long lives. Those who force others to hew to an uncomfortable mold rouse the wrathful judgment of Shei, as do fiends who corrupt mortals and rob them of their potential. The Ibis Matron has an esp ecial hatred for belier devils and their ilk. Evil creatures that weaken their victims through negative energy-particularly ones that cause premature aging, such as ghosts-also bear the brunt of Shei's glorious anger.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：朱鹭主母
阵营：中立善良 
神职：岁月，生命，自我实现
领域：联盟、善良、医疗、自由
子领域：盖森、教育、家庭、解放、回生
偏好武器：镰刀
圣徽：在镰刀上发芽的三颗种子
圣兽：蜻蜓
雪表现出了数千年培养出来的耐心和敏锐，并努力带领他人获得与自己相同的感知。通过安静的反思、服务社会和丰富的人生体验，雪的追随者学会了认识自己的真实本性，并感受到完美的自我接纳所带来的自由。
雪 身高 8 英尺，尽管外形怪异，但仍散发出平和的自信和优雅。至高天领主修长的身躯，看似中年女子，却隐藏在黑色光滑的羽毛和缠得严严实实的绷带之下。一只朱鹭的头从她细长的脖子伸而出，她手里拿着银镰刀-即将丰收，她总是随身携带以免被邪恶袭击。雪虽然拥有年长的感知，但也拥有青春的火热，即使在最繁荣的时代，她也是一股不可估量的力量。
朱鹭主母了解从婴儿到老年的每个阶段，并将自我实现视为生活的目的。她的仆人通过创造力、辛勤工作和为联盟服务来帮助凡人表达真实的自我，这让他们乐在其中。寻求启蒙的人、小孩子的父母、即将为世界带来生命的母亲、帮助学生成长的老师都向雪致敬。年长者特别喜欢雪，因为他们知道朱鹭主母了解他们漫长生命的重要性。那些强迫他人接受令人不安的生活的人会引来雪的愤怒审判，就像腐化凡人并剥夺他们潜力的恶魔一样。朱鹭主母对自以为是的恶魔及其同类有着特别的仇恨。通过负能量削弱受害者的邪恶生物——尤其是那些导致过早衰老的生物，如鬼魂——也首当其冲受到雪的愤怒。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You create a magical barrier that protects a target’s vital areas. When the target is struck by a critical hit or a sneak attack, there is a 25% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally. This benefit does not stack with other effects that can turn critical hits or sneak attacks into normal attacks, such as the fortification armor special ability.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your own non-magical club or quarterstaff becomes a weapon with a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls. A quarterstaff gains this enhancement for both ends of the weapon. It deals damage as if it were two size categories larger (a Small club or quarterstaff so transmuted deals 1d8 points of damage, a Medium 2d6, and a Large 3d6), +1 for its enhancement bonus. These effects only occur when the weapon is wielded by you. If you do not wield it, the weapon behaves as if unaffected by this spell. A magical weapon still gains the damage via size increase, but not the additional +1 bonuses.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你自己的非魔法棍棒或四分杖会变成一种武器，在攻击和伤害投掷上带有+1强化加成。四分杖的两端都会获得这种增强效果。它造成的伤害就像大了两个体型类别一样（小号棍棒或四分杖转化后造成 1d8 点伤害，中号 2d6 点伤害，大号 3d6 点伤害），强化加成+1。这些效果只有在您持有武器时才会出现。如果您没有挥动它，该武器就会像不受这个法术影响一样。魔法武器仍然可以通过增大尺寸获得伤害，但不会获得额外的 +1 加成。

These effects only occur when the weapon is wielded by you. If you do not wield it, the weapon behaves as if unaffected by this spell. A magical weapon still gains the damage via size increase, but not the additional +1 bonuses.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你自己的非魔法棍棒或四分杖会变成一种武器，在攻击和伤害投掷上带有+1强化加成。四分杖的两端都会获得这种增强效果。它造成的伤害就像大了两个体型类别一样（小号棍棒或四分杖转化后造成 1d8 点伤害，中号 2d6 点伤害，大号 3d6 点伤害），强化加成+1。这些效果只有在您持有武器时才会出现。如果您没有挥动它，该武器就会像不受这个法术影响一样。魔法武器仍然可以通过增大尺寸获得伤害，但不会获得额外的 +1 加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shillelagh
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: Shillelagh

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Chained Maiden, Lord of Prisons
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Aberrations, Clocks, Prisons
Domains: Chaos, Darkness, Evil, Madness   
Subdomains: Demon, Insanity, Loss, Nightmare   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy flail   
Holy Symbol: Clock face with 13 hours 
Sacred Animal: Tarantula   
Shivaska appears as a female choker with four arms and four legs. Her mouth is unnaturally large, but she has no eyes on her head—her eyes glare red from the palms of her four hands. From her back writhe a dozen long, thin animated chains that end in cruel hooks. Shivaska’s cult has a particular interest in orphanages, and an unsettling number of these institutions have ties to the Chained Maiden. An orphanage under the secret control of the cult of Shivaska uses its orphans for all manner of cruel labor, and keeps the children in line by allowing unsettling aberrations (usually chokers) to prowl the orphanage after dark. Tales of monsters and fears of being taken away by strange things lurking in chimneys or cramped closets or hiding under the floorboards work quite well to keep child laborers in line. Shivaska’s realm on the Abyss is a gloomy temperate wilderness known as the Winding Wood. Her palace, the Ticking House, is an immense workhouse with a huge clock tower, the face of which accounts for 13 hours rather than 12. This clock is kept running by the constant toil of a small army of abducted children.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：被锁链少女、监狱之王 
阵营：混乱邪恶 
关注领域：畸变、时钟、监狱 
领域：混乱、黑暗、邪恶、疯狂 
子领域：恶魔、疯狂、失落、梦魇 
偏好武器：重连枷 
圣徽：钟面13 小时 
圣兽：塔兰图拉毒蛛 
Shivaska 以四臂四腿的女性项链出现。她的嘴巴大得不自然，但她的头上没有眼睛——她的眼睛从四只手的手掌中闪闪发光。她的背上缠绕着一打又长又细的动画锁链，末端是残忍的钩子。 Shivaska 的教派对孤儿院特别感兴趣，这些机构中有令人不安的数量与 Chained Maiden 有联系。在 Shivaska 邪教的秘密控制下的孤儿院使用孤儿进行各种残酷的劳动，并通过让令人不安的畸变（通常是窒息者）在天黑后在孤儿院徘徊来保持孩子们的秩序。怪物的故事和害怕被潜伏在烟囱或狭窄的壁橱里或藏在地板下的奇怪事物带走的恐惧非常有效地让童工保持一致。 Shivaska 在 Abyss 上的领地是一片阴暗的温带荒野，被称为 Winding Wood。她的宫殿 Ticking House 是一个巨型的济贫院，有一座巨型的钟楼，钟楼的钟面是 13 小时而不是 12 小时。这个钟由一小群被绑架的儿童不断辛勤劳作维持运转。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shivaska
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 希瓦斯卡

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Empress of Heaven   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Ancestors, Honor, The Sun, Swordplay   
Domains: Glory, Good, Law, Repose, Sun   
Subdomains: Ancestors, Archon, Day, Heroism, Honor, Light, Revelation  
Favoured Weapon: Katana (Longsword)   
Holy Symbol: Katana in front of the sun   
Sacred Animal: Carp   
Shizuru is the Empress of Heaven, goddess of ancestors and the sun. She is also the goddess of honor and swordplay, and is the patron of samurai and other honorable swordfighters. Shizuru loves the moon god Tsukiyo, so much so that she returned him to life when he was slain by his brother Fumeiyoshi. The two lovers are rarely together, however, just as night and day are forever divided, but the two deities are able to rejoin, if only briefly, during rare solar eclipses—a sacred time for both faiths. Shizuru’s worship is popular throughout the Dragon Empires, but her faith is strongest in Minkai, for the emperors of that land revere Shizuru as their divine ancestor. Shizuru is often depicted in art as a beautiful samurai, as a magnificent dragon with golden scales, or as both simultaneously.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：天界女帝
阵营：守序善良
神职：祖先、荣耀、太阳、剑术
领域：荣耀、善良、守序、宁静、太阳
子领域：先祖、亚空、白昼、英勇、诚实、光明、启示
偏爱的武器：武士刀（长剑） 
圣徽：太阳前面的武士刀
圣兽：鲤鱼 
 静琉是祖宗与太阳之神，尊号天界女帝，同时她也是剑道和荣誉之神，武士和其他遵守荣誉准则的剑士都受她的庇护。据说，静琉和月神月夜是一对情侣，即使是月夜兄弟文业对他的谋杀也不能阻止他们之间的爱情。不过，这对恋人很少有机会见面，即使是能够碰上一次通常也是很短暂的——这个时候就会发生日蚀，对于两个神祗的教会来说都是圣日。虽然在整个龙国都不难找到静琉的崇拜者，但是女帝的主要信仰中心还是在明海，明海皇室以自己是静琉的嫡传而骄傲。在艺术作品中，静琉常被描绘为一位美貌的女武士，或者是一头金鳞帝龙，也有时候是两者同时出现。

Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Ancestors, Honor, The Sun, Swordplay   
Domains: Glory, Good, Law, Repose, Sun   
Subdomains: Ancestors, Archon, Day, Heroism, Honor, Light, Revelation  
Favoured Weapon: Katana (Longsword & Dueling sword)   
Holy Symbol: Katana in front of the sun   
Sacred Animal: Carp

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Black Goat of the Woods with a Thousand Young   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Fertility, Forests, Monsters   
Rank: Outer God   
Domains: Animal, Chaos, Evil, Plant, Void (Scalykind)   
Subdomains: Dark Tapestry, Decay, Feather, Fur, Growth, Stars   
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Radially arrayed goat heads   
Whereas Nyarlathotep is said to have a thousand forms, the monstrous fertility deity Shub-Niggurath is said to have spawned a thousand young. Her cult is particularly strong in rural areas where vegetation is thick, such as forests, jungles, and swamps, and many of the creatures associated with her dwell in these verdant realms. Of all the cults of the Dark Tapestry, Shub-Niggurath’s seems to be the most widespread throughout the Inner Sea region, particularly in areas surrounding Lake Encarthan. Many of the Great Old Ones and even other Outer Gods are believed to have mated with Shub-Niggurath, with the resulting spawn being among the most powerful of her children. Shub-Niggurath appears as a roiling cloud of flesh and mist that constantly forms and absorbs hooves, mouths, eyes, tentacles, and other portions of anatomy. She often gives birth to monstrous young, spawning beasts or depositing eggs with hideous fecundity upon the lands she blights.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：森之黑山羊
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：丰产，森林与怪物
等级：外神
领域：动物、混乱、邪恶、植物、虚空
子领域：异幕、腐朽、飞羽、毛兽、滋长、星辰
偏好武器：匕首 
圣徽：颈部相连尖角向外构成环形的山羊头
奈亚拉托提普据说拥有千种化身，而恐怖丰饶神莎布·尼古拉丝则据说诞有千种子嗣。祂的教团在植被茂密的原生态地区，例如林区，丛林与沼泽地区尤为繁盛，而与祂存在联系的生物也大多居住在此类葱郁地区。在所有的黑暗异幕信仰之中，莎布·尼古拉丝的教团在内海地区最为广泛，尤其是在恩卡坦湖（Lake Encarthan）的周边地区。据说莎布·尼古拉丝曾与众多旧日支配者甚至外神交配，由此诞生的子嗣皆是祂众多后裔中最具强力者。
莎布·尼古拉丝形如一团血肉与迷雾织就且不断翻腾激荡的云雾，无数或蹄或口或眼睛或触手或其他器官不断从中塑成又为其吞没。祂每时每刻都诞下恐怖的后代，常凭借恐怖的生殖力在被其伟力贻害的土地上散播丑恶野兽或沉睡之卵。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shub-Niggurath
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 莎布·尼古拉丝

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Many   
Alignment: Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Entropy, Reincarnation, Time   
Domains: Death, Destruction, Madness, Magic   
Subdomains: Arcane, Catastrophe, Divine, Insanity   
Favoured Weapon: Light Mace   
Holy Symbol: Broken hourglass   
Sacred Animal: Communal or hive animals   
Shyka the Many is one of the Eldest, a divine fey creature of tremendous power said to be able to reshape the very fabric of the First World on a whim. Shyka is considered a title or a role, for many entities, both male and female, have borne this name over the ages. All have been chronomancers with mastery over time; time acts strangely within the First World, but Shyka seems able to manipulate it. Indeed, their many forms and personalities over time, past and future, may well sit within Shyka together, out of time, as they all speak with the same voice. All of Shyka's incarnations have seen both the beginning and the end of the Great Beyond, yet they are strangely interested in small events, especially those related to the continuum of time, which they call "perceived causality". Many of their worshippers believe that Shyka quickly shepherds existence toward the best possible version, and has prevented its destruction innumerous times.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：众者
阵营：绝对中立 
神职：熵、转世、时间
领域：死亡、破坏、疯狂、魔法
子领域：秘示域、天灾、神力、狂乱
偏好武器：轻型硬头锤 
圣徽：破碎的沙漏
圣兽：群体或蜂群动物
众者塞卡是一名始祖，据称这类拥有强大力量的神圣妖精可以随心所欲地重塑第一世界的结构。塞卡可以被看做是一种头衔：或职位，因为历史上有许多的灵体都使用过这个名字，其中有男有女。他们都是能够掌控时间的时光术士。
第一世界中时间的流逝非常不同寻常，但塞卡似乎可以将其操纵自如。这点千真万确，从过去到未来，他或者她在历史上的许多形态和人格早已超越了时间的限制，同时存在于塞卡的体内，似乎以同一个声音发声。
塞卡的所有化身都看到了伟大彼岸的开始和结束，但他们对琐事却异常感兴趣，尤其是那些与时间连续体有关的事件，他们称之为“感知因果关系”。他们的许多信徒相信，塞卡将世界的存在引导到最好的结果，并无数次阻止了它的毁灭。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shyka
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 塞卡

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Paladins who serve as priests of Apsu are almost always on the move, wandering from place to place and trying to show their dedication to the Waybringer in their deeds rather than depending on mere words. More rarely a drake is so inspired by a paladin of Apsu that it chooses to assist the paladin in all her actions. These drake allies see the benefit of a silver champion remaining mobile and understand the powerful threats the champion must face, and in time even consent to serve their chosen paladins as a companion.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 作为阿普苏祭司的圣骑士几乎总是四处奔波，从一个地方游荡到另一个地方，试图用自己的行动而不是单纯的言语来表达他们对使道者的忠诚。更罕见的情况是，一只巨龙受到阿普苏圣骑士的启发，选择协助圣骑士的一切行动。这些巨龙盟友看到了白银圣骑士保持机动性的好处，也理解了圣骑士必须面对的强大威胁，久而久之，它们甚至同意作为同伴为自己选择的圣骑士服务。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Paladins who serve as priests of Apsu are almost always on the move, wandering from place to place and trying to show their dedication to the Waybringer in their deeds rather than depending on mere words.More rarely a drake is so inspired by a paladin of Apsu that it chooses to assist the paladin in all her actions. These drake allies see the benefit of a silver champion remaining mobile and understand the powerful threats the champion must face, and in time even consent to serve their chosen paladins as a companion.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 担任阿普苏祭司的圣骑士几乎总是在赶路，从一个地方流浪到另一个地方，试图用行动来展示他们对引路者的奉献，而不是仅仅依靠言语。更罕见的是，一只龙兽会受到阿普苏圣骑士的感召，甚至于它会选择协助圣骑士的所有行动。这些龙兽盟友看到了银冠勇士持续旅行的益处，并了解到他们必须面对的强大威胁，最终他们将同意选择作为圣骑士的伙伴服务。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Silver Champion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 银冠勇士

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Claw of the False Wyrm
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 虚龙之爪

LocalizedStrings.enGB: SilverChampion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 银冠勇士

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 5th Level Apsu grants their champion with a silver drake companion. The Silver Champion treats their paladin level as their effective druid level for this companion.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在 5 级时，阿普苏会授予他的冠军一个银色龙兽伙伴。银冠勇士将他们的圣武士等级视为该伙伴的有效德鲁伊等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Silver Drake Companion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 银龙兽伙伴

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Immaculate Joy, Walker of Worlds   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Journeys, Joy, Messengers   
Domains: Chaos, Good, Luck, Travel   
Subdomains: Azata, Exploration, Fate, Friendship   
Favoured Weapon: Shortbow   
Holy Symbol: Emerald trumpet and road   
Sacred Animal: Horse   
Sinashakti embodies perfect joy. He is an inveterate wanderer and delights in meeting long-lost friends along the road. Sinashakti carries missives of great import between empyreal lords; legend tells that Sinashakti once descended to Abaddon to bring a declaration of war to the divs, though he denies such audacious claims. Sinashakti is typically depicted as a handsome man with deep blue skin and a constant smile. He often wears his long black hair in a braided knot and his dark eyes gleam with felicity. Sinashakti favors silk trousers and colorful tunics, and it is known among his followers that he adores jewelry-bangles bedeck his arms and jeweled ropes hang from his shoulders. In battle, Sinashakti produces a shortbow studded with yellow sapphires from which he fires emerald-headed arrows. Those separated from their loved ones pray to Immaculate Joy for a reunion, as do travelers in need of safety. Good-hearted messengers who work diligently may find Sinashakti's agents come to their aid during dire straits. Sinashakti and his followers teach that true happiness can only come from a life lived well, an open and honest heart, and devotion to goodness. Sinashakti lives in a rosewood palace near the River of Chromatic Tranquility in Elysium, though he is rarely found at home.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：无暇喜乐
阵营：混乱善良
神职：旅程、喜悦、信使 
领域：混乱、善良、幸运、旅行
子领域：爱塔、探索、天命、友谊
偏好武器：短弓 
圣徽：翡翠喇叭和道路
圣兽：马
湿纳沙克帝代表了完美的喜悦。他是个顽固的流浪者，喜欢在路上与久违的朋友重逢。 湿纳沙克帝在至高天领主之间传递着重要的信函；传说中，湿纳沙克帝曾经到末日荒原向妖灵们宣战，尽管他否认了这种大胆的说法。
湿纳沙克帝通常被描绘成一个英俊的男人，有着深蓝色的皮肤，脸上始终挂着微笑。他经常把长长的黑发打理成一个辫子，黑眼睛闪烁着幸福的光芒。湿纳沙克帝喜欢丝绸裤子和色彩鲜艳的束腰外衣，他的追随者都知道他喜欢珠宝——手镯装饰在他的手臂上，宝石绳索挂在他的肩膀上。在战斗中，湿纳沙克帝制作了一把镶有黄宝石的短弓，他用它发射翡翠色的弓箭。
那些与亲人分离的人祈求无暇喜乐能让他们团聚，需要安全的旅行者亦是如此。勤奋工作的好人可能会发现湿纳沙克帝的仆从在危急时刻伸出援手。湿纳沙克帝和他的追随者教导说，真正的幸福只能来自于充满善意的生活、敞亮而诚实的心以及对善良的奉献。 
湿纳沙克帝住在极乐境的奔放之野缤纷宁静河边一座檀木宫殿，但基本不在家。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sinashakti
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 湿纳沙克帝

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day, a dreadknight can reach out to the profane lords to grant sinful absolution to the forces arrayed against them. As a swift action, the dreadknight chooses one enemy within sight to crush. The dreadknight adds their Charisma bonus (if any) on their attack rolls and adds their dreadknight level on all damage rolls made against the target of their unholy smite. Regardless of the target, sinful absolution attacks automatically bypass any DR the creature might possess. In addition, while Sinful Absolution is in effect, the dreadknight gains a deflection bonus equal to their Charisma modifier(if any) to their AC against attacks made by the target of sinful absolution. The sinful absolution effect remains until the target of sinful absolution is dead or the next time the dreadknight rests and regains their uses of this ability. At 4th level, and at every three levels thereafter, the dreadknight may grant sinful absoltion one additional time per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，恐惧骑士向亵渎领主索取原罪之力并以此摧毁胆敢反抗她们的势力。
以一个迅捷动作，恐惧骑士选择以原罪之力侵蚀一个视野内的目标。
恐惧骑士在他们的攻击检定上加上他们的魅力加值（如果有的话），并在对他们侵蚀目标的所有伤害检定上加上他们的恐惧骑士等级。
无论是何种目标，原罪斩都会自动穿透该生物可能拥有的任何 DR。
此外，当原罪斩生效时，恐惧骑士在对抗侵蚀目标的攻击时获得等于其魅力调整值（如果有的话）的偏斜加值。
原罪斩效果一直持续到侵蚀目标死亡或恐惧骑士下一次休息并恢复该能力使用次数时。在第 4 级以及之后的每 3 级，恐惧骑士每天可以额外使用一次原罪斩。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Until the target of Sinful Absolution is dead
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 直到侵蚀目标死亡

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day, a dreadknight can reach out to the profane lords to grant sinful absolution to the forces arrayed against them. As a swift action, the dreadknight chooses one target within sight to crush. The Dread Knight adds their Charisma bonus (if any) on their attack rolls and adds their dreadknight level on all damage rolls made against the target of their unholy smite. Regardless of the target, sinful absolution attacks automatically bypass any DR the creature might possess. In addition, while Sinful Absolution is in effect, the dreadknight gains a deflection bonus equal to their Charisma modifier(if any) to their AC against attacks made by the target of sinful absolution. The sinful absolution effect remains until the target of sinful absolution is dead or the next time the Dread Knight rests and regains their uses of this ability. At 4th level, and at every three levels thereafter, the dreadknight may grant sinful absoltion one additional time per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，恐惧骑士向亵渎领主索取原罪之力并以此摧毁胆敢反抗她们的势力。
以一个迅捷动作，恐惧骑士选择以原罪之力侵蚀一个视野内的目标。
恐惧骑士在他们的攻击检定上加上他们的魅力加值（如果有的话），并在对他们侵蚀目标的所有伤害检定上加上他们的恐惧骑士等级。
无论是何种目标，原罪斩都会自动穿透该生物可能拥有的任何 DR。
此外，当原罪斩生效时，恐惧骑士在对抗侵蚀目标的攻击时获得等于其魅力调整值（如果有的话）的偏斜加值。
原罪斩效果一直持续到侵蚀目标死亡或恐惧骑士下一次休息并恢复该能力使用次数时。在第 4 级以及之后的每 3 级，恐惧骑士每天可以额外使用一次原罪斩。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sinful Absolution
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 原罪斩

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Seventh Veil, Goddess of Illusions   
Alignment: Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Illusions, Reflections, Mysteries, Veils   
Edict: Show the beauty in illusions, pursue the nature of truth, respect the need for secrets   
Domains: Knowledge, Madness, Magic, Rune, Trickery  
Subdomains: Deception, Insanity, Memory, Protean, Thought, Wards   
Favoured Weapon: Bladed scarf (glaive)  
Holy Symbol: Veils tied in circle
   
Sacred Animal: Coyote   
Sivanah is a mysterious goddess of illusion magic. Legends tell of her mystical veils, each of the first six being the face of a different race-first human, then elf, halfling, gnome, aranea, and naga-but the seventh is never removed, masking her true form. Sivanah works her deeds through reflections in mirrors and the surface of water, and is said to speak to some of her followers through their own shadows. Her ultimate goals are secrets even to her most faithful, a level of secrecy that prevents her devout from growing much more beyond the level of a cult. Illusionists, tricksters, and those who work to preserve secrets and mystery often worship Sivanah, as do many gnomes, in keeping with their love of illusion magic and strange experiences. Priests of Sivanah tend to dress in veils and multiple layers of thin clothing that obscure their features and often go out of their way to give outsiders false impressions of their race, gender, and more general features. The church is tight-lipped about its practices, leading outsiders to suspect they have nefarious motives, but such concerns are somewhat mitigated by their festive and welcoming public holidays. Magic mirrors, veils, and magical cloths are popular tools among the priesthood. Rumors abound that some of the most powerful priests in the church are actually monstrous creatures, matching the goddess's affinity for such beings.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：第七层面纱，幻象女神 
阵营：中立 
关注领域：幻象、反射、神秘、面纱 
裁决：展现幻象之美，追求真理的本质，尊重对秘密的需求 
领域：知识、疯狂、魔法、符文、诡计 
次领域：魔法、符文、诡计 <br知识、疯狂、魔法、符文、诡计 
次领域：欺骗、精神错乱、记忆、保护神、思想、警戒 
最喜爱的武器：带刃围巾（青光剑） 
神圣象征：绑成圆圈的面纱 
 
神圣的动物：土狼 
希瓦娜是一位神秘的幻术女神。传说中她戴着神秘的面纱，前六个面纱分别是不同种族的面孔--首先是人类，然后是精灵、半精灵、侏儒、阿兰尼亚和娜迦--但第七个面纱永远不会摘下，掩盖了她的真面目。西瓦娜通过镜子和水面的倒影施展魔法，据说她还能通过一些追随者的影子与他们对话。即使对她最忠实的信徒来说，她的终极目标也是秘密，这种保密程度使她的信徒无法超越邪教的水平。幻术师、魔术师和那些致力于保守秘密和神秘的人经常崇拜西瓦娜，许多侏儒也是如此，因为他们喜欢幻术和奇异的经历。西瓦娜的祭司们往往戴着面纱，穿着多层薄薄的衣服，遮住了他们的特征，并经常不遗余力地让外人对他们的种族、性别和更多特征产生错误的印象。教会对自己的做法讳莫如深，导致外人怀疑他们动机不纯，但他们喜庆而热情的公共节日在一定程度上减轻了外人的疑虑。魔镜、面纱和魔法布是神职人员常用的工具。坊间盛传，教会中一些最有权势的牧师实际上是畸形生物，这与女神对此类生物的亲和力不谋而合。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Skulking hunters use their magic to lie in wait for their prey, ambushing them with a decisive, fatal strike.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 潜伏猎手使用魔法埋伏猎物，并果断发动致命一击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Skulking Hunter
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 潜伏猎手

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, the skulking hunter gains the slayer’s studied target class feature. She uses her hunter level as her effective slayer level to determine the effects of studied target, stacking with other sources of studied target. The skulking hunter shares the bonuses granted by her studied target ability with her animal companion, however these bonuses do not stack with other sources of studied target.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1 级时，潜伏猎手会获得屠夫的 "研究目标 "类特性。她使用自己的猎人等级作为有效的屠夫等级来决定 "研究目标 "的效果，并与其他来源的 "研究目标 "效果叠加。潜行猎手与她的动物伙伴共享研究目标能力所带来的加成，但这些加成不会与其他研究目标来源叠加。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Studied Target
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 研究目标

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The skulking hunter shares the bonuses granted by her studied target ability with her animal companion, however these bonuses do not stack with other sources of studied target.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 潜伏猎手与动物伙伴共享 "研究目标 "能力带来的加成，但这些加成不会与其他 "研究目标 "能力叠加。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Skulking Pet
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 潜行宠物

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A skulking hunter casts divine spells drawn from the druid, ranger, and sorcerer/wizard spell list. Only druid and sorcerer/wizard spells of 6th level and lower and ranger spells that belong to the enchantment, illusion, and transmutation schools are considered to be part of the skulking hunter’s spell list. If a spell appears on any combination of these spell lists, the skulking hunter uses the lower of the two spell levels listed for the spell. This ability modifies the standard spells and orisons abilities and replaces nature training.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 潜伏猎手施放的神术来自德鲁伊、游侠和巫师/魔法师的法术列表。只有六级及以下的德鲁伊和巫师/魔法师法术，以及游侠法术中属于附魔、幻术和转化流派的法术才被视为潜伏猎手法术列表的一部分。如果一个法术出现在这些法术列表的任何组合中，潜伏猎手会使用两个法术等级中较低的一个。此能力会修改标准法术和口令能力，并取代自然训练。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Skulking Spells
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 潜行法术

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Reach
You create low-cresting waves of water under the feet of the target, able to propel them while moving. The target’s speed increases by 10 feet.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你在目标脚下制造出低潮的水波，能够在移动时推动它们。目标的速度增加 10 英尺。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: 10 minutes/level
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 10 分钟/级

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action, you can create a 5-foot-radius cloud of smoke lasting 1 minute. Creatures inside the cloud take a –2 penalty on attack rolls and Perception skill checks for as long as they remain inside and for 1 round after exiting the cloud. Creatures inside the cloud gain concealment from attacks made by opponents that are not adjacent to them. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

As a standard action, you can create a 5-foot-radius cloud of smoke lasting 1 minute. Creatures inside the cloud take a –2 penalty on attack rolls and Perception skill checks for as long as they remain inside and for 1 round after exiting the cloud. Creatures inside the cloud gain concealment from attacks made by opponents that are not adjacent to them. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

You can blind and choke with smoke, those who dare not to burn.

Creatures inside the cloud gain concealment from attacks made by opponents that are not adjacent to them. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. 
Fire Resistance: At 6th level, you gain resist fire 10. This resistance increases to 20 at 12th level. At 20th level, you gain immunity to fire.

Titles: The Raging Torrent   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Crocodiles, Fertility, Military prowess, Rivers   
Domains: Chaos, Scalykind, Strength, War, Water   
Subdomains: Blood, Ferocity, Protean, Resolve, Rivers, Saurian   
Favoured Weapon: Falchion   
Holy Symbol: Green Crocodile   
Sacred Animal: Crocodile   
The crocodile god Sobek is a god of rivers, marshes, and fertility of both creatures and vegetation. Violent, aggressive, and prone to primal urges, Sobek is also a god of battle, venerated for his ferocity, strength, and military prowess. Sobek appears as a muscular man with the head of a mighty crocodile, wearing a headdress with tall plumes, curling horns, and a solar disk. He is the son of Neith and Set, and while he occasionally supports his father, Sobek more often stands alone. Sobek sometimes accompanies Ra on his solar barge, joining the sun god in his nightly battles against Apep. Kings venerate Sobek as a symbol of pharaonic potency and might. He is a patron of soldiers and armies, and he is worshiped by barbarians, druids, fighters, rangers, and warriors as well. Farmers often give offerings to Sobek so that he will enrich their fields and protect their livelihood. Sobek's temples are almost always situated on riverbanks, and are rarely found more than a few miles from a river. The crocodiles living in the neighboring rivers are exalted by the priesthood and the faithful as the direct offspring of the god, or are even seen as living incarnations of Sobek himself Most of his temples contain pools holding crocodiles sacred to Sobek, and their regular feeding is incorporated into worship. These honored reptiles are mummified and interred upon their deaths with all the respect and esteem that marks human funerals.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：怒滔激流
阵营：混乱中立 
神职：鳄鱼、多产、军威、江河
领域：混乱、鳞类、力量、战争、流水
子领域：鲜血、凶猛、星灵、决意、江河、蜥类
偏好武器：弯刃大刀
圣徽：绿鳄
圣兽：鳄鱼
鳄神索贝克是江河、沼泽以及动植物的富饶之神。粗勇蛮横，举止野性的索贝克也是战斗之神，因其威猛、力量与军力受人崇拜。
索贝克以生著凶猛鳄鱼头的健壮男子的姿态示人，头上戴着附有高耸羽饰、一对曲角及一面日轮的大冠。祂没有娶妻，但倾慕战斗祭司赛赫美特，不遗余力地展示自身力量及武勇试图博取好感。索贝克偶尔会一同搭乘太阳船，与拉协力和阿佩普夜战。
君主将索贝克视为力量及性能力之神敬拜。祂是士兵与军队的守护神，也受野蛮人、德鲁伊、战士、游侠及其他武人供奉。农夫常向鳄神献上供品以求地力富饶农作平安。索贝克的神殿几乎全都坐落在河畔，很少会离水边超过几哩。栖息在神殿附近的鳄鱼被祭司及信众视为鳄神的子嗣，甚至是索贝克的化身。神殿里也通常有眷养圣兽鳄鱼的水池，喂养这些鳄鱼是宗教仪式的一部分。这些圣兽在死后享有与人类同等待遇的木乃伊化流程。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：狂暴的洪流 
阵营：混乱中立 
关注领域：鳄鱼, 肥沃, 军事才能, 河流 
领域：混乱、鳞类、力量、战争、水 
次领域：血腥、凶猛、保护神、决心、河流、索瑞亚人 
最喜爱的武器：法尔克翁 
神圣的象征：绿色鳄鱼 
神圣动物：鳄鱼 
鳄鱼神索贝克是河流、沼泽以及生物和植被丰饶之神。索贝克暴力、好斗、容易产生原始冲动，他也是战斗之神，因其凶猛、力量和军事才能而备受尊崇。索贝克的形象是一个肌肉发达的男子，头像是一只威猛的鳄鱼，头戴高高的羽饰、卷曲的角和太阳圆盘。他是尼特和赛特之子，虽然偶尔会支持父亲，但索贝克更多时候是独自一人。索贝克有时会与拉神一起乘坐太阳船，与太阳神一起夜战阿佩普。国王们崇敬索贝克，将其视为法老效力和力量的象征。他是士兵和军队的守护神，也受到野蛮人、德鲁伊、战士、游侠和勇士的崇拜。农民们经常向索贝克供奉祭品，希望他能让田地肥沃，保护他们的生计。索贝克的神庙几乎总是坐落在河岸上，离河流几英里远的地方就很少见了。生活在附近河流中的鳄鱼被神职人员和信徒们尊崇为神的直系后代，甚至被视为索贝克本人的活化石。索贝克神的大多数神庙都有一个水池，里面养着索贝克神的鳄鱼，定期喂养鳄鱼也被纳入祭祀活动中。这些尊贵的爬行动物死后会被制成木乃伊，并以人类葬礼的尊重和敬意安葬。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sobek
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 索贝克

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Every war needs soldiers. Most people don’t know it, but a war rages every day between the forces of the natural world and those that would defile and destroy it. Whether these enemies be the obscene monstrosities of other planes or the foulness known as “civilization”, Golarion calls upon a few mortal emissaries to serve as her warriors in this fight.
Soldier of Gaia

At least one of a soldier’s blessings must be drawn from the following list: Air, Animal, Earth, Fire, Plant, Water, or Weather. 
The soldier cannot worship a deity that does not offer at least one of those blessings.
Soldier's Blessing

A soldier of gaia can call upon their connection with nature to receive aid from the natural world. 
Every enemy within the area of the spell is the target of a combat maneuver check made to grapple each round at the beginning of your turn, as well as when entering the area. The CMB of this grapple attempt is equal to your warpriest level plus 5, increasing to plus 10 when trying to escape the grapple. If a creature is grappled by this ability, or fails to escape the grapple, it takes 1d6+4 points of damage.

A soldier of gaia can call upon their connection with nature to receive aid from the natural world. 
Every enemy within the area of the spell is the target of a combat maneuver check made to grapple each round at the beginning of your turn, as well as when entering the area. The CMB of this grapple attempt is equal to your warpriest level plus 5, increasing to plus 10 when trying to escape the grapple.

Every enemy within the area of the spell is the target of a combat maneuver check made to grapple each round at the beginning of your turn, as well as when entering the area. The CMB of this grapple attempt is equal to your warpriest level plus 5, increasing to plus 10 when trying to escape the grapple. If a creature is grappled by this ability, or fails to escape the grapple, it takes 1d6+4 points of damage.

A soldier of gaia can call upon their connection with nature to receive aid from the natural world. 
Every enemy within the area of the spell is the target of a combat maneuver check made to grapple each round at the beginning of your turn, as well as when entering the area. The CMB of this grapple attempt is equal to your warpriest level plus 5, increasing to plus 10 when trying to escape the grapple.
Friend of the Forest

At 7th level, once per day, a soldier of gaia can call upon their connection with nature to receive aid from the natural world. 
Every enemy within the area of the spell is the target of a combat maneuver check made to grapple each round at the beginning of your turn, as well as when entering the area. The CMB of this grapple attempt is equal to your warpriest level plus 5, increasing to plus 10 when trying to escape the grapple. If a creature is grappled by this ability, or fails to escape the grapple, it takes 1d6+4 points of damage. 
A soldier of gaia can use this ability twice per day at 13th level and three times per day at 19th level.

At 7th level, once per day, a soldier of gaia can call upon their connection with nature to receive aid from the natural world. 
Every enemy within the area of the spell is the target of a combat maneuver check made to grapple each round at the beginning of your turn, as well as when entering the area. The CMB of this grapple attempt is equal to your warpriest level plus 5, increasing to plus 10 when trying to escape the grapple. 
A soldier of gaia can use this ability twice per day at 13th level and three times per day at 19th level.
The soldier of gaia casts divine spells drawn from the druid spell list rather than the cleric spell list. Druid spells of 7th level and above are not on the soldier of gaia’s class spell list
Druidic Casting
A soldier of gaia can expend any prepared spell of 1st level or higher to cast a summon nature’s ally spell of that level.
Spontaneous Casting

Titles: The Mystic Angel   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Guardians, Magic, Monuments   
Domains: Artifice, Earth, Good, Protection   
Subdomains: Caves, Construct, Defense, Purity   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy pick   
Holy Symbol: Rune-covered spire   
Sacred Animal: Guard dog   
Soralyon's handsome form is formed from living marble. Mortal art depicts Soralyon in numerous different shades, from white to rose red, blue, or green, but his true form is of the purest black marble, which always glimmers softly as iflit from within. Those who guard ancient sites, particularly as selfappointed guardians, pray to Soralyon for the strength and perseverance to carry out their grave tasks, and Soralyon and his agents are constantly on guard against those who would defile sacred monuments. While the Mystic Angel sometimes favors researchers who show prudence and strong moral fiber, his agents quickly intercede when a mortal seeks to uncover, however unwittingly, a dangerous monument or evil bit of ancient lore-a trait that sometimes puts Soralyon at odds with preservationists such as Bharnarol or the caretakers of the Great Library of Harmonious Scripture.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：神秘天使
阵营：中立善良
神职：守护者、魔法、纪念碑
领域：工匠、大地、善良、保护
子领域：洞窟、构装体、防御、纯净
偏好武器：重十字镐
圣徽：石头螺旋，上面满是天文符号
圣兽：看门犬
神秘天使司掌守卫，纪念碑与魔法。索拉莱昂相信纪念碑与遗迹是现世与过去时空的重要链接。守护他们不被玷污或破坏，以避免生者失去对于自我，来路和曾经成就的记忆，是至关重要的大事。正因如此，那些守卫着纪念碑与遗迹的人都为索拉莱昂所保佑。同样，那些研究过去与现在的纪念碑文之人，或是为了未来而保护它们的人也是有福的。索拉莱昂也十分重视那些保护他人者，和那些学习并保护历史遗留的符文之人。因为魔法是对于保护，学习，保存遗迹与身边之人的宝贵工具，索拉莱昂也鼓励信徒研究魔法，尤其是用于保护或是求知的法术。
当神秘天使出现在凡人面前时，他的形象通常是一个俊美的大理石雕塑，光滑美丽，雕工卓越。他散发出的光晕中涵盖着一切大理石所蕴藏的光谱，但倾向于展现当地最为常见的颜色。索拉莱昂的追随者包括考古学家，历史学家，护卫，守卫，雕塑家，博物馆长和奥术施法者。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Soralyon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 索拉莱昂

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The spear is one of the oldest weapons known to most humanoid races, and no weapon has seen as much use. Many martial arts traditions consider the spear to be the ultimate weapon.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 矛是大多数类人种族已知的最古老的武器之一，也是使用频率最高的武器。许多武术传统都将矛视为终极武器。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spear Fighter
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 长矛战士

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A spear fighter is proficient with all simple and martial weapons, with light and medium armor, and with shields (excluding tower shields). 
He gains dodge as a bonus feat, even if he doesn’t fulfill the prerequisites.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
长矛战士精通所有简单和武术武器、轻型和中型盔甲以及盾牌（塔盾除外）。
即使不满足先决条件，他也能获得闪避作为额外专长。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spear Fighter Proficiencies
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 长矛战士能力

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
When attacked in melee, the spear fighter makes an attack roll as if he were making an attack of opportunity; for each size category the attacking creature is larger than the spear fighter, he takes a –2 penalty on this roll. If his result is greater than the attacking creature’s result, the creature’s attack automatically misses. Upon performing a successful parry, he makes an attack of opportunity against the creature whose attack he parried, provided that creature is within his reach and the spear fighter has remaining attacks of opportunity.
When an incoming attack is successfully parried gain a cumulative –4 penalty on all attacks (including further parry attempts) for a full round. At 7th, 11th, and 15th levels, the penalty decreases by 1. At 19th level, a spear fighter can use spear parry without penalty.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
在近战中受到攻击时，长矛战士会进行一次攻击投掷，就像进行一次借机攻击一样；攻击生物的体型每大于长矛战士一个等级，长矛战士就会在这次投掷中受到 -2 的惩罚。如果他的结果大于攻击生物的结果，则该生物的攻击自动失败。成功抵挡后，他将对被他抵挡攻击的生物发动一次借机攻击，前提是该生物在他的攻击范围内，而且长矛战士还有剩余的借机攻击。
当成功抵挡一次袭来的攻击后，所有攻击（包括进一步的抵挡尝试）都将在一整轮内获得累计-4的惩罚。7、11和15级时，惩罚减少1。19级时，长矛战士可以使用长矛招架而不受惩罚。

When attacked in melee, the spear fighter makes an attack roll as if he were making an attack of opportunity; for each size category the attacking creature is larger than the spear fighter, he takes a –2 penalty on this roll. If his result is greater than the attacking creature’s result, the creature’s attack automatically misses. Upon performing a successful parry, he makes an attack of opportunity against the creature whose attack he parried, provided that creature is within his reach and the spear fighter has remaining attacks of opportunity.
When an incoming attack is successfully parried gain a cumulative –4 penalty on all attacks (including further parry attempts) for a full round. At 7th, 11th, and 15th levels, the penalty decreases by 1. At 19th level, a spear fighter can use spear parry without penalty.

三阶时，长矛战士学会用长矛抵挡对手的攻击。当受到近战攻击时，长矛战士会进行一次攻击掷卷，就像进行一次借机攻击一样；攻击生物的体型每大于长矛战士一个等级，他的掷卷就会受到-2的惩罚。如果他的结果大于攻击生物的结果，则该生物的攻击自动失败。成功抵挡后，他将对被他抵挡攻击的生物发动一次借机攻击，前提是该生物在他的攻击范围内，而且长矛战士还有剩余的借机攻击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A storm druid can channel stored spell energy into domain spells that she hasn't prepared ahead of time. She can "lose" a prepared spell in order to cast any domain spell of the same level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 风暴德鲁依可以将事先准备好的法术临时转换成领域法术，即使他事前并未准备该召唤法术也可。此时，德鲁伊会“失去”一个准备好的法术，换得一个同级或较低环级的领域法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Colourless Lord, Warden of Galisemni   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Form: Protean Lord  
Areas of Concern: Fate, Freedom, Paradox   
Domains: Chaos, Knowledge, Liberation, Trickery   
Favoured Weapon: Light hammer   
Holy Symbol: Triquetra over a keketar head   
The most prominent protean lord, Ssila'meshnik manifests as a leucistic keketar ranging in size, or as a ganzi of varying gender with a triune halo of interwoven keketar crowns. Shadowed by afterimages, their form periodically breaks into a flurry of superimposed possibilities as they manipulate reality moment by moment, choosing the most opportune course of future actions—the only true constant in a creature of inconsistency. Ssila'meshnik occasionally frequents Pharasma’s court to argue in favor of or against the fate of particular souls. The chosen souls seem arbitrary at times, and this mind-set seems to be the focus of most of the Colorless Lord's followers. These worshippers tend to live as contradictions, choosing a path to follow in life while simultaneously taking actions that work against their chosen path. In addition, these worshippers spontaneously change their life paths at a whim, insistence upon the freedom to seek new fates being the only consistent thread in their lives. Ssila'meshnik has no known divine domain, but ancient texts record them as “Warden of Galisemni.” The city of Galisemni rests within the Maelstrom, containing a set of seven towering statues of keketars known as the Watching Seven.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：无色领主、加利塞姆尼守望者
阵营：混乱中立形态：多变领主
领域：命运、自由、悖论
领域：混乱、知识、解放、诡计
偏好武器：轻锤
圣徽：keketar 头上的三角铁杰出的多变领主，Ssila'meshnik 表现为一个大小不等的 leucistic keketar，或者是一个不同性别的 ganzi，带有交织的 keketar 王冠的三位一体光环。在残像的阴影下，他们的形式周期性地闯入一连串叠加的可能性，因为他们时刻操纵现实，选择未来行动的最合适的路线——这是一个不一致的生物中唯一真正的常数。 Ssila'meshnik 偶尔会经常出入法拉斯玛的法庭，为特定灵魂的命运辩护或反对。所选择的灵魂有时似乎是武断的，而这种心态似乎是大多数无色之主追随者的焦点。这些崇拜者倾向于生活在矛盾中，选择一条人生道路，同时采取与他们选择的道路相悖的行动。此外，这些崇拜者自发地随心所欲地改变自己的人生道路，坚持追求新命运的自由是他们生活中唯一始终如一的主线。 Ssila'meshnik 没有已知的神域，但古代文献记载他们为“加利塞姆尼的守护者”。 Galisemni 市位于大漩涡内，包含一组七尊高耸的 keketar 雕像，被称为守望七人。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ssila'meshnik
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 斯拉 麼神尼克

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, and at every level thereafter, a Stargazer gains new spells per day as if he had also gained a level in a spellcasting class he belonged to before adding the prestige class. He does not, however, gain any other benefit a character of that class would have gained, except for additional spells per day, spells known, and an increased effective level of spellcasting. If a character had more than one spellcasting class before becoming a Stargazer, he must decide to which class he adds the new level for purposes of determining spells per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者在一阶时，以及之后的每一阶，每天都会获得新的法术，就好像他在加入进阶等级之前，在所属的法术等级中也获得了一个等级一样。但是，除了每天获得额外的法术、已知法术以及有效法术等级的提高之外，他不会获得该等级角色本应获得的任何其他好处。如果一个角色在成为观星者之前拥有一个以上的施法等级，他必须决定将新等级加入哪个等级以确定每天的法术数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Angelfire Apostle
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天使之火使徒

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, and at every level thereafter, a Stargazer gains new spells per day as if he had also gained a level in a spellcasting class he belonged to before adding the prestige class. He does not, however, gain any other benefit a character of that class would have gained, except for additional spells per day, spells known, and an increased effective level of spellcasting. If a character had more than one spellcasting class before becoming a Stargazer, he must decide to which class he adds the new level for purposes of determining spells per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者在一阶时，以及之后的每一阶，每天都会获得新的法术，就好像他在加入进阶等级之前，在所属的法术等级中也获得了一个等级一样。但是，除了每天获得额外的法术、已知法术以及有效法术等级的提高之外，他不会获得该等级角色本应获得的任何其他好处。如果一个角色在成为观星者之前拥有一个以上的施法等级，他必须决定将新等级加入哪个等级以确定每天的法术数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, and at every level thereafter, a Stargazer gains new spells per day as if he had also gained a level in a spellcasting class he belonged to before adding the prestige class. He does not, however, gain any other benefit a character of that class would have gained, except for additional spells per day, spells known, and an increased effective level of spellcasting. If a character had more than one spellcasting class before becoming a Stargazer, he must decide to which class he adds the new level for purposes of determining spells per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者在一阶时，以及之后的每一阶，每天都会获得新的法术，就好像他在加入进阶等级之前，在所属的法术等级中也获得了一个等级一样。但是，除了每天获得额外的法术、已知法术以及有效法术等级的提高之外，他不会获得该等级角色本应获得的任何其他好处。如果一个角色在成为观星者之前拥有一个以上的施法等级，他必须决定将新等级加入哪个等级以确定每天的法术数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, and at every level thereafter, a Stargazer gains new spells per day as if he had also gained a level in a spellcasting class he belonged to before adding the prestige class. He does not, however, gain any other benefit a character of that class would have gained, except for additional spells per day, spells known, and an increased effective level of spellcasting. If a character had more than one spellcasting class before becoming a Stargazer, he must decide to which class he adds the new level for purposes of determining spells per day.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Magus
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 魔术师

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You conjure a coat of starry radiance that grants you a +4 armor bonus along with DR 5/slashing. At 7th  and 9th level, the armor bonus increases by +2. You can use this coat for 1 hour number of times per day equal to stargazer level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你能变出一件星光熠熠的外衣，它能为你带来 +4 的护甲加成，以及 DR 5/砍伤。七级和九级时，护甲加成增加 +2。您每天可以使用这件外衣 1 小时，次数等于星际狩猎者等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You conjure a coat of starry radiance that grants you a +4 armor bonus along with DR 5/slashing. At 7th  and 9th level, the armor bonus increases by +2. You can use this coat for 1 hour number of times per day equal to stargazer level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你能变出一件星光熠熠的外衣，它能为你带来 +4 的护甲加成，以及 DR 5/砍伤。七级和九级时，护甲加成增加 +2。您每天可以使用这件外衣 1 小时，次数等于星际狩猎者等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mystery Magic - Coat of Many Stars
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神秘魔法 - 众星外衣

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You conjure a coat of starry radiance that grants you a +4 armor bonus along with DR 5/slashing. At 7th  and 9th level, the armor bonus increases by +2. You can use this coat for 1 hour number of times per day equal to stargazer level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你能变出一件星光熠熠的外衣，它能为你带来 +4 的护甲加成，以及 DR 5/砍伤。七级和九级时，护甲加成增加 +2。您每天可以使用这件外衣 1 小时，次数等于星际狩猎者等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st, 7th and 9th levels, the stargazer gains a hex from the witch’s list of hexes. His stargazer levels count as (and stack with) witch levels when determining the effects of hexes. In addition, the stargazer adds all hexes available to a shaman with the heavens spirit to the witch list.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在一阶、七阶和九阶时，观星者会从女巫的六芒星列表中获得一个六芒星。在决定六角的效果时，他的观星者等级算作巫师等级（并与巫师等级叠加）。此外，观星者还会将拥有天灵的巫师可以使用的所有六芒星添加到巫师列表中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mystery Magic - Hex
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神秘魔法 - 六角

LocalizedStrings.enGB: If the stargazer already has the stars subdomain he may select another domain granted by Pulura. His stargazer levels count as (and stack with) cleric levels when determining which domain abilities he gains and their effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 如果观星者已经拥有星辰子领域，他可以选择普鲁拉授予的另一个领域。在决定他获得哪些领域能力及其效果时，他的观星者等级会被算作（并与）牧师等级叠加。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Pulura's Domains
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 普鲁拉的领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 3rd level, the stargazer gains the stars subdomain in addition to any domains he already has, if he already has the stars subdomain he may select another domain granted by Pulura. His stargazer levels count as (and stack with) cleric levels when determining which domain abilities he gains and their effects. He can use the stars are right ability regardless of his spellcasting class.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 三阶时，观星者除了已经拥有的领域外，还能获得星辰子领域，如果他已经拥有星辰子领域，他可以选择普鲁拉授予的另一个领域。在决定他获得哪些领域能力及其效果时，他的观星者等级算作（并与）牧师等级叠加。无论他的施法等级如何，他都可以使用 "群星归位 "能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mystery Magic - Stars Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神秘魔法 - Stars 子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, and at every level thereafter, a Stargazer gains new spells per day as if he had also gained a level in a spellcasting class he belonged to before adding the prestige class. He does not, however, gain any other benefit a character of that class would have gained, except for additional spells per day, spells known, and an increased effective level of spellcasting. If a character had more than one spellcasting class before becoming a Stargazer, he must decide to which class he adds the new level for purposes of determining spells per day.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Oracle
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 甲骨文

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Paladin
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 圣骑士

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, and at every level thereafter, a Stargazer gains new spells per day as if he had also gained a level in a spellcasting class he belonged to before adding the prestige class. He does not, however, gain any other benefit a character of that class would have gained, except for additional spells per day, spells known, and an increased effective level of spellcasting. If a character had more than one spellcasting class before becoming a Stargazer, he must decide to which class he adds the new level for purposes of determining spells per day.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The empyreal lord Pulura, the Shimmering Maiden, is said to dance among the lights of the aurora. Some of her worshipers seek her guidance in the starry skies, attuning themselves to the constellations of the Cosmic Caravan. Beyond the stargazers’ interests in the heavens, though, they also train for the inevitable conflict with demons. Pulura’s bastion of worship in the Inner Sea region has traditionally been in the land of Sarkoris, which was consumed from within by the Worldwound at the advent of the Age of Lost Omens. Many of Pulura’s worshipers perished during that disastrous invasion from the Abyss, but those who survived remained behind and, over the past several decades, have grown in power.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 据说，虚幻之主普鲁拉（Pulura），即闪烁的少女，会在极光中翩翩起舞。她的一些崇拜者在星空中寻求她的指引，与篷车星座群的星座保持一致。不过，除了对星空的兴趣之外，他们还为不可避免的与恶魔的冲突进行训练。普路拉在内海地区的崇拜堡垒传统上位于萨科瑞斯大陆，在失落预兆时代来临时，萨科瑞斯大陆被世界之痕从内部吞噬。许多普鲁拉的崇拜者在那次灾难性的深渊入侵中丧生，但那些幸存下来的人留了下来，并在过去的几十年中不断壮大自己的力量。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stargazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sage Socerer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 先贤 术士

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 萨满

He does not, however, gain any other benefit a character of that class would have gained, except for additional spells per day, spells known, and an increased effective level of spellcasting. LocalizedStrings.enGB: As he studies the skies, the stargazer binds himself to constellations from the Cosmic Caravan, drawing on their unearthly power. At 2nd level and every 2 class levels thereafter, the stargazer gains one sidereal arcana of his choice.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在研究天空时，观星者会将自己与篷车星座群中的星座绑定，汲取它们的超凡力量。在 2 级和之后的每 2 个等级中，观星者都会获得一种他所选择的星座奥秘。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sidereal Arcana
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星座奥秘

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Daughter emboldens hearts with the promise of springtime and new life. The stargazer and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. The stargazer is immune to fear effects created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 闺女座以春天和新生命的承诺鼓舞人心。观星者和 10 英尺范围内的盟友在对抗恐惧时会获得 +4 的士气加成。观星者对恶魔制造的恐惧效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The specter of death follows the stargazer, shielding him from doom. The stargazer gains a +4 bonus on saves against death effects. In addition, he is immune to all death effects, negative energy effects, and negative levels created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 死亡的幽灵追随着观星者，保护他免遭厄运。观星者在抵御死亡效果时会获得 +4 的豁免加成。此外，他还能免疫所有死亡效果、负能量效果以及恶魔制造的负值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s ability to conjure light increases. Any spell cast by the stargazer with the fire descriptor has its spell level increased by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者变光的能力增强。观星者施放的任何带有火属性的法术，其法术等级都会提高 2 级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer channels the nurturing heart of the Caravan. Whenever the stargazer casts a cure spell, casts breath of life, or uses the healing hex, he adds twice his class level to the hit points restored.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者引导大篷车的养育之心。每当观星者施放治愈法术、生命之息或使用治愈六芒星，他恢复的生命都会增加两倍于他的等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The sign of intertwined lovers grants the stargazer a romantic mystique. Whenever he uses a spell with the compulsion descriptor the save DC increases by 1. In addition, stargazer gains a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against compulsion effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恋人交织的标志赋予观星者浪漫的神秘感。每当他使用带有蛊惑描述符的法术时，豁免DC都会增加1。此外，观星者在对抗蛊惑效果的豁免时会获得+2士气加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer becomes attuned to the beasts that follow the Caravan. He gains a +2 bonus on Nature checks. In addition, whenever he casts a summoning spell that conjures multiple creatures of the animal type, he summons an additional animal of that type.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者会与跟随商队的野兽产生共鸣。他的自然检定会获得 +2 加值。此外，每当他施放召唤多个动物类型生物的召唤法术时，他就会多召唤一个该类型的动物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者获得与生俱来的方向感。他在知识（世界）和感知检查上获得 +4 加分。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 与他同名的星座会向观星者发出危险警告。观星者在进行先攻检查时会获得 +2 的洞察加值，并且在战斗中行动之前不会被认为脚步不稳，但这并不允许他在无法以其他方式行动的情况下采取行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer learns to blend seamlessly into others’ cultures. He can use vanish on himself as a swift action spell-like ability a number of times equal to half his stargazer level (min 1) per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者学会与他人的文化完美融合。他可以在自己身上使用 "渐隐术"，作为一种类似法术的迅捷行动能力，每天的次数相当于他的窥星者等级的一半（最少 1 级）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者的声音变得和谐。观星者在魅力技能检定中获得相当于其等级一半的加成（最少 1）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者的移动变得敏捷而稳定。他的移动速度会获得 +10 英尺的强化加成。此外，作为敏捷动作，他每天可以获得三次移动自由的效果，持续 1 个回合。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Daughter emboldens hearts with the promise of springtime and new life. The stargazer and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. The stargazer is immune to fear effects created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 闺女座以春天和新生命的承诺鼓舞人心。观星者和 10 英尺范围内的盟友在对抗恐惧时会获得 +4 的士气加成。观星者对恶魔制造的恐惧效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Daughter Aura Effect
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 闺女座光环效应

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Daughter emboldens hearts with the promise of springtime and new life. The stargazer and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. The stargazer is immune to fear effects created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 闺女座以春天和新生命的承诺鼓舞人心。观星者和 10 英尺范围内的盟友在对抗恐惧时会获得 +4 的士气加成。观星者对恶魔制造的恐惧效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Daughter emboldens hearts with the promise of springtime and new life. The stargazer and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. The stargazer is immune to fear effects created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 闺女座以春天和新生命的承诺鼓舞人心。观星者和 10 英尺范围内的盟友在对抗恐惧时会获得 +4 的士气加成。观星者对恶魔制造的恐惧效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Daughter emboldens hearts with the promise of springtime and new life. The stargazer and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. The stargazer is immune to fear effects created by demons.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The specter of death follows the stargazer, shielding him from doom. The stargazer gains a +4 bonus on saves against death effects. In addition, he is immune to all death effects, negative energy effects, and negative levels created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 死亡的幽灵追随着观星者，保护他免遭厄运。观星者在抵御死亡效果时会获得 +4 的豁免加成。此外，他还能免疫所有死亡效果、负能量效果以及恶魔制造的负值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The specter of death follows the stargazer, shielding him from doom. The stargazer gains a +4 bonus on saves against death effects. In addition, he is immune to all death effects, negative energy effects, and negative levels created by demons.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s ability to conjure light increases. Any spell cast by the stargazer with the fire descriptor has its spell level increased by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者变光的能力增强。观星者施放的任何带有火属性的法术，其法术等级都会提高 2 级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s ability to conjure light increases. Any spell cast by the stargazer with the fire descriptor has its spell level increased by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者变光的能力增强。观星者施放的任何带有火属性的法术，其法术等级都会提高 2 级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s ability to conjure light increases. Any spell cast by the stargazer with the fire descriptor has its spell level increased by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者变光的能力增强。观星者施放的任何带有火属性的法术，其法术等级都会提高 2 级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer channels the nurturing heart of the Caravan. Whenever the stargazer casts a cure spell, casts breath of life, or uses the healing hex, he adds twice his class level to the hit points restored.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者引导大篷车的养育之心。每当观星者施放治愈法术、生命之息或使用治愈六芒星，他恢复的生命都会增加两倍于他的等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer channels the nurturing heart of the Caravan. Whenever the stargazer casts a cure spell, casts breath of life, or uses the healing hex, he adds twice his class level to the hit points restored.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者引导大篷车的养育之心。每当观星者施放治愈法术、生命之息或使用治愈六芒星，他恢复的生命都会增加两倍于他的等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The sign of intertwined lovers grants the stargazer a romantic mystique. Whenever he uses a spell with the compulsion descriptor the save DC increases by 1. In addition, stargazer gains a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against compulsion effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恋人交织的标志赋予观星者浪漫的神秘感。每当他使用带有蛊惑描述符的法术时，豁免DC都会增加1。此外，观星者在对抗蛊惑效果的豁免时会获得+2士气加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The sign of intertwined lovers grants the stargazer a romantic mystique. Whenever he uses a spell with the compulsion descriptor the save DC increases by 1. In addition, stargazer gains a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against compulsion effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恋人交织的标志赋予观星者浪漫的神秘感。每当他使用带有蛊惑描述符的法术时，豁免DC都会增加1。此外，观星者在对抗蛊惑效果的豁免时会获得+2士气加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer becomes attuned to the beasts that follow the Caravan. He gains a +2 bonus on Nature checks. In addition, whenever he casts a summoning spell that conjures multiple creatures of the animal type, he summons an additional animal of that type.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者会与跟随商队的野兽产生共鸣。他的自然检定会获得 +2 加值。此外，每当他施放召唤多个动物类型生物的召唤法术时，他就会多召唤一个该类型的动物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer becomes attuned to the beasts that follow the Caravan. He gains a +2 bonus on Nature checks. In addition, whenever he casts a summoning spell that conjures multiple creatures of the animal type, he summons an additional animal of that type.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者会与跟随商队的野兽产生共鸣。他的自然检定会获得 +2 加值。此外，每当他施放召唤多个动物类型生物的召唤法术时，他就会多召唤一个该类型的动物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者获得与生俱来的方向感。他在知识（世界）和感知检查上获得 +4 加分。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者获得与生俱来的方向感。他在知识（世界）和感知检查上获得 +4 加分。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者获得与生俱来的方向感。他在知识（世界）和感知检查上获得 +4 加分。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer and his mount ride as one. While he is mounted both rider and mount gain +1 on all saves and an immunity to difficult terrain.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者和他的坐骑合二为一。在骑乘时，骑手和坐骑都会获得+1的豁免和对困难地形的免疫力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sidereal Arcana - The Rider
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星座奥秘 - 驭手座

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 与他同名的星座会向观星者发出危险警告。观星者在进行先攻检查时会获得 +2 的洞察加值，并且在战斗中行动之前不会被认为脚步不稳，但这并不允许他在无法以其他方式行动的情况下采取行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 与他同名的星座会向观星者发出危险警告。观星者在进行先攻检查时会获得 +2 的洞察加值，并且在战斗中行动之前不会被认为脚步不稳，但这并不允许他在无法以其他方式行动的情况下采取行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 与他同名的星座会向观星者发出危险警告。观星者在进行先攻检查时会获得 +2 的洞察加值，并且在战斗中行动之前不会被认为脚步不稳，但这并不允许他在无法以其他方式行动的情况下采取行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The stargazer learns to blend seamlessly into others’ cultures. He can use vanish on himself as a swift action spell-like ability a number of times equal to half his stargazer level (min 1) per day. 
If a check is required, an invisible creature has a +20 bonus on its Stealth checks. The spell ends if the subject attacks any creature.[LONGSTART] For purposes of this spell, an attack includes any spell targeting a foe or whose area or effect includes a foe. Exactly who is a foe depends on the invisible character's perceptions. Actions directed at unattended objects do not break the spell. Causing harm indirectly is not an attack. Thus, an invisible being can open doors, talk, eat, climb stairs, summon monsters and have them attack, cut the ropes holding a rope bridge while enemies are on the bridge, remotely trigger traps, open a portcullis to release attack dogs, and so forth. If the subject attacks directly, however, it immediately becomes visible along with all its gear. Spells such as bless that specifically affect allies but not foes are not attacks for this purpose, even when they include foes in their area.[LONGEND]
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
观星者学会与他人的文化完美融合。他可以在自己身上使用渐隐术，作为一种类似法术的快速行动能力，每天的次数等于他的观星者等级的一半（最少 1 次）。
如果需要检定，隐形生物的隐身检定会获得 +20 加值。如果被施法者攻击了任何生物，法术就会结束。[长篇开头] 就本法术而言，攻击包括任何以敌人为目标的法术，或者其作用范围或效果包括敌人的法术。究竟谁是敌人取决于隐形角色的感知。针对无人看管物体的行动不会破坏法术。间接造成伤害不属于攻击。因此，隐形人可以开门、说话、吃东西、爬楼梯、召唤怪物并让它们攻击、在敌人在桥上时切断固定索桥的绳索、远程触发陷阱、打开栅栏放出攻击犬等等。不过，如果目标直接攻击，它就会立即连同所有装备一起显形。专门影响盟友而非敌人的法术（例如祝福）不属于此目的的攻击，即使这些法术的攻击范围包括敌人。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: 1 round/level (up to 5 rounds)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每级 1 轮（最多 5 轮）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stargazer - Vanish
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者 - 渐隐术

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者的声音变得和谐。观星者在魅力技能检定中获得相当于其等级一半的加成（最少 1）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者的声音变得和谐。观星者在魅力技能检定中获得相当于其等级一半的加成（最少 1）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round. 
This spell enables you to move and attack normally for the duration of the spell, even under the influence of magic that usually impedes movement, such as paralysis, solid fog, slow, and web. All combat maneuver checks made to grapple the target automatically fail.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
观星者的移动变得敏捷而稳定。他的移动速度会获得 +10 英尺的强化加成。此外，作为快速行动，他每天可以获得三次行动自由的效果，持续一回合。
这个法术能让你在法术持续时间内正常移动和攻击，即使是在通常会阻碍移动的魔法影响下，如麻痹、浓雾、缓慢和蛛网。所有擒抱目标的战斗演习检定自动失败。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stargazer - Freedom of Movement
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者 - 行动自由

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者的移动变得敏捷而稳定。他的移动速度会获得 +10 英尺的强化加成。此外，作为敏捷动作，他每天可以获得三次移动自由的效果，持续 1 个回合。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者的移动变得敏捷而稳定。他的移动速度会获得 +10 英尺的强化加成。此外，作为敏捷动作，他每天可以获得三次移动自由的效果，持续 1 个回合。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者的移动变得敏捷而稳定。他的移动速度会获得 +10 英尺的强化加成。此外，作为敏捷动作，他每天可以获得三次移动自由的效果，持续 1 个回合。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, and at every level thereafter, a Stargazer gains new spells per day as if he had also gained a level in a spellcasting class he belonged to before adding the prestige class. He does not, however, gain any other benefit a character of that class would have gained, except for additional spells per day, spells known, and an increased effective level of spellcasting. If a character had more than one spellcasting class before becoming a Stargazer, he must decide to which class he adds the new level for purposes of determining spells per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者在一阶时，以及之后的每一阶，每天都会获得新的法术，就好像他在加入进阶等级之前，在所属的法术等级中也获得了一个等级一样。但是，除了每天获得额外的法术、已知法术以及有效法术等级的提高之外，他不会获得该等级角色本应获得的任何其他好处。如果一个角色在成为观星者之前拥有一个以上的施法等级，他必须决定将新等级加入哪个等级以确定每天的法术数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Skald
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 斯卡尔德

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stargazer spellcasting
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者施法

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer is warded against winter’s darkness. He gains cold resistance 5 and an immunity to blindness effects caused by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者可以抵御冬季的黑暗。他获得 5 级抗寒能力，并对恶魔造成的失明效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sidereal Arcana - The Bridge
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星座奥秘 - 天桥座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Bridge and gains The Daughter.
The Daughter: The Daughter emboldens hearts with the promise of springtime and new life. The stargazer and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. The stargazer is immune to fear effects created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "天桥座"，获得 "闺女座"：闺女座：以春天和新生的承诺鼓舞人心。观星者和10英尺内的盟友在对抗恐惧的豁免检定中获得+4士气加成。观星者对恶魔制造的恐惧效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Bridge to The Daughter
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 闺女座天桥座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Bridge and gains The Follower.
The Follower: The specter of death follows the stargazer, shielding him from doom. The stargazer gains a +4 bonus on saves against death effects. In addition, he is immune to all death effects, negative energy effects, and negative levels created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。
追行者座：死亡的幽灵追随观星者，保护他免遭厄运。观星者在抵御死亡效果时获得+4的豁免加成。此外，他还能免疫所有死亡效果、负能量效果以及恶魔制造的负值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Bridge to The Follower
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天桥座到追行者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Bridge and gains The Lantern Bearer.
The LanternBearer: The stargazer’s ability to conjure light increases. Any spell cast by the stargazer with the fire descriptor has its spell level increased by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "天桥座"，并获得 "持灯人座"：观星者召唤光的能力增强。观星者施放的任何带有火属性的法术，其法术等级都会提高2级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Bridge to The Lantern Bearer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天桥座到提灯人座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Bridge and gains The Mother.
The Mother: The stargazer channels the nurturing heart of the Caravan. Whenever the stargazer casts a cure spell, casts breath of life, or uses the healing hex, he adds twice his class level to the hit points restored.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "天桥座"，获得 "慈母座"：观星者引导商队的培育之心。每当观星者施放治愈法术、生命吐息或使用治愈六芒星，他恢复的生命就会增加两倍于他的等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Bridge to The Mother
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天桥座到慈母座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Bridge and gains The Newlyweds.
The Newlyweds: The sign of intertwined lovers grants the stargazer a romantic mystique. Whenever he uses a spell with the compulsion descriptor the save DC increases by 1. In addition, stargazer gains a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against compulsion effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "天桥座"，获得 "新婚座"：恋人交织的星座赋予观星者浪漫的神秘感。每当他使用带有蛊惑描述的法术时，豁免DC增加1。 此外，观星者在对抗蛊惑效果的豁免时获得+2士气加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Bridge to The Newlyweds
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天桥座到新婚座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Bridge and gains The Pack.
The Pack: The stargazer becomes attuned to the beasts that follow the Caravan. He gains a +2 bonus on Nature checks. In addition, whenever he casts a summoning spell that conjures multiple creatures of the animal type, he summons an additional animal of that type.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何一种星座奥秘替换他的一种星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "天桥座"，获得 "群"：观星者会与跟随商队的野兽相契合。他的自然检定会获得+2加成。此外，每当他施放召唤多个动物类型生物的召唤法术时，他将额外召唤一个该类型的动物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Bridge to The Pack
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天桥座到驮兽座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. 
All variants of this ability give up The Bridge. 
The stargazer is warded against winter’s darkness. He gains cold resistance 5 and an immunity to blindness effects caused by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。
该能力的所有变体都会放弃 "天桥座"。
观星者可以抵御冬季的黑暗。他获得5级抗寒能力，并免疫恶魔造成的失明效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stars’ Dance - The Bridge
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 群星之舞 - 天桥座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Bridge and gains The Patriarch.
The Patriarch: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "天桥座"，获得 "天父座"：观星者获得与生俱来的方向感。他在知识（世界）和感知检查上获得+4加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Bridge to The Patriarch
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天桥座到天父座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Bridge and gains The Rider.
The Rider: The stargazer and his mount ride as one. While he is mounted both rider and mount gain +1 on all saves and an immunity to difficult terrain.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "天桥座"，获得 "驭手座"：观星者和他的坐骑合二为一。当他骑乘时，骑手和坐骑都会获得+1的救命效果，并对困难地形免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Bridge to The Rider
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天桥座到驭手座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Bridge and gains The Stargazer.
The Stargazer: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "天桥座"，获得 "观星者"：与他同名的星座警告观星者危险。观星者在主动检定时获得+2洞察加值，并且在战斗中行动前不会被认为脚步虚浮，尽管这并不允许他在其他情况下行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Bridge to The Stargazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天桥座到观星者

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Bridge and gains The Stranger.
The Stranger: The stargazer learns to blend seamlessly into others’ cultures. He can use vanish on himself as a swift action spell-like ability a number of times equal to half his stargazer level (min 1) per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任意一种星座奥秘替换他的一种星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "天桥座"，获得 "陌路人座"：观星者学会无缝融入他人的文化。他可以在自己身上使用 "渐隐术 "作为类似法术的迅捷行动能力，每天的次数等于他观星者等级的一半（最少1级）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Bridge to The Stranger
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天桥座到陌路人座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Bridge and gains The Thrush.
The Thrush: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "天桥座"，获得 "鸫"：观星者的声音变得和谐。观星者在魅力技能检定上获得相当于其等级一半的加成（最少1）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Bridge to The Thrush
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天桥座到画眉鸟座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Bridge and gains The Wagon.
The Wagon: The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "天桥座"，获得 "马车座"：观星者的移动变得迅速而稳定。他的移动速度获得+10英尺的强化加成。此外，作为快速行动，他每天可以获得三次移动自由的效果，持续1回合。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Bridge to The Wagon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天桥座到马车座

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Daughter emboldens hearts with the promise of springtime and new life. The stargazer and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. The stargazer is immune to fear effects created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 闺女座以春天和新生命的承诺鼓舞人心。观星者和 10 英尺范围内的盟友在对抗恐惧时会获得 +4 的士气加成。观星者对恶魔制造的恐惧效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Daughter emboldens hearts with the promise of springtime and new life. The stargazer and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. The stargazer is immune to fear effects created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 闺女座以春天和新生命的承诺鼓舞人心。观星者和 10 英尺范围内的盟友在对抗恐惧时会获得 +4 的士气加成。观星者对恶魔制造的恐惧效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星座奥秘 - 闺女座

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 闺女座到天桥座

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Daughter to The Wagon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 闺女座到马车座

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 10th level, the stargazer’s mastery of the Cosmic Caravan reaches its zenith. Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 10 级时，观星者对篷车星座群的掌握达到顶峰。每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。
