LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Follower to The Bridge
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天桥座到追行者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Follower and gains The Daughter.
The Daughter: The Daughter emboldens hearts with the promise of springtime and new life. The stargazer and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. The stargazer is immune to fear effects created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃追行者座，获得闺女座：闺女座：以春天和新生的承诺鼓舞人心。观星者和10英尺范围内的盟友在对恐惧的豁免检定中获得+4士气加成。观星者对恶魔制造的恐惧效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Follower to The Daughter
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 闺女座到追行者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Follower and gains The Lantern Bearer.
The LanternBearer: The stargazer’s ability to conjure light increases. Any spell cast by the stargazer with the fire descriptor has its spell level increased by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "追行者座"，获得 "持灯人座"：观星者召唤光的能力增强。观星者施放的任何带有火属性的法术，其法术等级都会提高2级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Follower to The Lantern Bearer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 持灯人座到追行者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Follower and gains The Mother.
The Mother: The stargazer channels the nurturing heart of the Caravan. Whenever the stargazer casts a cure spell, casts breath of life, or uses the healing hex, he adds twice his class level to the hit points restored.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任意一种星座奥秘替换他的一种星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "追行者座"，获得 "慈母座"：观星者引导商队的培育之心。每当观星者施放治愈法术、生命吐息或使用治愈六芒星，他恢复的生命都会增加两倍于他的等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Follower to The Mother
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 慈母座到到追行者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Follower and gains The Newlyweds.
The Newlyweds: The sign of intertwined lovers grants the stargazer a romantic mystique. Whenever he uses a spell with the compulsion descriptor the save DC increases by 1. In addition, stargazer gains a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against compulsion effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃了 "追行者座"，获得了 "新婚座"：恋人交织的星座赋予观星者浪漫的神秘感。每当他使用带有蛊惑描述的法术时，豁免DC增加1。 此外，观星者在对抗蛊惑效果的豁免时获得+2士气加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Follower to The Newlyweds
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 新婚座到追行者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Follower and gains The Pack.
The Pack: The stargazer becomes attuned to the beasts that follow the Caravan. He gains a +2 bonus on Nature checks. In addition, whenever he casts a summoning spell that conjures multiple creatures of the animal type, he summons an additional animal of that type.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任意一种星座奥秘替换他的一种星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "追行者座"，获得 "驮兽座"：观星者与跟随商队的野兽相契合。他的自然检定会获得 +2 加值。此外，每当他施放召唤多个动物类型生物的召唤法术时，他将额外召唤一个该类型的动物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Follower to The Pack
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 从追行者座到驮兽座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. 
All variants of this ability give up The Follower. 
The specter of death follows the stargazer, shielding him from doom. The stargazer gains a +4 bonus on saves against death effects. In addition, he is immune to all death effects, negative energy effects, and negative levels created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。
该能力的所有变体都会放弃 "追行者座"。
死亡的幽灵跟随观星者，保护他免遭厄运。观星者在抵御死亡效果时获得+4的豁免加成。此外，他还能免疫所有死亡效果、负能量效果以及恶魔制造的负等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stars’ Dance - The Follower
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 群星之舞 - 追行者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Follower and gains The Patriarch.
The Patriarch: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "追行者座"，获得 "守护者"：观星者获得与生俱来的方向感。他在知识（世界）和感知检查上获得+4加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Follower to The Patriarch
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 追行者座到天父座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Follower and gains The Rider.
The Rider: The stargazer and his mount ride as one. While he is mounted both rider and mount gain +1 on all saves and an immunity to difficult terrain.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "追行者座"，获得 "骑手"：观星者和他的坐骑合二为一。当他骑乘时，骑手和坐骑都会获得+1的豁免，并对困难地形免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Follower to The Rider
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 追行者座到驭手座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Follower and gains The Stargazer.
The Stargazer: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃了 "追行者座"（The Follower），获得了 "观星者"（The Stargazer）：与他同名的星座会向观星者发出危险警告。观星者在主动检定时获得+2洞察加值，并且在战斗中行动前不会被认为脚步虚浮，尽管这并不允许他在其他情况下行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Follower to The Stargazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 追行者座到观星者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Follower and gains The Stranger.
The Stranger: The stargazer learns to blend seamlessly into others’ cultures. He can use vanish on himself as a swift action spell-like ability a number of times equal to half his stargazer level (min 1) per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任意一种星座奥秘替换他的一种星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "追行者座"，获得 "陌路人座"：观星者学会无缝融入他人的文化。他可以在自己身上使用 "渐隐术术术术 "作为类似法术的迅捷行动能力，每天的次数等于其观星者等级的一半（最少1级）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Follower to The Stranger
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 追行者座到陌路人座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Follower and gains The Thrush.
The Thrush: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "追行者座"，获得 "画眉鸟座"：观星者的声音变得和谐。观星者在魅力技能检定上获得相当于其等级一半的加成（最少1）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Follower to The Thrush
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 追行者座到画眉鸟座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Follower and gains The Wagon.
The Wagon: The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "追行者座"，获得 "马车座"：观星者的移动变得迅速而稳定。他的移动速度获得+10英尺的强化加成。此外，作为快速行动，他每天可以获得三次行动自由的效果，持续1回合。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Follower to The Wagon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 追行者座到马车座

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s ability to conjure light increases. Any spell cast by the stargazer with the fire descriptor has its spell level increased by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者变光的能力增强。观星者施放的任何带有火属性的法术，其法术等级都会提高 2 级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s ability to conjure light increases. Any spell cast by the stargazer with the fire descriptor has its spell level increased by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者变光的能力增强。观星者施放的任何带有火属性的法术，其法术等级都会提高 2 级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sidereal Arcana - The Lantern Bearer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星座奥秘 - 持灯人座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Lantern Bearer and gains The Bridge.
The Bridge: The stargazer is warded against winter’s darkness. He gains cold resistance 5 and an immunity to blindness effects caused by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "持灯人座"，获得 "天桥座"。
"天桥座"：观星者可以抵御冬季的黑暗。他获得5级抗寒能力，并免疫恶魔造成的失明效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Lantern Bearer to The Bridge
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 提灯人座到天桥座

Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Mother and gains The Bridge.
The Bridge: The stargazer is warded against winter’s darkness. He gains cold resistance 5 and an immunity to blindness effects caused by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何一种星座奥秘替换他的一种星座奥秘。该能力放弃 "慈母座"，获得 "天桥座"：观星者可以抵御冬季的黑暗。他获得5级抗寒能力，并免疫恶魔造成的失明效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Mother to The Bridge
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 慈母座到天桥座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Mother and gains The Daughter.
The Daughter: The Daughter emboldens hearts with the promise of springtime and new life. The stargazer and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. The stargazer is immune to fear effects created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。该能力放弃了 "慈母座"，获得了 "闺女座"：闺女座：以春天和新生的承诺鼓舞人心。观星者和10英尺内的盟友在对抗恐惧的豁免检定中获得+4士气加成。观星者对恶魔制造的恐惧效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Mother to The Daughter
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 慈母座到闺女座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Mother and gains The Follower.
The Follower: The specter of death follows the stargazer, shielding him from doom. The stargazer gains a +4 bonus on saves against death effects. In addition, he is immune to all death effects, negative energy effects, and negative levels created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。
追行者座：死亡的幽灵追随观星者，保护他免遭厄运。观星者在抵御死亡效果时获得+4的豁免加成。此外，他还能免疫所有死亡效果、负能量效果以及恶魔制造的负值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Mother to The Follower
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 慈母座到追行者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Mother and gains The Lantern Bearer.
The LanternBearer: The stargazer’s ability to conjure light increases. Any spell cast by the stargazer with the fire descriptor has its spell level increased by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。该能力放弃 "圣母"，获得 "持灯人座"：观星者召唤光的能力增强。观星者施放的任何带有火属性的法术，其法术等级都会提高2级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Mother to The Lantern Bearer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 慈母座到提灯人座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Mother and gains The Newlyweds.
The Newlyweds: The sign of intertwined lovers grants the stargazer a romantic mystique. Whenever he uses a spell with the compulsion descriptor the save DC increases by 1. In addition, stargazer gains a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against compulsion effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃了 "慈母座"，获得了 "新婚座"：恋人交织的星座赋予观星者浪漫的神秘感。每当他使用带有蛊惑描述的法术时，豁免DC增加1。 此外，观星者在对抗蛊惑效果的豁免时获得+2士气加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Mother to The Newlyweds
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 慈母座到新婚座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Mother and gains The Pack.
The Pack: The stargazer becomes attuned to the beasts that follow the Caravan. He gains a +2 bonus on Nature checks. In addition, whenever he casts a summoning spell that conjures multiple creatures of the animal type, he summons an additional animal of that type.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。该能力放弃 "慈母座"，获得 "驮兽座"。
"驮兽座"：观星者会与跟随商队的野兽相契合。他在自然检定中获得 +2 加值。此外，每当他施放召唤多个动物类型生物的召唤法术时，他将额外召唤一个该类型的动物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Mother to The Pack
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 慈母座到驮兽座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. 
All variants of this ability give up The Mother. 
The stargazer channels the nurturing heart of the Caravan. Whenever the stargazer casts a cure spell, casts breath of life, or uses the healing hex, he adds twice his class level to the hit points restored.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。
该能力的所有变体都会放弃 "慈母座"。
观星者引导大篷马车座到哺育之心。每当观星者施放治愈法术、生命吐息或使用治愈六芒星，他恢复的生命会增加两倍于他的等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stars’ Dance - The Mother
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 群星之舞 - 慈母座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Mother and gains The Patriarch.
The Patriarch: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。该能力放弃 "慈母座"，获得 "天父座"。
"天父座"：观星者获得与生俱来的方向感。他在知识（世界）和感知检查上获得+4加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Mother to The Patriarch
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 慈母座到天父座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Mother and gains The Rider.
The Rider: The stargazer and his mount ride as one. While he is mounted both rider and mount gain +1 on all saves and an immunity to difficult terrain.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。该能力放弃 "慈母座"，获得 "驭手座"：观星者和他的坐骑合二为一。当他骑乘时，骑手和坐骑都会获得+1的豁免，并对困难地形免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Mother to The Rider
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 慈母座到驭手座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Mother and gains The Stargazer.
The Stargazer: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力可放弃 "慈母座"，获得 "观星者"：与他同名的星座警告观星者危险。观星者在主动检定时获得+2洞察加值，并且在战斗中行动之前不会被认为脚步虚浮，尽管这并不允许他在其他情况下行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Mother to The Stargazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 慈母座到观星者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Mother and gains The Stranger.
The Stranger: The stargazer learns to blend seamlessly into others’ cultures. He can use vanish on himself as a swift action spell-like ability a number of times equal to half his stargazer level (min 1) per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。该能力放弃 "慈母座"，获得 "陌路人座"：观星者学会了与他人的文化完美融合。他可以在自己身上使用 "渐隐术术术术 "作为类似法术的快速行动能力，每天的次数等于他的窥星者等级的一半（最少1级）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Mother to The Stranger
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 慈母座到陌路人座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Mother and gains The Thrush.
The Thrush: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "慈母座"，获得 "画眉鸟座"：观星者的声音变得和谐。观星者在魅力技能检定上获得相当于其等级一半的加成（最少1）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Mother to The Thrush
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 慈母座到画眉鸟座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Mother and gains The Wagon.
The Wagon: The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "慈母座"，获得 "马车座"：观星者的移动变得迅速而稳定。他的移动速度获得+10英尺的强化加成。此外，作为快速行动，他每天可以获得三次移动自由的效果，持续一回合。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Mother to The Wagon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 慈母座到马车座

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The sign of intertwined lovers grants the stargazer a romantic mystique. Whenever he uses a spell with the compulsion descriptor the save DC increases by 1. In addition, stargazer gains a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against compulsion effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恋人交织的标志赋予观星者浪漫的神秘感。每当他使用带有蛊惑描述符的法术时，豁免DC都会增加1。此外，观星者在对抗蛊惑效果的豁免时会获得+2士气加成。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者会与跟随商队的野兽产生共鸣。他的自然检定会获得 +2 加值。此外，每当他施放召唤多个动物类型生物的召唤法术时，他就会多召唤一个该类型的动物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer becomes attuned to the beasts that follow the Caravan. He gains a +2 bonus on Nature checks. In addition, whenever he casts a summoning spell that conjures multiple creatures of the animal type, he summons an additional animal of that type.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者会与跟随商队的野兽产生共鸣。他的自然检定会获得 +2 加值。此外，每当他施放召唤多个动物类型生物的召唤法术时，他就会多召唤一个该类型的动物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sidereal Arcana - The Pack
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星座奥秘 - 驮兽座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Pack and gains The Bridge.
The Bridge: The stargazer is warded against winter’s darkness. He gains cold resistance 5 and an immunity to blindness effects caused by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任意一种星座奥秘替换他的一种星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "群"，获得 "天桥座"。
"天桥座"：观星者可以抵御冬季的黑暗。他获得5级抗寒能力，并免疫恶魔造成的失明效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Pack to The Bridge
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 驮兽座到天桥座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Pack and gains The Daughter.
The Daughter: The Daughter emboldens hearts with the promise of springtime and new life. The stargazer and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. The stargazer is immune to fear effects created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "群"，获得 "闺女座"：闺女座以春天和新生的承诺鼓舞人心。观星者和10英尺内的盟友在对抗恐惧的豁免检定中获得+4士气加成。观星者对恶魔制造的恐惧效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Pack to The Daughter
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 驮兽座到闺女座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Pack and gains The Follower.
The Follower: The specter of death follows the stargazer, shielding him from doom. The stargazer gains a +4 bonus on saves against death effects. In addition, he is immune to all death effects, negative energy effects, and negative levels created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。
追行者座：死亡的幽灵跟随观星者，保护他免遭厄运。观星者在抵御死亡效果时获得+4的豁免加成。此外，他还能免疫所有死亡效果、负能量效果以及恶魔制造的负值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Pack to The Follower
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 从 "驮兽座裹 "到 "追行者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Pack and gains The Lantern Bearer.
The LanternBearer: The stargazer’s ability to conjure light increases. Any spell cast by the stargazer with the fire descriptor has its spell level increased by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "背包"，获得 "持灯人座"：观星者的光之召唤能力增强。观星者施放的任何带有火属性的法术，其法术等级都会提高2级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Pack to The Lantern Bearer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 驮兽座到提灯人座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Pack and gains The Mother.
The Mother: The stargazer channels the nurturing heart of the Caravan. Whenever the stargazer casts a cure spell, casts breath of life, or uses the healing hex, he adds twice his class level to the hit points restored.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "驮兽座"，获得 "慈母座"：观星者引导商队的哺育之心。每当观星者施放治愈法术、生命吐息或使用治愈六芒星，他恢复的生命都会增加两倍于他的等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Pack to The Mother
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 驮兽座到慈母座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Pack and gains The Newlyweds.
The Newlyweds: The sign of intertwined lovers grants the stargazer a romantic mystique. Whenever he uses a spell with the compulsion descriptor the save DC increases by 1. In addition, stargazer gains a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against compulsion effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "群星"，获得 "新婚座"：恋人交织的星座赋予观星者浪漫的神秘感。每当他使用带有蛊惑描述的法术时，豁免DC增加1。此外，观星者在对抗蛊惑效果的豁免时获得+2士气加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Pack to The Newlyweds
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 驮兽座到新婚座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. 
All variants of this ability give up The Pack. 
The stargazer becomes attuned to the beasts that follow the Caravan. He gains a +2 bonus on Nature checks. In addition, whenever he casts a summoning spell that conjures multiple creatures of the animal type, he summons an additional animal of that type.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。
该能力的所有变体都会放弃 "驮兽座"。
观星者会与跟随商队的野兽产生共鸣。他在自然检查上获得+2加成。此外，每当他施放召唤多个动物类型生物的召唤法术时，他将额外召唤一个该类型的动物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stars’ Dance - The Pack
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 群星之舞 - 驮兽座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Pack and gains The Patriarch.
The Patriarch: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力可放弃 "驮兽座"，获得 "天父座"
"天父座"：观星者获得与生俱来的方向感。他在知识（世界）和感知检查上获得+4加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Pack to The Patriarch
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 驮兽座到天父座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Pack and gains The Rider.
The Rider: The stargazer and his mount ride as one. While he is mounted both rider and mount gain +1 on all saves and an immunity to difficult terrain.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力可放弃 "驮兽座"，获得 "驭手座"：观星者和他的坐骑合二为一。当他骑乘时，骑手和坐骑都会在所有援救上获得+1，并对困难地形免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Pack to The Rider
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 从 "驮兽座 "到 "驭手座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Pack and gains The Stargazer.
The Stargazer: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "群星"，获得 "观星者"。
观星者：与他同名的星座警告观星者危险。观星者在主动检定时获得+2洞察加值，并且在战斗中行动之前不会被认为是平足，尽管这并不允许他在其他情况下行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Pack to The Stargazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 驮兽座到观星者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Pack and gains The Stranger.
The Stranger: The stargazer learns to blend seamlessly into others’ cultures. He can use vanish on himself as a swift action spell-like ability a number of times equal to half his stargazer level (min 1) per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃了 "群体"，获得了 "陌路人座"：观星者学会无缝融入他人的文化。他可以在自己身上使用 "渐隐术术 "作为类似法术的迅捷行动能力，每天的次数等于他观星者等级的一半（最少1级）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Pack to The Stranger
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 驮兽座到陌路人座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Pack and gains The Thrush.
The Thrush: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "群"，获得 "鸫"：观星者的声音变得和谐。观星者在魅力技能检定上获得相当于其等级一半的加成（最少1）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Pack to The Thrush
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 从 "驮兽座 "到 "画眉鸟座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Pack and gains The Wagon.
The Wagon: The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任意一种星座奥秘替换他的一种星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "群"，获得 "马车座"。
"马车座"：观星者的移动变得敏捷而稳定。他的移动速度获得+10英尺的强化加成。此外，作为快速行动，他每天可以获得三次移动自由的效果，持续1回合。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Pack to The Wagon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 从 "驮兽座 "到 "马车座

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者获得与生俱来的方向感。他在知识（世界）和感知检查上获得 +4 加分。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.

The Bridge: The stargazer is warded against winter’s darkness. He gains cold resistance 5 and an immunity to blindness effects caused by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任意一种星座奥秘替换他的一种星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "驭手座"，获得 "天桥座"：观星者可以抵御冬季的黑暗。他获得5级寒冷抗性，并对恶魔造成的失明效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Rider to The Bridge
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天桥座到驭手座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Rider and gains The Daughter.
The Daughter: The Daughter emboldens hearts with the promise of springtime and new life. The stargazer and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. The stargazer is immune to fear effects created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。该能力放弃 "驭手座"，获得 "闺女座"：闺女座：以春天和新生的承诺鼓舞人心。观星者和10英尺内的盟友在对抗恐惧的豁免检定中获得+4士气加成。观星者对恶魔制造的恐惧效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Rider to The Daughter
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 驭手座到闺女座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Rider and gains The Follower.
The Follower: The specter of death follows the stargazer, shielding him from doom. The stargazer gains a +4 bonus on saves against death effects. In addition, he is immune to all death effects, negative energy effects, and negative levels created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。
追行者座：死亡的幽灵追随观星者，保护他免遭厄运。观星者在抵御死亡效果时获得+4的豁免加成。此外，他还能免疫所有死亡效果、负能量效果以及恶魔制造的负值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Rider to The Follower
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 驭手座到追行者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Rider and gains The Lantern Bearer.
The LanternBearer: The stargazer’s ability to conjure light increases. Any spell cast by the stargazer with the fire descriptor has its spell level increased by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "驭手座"，获得 "持灯人座"：观星者的光之召唤能力增强。观星者施放的任何带有火属性的法术，其法术等级都会提高2级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Rider to The Lantern Bearer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 驭手座到持灯人座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Rider and gains The Mother.
The Mother: The stargazer channels the nurturing heart of the Caravan. Whenever the stargazer casts a cure spell, casts breath of life, or uses the healing hex, he adds twice his class level to the hit points restored.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "驭手座"，获得 "慈母座"：观星者引导商队的培育之心。每当观星者施放治愈法术、生命吐息或使用治愈六芒星，他恢复的生命都会增加两倍于他的等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Rider to The Mother
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 驭手座到慈母座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Rider and gains The Newlyweds.
The Newlyweds: The sign of intertwined lovers grants the stargazer a romantic mystique. Whenever he uses a spell with the compulsion descriptor the save DC increases by 1. In addition, stargazer gains a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against compulsion effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "驭手座"，获得 "新婚座"：恋人交织的星座赋予观星者浪漫的神秘感。每当他使用带有蛊惑描述符的法术时，豁免DC增加1。 此外，观星者在对抗蛊惑效果的豁免时获得+2士气加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Rider to The Newlyweds
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 新婚座到驭手座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Rider and gains The Pack.
The Pack: The stargazer becomes attuned to the beasts that follow the Caravan. He gains a +2 bonus on Nature checks. In addition, whenever he casts a summoning spell that conjures multiple creatures of the animal type, he summons an additional animal of that type.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任意一种星座奥秘替换他的一种星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "驭手座"，获得 "驮兽座"。
"驮兽座"：观星者与跟随商队的野兽相契合。他在自然检定上获得+2加成。此外，每当他施放召唤多个动物类型生物的召唤法术时，他将额外召唤一个该类型的动物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Rider to The Pack
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 驭手座到驮兽座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. 
All variants of this ability give up The Rider. 
The stargazer and his mount ride as one. While he is mounted both rider and mount gain +1 on all saves and an immunity to difficult terrain.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。
该能力的所有变体都会放弃 "驭手座"。
观星者和他的坐骑合二为一。当他骑乘时，骑手和坐骑都会在所有援救上获得+1，并对困难地形免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stars’ Dance - The Rider
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 群星之舞 - 驭手座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Rider and gains The Patriarch.
The Patriarch: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "驭手座"，获得 "守护神"：观星者获得与生俱来的方向感。他在知识（世界）和感知检查上获得+4加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Rider to The Patriarch
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 驭手座到天父座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Rider and gains The Stargazer.
The Stargazer: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "驭手座"，获得 "观星者"：与他同名的星座警告观星者危险。观星者在主动检定时获得+2洞察加值，在战斗中行动前不会被认为是平足，但这并不允许他在其他情况下行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Rider to The Stargazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 驭手座到观星者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Rider and gains The Stranger.
The Stranger: The stargazer learns to blend seamlessly into others’ cultures. He can use vanish on himself as a swift action spell-like ability a number of times equal to half his stargazer level (min 1) per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。该能力放弃 "驭手座"，获得 "陌路人座"：观星者学会无缝融入他人的文化。他可以在自己身上使用 "渐隐术 "作为类似法术的迅捷行动能力，每天的次数等于他的观星者等级的一半（最少1级）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Rider to The Stranger
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 驭手座到陌路人座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Rider and gains The Thrush.
The Thrush: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "驭手座"，获得 "画眉鸟座"：观星者的声音变得和谐。观星者在魅力技能检定上获得相当于其等级一半的加成（最少1）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Rider to The Thrush
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 驭手座到画眉鸟座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Rider and gains The Wagon.
The Wagon: The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "驭手座"，获得 "马车座"：观星者的移动变得敏捷而稳定。他的移动速度获得+10英尺的强化加成。此外，作为快速行动，他每天可以获得三次移动自由的效果，持续1回合。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Rider to The Wagon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 从驭手座到马车座

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 与他同名的星座会向观星者发出危险警告。观星者在进行先攻检查时会获得 +2 的洞察加值，并且在战斗中行动之前不会被认为脚步不稳，但这并不允许他在无法以其他方式行动的情况下采取行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 与他同名的星座会向观星者发出危险警告。观星者在进行先攻检查时会获得 +2 的洞察加值，并且在战斗中行动之前不会被认为脚步不稳，但这并不允许他在无法以其他方式行动的情况下采取行动。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者学会与他人的文化完美融合。他可以在自己身上使用 "渐隐术"，作为一种类似法术的迅捷行动能力，每天的次数相当于他的窥星者等级的一半（最少 1 级）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer learns to blend seamlessly into others’ cultures. He can use vanish on himself as a swift action spell-like ability a number of times equal to half his stargazer level (min 1) per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者学会与他人的文化完美融合。他可以在自己身上使用 "渐隐术"，作为一种类似法术的迅捷行动能力，每天的次数相当于他的窥星者等级的一半（最少 1 级）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sidereal Arcana - The Stranger
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星座奥秘 - 陌路人座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stranger and gains The Bridge.
The Bridge: The stargazer is warded against winter’s darkness. He gains cold resistance 5 and an immunity to blindness effects caused by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "陌路人座"，获得 "天桥座"：观星者可以抵御冬季的黑暗。他获得5级抗寒能力，并免疫恶魔造成的失明效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Bridge
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌路人座到天桥座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stranger and gains The Daughter.
The Daughter: The Daughter emboldens hearts with the promise of springtime and new life. The stargazer and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. The stargazer is immune to fear effects created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "陌路人座"，获得 "闺女座"：闺女座：以春天和新生的承诺鼓舞人心。观星者和10英尺内的盟友在对抗恐惧的豁免检定中获得+4士气加成。观星者对恶魔制造的恐惧效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Daughter
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌路人座到闺女座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stranger and gains The Follower.
The Follower: The specter of death follows the stargazer, shielding him from doom. The stargazer gains a +4 bonus on saves against death effects. In addition, he is immune to all death effects, negative energy effects, and negative levels created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。
追行者座：死亡的幽灵追随观星者，保护他免遭厄运。观星者在抵御死亡效果时获得+4的豁免加成。此外，他还能免疫所有死亡效果、负能量效果以及恶魔制造的负值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Follower
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌路人座到追行者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stranger and gains The Lantern Bearer.
The LanternBearer: The stargazer’s ability to conjure light increases. Any spell cast by the stargazer with the fire descriptor has its spell level increased by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "陌路人座"，获得 "持灯人座"：观星者召唤光的能力增强。观星者施放的任何带有火属性的法术，其法术等级都会提高2级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Lantern Bearer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌路人座到提灯人座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stranger and gains The Mother.
The Mother: The stargazer channels the nurturing heart of the Caravan. Whenever the stargazer casts a cure spell, casts breath of life, or uses the healing hex, he adds twice his class level to the hit points restored.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "陌路人座"，获得 "慈母座"：观星者引导商队的培育之心。每当观星者施放治愈法术、生命吐息或使用治愈六芒星，他恢复的生命都会增加两倍于他的等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Mother
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌路人座到慈母座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stranger and gains The Newlyweds.
The Newlyweds: The sign of intertwined lovers grants the stargazer a romantic mystique. Whenever he uses a spell with the compulsion descriptor the save DC increases by 1. In addition, stargazer gains a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against compulsion effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "陌路人座"，获得 "新婚座"：恋人交织的星座赋予观星者浪漫的神秘感。每当他使用带有蛊惑描述的法术时，豁免DC增加1。 此外，观星者在对抗蛊惑效果的豁免时获得+2士气加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Newlyweds
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌路人座到新婚座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stranger and gains The Pack.
The Pack: The stargazer becomes attuned to the beasts that follow the Caravan. He gains a +2 bonus on Nature checks. In addition, whenever he casts a summoning spell that conjures multiple creatures of the animal type, he summons an additional animal of that type.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任意一种星座奥秘替换他的一种星座奥秘。该能力放弃 "陌路人座"，获得 "驮兽座"。
"驮兽座"：观星者会与跟随商队的野兽产生共鸣。他的自然检定会获得 +2 加值。此外，每当他施放召唤多个动物类型生物的召唤法术时，他将额外召唤一个该类型的动物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Pack
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌路人座到驮兽座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. 
All variants of this ability give up The Stranger. 
The stargazer learns to blend seamlessly into others’ cultures. He can use vanish on himself as a swift action spell-like ability a number of times equal to half his stargazer level (min 1) per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。
该能力的所有变体都会放弃 "陌路人座"。
观星者学会无缝融入他人的文化。他可以在自己身上使用 "渐隐术 "作为类似法术的迅捷行动能力，每天的次数等于他的观星者等级的一半（最少1级）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stars’ Dance - The Stranger
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 群星之舞 - 陌路人座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stranger and gains The Patriarch.
The Patriarch: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "陌路人座"，获得 "守护神"：观星者获得与生俱来的方向感。他在知识（世界）和感知检查上获得+4加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Patriarch
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌路人座到天父座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stranger and gains The Rider.
The Rider: The stargazer and his mount ride as one. While he is mounted both rider and mount gain +1 on all saves and an immunity to difficult terrain.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "陌路人座"，获得 "骑手"：观星者和他的坐骑合二为一。当他骑乘时，骑手和坐骑都会获得+1的豁免，并对困难地形免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Rider
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌路人座到驭手座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stranger and gains The Stargazer.
The Stargazer: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "陌路人座"，获得 "观星者"：与他同名的星座警告观星者危险。观星者在主动检定时获得+2洞察加值，并且在战斗中行动之前不会被认为脚步虚浮，尽管这并不允许他在其他情况下行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Stargazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌路人座到观星者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stranger and gains The Thrush.
The Thrush: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "陌路人座"，获得 "画眉鸟座"：观星者的声音变得和谐。观星者在魅力技能检定上获得相当于其等级一半的加成（最少1）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Thrush
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌路人座到画眉鸟座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stranger and gains The Wagon.
The Wagon: The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "陌路人座"，获得 "马车座"：观星者的移动变得敏捷而稳定。他的移动速度获得+10英尺的强化加成。此外，作为快速行动，他每天可以获得三次行动自由的效果，持续一回合。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Wagon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌路人座到马车座

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者的声音变得和谐。观星者在魅力技能检定中获得相当于其等级一半的加成（最少 1）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者的声音变得和谐。观星者在魅力技能检定中获得相当于其等级一半的加成（最少 1）。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 画眉鸟座到马车座

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者的移动变得敏捷而稳定。他的移动速度会获得 +10 英尺的强化加成。此外，作为敏捷动作，他每天可以获得三次移动自由的效果，持续 1 个回合。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者的移动变得敏捷而稳定。他的移动速度会获得 +10 英尺的强化加成。此外，作为敏捷动作，他每天可以获得三次移动自由的效果，持续 1 个回合。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sidereal Arcana - The Wagon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星座奥秘 - 马车座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Bridge.
The Bridge: The stargazer is warded against winter’s darkness. He gains cold resistance 5 and an immunity to blindness effects caused by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任意一种星座奥秘替换他的一种星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "马车座"，获得 "天桥座"：观星者可以抵御冬季的黑暗。他获得5级抗寒能力，并对恶魔造成的失明效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Bridge
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 马车座到天桥座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Daughter.
The Daughter: The Daughter emboldens hearts with the promise of springtime and new life. The stargazer and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. The stargazer is immune to fear effects created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。该能力放弃 "马车座"，获得 "闺女座"：闺女座：以春天和新生的承诺鼓舞人心。观星者和10英尺内的盟友在对抗恐惧的豁免检定中获得+4士气加成。观星者对恶魔制造的恐惧效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Daughter
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 马车座到闺女座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Follower.
The Follower: The specter of death follows the stargazer, shielding him from doom. The stargazer gains a +4 bonus on saves against death effects. In addition, he is immune to all death effects, negative energy effects, and negative levels created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。
追行者座：死亡的幽灵追随观星者，保护他免遭厄运。观星者在抵御死亡效果时获得+4的豁免加成。此外，他还能免疫所有死亡效果、负能量效果以及恶魔制造的负值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Follower
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 从马车座到追行者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Lantern Bearer.
The LanternBearer: The stargazer’s ability to conjure light increases. Any spell cast by the stargazer with the fire descriptor has its spell level increased by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "马车座"，获得 "持灯人座"：观星者召唤光的能力增强。观星者施放的任何带有火属性的法术，其法术等级都会提高2级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Lantern Bearer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 马车座到提灯人座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Mother.
The Mother: The stargazer channels the nurturing heart of the Caravan. Whenever the stargazer casts a cure spell, casts breath of life, or uses the healing hex, he adds twice his class level to the hit points restored.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "马车座"，获得 "慈母座"：观星者引导商队的培育之心。每当观星者施放治愈法术、生命吐息或使用治愈六芒星，他恢复的生命就会增加两倍于他的等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Mother
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 马车座到慈母座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Newlyweds.
The Newlyweds: The sign of intertwined lovers grants the stargazer a romantic mystique. Whenever he uses a spell with the compulsion descriptor the save DC increases by 1. In addition, stargazer gains a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against compulsion effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "马车座"，获得 "新婚座"：恋人交织的星座赋予观星者浪漫的神秘感。每当他使用带有蛊惑描述的法术时，豁免DC增加1。 此外，观星者在对抗蛊惑效果的豁免时获得+2士气加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Newlyweds
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 马车座到新婚座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Pack.
The Pack: The stargazer becomes attuned to the beasts that follow the Caravan. He gains a +2 bonus on Nature checks. In addition, whenever he casts a summoning spell that conjures multiple creatures of the animal type, he summons an additional animal of that type.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何一种星座奥秘替换他的一种星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "马车座"，获得 "驮兽座"。
"驮兽座"：观星者会与跟随商队的野兽产生共鸣。他的自然检定会获得+2加成。此外，每当他施放召唤多个动物类型生物的召唤法术时，他将额外召唤一个该类型的动物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Pack
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 马车座到驮兽座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. 
All variants of this ability give up The Wagon. 
The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。
该能力的所有变体都会放弃 "马车座"。
观星者的移动变得敏捷而稳定。他的移动速度获得+10英尺的强化加成。此外，作为敏捷动作，他每天可以获得三次移动自由的效果，持续1回合。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stars’ Dance - The Wagon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 群星之舞 - 马车座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Patriarch.
The Patriarch: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "马车座"，获得 "天父座"：观星者获得与生俱来的方向感。他在知识（世界）和感知检查上获得+4加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Patriarch
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 马车座到天父座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Rider.
The Rider: The stargazer and his mount ride as one. While he is mounted both rider and mount gain +1 on all saves and an immunity to difficult terrain.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "马车座"，获得 "坐骑"：观星者和他的坐骑合二为一。当他骑乘时，骑手和坐骑都会获得+1的豁免，并对困难地形免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Rider
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 从马车座到驭手座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Stargazer.
The Stargazer: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "马车座"，获得 "观星者"：与他同名的星座警告观星者危险。观星者在主动检定时获得+2洞察加值，并且在战斗中行动之前不会被认为脚步虚浮，尽管这并不允许他在其他情况下行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Stargazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 马车座到观星者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Stranger.
The Stranger: The stargazer learns to blend seamlessly into others’ cultures. He can use vanish on himself as a swift action spell-like ability a number of times equal to half his stargazer level (min 1) per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "马车座"，获得 "陌路人座"：观星者学会无缝融入他人的文化。他可以在自己身上使用 "渐隐术 "作为类似法术的迅捷行动能力，每天的次数等于他观星者等级的一半（最少1级）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Stranger
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 马车座到陌路人座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Thrush.
The Thrush: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，观星者可以用任何其他奥术替换他的一个星座奥秘。此能力放弃 "马车座"，获得 "画眉鸟座"：观星者的声音变得和谐。观星者在魅力技能检定上获得相当于其等级一半的加成（最少1）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Thrush
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 马车座到画眉鸟座

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stars Are Right - Stargazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 群星归位 - 观星者座

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stars Are Right - Stargazer Check
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 群星归位 - 观星者检定

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, and at every level thereafter, a Stargazer gains new spells per day as if he had also gained a level in a spellcasting class he belonged to before adding the prestige class. He does not, however, gain any other benefit a character of that class would have gained, except for additional spells per day, spells known, and an increased effective level of spellcasting. If a character had more than one spellcasting class before becoming a Stargazer, he must decide to which class he adds the new level for purposes of determining spells per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者在一阶时，以及之后的每一阶，每天都会获得新的法术，就好像他在加入进阶等级之前，在所属的法术等级中也获得了一个等级一样。但是，除了每天获得额外的法术、已知法术以及有效法术等级的提高之外，他不会获得该等级角色本应获得的任何其他好处。如果一个角色在成为观星者之前拥有一个以上的施法等级，他必须决定将新等级加入哪个等级以确定每天的法术数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sword Saint
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 剑圣

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, and at every level thereafter, a Stargazer gains new spells per day as if he had also gained a level in a spellcasting class he belonged to before adding the prestige class. He does not, however, gain any other benefit a character of that class would have gained, except for additional spells per day, spells known, and an increased effective level of spellcasting. If a character had more than one spellcasting class before becoming a Stargazer, he must decide to which class he adds the new level for purposes of determining spells per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者在一阶时，以及之后的每一阶，每天都会获得新的法术，就好像他在加入进阶等级之前，在所属的法术等级中也获得了一个等级一样。但是，除了每天获得额外的法术、已知法术以及有效法术等级的提高之外，他不会获得该等级角色本应获得的任何其他好处。如果一个角色在成为观星者之前拥有一个以上的施法等级，他必须决定将新等级加入哪个等级以确定每天的法术数。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 女巫

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wizard
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 向导

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The firmament provides you inspiration, and you draw power from the stars’ distant light.
Guarded Mind: You gain a +2 insight bonus on saving throws against all mind-affecting effects.
The Stars Are Right: At 8th level, you may spontaneously cast any of your Stars subdomain spells by swapping out a spell of an equal spell level. Any Stars subdomain spell that you cast heals you an amount of hit point damage equal to the spell’s level; this effect happens as you cast the spell.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
苍穹为你提供灵感，你从遥远的星光中汲取力量。
坚御心智：对抗影响心灵效果时，你的豁免获得+2洞察加值。 
群星归位：在第 8 级，你可以将其他同级的法术位用来自发施放星辰子域的领域法术。你施放的任何星辰子域的领域法术将为你恢复相当于该法术等级的伤害；这个效果将在你施法的同时发生。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stars Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星辰子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 8th level, you may spontaneously cast any of your Stars subdomain spells by swapping out a spell of an equal spell level. Any Stars subdomain spell that you cast heals you an amount of hit point damage equal to the spell’s level; this effect happens as you cast the spell.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 8 级，你可以将其他同级的法术位用来自发施放星辰子域的领域法术。你施放的任何星辰子域的领域法术将为你恢复相当于该法术等级的伤害；这个效果将在你施法的同时发生。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The firmament provides you inspiration, and you draw power from the stars’ distant light.
Guarded Mind: You gain a +2 insight bonus on saving throws against all mind-affecting effects.
The Stars Are Right: At 8th level, you may spontaneously cast any of your Stars subdomain spells by swapping out a spell of an equal spell level. Any Stars subdomain spell that you cast heals you an amount of hit point damage equal to the spell’s level; this effect happens as you cast the spell.
Domain Spells: entropic shield, hypnotic pattern, blink, dimension door, summon monster V, overwhelming presence, sunbeam, sunburst, polar midnight/meteor swarm.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
苍穹为你提供灵感，你从星星遥远的光芒中汲取力量。
守护心灵：你在抵御所有影响心灵的效果时获得+2洞察加值：在八级时，你可以自发地施放任何一个 "星辰 "亚领域法术，只要换掉一个同等法术等级的法术即可。
领域法术：熵光护盾、催眠图纹、闪现术、任意门、召唤怪物V、神威如狱、阳炎射线射线、阳炎爆、冷酷凛冬/流星爆。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: For the duration of the spell, you can fire rays of steam once per round as a standard action (and you also fire these rays as part of casting this spell). You may fire three rays, plus one additional ray for every four levels beyond 11th (to a maximum of five rays at 19th level). Each ray requires a ranged touch attack to hit and deals 4d6 points of fire damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在法术持续时间内，你可以以一个标准动作每轮发射一次蒸汽射线（你也可以在施展该法术时发射这些射线）。你可以发射 3 道射线，超过 11 级后每 4 级可以发射 1 道额外射线（在 19 级时最多发射 5 道射线）。每条射线都需要一次远程接触攻击才能命中并造成 4d6 点火焰伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Buff 1 round/level
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: Buff 1 轮/级

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per round as a standard action you may fire three rays, plus one additional ray for every four levels beyond 11th (to a maximum of five rays at 19th level). Each ray requires a ranged touch attack to hit and deals 4d6 points of fire damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每轮一次，以一个标准动作，你可以发射三道射线，再加上 11 级之后每 4 级额外的一道射线（在 19 级时最多发射五道射线）。每条射线都需要一次远程接触攻击才能命中并造成 4d6 点火焰伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per round as a standard action you may fire three rays, plus one additional ray for every four levels beyond 11th (to a maximum of five rays at 19th level). Each ray requires a ranged touch attack to hit and deals 4d6 points of fire damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每轮一次，以一个标准动作，你可以发射三道射线，再加上 11 级之后每 4 级额外的一道射线（在 19 级时最多发射五道射线）。每条射线都需要一次远程接触攻击才能命中并造成 4d6 点火焰伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Steam Ray Fusillade
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 蒸汽融化射线

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
With power over storm and sky, you can call down the wrath of the gods upon the world below.
Storm Burst: As a standard action, you can create a storm burst targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged touch attack. The storm burst deals 1d6 points of damage + 1 point for every two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. In addition, the target is buffeted by winds and rain, causing it to take a –2 penalty on attack rolls for 1 round. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Gale Aura (Su): At 6th level, as a standard action, you can create a 30-foot aura of gale-like winds that slows the progress of enemies. Creatures in the aura cannot take a 5-foot step and treat it as as difficult terrain. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. The rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
利用暴风与天空的力量，你可召唤诸神之怒降临人世。
暴风冲击：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你能够以远程{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触攻击{/g}的方式，对30英尺内的任意敌人施以暴风的冲击。暴风冲击将造成{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}，赋予你此领域的职业等级每提升2级，可额外造成1点伤害。此外，该目标将持续受到风雨的影响，{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击检定{/g}受到-2{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，效果持续1{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
暴风氛围：在6级,你召来阻碍敌人靠近的狂风，令30尺内生物无法五尺快步，且范围内敌人向你靠近时视为经过艰难地形。每天使用轮数为牧师等级，不需连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Storm Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 风暴子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Unable to take 5-foot steps and is affected by difficult terrain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 无法迈出 5 英尺并受困难地形影响

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Gale Aura
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暴风氛围

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 6th level, as a standard action, you can create a 30-foot aura of gale-like winds that slows the progress of enemies. Enemies in the aura cannot take a 5-foot step and treat it as as difficult terrain. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. The rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在6级,你召来阻碍敌人靠近的狂风，令30尺内生物无法五尺快步，且范围内敌人向你靠近时视为经过艰难地形。每天使用轮数为牧师等级，不需连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 6th level, as a standard action, you can create a 30-foot aura of gale-like winds that slows the progress of enemies. Enemies in the aura cannot take a 5-foot step and treat it as as difficult terrain. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. The rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在6级,你召来阻碍敌人靠近的狂风，令30尺内生物无法五尺快步，且范围内敌人向你靠近时视为经过艰难地形。每天使用轮数为牧师等级，不需连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 6th level, as a standard action, you can create a 30-foot aura of gale-like winds that slows the progress of enemies. Enemies in the aura cannot take a 5-foot step and treat it as as difficult terrain. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. The rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在6级,你召来阻碍敌人靠近的狂风，令30尺内生物无法五尺快步，且范围内敌人向你靠近时视为经过艰难地形。每天使用轮数为牧师等级，不需连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
With power over storm and sky, you can call down the wrath of the gods upon the world below.
Storm Burst: As a standard action, you can create a storm burst targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged touch attack. The storm burst deals 1d6 points of damage + 1 point for every two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. In addition, the target is buffeted by winds and rain, causing it to take a –2 penalty on attack rolls for 1 round. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Gale Aura (Su): At 6th level, as a standard action, you can create a 30-foot aura of gale-like winds that slows the progress of enemies. Creatures in the aura cannot take a 5-foot step and treat it as as difficult terrain. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. The rounds do not need to be consecutive.
Domain Spells: snowball, summon small elemental, call lightning, slowing mud, call lightning storm, sirocco, sunburst, fire storm, tsunami.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
利用暴风与天空的力量，你可召唤诸神之怒降临人世。
暴风冲击：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你能够以远程{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触攻击{/g}的方式，对30英尺内的任意敌人施以暴风的冲击。暴风冲击将造成{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}，赋予你此领域的职业等级每提升2级，可额外造成1点伤害。此外，该目标将持续受到风雨的影响，{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击检定{/g}受到-2{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，效果持续1{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
暴风氛围：在6级,你召来阻碍敌人靠近的狂风，令30尺内生物无法五尺快步，且范围内敌人向你靠近时视为经过艰难地形。每天使用轮数为牧师等级，不需连续。
领域法术：雪球术，召唤小型元素，召雷术，迟缓污泥，召唤雷暴，灼热之风，阳炎爆，烈焰风暴，津波。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While most druids focus their attention upon the rich earth and the bounty of nature that springs forth from it, the storm druid’s eyes have ever been cast to the skies and the endless expanse of blue, channeling the most raw and untamed aspects of nature.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当大部分的德鲁伊将他们的注意力放在丰饶的大地与大自然赐与的泉水上时，暴风之主却将他们的目光放在苍天那无尽苍蓝之上，那最原始且未经改变的自然之道。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Storm Druid
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暴风之主

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A storm druid may not choose an animal companion. A storm druid must choose the Air or Weather domain; or the Lightning, Storm or Wind subdomain.
A storm druid may not choose an animal companion. A storm druid must choose the Air or Weather domain, or the Storm or Wind subdomain.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暴风之主无法选择动物伙伴，他必须从必须选择气或天气领域，或者风暴 或风子域。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Storm Druids Bond
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暴风之主纽带

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A storm druid can channel stored spell energy into air domain spells that she hasn't prepared ahead of time. She can "lose" a prepared spell in order to cast any air domain spell of the same level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暴风之主可以把已经准备好的法术转化为气领域法术，他可以失去一个已经准备好的法术以施展同级或更低等级的气领域法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spontaneous Air Domain Spellcasting
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发气领域施法

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A storm druid can channel stored spell energy into air domain spells that she hasn't prepared ahead of time. She can "lose" a prepared spell in order to cast any lightning domain spell of the same level.
Spontaneous Lightning Domain Spellcasting

A storm druid can channel stored spell energy into storm domain spells that she hasn't prepared ahead of time. She can "lose" a prepared spell in order to cast any storm domain spell of the same level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暴风之主可以把已经准备好的法术转化为风暴领域法术，他可以失去一个已经准备好的法术以施展同级或更低等级的风暴领域法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spontaneous Storm Domain Spellcasting
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发风暴领域施法

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A storm druid can channel stored spell energy into weather domain spells that she hasn't prepared ahead of time. She can "lose" a prepared spell in order to cast any weather domain spell of the same level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暴风之主可以把已经准备好的法术转化为天气领域法术，他可以失去一个已经准备好的法术以施展同级或更低等级的天气领域法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A storm druid can channel stored spell energy into wind domain spells that she hasn't prepared ahead of time. She can "lose" a prepared spell in order to cast any wind domain spell of the same level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暴风之主可以把已经准备好的法术转化为风领域法术，他可以失去一个已经准备好的法术以施展同级或更低等级的风领域法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spontaneous Wind Domain Spellcasting
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发风领域施法

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 13th level, a storm druid is unaffected by all natural and magical wind effects. She gains +2 bonus on saving throws against sonic effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 13级时，暴风之主不会被自然或魔法效应产生的风影响，并在对抗声音的豁免检定上得到+2的加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Storm Lord
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 风暴之君

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
In strength and brawn there is truth — your faith gives you incredible might and power.
Strength Surge: As a standard action, you can touch a creature to give it great strength. For 1 round, the target gains an enhancement bonus equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum +1) to melee attacks and Athletics checks. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Might of the Gods: At 8th level, you add 1/2 of your level in the class that gave you access to this domain as an enhancement bonus to your Athletics checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
力量与强壮的实质是-你的信仰赋予你无尽的力量与能量。
力量激荡：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你可{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触{/g}生物赋予其强大的力量。在1{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}内，该目标的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}近战攻击{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}运动检定{/g}将获得增强{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，加值等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级（最小为+1）。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
神授力量：在8级时，你的运动{g|Encyclopedia:Check}检定{/g}将获得增强加值，加值等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Strength Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 力量领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
In strength and brawn there is truth — your faith gives you incredible might and power.
Strength Surge: As a standard action, you can touch a creature to give it great strength. For 1 round, the target gains an enhancement bonus equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum +1) to melee attacks and Athletics checks. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Might of the Gods: At 8th level, you add 1/2 of your level in the class that gave you access to this domain as an enhancement bonus to your Athletics checks.
Domain Spells: enlarge person, bull's strength, magical vestment, mass enlarge person, righteous might, stoneskin, legendary proportions, frightful aspect, transformation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
力量与强壮的实质是-你的信仰赋予你无尽的力量与能量。
力量激荡：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你可{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触{/g}生物赋予其强大的力量。在1{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}内，该目标的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}近战攻击{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}运动检定{/g}将获得增强{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，加值等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级（最小为+1）。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
神授力量：在8级时，你的运动{g|Encyclopedia:Check}检定{/g}将获得增强加值，加值等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级。领域法术：变巨术，牛之蛮力，魔化防具，群体变巨术，正气如虹，石肤，伟岸雄姿，可怖外表，战法转换。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Strength: You gain a +6 enhancement bonus to Strength.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举圣徽并呼唤你的神灵的名字，你就获得了神性的一个方面。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免的能力使用该法术的 DC。
力量：你的力量获得+6增强加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Strength: You gain a +6 enhancement bonus to Strength.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
力量：你的力量获得+6增强加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Strength Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 力量领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: StudyTargetPetRank
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 研究目标宠物排名

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You must have a bardic performance in effect to cast this spell. With a flourish, you immediately end your bardic performance, assaulting the senses of the targets with your finale. Each target is stunned for 1 round. On a successful saving throw, a target is staggered for 1 round.
You cannot activate another bardic performance this round. If you have the lingering performance feat the effect lingers as normal.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你必须处于一个生效中的吟游演绎中才能施展这个法术。使用时，你立即结束你的吟游表演，用你的谢幕曲攻击目标的感官。每个目标都会被眩晕 1 轮。豁免成功后，目标会错开一轮。本轮你不能激活另一个吟游表演。如果你有余音绕梁的表演专长，效果会像往常一样持续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stunning Finale
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 惊叹谢幕曲

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This spell summons to your side 1d3 natural advanced grizzly bears. The summoned allies appear where you designate and acts according to its initiative check results. It attacks your opponents to the best of its ability.
Advanced: Creature has natural armor increased by 2, gains a +4 bonus all ability scores (except Int scores of 2 or less).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
这个法术召唤 1d3 只高等灰熊到你身边。被召唤的盟友出现在你指定的地方，并根据其先攻检定结果行动。它会尽其所能攻击你的对手。
高等：生物的天生防御增加 2，获得所有属性值的 +4 加值（除了 2 或更少的智力值）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Summon Advanced Grizzly Bear (1d3)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤高等灰熊 (1d3)

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This spell summons to your side 1d4 + 1 natural advanced grizzly bears. The summoned allies appear where you designate and acts according to its initiative check results. It attacks your opponents to the best of its ability.
Advanced: Creature has natural armor increased by 2, gains a +4 bonus all ability scores (except Int scores of 2 or less).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
该法术召唤 1d4 + 1 只高等灰熊到你身边。被召唤的盟友出现在你指定的地方，并根据其先攻检定结果行动。它会尽其所能攻击你的对手。
高等：生物的天生防御增加 2，获得所有属性值的 +4 加值（智力值不超过 2 除外）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Summon Advanced Grizzly Bear (1d4 + 1)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤高等灰熊 (1d4 + 1)

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This spell summons to your side a natural advanced grizzly bear. The summoned ally appears where you designate and acts according to its initiative check results. It attacks your opponents to the best of its ability.
Advanced: Creature has natural armor increased by 2, gains a +4 bonus all ability scores (except Int scores of 2 or less).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
这个法术会召唤一只高等灰熊到你身边。被召唤的盟友出现在你指定的地方，并根据其先攻检定结果行动。它会尽其所能攻击你的对手。
高等：生物的天生防御增加 2，获得所有属性值的 +4 加值（智力值不超过 2 除外）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Summon Advanced Grizzly Bear
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤高等灰熊

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This spell summons to your side 1d3 natural giant advanced grizzly bears. The summoned allies appear where you designate and acts according to its initiative check results. It attacks your opponents to the best of its ability.
Giant + Advanced: Creature is one size category larger, has natural armor increased by 5, gains a +8 bonus to strength and constitution, a +4 bonus to wisdom and charisma, and a +2 bonus to dexterity.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
这个法术召唤 1d3 只巨型高等灰熊到你身边。被召唤的盟友出现在你指定的地方，并根据其先攻检定结果行动。它会尽其所能攻击你的对手。
巨型+高等：：生物体型增大一级，天生防御增加5，力量和体质+8，感知和魅力+4，敏捷+2。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Summon Giant Advanced Grizzly Bear (1d3)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤巨型高等灰熊 (1d3)

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This spell summons to your side 1d3 natural giant grizzly bears. The summoned allies appear where you designate and acts according to its initiative check results. It attacks your opponents to the best of its ability.
Giant: Creature is one size category larger, has natural armor increased by 3, gains a +4 bonus to strength and constitution, and a -2 penalty to dexterity.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
这个法术召唤 1d3 只巨型灰熊到你身边。被召唤的盟友出现在你指定的地方，并根据其先攻检定结果行动。它会尽其所能攻击你的对手。
幼年：生物体型增大一级，天生防御增加 3，力量和体质获得 +4 加值，敏捷减值 -2。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Some creatures can transform themselves into whirlwinds and remain in that form for up to 1 round for every 2 HD they have. A creature in whirlwind form cannot make its normal attacks and does not threaten the area around it. Creatures caught in the whirlwind take a –4 penalty to Dexterity and a –2 penalty on attack rolls and must succeed on a concentration check (DC 15 + spell level) to cast a spell. An affected creature must succeed on a Reflex save (DC 10 + half monster's HD + the monster's Strength modifier) each round or take damage as if it were hit by the creatures spike attack, plus the same amount of damage dice as cold damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 有些生物可以将自己变成旋风，并且每拥有 2 个 HD 就可以保持这种形态长达 1 回合。处于旋风形态的生物无法发动普通攻击，也不会对周围区域造成威胁。卷入旋风中的生物会受到敏捷-4的惩罚，攻击投掷-2的惩罚，并且必须通过专注检定（DC 15 + 法术等级）才能施法。受影响的生物必须在每一轮反射豁免（DC 10 + 一半怪物的 HD + 怪物的力量修正值）中成功，否则就会受到伤害，就像被怪物的尖刺攻击击中一样，外加与寒冷伤害相同数量的伤害骰子。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Whirlwind of Hail
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 冰雹旋风

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This spell summons to your side 1d3 natural advanced leopards. The summoned allies appear where you designate and acts according to its initiative check results. It attacks your opponents to the best of its ability.
Advanced: Creature has natural armor increased by 2, gains a +4 bonus all ability scores (except Int scores of 2 or less).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
这个法术会召唤 1d3 只高等花豹到你身边。被召唤的盟友出现在你指定的地方，并根据其先攻检定结果行动。它会尽其所能攻击你的对手。
高等：生物的天生防御增加 2，获得所有属性值的 +4 加值（智力值不超过 2 除外）。

This spell summons to your side 1d3 natural giant smilodons. The summoned allies appear where you designate and acts according to its initiative check results. It attacks your opponents to the best of its ability.
Giant: Creature is one size category larger, has natural armor increased by 3, gains a +4 bonus to strength and constitution, and a -2 penalty to dexterity.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
这个法术会召唤 1d3 只巨型剑齿虎到你身边。被召唤的盟友出现在你指定的地方，并根据其先攻检定结果行动。它会尽其所能攻击你的对手。
幼年：生物体型增大一级，天生防御增加 3，力量和体质获得 +4 加值，敏捷减值 -2。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You see truth in the pure and burning light of the sun, and can call upon its blessing or wrath to work great deeds.
Sun's Blessing: Whenever you channel positive energy to harm undead creatures, add your level in the class that gave you access to this domain to the damage dealt. Undead do not add their channel resistance to their saves when you channel positive energy.
Nimbus of Light: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot nimbus of light for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Any hostile creature within this radius must succeed at a Fortitude save to resist the effects of this aura. If the creature fails, it is blinded until it leaves the area of the spell. A creature that has resisted the effect cannot be affected again by this particular aura. In addition, undead within this radius take an amount of damage equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain each round that they remain inside the nimbus. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你在纯净而灼热的日光中洞悉真理，并能借助它的祝福或怒火来达成伟大的壮举。
阳光祝福：当你引导正向能量{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}不死生物时，可以造成等于赋予你此领域的职业等级的额外伤害。不死生物在进行{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}对抗你所引导的正向能量时，它们的引导抗性不会生效。
光晕：在8级时，你可发出30英尺范围的光晕，每天可持续的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。任何处于此范围内的敌对生物必须进行强韧豁免检定，以抵抗此灵光的效果。如果豁免失败，则该生物将持续目盲，直至离开该{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}的范围。成功抵抗该效果的生物将不会再次被同一个灵光影响。此外，不死生物如果一直处于光晕范围内，每轮都会受到伤害，伤害量等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。生效轮次无需连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sun Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 太阳领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You see truth in the pure and burning light of the sun, and can call upon its blessing or wrath to work great deeds.
Sun's Blessing: Whenever you channel positive energy to harm undead creatures, add your level in the class that gave you access to this domain to the damage dealt. Undead do not add their channel resistance to their saves when you channel positive energy.
Nimbus of Light: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot nimbus of light for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Any hostile creature within this radius must succeed at a Fortitude save to resist the effects of this aura. If the creature fails, it is blinded until it leaves the area of the spell. A creature that has resisted the effect cannot be affected again by this particular aura. In addition, undead within this radius take an amount of damage equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain each round that they remain inside the nimbus. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
Domain Spells: faerie fire, see invisibility, searing light, shield of dawn, flame strike, chains of light, sunbeam, sunburst, elemental swarm (fire).

领域法术：妖火，识破隐形，炽热光辉，曙光护盾，炽焰击，链状闪电，阳炎光束，阳炎爆，召集元素（火）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Sun: You are immune to the blindness, dazed, and dazzled conditions.Any enemies that attack you with melee weapons find their vision obscured by divine sun-rays (50% miss chance).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
太阳：你免疫目盲、眩晕和目眩。任何用近战武器攻击你的敌人都会发现他们的视线被神圣的太阳射线遮挡（50% 失手几率）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Sun Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 太阳领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
In melee combat, you can help your allies attack or defend by distracting or interfering with an opponent. If you’re in position to make a melee attack on an opponent you can attempt to aid your allies against that enemy as a swift action. The distracted enemy is inflicted with a -1 penalty to either their AC against the next attack by your allies, or a -1 penalty on their next attack roll against your allies. This penalty only applies to the first attack roll and is removed after 1 round. 
This penalty does not stack with the standard aid another penalty.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在近战中，您可以通过分散或干扰对手来帮助您的盟友进攻或防御。如果你处于对对手进行近战攻击的位置，你可以尝试以一个迅捷动作帮助你的盟友对抗该敌人。分心的敌人在对抗你盟友的下一次攻击时，他们的 AC 将受到 -1 惩罚，或者在他们对你盟友的下一次攻击检定中受到 -1 惩罚。此惩罚仅适用于第一次攻击掷骰，并在 1 轮后移除。该处罚不与标准援助的另一处罚叠加。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Swift Aid Another
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 迅速援助

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Swift Aid Another - Defence
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 迅速援助 - 分心攻击

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
With a quick but harmless swipe, you can aid an ally’s assault. 
As a swift action, you can attempt the aid another action, granting your enemy either a -1 penalty on their next attack roll or a -1 bonus to their AC. This ability still confers any extra effects your standard aid another ability would.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 通过快速但无害的一击，您可以协助盟友的攻击。以一个迅捷动作，你可以尝试援助盟友，使你的敌人在他们的下一次攻击检定上获得 -1 减值或在他们的 AC 上获得 -1 加值。此能力仍会赋予您的标准辅助其他能力所具有的任何额外效果。
