LocalizedStrings.enGB: Although the Eldest rarely have adherents as other deities do, they still occasionally require mortal agents to advance their aims. Sworn of the Eldest consider their chosen Eldest to be akin to powerful patrons or fey royalty and serve them faithfully.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 虽然长老很少像其他神灵那样拥有信徒，但他们偶尔还是需要凡人的代理人来推进他们的目标。原初誓约者认为他们所选择的长老就像强大的赞助人或费尔德王族，并忠实地为他们服务。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Resistant to the tricky ways of other fey, a sworn of the Eldest gains the resist nature’s lure druid class feature.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 抵御其他精类的诡计，原初誓约者会获得抵御自然诱惑的德鲁伊类特性。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Feywatcher
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 妖精守望者

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sworn of the Eldest
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 原初誓约者

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Horseman of War, Angel of Desolation, Seraph of Devastation
Alignment: Neutral Evil 
Areas of Concern: War 
Domains: Evil, Fire, Strength, War 
Subdomains: Blood, Daemon, Ferocity, Tactics 
Favoured Weapon: Greatsword 
Holy Symbol: Pale hand and black sword 
Sacred Animal: Horse, vulture   
Like an enormous weeping angel, the Horseman of War stands triumphant over the battlefield, blood running in rivers down the black blade of her terrible sword. She is no leader of the righteous, but a warrior for the sake of making war. Under her banner, the vulture-headed purrodaemons lead great crusades against existence itself, laying waste to entire worlds, bound to their grim campaign until the cosmos finally heaves its last convulsive breath and expires into nothingness.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：战争驭手座、荒芜天使、毁灭撒拉弗
排列方式：中立邪恶 
关注领域：
领域：邪恶、火焰、力量、战争 
次领域：血腥、恶魔、凶残、战术 
最喜爱的武器：大剑 
神圣象征：苍白的手和黑色的剑 
圣兽：马、秃鹫 
战争骑士像一个巨型的哭泣天使，胜利地站在战场上，鲜血顺着她可怕的黑色剑刃流淌成河。她不是正义的领袖，而是为战争而战的战士。在她的旗帜下，秃鹫头的嘌呤恶魔们领导着针对存在本身的伟大征战，毁灭了整个世界，将它们束缚在残酷的战役中，直到宇宙最终喘出最后一口气，化为虚无。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Szuriel
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 莎祖瑞尔

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Aurulent Eye   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Night, Owls, Watchfulness   
Domains: Animal, Darkness, Good, Law   
Subdomains: Archon, Feather, Moon, Night   
Favoured Weapon: Kukri   
Holy Symbol: Shadowed golden eye   
Sacred Animal: Owl   
Tanagaar watches from the darkness, always alert for evil working under the cloak of night. His great golden eyes never close, and his sharp beak and fierce talons are always ready to tear apart those who challenge him. In his true form, Tanagaar is a giant owl, 14 feet tall, with luminous golden eyes; it is said that he can swivel his head in any direction and can see perfectly at any distance. Tanagaar's plumage is dusky platinum gray tipped with inky black, perfect for melding into the shadows of the forest. His beak and talons shine like platinum as well, but are actually cold iron, and never catch the moonlight to betray his position. Lookouts, guards, and forest wardens all pay homage to the Aurulent Eye. The empyreal lord is as concerned with law as any archon, and his influence envelopes borders, watchtowers, and wild preserves. His servants frown on poaching, but if such illegal hunting is done unwittingly or out of desperation, these celestial agents typically send poachers away with a stern warning and perhaps an offer of lawful aid. Poachers or trappers who leave wounded animals in distress or use cruel hunting tactics face the full wrath of Tanagaar's faithful. Guards who find themselves overwhelmed while defending legitimate borders may find unexpected aid from Tanagaar, and more than one border conflict has seen the tide of battle turn because of hundreds of screeching owls swooping down on the unlawful assailants. Tanagaar concerns himself with watching the borders of Heaven from the depths of the Unbent Forest on the lowest slopes of the mountain. There he maintains a force ofhound archon s couts who assist him in patrolling and defending their divine realm.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：黄金眼
阵营：守序善良
神职：夜晚、猫头鹰、警戒
领域：动物、黑暗、善良、守序
子领域：亚空、飞羽、月、暗夜
偏好武器：反曲刀
圣徽：暗影金眼
圣兽：猫头鹰
塔那加在黑暗中守望，时刻警惕在黑夜的掩护下行事的邪恶。他金色的大眼睛从不闭上，锋利的喙和凶猛的爪子随时准备撕裂挑战他的人。在他的真实形态下，塔那加是一只巨型的猫头鹰，14 英尺高，有着明亮的金色眼睛；据说他可以向任何方向旋转头部，并且可以在任何距离上都能看得很清楚。 塔那加的羽毛是暗淡的铂灰色，末端带有墨黑色，非常适合融入森林的阴影中。他的喙和爪子也像铂金一样闪耀，但实际上是冰冷的铁，月光从不暴露他的位置。瞭望台、守卫和森林管理员都向黄金眼致敬。
至高天领主与任何亚空一样关心秩序，他的影响力笼罩着边境、瞭望塔和野生保护区。他的仆人对偷猎不屑一顾，但如果这种非法狩猎是无意或出于绝望而进行的，这些信徒通常会在严厉警告并可能提供守序援助的情况下将偷猎者赶走。让受伤的动物陷入困境或使用残虐的狩猎策略的偷猎者或捕猎者将面临塔那加信徒的愤怒。在保卫边界时发现自己不知所措的卫兵可能会从塔那加那里得到意想不到的帮助，不止一场边界冲突因为数百只尖叫的猫头鹰猛扑向非法袭击者而导致战局发生转变。
塔那加关心的是从山坡最低处的不屈森林深处观察天堂的边界。在那里，他维持着一支猎犬亚空的侦察部队，协助他巡逻和保卫他们的神圣领域。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Tanagaar
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 塔那加

LocalizedStrings.enGB: TempImprovedUnarmedStrikeBuff

Creature gains spell resistance equal to its level +5. It also gains:
1 — 4 HD: resistance 5 to cold and fire.
5 — 10 HD: resistance 10 to cold and fire, DR 5/good
11+ HD: resistance 15 to cold and fire, DR 10/good
Smite Good (Su): Once per day, the fiendish creature may smite a good-aligned creature. As a swift action, the creature chooses one target within sight to smite. If this target is good, the creature adds its Charisma bonus (if any) to attack rolls and gains a damage bonus equal to its HD against that foe. This effect persists until the target is dead or the creature rests.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
生物获得等于其等级+5的法术抗力。它还获得：
1——4 HD：对寒冷和火焰的抵抗力 5。
5 — 10 HD：对寒冷和火焰的抵抗力 10，DR 5/善良
11+ HD：对寒冷和火焰的抵抗力 15，DR 10/善良
惩戒善良（Su）：每天一次，恶魔生物可以惩戒善良阵营生物。以一个迅捷动作，该生物选择视野内的一个目标进行打击。如果这个目标是善良的，那么该生物将其魅力加值（如果有的话）加到攻击检定上，并获得等于其对那个敌人的 HD 的伤害加值。此效果持续到目标死亡或生物休息为止。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Fiendish Template
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 炼狱模板

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Until the target of the smite is dead
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 直到惩戒的目标死亡

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day, the fiendish creature may smite a good-aligned creature. As a swift action, the creature chooses one target within sight to smite. If this target is good, the creature adds its Charisma bonus (if any) to attack rolls and gains a damage bonus equal to its HD against that foe. This effect persists until the target is dead or the creature rests.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，炼狱生物可以惩戒善良阵营的生物。以一个迅捷动作，该生物选择视野内的一个目标进行打击。如果这个目标是好目标，该生物将其魅力加值（如果有的话）加到攻击检定上，并获得等于其对那个敌人的 HD 的伤害加值。该效果持续到目标死亡或生物休息为止。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Smite Good
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 惩戒善良

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A temple champion is a powerful warrior dedicated to a good or lawful deity. She thinks of herself primarily as a servant of her deity and secondarily as an agent of her deity’s church. She has a refined understanding of a specific aspect of that faith and gives up standard paladin spellcasting in favor of a warpriest’s domain-based blessings and granted powers.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 圣殿冠军是一位强大的战士，献身于一个善良或守序的神祇。她认为自己首先是她的神灵的仆人，其次是她神灵教会的代理人。她对这种信仰的特定方面有着深刻的理解，并放弃了标准的圣武士施法，转而支持战争祭司基于领域的祝福和授予的力量。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Temple Champion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 圣殿冠军

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Constant wearing of the Temples armor has reduced its effect on movement, the Temple Champion gains Armored Swiftness at level 4 and Improved Armored Swiftness at level 12.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 持续穿着神殿盔甲降低了它对移动的影响，圣殿冠军在 4 级获得盔甲迅捷，在 12 级获得精通盔甲迅捷。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Temple Armor
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 圣殿盔甲

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Primordial Poison   
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Ageing, Poison, Venomous creatures  
Domains: Healing, Magic, Repose, Scalykind 
Favoured Weapon: Chakram (Starknife) 
Holy Symbol: Circle pierced by two vertical lines  
When Pharasma saw that mortals loved life too dearly to part with it when their time came, she reached down, lifted up an asp, and reshaped it into the usher Teshallas. The Primordial Poison’s venom—age—would flow through the veins of all mortals and slowly rob them of memory, passion, and vitality until they eventually welcomed the embrace of death. Many curse the usher’s name and regard them as an example of Pharasma’s indifference and cruelty, but others recognize that poison is in the dose, and that those fluids that kill can also bring life. Teshallas’s embrace allows mortals to grow and mature, to discover experiences and wisdom that eluded them earlier in life. While Dammar serves as the usher of doctors and healers, Teshallas is patron of herbalists and others who refine nature’s poisons into potent medicines. They are also the usher most associated with scaly folk, and they manage the souls of kobolds, lizardfolk, serpentfolk, and other cold-blooded sapients. The Primordial Poison manifests as a serpent devouring their own tail, supported by four feathered wings not physically connected to their looping body. Teshallas often wanders the Ethereal Plane but resides in the Bower Antimony, a greenhouse brimming with poisonous plants and extreme temperatures. Worshippers often maintain their own small gardens of poisonous plants in homage and use their crops to distill a variety of medicines.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：原始毒药 
阵营：绝对中立 形态：招魂使 
领域：衰老、毒药、有毒生物 
领域：治疗、魔法、安眠、鳞类 
偏好武器：飞轮（星刃） 
圣徽：被两条垂直线刺穿的圆圈 当 Pharasma 看到凡人对生命的热爱太深，以至于当他们的时间到来时不会放弃它，她伸手，举起一根木棍，把它重新塑造成引座员 Teshallas。原始毒药的毒液——年龄——会在所有凡人的血管中流淌，慢慢地夺走他们的记忆、激情和活力，直到他们最终迎来死亡的拥抱。许多人破敌引座员的名字，并认为他们是法拉斯玛冷漠和残忍的一个例子，但其他人承认毒药在剂量中，那些杀死的液体也可以带来生命。 Teshallas 的拥抱让凡人得以成长和成熟，发现他们早年无法获得的经验和感知。 Dammar 是医生和治疗师的引路人，而 Teshallas 则是草药师和其他将大自然的毒药提炼成强效药物的人的守护神。他们也是与有鳞的人联系最紧密的引座员，他们管理狗头人、蜥蜴人、蛇人和其他冷血感知生物的灵魂。原始毒药表现为一条吞食自己尾巴的蛇，由四只羽毛翅膀支撑，这些翅膀与它们的环状身体没有物理连接。 Teshallas 经常在以太位面徘徊，但居住在 Bower Antimony，这是一个充满有毒植物和极端温度的温室。崇拜者经常维护自己的有毒植物小花园以示敬意，并使用他们的作物来蒸馏各种药物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Teshallas
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 特沙拉斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB: In the early days, there were older gods whose existence dwarfed even those who helped shape the course of written history. These are the unimaginably ancient and inconceivably potent Great Old Ones, who in turn serve and worship the even greater Outer Gods. Scholars call these entities by many names, but on Golarion, their faiths and the entities themselves are known as the Elder Mythos. Worshipped primarily by the mad or desperate, the knowledge gained from gazing into the Dark Tapestry will often break even the strongest mind, freeing it to maddening truth.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
葛拉利昂神祇繁多，虽然其中一些仍属新晋者，但另外一些则可追溯至数千年前。那些在阿兹兰特的缔造者们为新生帝国制定规划之时就受人崇拜者，有一些时至今日仍受尊崇。但即是在当时，更古老的神祇也早已存在，祂们的存在甚至连那些塑造历史的神祇也相形见绌。而这些远古得难以想象且伟力超凡的旧日支配者们继而服务和崇拜那些更为伟大的外神。学者们以各种名字称呼这些实体，但在格拉里昂，祂们的信仰和实体本身被称作古老神话。
旧日支配者与外神并不居于伟大彼岸的外层位面。其中一些到访或栖身在与这些遥远位面邻接的区域或维度之中，但构成古老神群的绝大多数实体都存在于物质位面。然而祂们绝不属于凡俗。死亡无法触及旧日支配者，纵使被击败，祂们也仅仅是落入眠梦，等待终会到来的时机再次苏醒实现其意志。而外神亦属永在。早在初次受到窥探之时，祂们的影响留下的痕迹便已随处可见。某些学者认为外神比旧日支配者更为古老，早在时间之前便已存在，祂们引领了法莱斯玛的诞生，生命与死亡的概念由此出现。墓土女士的信徒认为这些理论亵渎神灵，然而她最为聪慧的神职人员却深知不要深入研究，因为即使是最为坚定的法拉兹玛信徒也无法接受真相。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Elder Mythos
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 古神

LocalizedStrings.enGB: When the gods abandoned the First World to focus their attentions on the Material Plane and the cycle of souls, they left behind a power vacuum. The fey were like children abandoned by their parents, and like those children, they fought and despaired, tormenting each other in hopes that an authority would appear to make them stop.Into this void stepped the realm’s most powerful remaining residents, creatures that might as well have been gods in the minds of the average fey.Seeking all the same boons that had drawn them to the faith of the original gods—safety, belonging, knowledge, power—the common people not only served these great beings, but worshiped them.In time, these powerful fey learned the trick of granting spells to their worshipers, and thus the Eldest became gods in truth.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当神明们抛弃第一世界的时候，精类的国度陷入了混乱，直到它们之中的最强者站了出来取得了权力，混乱才最终停歇。在漫长的时间过后，这些遗留下来的始祖成为了真正的神明。这些始祖中包括流亡的叛徒伯爵莱诺克，秀色可餐的绿母，巨型的双重存在因博莱克斯，拨弄是非的灯王，孤独的失落王子，明察秋毫的玛芙，神秘的流浪者无，神话般的海洋之主拉格达恩，还有时间的主人塞卡。透过它们的代理人，后裔，以及深远的计划，始祖们影响着格拉利昂的诸多地区。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Eldest
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 妖精始祖

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Feasting Flower, The Hungry Blossom   
Alignment: Neutral Evil   
Areas of Concern: Carnivorous plants, Intrigue, Seduction   
Domains: Charm, Earth, Evil, Plant   
Subdomains: Caves, Decay, Growth, Lust   
Favoured Weapon: Sickle   
Holy Symbol: Sensual, female, briar-wrapped lips   
Sacred Animal: None (carnivorous plants)   
From the elegant flower that draws in the bee to the bioluminescent lures that call deep-sea fish to the slaughter, seduction is an integral part of the natural world, bringing both pleasure and pain. No creature embodies this idea better than the Green Mother. The Green Mother resembles a beautiful humanoid woman with bark-like skin and green hair, her features a constantly shifting mix of elf, dryad, and nymph. As befits the Eldest most associated with simplistic human ideas of nature, her body regularly changes to incorporate natural features: hands becoming gnarled roots, hair becoming a literal waterfall, or skin suddenly becoming a mirror-smooth pond capable of sucking in and drowning an unfortunate lover. Travelers from beyond the First World are often quick to cast the Green Mother in one of two lights: either as the villainous temptress of morality plays or as the equally deadly seductress of bawdy tales (contributing to such thinly veiled sobriquets as "The Feasting Flower" and "The Hungry Blossom"). Yet the Green Mother is not merely a creature of lust. Rather, she is the seduction of nature incarnate, the caution to the unwary. She is the rolling landscape that calls to the wanderer, the primal need that leads salmon to spawn and die, the mantis gnawing on the corpse of her mate. She is both the flower’s bloom and the inevitable death that follows. To attempt to define her via mortal concepts of morality is to miss the point entirely. She is a master puppeteer, pulling strings that affect events even far beyond the First World’s borders. Though her sense of humor is dark, and many see evil in her tricks and traps, the Green Mother sees herself as merely impartial, helping to guide natural selection by uncovering and exploiting weaknesses. If the practice amuses her as well, surely she deserves such a small reward.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：盛宴之花，饥饿之花
阵营：中立邪恶
神职：藤蔓植物、阴谋、色诱
领域：魅惑，大地，邪恶，植物
子领域：洞窟，腐朽，滋长，情欲
偏好武器：镰刀
圣徽：性感，被荆棘包裹的女性嘴唇 
圣兽：无（食肉植物）
从吸引蜜蜂的优雅花朵到召唤深海鱼类屠宰的生物发光诱饵，诱惑是自然界不可或缺的一部分，既能带来愉悦也带来痛苦。
没有任何生物比绿母更能体现这一理念。绿母是个高大美丽的女人，留有一头绿色的波浪发，就像一个介于宁芙、精灵和树精之间的生物。最与人类对自然的简单印象相得益彰的始祖，她的身体会定期变化以融入自然特征：手变成粗糙的根，头发变成真正的瀑布，或者皮肤突然变成镜面一般光滑的池塘，能够吸入并淹死一对不幸的情人。
来自第一世界以外的旅行者通常很快就将绿母描绘成两种角色中的一种：要么作为道德剧中的邪恶诱惑者，要么作为同样致命的淫秽故事的诱惑者（这导致了“盛宴之花”和“饥饿之花”等几乎不加掩饰的头衔：）。
然而，绿母不仅仅是欲望的产物。相反，她是自然诱惑的化身，对粗心之人的谨慎。她是呼唤流浪者的绵延风景，是导致鲑鱼产卵和死亡的原始需求，是螳螂啃噬伙伴尸体的需求。她既是花朵的绽放，也是随之而来的不可避免的死亡。试图通过凡人的道德观念来定义她是不得要领的。
她是一位大师级的木偶师，甚至可以影响远在第一世界边界之外的事件。尽管她的幽默感是黑暗的，而且许多人认为她的技艺和陷阱是邪恶的，但绿母认为自己只是公正的，通过发现和利用弱点来帮助引导自然选择。如果这种做法也能让她感到开心，那么她理应得到这么些许的嘉奖。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Green Mother
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 绿母

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Laughing Lie   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Laughter, Mischief, Transformation   
Domains: Chaos, Charm, Madness, Trickery   
Subdomains: Deception, Love, Lust, Thievery   
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Golden lantern   
Sacred Animal: Firefly   
Even on a plane filled with tricksters and illusions, the Lantern King is a prankster without peer, making the lives of those he touches more interesting—often at their expense. The Lantern King usually appears as a 1-foot-wide ball of floating golden light that shifts in color when making a point or expressing emotion, sometimes circled by glowing runes in the shape of a coronet. His form has led many to suggest that he was the original archetype for lantern archons or else the progenitor of all will-o’-wisps—both claims he laughs off without answering. Other than his name, the only outward sign of the Lantern King’s gender is his voice, a booming, merry baritone. While his preferred form as a ball of light is his most common and thus presumably true appearance, the Lantern King is also fond of transforming into the shapes of other creatures for the purposes of mischief, up to and including impersonating other Eldest. According to the Laughing Lie, his sole purpose is to make the First World less boring, preferably with the injection of a little good-natured chaos and confusion. Unfortunately for the plane’s other residents, what amuses the Lantern King isn’t always comfortable or pleasant, and even his “good-natured” pranks can be deeply inconvenient. For instance, the Laughing Lie might help a man whose house burns down by hiding a valuable magical sword in the ashes or the Eldest might transform the man into a fish, so that he need never fear fire again.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：微笑谎言
阵营：混乱中立
神职：欢笑者、恶作剧、转化 
领域：混乱、魅惑、疯狂、诡计
子领域：欺骗、爱慕、情欲、盗窃 
偏好武器：匕首
圣徽：金灯笼
圣兽：偶数萤火虫
在对于第一世界的原生种族来说，反复无常的作风和违反常理的恶作剧司空见惯，而要在这样的一个世界里选出一位诡计之神的话，那一定非也被称为“微笑谎言”的灯王莫属了。
灯王通常表现为一个 1 英尺宽的漂浮金色光球，在提出观点或表达情感时会发生颜色变化，有时会被皇冠形状的发光符文环绕。
他的形态让许多人认为他是灯笼亚空的初始原型，或者是所有鬼火的祖先——两种说法他都一笑置之，不予回答。
除了他的名字，灯王的性别唯一的外在标志就是他的声音，一个低沉、欢快的男中音。虽然他最喜欢而且最常见的外形是光球，因此可能是真实的外表，但灯王也喜欢为了恶作剧而变成其他生物的外貌，甚至包括模仿其他始祖。
按照微笑谎言的说法，他唯一的目的是让第一世界不那么无聊，最好是注入一点善意的混乱和困惑。不幸的是，对于计划里的其他居民来说，灯王的娱乐并不总是那么舒适或愉快，甚至他的“善意”恶作剧也可能非常不便。譬如，微笑谎言可能会帮助一个房屋被烧毁的人，在灰烬中藏一把珍贵的魔法剑，或者始祖可能会将这个人变成一条鱼，这样他就再也不用害怕火了。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Lantern King
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 灯王

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Melancholy Lord   
Alignment: Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Forgotten things, Sadness, Solitude   
Domains: Knowledge, Madness, Nobility, Repose   
Subdomains: Ancestors, Insanity, Martyr, Memory   
Favoured Weapon: Quarterstaff   
Holy Symbol: Crumbling black tower   
Sacred Animal: Raven   
While no one can claim to know the origins of the Eldest, the Lost Prince is persistently rumored to be the only one not from the First World. The nature of his birthplace—some world far distant on the Material Plane, a demiplane long since lost to the Maelstrom, or another reality entirely—is a subject of much whispered debate, as is the question of why he left, and when and how he might someday return. Whether or not it’s his original form, the Lost Prince always appears to his subjects as a pale human man dressed all in black, with completely black eyes and a mess of unruly black hair. The only bits of color are the glowing red symbols that seem tattooed across his brow in a coronet-like band, or the similarly glowing 4-pointed star on the back of each hand. Despite being painfully gaunt, the Lost Prince has delicate features that might be handsome, if not for his constant frown. Famous for his constant melancholy, the Lost Prince nevertheless has a large coterie of devoted servants and followers. While the love of these attendants might seem unwarranted by the thankless Eldest, the truth is that the Lost Prince has a tendency to quietly aid those who share his depression, particularly those who have lost their homes or families. He never admits to such acts, and those he helps receive the same surface-level disdain as all others, yet those who have found a second home in his court are fierce in their defense of his character. Though the Lost Prince himself rarely expresses much enthusiasm about anything, he has a keen interest in information about planar travel and the history of the multiverse.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：忧郁之主
阵营：绝对中立 
神职：被遗忘之物、悲伤、孤独 
领域：知识、疯狂、崇高、宁静 
子领域：先祖、狂乱、殉难、记忆
偏好武器：铁头木棒（木棍） 
圣徽：摇摇欲坠的黑塔
圣兽：乌鸦
没有人可以声称知道长老的来历，一直有传言说失落王子是唯一一个不是来自第一世界的人。他的出生地的性质——在物质位面遥远的某个世界，一个早已被大漩涡迷失的半位面，或者完全是另一个现实——是一个备受争议的话题，就像他为什么离开、何时以及如何离开的问题一样他可能有一天会回来。
不管是不是他的原形，迷失王子在他的臣民面前总是以一袭黑衣、全黑的眼睛和一头凌乱的黑发的苍白人类的形象出现。唯一的色彩是发亮的红色符号，看起来像皇冠一样纹在他的额头上，或者是每只手背上同样发亮的四角星。尽管憔悴得令人悲伤，但失落王子拥有精致的五官，如果不是因为他经常皱眉头，可能会很英俊。
失落王子以他一贯的忧郁而闻名，但仍有一大群忠诚的仆人和追随者。虽然这些侍从似乎吃力不讨好的爱戴在始祖看来是毫无根据的，但事实是，失落王子倾向于悄悄地帮助那些与他有同样抑郁症的人，尤其是那些失去家园或家人的人。他从不承认这种行为，他帮助的人与其他人一样受到表面上的蔑视，但那些在他的宫廷中找到第二故乡的人却为他的性格辩护。
虽然失落王子本人很少对任何事情表现出太多热情，但他对有关位面旅行和多元宇宙历史的信息有着浓厚的兴趣。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Lost Prince
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 失落王子

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Lash and the Plough   
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Beasts of burden, Duty, Revenge 
Domains: Death, Repose, Travel, Water  
Favoured Weapon: Trident   
Holy Symbol: Horizontal line with a circle and three dots at one end  
Once, the Pale Horse rode the Astral Plane and poached souls without remorse from the River of Souls, gorging on suffering; accounts conflict if this abominable entity were a daemonic harbinger or a Horseman. Yet as the Pale Horse grew fat off mortal suffering, he also grew discontent. The pressures of freedom, the burden of leadership, and the weight of every choice shackled his heart and soured his meals. In a moment of weakness, he faltered in his daemonic nature and sought service. Pharasma offered the Pale Horse respite until he saved half again as many souls as he had damned. The Pale Horse prostrated himself before the Lady of Graves and wept in joy, freed now from his burden of choice. The Pale Horse has since become Pharasma’s avenging angel, hunting those who steal from the River of Souls as he once did. He luxuriates in his duties and obeys the tenants set forth by Pharasma, and his soldiers likewise obey without question. He represents both the pain and the bounty in servitude, guiding both those who die in service and those who die unattended and alone thanks to their own miserable choices. His wrath is legendary, especially in regard to daemons, and Abaddon long ago struck the Lash and the Plough’s true name from its monuments and libraries. Despite his apparent loyalty, some among the psychopomps worry the Pale Horse remains a daemon at his core, and that upon completion of his sentence he will visit an equally terrible vengeance upon the Boneyard. The Pale Horse appears as a powerful white stallion, missing its head save for a disembodied skull and a floating crown of flames, though he sometimes appears as a silent rider on a white horse.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：鞭笞和犁 
阵营：绝对中立 
形态：招魂使 
领域：驮兽、职责、复仇 
领域：死亡、安眠、旅行、水 
偏好武器：三叉戟 
圣徽：带圆圈和三个点的水平线有一次，苍白的马骑着星界，从灵魂之河中毫无悔意地偷猎灵魂，吃尽苦头；如果这个可恶的实体是恶魔预兆或骑士，帐户就会发生冲突。然而，随着苍白马因凡人的痛苦而变得肥胖，他也越来越不满。自由的压力，领导的负担，每一个选择的重量，都束缚着他的心，使他的饭菜变酸。在虚弱的时刻，他在他的恶魔本性中颤栗并寻求服务。法拉斯玛让苍白马得以喘息，直到他拯救了他所破敌的灵魂的一半。苍白的马在坟墓夫人面前俯伏，高兴地哭了，现在从他选择的负担中解脱了出来。苍白的马从此成为了法拉斯玛的复仇天使，像他曾经那样追捕那些从灵魂之河偷窃的人。他尽职尽责，服从法拉斯玛规定的佃户，他的士兵同样毫无疑问地服从。他既代表了奴役中的痛苦和恩惠，也指导了那些因服务而死的人，以及那些因自己悲惨的选择而在无人看管的情况下独自死去的人。他的愤怒是传奇的，尤其是在恶魔方面，而阿巴顿很久以前就从它的纪念碑和图书馆中发现了鞭笞和犁的真名。尽管他显然很忠诚，但一些精神病患者担心苍白马在他的核心仍然是一个恶魔，并且在他完成判决后，他将对墓地进行同样可怕的报复。苍白马看起来像一匹强大的白色种马，除了一个没有实体的头骨和一个漂浮的火焰冠冕外，没有了它的头，尽管他有时看起来像一匹白马上的沉默的骑手。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Pale Horse
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 苍白之马

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are a master of thievery, both in the name of your god and yourself. Trickery and Stealth are class skills.
Copycat: You can create an illusory double of yourself as a move action. This double functions as a single mirror image, and lasts for a number of rounds equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain, or until the illusory duplicate is dispelled or destroyed. You can have no more than one copycat at a time. This ability does not stack with the mirror image spell. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Thief of the Gods: At 8th level, you can make grant yourself the ability to roll twice on any trickery skill check, this abilities effect lasts until used then dispels itself. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, plus one additional time per day for every 2 levels beyond 8th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
以你的神祇和你自己的名义，你是个盗窃大师。巧手和隐匿是你的本职技能。
复制幻象：你可以用一个移动动作制造一个与自身极为相似的幻象。此幻象如同单个的“镜影术”般生效，并持续等同于你的牧师等级的轮数，或直到该复制幻象被解除或毁灭。你同时只能拥有一个复制幻象。此能力与镜影术无法同时生效。你每日可使用本能力的次数为“3+感知修正”。
神偷：到了8级当你进行巧手检定之时，可自由动作发动此能力双投取高。此能力在8级能每天用1次，每比8级高2级多1次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Thievery Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 盗窃子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lord of Divine Words   
Alignment: Lawful Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Magic, Moon, Wisdom, Writing   
Domains: Darkness, Knowledge, Law, Magic, Rune   
Subdomains: Arcane, Language, Inevitable, Memory, Moon, Wards   
Favoured Weapon: Sickle   
Holy Symbol: Scroll with lunar disk and crescent   
Sacred Animal: Ibis   
All knowledge and wisdom comes from Thoth, the god of science, mathematics, history, philosophy, religion, and wisdom. He is also god of the moon and magic, particularly arcane magic. Thoth is also the patron of language, literature, and writing, and is said to have invented the hieroglyphs first used by Ancient Osirian scribes and that are still used, in modified form, in the modern Osiriani language. He is the reckoner of years, recording the passage of time and details of all the events of life, from the honorable reigns of kings to the simple daily lives of peasants. Thoth normally takes the form of a man with the head of an ibis, though occasionally his form is that of a seated baboon or even a man with the head of a baboon. He is the husband of Maat, the goddess of order and truth, and he serves as secretary and counselor to Ra. It was Thoth who gave Isis the magic words she used to resurrect her dead husband Osiris. He is the scribe of the gods, and mediates between them fairly in their disputes. Thoth is the patron of archivists, scribes, researchers, and scholars, and alchemists, witches, and wizards all worship him as the god of magic and spells. His temples usually include well-stocked libraries and archives, and often include orders of monks who venerate him for his knowledge and wisdom.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：天书之王
阵营：守序中立
神职：魔法、月亮、睿智、文书
领域：黑暗、知识、守序、魔法、符文
子领域：秘示域、语言、制裁、记忆、月、守护
偏好武器：镰刀
圣徽：绘有月轮与弯月的卷轴
圣兽：朱鹭
天地间的知识与感知皆出自托特，科学、数理、历史、哲学、宗教与睿智之神。祂也是月与魔法之神，具体来说主管奥术。托特也是语言、文学及书简的守护神，传说从古奥西里昂直至今日依然被使用着的象形文字─虽然笔画多少有变─即是出自祂手。祂是岁月的纪录者，记述了时间的流逝以及与众生相关从明君德政到百姓日常的一切事件。
托特一般以朱鹭首男子的姿态示人，但有时也会化身坐着的狒狒或是生著狒狒头的男子形象。祂是秩序与真理之神玛亚特的配偶，并担任拉的秘书和顾问。教授伊西斯如何复活欧西里斯的咒文的正是托特。祂是诸神的书记，在天庭发生纠纷时出面调解。
托特是纪录者、书记、研究家、学者的守护神，炼金术师、巫师及法师也将祂作为魔法与法术之神敬拜。祂的神庙一般附设藏书齐全的图书馆或资料库，也常住着一批因其知识与睿智而供奉祂的武僧。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Thoth
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 托特

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Snow-Strider   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Cold, Frozen wilds, Survival   
Domains: Chaos, Good, Travel, Water   
Subdomains: Azata, Exploration, Ice, Storms   
Favoured Weapon: Javelin   
Holy Symbol: Antlers and ice javelin   
Sacred Animal: Caribou   
Tole is master of the frozen lands, where people struggle daily to survive the harsh elements . He gazes favorably upon those who learn to live within this wild domain and appreciate its fierce beauty. Tole stands 7 feet tall and has a stout but muscular figure. His light brown skin always holds a rosy flush, as though the empyreal lord had just stepped in from the cold. Numerous scars mar his broad face, which constantly sports a stern expression, though a kind light occasionally warms his hardened gaze. From his back stretch two arching tusks carved from celestial ice. Snow-Strider and his agents help worthy individuals struggling to live in cold, inhospitable climes. Many northern cultures credit Tole with teaching their people to build shelters from ice. Tole is a sworn enemy of Kostchtchie, and Tole's champions hone their skills in battle to best combat frost giants and white dragons. On occasion, a mortal champion catches Tole's attention long enough for the empyreal lord to grant this mortal divine strength and tactical knowledge with which to defend her kinsfolk. Tole can sometimes be found in the coldest reaches of Elysium's mountains, but his followers on the Material Plane claim to see Snow-Strider in their temple-longhouses with some frequency. Many believe he assumes the guise of a wanderer in need of respite and leaves flecks of gold in the bedding of those who provide him hospitality.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：踏雪者
阵营：混乱善良 
神职：寒冷、冰封荒野、生存
领域：混乱、善良、旅行、流水 
子领域：爱塔、探索、冰、风暴
偏好武器：标枪 
圣徽：鹿角和冰标枪
圣兽: 驯鹿
托克是冻寒土地的主人，人们每天都在为在严酷的环境中生存而奋斗。他看好那些学会在这片荒野中生活并欣赏其凶猛美丽的人。
托克身高 7 英尺，身材结实但肌肉发达。浅褐色的皮肤上，总是带着红润的红晕，仿佛天帝刚刚从寒风中踏来。他宽阔的脸上布满了伤痕，脸上始终带着严厉的表情，尽管偶尔有一丝善意的光芒温暖了他僵硬的目光。从他的背部伸出两根由天冰雕刻而成的拱形獠牙。
踏雪者和他的代理人帮助那些在寒冷、荒凉地区挣扎的有价值的人。许多北方文化认为托尔教他们的人民用冰建造避难所。
托克是阔什提克提凯的死敌，托克的勇士们在战斗中磨练他们的技能，以最好地对抗霜巨人和白龙。有时，一位凡人勇士会引起托尔的注意足够长的时间，让这位至高无上的领主给予这种凡人神圣的力量和战术知识来保护她的亲属。
托克有时会在极乐境山脉最寒冷的地方，但他在物质位面的追随者声称在他们的神殿长屋中经常看到雪行者。许多人认为他伪装成一个需要喘息的流浪者，并在为他提供住所的好客人的床上留下金色的斑点。

阵营：混乱善良 
关注领域：寒冷, 冻寒荒野, 生存 
领域：混沌、善良，旅行、水 
子域：阿扎塔、探索、冰雪、风暴 
最喜爱的武器：标枪 
圣物：鹿角和冰标枪 
神圣动物：驯鹿 
托尔克是冰天雪地的主人，那里的人们每天都在严酷的环境中挣扎求生。他善待那些学会在这片荒野中生活并欣赏其凶猛之美的人。托尔克身高 7 英尺，身材魁梧但肌肉发达。他浅棕色的皮肤总是泛着红润的光泽，就像刚从寒冷中走出来的帝国领主。他宽阔的脸庞上有许多伤疤，始终保持着严厉的表情，但偶尔也会流露出和蔼的光芒，温暖着他坚毅的目光。从他的背上伸出两根天冰雕刻而成的拱形獠牙。雪黾（踏雪者）和他的代理人帮助那些在寒冷、荒凉的环境中挣扎求生的有价值的人。许多北方文化都认为托尔克教会了他们的人民用冰建造庇护所。托尔克是科斯特奇的死敌，托尔克的冠军们在战斗中不断磨练自己的技能，以最好的状态对抗冰霜巨人和白龙。有时，一位凡人冠军会引起托尔克的注意，以至于帝国领主会赐予这位凡人神力和战术知识来保卫她的族人。托尔克有时会出现在极乐世界最寒冷的山区，但他在物质位面的追随者们声称在他们的神庙龙屋里经常能看到雪黾。许多人认为他假扮成需要休息的流浪者，并在招待他的人的被褥中留下金块。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Snow-Strider   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Cold, Frozen wilds, Survival   
Domains: Chaos, Good, Travel, Water   
Subdomains: Azata, Exploration, Ice, Storms   
Favoured Weapon: Javelin   
Holy Symbol: Antlers and ice javelin   
Sacred Animal: Caribou   
Tole is master of the frozen lands, where people struggle daily to survive the harsh elements. He gazes favorably upon those who learn to live within this wild domain and appreciate its fierce beauty. Tole stands 7 feet tall and has a stout but muscular figure. His light brown skin always holds a rosy flush, as though the empyreal lord had just stepped in from the cold. Numerous scars mar his broad face, which constantly sports a stern expression, though a kind light occasionally warms his hardened gaze. From his back stretch two arching tusks carved from celestial ice. Snow-Strider and his agents help worthy individuals struggling to live in cold, inhospitable climes. Many northern cultures credit Tole with teaching their people to build shelters from ice. Tole is a sworn enemy of Kostchtchie, and Tole's champions hone their skills in battle to best combat frost giants and white dragons. On occasion, a mortal champion catches Tole's attention long enough for the empyreal lord to grant this mortal divine strength and tactical knowledge with which to defend her kinsfolk. Tole can sometimes be found in the coldest reaches of Elysium's mountains, but his followers on the Material Plane claim to see Snow-Strider in their temple-longhouses with some frequency. Many believe he assumes the guise of a wanderer in need of respite and leaves flecks of gold in the bedding of those who provide him hospitality.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：踏雪者
阵营：混乱善良 
神职：寒冷、冰封荒野、生存
领域：混乱、善良、旅行、流水 
子领域：爱塔、探索、冰、风暴
偏好武器：标枪 
圣徽：鹿角和冰标枪
圣兽: 驯鹿
托克是冻寒土地的主人，人们每天都在为在严酷的环境中生存而奋斗。他看好那些学会在这片荒野中生活并欣赏其凶猛美丽的人。
托克身高 7 英尺，身材结实但肌肉发达。浅褐色的皮肤上，总是带着红润的红晕，仿佛天帝刚刚从寒风中踏来。他宽阔的脸上布满了伤痕，脸上始终带着严厉的表情，尽管偶尔有一丝善意的光芒温暖了他僵硬的目光。从他的背部伸出两根由天冰雕刻而成的拱形獠牙。
踏雪者和他的代理人帮助那些在寒冷、荒凉地区挣扎的有价值的人。许多北方文化认为托尔教他们的人民用冰建造避难所。
托克是阔什提克提凯的死敌，托克的勇士们在战斗中磨练他们的技能，以最好地对抗霜巨人和白龙。有时，一位凡人勇士会引起托尔的注意足够长的时间，让这位至高无上的领主给予这种凡人神圣的力量和战术知识来保护她的亲属。
托克有时会在极乐境山脉最寒冷的地方，但他在物质位面的追随者声称在他们的神殿长屋中经常看到雪行者。许多人认为他伪装成一个需要喘息的流浪者，并在为他提供住所的好客人的床上留下金色的斑点。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 托克

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 图腾生物

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Beginning at 2nd level, a dreadknight surrounds his hand with a profane flame, causing terrible wounds to open on those he touches. Each day he can use this ability a number of times equal to 1/2 his Dread Knight level + his Charisma modifier. As a touch attack, a dreadknight can cause 1d6 points of damage plus an additional 1d6 points of damage for every two dreadknight levels he possesses. Using this ability is a standard action that does not provoke attacks of opportunity. 
Alternatively, a dreadknight can use this power to heal undead creatures, restoring 1d6 hit points plus an additional 1d6 hit points for every two levels the dreadknight possesses.This ability is modified by any feat, spell, or effect that specifically works with the lay on hands paladin class feature. For example, the Extra Lay On Hands feat grants a dreadknight 2 additional uses of the touch of corruption class feature.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 从第 2 级开始，恐惧骑士使用包裹着酸蚀火焰的手碰触目标造成可怕的溃烂。每天他可以使用此能力的次数等于他的恐惧骑士等级的 1/2 + 他的魅力调整值。恐惧骑士进行接触攻击，造成 1d6 + 额外1d6/每2个恐惧骑士等级的伤害。使用此能力是一个标准动作，不会引发借机攻击。此外，恐惧骑士也可以使用此能力来治疗不死生物，恢复等同于伤害数值的生命值。此能力会受益于任何影响圣武士圣疗能力的专长、法术或效果。例如，额外圣疗专长使恐惧骑士获得 2 次额外使用次数亵渎之炎次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You have been granted temporary health from a allied touch of the moon cure spell. 
This temporary health will be replaced if affected by another instance of touch of the moon.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你已从盟友的触月治愈术中获得临时健康。
如果再次受到触月治愈术的影响，该临时健康值将被替换。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Cure spells are potentially more effective but entirely in the target’s mind. As a free action you may spend a spell slot, the next cure spell you cast this round of the same level will also grant temporary hit points equal to 1d4 + 1 for each d8 that would normally be healed by the spell. Hit points healed this way expire after a number of minutes equal to half your oracle level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 治愈法术可能更有效，但完全取决于目标的意念。作为一个自由行动，你可以花费一个法术槽，在本回合施放的下一个相同等级的治愈法术中，也会给予相当于 1d4 + 1 的临时生命，每个 d8 通常会被该法术治愈。以这种方式治愈的生命会在几分钟后失效，失效时间等于你先知等级的一半。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 治愈法术可能更有效，但完全取决于目标的意念。作为一个自由行动，你可以花费一个法术槽，在本回合施放的下一个相同等级的治愈法术中，也会给予相当于 1d4 + 1 的临时生命，每个 d8 通常会被该法术治愈。以这种方式治愈的生命会在几分钟后失效，失效时间等于你先知等级的一半。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You transmute blood in the target’s body to acid, dealing 1d6 points of acid damage/2 levels (maximum 12d6) each round. The creature is staggered and sickened by the debilitating pain. A successful Fortitude save each round halves the damage and negates the staggered condition for 1 round. Anyone who strikes the target with a non-reach melee weapon, natural weapon, or unarmed attack takes 3d6 points of acid damage as the acidic blood sprays on the attacker. 
This spell has no effect on creatures immune to critical hits or bleed effects.
1 round/5 levels

A successful Fortitude save each round halves the damage and negates the staggered condition for 1 round. Anyone who strikes the target with a non-reach melee weapon, natural weapon, or unarmed attack takes 3d6 points of acid damage as the acidic blood sprays on the attacker. 
This spell has no effect on creatures immune to critical hits or bleed effects.
Transmute Blood To Acid

By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Travel: You gain a +6 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
旅行：你的体质获得+6增强加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:

旅行：你的体质获得+6增强加值。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 旅行领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a small mandragora. You gain a +2 size bonus to your Dexterity and Constitution and a +2 natural armor bonus. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one 1d6 bite attack, two 1d4 slams and poison ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成了小型曼德拉戈拉。你的敏捷和体质获得 +2 体型加成，天生护甲加成 +2。你的移动速度增加 10 英尺。你还会获得一次 1d6 撕咬攻击、两次 1d4 猛击和中毒能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Tree Form (Mandragora)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 树形（曼德拉戈拉）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You become a large shambling mound. You gain a +4 size bonus to your Strength, a +2 size bonus to your Constitution, +4 natural armor bonus, resist fire 20, and resist electricity 20. Your movement speed is reduced by 10 feet. You also have two 2d6 slam attacks, the constricting vines ability, and the poison ability.
Constricting Vines: A shambling mound's vines coil around any creature it hits with a slam attack. The shambling mound attempts a grapple maneuver check against its target, and on a successful check its vines deal 2d6+5 damage and the foe is grappled.
Grappled characters cannot move, and take a -2 penalty on all attack rolls and a -4 penalty to Dexterity. Grappled characters attempt to escape every round by making a successful combat maneuver, Strength, Athletics, or Mobility check. The DC of this check is the shambling mound's CMD.
Each round, creatures grappled by a shambling mound suffer 4d6+Strength modifier × 2 damage.
A shambling mound receives a +4 bonus on grapple maneuver checks.
Poison:
Slam; Save: Fortitude
Frequency: 1/round for 2 rounds
Effect: 1d2 Strength and 1d2 Dexterity damage
Cure: 1 save
The save DC is Constitution-based.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你会变成一个蔓生怪。你的力量获得 +4 体型加成，体质获得 +2 体型加成，天生护甲获得 +4，抗火 20，抗电 20。你的移动速度降低 10 英尺。你还拥有两次 2d6 猛击、藤蔓束缚能力和中毒能力：乱冢的藤蔓会缠绕任何被它的猛击击中的生物。如果成功，它的藤蔓会造成 2d6+5 伤害，敌人会被抓住。
被抓住的角色无法移动，所有攻击投掷都会受到-2 的惩罚，敏捷也会受到-4 的惩罚。被擒住的角色每回合都会尝试逃脱，方法是进行一次成功的战斗演习、力量、运动或移动检定。
每回合，被乱冢抓住的生物都会受到4d6+力量修正×2的伤害。
乱冢在擒抱动作检定上获得+4的加成：
频率：1/回合，持续2回合
效果：1d2力量和1d2敏捷伤害
治愈：1次拯救
拯救DC基于体质。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Tree Form (Shambling Mound)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 树形（蔓生怪）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Tree Form (Final)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 树形（最终）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a huge giant flytrap. You gain a +8 size bonus to your Strength, +4 to Constitution, -2 penalty to Dexterity and a +6 natural armor bonus. You also gain four 1d8 bite attacks, acid Resistance 20 and blindsight and poison ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成了巨型的捕蝇草。你会获得体型+8的力量加成、+4的体质加成、-2的敏捷惩罚以及+6的天生护甲加成。你还会获得四次 1d8 撕咬攻击、酸抗性 20 以及盲视和中毒能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Tree Form (Giant Flytrap)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 树形（巨型捕蝇草）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a huge treant. You gain a +8 size bonus to your Strength, +4 to Constitution, -2 penalty to Dexterity and a +6 natural armor bonus. You also gain two 2d6 slam attacks, damage reduction 10/slashing, vulnerability to fire and overrun ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成了一只巨型的树人。您会获得体型+8的力量加成、+4的体质加成、-2的敏捷惩罚以及+6的天生护甲加成。您还会获得两次 2d6 猛击、伤害减免 10/砍伤、易受火焰伤害和碾压能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Tree Form (Treant)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 树形（树人）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lord of the Blasted Tarn   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Corruption of nature, Pollution   
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Evil, Plant   
Subdomains: Catastrophe, Decay, Demon, Rage   
Favoured Weapon: Greataxe   
Holy Symbol: Axe in bleeding tree stump   
Sacred Animal: Deinonychus   
Treerazer, the self-styled Lord of the Blasted Tarn, was once the favored minion and lieutenant of Cyth-V’sug, Demon Lord of Fungus and Parasites. After a failed attempt to wrest that crown away from Cyth-V’sug, Treerazer fled to the Material Plane. Cyth-V’sug was unable to pursue, but took steps to ensure that Treerazer would remain there by exiling him, transforming Treerazer into a native outsider and severing his bond to the Abyss. He spent many centuries wandering the remote corners of Golarion before finally coming upon the abandoned elven nation of Kyonin in 2497 ar. In the Sovyrian Stone, he found an artifact that he believed he could use to reinstate his Abyssal link and, perhaps, even uproot the entire nation and refocus the portal from Sovyrian to the Abyss, thereby reclaiming his position there and taking one more step toward revenge against Cyth-V’sug. Yet the elves sensed his tamperings and returned to confront the demon. A terrific battle resulted, and while the elves were able to drive Treerazer out of Iadara and into southern Kyonin, they were unable to slay him or force him out completely—they merely concentrated his power in a smaller region. Instead, the elves walled off this region, a perverted realm known today as the Tanglebriar. Treerazer lurks at the Tanglebriar’s heart to this day, the greatest bogeyman in elven mythology and a very real and constant threat to the nation’s security. Cults of Treerazer are quite rare beyond Kyonin, where secret cabals of cultists venerate him. When they do appear beyond these borders, they are secretive but sadistic groups, eager to sacrifice nonbelievers yet cunning in remaining undetected by the law of the land.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：破敌之塔恩领主
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：自然腐败、污染
领域：混乱、毁灭、邪恶、植物
子领域：灾难、腐烂、恶魔、狂暴
偏好武器：巨斧
圣徽：斧头插在流血的树桩上圣兽：Deinonychus Treerazer，自封的破敌之湖领主，曾经是真菌和寄生虫恶魔领主 Cyth-V'sug 的宠儿和副官。在试图从 Cyth-V'sug 手中夺取王冠失败后，Treerazer 逃到了主物质位面。 Cyth-V'sug 无法继续追捕，但采取措施确保 Treerazer 能留在那里，将他放逐，将 Treerazer 变成一个本地异界者，并切断他与深渊的联系。在 2497 年终于来到被遗弃的精灵国 Kyonin 之前，他花了许多世纪在戈拉利安的偏远角落徘徊。在苏维利亚之石中，他发现了一件神器，他相信他可以用它来恢复他的深渊链接，甚至可能连根拔起整个国家，并将传送门从苏维利亚重新聚焦到深渊，从而重新夺回他在那里的位置，朝着更进一步的方向迈进。报复 Cyth-V'sug。然而精灵们察觉到了他的颤栗并返回与恶魔对峙。一场可怕的战斗发生了，虽然精灵们能够将 Treerazer 赶出 Iadara 并进入 Kyonin 南部，但他们无法将他完全杀死或将他赶出——他们只是将他的力量集中在一个较小的区域。取而代之的是，精灵们围住了这个地区，这是一个今天被称为 Tanglebriar 的变态领域。直到今天，Treerazer 潜伏在 Tanglebriar 的心脏，是精灵神话中最伟大的怪物，并且对国家安全构成了非常真实和持续的威胁。除了 Kyonin 之外，Treerazer 的邪教非常罕见，那里有邪教的秘密阴谋集团崇拜他。当他们确实出现在这些边界之外时，他们是秘密但残虐狂的团体，渴望牺牲非信徒，但狡猾地保持不被土地守序发现。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Treerazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 泰拉泽尔

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Elves live far longer than other common races, and a single elf may see whole empires rise and fall. Given the impermanence of the cultures around them, it’s small wonder that some elves turn to the timeless growth of nature for solace, finding allies among the great trees themselves, and even leading the forest’s plants into combat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 精灵的寿命比其他普通种族要长得多，一个精灵可能见证了整个帝国的兴衰。鉴于周围文化的无常，难怪有些精灵会向永恒生长的大自然寻求慰藉，在大树中寻找盟友，甚至带领森林中的植物作战。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Treesinger
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 树歌手

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A treesinger may begin play with a plant companion. This plant is a loyal companion that accompanies the treesinger on her adventures. Except for the companion being a creature of the plant type, drawn from the list of plant companions, this ability otherwise works like the standard druid’s animal companion ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 树精灵可以与植物伙伴一起开始游戏。该植物是树精的忠实伙伴，陪伴她一起冒险。除了同伴是从植物同伴列表中抽取的植物类型生物外，该能力与标准德鲁伊的动物同伴能力相同。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Plant Companion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 植物伙伴

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A treesinger may begin play with a plant companion. This plant is a loyal companion that accompanies the treesinger on her adventures. Except for the companion being a creature of the plant type, drawn from the list of plant companions, this ability otherwise works like the standard druid’s animal companion ability. 
A treesinger may instead may choose the plant or growth domain.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
树精灵可以与植物伙伴一起开始游戏。该植物是树精的忠实伙伴，陪伴她一起冒险。除了同伴是从植物同伴列表中抽取的植物类型生物之外，该能力与标准德鲁伊的动物同伴能力相同。
树精可以选择植物或生长领域。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Treesingers Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 树人领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Treesingers Bond
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 树人羁绊

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wild Shape (Giant Flytrap)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自然变身（巨型捕蝇草）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 6th level, a treesinger can use wildshape to change into a mandragora and back twice a day. The effect lasts for 1 hour per druid level, or until she changes back. 
Changing form is a standard action and doesn't provoke an attack of opportunity. A druid can use this ability an additional time per day at 8th level and every two levels thereafter, for a total of eight times at 18th level. At 9th level, a treesinger can use wild shape to change into a shambling mound ro a quickwood. At 12th level, a treesinger can use wild shape to change into a giant flytrap or a treant.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
六级时，树精灵可以使用野性之形变回曼德拉戈拉，每天两次。该效果持续时间为每级德鲁伊 1 小时，或直到她变回原样。
变身是一个标准动作，不会引发借机攻击。德鲁伊在八级时每天可以额外使用一次这个能力，之后每两级使用一次，到十八级时总共可以使用八次。9 级时，树人可以使用狂野形态变身成一个匍匐的蔓生怪。12 级时，树人可以使用野性形态变成巨型捕蝇草或树人。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wild Shape (Mandragora)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自然变身（曼德拉戈拉）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a huge quickwood. You gain a +4 size bonus to your Strength, a +2 size bonus to your Constitution, +4 natural armor bonus, resist fire 20, resist electricity 20, and spell resistance equal to 10 + half your caster level. Your movement speed is reduced by 10 feet. You also have one 2d6 bite attack and two 1d4 root (tentacle) attacks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成了一棵巨型的迅树。你获得力量 +4 体型加成、体质 +2 体型加成、+4 天生护甲加成、抗火 20、抗电 20 以及等于 10 + 施法者等级一半的法术抗性。你的移动速度降低 10 英尺。你还拥有一次 2d6 撕咬攻击和两次 1d4 根须（触手）攻击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Horseman of Famine, The Black, Archdaemon of Wasting, The Lysogenic Prince
Alignment: Neutral Evil 
Areas of Concern: Famine 
Domains: Earth, Evil, Madness, Weather 
Subdomains: Daemon, Decay, Insanity, Seasons 
Favoured Weapon: Spiked gauntlet (punching dagger) 
Holy Symbol: Black jackal skull eating an eclipsed sun 
Sacred Animal: Horse, jackal   
The youngest and most ambitious of the Four, Trelmarixian the Black is the Horseman of Famine, devoted to seeing all mortal life waste away before his eyes. Jackal-headed, with the emaciated body of a starving man and thin, fluid flesh with no shape of its own, Trelmarixian specializes in cancers and other forms of selfconsumption, helping to infect mortal life with his essence and other maladies that turn the body against itself, causing famine from within.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：饥荒骑士、黑衣人、消瘦大魔王、溶血王子
排列组合：中立邪恶 
关注领域：饥荒 
领域：中立邪恶 
关注领域：中立邪恶 
关注领域：饥荒饥荒 
领域：大地、邪恶、疯狂、天气 
次领域：恶魔、腐朽、疯狂、季节 
最喜爱的武器：尖刺战铠（冲锋匕首） 
神圣象征：黑豺狼头骨正在吞食日蚀的太阳 
圣兽：马、豺狼 
黑豺狼崔玛瑞希是四神中最年轻、最有野心的一位，他是饥荒骑士，一心想看到所有凡人的生命在他眼前消逝。特瑞玛里克西安擅长癌症和其他形式的自我消耗，用他的精气和其他恶疾感染凡人的生命，使身体与自身对抗，从内部造成饥荒。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Trelmarixian
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 崔玛瑞希

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The target creature is covered in burning acid that deals 1d6 points of acid damage and 1d6 points of fire damage each round. The subject can attempt a Fortitude saving throw each round to reduce the damage by half.
Fortitude half (see text)

The target creature is covered in burning acid that deals 1d6 points of acid damage and 1d6 points of fire damage each round. The subject can attempt a Fortitude saving throw each round to reduce the damage by half.
Trial of Fire and Acid

By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Trickery: You gain a +4 enhancement bonus to Persuasion, Thievery and Stealth checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
诡计：你在沟通、巧手和隐匿检定上获得 +4 增强加值。

Trickery: You gain a +4 enhancement bonus to Persuasion, Thievery and Stealth checks.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A target grappled by an arrow can attempt to escape every round by making a successful combat maneuver, Strength, Athletics, or Mobility check against the archers CMD. The pinned target gets a +4 bonus on this check.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 被箭扣住的目标每回合都可以尝试逃脱，方法是针对弓箭手的 CMD 进行一次成功的战斗技巧、力量、运动或移动检查。被钉住的目标会在该检定中获得 +4 的加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Pinned by arrows
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 被箭钉住

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 3rd level, an archer can choose one of the following combat maneuvers or actions: disarm or sunder. He can perform this action with a bow against any target within 30 feet, with a –4 penalty to his CMB. Every four levels beyond 3rd, he may choose an additional trick shot to learn. 
At 11th level, he may also choose from the following combat maneuvers: bull rush, grapple, trip.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
3 级时，弓箭手可以从以下战斗动作或行动中选择一个：缴械或击破武器。他可以用弓箭对 30 英尺内的任何目标执行该动作，但其 CMB 会受到-4 的惩罚。3级之后，每升4级，他可以选择学习一种额外的特技射击。
到11级时，他还可以从以下战斗动作中进行选择：牛群冲撞、擒拿、绊摔。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Trick Shot Selection
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 特技射击选择

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Father of Night, Saint Toad, The Sleeper in the Deep   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Magic, Outcasts, The Underworld   
Rank: Great Old One   
Domains: Chaos, Evil, Knowledge, Magic   
Subdomains: Arcane, Divine, Thought, Whimsy   
Favoured Weapon: Shortsword   
Holy Symbol: Crouching eyeless toad   
Tsathoggua dwells in the same network of vast caverns wherein can be found other divinities of the Elder Mythos, such as Abhoth, Atlach-Nacha, and Orgesh. Some maintain the specific underground realm ruled by Tsathoggua is a blue-lit realm called K’n-Yan, while others say the denizens of K’n-Yan rose up against Tsathoggua and drove him from that realm to a deeper lair where even light dreads to go—a dark tangle of caverns called N’kai. Tsathoggua has a strange, almost whimsical nature; while evil and unpredictable, at times he can appear almost benevolent in his dealings with mortals. Yet such dealings are never long-lived, and more often than not end in tragedy for those who would treat with the Great Old One. Tsathoggua appears as a semi-humanoid creature whose features mix those of a toad, a bat, and a sloth, with sleepy-looking eyes and a toothy grin.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：暗夜之父、圣蟾蜍、深渊中的沉睡者
阵营：混乱邪恶 
神职：魔法，被遗弃者与里世界
等级：旧日支配者
领域：混乱、邪恶、知识、魔法 
子领域：秘示域、神力、思想、滑稽
偏好武器：短剑
圣徽：蹲伏的无眼蟾蜍
撒托古亚居住在巨型的洞穴网络之中，在那之中也可找到其他古老神话中的神祇，例如阿布霍斯、阿特拉克·纳克亚和欧格什。某些说法认为撒托古亚统治着一个唤作昆扬（K'n-Yan）的闪耀蓝光的地下国度，而另外一些说守序称昆扬的居民奋起反抗撒托古亚，将祂驱赶至更为深邃，任何光明也不敢前往的所在——唤作恩凯（N'kai）的至暗深穴。
撒托古亚有一种古怪，甚至近乎异想天开的天性：虽仍然邪恶且不可预测，但有时祂在与凡人交往时却显得近乎仁慈。然而，这样的交往绝不长久，而那些愿与旧日支配者交往之人也往往以悲剧收场。
撒托古亚半似人形，混合了蟾蜍、蝙蝠与懒惰的特征，双眼昏昏欲睡而咧嘴带笑。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Tsathoggua
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 撒托古亚

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Prince of the Moon   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Jade, The Moon, Spirits   
Domains: Darkness, Good, Law, Madness, Repose   
Subdomains: Ancestors, Archon, Insanity, Moon, Night, Souls   
Favoured Weapon: Longspear   
Holy Symbol: Jade Crescent Moon   
Sacred Animal: Hare   
Tsukiyo is the god of jade, the moon, and spirits. He is the brother of Fumeiyoshi, the god of envy, and lover of thesun goddess Shizuru. Called the Prince of the Moon, Tsukiyo was slain by his jealous brother, and it is said that Shizuru’s tears, mingled with Tsukiyo’s blood, formed the first stones of jade, which remains sacred to the moon god’s faith. Tsukiyo was returned to life by Shizuru, and upon his rebirth, he acquired the portfolio of spirits and became patron of the reincarnated samsaran race. His worship is popular in the Forest of Spirits, and his shrines can often be found attached to larger temples to Shizuru.

阵营：守序善良 
关注领域：玉石、月亮、灵魂 
领域：黑暗、善良、守序、疯狂、安息 
次领域：黑暗、善良、守序、疯狂、安息黑暗、善良、守序、疯狂、安息 
子域：祖先、大君、精神错乱、月亮、黑夜、灵魂 
最喜爱的武器：长矛 
神圣的象征：玉新月 
圣兽：野兔 
辰清是玉神、月神和灵魂之神。他是嫉妒之神 Fumeiyoshi 的弟弟，也是太阳女神 Shizuru 的情人。据说静流的眼泪和月神的血混合在一起，形成了最初的玉石，至今仍是月神信仰的圣物。月神被静流救活，重生后，他获得了神灵之物，成为转世三族的守护神。他的崇拜在灵之森很受欢迎，他的神龛经常被附在静流的大型寺庙中。

月夜是碧玉，月亮和灵魂之神，也是嫉妒之神文业的兄弟和太阳女神静琉的爱人。碧月亲王曾经被他妒火满溢的兄弟所杀死过，据说那时月夜流下的鲜血和静琉流下的眼泪融合，成为了第一条玉石矿脉，所以碧玉也就成为了月夜教会的圣物。  后来月夜为静琉（在齐仲的协助下）所复活。通过这次重生，月夜获得了灵魂的神职，并且也因此经历而被轮回者一族奉为守护神。月夜的信徒主要聚居在神灵之森中，不过，凡是有静琉神社的地方，通常也会在正殿旁为月夜修建一座小一些的神祠一起供奉。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can cause a creature to take on some of the traits of the undead with a melee touch attack. Touched creatures are treated as undead for the purposes of effects that heal or cause damage based on positive and negative energy. This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum 1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的接触可令生物如不死生物般，受负能量治疗正能量伤害。此效果持续轮数为你牧师等级一半（最少1），每天“3+感知修正”次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You are treated as undead for the purposes of effects that heal or cause damage based on positive and negative energy
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 如不死生物般，受负能量治疗正能量伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Death’s Kiss
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 死亡之吻

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your touch can allow others to embrace undeath, willfully or not.
Death’s Kiss: You can cause a creature to take on some of the traits of the undead with a melee touch attack. Touched creatures are treated as undead for the purposes of effects that heal or cause damage based on positive and negative energy. This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum 1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Death's Embrace: At 8th level, you heal damage instead of taking damage from channeled negative energy. If the channeled negative energy targets undead, you heal hit points just like undead in the area.
If you are undead, then you instead do not take damage from positive energy.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的触摸可以让其他人拥抱不死，无论是否有意。
死亡之吻：你的接触可令生物如不死生物般，受负能量治疗正能量伤害。此效果持续轮数为你牧师等级一半（最少1），每天“3+感知修正”次。
死亡之拥：在8级时，你能从引导的负能量中获得治疗，而不是受到伤害。若该引导负能量的目标是不死生物时，则你如同范围内的不死生物一般获得治疗。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Undead Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亡灵子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your touch can allow others to embrace undeath, willfully or not.
Death’s Kiss: You can cause a creature to take on some of the traits of the undead with a melee touch attack. Touched creatures are treated as undead for the purposes of effects that heal or cause damage based on positive and negative energy. This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum 1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Death's Embrace: At 8th level, you heal damage instead of taking damage from channeled negative energy. If the channeled negative energy targets undead, you heal hit points just like undead in the area.
If you are undead, then you instead do not take damage from positive energy.
Domain Spells: cause fear, frigid touch, bestow curse, enervation, slay living, circle of death, destruction, horrid wilting, energy drain.

领域法术：惊恐术，极寒之触，降咒，弱能术，杀生术，死亡法阵，灰飞烟灭，凋死术，吸能术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Unmountable
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 不可安装的

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While many druids keep to the wilderness, some make their way within settlements, communing with the animals and vermin who live there and speaking for the nature that runs rampant in civilization’s very cradle.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当大多数德鲁伊守望的荒野的时候，有一小批德鲁伊以他们自己的方式守卫着聚落，关照着那里的飞虫走兽，并且为那些在文明摇篮周遭运行的自然事物发声。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Urban Druid
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 城镇德鲁伊

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An urban druid may not select an animal companion. Instead, she must choose from the following domains, rather than those usually available to druids: Charm, Community, Knowledge, Nobility, Protection, Repose, Rune, or Weather.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 由于生活在偏离自然的地区，城镇德鲁伊不获得动物伙伴；但他可以从以下领域中选一个作为他自然纽带的连结：魅惑、联盟、知识、崇高、保护、宁静、符文或天气。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Urban Druids Bond
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 城镇德鲁伊纽带

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 2nd level an urban druid adds Use Magic Device to her class skills. She also gains a +2 bonus on Use Magic Device, Knowledge (Arcana), and Knowledge (World) skill checks
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 2 级，城镇德鲁伊将使用魔法装置添加到她的本职技能中。她还在使用魔法装置、知识（神秘）和知识（世界）技能检定上获得 +2 加值

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lorekeeper
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 博学者

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 9th level, an urban druid gains immunity to charm and compulsion effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 9 级时，城镇德鲁伊对魅惑和胁迫效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mental Strength
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 坚毅心灵

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, an urban druid gains a +2 bonus on saves against divinations and enchantments.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 4 级，城镇德鲁伊在对抗所有预言学派和惑控学派效果时得到豁免+2加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Resist Temptation
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 抵抗幻惑

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A urban druid can channel stored spell energy into charm domain spells that she hasn't prepared ahead of time. She can "lose" a prepared spell in order to cast any charm domain spell of the same level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 城镇德鲁伊可以将储存的法术能量引导到她没有提前准备好的魅惑领域法术中。她可以“失去”一个准备好的法术，以施展任何同等级的魅惑领域法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spontaneous Charm Domain Spellcasting
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发魅力领域施法

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发宁静领域施法

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发符文领域施法

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spontaneous Weather Domain Spellcasting
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发天气领域施法

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Due to the urban druids closeness to civilization, wild shape transformations are much more difficult to acheve. An urban druid gains wild shape forms 4 levels later than a standard druid.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 由于城镇德鲁伊接近文明，自然变形的转换更难实现。城镇德鲁伊比标准德鲁伊晚 4 级获得野性形态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wild Shape - Urban Druid
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 野性变身 - 城镇德鲁伊

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Fireshaker, The Father of Islands   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Change, Growth, Primal forces   
Domains: Chaos, Earth, Good, Weather   
Subdomains: Azata, Growth, Seasons, Storms   
Favoured Weapon: Club   
Holy Symbol: Volcano with gold lava   
Sacred Animal: Dinosaur   
It is said that trees bend beneath the force of Valani's laugh and his wrathful roar can split the ground around him. Valani's hot temper is well known among the empyreal lords, and his peers respect him for his mastery over the forces of nature. Fireshaker understands that change cannot be forestalled and that growth requires destruction in order for goodness to take root in what was once evil soil. Valani is a massive figure, standing 10 feet tall with the thick arms and legs of a primate and the head of a boar. His wavy dark hair falls free under a crown of spiked grass and purple flowers. The skin left uncovered by ornate armor crafted from tiles of shell and obsidian is dark brown and ruddy, as if the light of a fire were always burning just beneath his flesh. When angered-which is often-his majestic features contort into an expres sion of awful rage. Aside from his wrath, Valani is also known for being a proud and wise father countless times over. Dozens of tribes on serene islands through the multiverse claim their blessings stem from being favored children of Fireshaker. Valani lives in the heart of the Bright-Burning Volcano in Elysium.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：撼火者、岛屿之父
阵营：混乱善良
神职：变化，生长，原始之力
领域：混乱、大地、善良、天气
子领域：爱塔、滋长、季节、风暴
偏好武器：木棒
圣徽：喷发金色岩浆的火山
神兽：恐龙
据说树木在瓦拉尼的笑声中弯折，他愤怒的咆哮可以撕裂周围的土地。森林与自然之主脾气火爆，理解创造善必先毁灭恶。撼火者明白变化无法阻止，森林的成长需要先进行破坏才能让善良在曾经邪恶的土壤中生根发芽。
瓦拉尼身材魁梧，身高8尺，野猪头，四肢粗壮，身披黑曜石铠甲。他那卷曲的黑发披散在荆棘紫花冠。由贝壳和黑曜石制成的华丽盔甲所覆盖的皮肤呈深褐色和红润，仿佛皮肤下有火焰在燃烧。
当他生气时——通常是这样——他威严的容貌会扭曲成一种可怕的愤怒表情。除了愤怒之外，瓦拉尼瓦拉尼也是一个骄傲而明智的父亲。在多元宇宙的宁静岛屿上，数十个部落声称他们的祝福源于成为撼火者的宠儿。
瓦拉尼住在极乐境奔放之野熊焰火山。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Fireshaker, The Father of Islands   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Change, Growth, Primal forces   
Domains: Chaos, Earth, Good, Weather   
Subdomains: Azata, Growth, Seasons, Storms   
Favoured Weapon: Club   
Holy Symbol: Volcano with gold lava   
Sacred Animal: Dinosaur   
It is said that trees bend beneath the force of Valani's laugh and his wrathful roar can split the ground around him. Valani's hot temper is well known among the empyreal lords, and his peers respect him for his mastery over the forces of nature. Fireshaker understands that change cannot be forestalled and that growth requires destruction in order for goodness to take root in what was once evil soil. Valani is a massive figure, standing 10 feet tall with the thick arms and legs of a primate and the head of a boar. His wavy dark hair falls free under a crown of spiked grass and purple flowers. The skin left uncovered by ornate armor crafted from tiles of shell and obsidian is dark brown and ruddy, as if the light of a fire were always burning just beneath his flesh. When angered-which is often-his majestic features contort into an expres sion of awful rage. Aside from his wrath, Valani is also known for being a proud and wise father countless times over. Dozens of tribes on serene islands through the multiverse claim their blessings stem from being favored children ofFireshaker. Valani lives in the heart of the Bright-Burning Volcano in Elysium.

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Court of Ancestors   
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Consequence, Superstition, Tradition  
Domains: Community, Knowledge, Nobility, Repose  
Favoured Weapon: Heavy flail   
Holy Symbol: Three circles bisected by a horizontal line  
The Court of Ancestors washed ashore in the Boneyard, borne on the first wave in the River of Souls by the collective weight of mortal cultures and the influence they impose on living hearts. Vale serves the Boneyard as chief prosecutor, in that they champion the cause of judging souls based only upon external criteria and impact, without regard for individual intentions. As a gatherer of knowledge and advocate for agnostics, Vale also finds themself the Boneyard’s authority on matters of faith unrelated to gods, such as superstitions. Vale manifests as several naked, androgynous figures merged into a single being, crowned with a floating circle of white crystal. Their domain is the Mall of Jurisprudence, a winding network of libraries and offices.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：先祖之庭 
阵营：绝对中立 
形态：招魂使 
领域：后果、迷信、传统 
领域：联盟、知识、崇高、安眠 
偏好武器：重型连枷 
圣徽：被水平线一分为二的三个圆圈 先祖之庭被人类文化的集体重量及其对活生生的心灵的影响，在灵魂之河的第一波涛潮中被冲上岸。 Vale 担任 Boneyard 首席检察官，因为他们支持仅根据外部标准和影响来判断灵魂的事业，而不考虑个人意图。作为知识的收集者和不可知论者的倡导者，Vale 还发现自己是 Boneyard 在与神无关的信仰问题上的权威，例如迷信。谷显现为几个赤裸的、雌雄同体的人形融合成一个个体，其冠冕是一圈漂浮的白色水晶。他们的领域是法学商城，一个由图书馆和办公室组成的蜿蜒网络。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Vale
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 佤勒

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Answering Rite   
Alignment: Lawful Neutral   
Form: Primordial Inevitable   
Areas of Concern: Ceremonies, Magic, Preparation   
Domains: Law, Magic, Rune, Water   
Favoured Weapon: Kukri   
Holy Symbol: Scroll twisting upon itself   
By nature of their supernatural genesis, most outsiders easily command magic to do their bidding. However, the aligned essence of these beings guides their actions, ensuring they use magic in a manner that befits their nature and the multiverse’s needs. Mortals, on the other hand, greedily seek out and exploit magic, possessing neither the underlying instincts to use it responsibly nor the eternity of practice to do so perfectly. But whether mortal spellcasters are cognizant of it or not, magic is a fundamental force guided by principles, and whenever simple creatures would trivialize or abuse magic, Valmallos presides. Valmallos considers mortals unpredictable and reckless, and seeks to keep them from treating magic as a toy. In part, he is responsible for the array of complex material, somatic, and verbal components so prevalent in magic, many of which act as gatekeepers to ensure an amateur cannot wield magic without putting in the requisite training and practice to use the power responsibly. As a result, Valmallos typically approves of wizards’ methodologies, and his faithful handle sorcerers and other innate spellcasters with extreme caution—and sometimes even with prejudice. Valmallos regards most other mortal spellcasters on a case-by-case basis, and the way in which one has used magic in the past matters far more to him than the esoteric tradition that granted the power in the first place. Valmallos sees his faithful less as worshippers than as students and advocates who can learn from him and further complicate magical practices to protect them from fools.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：回答仪式 
阵营：守序中立
形态：原始不可避免 
领域：仪式、魔法、准备
领域：守序、魔法、符文、水 
偏好武器：Kukri 
圣徽：卷轴扭曲自身外人很容易指挥魔法来完成他们的命令。然而，这些生物的一致本质指导着他们的行动，确保他们以适合他们的本性和多元宇宙需求的方式使用魔法。另一方面，凡人贪婪地寻找和利用魔法，既不具备负责任地使用它的潜在本能，也没有永恒的实践来完美地做到这一点。但无论凡人施法者是否意识到这一点，魔法都是一种以原则为指导的基本力量，每当简单的生物轻视或滥用魔法时，瓦尔马洛斯都会主持。 Valmallos 认为凡人不可预测且鲁莽，并试图阻止他们将魔法视为玩具。在某种程度上，他负责魔法中如此普遍的复杂材料、躯体和语言成分的阵列，其中许多充当守门人，以确保业余爱好者在没有进行必要的训练和练习以负责任地使用这种力量的情况下无法使用魔法。因此，瓦尔马洛斯通常赞同巫师的方法，他的忠实信徒对待巫师和其他施法者时会极其谨慎——有时甚至带有偏见。 Valmallos 对大多数其他凡人施法者视情况视情况而定，而对他而言，过去使用魔法的方式远比最初授予权力的秘传传统更为重要。 Valmallos 认为他的信徒与其说是崇拜者，不如说是作为学生和倡导者，他们可以向他学习，并进一步复杂化魔法实践以保护他们免受傻瓜的伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Valmallos
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 瓦尔马洛斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Vampirism
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 吸血鬼化

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You crave the taste of fresh, warm blood. 
You take damage from positive energy and heal from negative energy as if you were undead. 
At 5th level, you gain channel resistance +4. 
At 10th level, you add vampiric touch to your list of 3rd-level oracle spells known and create undead to your list of 5th-level oracle spells known. 
At 15th level, you gain damage reduction 5/magic.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你渴望新鲜、温暖的血液的味道。你受到正能量的伤害并从负能量中恢复，就好像你是不死生物一样。
第 5 级时，你获得 +4 引导能量抗性。
在第 10 级时，你将吸血鬼之触添加到你的 3 级先知法术列表中，将创造不死生物添加到你的 5 级先知法术列表中。
15 级时，你获得 5/魔法的伤害减免。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Iron Warrior   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Iron, Siege Engines, War   
Domains: Chaos, Earth, Evil, War   
Subdomains: Demon, Fear, Metal, Tactics   
Favoured Weapon: Greataxe  
Holy Symbol: Crumbling, smoking tower   
Sacred Animal: Woolly rhinoceros   
Varg is the orc god of innovation, tactics, and technology. He taught the orcs how to forge blades and to build complex siege engines. While all orc gods are war gods, the Iron Warrior is the master of strategy. He disdains battle plans that rely solely on enthusiasm and overwhelming numbers to win the day. Instead, Varg teaches orcs, if not discipline, at least more efficient ways to use their strength. Varg favors weapons that not only deal damage, but also instill fear. The Iron Warrior knows that intimidation can defeat an enemy as quickly as any wound, and he sees no shame in striking from behind at a foe in retreat. Varg is depicted as an orc general wearing half-plate armor that was assembled from varied sources. He never wears a helm that would hinder his ability to see and hear what is happening on the battlefield. Varg has honed his abilities through countless battles against his brothers and the gods of other pantheons. When not opposing the Iron Warrior, the other orc gods depend on him to equip their armies. Varg is the most inventive and forward thinking of orc gods, but his genius is only for battle. His followers have little interest in using technology to improve other aspects of orc life, and the most devout of his faithful see innovation in other arenas as a blasphemous misuse of Varg’s gifts. All but the most savage orcs make use of metal weapons and armor, and they give thanks to Varg when they craft or steal these items. Tribes dedicated to the Iron Warrior make extensive use of siege weapons, and individual worshipers compete against each other to build the most complex and destructive devices of death.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：钢铁战士 
结盟：混沌邪恶 
关注领域：钢铁、攻城引擎、战争 
领域：混沌、大地、邪恶、战争 
次领域：混沌、大地、邪恶、战争 <br混沌、大地、邪恶、战争 
次领域：恶魔、恐惧、金属、战术 
最喜爱的武器：大斧 
神圣象征：摇摇欲坠、冒烟的高塔 
神圣的动物：毛犀牛 
瓦格是兽人的创新、战术和技术之神。他教会了兽人如何锻造兵刃和建造复杂的攻城引擎。虽然所有兽人之神都是战斗祭司，但钢铁战士是战略大师。他不屑于仅仅依靠热情和压倒性的人数来赢得胜利的作战计划。相反，瓦尔格即使不教兽人纪律，至少也会教兽人如何更有效地使用他们的力量。瓦格偏爱的武器不仅能造成伤害，还能带来恐惧。钢铁战士深知，恐吓能像任何伤害一样迅速击败敌人，他认为从背后攻击撤退中的敌人并不可耻。瓦格被描绘成一名兽人将军，身着从不同来源收集来的半身盔甲。他从不戴头盔，因为头盔会妨碍他看到和听到战场上发生的一切。瓦格在与他的兄弟和其他神殿的神灵的无数次战斗中磨练了自己的能力。在不与钢铁战士对抗时，其他兽人诸神都要依靠他来装备自己的军队。瓦格是兽人诸神中最具创造力和前瞻性思维的一位，但他的天才只用于战斗。他的追随者对利用科技改善兽人生活的其他方面兴趣不大，最虔诚的信徒认为在其他领域的创新是对瓦格天赋的亵渎。除了最野蛮的兽人，所有兽人都会使用金属武器和盔甲，他们在制作或偷窃这些物品时都会感谢瓦格。供奉钢铁战士的部落会大量使用攻城武器，个别崇拜者还会相互竞争，制造最复杂、破坏力最大的死亡装置。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：钢铁战士
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：钢铁、攻城马车座、战争
领域：混乱、大地、邪恶、战争
子领域：恶魔、恐惧、铁、战术
偏好武器：巨斧
圣徽：摇摇欲坠、冒烟的塔 
圣兽：披毛犀
瓦尔格 是兽人的创新、战术和技术之神。
他教兽人如何锻造刀片和制造复杂的攻城器械。虽然所有兽人神都是战斗祭司，但钢铁战士同时也是是战略大师。他鄙视仅依靠热情和压倒性人数来赢得胜利的战斗计划。相反，瓦尔格教导兽人，如果不守纪律，至少更有效的方式来使用他们的力量。
瓦尔格偏爱那些不仅能造成伤害，还能灌输恐惧的武器。钢铁战士知道恐惧可以像任何伤害一样迅速地击败敌人，他认为从背后攻击撤退的敌人并不丢人。
瓦尔格被描绘成一个穿着从不同来源的零件拼凑而成的半板甲的兽人将军。他从不穿戴会妨碍他看到和听到战场上发生的事情的头盔。
瓦尔格通过与他的兄弟和其他万神殿的众神的无数次战斗来磨练自己的能力。当不与钢铁战士对抗时，其他兽人神祇依靠他来训练武装他们的军队。
瓦尔格是兽人诸神中最具创造力和前瞻性的，但他的天赋只用于战斗。他的追随者对使用科技来改善兽人生活的其他方面几乎没有兴趣，他最虔诚的信徒将其他领域的创新视为对瓦尔格天赋的亵渎。除了最野蛮的兽人外，所有兽人都使用金属武器和盔甲，当他们制作或偷窃这些物品时，他们会感谢瓦尔格。献身于钢铁战士的部落广泛使用攻城武器，信徒之间相互竞争，以制造出最复杂和最具破坏性的死亡装置。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Varg
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 瓦尔格

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Steeple's Skull  
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Gargoyles, Holy ground, Rest   
Domains: Darkness, Earth, Protection, Repose   
Favoured Weapon: Shortbow   
Holy Symbol: Vertical line with a shorter horizontal crossbar near the top, and a circle around the overlap  
The brooding master of the spires and steeples, Vavaalrav is the architect of the Boneyard, manifested from the mortal need to leave a legacy for the fallen. He is the patron and protector of sacred sites, and his cold, earthy breath flows through the world’s mausoleums with eerie reverence. He has no patience for those who disturb sacred spaces, and many mortals—both Pharasmins and those who are simply superstitious—carve his holy symbol into tombs or fashion headstones in its shape to help protect the site from foul spirits and grave robbers. Those gargoyles who take up residence on cathedrals, temples, and tombs also pay at least lip service to this usher. Vavaalrav makes his home in the Wailing Tor, a tall, steepled tower in the heart of the Eight Courts. He manifests as a skeletal gray figure garbed in a breastplate, robe, and wings of stone, with three eyes upon his right hand. Whether his countenance bears any eyes as well remains unknown, as the Steeple’s Skull covers the top half of his head with a delicate silk veil.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：尖塔的骷髅 
阵营：绝对中立 
形态：招魂使 
领域：石像鬼、圣地、休息
领域：黑暗、大地、保护、安眠 
偏好武器：短弓 
圣徽：垂直线，顶部附近有较短的水平横杆，以及围绕重叠的圆圈 尖塔和尖塔的沉思大师，Vavaalrav 是 Boneyard 的构装体师，从凡人需要为堕落者留下遗产中体现出来。他是圣地的守护者和保护者，他冰冷、朴实的吐息带着诡异的崇敬流过世界的陵墓。他对那些扰乱神圣空间的人没有耐心，许多凡人——无论是法拉斯敏人还是迷信的人——都将他的圣徽雕刻成坟墓或时尚的墓碑，以帮助保护该地点免受恶灵和盗墓者的侵害。那些在大教堂、寺庙和坟墓中居住的石像鬼也至少对这位招待员做了口头上的服务。瓦瓦拉夫在哀嚎之门安家，这是一座高大的尖塔，位于八宫的中心。他现身为一个灰色的骷髅人物，身着胸甲、长袍和石制翅膀，右手上有三只眼睛。他的脸是否也有任何眼睛仍然未知，因为尖顶的骷髅用精致的丝绸面纱覆盖了他的上半部分。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Vavaalrav
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 瓦瓦拉夫

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Most Glorious Neverfull 
Alignment: Neutral Evil   
Areas of Concern: Beauty, Gluttony, Sadism 
Domains: Death, Destruction, Earth, Evil 
Subdomains: Daemon, Catastrophe, Torture, Undead 
Favoured Weapon: Spear (Longspear)   
Holy Symbol: Half-eaten piece of food 
Sacred Animal: Crow   
Reckoned the most beautiful of the four barghest deities, this immense and grotesquely obese deity suffers from an insatiable hunger. Goblins credit her for their ability to eat just about anything. Her most ardent worshipers claim that goblins can also feed on pain itself and encourage them to regard torture as a sort of meal. Goblins seeking to honor her must make gifts of food.By custom, deceased priests of Venkelvore are often cut open and stuffed with tasty morsels before burial so they won't be hungry while they're dead.
Venkelvore

Titles: The Despoiler   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Lust, Pillage, Plunder   
Domains: Chaos, Charm, Evil, Trickery   
Subdomains: Deception, Lust, Thievery   
Favoured Weapon: Battleaxw   
Holy Symbol: Rat with gold coin   
Sacred Animal: Dire rat   
In other cultures, the gods of avarice might lurk in shadows, and their worshipers would do the same, practicing their faith in secret, but not among orcs, for whom greed and lust are practically virtues. Verex is a brazen thief who encourages orcs to take whatever or whomever they desire. He is the patron of plunderers and usurpers who take by force. Yet duplicity and stealth are not beneath Verex, so he is also the god of grifters and thieves. Orcs praise the Despoiler when their raids yield valuable treasures, but they may curse his name when they become the victims of theft or simply misplace an item. Verex is depicted as an orc rogue wearing studded leather armor, in contrast to the heavy hide and metal favored by his brothers. The Despoiler’s irises are the color of gold coins, and it’s said he can see the deepest desire of any creature that looks him in the eyes. In his time, Verex has allied with and stolen from all the other orc gods, though he has the least contact with Zagresh, who rarely possesses anything of value and is thus not worth the Despoiler’s time. As raiding is important to their survival, many orcs call upon the Despoiler when looting a village or pillaging a rival tribe, but his most dedicated worshipers are typically rogues. Tribes dedicated to Verex prefer guerrilla warfare to attacking en masse, and use diplomacy to deflect fights they can’t win—at least until they can attain a stronger position. For followers of Verex, success is measured in gold, mates, and slaves rather than kills; any orc who can attain goals through guile and deception is valued among Verex’s faithful.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：掠夺者
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：欲望、掠夺、抢劫 
领域：混乱、魅惑、邪恶、诡计 
子领域：欺骗、情欲、盗窃
偏好武器：战斧
圣徽：带金币的老鼠
圣兽：凶暴老鼠
在其他文化中，贪婪之神可能潜伏在阴影中，他们的崇拜者也会这样做，隐秘地实践他们的信仰，但兽人不同，对他们来说，贪婪和欲望实际上是美德。
威雷克斯是一个厚颜无耻的小偷，他鼓励兽人拿走他们想要的任何东西或任何人。他是强盗掠夺者和篡夺者的保护神。然而，两面派和隐匿并不有失威雷克斯的身份，所以他同时也是欺诈和盗窃之神。兽人会在掠夺者获得宝贵的财宝时赞美掠夺者，但当他们成为盗窃的受害者或只是放错物品时，他们可能会破敌他的名字。
威雷克斯被描绘成一个穿着镶嵌皮甲的兽人盗贼，与他的兄弟们喜欢的厚重的皮革和金属形成鲜明对比。掠夺者的虹膜是金币的颜色，据说他能看到任何看着他的生物最深的渴望。
在他的时代，威雷克斯与所有其他兽人神结盟并从他们那里偷窃物品，他与萨格勒什的接触最少，因为他很少拥有任何有价值的东西，不值得浪费掠夺者的时间。
由于突袭对他们的生存十分重要，许多兽人在抢劫村庄或掠夺敌对部落时都会召唤掠夺者，但他最忠诚的崇拜者通常是盗贼。崇拜威雷克斯的部落更喜欢游击战而不是集体进攻，并使用外交来转移他们无法赢得的战斗——至少在他们能够获得更强大的地位之前。对于威雷克斯的追随者来说，成功的衡量标准是金钱、配偶和奴隶，而不是杀戮；任何能够通过技艺和欺骗达到目标的兽人都会在威雷克斯的信徒中受到重视。

阵营：混乱邪恶

在其他文化中，贪婪之神可能会潜伏在阴影中，他们的崇拜者也会这样做，秘密地实践他们的信仰，但在兽人中不会，对他们来说，贪婪和欲望实际上是美德。维瑞克斯是一个厚颜无耻的盗贼，他鼓励兽人随心所欲地攫取任何东西或任何人。他是掠夺者和强取豪夺者的守护神。然而，奸诈和狡猾并不在维瑞克斯之下，因此他也是骗子和小偷之神。半兽人在掠夺到珍贵的宝藏时会赞美掠夺者，但当他们成为盗窃的受害者或只是把物品放错了地方时，他们可能会破敌他的名字。维瑞克斯被描绘成一个穿着镶钉皮甲的兽人流氓，与他的兄弟们喜欢的厚重兽皮和金属形成鲜明对比。掠夺者的虹膜是金币的颜色，据说他能看到任何与他对视的生物最深处的欲望。在他的时间里，维瑞克斯与所有其他兽人之神结盟，并从他们那里偷窃，不过他与扎格雷什接触最少，因为扎格雷什很少拥有有价值的东西，所以不值得 "掠夺者 "浪费时间。由于掠夺对兽人的生存非常重要，许多兽人在抢劫村庄或掠夺敌对部落时都会召唤 "破坏者"，但他最忠实的崇拜者通常都是流氓。比起大举进攻，崇拜维瑞克斯的部落更喜欢游击战，他们会用外交手段来化解打不赢的战斗--至少在他们能够获得更强大的地位之前是这样。对于韦瑞克斯的信徒来说，成功是以金币、配偶和奴隶而不是杀戮来衡量的；任何能通过诡计和欺骗达到目的的兽人都会受到韦瑞克斯信徒的重视。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a giant-centipede. You gain a +2 size bonus to Strength and Constitution and a +3 natural armor bonus. You gain two 1d6 bite attacks plus poison, cannot be be tripped, and have a +2 resistance bonus on all saving throws against mind-affecting effects.

You are in centipede form now. You have a +2 size bonus to Strength and Constitution and a +3 natural armor bonus. You have two 1d6 bite attacks plus poison, cannot be be tripped, and have a +2 resistance bonus on all saving throws against mind-affecting effects.
Vermin Shape (Centipede)

You become a giant-fly. You gain a +2 size bonus to Strength and Constitution and a +3 natural armor bonus. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You have two 1d6 bite attacks, trip and ground effect immunity, and have a +2 resistance bonus on all saving throws against mind-affecting effects.

You are in giant fly form now. You have a +2 size bonus to Strength and Constitution and a +3 natural armor bonus. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You have two 1d6 bite attacks, trip and ground effect immunity, and have a +2 resistance bonus on all saving throws against mind-affecting effects.
Vermin Shape (Giant Fly)

You become a giant spider. You gain a +4 size bonus to your Strength, a -2 penalty to your Dexterity, a +2 size bonus to your Constitution, +5 natural armor bonus, trip immunity, web immunity, and a web ability with a (DC of 10 + half the casters level + their Constitution modifier); after use, the web ability cannot be used for 1 minute. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You have have two 2d6 bite attacks plus poison
Vermin Shape II

You become a giant spider. You gain a +4 size bonus to your Strength, a -2 penalty to your Dexterity, a +2 size bonus to your Constitution, +5 natural armor bonus, trip immunity, web immunity, and a web ability with a (DC of 10 + half the casters level + their Constitution modifier); after use, the web ability cannot be used for 1 minute. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You have have two 2d6 bite attacks plus poison
Vermin Shape (Giant Spider)
You become a giant-centipede or a giant-fly.

Web creates a many-layered mass of strong, sticky strands. These strands trap those caught in them. Creatures caught within a web become grappled by the sticky fibers.
Anyone in the effect's area when spider's web is cast must make a Reflex save. If this save succeeds, the creature is inside the web but is otherwise unaffected. If the save fails, the creature gains the grappled condition, but can break free by making a combat maneuver check, Athletics check, or Mobility check as a standard action against the DC of this ability. The entire area of the web is considered difficult terrain. Anyone moving through the webs must make a Reflex save each round. Creatures that fail lose their movement and become grappled in the first square of webbing that they enter. Spiders are immune to this ability. 
After use you cannot use this ability for 1 minute.
After use you cannot use the spiders web ability for 1 minute.
Web Ability Cooldown

Titles: The Cardinal Martyr   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Devotion, Sacrifice, Scars   
Edict: Sacrifice yourself in pursuit of good, champion noble causes, scar your body   
Domains: Destruction, Good, Healing, Law   
Subdomains: Archon, Martyr, Rage, Resurrection   
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Scarred gold breastplate   
Sacred Animal: Eagle   
Legend tells that Vildeis despises evil more than any other empyreal lord. Other angels rail furiously against the darkness and spend eternity battling its agents. But when Vildeis emerged from the ether of Heaven, it is said, she could not cope with the mere idea of evil-what reality allows such an abomination to exist? To preserve her sanity, Vildeis blinded herself so she could not see the foulness that so often tainted existence and dedicated herself wholly to destroying that which pained her so. Now, her zealous championing of rightness leaves her no peace. She cannot rest, cannot laugh, cannot pause to appreciate her efforts. Only action and repeated sacrifice keep her damaged spirit whole. The Cardinal Martyr's body is marked with countless scars, each one a celestial rune representing a sacrifice she has made. Crimson ribbons cover her useless eyes, and her magnificent red wings carry her aloft as she embarks on divine quests. Her curved dagger, Cicatrix, is never far from her side. Those who stand in Vildeis's shadow hear a maddening chorus of screams, the voices of all the martyred throughout the Great Beyond. Vildeis's followers commit themselves utterly to her worship. The Cardinal Martyr is a demanding mistress, and her tenets are so exact that it is easy to fall out of her favor. Followers of Vildeis give up their homes, families, and wealth to follow her dictums and receive no material reward for their service. To Vildeis's devout, sacrifice in the service of good is its own reward. Those who die acting in Vildeis's name may find rest in their final reward, but the most faithful and talented are raised to serve again, this time as Vildeis's divine agents. Vildeis has no home. She never pauses in her travels, for she is driven mercilessly by her cause.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：红衣烈士
阵营：守序善良
神职：虔诚，牺牲，伤痕
领域：破坏、善良、医疗、守序
子领域：亚空、殉难、狂暴, 回生
偏好武器：匕首 
圣徽：满是伤痕的黄金胸甲
圣兽：鹰
传薇尔迪斯的原初驱动全然源自她对于邪恶的憎恨。一切邪恶都不应存在，也绝不容许任何例外。对抗邪恶的战争应当永远无止无休，直到一切邪恶都被彻底摧毁。这将会是一场永无止境的斗争，并且过程之中所有必要的牺牲都无比必要，永远正当。摧毁邪恶不会带来任何物质上的好处或奖励——邪恶的毁灭本身，就是一切应得的回报，而且只有在邪恶被彻底灭绝后，这份奖励才能够被享受。疤痕是曾经发生过的战斗所留下的痕迹，是对一切曾被付出牺牲的铭记。薇尔迪斯期望她的追随者全身心投入她的理念，放弃一切，将生命的全部贡献给摧毁世间一切邪恶的事业。
红衣殉道者的化身是一个满身伤痕的人类女性，每个伤痕都组成一个符文，刻画出她所做出的每一次牺牲行为。她的双眼被一块红布遮盖，这样她便能够不再看到世上一切邪恶与恐怖。薇尔迪斯用巨型的血红双翼翔于九天，当她出现时，你能够听到宛若低语般的尖叫——那是所有次元的殉道者所发出的尖鸣。薇尔迪斯的追随者包括殉道者，圣武士和宗教狂热者。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Vildeis
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 薇尔迪斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 17th level, as a full-round action, an archer can make a single bow attack at his highest base attack bonus against any number of creatures in a 15-foot radius burst, making separate attack and damage rolls for each creature.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 17 级时，作为一个全回合动作，弓箭手可以用自己最高的基础攻击加成对半径 15 英尺范围内的任意数量的生物进行单次弓箭攻击，并对每个生物分别进行攻击和伤害投掷计算。
