LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Mourning Storm  
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Catastrophes, Last stands, Suicides  
Domains: Fire, Glory, Repose, Weather  
Favoured Weapon: Scythe   
Holy Symbol: Hollow circle with three trailing lines curling clockwise from it   
Vonymos is born from the overwhelming grief mortals experience in the wake of loss, and they embody both the positive and negative things that can grow from that mourning. They represent depression, isolation, and desperation, but also glorious last stands and renewed vigor, playing a role as a muse among the ushers. Vonymos tends to souls fallen to suicide, martyrdom, and catastrophes such as natural disasters and plague. Many feel the usher’s presence as a churning flood of feelings that builds until emotional walls crumble before the tide, but others experience the Mourning Storm’s touch as lightning and fire driving them to desperate action. Vonymos dwells near a glass willow overlooking the Storm of Shards—a cascade of broken, floating stones that drift at the edge of the Spire. The usher sometimes manifests as a wheel of water and wails ringing a single coppery-brown eye, or as a cross between a crow and a knight.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：哀悼风暴 
阵营：绝对中立 
形态：招魂使 
领域：灾难、最后一站、自杀 
领域：火、荣耀、安眠、天气偏好 武器：镰刀 
圣徽：空心圆圈，三个尾随线顺时针卷曲 Vonymos 是凡人在失去亲人之后所经历的巨型悲痛中诞生，他们体现了从悲痛中成长的积极和消极的东西。它们代表着沮丧、孤立和绝望，也代表着光荣的最后一站和重新焕发的活力，在引导者中扮演着缪斯的角色。 Vonymos 倾向于帮助那些死于自杀、殉道和自然灾害和瘟疫等灾难的灵魂。许多人将引座员的存在视为一股翻腾的感情，直到情绪的墙在潮汐前崩塌，但其他人则将哀悼风暴的触感视为闪电和火焰，驱使他们采取绝望的行动。 Vonymos 住在一棵玻璃柳树旁，俯瞰着碎片风暴——一连串破碎的漂浮石头漂浮在尖塔的边缘。引座员有时会以水轮的形式出现，并在一只铜褐色的眼睛里发出哀号，或者是乌鸦和骑士的杂交。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Vonymos
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 沃尼莫斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Green Empress   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Good serpents, The River Sphinx, Wisdom   
Edict: Defend your homelands and your people, aid childbirths, grow papyrus, protect sources of clean water   
Domains: Good, Law, Protection, Travel, Water   
Subdomains: Archon, Defense, Exploration, Purity, Rivers, Trade   
Favoured Weapon: Light mace   
Holy Symbol: Uraeus   
Sacred Animal: Uraeus   
The great River Sphinx, the heart of Osirian life in both ancient and modern times, is embodied in the snake goddess Wadjet, who is said to dwell in the papyrus marshes in the river's delta. Wadjet is the patron and protector of Osirion, and she nourishes the kingdom as the River Sphinx sustains the land and its people. A teacher and giver of wisdom, Wadjet is the mother of the uraeuses, the race of two-headed winged serpents who are her emissaries and spirits of caution, guidance, and protection. Wadjet appears as a woman with the head of a cobra, with winged arms outspread in a protective pose, or as a winged cobra with a woman's face, raised and ready to strike in defense of her land and people. A protector of kings, Wadjet supports Ra and Horus as deities of rulership, but as the guardian of all Osirion, she works with Khepri to protect the common folk as well. Although she has temples in many of Osirion's major cities, countless smaller shrines to Wadjet stand along the banks of the River Sphinx. Oracles are particularly common in Wadjet's priesthood, and the pharaohs of Osirion have long looked to them for insight and counsel.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：翠绿女帝
阵营：守序善良
神职：善蛇、史芬斯河、睿智
领域：善良、守序、保护、旅行, 流水
子领域：亚空、防御、探索、纯净、江河、交易
偏好武器：轻型硬头锤
圣徽：圣蛇
圣兽：圣蛇
史芬斯河─欧西里昂从古至今的命脉，有着蛇神瓦吉特这一化身，传说蛇神居住在大河出海口的中一片生长纸莎草的沼泽中。瓦吉特是奥西里昂的守护神，祂如同史芬斯河滋养众生一般眷顾这个国家。身为传授睿智者的瓦吉特也是圣蛇─一种双头带翼飞蛇─的圣母，而身为慎戒、引导与守护之圣灵的圣蛇也担当蛇神的使者。
瓦吉特以生着眼镜蛇首、生羽双臂状似保护身后之人一般张开的女性形象示人，有时也会被描绘成长着女人脸，腾空而起准备为了保国护民而出击的带翼眼镜蛇。身为君主守护神，瓦吉特协助统御之神的拉与荷鲁斯，在奥西里昂守护者这一层面上，则与凯布里一同庇护平民百姓。
瓦吉特是法老的守护神，圣蛇也是奥西里昂皇家徽记的一部分。除了奥西里昂大城市里的神庙以外，史芬斯沿岸也散布著许多瓦吉特的祭坛。先知在侍奉瓦吉特的神职人员中相当常见，而奥西里昂的法老自古就常向他们寻求感知与建言。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wadjet
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 瓦吉特

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An immobile, blazing curtain of shimmering fire springs into existence. The wall deals fire damage when it appears, to all creatures in the area on your turn each round, and also to any creature that passes through it. The damage dealt is 2d6 points of damage +1 point of damage per caster level (maximum +20). The wall deals double damage to undead creatures.

An immobile, blazing curtain of the shimmering fire springs into existence. The wall deals fire damage when it appears, to all creatures in the area on your turn each round, and also to any creature that passes through it. The damage delt is 2d6 points of damage +1 point of damage per caster level (maximum +20). The wall deals double damage to undead creatures.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 闪耀的火焰形成了一道静止的、炽热的帷幕。当火墙出现时，每次轮到你的回合对该区域中的所有生物以及穿过它的任何生物造成 2d6 + 1/每施法者等级的火焰伤害（最大 +20）。火墙对不死生物造成双倍伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wall of Fire
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 烈焰之墙

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 1st level, you can touch an ally and grant it a tactical advantage for 1 minute. The ally gets one of the following bonuses: +10 feet to base speed, +1 dodge bonus to AC, +1 insight bonus on attack rolls, or a +1 luck bonus on saving throws. 
At 10th level, you can touch an ally and grant it a thirst for battle. All of the ally’s melee attacks are treated as if they had the vicious weapon special ability. In addition, the ally receives a +4 insight bonus on attack rolls made to confirm critical hits. These benefits last for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
1 级时，您可以接触一名盟友，并在 1 分钟内给予其战术优势。盟友会获得以下奖励之一：基础速度+10英尺，敏捷+1，攻击投掷上的洞察加值+1，或幸运加值+1。
10级时，你可以触摸一个盟友并赋予它对战斗的渴望。盟友的所有近战攻击都会被视作拥有邪恶武器特殊能力。此外，盟友在确认关键一击的攻击投掷上会获得 +4 的洞察加值。这些效果持续 1 分钟。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Warhound Animal Companion Progression

The warhound has finished training their animal companion to aid in their hunt. This functions like the druid animal companion ability, except that the warhound’s effective druid level is equal to his warhound level –3. 
Unlike normal animals of its kind, an animal companion's Hit Dice, abilities, skills, and feats advance as the druid advances in level. If a character receives an animal companion from more than one source, her effective druid levels stack for the purposes of determining the statistics and abilities of the companion. Most animal companions increase in size when their druid reaches 4th or 7th level, depending on the companion.
Warhound Animal Companion
A warhound is a humanoid beast, a trained stalker who hunts and kills his master’s enemies with the aid of an animal companion.
Warhound

At 1st level, a warhounds training helps them spot and track targets. They gain a +2 bonus to their Perception and Lore (nature) checks. 
Additionally, the warhound does not get the studied target feature at 1st level, instead gaining it at 5th level with the bonus granted being 1 less than the standard slayer progression.
Warhounds Eye
At 14th level, the warhound and their animal companion both gain the swift aid feat.
Swift Hunting

By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
War: You gain a +2 insight bonus on attack rolls and deal an additional 1d6 points of damage each time you hit a foe.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
战争：你在攻击检定上获得 +2 洞察加值，并且每次击中敌人时额外造成 1d6 点伤害。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 战争领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 3rd level and every 3 levels thereafter, this class gains a bonus feat in addition to those gained from normal advancement. These bonus feats must be selected from those listed as Combat Feats, sometimes also called "fighter bonus feats."
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 3 级和之后的每 3 级，该职业除了从正常升级中获得的专长外，还获得一个额外专长。额外专长必须从“战斗专长”中选择，有时也被称为“战士额外专长”。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Water dancers derive their martial training from ancient nereid traditions jealously guarded by these enigmatic fey.
Water Dancer

At 1st level, a water dancer can overexert themselves to channel more power than normal, pushing past the limit of what is safe for their body by accepting burn. For each point of burn they accept, a water dancer takes (1 per character level) points of nonlethal damage. This damage can't be healed by any means other than getting a full night's rest, which removes all burn, or by using the ki cooling ability. 
A water dancer can accept only 1 point of burn per round. This limit rises to 2 points of burn at 6th level, and rises by 1 additional point every 3 levels thereafter. A water dancer can't choose to accept burn if it would put their total number of points of burn higher than (3 + their Constitution modifier), though they can be forced to accept more burn from a source outside their control.
Burn

A water dancer gains the elemental focus ability of the kineticist class, but must choose water as his element. He gains the basic hydrokinesis wild talent as normal, and gains the kinetic blast feature of the kineticist class for the water element, using his monk level as his effective kineticist level. He can’t use his kinetic blast when armored or encumbered.
Elemental Focus
Spend 2 points from your ki pool to lower your kinetic burn by 1.
Ki Cooling
At 4th level, a water dancer can spend 2 points from their ki pool to lower their burn by 1.

At 3rd level, a monk gains a pool of ki points, supernatural energy he can use to accomplish amazing feats. The number of points in a monk's ki pool is equal to 1/2 his monk level + his Charisma modifier. As long as he has at least 1 point in his ki pool, he can make a ki strike.
At 3rd level, ki strike allows his unarmed attacks to be treated as magic weapons for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.
At 7th level, his unarmed attacks are also treated as cold iron and silver for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.
At 10th level, his unarmed attacks are also treated as lawful weapons for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.
At 16th level, his unarmed attacks are treated as adamantine weapons for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction and bypassing hardness.
By spending 1 point from his ki pool as a swift action, a monk can make one additional unarmed strike at his highest attack bonus when making a flurry of blows attack. This bonus attack stacks with all bonus attacks gained from flurry of blows, as well as those from haste and similar effects. A monk gains additional powers that consume points from his ki pool as he gains levels.
The ki pool is replenished each morning after 8 hours of rest or meditation; these hours do not need to be consecutive.
Ki Pool

Water dancers are proficient with kinetic blasts and unarmed strikes. Water dancers are not proficient with any armor or shields. When wearing armor, using a shield, or carrying a medium or heavy load, a water dancer loses their AC bonus, as well as his fast movement ability.
Water Dancer Proficiencies

A water dancer gains the unarmed strike monk class feature but treats his unarmed strike damage as that of a monk 4 levels lower (minimum 1st level).
At 1st level, a monk gains Improved Unarmed Strike as a bonus feat. The damage dealt by a Medium monk's unarmed strike increases with level: 1d6 at levels 1–3, 1d8 at levels 4–7, 1d10 at levels 8–11, 2d6 at levels 12–15, 2d8 at levels 16–19, and 2d10 at level 20.
If the monk is Small, his unarmed strike damage increases as follows: 1d4 at levels 1–3, 1d6 at levels 4–7, 1d8 at levels 8–11, 1d10 at levels 12–15, 2d6 at levels 16–19, and 2d8 at level 20.
If the monk is Large, his unarmed strike damage increases as follows: 1d8 at levels 1–3, 2d6 at levels 4–7, 2d8 at levels 8–11, 3d6 at levels 12–15, 3d8 at levels 16–19, and 4d8 at level 20.
Unarmed Strike

At 2nd level and every 4 levels thereafter, a water dancer selects a new utility wild talent from the list of options available to the kineticist class, treating his monk level – 2 (minimum 1) as his kineticist level for the purpose of fulfilling prerequisites. He can select only universal wild talents or those that match his element.
Wild Talents

At 5th level, and every 4 levels thereafter, a water dancer learns one type of water style strike. 
Each style has two forms: 
Calm water forms use ki as a resource and provide long lasting, minor effects. 
Rapid water forms force the water dancer to accept a point of burn, in exchange for short, but major effects. 
A water dancer can only be effected by one style at a time, using a calm style removes other calm styles, rapid styles do not remove calm styles but suppress them for one round.
Water Style Strke
Water Style Strike
Calm Style suppress

Calm: Spend 1 point from your ki pool as a swift action, make a free trip attempt on critical unarmed hits for one minute. 
Rapid: Accept 1 point of burn as a swift action, the next unarmed strike that hits deals extra damage equal to half your blast damage, in addition to making a free trip attempt. 
These trip attempts use the base attack bonus of the attack used to hit the foe and do not provoke an attack of opportunity.

Divine/Profane Weapon Bond - Additional Use
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣/亵渎武器盟誓——额外使用次数

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A paladin/dread knight can add the axiomatic property to a weapon enhanced with her divine/profane weapon bond, but this consumes 2 points of enhancement bonus granted to this weapon.
An axiomatic weapon is infused with lawful power. It makes the weapon lawful-aligned and thus overcomes the corresponding damage reduction. It deals an extra 2d6 points of damage against chaotic creatures.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
圣武士/恐惧骑士可以将公正属性添加到与的神圣/亵渎武器结合增强的武器上，但这会占用授予该武器的 2 点增强加值。
公正武器灌有守序之力。该力量使得该武器成为守序{g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}阵营{/g}武器，因此可穿透相关的{g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}伤害减免{/g}。在击中混乱阵营生物时，额外造成{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Divine/Profane Weapon Bond - Axiomatic
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣/亵渎武器盟誓——公正

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A paladin/dread knight can add the brilliant energy property to a weapon enhanced with her divine/profane weapon bond, but this consumes 4 points of enhancement bonus granted to this weapon.
A brilliant energy weapon ignores nonliving matter. Armor and shield bonuses to AC (including any enhancement bonuses to that armor) do not count against it because the weapon passes through armor. (Dexterity, deflection, dodge, natural armor, and other such bonuses still apply.) A brilliant energy weapon cannot harm undead, constructs, or objects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
圣武士/恐惧骑士可以将光能属性添加到与的神圣/亵渎武器结合增强的武器上，但这会占用授予该武器的 4 点增强加值。
光能武器能够无视无生命物质。因武器能够直接穿过防具，所以盔甲和盾牌对于{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}防御等级{/g}的加值（包括防具的强化加值）无效。（{g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}敏捷{/g}、偏斜、闪避、天生防御和其他类似加值依旧生效。）光能武器无法对不死生物、构装体或物品造成伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Divine/Profane Weapon Bond - Brilliant Energy
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣/亵渎武器盟誓——光能

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A paladin/dread knight can add the flaming burst property to a weapon enhanced with her divine/profane weapon bond, but this consumes 2 points of enhancement bonus granted to this weapon. A flaming burst weapon functions as a flaming weapon that also explodes with flame upon striking a successful critical hit. The fire does not harm the wielder. In addition to the extra 1d6 fire damage from the flaming ability, a flaming burst weapon deals an extra 1d10 points of fire damage on a successful critical hit. If the weapon's critical multiplier is ?3, add an extra 2d10 points of fire damage instead, and if the multiplier is ?4, add an extra 3d10 points of fire damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
圣武士/恐惧骑士可以将焰爆属性添加到与的神圣/亵渎武器结合增强的武器上，但这会占用授予该武器的 2 点增强加值。
焰爆武器的作用如同炽焰武器，不过在成功进行{g|Encyclopedia:Critical}重击{/g}时还会爆出一阵烈焰。火焰不会伤害持用者。除了炽焰武器给予的{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}点额外{g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}火焰伤害{/g}之外，焰爆武器在成功重击时还会额外造成1d10点火焰{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}。若武器重击倍数为×3，则改为额外造成2d10点火焰伤害。若重击倍数为×4，则改为额外造成3d10点火焰伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Divine/Profane Weapon Bond - Flaming Burst
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣/亵渎武器盟誓——焰爆

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A paladin/dread knight can add the flaming property to a weapon enhanced with her divine/profane weapon bond, but this consumes 1 point of enhancement bonus granted to this weapon.
A flaming weapon is sheathed in fire that deals an extra 1d6 points of fire damage on a successful hit. The fire does not harm the wielder.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
圣武士/恐惧骑士可以将炽焰属性添加到使用她的神圣/亵渎武器结合增强的武器上，但这会占用授予该武器的 1 点增强加值。
炽焰武器覆盖有高温火焰，成功命中后会造成{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}点额外{g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}火焰伤害{/g}。火焰不会伤害持用者。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Divine/Profane Weapon Bond - Flaming
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣/亵渎武器盟誓——炽焰

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A paladin/dread knight can add the keen property to a weapon enhanced with her divine/profane weapon bond, but this consumes 1 point of enhancement bonus granted to this weapon.
The keen property doubles the threat range of a weapon. This benefit doesn't stack with any other effects that expand the threat range of a weapon (such as the keen edge spell or the Improved Critical feat).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
圣武士/恐惧骑士可以将锐锋属性添加到用她的神圣/亵渎武器结合增强的武器上，但这会占用授予该武器的 1 点增强加值。
锐锋属性能够使得武器的{g|Encyclopedia:Critical}重击{/g}威胁范围翻倍。该效果不与其他可增加武器重击威胁范围的效果叠加（例如磨锋砺刃{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}或精通重击{g|Encyclopedia:Feat}专长{/g}）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Divine/Profane Weapon Bond - Keen
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣/亵渎武器盟誓——锐锋

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A paladin/dread knight can add the speed property to a weapon enhanced with her divine/profane weapon bond, but this consumes 3 points of enhancement bonus granted to this weapon.
When making a full attack, the wielder of a speed weapon may make one extra attack with it. The attack uses the wielder's full base attack bonus, plus any modifiers appropriate to the situation. (This benefit is not cumulative with similar effects, such as a haste spell.)
Divine/Profane Weapon Bond - Speed
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣/亵渎武器盟誓——追击

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Weather: You do not take penalties or damage or suffer from reduced visibility or other effects due to natural weather. You gain electricity resistance 30, and your call lightning and call lightning storm spells and effects always function as though called outdoors in stormy weather.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
天气：您不会因自然天气而遭受减值、损伤、能见度降低或其他影响。你获得 30 点电击抗力，并且你的召雷术和召唤雷暴法术和效果总是像在暴风雨天气中被施展一样发挥作用。

天气：您不会因自然天气而遭受减值、损伤、能见度降低或其他影响。你获得 30 点电击抗力，并且你的召雷术和召唤雷暴法术和效果总是像在暴风雨天气中被施展一样发挥作用。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Weather Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 天气领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A sworn of the Eldest uses her Charisma modifier, rather than her Wisdom modifier, to determine all class features and effects relating to her inquisitor class, including her spells, cunning initiative, and true judgment abilities.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 原初誓约者使用魅力修正值，而不是感知修正值来决定与审判者等级相关的所有等级特征和效果，包括法术、狡猾先攻和真实判断能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Whimsical Worship
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 异想天开的崇拜

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your touch infuses life and weapons with chaos, and you carry a divine whimsy wherever you go.
Touch of Chaos: You can imbue a target with chaos as a melee touch attack. For the next round, anytime the target rolls a d20, he must roll twice and take the less favorable result. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Unexpected Whimsy: All enemies within 30 feet of you that can see and hear you must succeed a Will saving throw or they collapse into gales of manic laughter, falling prone. Those who fail their saving throws can take no actions other than laughing for 1 round, but are not considered helpless. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time for every 4 levels you possess beyond 8th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
以你的手为武器注入混乱的生命，无论你走到哪里，你都带着各种奇思妙想。
混乱之触：混乱之触：以近战{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触攻击{/g}，对目标灌注混乱之力。在下一轮中，当目标{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}投骰{/g}结果为d20时，他必须投骰两次，并取较不利的那次投骰结果。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
无厘头：以一个标准动作，你可以通过舞蹈，演剧或说笑话打破他人的敌意。所有处于你30尺范围内的敌人都必须通过一个DC=（10+1/2你的牧师等级+你感知调整值一半）的意志检定，否则将直接笑倒在地1轮，陷入俯卧状态。同时，在豁免检定上失败的生物将在1轮内无法进行任何动作（不过不视为无助）。你可以在8级每天使用一次此能力，之后每4级多获得一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Whimsy Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 滑稽子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can use wild shape to change into a dragon-scaled version of yourself with long fangs, gaining a +1 natural armor bonus to your AC and a bite attack appropriate for your size (1d6 points of damage for a Medium druid) but otherwise retaining your usual form.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你使用野性变身，成为长有长牙的龙鳞形态，在AC上获得+1天生防御，获得一次适合你体型的啮咬攻击（中体型德鲁伊造成1d6伤害），其他则保留正常身体状态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can use wild shape to change into a dragon-scaled version of yourself with long fangs, gaining a +1 natural armor bonus to your AC and a bite attack appropriate for your size (1d6 points of damage for a Medium druid) but otherwise retaining your usual form.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你使用野性变身，成为长有长牙的龙鳞形态，在AC上获得+1天生防御，获得一次适合你体型的啮咬攻击（中体型德鲁伊造成1d6伤害），其他则保留正常身体状态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dragon Shape - Dragon Fangs
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙形 - 龙牙

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can use wild shape to change into a dragon-scaled version of yourself with long fangs, gaining a +1 natural armor bonus to your AC and a bite attack appropriate for your size (1d6 points of damage for a Medium druid) but otherwise retaining your usual form.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你使用野性变身，成为长有长牙的龙鳞形态，在AC上获得+1天生防御，获得一次适合你体型的啮咬攻击（中体型德鲁伊造成1d6伤害），其他则保留正常身体状态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You become a medium black dragon. You gain a +4 size bonus to Strength, a +2 size bonus to Constitution, a +4 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a acid breath weapon, and resistance to acid 20. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (1d8), two claws (1d6), and two wing attacks (1d4). You can only use the breath weapon once per casting of this spell. All breath weapons deal 6d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage.
This ability costs 2 uses of your Wild Shape resource.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成一条中型黑龙。你的力量获得 +4 体型加值，体质获得 +2 体型加值，AC 获得 +4 形态天生防御加值，对困难地形免疫，酸性喷吐武器和对酸液的抵抗力 20。你的移动速度增加10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬（1d8）、两次爪抓（1d6）和两次翼击（1d4）。每次施放此法术时，你只能使用一次喷吐武器。所有喷吐武器造成 6d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。此能力需要消耗 2 次野性形态次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dragon Shape - Black Dragon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙形——黑龙

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You become a large black dragon. You gain a +6 size bonus to Strength, a +4 size bonus to Constitution, a +6 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a acid breath weapon, damage reduction 5/magic, and resistance to acid 20. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (2d6), two claws (1d8), two wing attacks (1d6), and one tail slap attacks (1d8). You can only use the breath weapon once per casting of this spell. All breath weapons deal 8d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage.
This ability costs 2 uses of your Wild Shape resource.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成一条大型黑龙。你的力量获得+6体型加值，体质获得+4体型加值，AC获得+6形态天生防御加值，免疫困难地形，酸性喷吐武器，伤害减免5/魔法，抗酸性20。你的移动速度提高 10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬（2d6）、两次爪抓（1d8）、两次翼击（1d6）和一次尾扫（1d8）。每次施放此法术时，你只能使用一次喷吐武器。所有喷吐武器造成 8d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。此能力需要消耗 2 次野性形态次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dragon Shape - Large Black Dragon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙形——大型黑龙

LocalizedStrings.enGB:

Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (1d8), two claws (1d6), and two wing attacks (1d4). You can only use the breath weapon once per casting of this spell. All breath weapons deal 6d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage.
This ability costs 2 uses of your Wild Shape resource.

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成一条中型黄铜龙。你的力量获得 +4 体型加值，体质获得 +2 体型加值，AC 获得 +4 形态天生防御加值，对困难地形免疫，火焰喷吐武器，火焰抗性 20。你的移动速度增加10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬（1d8）、两次爪抓（1d6）和两次翼击（1d4）。每次施放此法术时，你只能使用一次喷吐武器。所有喷吐武器造成 6d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。此能力需要消耗 2 次野性形态次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dragon Shape - Brass Dragon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙形——黄铜龙

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You become a large brass dragon. You gain a +6 size bonus to Strength, a +4 size bonus to Constitution, a +6 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a fire breath weapon, damage reduction 5/magic, and resistance to fire 20. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (2d6), two claws (1d8), two wing attacks (1d6), and one tail slap attacks (1d8). You can only use the breath weapon once per casting of this spell. All breath weapons deal 8d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage.
This ability costs 2 uses of your Wild Shape resource.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成了一条大型黄铜龙。你的力量获得+6体型加值，体质获得+4体型加值，AC获得+6形态天生防御加值，免疫困难地形，火焰吐息武器，伤害减免5/魔法，火焰抗力20。你的移动速度提高 10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬（2d6）、两次爪抓（1d8）、两次翼击（1d6）和一次尾扫（1d8）。每次施放此法术时，你只能使用一次喷吐武器。所有喷吐武器造成 8d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。此能力需要消耗 2 次野性形态次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dragon Shape - Large Brass Dragon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙形——大型黄铜龙

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You become a medium dragon-like creature. You gain a +4 size bonus to Strength, a +2 size bonus to Constitution, a +4 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a breath weapon, and resistance to one element. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (1d8), two claws (1d6), and two wing attacks (1d4). Your breath weapon and resistance depend on the type of your dragon prototype. You can only use the breath weapon once per casting of this spell. All breath weapons deal 6d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage.
This ability costs 2 uses of your Wild Shape resource.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成了中型龙类生物。你在力量上获得 +4 体型加值，在体质上获得 +2 体型加值，在 AC 上获得 +4 形态天生防御加值，对困难地形免疫，喷吐武器和对一种元素的抵抗力。你的移动速度提高 10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬（1d8）、两次爪抓（1d6）和两次翼击（1d4）。你的喷吐武器和抗性取决于你的龙种的类型。每次施放此法术时，你只能使用一次喷吐武器。所有喷吐武器造成 6d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。此能力需要消耗 2 次野性形态次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wild Shape (Dragon)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 野性形态（龙）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This ability functions as Wild Shape (Dragon) except that it also allows you to assume the form of a large dragon-like creature. You gain the following abilities: a +6 size bonus to Strength, a +4 size bonus to Constitution, a +6 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a breath weapon, damage reduction 5/magic, and resistance to one element. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (2d6), two claws (1d8), two wing attacks (1d6), and one tail slap attack (1d8). You can only use the breath weapon twice per casting of this spell (when you use it, the duration of your breath weapon ability is reduced by 1/2 caster level minutes), and you must wait 1d4 rounds between uses. All breath weapons deal 8d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage. Line breath weapons increase to 80-foot lines and cones increase to 40-foot cones.
This ability costs 2 uses of your Wild Shape resource.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 此能力与野性形态（龙）一样发挥作用，但它还允许您呈现大型类龙生物的形态。你获得以下能力：力量+6体型加值，体质+4体型加值，AC+6形态天生防御加值，免疫困难地形，喷吐武器，伤害减免5/魔法，抵抗一种元素。你的移动速度提高 10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬（2d6）、两次爪抓（1d8）、两次翼击（1d6）和一次尾扫（1d8）。每次施展此法术你只能使用喷吐武器两次（当你使用它时，你的喷吐武器能力的持续时间减少 1/2 施法者等级分钟），并且你必须在两次使用之间等待 1d4 轮。所有喷吐武器造成 8d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。线型喷吐武器增加到 80 英尺，锥形增加到 40 英尺。此能力需要消耗 2 次野性形态次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wild Shape (Large Dragon)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 野性形态（大型龙）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You become a medium green dragon. This ability costs 2 uses of your Wild Shape resource.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成一条中型绿龙。你的力量获得 +4 体型加值，体质获得 +2 体型加值，AC 获得 +4 形态天生防御加值，对困难地形免疫，酸性喷吐武器和对酸液的抵抗力 20。你的移动速度增加10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬（1d8）、两次爪抓（1d6）和两次翼击（1d4）。每次施放此法术时，你只能使用一次喷吐武器。所有喷吐武器造成 6d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。此能力需要消耗 2 次野性形态次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dragon Shape - Large White Dragon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙形——大型白龙

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action, you can unleash a blast of air in a 30-foot line. Make a combat maneuver check against each creature in the line, using your caster level as your base attack bonus and your Wisdom modifier in place of your Strength modifier. Treat the results as a bull rush attempt. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个标准动作，你可放出30尺直线的冲击波，用你的“施法者等级+感知修正”作为战技加值来冲撞线上生物。每天“3+感知修正”次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wind Blast
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 风爆

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You can manipulate wind, mist, and lightning, and are resistant to electricity damage.
Wind Blast: As a standard action, you can unleash a blast of air in a 30-foot line. Make a combat maneuver check to push back each creature in the line, using your caster level as your base attack bonus and your Wisdom modifier in place of your Strength modifier. Treat the results as a bull rush attempt. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Electricity Resistance: At 6th level, you gain resist electricity 10. This resistance increases to 20 at 12th level. At 20th level, you gain immunity to electricity.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你可以操纵风、雾和闪电，并且可以抵抗电击伤害。
风爆：以一个标准动作，你可放出30尺直线的冲击波，用你的“施法者等级+感知修正”作为战技加值来冲撞线上生物。每天“3+感知修正”次。
电击抗性：达到6级时，你将获得10点电击抗性。此抗性在12级时将增加为20。达到20级时，你将获得电击免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wind Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 风子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You can manipulate wind, mist, and lightning, and are resistant to electricity damage.
Wind Blast: As a standard action, you can unleash a blast of air in a 30-foot line. Make a combat maneuver check to push back each creature in the line, using your caster level as your base attack bonus and your Wisdom modifier in place of your Strength modifier. Treat the results as a bull rush attempt. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Electricity Resistance: At 6th level, you gain resist electricity 10. This resistance increases to 20 at 12th level. At 20th level, you gain immunity to electricity.
Domain Spells: ear piercing scream, protection from arrows, lightning bolt, shout, cloudkill, sirocco, elemental body IV (air), greater shout, winds of vengeance.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 9th level, a storm druid can select another domain or subdomain from those available to her through her nature bond.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 9级时，暴风之主可以额外选择一个他自然纽带提供的领域或子领域。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Windlords Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 风王

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 2nd level, a storm druid is unaffected by all light wind and snow effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 2级时，自然或魔法所起风其效性对暴风之主来说降低一级，此能力取代穿林。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Windwalker
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 风行者

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Elder of Divinity   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Ceremonies, Religiousness, Service   
Domains: Good, Knowledge, Law, Protection   
Subdomains: Archon, Defense, Legislation, Loyalty, Purity   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy mace   
Holy Symbol: Censer hanging from a sapphire mace   
Sacred Animal: Egret   
In his palatial quarters in the Great Library of Harmonious Scripture, Winlas maintains a massive tome detailing every sacred ceremony in existence, knowledge that he uses to counteract the evil done by profane observances. Winlas stands 11 feet tall and has skin the shade of unspoiled parchment. His white silk robe is impeccably clean beneath his heavy tunic of blue brocade trimmed in gold. A sweeping tapestry depicting countless religious rituals-each one minutely detailed in silver threadhangs from his shoulders, and he wears a four-pointed crown of beaten gold. Depictions of the lord of ceremonies show him as an old man with a heavy tome in his arms. The Elder of Divinity teaches that religious ritual unites the faithful, and there is great power in numbers. Religious rituals are not distant prescriptions, but elements of worship passed down from the divine and shaped by pious mortals over the years. Winlas does not encourage loose interpretations of rituals or careless development of new rites. Instead, he and his agents communicate the importance of following religious doctrine to the letter and work to preserve these sacred rites in their entirety.

头衔：神学先师
阵营：守序善良 
神职：仪式，宗教，服务
领域：善良、知识、守序、保护
子领域：亚空、防御、立法、忠诚、纯净
偏好武器：重型硬头锤
圣徽：蓝宝石战锤上垂下的焚香炉
圣兽：白鹭
在他位于和谐圣典大图书馆宫殿般的私人房间，文拉斯保存着一本巨著，详述了现存的每一个神圣仪式，他运用这些来对抗世俗仪式带来的邪恶。文拉斯身高 11 英尺，肤色如纸。他的白色丝绸长袍在他沉重的金镶边蓝色锦缎束腰外衣下一尘不染。一幅描绘无数宗教仪式的宽幅挂毯——每一个都用银线细细细细地挂在他的肩膀上，他戴着一顶四角金冠。
在对仪式之主的描绘中他是个携带一本大书的老人。神性长老教导说，宗教仪式将信徒团结在一起，人多力量大。宗教仪式并非遥不可及的处方，而是从神传下来的崇拜元素，并由虔诚的凡人多年来塑造而成。
文拉斯不鼓励对仪式的松散解释或对新仪式的粗心发展。相反，他和他的代理人传达了遵循宗教教义的重要性，并努力完整地保存这些神圣的仪式。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Winlas
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 文拉斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stars themselves hold many answers, you may add your Charisma modifier to your Wisdom modifier on all Wisdom-based checks. In addition, once per day you can cast one spell as if it were modified by the Empower Spell or Extend Spell feat without increasing the spell’s casting time or level.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action, the stargazer causes one creature within 30 feet to burn like a star. The creature takes 1d6 points of fire damage for every 2 levels the stargazer possesses and emits bright light for 1 round. A successful Fortitude saving throw halves the damage and negates the emission of bright light. The stargazer can use this hex a number of times per day equal to her Charisma modifier (minimum 1), but must wait 1d4 rounds between uses.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 作为标准动作，观星者可以使 30 英尺内的一个生物像星星一样燃烧。观星者每升 2 级，该生物就会受到 1d6 点火焰伤害，并在 1 个回合内发出强光。成功的强韧自救会将伤害减半，并抵消亮光的发射。观星者每天可以使用此六角星的次数等于她的魅力修正值（最少 1 次），但两次使用之间必须等待 1d4 回合。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You create 1d4+2 wood golems with the advanced template. The golems willingly aid you in combat or battle, perform a specific mission, or serve as bodyguards. You can only have one wooden phalanx spell in effect at one time. If you cast this spell while another casting is still in effect, the previous casting is dispelled.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 您使用高等模板创造了 1d4+2 个木头精怪。这些木偶自愿在战斗或战役中帮助你，执行特定任务，或充当护卫。同一时间只能有一个木制法阵法术生效。如果您在施放该魔法时，另一个魔法仍在生效，则之前的魔法会被驱散。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Monkey King, Aware of Vacuity   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Drunkenness, Nature, Trickery   
Edict: Inspire passion, comfort and free the repressed, seek your true self and desires   
Domains: Chaos, Liberation, Travel, Trickery   
Subdomains: Deception, Exploration, Freedom, Protean, Revolution, Thievery   
Favoured Weapon: Quarterstaff   
Holy Symbol: Stone Monkey   
Sacred Animal: Monkey   
Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, is the Tian Xia god of trickery, nature, and drunkenness. Originally a stone statue, Sun Wukong was given life and eventually became king of all monkeys. That was not enough for him, so he went before Qi Zhong, god of magic, hoping to glean the secret of immortality. Qi Zhong would not part with this secret, but taught Sun Wukong many other techniques. Undeterred, the ambitious Monkey King then sneaked into Pharasma's Boneyard and erased his name from her records, so gaining immortality.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:

阵营：混乱中立 
神职：醉酒、自然、诡计
信条：激发激情，安慰和释放被压抑的人，寻找真正的自我和渴求
领域：混乱、自由、旅行、诡计
子领域：欺骗、探索、自由、星灵、革命、盗窃
偏好武器：木棍
圣徽：石猴 
圣兽：猴
美猴王孙悟空是一个极其狡黠的神祗，有关于他的神话传说在龙国数不胜数。据说最初，孙悟空只是一具活化的石猴雕塑，并以自己的能力成为了猿猴之王。不过它完全不满足于这种凡俗形态，所以孙悟空找上了魔法之神齐仲以探求不朽之法。药师祖自然不会轻易就分享永生的秘密给一只猴子，不过他还是教了孙悟空很多魔法的知识。最后，孙悟空只身潜入到法莱斯玛的骨园神域，偷偷从生死薄上抹掉了自己的名字从而获得了不死之身。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wukong
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 悟空

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wyrm singers spin fragments of the story of the ongoing struggle between noble Apsu and wicked Dahak.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙战颂者将高贵的阿普苏和邪恶的达哈克之间持续斗争的故事碎片化。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wyrm Singer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙战颂者

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 12th level, once per day as a swift action, a wyrm singer can grant a breath weapon attack to himself or an ally affected by his draconic rage raging song. Using the breath weapon is a standard action, and it affects creatures in a 30-foot cone or a 60-foot line. The breath weapons deal 1d6 points of damage per 2 character levels, and are of an energy type of the wyrm singer’s choice (acid, cold, electricity, or fire). Creatures caught in the area can attempt a Reflex save (DC = 10 + 1/2 the characters level + their Constiution modifier) to halve the damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙战颂者在 12 级时，每天一次，作为快速动作，可以为自己或受其龙怒狂歌影响的盟友赋予一次吐息武器攻击。使用吐息武器是一个标准动作，它会影响 30 英尺锥形范围或 60 英尺直线范围内的生物。吐息武器每 2 个角色等级造成 1d6 点伤害，能量类型由龙战颂者选择（酸、冷、电或火）。周围的生物可以尝试反射豁免（DC = 10 + 1/2角色等级 + 他们的体质修正值）将伤害减半。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 12th level, once per day as a swift action, a wyrm singer can grant a breath weapon attack to himself or an ally affected by his draconic rage raging song. Using the breath weapon is a standard action, and it affects creatures in a 30-foot cone or a 60-foot line. The breath weapons deal 1d6 points of damage per 2 skald levels the wyrm singer has, and are of an energy type of the wyrm singer’s choice (acid, cold, electricity, or fire). Creatures caught in the area can attempt a Reflex save (DC = 10 + 1/2 the characters level + their Constiution modifier) to halve the damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙战颂者在 12 级时，每天一次，作为快速动作，可以为自己或受其龙怒狂歌影响的盟友赋予一次吐息武器攻击。使用吐息武器是一个标准动作，它会影响 30 英尺锥形范围或 60 英尺直线范围内的生物。龙战颂者每提升 2 个斯卡尔德等级，吐息武器就会造成 1d6 点伤害，能量类型由龙战颂者选择（酸、冷、电或火）。周围的生物可以尝试反射豁免（DC = 10 + 1/2角色等级 + 他们的体质修正值）将伤害减半。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wyrm Singers Fire Breath - Line
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙战颂者火之吐息 - 线性

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, a wyrm singer can kindle an echo of ancient rage felt between warring dragon clans in his allies. This ability acts as inspired rage, except those affected gain a +2 bonus on melee attack and damage rolls and a +2 bonus on saving throws against paralysis and sleep effects (but they still take a –1 penalty to their AC), rather than inspired rage’s normal bonuses. At 4th level and every 4 skald levels thereafter, the song’s bonuses on saves against paralysis and sleep effects increase by 1. At 8th and 16th levels, the song’s bonus on melee attack and damage rolls increases by 1.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1 级时，龙战颂者可以在他的盟友中燃起龙族之间交战时的古老愤怒回声。该能力的作用与鼓舞愤怒相同，但受影响者在近战攻击和伤害投掷上获得 +2 加成，在对抗麻痹和睡眠效果的豁免检定上获得 +2 加成（但他们的 AC 值仍会受到 -1惩罚），而不是鼓舞愤怒的普通加成。在第 4 级和之后的每 4 个斯卡尔德等级，歌曲对麻痹和睡眠效果的豁免加成增加 1。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, a wyrm singer can kindle an echo of ancient rage felt between warring dragon clans in his allies. This ability acts as inspired rage, except those affected gain a +2 bonus on melee attack and damage rolls and a +2 bonus on saving throws against paralysis and sleep effects (but they still take a –1 penalty to their AC), rather than inspired rage’s normal bonuses. At 4th level and every 4 skald levels thereafter, the song’s bonuses on saves against paralysis and sleep effects increase by 1. At 8th and 16th levels, the song’s bonus on melee attack and damage rolls increases by 1.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Rage
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙之怒

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, a wyrm singer can kindle an echo of ancient rage felt between warring dragon clans in his allies. This ability acts as inspired rage, except those affected gain a +2 bonus on melee attack and damage rolls and a +2 bonus on saving throws against paralysis and sleep effects (but they still take a –1 penalty to their AC), rather than inspired rage’s normal bonuses. At 4th level and every 4 skald levels thereafter, the song’s bonuses on saves against paralysis and sleep effects increase by 1. At 8th and 16th levels, the song’s bonus on melee attack and damage rolls increases by 1.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1 级时，龙战颂者可以在他的盟友中燃起龙族之间交战时的古老愤怒回声。该能力的作用与鼓舞愤怒相同，但受影响者在近战攻击和伤害投掷上获得 +2 加成，在对抗麻痹和睡眠效果的豁免检定上获得 +2 加成（但他们的 AC 值仍会受到 -1惩罚），而不是鼓舞愤怒的普通加成。在第 4 级和之后的每 4 个斯卡尔德等级，歌曲对麻痹和睡眠效果的豁免加成增加 1。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 14th level, a wyrm singer embraces the essence of the draconic histories, allowing his allies to manifest aspects of a dragon in their physical forms. The wyrm singer selects a single ally within 50 feet to take on a draconic aspect (as per form of the dragon I) of a type of the wyrm singer’s choice. The ally cannot use the breath weapon attack provided by form of the dragon. The wyrm singer must expend 1 round of raging song each round to maintain wyrm saga, and can affect only a single ally at a time.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 14 级时，巫妖歌者会接受龙族历史的精髓，让他的盟友在他们的身体形态中表现出龙的一面。巫妖歌者在 50 英尺内选择一名盟友，使其具有巫妖歌者所选择类型的龙兽特征（与龙之形态 I 相同）。该盟友不能使用龙之形提供的吐息武器攻击。狼人歌手必须每回合消耗一轮狂暴之歌来维持狼人传奇，每次只能影响一名盟友。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wyrm Saga
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙吟

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You are in a dragon-like creature form now. You have a +4 polymorph bonus to Strength, a +2 polymorph bonus to Constitution, a +4 natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, and resistance to acid 20. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (1d8), two claws (1d6), and two wing attacks (1d4). You do not gain the breath weapon normally gained from dragonkind spells.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你现在是龙形生物。你的力量有 +4 变形加成，体质有 +2 变形加成， AC 有 +4 天生护甲加成，对困难地形免疫，对酸有 20 抗性。你的移动速度增加 10 英尺。你还会获得一次咬击（1d8）、两次爪击（1d6）和两次翅膀攻击（1d4）。您不会获得通常从龙类法术中获得的吐息武器。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Inmost Blot, The Star Seed   
Alignment: Neutral Evil   
Areas of Concern: Decay, Parasites, Transformation   
Rank: Great Old One   
Domains: Death, Evil, Plant, Trickery   
Subdomains: Decay, Deception, Murder, Undead   
Favoured Weapon: Spear   
Holy Symbol: Sphere of tendrils   
The sentient infestation known as Xhamen-Dor, first cultivated in the sewers of the alien city of Carcosa, infected and transformed countless worlds before some ancient catastrophe or miscalculation nearly destroyed it. Reduced to a single blot of fungoid sentience trapped within a comet, the Great Old One eventually came to Golarion during Earthfall, accidentally plucked from the sky just as the Starstone was in the aboleths’ assault upon the doomed nation of Azlant. Where Xhamen-Dor’s comet came to rest is unknown, but its cult agrees that the fallen star that bears the Great Old One’s core lies in the depths of a large but remote lake somewhere in the world. Since that date, Xhamen-Dor has slowly begun wakening, growing and sending filaments of its fungoid body throughout the world to rise up here and there to infest and spread. Those infected by the Inmost Blot first become sickly, then begin to simultaneously decay and transform, eventually becoming undead monsters animated by a combination of necromantic energy and the alien fungal masses that writhe in their cores. Cultists of Xhamen-Dor often take these parasitic creatures into themselves under the belief that they will live on as part of the creatures that emerge from their bodies, but just as often use unsuspecting sacrifices to serve as hosts. Foul Xhamen-Dor is said to have once resembled a tangled mass of fungoid tendrils growing from the shattered bones of some ancient reptilian lifeform, though what nightmarish shape the slowly growing blight has taken on today is unknown.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：深心污点
阵营：中立邪恶 
神职：腐败，寄生与转化
等级：旧日支配者 
领域：死亡、邪恶、植物、诡计
子领域：腐朽、欺骗、杀戮、亡灵
偏好武器：矛
圣徽：带有两条长尾的球状卷须
这个被称作夏曼·朵的智能祸患最初诞生于外星城市卡尔克萨的阴渠之中，在一场远古天灾或错误计算几乎将祂摧毁之前，祂已侵染并转化了无数世界。这位旧日支配者最终在底栖魔鱼（Aboleth）唤来星石（Starstone）袭击阿兹兰特（Azlant）之时意外受其牵引，伴随星陨（Earthfall）降临格拉里昂。无人知晓夏曼·朵寄宿的彗星坠于何处，但祂的信徒一直认为承载这位旧日支配者核心的陨星位于世界某处的偏僻大湖深处。
自那时起，夏曼·朵已经缓慢地重新苏醒、生长、将其真菌孢子散布至世界各地滋生蔓延。受深心污点感染者首先如同患病，随后同时开始腐烂和转化，最终化为由死灵能量与内含外星真菌丝群的核心结合而成的亡灵生物。夏曼·朵的信徒常将这些寄生生物植入自己的身体，相信自己会成为自身体中诞生的生物的一部分继续存在，但同时也常利用毫无防备的祭品充作宿主。
据称肮脏的夏曼·朵曾经形如自某种古代爬行生物碎裂骨架中生出的缠曲真菌卷须丝群，不过这位缓慢生长的祸患如今呈现何种噩梦形状还无从得知。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Xhamen-Dor
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 夏曼·朵

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Minister of Blood   
Alignment: Lawful Evil   
Areas of Concern: Harsh justice, Murder, Punishment   
Domains: Artifice, Death, Evil, Law, Trickery   
Subdomains: Construct, Deception, Devil, Murder, Toil, Undead   
Favoured Weapon: Shuriken (Dart)   
Holy Symbol: Bloody Shuriken   
Sacred Animal: Tiger   
Yaezhing is the god of murder and death. But as the Minister of Blood, he is also the punisher of the gods, the enforcer of divine justice. His dual roles sometimes conflict with one another, as when Yaezhing had to carry out Shizuru’s punishment against Fumeiyoshi, who had murdered his brother Tsukiyo. This duality is also reflected in Yaezhing’s temples, where his priests are often contracted to mete out punishments for convicted criminals, but are also available for murder for hire. Yaezhing is the patron of ninja and assassins, but he is also worshiped by executioners, judges, and those constables for whom inflicting punishment is more important than determining guilt. He appears as a shadowy humanoid figure swathed in darkness. His head is that of a tiger with human eyes.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：血宰相
阵营：守序邪恶 
神祗：严刑峻法、谋杀、惩罚 
领域：工匠、死亡、邪恶、守序、诡计 
子领域：构装、欺骗、邪魔、杀戮、疲累、亡灵 
偏好武器：手里剑（飞镖）
圣徽：血腥手里剑
圣兽：虎
崖刑通常被认为是死亡和谋杀之神，但是另一方面，如他的头衔：“血宰相”所暗示的，他也是神明间的司法官和代行神力的审判者。崖刑的双重角色常常会充满矛盾，比如说他必须毫不留情的按照静琉的指控处罚文业，仅仅是因为他谋杀了自己的兄弟。这种冲突的特征也体现在崖刑的信徒身上——崖刑的祭司既制裁被宣判有罪的犯人，也承担合约杀手的职责。崖刑是刺客和忍者的守护神，不过刽子手、法官和其他一些认为惩罚的意义大于定罪的人也崇拜他。崖刑的化身通常是一个浑身环绕着阴影，长着人类双眼的虎头人形。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Yaezhing
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 崖刑

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Mountain Lord   
Alignment: Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Mountains, Volcanoes, Winter   
Domains: Earth, Fire, Protection, Strength, Water   
Subdomains: Ash, Caves, Defense, Fist, Flowing, Ice, Resolve, Smoke, Solitude   
Favoured Weapon: Tetsubo (Greatclub)   
Holy Symbol: Erupting, snow-capped volcano   
Sacred Animal: Ram   
Yamatsumi is the god of mountains, volcanoes, and winter. Every snow-capped mountain peak is a temple to him, and every volcanic eruption a sign of his wrath. Yet Yamatsumi is also a god of renewal, for his winter snows feed the rivers running through green valleys, and ash from his volcanoes fertilizes the fields of farmers. Ascetic mountain monks, or yamabushi, ake up a majority of his faithful, but people from all walks of life pray to Yamatsumi to avert his wrath when the first winds of winter blow, or the nearby volcano belches smoke. Yamatsumi appears as a giant man with ice for skin, lava for hair and a beard, and two pairs of ram’s horns on his head.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：山之主 
阵营：绝对中立 
神职：山脉、火山、冬季 
领域：大地、烈火、保护、力量、流水
子领域：灰烬、洞窟、防御、冰、决意、烟幕
偏好武器：金碎棒（巨木棒） 
圣徽：正在喷发的雪顶火山 
圣兽：公羊
山积是山脉，火山，冬季之神，对他来说，白雪皑皑的山峰就是最好的神殿，而火山的爆发则代表他的怒气。另一方面，山积也是新生之神，他让融雪充盈山谷间的河流，火山灰肥沃农人耕作的土壤。在山中苦行的武僧和验修者是他的主要信徒，不过几乎所有的凡人都会在冬风渐起，或者火山活动时向山积祈祷息怒。山积的化身通常是一个皮肤冰洁的巨人，有着熔岩构成的头发和胡须，额上顶着一对巨型的公羊角。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Mother of Tongues
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Form: Protean Lord  
Areas of Concern: Language evolution, Lost words, Slang  
Domains: Chaos, Knowledge, Rune, Trickery  
Favoured Weapon: Greatclub   
Holy Symbol: Yawning maw drawn in lines of protean poetry  
Ydajisk manifests as a skein of iridescent poetry outlining a massive serpent vaguely resembling an izfiitar, surrounded by a cloud of drifting symbols, sounds, and other sensory experiences manifesting and dissolving back into nothing. Despite Ydajisk’s title, they eschew discrete sex or gender, their form shifting from moment to moment to suit their whimsy. Ydajisk holds a wealth of lost books, including copies of Tabris’s collected works, The Withered Footsteps of the Dire Shepherd, and rubbings of the Codex of the Infinite Planes. Ydajisk’s clergy wanders, chronicling the languages of dying civilizations, worlds on the edge of ecological collapse, and worlds threatened by divine conflict. Ydajisk’s Library of Stolen Words occupies an island of stone orbiting the monstrous, star-sized Felikar’s Whirlpool, meandering about in defiance of the devouring current. The library remotely feeds upon distant sources, transcribing knowledge into Ydajisk’s collection of books, magically bottled words, and preserved sensations.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：方言之母 
阵营：混乱中立
形态：千变万化的领主 
领域：语言进化、失落的词语、俚语 
领域：混乱、知识、符文、诡计 
偏好武器：Greatclub 
圣徽：用千变万化的诗行画出的打哈欠 Ydajisk表现为一串彩虹色的诗歌，勾勒出一条巨型的蛇，隐约地类似于一条 izfiitar，周围环绕着一团飘荡的符号、声音和其他感官体验，这些体验显现并消融于虚无之中。尽管有 Ydajisk 的
头衔：，但他们避开了离散的性别或性别，他们的形式时不时地变化以适应他们的奇思妙想。伊达吉斯克拥有大量丢失的书籍，包括塔布里斯文集、凶暴牧羊人枯萎的足迹和无限位面手抄本的拓本。 Ydajisk 的神职人员四处游荡，记录垂死文明的语言、处于生态崩溃边缘的世界以及受到神圣冲突威胁的世界。伊达吉斯克的失窃词汇图书馆占据了一个围绕着巨型的、恒星大小的费利卡漩涡旋转的石头岛，它在无视吞噬潮流的情况下蜿蜒而行。图书馆远程获取遥远的资源，将知识转录到 Ydajisk 的藏书、神奇的瓶装文字和保存下来的感觉中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ydajisk
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 伊达基斯克

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Headless King, Lord of Coiling Poison, the Father of Serpents   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Serpentfolk, Immortality, Poison   
Domains: Chaos, Evil, Nobility, Scalykind, War   
Subdomains: Demon, Leadership, Martyr, Saurian, Tactics   
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Snake skull and ouroboros   
Sacred Animal: Snake   
This ancient being was the patron god of the all-but-forgotten race of snake-men that battled mighty Azlant and lost. Forced to hide in the Darklands with his mortal servants, the Serpent King was decapitated by a mighty champion, but such was the power of the god that he remained alive in two pieces. Now his mindless body thrashes recklessly, and his head is lost and presumably rotted away to a skull; but there are some that say the skull still thinks and can control a tiny measure of power, and if it and the body were ever reunited, Ydersius would heal and lead his people in an attack on the surface world.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：无头之王
阵营：混乱邪恶 
神职：蛇人、不朽、毒药
领域：混乱、邪恶、崇高、鳞类、战争 
子领域：恶魔、领导、殉难、蜥类、战术
偏好武器：匕首 
圣徽：蛇头骨和衔尾蛇 
圣兽：蛇
这个古老的生物是几乎被遗忘的蛇人种族的守护神，他们与强大的阿兹兰特战斗并失败了。
当蛇人在与阿兹兰特帝国的战争中几乎全灭时，耶德西亚斯躲藏到了幽暗之地，一位强大的英雄将其斩首，但由于神的力量如此之大，即使被切成两半他依然存活，并据说在努力尝试合体重生。
现在他的无意识的身体肆无忌惮地跳动，他的头已经丢失，大概已经腐烂成头骨了。但也有人说头骨仍然会思考并且仍然具有些许神力，如果它和身体重新结合，耶德西亚斯会重生并带领他的人民对地表世界发起攻击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ydersius
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 耶德西亚斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Father of Serpents   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Cycles, Procreation, Serpents   
Rank: Great Old One   
Domains: Chaos, Community, Protection, Scalykind   
Subdomains: Defense, Dragon, Revelry, Venom   
Favoured Weapon: Punching dagger   
Holy Symbol: Coiled serpent with a crescent mark on its head   
Of all the Great Old Ones—indeed, of all the gods of the Elder Mythos—the Father of Serpents is without a doubt the most benign. Yet those who would be so foolish as to expect kindness from Yig would do well to think again, for Yig does not suffer fools and is as likely to devour those who beseech him for aid as he is to provide aid. Even Yig’s most devout worshipers realize the god may simply wish to feed at times, and on these occasions, no amount of devotion can protect the supplicant from death. Yig is worshiped primarily by nomadic societies and those who live with a close connection to the land; veneration of him is all but unknown in urban regions. He protects communities that honor him in the right ways, particularly if they follow the complex rituals required of his worship through the seasons. His favor can result in bountiful harvests, good hunts, and strong and healthy babies—at times immaculate conceptions are attributed to Yig, particularly if the resulting children bear crescent-shaped birthmarks upon their brows. Conversely, when a society has displeased or failed Yig, its children are born with crippling or monstrous deformities that leave mothers dead and fathers insane. Yig speaks through the actions of serpents, yet he is rarely worshiped by serpentfolk. Indeed, the Father of Serpents has long been at war with the god Ydersius, although since the decapitation of Ydersius, Yig has turned his attentions elsewhere. Yig appears as a scaled, humanoid creature with a serpent’s head and lashing tail, or as an immense rattlesnake with a crescent-shaped mark upon the brow.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：众蛇之父
阵营：混乱中立 
神职：循环，繁育与大蛇
等级：旧日支配者 
领域：混乱、联盟、保护、鳞状
子领域：防御、龙、狂欢、毒液
偏好武器：拳匕
圣徽：头顶带有新月印记的盘卷长蛇
在所有的旧日支配者之中——实际上，是古老神群的所有神祇中——众蛇之父无疑是最为温和的。然而那些愚蠢到期盼伊格恩惠的人最好思虑清楚，因为伊格不受欺瞒且很可能吞噬那些恳求祂帮助之人而此即为祂所赐下的帮助。纵是伊格最为虔诚的信徒也知晓这位神祇有时只想进食，而再多的献祭也无法在这种时候保护祈求者免于死亡。
伊格主要受游牧民族和与脚下大地紧密相连者的崇拜，而城市地区则罕有其信仰。祂会保护那些以正确方式崇敬祂的族群，尤其是当他们每个季度都贯彻复杂的遵从仪典时。祂的赐福能带来农牧与捕猎的丰饶收获以及强壮健康的婴儿——有些时候，完美的受孕被归功于伊格，尤其是诞下的婴儿额上带有新月胎记时。相反，若一个族群触怒了伊格，婴儿出生时便会伴有残废或成为恐怖的畸形，使母亲死亡而使父亲疯狂。尽管伊格通过蛇的行为传达先知，但祂很少受蛇人崇拜。事实上，众蛇之父长期以来一直与耶德希斯（Ydersius）交战，但在耶德希斯被斩首之后便不再问津。
伊格形如生有鳞片，具有蛇头蛇尾的人形，亦或呈现为额头带有新月印记的硕大响尾蛇。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Yig
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 伊格

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Harborwing   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Coastal waters, Fisherfolk, Flying creatures   
Domains: Air, Animal, Good, Water   
Subdomains: Agathion, Feather, Oceans, Wind   
Favoured Weapon: Longbow   
Holy Symbol: Golden seagull   
Sacred Animal: Seagull   
Ylimancha watches over the coastlines of the world and battles with Pazuzu for dominion over the souls of those beings who call the sky their home. Her conflict with the King of the Wind Demons began at the dawn of time when she and Pazuzu fought for the souls of winged beings as they sprang into existence. Ylimancha bitterly resents each race lost to Pazuzu's corrupting influence. The empyreal lord of coasts has two forms. One is that of a woman with the head of an osprey. In this form she carries a teak longbow strung with gold. Her other form is that of a 4-foot-tall pure white seagull with the head of a beautiful Varisian woman with short dark hair. Ylimancha can speak in both forms, and her words always carry with them the quiet echo of crashing waves. Agents of Ylimancha help protect coastlines and the mortals who live near the water. Harborwing teaches fisherfolk how to find s chools of marine animals and cautions fishers against taking too much from the sea's bounty. According to her faithful, it is Ylimancha who taught mortals to build breakwaters to protect their port cities from the corrosive effects of the sea's mighty waves. Ylimancha lives in a magnificent golden aerie on the Skyward Cliffs, which stand against the Sea of No Shadows in Nirvana.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：港湾之翼
阵营：中立善良 
神职：浅滩，渔民与飞行生物
领域：气、动物、善良、水
子领域：盖森、飞羽、海、风
偏好武器：长弓 
圣徽：金海鸥 
圣兽：海鸥
尤丽曼查注视着全世界的海岸线，她司掌浅滩，渔民与飞行生物。
尤丽曼查也被称为港湾之翼，她相信海与天，生灵与自然见的和谐共存。生活在海边陆地上的生物可以从海中获取养料与资源，但不能过多掠夺，破坏自然的平衡。海水有时会冲袭陆地，但陆地上的居民可以建造防波提，维持陆地上团队远离海水，获得安宁。尤丽曼查也热爱所有飞行生物，虽然恶魔领主帕祖祖也宣称自己对于飞行生物的管辖权。这使得尤丽曼查与帕祖祖陷入无尽的冲突，并让尤丽曼查每次看到有生物被转化为帕祖祖的信徒，都陷入极深的悲痛。
港湾之翼最常见的化身是一只巨型的海鸥，毛发纯白，头部是一个黑色短发的瓦瑞西亚女人。有时，她也会以人形的身体上有着鹗头的形态出现。这时，她会穿着像海浪般摇摆的长袍，蓝色的褶皱边缘泛着白色的泡沫。她带着一把黄金弓弦的柚木长弓，当她说话时，她的语音中带着浪花拍击海岸的沙沙声。尤丽曼查的追随者包括渔民，水手，人鱼，靠海洋维生之人和飞行生物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ylimancha
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 尤丽曼查

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lurker at the Threshold, The Key and the Gate, The Watcher   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Gates, Space, Time   
Rank: Outer God   
Domains: Chaos, Darkness, Knowledge, Travel, Void (Magic)   
Subdomains: Dark Tapestry, Exploration, Memory, Night, Stars, Thought   
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Black spiral   
According to some, the Dark Tapestry is not so much a location as a thing that connects all places and possibilities. These texts go on to suggest that this it is conscious—that it is aware. Yog-Sothoth is normally said to dwell within the Dark Tapestry, but some ancient legends say he is the Dark Tapestry. Certainly he has great power over time and space, and can exist at multiple times in multiple realities. Distance has no meaning to him, yet he seems unable to properly exist in the reality shared by most mortal life. He can only partially intrude upon this dimension, taking on the shape of a slithering mass of iridescent spheres or glowing motes of light when he does. Or perhaps Yog-Sothoth can exist in this world but has no reason to do so, and what mortals see and tremble before is but his shadow. Yog-Sothoth’s cultists believe he is slowly preparing the many worlds of the universe for a new age presaged by the wakening of the Great Old Ones, during which time the inhabitants of these worlds will be wiped out to make way for the true masters. Cults often call upon Yog-Sothoth to bless unborn children, turning them into monstrous hybrids that help to prepare the unsuspecting world for the time when the stars themselves shall be right for the Great Old Ones to rule once again.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：门之钥
阵营：混乱中立
神职：门扉，空间与时间
等级：外神
领域：混沌、黑暗、知识、旅行、虚空（魔法）
子领域：异幕，探索，记忆，暗夜，星辰，思想
偏好武器：匕首
圣徽：黑色螺旋
根据一些观点，黑暗异幕与其说是一处地点，不如说是一个连接一切所在与所有可能性的实体。这些文献进一步暗示它具备意识。犹格·索托斯通常被认为居住在黑暗异幕之中，但一些古代传说则表示祂即为黑暗异幕本身。可以肯定的是，祂掌有操控时间与空间的伟力，且存在于诸空间与诸时间。祂只能部分进入现实维度，呈现为斑斓球体或闪光微粒的聚合形态；又或许犹格·索托斯完全可以进入这个世界而仅仅只是并无理由如此行事，而凡人之所见所惧的不过是祂的投影。
犹格·索托斯的信徒相信，祂正缓慢地为宇宙中的无数世界打造一个崭新世代，而旧日支配者的觉醒则是新世代降临的预兆。在那之前，旧世界的居民将被扫灭净空而向新世界的真正主人让位。犹格·索托斯的信徒时常呼唤祂为未出世的新生儿祝福、将他们转变为可怕的混血而，以帮助这个毫无戒备的世界做好准备以迎接群星归位而旧日支配者再次统治世界的时刻到来。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Yog-Sothoth
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 犹格·索托斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Wise   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Magic, Crystal, Jewelers   
Domains: Artifice, Earth, Good, Knowledge, Magic   
Subdomains: Arcane, Azata, Caves, Construct, Divine, Memory   
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Three overlapping crystals   
Sacred Animal: Panther   
A patron of druids and mages alike, Yuelral prefers the magic of the natural world to that of metal, force, and other artificial things. Jewelers who worship her work in wood, ivory, and leather; they polish gemstones but do not cut them. In art she appears as an elven woman with wise eyes wearing simple garb and surrounded by floating magical crystals similar to ioun stones. Always quick to see talent, this goddess welcomes half-elves into her faith. Her symbol is a trio of crystals overlapping in a star shape.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：智者
阵营：中立善良
神职：魔法、水晶、珠宝商
领域：工匠、大地、善良、知识、魔法
子领域：秘示域、爱塔、洞窟、构装体、神力、记忆
偏好武器：匕首
圣徽：三个重叠水晶 
圣兽：黑豹
作为德鲁伊和法师的守护神，约拉尔更喜欢自然世界的魔法，而不是金属、力场和其他人造物的魔法。
崇拜她的木头、象牙和皮革作品的珠宝商；他们抛光宝石但不切割它们。在艺术作品中，她以精灵女性的形象出现，有着充满感知的双眸，穿着简单的服饰，周围漂浮着类似于艾恩石的魔法水晶。
这位女神总是善于发掘人才，她同样欢迎半精灵加入她的信仰。她的圣徽是三个水晶重叠成的星形。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Yuelral
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 约拉尔

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Destroyer   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Death, Destruction, Disaster   
Domains: Chaos, Death, Destruction, Evil   
Subdomains: Catastrophe, Demon, Murder, Undead   
Favoured Weapon: Greatclub   
Holy Symbol: Stack of severed heads   
Sacred Animal: Cave bear   
The shamans say Zagresh was the first god of the orcs. Indeed, the Destroyer represents the primal nature of orcs, before they learned to use technology or magic. Unlike other orc gods who desire glory and power, Zagresh is a nihilist who fights only for survival, and lives only to destroy. Even orcs who profess a higher purpose revere Zagresh as the god of violent death, a fate to which all orcs aspire (those who die of natural causes are instead relegated to Dretha). Zagresh is described as a savage orc with monstrous tusks. The hides of large animals serve as his armor and clothing, and his weapon of choice is a spiked greatclub. Though he rarely uses articulate speech, Zagresh is not a quiet god. The Destroyer expresses his every emotion through animalistic growls and howls. In his joyous destruction, Zagresh’s roars echo across the battlefield and strike fear into the hearts of his enemies. The orc gods don’t ally with Zagresh so much as direct him against those they wish to annihilate. The Destroyer cares not for their machinations, only for mayhem, and as long as they provide him enemies to slaughter, he revels in the destruction. Worship of the Destroyer is more common among subterranean or less civilized and orcs. His followers rarely have much in the way of material wealth. They take joy in destroying the creations of civilized folk (including more organized orcs), and in fits of rage smash even their own possessions. The orc god of the dead is also the race’s god of the undead; even among civilized orcs, those who practice necromancy give homage to Zagresh, and those who don’t pray that Zagresh will keep their dead from rising.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：毁灭者
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：死亡、毁灭、灾难
领域：混乱、死亡、破坏、邪恶
子领域：天灾、恶魔、杀戮、亡灵
偏好武器：巨木棒
圣徽：一堆兽人头颅
圣兽：洞穴熊 萨满说萨格勒什是兽人的第一位神神祇。事实上，毁灭者代表了兽人在学会使用技术或魔法之前的原始本性。与其他渴望荣耀和权力的兽人神祇不同，萨格勒什是一个只为生存而战，只为毁灭而生的虚无主义者。即使是自称拥有崇高目标的兽人也将萨格勒什尊为暴力与死亡之神，这是所有兽人都向往的命运（那些死于自然原因的人会被归于德瑞莎）。
萨格勒什被描述为一个有着可怕獠牙的野蛮兽人。将大型动物的毛皮作为他的盔甲和衣服，他选择的武器是巨木棒。
尽管萨格勒什很少使用口齿清晰的语言，但他并不是一个安静的神。毁灭者通过野兽般的咆哮和嚎叫来表达他的每一种情感。在毁灭的狂欢中，萨格勒什的咆哮在战场上回荡，让敌人的心中充斥恐惧。
兽人诸神并没有与萨格勒什结盟，而是直接让他对抗他们想要消灭的人。毁灭者不在乎他们的阴谋，只在乎混乱，只要他们为他提供敌人屠杀，他就陶醉于毁灭中。
毁灭者的信仰在地下或文明程度较低的兽人中更为普遍。他的追随者很少有物质财富。他们乐于摧毁文明人的创造物（包括更有组织的兽人），甚至狂热地摧毁他们自己的财产。
兽人的死亡之神也是种族的亡灵之神；即使在文明的兽人中，那些使用死灵术的人也会向萨格勒什致敬，而那些不祈祷萨格勒什会阻止让死者复活的人。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Zagresh
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 萨格勒什

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Bark Breaker 
Alignment: Neutral Evil   
Areas of Concern: Arson, Hunt, Ritual 
Domains: Animal, Evil, Fire, Travel 
Subdomains: Arson, Daemon, Fur, Smoke 
Favoured Weapon: Dogslicer (Kukri)   
Holy Symbol: Severed dog's paw 
Sacred Animal: Goblin dog 
Flame-haired Zarongel, the most independent of the barghests, taught goblins how to ride. He spends his days hunting dogs and setting fires. Goblins seeking his favor must kill a dog and then burn its corpse at least once in their lives. Those who pray to him before they have performed this ritual sometimes experience misfortune, especially when dealing with flames or engaged in mounted combat. Zarongel encourages risk taking among his followers, especially where riding and arson are concerned. He tells them that their lives are brief, brutal, and hard; but those who trust in luck can win a place in his worg cavalry.
Zarongel

You can call upon the spirits of the air to grant agility to your allies. Each target gains a +30 foot enhancement bonus to its speed. Each target can also move (and charge) through difficult terrain without penalty.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以召唤气中的精魂来为你的盟友强化灵活度。每个目标在其速度上获得+30 英尺的增强加值。每个目标还可以移动（和冲锋）穿过困难的地形而不会受到惩罚。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 岚风敏捷

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lady Lastbreath   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Drowning, Invention, Self-sufficiency 
Domains: Chaos, Evil, Trickery, Water 
Subdomains: Demon, Flotsam, Oceans, Thievery 
Favoured Weapon: Sickle   
Holy Symbol: Seaweed draped chest  
Sacred Animal: Crab   
The most clever and observant of the four goblin hero-gods, but also the easiest to distract, Zogmugot encourages her followers to make the most out of their surroundings. Any goblin who discovers a way to make broken or discarded objects useful (or, even better, deadly) earns her favor. She rewards those who need her the least, showering luck and inspiration on goblins who find their own solutions to problems. Though she answers prayers as often as any of the four, her blessings frequently fade once her attention wanes. Goblins wishing to do her honor typically swim out of sight of land, hold their breath underwater until they nearly fall unconscious, or do something similar that risks drowning. As the closest thing goblins have to a patron of invention, craft, and creativity, most tribes have at least one member who pays her homage by creating weapons or clever deathtraps.
Zogmugot

Titles: Verity   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Determination, Investigation, Truth   
Domains: Good, Knowledge, Law, Travel   
Subdomains: Archon, Exploration, Judgment, Thought   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy crossbow   
Holy Symbol: Book with chequered page   
Sacred Animal: Wren   
To Zohls, the act of discovery is almost as important as the truth uncovered by it. The empyreal lord of determination and investigation, she revels in unwinding mysteries-the more complicated the better-as well as shedding light upon previously obscured events. Zohls sees existence as a series of interlocking puzzles and delights in discovering patterns. She is guided by logic more than instinct, and has trouble interacting with less perceptive beings, even fellow archons. She is an impatient empyreal lord who genuinely forgets that not everyone shares her talent for brilliant leaps oflogic. Zohls often appears practically dressed in a tunic and breeches and ties back her shining chestnut hair into braids. She favors clothing of black and white, representing the light of truth and the darkness of the unknown, and she reveals her celestial nature to the deserving by unfurling magnificent wings of parchment that never wrinkles. Investigators and researchers-who both seek the truth in their own ways-pay homage to the empyreal lord sometimes known simply as "Verity." Her agents often appear incognito to give a crucial hint or provide a key piece of evidence to the faithful. Those who hide criminal deeds capture Zohls's ire most strongly, but anyone who seeks to keep acts, lore, or objects hidden may encounter interference from Zohls's agents. Zohls uses her abilities and her agents to uncover fiendish plots and unravel the machinations of evil, particularly devils. Zohls's palace on Heaven is filled with endless halls full of labeled evidence, research notes, maps covered in check marks , sketches of interesting individuals, and laboratory equipment. She rarely visits her fellow empyreal lords, finding them largely uninteresting and difficult to talk to.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：永恒真理
阵营：守序善良 
神职：决心，调查与真相
领域：善良、知识、守序、旅行
子领域：亚空、探索、审判、思想
偏好武器：重弩 
圣徽：带有方格页的书 
圣兽：鹪鹩
被称为永恒真理，泽欧丝代表决心，调查与真相。他相信谜团将会导向真知，但如何追踪真相的过程与真相本身一样重要。一切悬疑都不过是真相的拼图，而一切拼图都值得被完整拼凑。问题越是复杂，调查就越有意义，而通过强韧的决心与符合道德的调查流程，即使是最深的谜团也能够得到解决。泽欧丝认为精密的计算和符合逻辑的思考比直觉更为重要。无论在何处，她都能看到，万事万物都有迹可循，而她教导信徒，找到这些痕迹，便能让真相大白于天下。虽然只要不伤己无辜之人，一切调查都值得追踪，但那些揭示犯罪或其他恐怖事件的真相，那些终将使正义得到伸张，让受害者获取安宁的调查对泽欧丝最为重要.
当她出现在追随者面前时，她总是穿着实用的装束，通常是宽松的束腰外袍和马裤。她身着黑白色的衣物，因为黑与白代表着真理的光明与神秘未知的黑暗。她把浅棕色的长发在脑后挽成发辫，背后是一双羊皮纸构成的巨型翅膀，无论收起还是张开，都绝不会发皱。泽欧丝的追随者包括侦探，科学家，研究者，历史学家，档案员，图书馆员，甚至阴谋论者。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Zohls
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 泽欧丝

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Vampire Queen, Demon Lord of Cannibalism and Vampires   
Realm: Nesh, The Abyss   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Blood, Cannibalism, Vampires   
Domains: Chaos, Death, Evil, Madness  
Subdomains: Blood, Demon, Murder, Undead  
Favoured Weapon: Rapier  
Profane Symbol: Crimson fanged skull rune  
Profane Animal: Vampire bat  
Profane Colours: Red
The demon lord Zura, is also known as the Vampire Queen, and is worshiped by cannibals, drow, and of course, vampires. Her profane symbol is a blood-red, fanged skull, embossed with runes. Zura is believed to be the first vampire in all of creation. Supposedly she was an ancient Azlanti queen who possessed a lust for eternal life so great she eventually resorted to feeding on her own kind. Even thousands of years later, people still whisper the legends of her decadent, savage feasts and her baths of warm human blood. Some scholars even claim that her ascension heralded the beginning of the ancient Azlant empire's descent into decadence and eventual destruction at the beginning of the Age of Darkness. Her sinfulness was so great that, on her death by botched suicide, her soul was sent to the Abyss, where she immediately arose as a succubus vampire. Her remaining family members changed their names and went into hiding after their estates were plundered and razed. Before Earthfall she had ascended to demon lord status. Zura now calls the mountainous Abyssal realm of Nesh her home. Nesh has a large number of villages inhabited by captured humanoids harvested from the Material Plane. They are, for the most part, unaware that they dwell deep in the Abyss, except the leaders, who are rewarded by Zura's minions to keep the truth hidden.   
Appearance: She is said to appear as a voluptuous woman, with a dark gothic beauty that is almost impossible to resist. This beautiful form is merely a ruse she uses to seduce her victims; her true form is that of an emaciated woman with bat-like wings in place of arms, blood-red eyes and hair, large fangs, and taloned feet.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：吸血鬼女王、食人族恶魔领主和吸血鬼
领域：内什、深渊
阵营：混乱邪恶 
神职：鲜血、同类相食、吸血鬼 
领域：混沌、死亡、邪恶、疯狂 
子领域：鲜血、恶魔、谋杀、不死族偏好武器：细剑 亵渎符号：深红尖牙骷髅符文 亵渎动物：吸血蝙蝠 亵渎颜色：红色 恶魔领主祖拉，也被称为吸血鬼女王，受到食人族、卓尔精灵，当然还有吸血鬼的崇拜。她的亵渎符号是一个血红色的长着尖牙的头骨，上面刻有符文。祖拉被认为是所有创造物中的第一个吸血鬼。据说她是一位古老的阿兹兰蒂女王，她对永生的渴望如此强烈，以至于她最终不得不以自己的同类为食。即使在数千年后，人们仍然在耳语着她颓废、野蛮的盛宴和她用温暖的人血沐浴的传说。一些学者甚至声称，她的提升预示着古代阿兹兰特帝国在黑暗时代开始时开始衰落并最终毁灭。她的罪孽深重，以至于在她因拙劣的自杀而死后，她的灵魂被送到了深渊，在那里她立即成为了一个魅魔吸血鬼。她剩下的家人在他们的庄园被掠夺和夷为平地后改名并躲藏起来。在Earthfall之前，她已经提升到恶魔领主的地位。祖拉现在将内什的山区深渊国度称为她的家。 Nesh 拥有大量村庄，居住着从物质位面收获的捕获类人生物。大多数情况下，他们不知道自己居住在深渊深处，除了领袖，祖拉的爪牙加成他们以隐藏真相。外貌：据说她是一个性感的女人，有着几乎无法抗拒的黑暗哥特式美感。这种美丽的形式只是她用来引诱受害者的技艺；她的真实形象是一个瘦弱的女人，手臂像蝙蝠一样的翅膀，血红色的眼睛和头发，巨型的尖牙和爪子。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Zura
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 祖拉

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Grim Harvestman   
Alignment: Neutral Evil   
Areas of Concern: Accidental death, Graveyards, Tragedy   
Domains: Death, Destruction, Evil, Plant, War   
Subdomains: Blood, Catastrophe, Daemon, Decay, Murder, Undead   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy pick   
Holy Symbol: Pick axe made of a femur, a human skull & a large rib   
Sacred Animal: Vulture   
Zyphus is the malignant god of accidental death. A bitter enemy of the goddess Pharasma, he is worshiped by small cults throughout Golarion. These groups foment tragedy and bring about accidents in the hopes of strengthening the power of their god.Followers of the Grim Harvestman believe that the god arose from the first maddened soul to die a pointless death. It is written that since that time, every mortal that dies in the same meaningless way is destined to be absorbed by Zyphus after death. This puts him in direct competition with the goddess Pharasma, and his followers believe that once he has acquired enough souls he will be able to engineer the death of Pharasma herself. Due to shared interests and hatred of Pharasma, Zyphus is known to consort with Urgathoa, even seeing her as a mentor.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
头衔：残酷收割者 
阵营：中立邪恶 
神职：意外死亡、墓地、悲剧
领域：死亡、破坏、邪恶、植物、战争 
子领域：鲜血、天灾、邪魔、腐朽、杀戮、亡灵
偏好：重型镐（重十字镐） 
圣徽：一把由一根股骨，一颗人类头骨与一根大肋骨所做的镐
圣兽：秃鹫
泽弗斯被认为是第一个死于意外，死得毫无意义的凡俗之人。当他作为一位新死去的灵魂出现在法莱丝玛的葬骨园时，他破敌法莱丝玛，并拒绝接受她的审判。他的愤怒以及独特的死亡状况扭转了命运，使他成神。他是意外死亡之神，是悲剧与无意义的主宰。与法莱丝玛在乎每个凡俗灵魂的既定命运不同，泽弗斯象征著在死亡命运中偶然与意料之外的面相。残忍、虚伪、吝啬以及虚无主义。泽弗斯的信徒很少，但在大多数的地方，作为意外死亡，以若隐若现的幽灵形象被恐惧著。他是一股恶毒、令人憎恶的力量，寻求将毁灭与悲伤带往世界，是许多不明原因、无意义死亡的幕后黑手。
泽弗斯的内在充满了宁静，却激昂沸腾的愤怒，这些情感会慢慢的扩大到一个临界点，然后猛烈抨击一切，这会让他得到仅仅一会儿的满足感。每个死于受感染伤口的孩童，每位在自己婚礼上死去的幸福的新郎，以及每名不幸被她自己的马匹甩出去的骑术大师，都能感受到泽弗斯那冰冷的手。据说每次意外的死亡都会使他更加强大，所以总有一天他能成长的足够强悍，篡夺他头号对手：墓穴女士的地位。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Zyphus
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 泽弗斯
